40001001	A Jeeju-Kirisi sãa-kʋnbↄ nɩ a basɩmɛ ba na sɛb, wa nyↄw nɩ a Abʋraham wa ta nɩ a Davɩtɩ ɩ̃ cen na ta a Jeeju-Kirisi.
40001002	A Abʋraham dↄw na a Ɩjakɩ, a Ɩjakɩ mɩ dↄw a Jakↄb, a Jakↄb mɩ ɩraa ɩ̃ dↄw a Juda nɩ a ʋ yɛɛr,
40001003	a Juda mɩ lɛ dↄw a Farɛsɩ nɩ a Jara (a ba mã ɩ̃ dɩ a Tamaar), a Farɛsɩ mɩ dↄw a Ɛsɩrↄ̃, a Ɛsɩrↄ̃ mɩ ɩraa ɩ̃ dↄw a Aram,
40001004	a Aram mɩ lɛ dↄw a Aminadab, a Aminadab mɩ dↄw a Naasõ, a Naasõ mɩ ɩraa ɩ̃ dↄw a Salmↄ̃,
40001005	a Salmↄ̃ mɩ lɛ dↄw a Booji (a ʋ mã dɩ na a Arahab), a Booji mɩ dↄw a Obɛdɩ (a ʋ mã dɩ na a Uruti), a Obɛdɩ mɩ ɩraa ɩ̃ dↄw a Jɛsɩ,
40001006	a Jɛsɩ mɩ lɛ dↄw a jamana Davɩtɩ.A Davɩtɩ dↄw na a Salʋmↄ̃ (a ʋ mã ɩ̃ dãa ɩ a Uri pↄw),
40001007	a Salʋmↄ̃ mɩ dↄw a Orobom, a Orobom mɩ ɩraa ɩ̃ dↄw a Abiya, a Abiya mɩ lɛ dↄw a Asafi,
40001008	a Asafi mɩ dↄw a Jojafati, a Jojafati mɩ ɩraa ɩ̃ dↄw a Joram, a Joram mɩ lɛ dↄw a Ojaasi,
40001009	a Ojaasi mɩ dↄw a Jowatam, a Jowatam mɩ ɩraa ɩ̃ dↄw a Akaji, a Akaji mɩ lɛ dↄw a Ejekasi,
40001010	a Ejekasi mɩ dↄw a Manase, a Manase mɩ ɩraa ɩ̃ dↄw a Amↄ̃, a Amↄ̃ mɩ lɛ dↄw a Jojiya,
40001011	a Jojiya mɩ dↄw a Jekↄnya nɩ a ʋ yɛɛr a daar ʋlↄ ba na nyↄↄr a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ cenʼɩ̃ a Babɩlↄ̃-tẽw.
40001012	A mɩnɛ ba na nyↄↄr a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ cenʼɩ̃ a Babɩlↄ̃-tẽw baar, a Jɛkↄnya dↄw na a Salatɩɛl a be, a Salatɩɛl mɩ dↄw a Jorobabɛl,
40001013	a Jorobabɛl mɩ ɩraa ɩ̃ dↄw a Abudi, a Abudi mɩ lɛ dↄw a Elaakɩm, a Elaakɩm mɩ dↄw a Ajↄↄr,
40001014	a Ajↄↄr mɩ ɩraa ɩ̃ dↄw a Sadↄkɩ, a Sadↄkɩ mɩ lɛ dↄw a Akɩm, a Akɩm mɩ dↄw a Eludi,
40001015	a Eludi mɩ ɩraa ɩ̃ dↄw a Elajaar, a Elajaar mɩ lɛ dↄw a Matã, a Matã mɩ dↄw a Jakↄb,
40001016	a Jakↄb mɩ ɩraa ɩ̃ dↄw a Jojɛfʋ na ɩ a Maarɩɩ sɩrɛ, a Maarɩɩ ʋlↄ na dↄw a Jeeju ba na bʋↄlↄ a Kirisi.
40001017	A nↄhↄ̃ a sãa-kʋnbↄ tu-taa dãa na ɩ a pie-nʼanuu for bir, wa nyↄw nɩ a Abʋraham daar cenʼɩ̃ na ta a Davɩtɩ. Wa mɩ nyↄw nɩ a Davɩtɩ daar cenʼɩ̃ wa ta nɩ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ Babɩlↄ̃-tẽw cenfʋ daar mɩ lɛ ɩ a tu-taa gbɛɛ pie-nʼanuu for bir. Wa mɩ nyↄw nɩ a ʋna daarʼãa wa ta nɩ a Kirisi dↄwfʋ daar lɛ ɩ na a tu-taa gbɛɛ pie-nʼanuu for bir go.
40001018	Nyɛ a mɩnɛ a Jeeju-Kirisi dↄwfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ na be. A ʋ mã Maarɩɩ nɩ a Jojɛfʋ dãa na ŋma a ba. Ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛ ba na ma kul taa sɛr wa, ba nyɛ ʋ na ʋ tɛrɛ a pʋↄ na yi a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ jie.
40001019	A ʋ baraa Jojɛfʋ ɩ na nɩ-dẽdẽ ɩ̃ ma bʋↄrↄ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ ʋ yi ƴↄ̃w a Maarɩɩ a vĩ wa, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ tɩɛrɛ a ʋ suur pʋↄ a mɩnɛ ba na ɩrɛ ɩ̃ ŋmara a ba ba ɩfʋ.
40001020	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na cãa tɩɛrɛ a ala, a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnaa nyɩr ʋ na a jãasʋlɩ̃ pʋↄ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Davɩtɩ bie Jojɛfʋ! Taa jↄrↄ dãbɩ̃ɛ a Maarɩɩ kulfʋ ɩnɛ wa, a-na-ɩ a pʋↄ ʋ na tɛrɛ yi na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ jie.
40001021	Ʋ na dↄw na dabile ɩ̃ a f̃ʋ pʋr ʋ a yuor Jeeju, a-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ nↄↄ faa a ʋ nɩbɛ a ba maal-faar pʋↄ.”
40001022	A ana yele a jaa ta na, a na ɩ a ala a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na dãa yel a ʋ ƴɛr-hiere nʋↄr pʋↄ. Ʋ dãa na yel:
40001023	“Pↄsa-bile na tɛrɛ na a pʋↄ dↄw a dabile a ba pʋr ʋ a yuor, Emanʋwɛl.” A lɛ yelʼã, áa Naaŋmɩn be nɩ sɩ na.
40001024	A mɩnɛ a Jojɛfʋ na jaw, ʋ sↄw na a ala a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sɩ-tʋnaa na yel ʋ, ɩ̃ taw a ʋ baraa kulʼɩ̃ a ʋ yir,
40001025	ɩ̃-cɛ baa gã taa wa, wa ta nɩ a lɛ ʋ na dↄw a bie baar. Ɩ̃ a Jojɛfʋ pʋrʼã a bie yuor a Jeeju.
40002001	Ba dↄw na a Jeeju a Bɛtɩlɛm na be a Jude wɩɛr. A ʋna daarʼãa a Ɛrↄdɩ ɩ̃ dãa ɩ a jamana. A ɩ na fɩ̃ɩ a bↄ̃bↄↄnbↄ na ma Ꞌwuoro a ŋmarbie yi na a tẽw parɩ̃ ɩ̃ wɩ a Jerujalɛm-tẽw pʋↄ
40002002	ɩ̃ sooro: “Nyɩnɛ ba dↄw a bibile ʋlↄ na ɩ a Jufisɩ jamana? A-na-ɩ sɩ nyɛ na a ʋ ŋmarbir a tẽw parɩ̃ ɩ̃ wa bʋↄrↄ sɩ puor ʋ.”
40002003	A lɛ a jamana Ɛrↄdɩ na wõ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ, a dama ʋ na nɩ a Jerujalɛm tẽ-deme ba jaa,
40002004	ʋ bʋↄl a Naaŋmɩn yir baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ, nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ kpaarɩ̃ taa ɩ̃ soor ba: “Nyɩnɛ ba dↄw a Kirisi?”
40002005	A ba yel ʋ: “A Bɛtɩlɛm na be a Jude wɩɛr pʋↄ ʋ. A-na-ɩ a yelʼã a ƴɛr-hiere sɛbɛ pʋↄ:
40002006	ʻA fʋ̃ʋ Jude Bɛtɩlɛm, faa nyɩrɩ̃ pab a Jude nɩ-bɛrɛ jie wa, a-na-ɩ a fʋ pʋↄ a ni-diere nↄↄ yi ɩ̃ ɩrɛɛ a dↄ-cɩɩnaa a ɩ̃ nɩbɛ Ɩsɩrayɛl jie.ʼ ”
40002007	A Ɛrↄdɩ sↄↄlɩ̃ na bʋↄl a bↄ̃bↄↄnbↄ bala ɩ̃ soor ba a ba miil ʋ a bibir ʋlↄ a ŋmarbir na nyɩr ba.
40002008	ɩ̃ ʋ tʋ̃ ba na a ba cen a Bɛtɩlɛm ɩ̃ yel: “Nyɩ́ cen na bↄ̃w Ꞌwuor bↄ̃w a jie ʋlↄ a bibile na be. A nyɩmɩ wa nyɛ ʋ, nyɩ́ wa yel ma ɩ̃ mɩ cen na puor ʋ.”
40002009	A lɛ ba na cɛl a jamana ƴɛrɩ̃ baar, ba cenʼã. Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na cere, ba nyɛ na a ŋmarbir ʋlↄ na yi a tẽw parɩ̃ ʋ be a ba nii-sↄw cere. A ŋmarbir cenʼã lɛɛ na ta a jie ʋlↄ a bibile na be ɩ̃ ɩraa a ʋ ju-sↄ̃w.
40002010	A lɛ ba na nyɛ a ŋmarbir, nʋ̃ↄ kpɛ̃ɛ nyↄw ba na a ba cɩlɛ.
40002011	Ba kpɛ na a yir pʋↄ na nyɛ a bibile ɩ̃ lo gburĩ a dume puor ʋ, ɩ̃ yuo a ba wʋʋr ir a ba bom-pↄrsɩ kʋ ʋ. Ba kʋ ʋ na a sɛlmɛ, nɩ a tɩ̃ɩ-nyu-vɩlaa, nɩ a tɩ̃ɩ ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a mɩɩr.
40002012	A Naaŋmɩn yel ba na a jãasʋlɩ̃ pʋↄ, a ba taa lɛ lɩɛb cen a Ɛrↄdɩ sɛ̃ wa, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ba de a sↄr kpee kul a ba tẽw.
40002013	A lɛ ba na lɩɛb kul baar, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sɩ-tʋnaa nyɩrʼã a Jojɛfʋ a jãasʋlɩ̃ pʋↄ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Ir de a bibile nɩ a ʋ mã jↄ cenʼɩ̃ a Ejibti-tẽw na fʋ jɛ a be wa ta nɩ a daar ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na ƴↄ̃w fʋ, a-na-ɩ a Ɛrↄdɩ nↄↄ bʋↄrↄ na ʋ kú a bibile.”
40002014	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Jojɛfʋ irʼã a tɩsↄw de a bibile nɩ a ʋ mã cere nɩ a Ejibti-tẽw,
40002015	a ba be a be wa ta nɩ a Ɛrↄdɩ kũu daar. A lɛ a ta, a na ɩ a ala a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na dãa yel a ʋ ƴɛr-hiere nʋↄr pʋↄ: “Ɩ̃ bʋↄlʼã a ɩ̃ bi-daba ʋ yi a Ejibti-tẽw pʋↄ.”
40002016	A mɩnɛ a Ɛrↄdɩ na nyɛ bↄ̃w ka a bana bↄ̃bↄↄnbↄ na yi a tẽw parɩ̃ wa, a ba bɛlɩ̃ ʋ na, ʋ nyɛ na suur yaw. Ʋ ƴↄ̃w na a ba kú a da-bil ba na dↄwrↄ ba jaa, wa ta nɩ a bala na pↄw a yomo ayi, a Bɛtɩlɛm nɩ a ten ala na be a ʋ lõbobo pʋʋr. Ʋ maalʼã a ala tu nɩ a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa wõ a saanba jie a ŋmarbir nyɩrfʋ daar.
40002017	Ɩ̃ a lɛ a maal a ɩ a mɩnɛ a ƴɛr-hiere Jeremi ƴɛrɩ̃ na dãa yel:
40002018	“Ba wõ na a kↄkɩr na wuure a Arama-tẽw pʋↄ sↄrↄ nɩ a kõ-yelbie kono nɩ yaw.A Arasɛl kono a ʋ bibiir ɩnɛ, a ba ma ƴɛw ʋ ʋ jaar, a-na-ɩ a ʋ bibiir ma cãa be wa.”
40002019	A lɛ a Ɛrↄdɩ na kpi baar, a Jojɛfʋ nyɛ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sɩ-tʋnaa a jãasʋlɩ̃ pʋↄ a Ejibti-tẽw pʋↄ. A sɩ-tʋnaa yel ʋ:
40002020	“Ir de a bibile nɩ a ʋ mã na fʋ lɛ lɩɛb kulʼɩ̃ a Ɩsɩrayɛl-tẽw pʋↄ, a-na-ɩ a bala na dãa bʋↄrↄ ba kú a bibile, ba kpi na.”
40002021	A Jojɛfʋ irʼã a lɛ, de a bibile nɩ a ʋ mã, lɩɛb kulʼɩ̃ a Ɩsɩrayɛl-tẽw pʋↄ.
40002022	Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ ʋ na wõ a Akɛlaasɩ na de a ʋ sãa Ɛrↄdɩ jɩnaafʋ jie ɩ a jamana a Jude-tẽw pʋↄ, dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw ʋ na a be kpɛfʋ. Ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na dãa wõ a ƴɛr-manaa a jãasʋlɩ̃ pʋↄ, a Galile-tẽw wɩɛr ʋ cen naa ʋ jɛ a tẽw ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Najarɛtɩ.
40002023	A maalʼã a lɛ a mɩnɛ a ƴɛr-hierbe ƴɛrɩ̃ na ɩrɛɛ a sɩrɛ: “Ba na bʋↄlↄ ʋ na a Najarɛtɩ nɩrɛ.”
40003001	A ʋna daarʼãa pʋↄ a Jã-Batii cenʼã a Jude wɛkar pʋↄ ɩ̃ nyↄw a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ yele nɩ:
40003002	“Nyɩ́ lɩɛb a nyɩ yɛ̃, a-na-ɩ a saa juu fãw daar pɩɛlɛ na.”
40003003	A Jã ɩ na a ʋlↄ a ƴɛr-hiere Ejayi na dãa ƴɛrɛ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ pʋʋr a mɩnɛ ʋ na ma dãa yele: “Ba wõ na a nɩrɛ kↄkɩr na hiere a wɛkar pʋↄ yele: Nyɩ́ gbɛɛrɩ̃ a sↄr a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ mɩ maal a ʋ sↄɛ a tor.”
40003004	A Jã ʋlↄ su na a nyʋↄmɩ kↄbↄ kparʋ, ɩ̃ mɩ sɛ a gan cẽcen a sɩɛ pʋↄ; a sãsobo nɩ a sɩɩr ʋ dãa dɩrɛ.
40003005	-
40003006	A Jerujalɛm tẽ-deme nɩ a Jude wɩɛr ʋ jaa nɩbɛ nɩ a Jʋrdɛ̃ man nʋↄr ten deme jaa cere na a ʋ sɛ̃ caala a ba maal-faar, ɩ̃ a Jã mʋrↄ ba a kʋ̃ↄ a Jʋrdɛ̃ manɩ̃.
40003007	A mɩnɛ a Jã na nyɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ nɩ a Saduse nɩbɛ a ba wɩɛrɛ yaw a kʋ̃ↄ mʋrfʋ ɩnɛ a ʋ sɛ̃, ʋ yel ba na: “Nyɩna waab bibiirʼãa! Ala jaan nyɩ a nyɩ sɛw na na jↄ cɩ̃ɛ a Naaŋmɩn suur na pɩɛlɛ?
40003008	Nyɩ́ ɩ a nyɩ maal-bie a miile áa nyɩ yɛ̃ lɩɛbʼã.
40003009	A tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ nyɩ na tɛrɛ a nyɩ pʋʋr, áa Abʋraham ɩ na a nyɩ sãa-kʋmↄ, ma sɛw nyɩ wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ yel nyɩ na, a kubie asɩmɛ nyɩ na nyɛ, a Naaŋmɩn na tʋↄ na lɩɛb ba a ba ɩ a Abʋraham bibiir.
40003010	Ba gↄrʼã ƴↄ̃w a kpãakpo a tɩɩr nyɩbɛ pʋʋr. A tɩɛ lɛ na ma wↄnↄ a wↄ̃-vɛlɛ wa, ba na ŋmaa ʋ na lↄb ƴↄ̃w a vũu pʋↄ.
40003011	A maa, kʋ̃ↄ tɛw ɩ̃ mʋrↄ nyɩ, na miile a nyɩ yɛ̃-lɩɛbfʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ nɩrɛ be na be na waara a ɩ̃ puo-sↄw na gãw ma, a maa mɩ sɛw na sɩɩr a ʋ nafaba wa. A ʋlↄ, ʋ nↄↄ mʋr nyɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ pʋↄ nɩ a vũu pʋↄ.
40003012	Ʋ tɛrɛ na a ci-ŋme-daa a nuu pʋↄ ʋ na ŋmeere nɩ a ci, ɩ̃ yɛlɛ diere a ci ƴↄnↄ a boor pʋↄ, ɩ̃ cɩɛrɛ a ure ƴↄnↄ a vũu ʋlↄ pʋↄ na ma tɛrɛ a kpiiufʋ wa.”
40003013	A daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ, a Jeeju yi na a Galile ɩ̃ cen a Jʋrdɛ̃ manɩ̃ a Jã sɛ̃ a kʋ̃ↄ mʋrfʋ ɩnɛ.
40003014	A Jã ma bʋↄrↄ ʋ sↄw wa, ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Maa ɩ̃ sɛw a fʋ na mʋr ma a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ lɛ waara a ɩ̃ sɛ̃?”
40003015	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Bar a sɩ maal a lɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, a-na-ɩ lɛ sɩ na maal a tʋmↄ a jaa a Naaŋmɩn na bʋↄrↄ sɩ maal,” ɩ̃ a Jã pãa sↄw.
40003016	A lɛ ʋ na mʋr a Jeeju a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ baar ʋ yi na a kʋ̃ↄmɩ, ɩ̃ a jie naan a saꞋlon yuo na a ʋ ɩnɛ, ʋ nyɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ʋ wↄ̃ taa nɩ a ŋmam ʋ suure waara a ʋ sɛ̃.
40003017	Ɩ̃ ba wõ na a kↄkɩr na yi a saa juu ɩ̃ yel: “A naa ɩ a ɩ̃ Bi-nʋnaa na kpɛ ma a nyãa.”
40004001	A ala ɩ̃ baar, a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tↄw na a Jeeju kpɛ nɩ a wɛkar pʋↄ a Satã na bɩɩr ʋ.
40004002	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na lũ a nʋↄr a bibie lɩjaayi, a kↄ̃ nyↄw ʋ na.
40004003	A Bɩbɩɩrɛ wɩ na a ʋ sɛ̃ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “A ala ɩ fʋ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Bie, yel a kubie na a ba lɩɛb ɩ a dɩb.”
40004004	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A yelʼã a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: ʻAa ɩ a dɩb tɛw na baa a nɩrɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a jaa na yire a Naaŋmɩn nʋↄr pʋↄ, ala a nɩrɛ na baa nɩ.ʼ ”
40004005	Ɩ̃ a Satã taw na a Jeeju cenʼɩ̃ a Jerujalɛm na ɩ a ba tẽ-son, ɩ̃ ɩ ʋ do ɩraa a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ ju-sↄ̃w
40004006	ɩ̃ ʋ yel ʋ: “A ala ɩ fʋ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Bie, aw lo a tene, a-na-ɩ a yelʼã a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: ʻA Naaŋmɩn na kʋ na a sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃ a fʋ ɩnɛ, a ba cↄw fʋ nɩ a ba nur a mɩnɛ fʋ kↄ̃ wa ŋme gbɛr wa.ʼ ”
40004007	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A lɛ yelʼã a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: ʻTaa bɩɩrɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na ɩ a fʋ Naaŋmɩn wa.ʼ ”
40004008	A Satã lɛ taw na a Jeeju do nɩ a tã-kpɛ̃ɛ juu na miil ʋ a ten ten a jaa nɩ a ba yo-yifʋ yele
40004009	ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “A fʋ̃ʋ gburĩ a dume ɩ̃ puor ma, ɩ̃ na kʋ fʋ na a ana yele a jaa.”
40004010	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Satã, cen be ɩ̃ cɛ ma! A-na-ɩ a yelʼã a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: ʻA Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na ɩ a fʋ Naaŋmɩn, ʋlↄ fʋ na puoro, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ tʋn tɛw fʋ na mɩ tʋnↄ.ʼ ”
40004011	A lɛ, a Satã bar ʋ na ɩ̃ a sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ wɩ sũono ʋ.
40004012	A lɛ a Jeeju na wõ a ba nyↄw a Jã ƴↄ̃w a kasu pʋↄ, ʋ lɛ lɩɛbʼã cen a Galile.
40004013	A mɩnɛ ʋ na yi a Najarɛtɩ-tẽw, ʋ cenʼã na jɛ a Kapɛɛnam-tẽw na be a man nʋↄr, a Jabʋlↄ̃ nɩ a Nɛbtalɩ wɩɛr.
40004014	A ta na a lɛ, a na ɩ a ƴɛr-hiere Ejayi ƴɛrɩ̃ na dãa yel:
40004015	“A Jabʋlↄ̃ nɩ a Nɛbtalɩ wɛɛ na be a man sↄɛ pʋʋr a Jʋrdɛ̃ man gaan, a Galile ʋlↄ na ɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ tẽw,
40004016	a bana nɩbɛ naa na dãa jɛ a libe pʋↄ nyɛ na a cãa kpɛ̃ɛ; a bala na mɩ dãa jɛ a kũu nʋↄr libe pʋↄ, mɩ nyɛ na a cãa ʋ pur caarɩ̃ ba.”
40004017	Wa nyↄw nɩ a daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ a Jeeju hiere na yele nɩ: “Nyɩ́ lɩɛb a nyɩ yɛ̃, a-na-ɩ a saa juu fãw pɩɛlʼã.”
40004018	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na lara a Galile man gbẽgbere, ʋ nyɛ na a yɛɛr ayi, a Sɩmↄ̃ ʋlↄ na mɩ dɩ a Pɩɛr nɩ a Ádire, a ba bɛrɛ a jɩmɛ a manɩ̃ a-na-ɩ jɩ̃-nyↄↄrbↄ ba ɩ.
40004019	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ wa tuure ma, ɩ̃ ɩ̃ na lɩɛb nyɩ na a nyɩ na bʋↄrↄ a nɩbɛ kʋrↄ ma a jɩ̃-bɛrɛ kaarɩ̃.”
40004020	A jie naan ba barʼã a ba jʋʋr ɩ̃ tuure ʋ.
40004021	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na po a nii-sↄw, ʋ nyɛ na yɛɛr ayi go na ɩ a Jakɩ nɩ a Jã na ɩ a Jebede bi-dabsɩ, a ba be taa nɩ a ba sãa a gbor pʋↄ cↄↄrↄ a ba jʋʋr, ʋ mɩ bʋↄl ba.
40004022	Ɩ̃ a jie naan ba barʼã a ba sãa nɩ a gbor ɩ̃ tuure ʋ.
40004023	A Jeeju yʋↄrↄ na a Galile-tẽw ʋ jaa jaana a Jufisɩ a ba puorfʋ yie pʋʋr, hiere nɩ a saa juu fãw ƴɛr-son, kpaara nɩ a wʋlɩ̃-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ deme.
40004024	A ʋ yuor yɛrʼã pↄw a Sɩrɩ-tẽw ʋ jaa, a nɩbɛ wɩɛrɛ nɩ a bala ba jaa na tɛrɛ a wʋlɩ̃-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ, a bala na nyɛrɛ a hʋʋr, a kↄ̃tↄn-irbe, a ŋme-kpar deme, nɩ a bala na sãw a ɩ̃gana, ʋ kpaara ba.
40004025	A nɩ-yayaw yi na a Galile, a Ten-Pie tẽ-daa, a Jerujalɛm, a Jude, nɩ a Jʋrdɛ̃ man gaan ɩ̃ wa tuure ʋ.
40005001	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na nyɛ a bana nɩ-yaw a ba tuure ʋ, ʋ do na a tãw juu jɛ, a ʋ par-tuurbe wɩ a ʋ sɛ̃,
40005002	ʋ nyↄw a jaanfʋ ɩ̃ jaana ba, yele nɩ:
40005003	“Nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a bala jie na tɛrɛ a nãw a sɩɛ pʋↄ, a-na-ɩ bala sↄ a saa juu fãw.
40005004	Nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a bala jie a sube na sãw, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn nↄↄ ƴɛw ba na.
40005005	Nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a bala jie na tɛrɛ a su-ɓaara, a-na-ɩ bala wa sↄrɛɛ a tẽw.
40005006	Nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a bala jie na nyɩrɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ a torfʋ a kↄ̃ nɩ a kʋ̃ↄ-nyuur kaarɩ̃, a-na-ɩ ba nↄↄ pↄw ʋ na.
40005007	Nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a bala jie na tɛrɛ a nã-bↄ̃wfʋ a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn nↄↄ mɩ bↄ̃w na a ba nãw.
40005008	Nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a bala jie na tɛrɛ a su-pɩlaa, a-na-ɩ ba nↄↄ nyɛ na a Naaŋmɩn.
40005009	Nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a bala jie na bʋↄrↄ a nɩbɛ pɩɛnfʋ, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn nↄↄ bʋↄl ba na a ʋ bibiir.
40005010	Nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a bala jie ba na hʋↄlↄ a torfʋ ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ bala sↄ a saa juu fãw.
40005011	“A na ɩ nyɩ na nʋ̃ↄ a lɛ ba nↄↄ tʋrↄ nyɩ, ɩ̃ hʋↄlↄ nyɩ, ɩ̃ mɩ ŋmara a jir-kara ƴↄnↄ nyɩ a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ.
40005012	Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ nʋ̃ↄ cɩlɛ nɩ, a-na-ɩ a nyɩ yar nↄↄ bɛrmɛ na a saa juu. Nyɩ bↄ̃w na ka a lɛ ba mɩ dãa hʋↄl a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe na dãa de nyɩ a nĩe.
40005013	“Nyɩmɩ ɩ a nasõ a tẽw pʋↄ deme jie, ɩ̃-cɛ a nasõ tomofʋ wa baar, bõ a nɩrɛ na nyɛ ƴↄ̃w ʋ ʋ lɛ tomo? ꞋWaa lɛ ɩ bom go wa. Ba na de ʋ na lↄb bar, a ba nɛbɛ nɩ gbɛɛ.
40005014	“Nyɩmɩ ɩ a cãa a tẽw pʋↄ deme jie. A tẽw na be a tãw juu ma tʋↄrↄ sↄↄlↄ wa.
40005015	Nɩrɛ ma ƴↄnↄ a lãpa a vũu, ɩ̃ lɛ diere pↄwrↄ a lakpow pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a gbẽgbere juu ʋ na dↄↄl ʋ, ʋ caara a nɩbɛ jaa na be a yir pʋↄ.
40005016	A lɛ ʋ mɩ, a sɛw na a nyɩ na ɩ a nyɩ cãa ʋ caara a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw, a mɩnɛ a ba na tʋↄ nyɛ a nyɩ tʋ̃-sono, ɩ̃ kʋrↄ a nyɩ Sãa na be a saa juu a ju-kpɛ̃ɛ.
40005017	“Nyɩ taa tɩɛr beeka ɩ̃ wa na a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn sãwfʋ ɩnɛ wa, mɩɩ a ƴɛr-hierbe ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ sãwfʋ ɩnɛ wa. Maa wa a ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ sãwfʋ ɩnɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ wa na a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na tʋↄ maal a jaa baar.
40005018	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a lɛdaar a saꞋlon nɩ a tẽw na ma tↄl sɛr wa, a sɛb-bir ŋmãa mɩɩ a sɛb-bir pabaa na be a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn pʋↄ ma tʋↄrↄ ire bara wa. A jaa na maalʼã wa baar.
40005019	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na jaar a ƴɛr-kpɛ̃w kãw, a ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a ƴɛr-bir bile ʋ, ɩ̃ mɩ miile a nɩbɛ a ba maala a ʋ kaarɩ̃, a ʋna nɩrɛ naa na nyɩrɩ̃ na pab a saa juu fãw pʋↄ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na sↄw ɩ̃ mɩ miile a nɩbɛ a ba maala a lɛ, a ʋna nɩrɛ naa na nyɩrɩ̃ na ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ a saa juu fãw pʋↄ.
40005020	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a nyɩmɩ ma ɩ dẽdẽ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ jↄfʋ pʋↄ gãw a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ wa, nyaa tʋↄrↄ kpɛɛrɛ a saa juu fãw pʋↄ wa.
40005021	“Nyɩ wõ na a mɩnɛ ba na dãa yel kʋ a korĩ-cɛ deme, a ba taa kúrↄ nɩrɛ wa. Áa nɩrɛ wa kú nɩrɛ, a ba na cenʼɩ̃ ʋ na a ƴɛr-guoro jie.
40005022	Ɩ̃-cɛ a maa, ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a nɩrɛ lɛ na nyɛrɛ a suur ƴↄnↄ a ʋ yɛbɛ, ba na mɩ cenʼɩ̃ ʋ na a ƴɛr-guoro jie. Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na yel a ʋ yɛbɛ á dãbol, ba na cenʼɩ̃ ʋ na a ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na yel a ʋ yɛbɛ á ʋ yaara na, ʋ na tʋↄ na kpɛ a wɛfʋ vũu pʋↄ.
40005023	A fʋ̃ʋ tɛrɛ a bom bʋↄrↄ fʋ kʋ a Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃ wa tɩɛr yuo be a baar lofʋ jie a fʋ yɛbɛ na tɛrɛ nɩ fʋ a ƴɛrɩ̃,
40005024	bar a bom ʋlↄ a be a baar lofʋ jie, ɩ̃ cen na cↄↄrɩ̃ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩ a fʋ yɛbɛ baar, ɩ̃ pãa lɛ wa de a fʋ bom kʋ a Naaŋmɩn.
40005025	“A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ tɛrɛ nɩ fʋ na ƴɛrɩ̃ a ʋ bom fʋ na sãw ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ cere nɩ fʋ a ƴɛr-guoro jie, ɓaalɩ̃ ʋ fↄfↄw a lɛ nyɩ na cãa a sↄr pʋↄ cere, a-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ ta nɩ fʋ a be, ʋ na ƴↄ̃w fʋ na a ƴɛr-guoro nuumɩ ʋ de fʋ kʋ a parsãde ʋ ƴↄ̃w fʋ a kasu pʋↄ.
40005026	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele fʋ, faa yire a be ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ma ɩ fʋ ya na a fʋ san a jaa wa.
40005027	“Nyɩ wõ na a mɩnɛ ba na dãa yel a nɩrɛ ʋ taa wa gana nɩ a ʋ tↄ sʋbↄ pↄw wa,
40005028	Ɩ̃-cɛ a maa, ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a nɩrɛ lɛ na Ꞌwuoro a pↄw a Ꞌwuor-fãa, ʋ gↄrʼã gã nɩ ʋ a ʋ suur pʋↄ.
40005029	A ala ɩ a fʋ dʋrɩ̃ mimir ɩ̃ ƴↄnↄ fʋ a fãa pʋↄ, ir ʋ lↄb bar, a-na-ɩ a sa na a fʋ ɩ̃gan ji-bõ-ƴen na bↄr gãw a fʋ ɩ̃gan ʋ jaa ba na diere lↄbↄ ƴↄnↄ a vũu pʋↄ.
40005030	A ala mɩ ɩ a fʋ dʋrɩ̃ nuu wa mɩ ƴↄnↄ fʋ a fãa pʋↄ, fú ŋmaa ʋ lↄb bar, a-na-ɩ a sa na a fʋ ɩ̃gan jie kãw na bↄr, gãw a fʋ ɩ̃gan ʋ jaa na kpɛɛrɛ a vũu pʋↄ.
40005031	“Ba mɩ dãa na yel, aa nɩrɛ wa diwre a ʋ pↄw bara, ú kʋ ʋ a barfʋ sɛbɛ.
40005032	Ɩ̃-cɛ a mãa, ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a ʋlↄ na diwre a ʋ pↄw bara ɩ̃-cɛ a pↄw ʋlↄ ma dãa maala a burbur wa, ʋ ƴↄ̃w ʋ na a dab-kpee ganɩfʋ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a daba ʋlↄ na kule a ʋna pↄw naa na mɩ maalʼã a ʋna fãa.
40005033	“Nyɩ mɩ wõ na a mɩnɛ ba na dãa yel kʋ a korĩ-cɛ deme: ʻTaa mↄ̃wnↄ a fʋ pʋlɩ̃fʋ bom wa. Maal kʋ a Naaŋmɩn a ala fʋ na dãa pↄ nɩ ʋ.ʼ
40005034	Ɩ̃-cɛ a maa, ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, nyɩ taa wa pↄrↄ fɩ̃ɩ wa. A ala ɩ a saa juu ʋ mɩɩ, taa pↄrↄ nɩ ʋ wa, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn jaajie ʋ.
40005035	A tẽw ʋ mɩɩ, taa mɩ pↄrↄ nɩ ʋ wa, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn gbɛɛ dↄↄlfʋ jie ʋ. A Jerujalɛm ʋ mɩɩ, taa mɩ lɛ pↄrↄ nɩ ʋ wa, a-na-ɩ a Jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ tẽw ʋ.
40005036	Taa mɩ lↄↄ pↄrↄ nɩ a fʋ juu wa, a-na-ɩ faa tʋↄrↄ lɩɛbɛ a fʋ jukↄↄr ʋ pɛlɛɛ mɩɩ ʋ sↄbↄ wa.
40005037	A nyɩ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a ɩ a ʻↄↄʼ mɩɩ a ʻkpeeʼ. A ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala nyɩ na ƴɛrɛ dↄↄlↄ, a yi na a Fãa Sʋbↄ jie.
40005038	“Nyɩ wõ na a mɩnɛ ba na dãa yel: ʻA mimir ba na de ya a mimir, a nyɩm ba na mɩ de ya a nyɩmʼ.
40005039	Ɩ̃-cɛ a maa, ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, taa lɩɛb a fãa ya a fãa wa. A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ ɓa fʋ na a dʋrɩ̃ tʋkpalɩ̃, cↄw ʋ a gʋbaa tʋkpal ʋ lɛ ɓa.
40005040	Ɩ̃ a nɩrɛ bʋↄrↄ ʋ cenʼɩ̃ fʋ a ƴɛr-guoro jie, na de a fʋ kparle, de a fʋ fu ɓã taa nɩ ʋ.
40005041	Ɩ̃ a nɩrɛ wa fɛr fʋ a fʋ de a ʋ tuor cenʼɩ̃ fɩ̃ɩ kʋ ʋ, de cenʼɩ̃ a jãa a fʋ kʋ ʋ.
40005042	Kʋ a ʋlↄ na sʋↄrↄ; taa mɩ mↄ̃wnↄ a ʋlↄ na pɛ̃wnɛ wa.
40005043	“Nyɩ wõ na a mɩnɛ ba na dãa yel: ʻNʋnↄ a fʋ tↄ sʋbↄ ɩ̃ Ꞌlaar a fʋ san-sʋbↄ.ʼ
40005044	Ɩ̃-cɛ a maa, ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, nyɩ́ nʋnↄ a nyɩ dↄ̃-deme, ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄnↄ a bala na hʋↄlↄ nyɩ,
40005045	a mɩnɛ nyɩ na tʋↄrↄ ɩrɛ a nyɩ Sãa na be a saa juu bibiir. Á-na-ɩ ʋ ma purʼã a ʋ mↄtↄ̃w ƴↄ̃w a nɩ-faar nɩ a nɩ-sono, ɩ̃ mɩ ɩ a ʋ saa ʋ wa a nɩ-torisɩ nɩ a bala na maala a burbur jaa ɩnɛ.
40005046	A ala ɩ nyɩ nʋnↄ na a bala tɛw na nʋnↄ nyɩ, bõ yar nyɩ na lɛ pↄw? A lãpo-dierbe maa mɩ maal a lɛ wa mɩɩ?
40005047	A ala ɩ a nyɩ nɩ-nʋnɩsɩ tɛw nyɩ puoro, a nyɩ maalfʋ sa na a nɩŋmɛɛ maalfʋ mɩɩ? A tɩbɛ deme maa mɩ maal a lɛ wa mɩɩ?
40005048	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, nyɩ́ ɩ cɛcɛ a mɩnɛ a nyɩ Sãa na be a saa juu na ɩ a cɛcɛ.
40006001	“Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a nyɩ torfʋ tʋmↄ ɩnɛ, a nyɩ kↄ̃ wa maal bom kãw a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw a ba Ꞌwuoro nyɩ wa. A nyɩmɩ wa maal a lɛ, nyaa pↄwrↄ a yar a nyɩ Sãa na be a saa juu jie wa.
40006002	“A lɛdaar fʋ na kʋrↄ a nãw sʋbↄ a bom, taa maala nɩ a yo-bↄb wa. A-na-ɩ lɛ a poe ayi deme ma maal a ba puorfʋ yie pʋʋr nɩ a sↄɛ pʋʋr, a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ na nyɛ ba ɩ̃ pɛwrɛ ba. Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a bala, ba gↄrʼã pↄw a ba yar.
40006003	Ɩ̃ a fʋ̃ʋ kʋrↄ a nãw sʋbↄ a bom taa tɩɛr a ɩ fʋ bom kpɛ̃ɛ wa.
40006004	Sↄↄlɩ̃ maal, ɩ̃ a fʋ Sãa na nyɛ a fʋ sↄↄlɩ̃fʋ tʋmↄ na ya fʋ na.
40006005	“A nyɩmɩ puoro a Naaŋmɩn, nyɩ taa maala a mɩnɛ a poe ayi deme na ma maal wa, a-na-ɩ a nʋmↄ ba na a ba ma ir ɩraa puoro a ba puorfʋ yie pʋʋr nɩ a sↄ-carsɩ pʋʋr a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ na nyɛ ba. Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, ba gↄrʼã pↄw a ba yar.
40006006	Ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ̃ʋ, a fʋ̃ʋ puoro a Naaŋmɩn, kpɛ a fʋ diem, pↄw a pan ɩ̃ puor a fʋ Sãa na be a be a sↄↄlɩ̃fʋ jie, ɩ̃ a fʋ Sãa ʋlↄ na nyɛ a ala fʋ na sↄↄlɩ̃ maal, ʋ na ya fʋ na.
40006007	“A nyɩmɩ puoro, nyɩ taa dↄↄlↄ a ƴɛr-pↄrsɩ a mɩnɛ a nɩ-kpeesɩ na ma maal wa. A-na-ɩ ba ma tɩɛrʼã beeka a ba ƴɛr-yaw ɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na wonaa.
40006008	Nyɩ taa maala a ba kaarɩ̃ wa, a-na-ɩ a lɛdaar nyɩ na ma sʋↄr sɛr wa, a nyɩ Sãa de na nĩe bↄ̃w a ala na sɛw nɩ nyɩ.
40006009	Ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ nyɛ a mɩnɛ na sɛw a nyɩ na sʋↄrↄ: ʻA sɩ Sãa na be a saa juu, a fʋ yuor ú ow kpee,
40006010	a fʋ fãw ú wa, a fʋ pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ ú maal a tẽw pʋↄ, a mɩnɛ ʋ na maal a saa juu.
40006011	Kʋ sɩ a dɩb ala na sɛw nɩ sɩ a dɩnaa.
40006012	De a sɩ maal-faar bar kʋ sɩ, a mɩnɛ sɩ na ma mɩ de a maal-faar ala a nɩbɛ na maal sɩ bar kʋ ba.
40006013	Taa bar sɩ a sɩ kpɛ a bɩɩrfʋ pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ faa sɩ a Fãa Sʋbↄ jie.ʼ
40006014	“A-na-ɩ a ala ɩ nyɩ de na a nɩbɛ maal-faar bar kʋ ba, a nyɩ saa juu Sãa na mɩ de na a nyɩ ben bar kʋ nyɩ.
40006015	Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ ma de a nɩbɛ maal-faar bar kʋ ba wa, a nyɩ Sãa kↄ̃ mɩ de a nyɩ maal-faar bar kʋ nyɩ wa.
40006016	“A nyɩmɩ lũ a nʋↄr, nyɩ taa maala a poe ayi deme kaarɩ̃, sↄbↄ nɩ a nii-sↄw wa. A-na-ɩ ba ma lɩɛbʼã a ba nii-sↄw wↄ̃ taa nɩ nãw deme ba ɩ, a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ na tʋↄ bↄ̃w a nʋↄr ba lũ. Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, ba pↄw na a ba yar.
40006017	Ɩ̃ a fʋ̃ʋ, a fʋ̃ʋ lũ a nʋↄr, pɛw a nii-sↄw ɩ̃ ir a juu
40006018	a mɩnɛ a nɩrɛ kↄ̃ wa bↄ̃w ka nʋↄr fʋ lũ wa, ɩ̃ a ɩ a fʋ Sãa tɛw na be a be a sↄↄlɩ̃fʋ jie. Ɩ̃ a fʋ Sãa ʋlↄ na nyɛ a ala fʋ na maal a sↄↄlɩ̃, na ya fʋ na.
40006019	“Nyɩ taa bʋↄrↄ a na-yele dↄↄlↄ taa a ka a tẽw pʋↄ wa. A-na-ɩ a ka, a kpolo be na ka mↄↄrↄ, a bajɩ̃ɩ mɩ dɩrɛ sãwna, ɩ̃ a nyanyube mɩ kpɛɛrɛ jure.
40006020	Ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ bʋↄrↄ a saꞋlon na-yele dↄↄlↄ taa. A-na-ɩ a be, kpolo ma be be mↄↄrↄ wa, bajɩ̃ɩ ma mɩ be be dɩrɛ sãwna wa, ɩ̃ nyanyube ma mɩ kpɛɛrɛ be jure wa.
40006021	A-na-ɩ a jie ʋlↄ a fʋ na-yele na be, a be a fʋ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ na mɩ be.
40006022	“A mimie ɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃gan lãpa. A fʋ mimie wa ɩ mimi-sono, a fʋ ɩ̃gan ʋ jaa na caarɩ̃ na.
40006023	Ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ mimie wa sãw, a fʋ ɩ̃gan ʋ jaa na liw na. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a cãa ʋlↄ na be a fʋ suur pʋↄ, a ʋlↄ ma caara wa, mɩnɛ a libe na bɛrmɛ jɛ̃!
40006024	“Nɩrɛ ma be be na tʋↄrↄ tʋnↄ a nɩ-bɛrɛ ayi tʋn wa. Ʋ na Ꞌlaarʼã a kãw ɩ̃ nʋnↄ a ƴen sʋbↄ, mɩɩ ʋ na ƴↄnↄ na a bõ-ƴen ɩ̃ kpɛrɛ a kãw. Nyaa tʋↄrↄ puoro a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ mɩ ɩrɛ a na-yele gbãgbaar wa.
40006025	“Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, nyɩ taa waala a nyɩ baafʋ ɩnɛ wa, yele nɩ a bõ nyɩ na dɩrɛ ɩ̃ mɩ nyuure, mɩɩ mɩ waala nɩ a nyɩ ɩ̃gan ɩnɛ a bõ nyɩ na nyɛ su wa. A baafʋ ma gãw a bõ-dɩraa wa mɩɩ? Ɩ̃ a ɩ̃gan ma mɩ gãw a cẽcen wa mɩɩ?
40006026	Nyɩ́ Ꞌwuor nyɛ a lili na be a saꞋlon. Ba maa bʋr wa; ba maa ŋma wa; baa mɩ tɛrɛ boor wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩ saa juu Sãa ʋlↄ guolo ba. Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, nyaa sa gãw a lili wa mɩɩ?
40006027	A nyɩ waalɩ̃fʋ pʋↄ, ala be a nyɩ pʋↄ na tʋↄ tↄ a ʋ baafʋ bibie dↄↄl fɩ̃ɩ?
40006028	“Bõ ɩ a nyɩ ma waala a cẽcene ɩnɛ? Nyɩ́ Ꞌwuor nyɛ a mɩnɛ a mↄↄpʋↄ tɩ-pube na wↄ̃. Ba maa tʋ̃ tʋn wa; ba maa mɩ sɛ cẽcene su wa,
40006029	ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a ala ɩ a Salʋmↄ̃ na dãa le ʋ, Ꞌwaa dãa tɛrɛ cẽcen ʋ wↄ̃ taa nɩ a tɩ-pube asɩmɛ bõ-ƴen kaarɩ̃ wa.
40006030	A ala ɩ a Naaŋmɩn na maal a mↄↄ pʋↄ tɩ-pube a vɩɛlɛ a lɛ, a tɩ-pube ala na be a be a dɩnaa, ɩ̃-cɛ a bio vɩɛ a ba de lↄb ƴↄ̃w a vũu pʋↄ, ʋ kↄ̃ tʋↄ maal nyɩ a gãw a lɛ wa mɩɩ? A nyɩ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa pabʼã a Naaŋmɩn jie.
40006031	Ála-ɩ̃-sↄ, nyɩ taa waala yele nɩ: ʻA bõ nyɩ nↄↄ nyɛ dɩ, mɩɩ á bõ nyɩ nↄↄ nyɛ nyu wa, ɩ̃ cɛ á bõ nyɩ na nyɛ su.ʼ
40006032	Tɩbɛ deme ɩ̃ ma bʋↄrↄ a ana yele a jaa, ɩ̃ a nyɩ saa juu Sãa bↄ̃w na bↄ̃w ka nyɩ bʋↄrↄ na a ana yele.
40006033	Nyɩ́ bʋↄrↄ a ʋ fãw nɩ a ʋ torfʋ sɛr, ɩ̃ a ala a jaa na cɛ ʋ na de na kʋ nyɩ dↄↄl.
40006034	Nyɩ taa ɩ a bio tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ a dama nyɩ wa, a-na-ɩ a bio tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ mɩ sɛw nɩ ʋ na. A bibie a jaa tɛrɛ na a ba won na mɩ sɛw ba.
40007001	“Nyɩ taa koro nɩrɛ wa, a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn kↄ̃ wa guor a nyɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa.
40007002	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn nↄↄ guorʼã a nyɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ a mɩnɛ nyɩ na mɩ guoro a nɩbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, ɩ̃ a bom lɛ nyɩ na de mana nɩ a yele, a ʋna bom a Naaŋmɩn na mɩ de manʼɩ̃ a nyɩ ben.
40007003	Bõ ɩ a fʋ Ꞌwuoro a mobir na be a fʋ yɛbɛ mimir pʋↄ ɩ̃ ma tɩɛrɛ nɩ a dakpur na be a fʋ mimir pʋↄ wa?
40007004	Mɩnɛ fʋ na tʋↄ ɩ ɩ̃ yel a fʋ yɛbɛ: ʻƖra lɛ, ɩ̃ pɛɛl fʋ mobir na be a fʋ mimirɩ̃,ʼ ɩ̃-cɛ a dakpur cãa be a fʋ mimir pʋↄ?
40007005	Fʋ ɩ na bɛbɛlɛ! A sɛw na fʋ de nĩe ir a dakpur na be a fʋ mimir pʋↄ baar, ɩ̃ pãa tʋↄ nyɛ a mɩnɛ fʋ na ɩrɛ ɩ̃ pɛɛlɛ a mobir na be a fʋ yɛbɛ mimirɩ̃.
40007006	“Nyɩ taa de a Naaŋmɩn yel-ciirsɩ ƴↄnↄ a baar wa a mɩnɛ a ba nↄↄ wa lɩɛb dʋ̃ nyɩ wa. Ɩ̃ nyɩ taa mɩ de a nyɩ yel-sono na kpɛmɛ a dafʋ lↄbↄ ƴↄnↄ a dor a mɩnɛ a ba nↄↄ wa nɛbɛ nɩ gbɛɛ wa.
40007007	“Nyɩ́ sʋↄrↄ, ɩ̃ ba na kʋ nyɩ na. Nyɩ́ bʋↄrↄ, ɩ̃ nyɩ na nyaa na. Nyɩ́ ŋmeere a pan, ɩ̃ ba na yuo nyɩ na.
40007008	A-na-ɩ a nɩrɛ lɛ na sʋↄrↄ, ʋ na pↄw na, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na bʋↄrↄ, ʋ na nyɛ na. A ʋlↄ mɩ na mɩ ŋmeere, ba na yuo ʋ na a pan.
40007009	Sãa buor be ka a nyɩ pʋↄ a ʋ bie wa sʋↄr ʋ a bõ-son, ʋ de kubir kʋ ʋ?
40007010	Mɩɩ a jɩm ʋ sʋↄr ʋ, ʋ nyↄw waab kʋ ʋ?
40007011	A nyɩmɩ na ɩ a nɩ-faar ɩ̃ bↄ̃w a yel-sono kʋrↄ a nyɩ bibiir, wa yele nɩ a nyɩ Sãa na be a saa juu, ʋ kↄ̃ kʋ a bala na sʋↄrↄ ʋ a yel-sono wa?
40007012	“A bom jaa lɛ nyɩ na bʋↄrↄ a nɩbɛ ba maal kʋ nyɩ, nyɩ́ mɩ maal a lɛ kʋ ba. A-na-ɩ a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn nɩ a ƴɛr-hierbe ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ par nɩ a lɛ.
40007013	“Nyɩ́ de a sↄr ʋlↄ na yire a dↄ̃dↄr nↄ-bile pʋↄ, a-na-ɩ a dↄ̃dↄr nↄ-yalaa be na be, a ʋ sↄr mɩ yↄw ɩ̃ cere a wɛfʋ jie, ɩ̃ a yaw jie de na a ʋna sↄr.
40007014	Ɩ̃-cɛ a dↄ̃dↄr nↄ-bile be na be, a ʋ sↄr mɩ kpɛmɛ a defʋ, ɩ̃ cere a baafʋ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a bala na nyɛ a ʋna sↄr, baa jɛ̃ bom wa.
40007015	“Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a bala na ƴɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ bɛlɛ nɩ a nɩbɛ. Ba ma wa na a nyɩ jie wↄ̃ taa nɩ piir, ɩ̃-cɛ a ba pʋʋr, Ꞌwʋbsɩ ba ɩ.
40007016	A ba maal-bie jie nyɩ na bↄ̃w nɩ ba. A gʋ-tɩɛ ma wↄnↄ a aaraa wa; a gʋ-salaa ma mɩ wↄnↄ a Ꞌwↄrↄ wa.
40007017	A tɩ-son wↄnↄ na a bi-sono, a tɩ-kpana mɩ wↄnↄ a bi-kpana.
40007018	A tɩ-son ma tʋↄrↄ wↄnↄ a bi-kpana wa, a tɩ-kpana mɩ ma mɩ tʋↄrↄ wↄnↄ a bi-son wa.
40007019	A tɩɛ lɛ na ma wↄnↄ a bi-son wa, ba na ŋmaa ʋ na ƴↄ̃w a vũu pʋↄ ʋ dɩ.
40007020	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a nɩbɛ bala, a ba maal-bie jie nyɩ na bↄ̃w nɩ ba.
40007021	“Aa ɩ a nɩrɛ lɛ na tↄↄ bʋↄlↄ ma: ʻA Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ! Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ!ʼ ɩ̃ wa kpɛɛrɛ a saa juu fãw pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na maala a ɩ̃ Sãa na be a saa juu pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃, ʋlↄ tɛw kpɛɛrɛ.
40007022	A ʋna bibir nↄↄ tara, a yaw jie na yele ma na: ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ! Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ! Aa ɩ a fʋ yuor sɩ dãa hiere nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ wa? Aa mɩ dãa ɩ a fʋ yuor sɩ dãa diwre nɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ, ɩ̃ mɩ tʋ̃ nɩ a tʋ̃-kpɛn yaw wa?ʼ
40007023	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ na yel ba na cãa pʋↄ: ʻMaa bↄ̃w nyɩ fɩ̃ɩ wa. Nyɩ́ taw yi ma be, a nyɩna maal-fãa deme naa!ʼ
40007024	“Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na cɛlɛ a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala ɩ̃ na ƴɛr ɩ̃ sↄw maal, ʋ na wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a nɩrɛ na tɛrɛ a yɛ̃ mɛ nɩ a ʋ yir a kʋsɩpan juu.
40007025	A saa wa na yaw, a kʋlsɩ paal, a sɛsɛb mɩ fure dama nɩ a ʋna yir, ɩ̃-cɛ Ꞌwaa lo wa, a-na-ɩ a kʋsɩpan juu ba mɛ ʋ.
40007026	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na cɛlɛ a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala ɩ̃ na ƴɛr ɩ̃ ma sↄw maal wa, ʋ na wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a nɩ-dãbol na mɛ a ʋ yir a biire juu.
40007027	A saa wa na yaw, a kʋlsɩ paal, a sɛsɛb mɩ fure dama nɩ a ʋna yir ʋ faa lo, a ʋ lofʋ nyɩrɩ̃ na bɛlɩ̃.”
40007028	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na man a ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ baar, nↄɛ ko na a bana nɩbɛ ba jaa na cɛlɛ ʋ
40007029	a-na-ɩ Ꞌwaa man a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ a wↄ̃ taa nɩ a ba ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ manfʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ tɛrɛ na a tʋↄfʋ.
40008001	A lɛ a Jeeju na suure a tãw juu, nɩ-yayaw tuure ʋ na
40008002	a kↄ̃w wa taw ta ʋ ɩ̃ lo gburĩ a dume puor ʋ, ɩ̃ yel: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, a ala ɩ fʋ sↄw na fʋ na tʋↄ na pↄlɩ̃ ma.”
40008003	A Jeeju ir a nuu sɩɩrʼɩ̃ ʋ ɩ̃ yel: “Ɩ̃ sↄw na. Pↄlɩ̃!” A jie naan a kↄ̃w pↄlɩ̃ na,
40008004	ɩ̃ a Jeeju yel ʋ: “Tɛrɛ fʋ mɩ̃ɛ kↄ̃ yel kʋ nɩrɛ wa. Oen na miilʼɩ̃ a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ a Naaŋmɩn baar-loro, ɩ̃ tɩɩr a baar-lo-yele ala a Mowisi na dãa ƴↄ̃w, a nɩbɛ na bↄ̃w ka fʋ sɩrɩ̃ na pↄlɩ̃.”
40008005	A lɛ a Jeeju na kpɛ a Kapɛɛnam-tẽw, a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na ɩ a Orom nɩrɛ wɩ na a ʋ sɛ̃ na sʋↄrↄ ʋ waala nɩ:
40008006	“Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, a ɩ̃ tʋ̃tʋnↄ gã na be a yir a Ꞌwↄbↄ ʋ a Ꞌwaa tʋↄrↄ dama wa; ʋ nyɛrɛ na hʋʋr yaw.”
40008007	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Ɩ̃ na wɩ na kpaar ʋ,”
40008008	ɩ̃-cɛ a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, maa ɩ nɩrɛ na sɛw a fʋ na kpɛ a ɩ̃ yir wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ƴɛr a ƴɛrɩ̃ tɛw, ɩ̃ a ɩ̃ tʋ̃tʋnↄ na kpaarʼã.
40008009	A-na-ɩ a maa mɩ, ɩ̃ tɛrɛ na a ɩ̃ nɩ-bɛrɛ, ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ a sↄdaalsɩ a ba jↄrↄ a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ. A maa yel a kãw ú cen, ʋ na cenʼã. Ɩ̃ a maa mɩ yel a ƴen sʋbↄ ú wa, ʋ na wa na. A maa mɩ lɛ yel a ɩ̃ tʋ̃tʋnↄ á ʋ maal a asɩmɛ, ʋ na maalʼã.”
40008010	A lɛ a Jeeju na wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃, nʋↄr ko ʋ na, ʋ yel a bala na tuure ʋ: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, maa dãa nyɛ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ pʋↄ a nɩrɛ ʋ tɛrɛ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa a nↄhↄ̃ wa.
40008011	Ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a nɩ-yaw nↄↄ yi na a tẽw parɩ̃ nɩ a tẽw ju-sↄ̃w, na ba pↄw a Abʋraham nɩ a Ɩjakɩ nɩ a Jakↄb lãa jɛ nɩ a dɩb pulẽe a saa juu fãw pʋↄ.
40008012	Ɩ̃-cɛ a bala na dãa sɛw ba kpɛ a be, bala ba na lↄb ƴↄ̃w a libe pʋↄ a yene, a jie ba na kono nyɩrɛ nɩ a nyɩmɛ.”
40008013	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju yelʼã a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ: “Kule. Á mɩnɛ a fʋ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa na be, a na maalʼã a lɛ.” Ɩ̃ a daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnↄ kpaarʼã.
40008014	A Jeeju cenʼã a Pɩɛr yir, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na kpɛ a diem, ʋ nyɛ na a Pɩɛr dɩ̃ɛ-mã a ɩ̃gan na tʋlↄ, ʋ gã.
40008015	A Jeeju sɩɩr ʋ a nuu, a jie naan a ɩ̃gan ɓãa ʋ, ʋ ir, ir ʋ a saan.
40008016	A mɩnɛ a jaanʋↄr na ta, ba taw na a kↄ̃tↄn-irbe yaw wɩ nɩ a ʋ sɛ̃, ʋ diw a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ bar nɩ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ kpaar a wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme ba jaa.
40008017	Ʋ maalʼã a lɛ a na ɩ a mɩnɛ a ƴɛr-hiere Ejayi ƴɛrɩ̃ na dãa yel: “Ʋ de na a sɩ ɩ̃gan saansɩ, ɩ̃ mɩ ir a sɩ wʋlɩ̃sɩ bar.”
40008018	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na nyɛ a nɩ-yaw na tiw kolĩ ʋ, ʋ yelʼã a ba gãw a gaan kpee pʋↄ.
40008019	Ɩ̃ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄ̃wnↄ taw na ta ʋ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Jãjaana, ɩ̃ na tuure fʋ na a jie-oo-jie fʋ na cere.”
40008020	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A sɛ̃nɛ tɛrɛ na a ba bↄↄr, ɩ̃ a wɛ-lili mɩ tɛrɛ a ba cor, ɩ̃-cɛ a Nɩbɛ Bie ma mɩ tɛrɛ jie ʋlↄ ʋ na gaala a ʋ juu wa.”
40008021	A ʋ par-tuure kãw mɩ taw ta ʋ ɩ̃ mɩ yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, kʋ ma sↄr ɩ̃ kulʼɩ̃ ũu a ɩ̃ sãa baar.”
40008022	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Wa tuure ma, ɩ̃ bar a nɩ-kũusɩ a ba uune a ba kũusɩ.”
40008023	A ala ɩ̃ baar a Jeeju par-tuurbe tu ʋ na kpɛ nɩ a gbor pʋↄ.
40008024	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na be a man sↄ̃w, sɛsɛb kpɛ̃ɛ nyↄw na ɩ̃ fure a man pʋↄ, a kʋ̃ↄ duoro pↄwrↄ a gbor, ɩ̃ a Jeeju gur,
40008025	a ba taw ta sɩ̃wnɛ ʋ, yele nɩ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, sɩ wɛrɛ na! Ir faa sɩ!”
40008026	A Jeeju yel ba: “Bõ nyɩ kpɛ dãbɩ̃ɛ lɛ? Nyɩ ɩ na ƴↄ̃w-nyãa pabaa deme”, ɩ̃ ir tan a sɛsɛb nɩ a kʋ̃ↄ, a ŋma vʋʋrʋ̃ cici.
40008027	A nʋↄr ko a ʋ par-tuurbe ba jaa, a ba yele taa: “Bõ nɩ-bʋrↄ nɩ a nyanɩ, a sɛsɛb nɩ a kʋ̃ↄ jaa jↄrↄ ʋ?”
40008028	A mɩnɛ ba na gãw a man gaan a Gadarɩ-tẽw, kↄ̃tↄn-irbe ayi yi na a yar par ɩ̃ tuor ʋ. Ba nyɩrɩ̃ na bier, a nɩrɛ maa Ꞌla de a sↄr ʋlↄ ba na be pʋↄ wa.
40008029	Ba wuure na yele nɩ: “Bõ a sɩmɩ nɩ a fʋ̃ʋ Naaŋmɩn Bie be taa? Fʋ de na nĩe wa ka a sɩ hʋↄlfʋ jie ɩ̃-cɛ a daar ma ta sɛr wa?”
40008030	Ɩ̃ dor yaw dãa na Ꞌwↄbↄ mʋ̃ↄ yʋↄrↄ nɩ be jie kãw,
40008031	a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ sʋↄrↄ a Jeeju yele nɩ: “A ala ɩ fʋ diwre sɩ na bara, ƴↄ̃w a sɩ kpɛ a dor basɩmɛ pʋʋr.”
40008032	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ yi cen!” A ba yi cen na kpɛ a dor pʋↄ, a dor dar taa suu a tãw fʋↄlaa lo a man kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ ba jaa kpi,
40008033	a dↄ-cɩɩnbɛ jↄ kul na man a ala na ta a dor, nɩ a kↄ̃tↄn-irbe ayi ƴɛrɩ̃.
40008034	A tẽ-deme ba jaa yi na cere a Jeeju nyɛfʋ ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na nyɛ ʋ, ba sʋↄr ʋ na, á ʋ yi a ba tẽw pʋↄ.
40009001	A Jeeju lɛ lɩɛbʼã kpɛ a gbor pʋↄ gãw a man, ɩ̃ kul a ʋ tẽw.
40009002	Ba ɓↄw na gbɛr nɩ a ʋ gaajie wɩ nɩ a ʋ sɛ̃. Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na nyɛ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ba na tɛrɛ, ʋ yelʼã a gbɛr: “Ɩ̃ bie, tɛrɛ nʋ̃ↄ! Ɩ̃ de na a fʋ maal-faar bar kʋ fʋ!”
40009003	Ɩ̃ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ ŋmɛɛ yele na taa: “A daba na tʋrↄ na a Naaŋmɩn,”
40009004	a Jeeju bↄ̃w a ba tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ ɩ̃ yel ba: “Bõ ɩ a nyɩ tɛrɛ a tɩɛrʋ̃-faar a nyɩ sube pʋʋr a lɛ?
40009005	Buor ɩ̃ yↄw gãw ɩ̃ na yel: ʻA fʋ maal-faar de na bar kʋ fʋʼ mɩɩ ʻA fʋ ir cere?ʼ
40009006	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na nyɩ bↄ̃w áa Nɩbɛ Bie tɛrɛ na a tʋↄfʋ a tẽw pʋↄ na de a nɩbɛ maal-faar bar ba.” Ɩ̃ ʋ yelʼã a gbɛr: “Ir de a fʋ gaajie kule nɩ,”
40009007	ʋ ir kule.
40009008	Á mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ na nyɛ a lɛ, dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw ba na, a ba pɛwrɛ a Naaŋmɩn a mɩnɛ ʋ na kʋ a nɩbɛ a ʋna tʋↄfʋ bʋrↄ.
40009009	A lɛ a Jeeju na yi a be ɩ̃ cere, ʋ nyɛ na a daba na jɛ a lãpo defʋ jie a ba bʋↄlↄ a Matie, ʋ yel ʋ: “Ir wa tuure ma!” ɩ̃ ʋ ir cen na tuure ʋ.
40009010	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na jɛ a dɩb pulẽe a Matie yir pʋↄ, a lãpo-dierbe nɩ a maal-faar deme yaw wɩ na lãa jɛ nɩ a Jeeju nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe.
40009011	A mɩnɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ na nyɛ a lɛ, ba yelʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe: “Bõ ɩnɛ a nyɩ jãjaana lãa dɩrɛ nɩ a lãpo-dierbe nɩ a maal-faar deme?”
40009012	A lɛ a Jeeju na wõ a ala, ʋ yel ba na: “Aa ɩ a bala na kpɛmɛ, bala ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ a dↄↄtↄrↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a baalsɩ ɩ̃ ma bʋↄrↄ ʋ.
40009013	Nyɩ́ cen na jaan a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-bir nanɩ par na yel: ʻMaa bʋↄrↄ baar lofʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a nã-bↄ̃wfʋ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ.ʼ A-na-ɩ maa wa a nɩ-torisɩ bʋↄlfʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a maal-faar deme bʋↄlfʋ ɩ̃ wa.”
40009014	A Jã-Batii par-tuurbe taw na ta a Jeeju ɩ̃ soor ʋ: “Bõ ɩnɛ a sɩmɩ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ ma lũ a nʋↄr, ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ par-tuurbe maa lũ wa?”
40009015	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ tɩɛrʼã bↄ̃w ka a bala ba na bʋↄl a kul-taa jie, ba na tʋↄ na kono a lɛdaar a kul-taa sʋbↄ na cãa be nɩ ba mɩ? Ɩ̃-cɛ a daar nↄↄ ta na a ba ir a kul-taa sʋbↄ cenʼɩ̃, ɩ̃ a ba pãa lũ a nʋↄr.
40009016	Nɩrɛ ma diere cẽcen paalaa sɛbɛ nɩ kpar-kʋraa bↄw wa, a-na-ɩ ʋ na taw na a kparʋ, ɩ̃ a ʋ ɓerfʋ na nyɩrɩ̃ na bɛlɩ̃.
40009017	Nɩrɛ ma mɩ diere dã-paalaa ƴↄnↄ a dʋʋ jaw pʋↄ wa, a-na-ɩ a ʋ na wɛlʼã, a dãa deer, a jaa sãw. Ɩ̃ a dʋʋ paalaa pʋↄ ba ma mɩ ƴↄ̃w a dã-paalaa, a ba iaa ayi nyↄↄr taa.”
40009018	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na cãa mana ba a ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, a Jufisɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ta na ɩ̃ lo gburĩ a dume a ʋ nii-sↄw ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Ɩ̃ bi-pↄw kpi na a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ɩ̃ a fʋ̃ʋ waa dↄↄl ʋ a fʋ nuu, ʋ na jaw na.”
40009019	A Jeeju irʼã nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe ɩ̃ tuure ʋ.
40009020	Pↄw be na be na tɛrɛ a sɩɛ na ma baara wa, yara nɩ a yaan maalʼɩ̃ yomo pie-nʼayi. Ʋ taw na ta a Jeeju puo-sↄw ɩ̃ sɩɩr a ʋ fu nʋↄr,
40009021	a-na-ɩ ʋ yelʼã a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ: “A maa wa tʋↄ sɩɩr a ʋ fu tɛw, a ɩ̃ sɩɛ na baarʼã.”
40009022	A Jeeju lɩɛb nyɛ ʋ, ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Ɩ̃ bi-pↄw, tɛrɛ nʋ̃ↄ! A fʋ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa faa fʋ na,” ɩ̃ a daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ a pↄw sɩɛ baarʼã.
40009023	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na ta a nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ yir, ʋ nyɛ na a ɩl-pɛɛlbɛ nɩ a nɩbɛ na kono maala nɩ a nã-yele,
40009024	ʋ yel: “Nyɩ́ yi be! A poole ma kpi wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ gurʼã,” a ba laara ʋ.
40009025	A lɛ ba na diw a nɩbɛ bar a yẽw, a Jeeju kpɛ na a diem ɩ̃ nyↄw a poole nuu, ʋ ir.
40009026	A ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ yɛrʼã pↄw a tẽw ʋ jaa.
40009027	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na yi cere, jↄn ayi wuure na tuure nɩ ʋ yele nɩ: “Davɩtɩ Bie yaa! Waalɩ̃ nãw ƴↄ̃w sɩ bɩlɛ!”
40009028	A lɛ a Jeeju na ta a yir kpɛ a diem, a jↄn bala taw na ta ʋ, ʋ soor ba: “Nyɩ tɩɛrʼã bↄ̃w ka ɩ̃ na tʋↄ na maal nyɩ a lɛ mɩɩ?” A ba yel: “Ↄↄ, Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ!”
40009029	Ʋ sɩɩr ba a mimie ɩ̃ yel: “Á maal a lɛ, tu nɩ a nyɩ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa,”
40009030	ɩ̃ a ba mimie yuo na. A Jeeju kpãa ba, kpãkpanʼɩ̃ ba: “Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ, a nɩrɛ kↄ̃ bↄ̃wnaa wa.”
40009031	Ɩ̃-cɛ ba yi na ƴɛrɛ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃, a pↄw a ʋna tẽw ʋ jaa.
40009032	A mɩnɛ ba na cãa yi cere, ba taw na wõw a kↄ̃tↄn na ire wɩ nɩ a ʋ sɛ̃.
40009033	Ɩ̃ a lɛ a Jeeju na diw a kↄ̃tↄn bar ʋ yi, a wõw nyↄw na a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ, a nɩbɛ nↄɛ ko ba a ba yele taa: “Saa dãa nyɛ bom nↄhↄ̃ a Ɩsɩrayɛl-tẽw pʋↄ fɩ̃ɩ wa!”
40009034	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ ʋlↄ yelʼã: “A kↄ̃tↄn nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ fãw ʋ diwre nɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ!”
40009035	A Jeeju cʋbʼã a tẽ-bɛrɛ nɩ a tẽ-bil a jaa jaana a Jufisɩ a ba puorfʋ yie pʋʋr, hiere nɩ a Naaŋmɩn fãw ƴɛrɩ̃, mɩ kpaara nɩ a wʋlɩ̃-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ deme ba jaa.
40009036	A mɩnɛ ʋ na nyɛ a nɩbɛ na waa, nãw nyↄw ʋ na a-na-ɩ ba ɩ na nɩbɛ na giem, a sube na mɩ sãw wↄ̃ taa nɩ piir na ma tɛrɛ dↄ-cɩɩnaa wa.
40009037	Ʋ yel a ʋ par-tuurbe: “A puo bɛrmɛ na, ɩ̃-cɛ a cɩ-ŋmarba ma jɛ̃ bom wa.
40009038	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, nyɩ́ sʋↄr a puo sʋbↄ ʋ ƴↄ̃w a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ a ba cen na ŋma a ei.”
40010001	A Jeeju bʋↄlʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi a ba wɩ, ʋ kʋ ba a tʋↄfʋ a ba na diwre nɩ a kↄ̃tↄn-bebe ɩ̃ mɩ kpaara nɩ a wʋlɩ̃-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ deme.
40010002	Nyɛ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ pie-nʼayi yoe: a dãdãw sʋbↄ ɩ na a Sɩmↄ̃ ba ma bʋↄlↄ a Pɩɛr, a ʋ yɛbɛ Ádire, a Jebede bie Jakɩ, nɩ a ʋ yɛbɛ Jã,
40010003	a Fɩlɩpɩ nɩ a Batelemi, a Tomasɩ, nɩ a Matie na dãa ɩ a lãpo-diere, a Alfe bie Jakɩ, nɩ a Tade,
40010004	a Sɩmↄ̃ na ma jɛrɛ, nɩ a Judasɩ Isikaryↄtɩ na cilĩ a Jeeju.
40010005	A Jeeju tʋ̃ na a bana nɩbɛ pie-nʼayi, ɩ̃ kpãkpan ba a nↄhↄ̃: “Nyɩ taa wa cere a nɩ-bʋlsɩ sɛ̃ wa, ɩ̃ nyɩ taa mɩ kpɛɛrɛ a Samari-tẽw wa,
40010006	ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ cen a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ jie na bↄr a piir kaarɩ̃.
40010007	A lɛ nyɩ na cere, nyɩ́ hiere yele nɩ: ʻA saa juu fãw pɩɛlʼã.ʼ
40010008	Nyɩ́ kpaara a wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme, mɩ jawra nɩ a kũusɩ, pↄlↄ nɩ a kↄn, ɩ̃ mɩ diwre a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ bara. Pↄrↄ nyɩ pↄw, nyɩ́ mɩ tɩɩr a pↄrↄ.
40010009	Nyɩ taa wa bʋↄrↄ nyɩ tɛrɛɛ a sɛlmɛ, mɩɩ a libie a nyɩ wʋʋr pʋʋr wa.
40010010	Nyɩ taa wa mɩ bʋↄrↄ nyɩ tɛrɛɛ a wʋↄ, nɩ kparsɩ ayi, nɩ a nafaba, nɩ a dãɓɩlaa wa, a-na-ɩ a tʋ̃tʋnↄ sɛw nɩ na a ʋ dɩb.
40010011	A nyɩmɩ wa ta a tẽw-oo-tẽw pʋↄ, nyɩ́ soor nɩrɛ ʋlↄ ba na ƴↄnↄ yir, cen na jɛ a be wa ta nɩ a nyɩ be yifʋ daar.
40010012	A nyɩmɩ wa ta a yir, nyɩ́ puor ba.
40010013	A bala wa ɩ nɩ-sono, nyɩ́ sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn á ʋ be nɩ ba. Ɩ̃-cɛ a bala mↄↄ ɩ nɩ-sono wa, nyɩ́ mↄ̃w a nyɩ puorfʋ cere nɩ.
40010014	A ala ɩ nyɩ wa ta na a yir kãw pʋↄ mɩɩ tẽw kãw pʋↄ, a ba wa jaar nyɩ nɩ a nyɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ bar, nyɩ́ yi ɩ̃ tɛ-tɛb a nyɩ gbɛɛ tãbuulĩ ƴↄ̃w ba.
40010015	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ dayen, a Sↄdↄm nɩ a Gↄmↄↄr ten hʋʋr nyɛfʋ na sa na a ʋna tẽw naa.
40010016	“Nyɩ́ nyɛ, ɩ̃ tʋnↄ nyɩ na wↄ̃ taa nɩ piir a wɛ-baar sↄ̃w. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, nyɩ́ ɩ nɩ-kpaarsɩ a wɩ́ɩr kaarɩ̃, ɩ̃ mɩ wↄ̃ taa nɩ a ŋmama na ma bↄ̃w a bier maalfʋ wa.
40010017	Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a nɩbɛ ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ ba nↄↄ bʋↄl nyɩ na a nɩ-bɛrɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ jiir, ɩ̃ mɩ fↄb nyɩ nɩ kpaarsɩ a Jufisɩ puorfʋ yie pʋʋr.
40010018	Ba na taw nyɩ na cenʼɩ̃ a ni-dierbe nii-sↄw nɩ a jamansɩ nii-sↄw a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ, a mɩnɛ a nyɩ na tʋↄ man a yel-mɩ̃ɛ kʋ ba, nɩ a bala na ɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ mɩ.
40010019	Ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛ ba na taw nyɩ cere nɩ, nyɩ taa ɩ a dama nyɩ a bõ nyɩ na ƴɛrɛ, mɩɩ a mɩnɛ nyɩ nↄↄ ƴɛrɛ wa. A daar ʋlↄ wa ta, nyɩ na bↄ̃w na a ala nyɩ na ƴɛrɛ.
40010020	A-na-ɩ aa ɩ a nyɩ jie a ƴɛrɩ̃ ala na yi wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩ Sãa Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ jie a na yi.
40010021	A nɩrɛ nↄↄ cilĩ na a ʋ yɛbɛ ƴↄ̃w a kũu pʋↄ; a sãa nↄↄ mɩ maalʼã a lɛ a ʋ bie jie; a bibiir nↄↄ mɩ kpɛmɛ na a ba dↄↄrbↄ jiir, ƴↄnↄ nɩ ba a ƴɛrɩ̃ a ba kú ba.
40010022	A nɩbɛ ba jaa nↄↄ Ꞌlaara nyɩ na a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ nↄↄ tʋↄ ɩraa cĩcĩ wa ta nɩ a baarfʋ daar, na pↄw na a faafʋ.
40010023	A bala wa hʋↄlↄ nyɩ a tẽw kãw pʋↄ, nyɩ́ jↄ cen tẽ-kpee. Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, nyaa tʋↄrↄ baara a Ɩsɩrayɛl ten a jaa, ɩ̃-cɛ a Nɩbɛ Bie waara wa.
40010024	A par-tuure maa gãw a ʋ jãjaana wa; a gbãgbaar ma mɩ gãw a ʋ sↄsʋↄrↄ wa.
40010025	A na sɛw na a ala ɩ a par-tuure jɛ̃ na taa nɩ a ʋ jãjaana, ɩ̃ a gbãgbaar mɩ jɛ̃ taa nɩ a ʋ sↄsʋↄrↄ. Á ala ɩ ba bʋↄlʼã a yir sʋbↄ a Bɛɛjɛbul, mɩnɛ ba nↄↄ bʋↄl a ʋ yir deme?
40010026	“Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, nyɩ taa jↄrↄ a nɩbɛ dãbɩ̃ɛ wa. A-na-ɩ bom ma be be na sↄↄlɩ̃ ɩ̃ mↄↄ yire cãa pʋↄ wa.
40010027	A ala ɩ̃ na yele nyɩ a libe pʋↄ, nyɩ́ yel ba a cãa pʋↄ. A ala ɩ̃ na mɩ bʋrↄ kʋrↄ nyɩ, nyɩ́ hier ba a gara jur.
40010028	Nyɩ taa jↄrↄ a bala na kúrↄ a ɩ̃gan ɩ̃ ma tʋↄrↄ kúrↄ a sɩɛ wa. Ɩ̃ nyɩ́ ɛ̃ɛ jↄrↄ a ʋlↄ na tʋↄrↄ maala a ɩ̃gan nɩ a sɩɛ a wɛrɛ a wɛfʋ vũu pʋↄ.
40010029	A tɩ̃ɩtɩ̃ɩ, lɩba-anuu tɛw ba ma da nɩ ayi, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ bõ-ƴen tẽtẽ ma bↄrↄ ɩ̃ a nyɩ Sãa ma bↄ̃w wa.
40010030	A ala ɩ a nyɩmɩ ʋ, a Naaŋmɩn bↄ̃w na a nyɩ ju-kↄbↄ nʋↄr.
40010031	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, nyɩ taa jↄrↄ dãbɩ̃ɛ wa. Nyɩ sa na a tɩ̃ɩtɩ̃ɩsɩ yayaw.
40010032	“A nɩrɛ lɛ na cã yel a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw, á ɩ̃ ben ʋ ɩ, ɩ̃ nↄↄ mɩ yelʼã a ɩ̃ saa juu Sãa nii-sↄw, á ɩ̃ ben a sʋbↄ ʋlↄ ɩ.
40010033	Ɩ̃ a nɩrɛ lɛ na jaar ma a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ nↄↄ mɩ jaar ʋ na a ɩ̃ saa juu Sãa nii-sↄw.
40010034	“Nyɩ taa tɩɛr beeka pɩɛnfʋ ɩ̃ wa nɩ a tẽw pʋↄ wa. Maa wa nɩ pɩɛnfʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ sↄgbalʋ ɩ̃ wa nɩ.
40010035	Ɩ̃ wa na na ŋma a bie nɩ a ʋ sãa kpee, a mã nɩ a ʋ bi-pↄw mɩ kpee, a poole nɩ a ʋ dɩ̃ɛ-mã mɩ kpee.
40010036	A nɩrɛ yi-deme na ɩ na a ʋ sama-deme.
40010037	A ʋlↄ na nʋnↄ a ʋ sãa mɩɩ a ʋ mã gãw ma, ma sɛw nɩ ma wa. A ʋlↄ na mɩ nʋnↄ a ʋ bi-daba mɩɩ a ʋ bi-pↄw gãw ma, ma mɩ sɛw nɩ ma wa.
40010038	Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na ma sↄw tuo a ʋ nɩ-kʋ-daa tuure nɩ ma wa, ma mɩ sɛw nɩ ma wa.
40010039	A nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na pↄw a ʋ baafʋ, a ʋ baafʋ ʋlↄ nↄↄ bↄrʼã, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ baafʋ na bↄr a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ, ʋ nↄↄ pↄw ʋ na.
40010040	“A ʋlↄ na sↄwrↄ diere nyɩ, mɩ sↄw na de ma. Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na sↄw de ma, mɩ sↄw na de a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma.
40010041	A ʋlↄ na sↄwrↄ diere a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere a-na-ɩ ƴɛr-hiere ʋ ɩ, ʋ na pↄw na a ƴɛr-hiere yar mɩ. Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na sↄwrↄ diere a nɩ-toraa a-na-ɩ nɩ-toraa ʋ ɩ, ʋ na mɩ pↄw na a nɩ-toraa yar.
40010042	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ʋlↄ na Ꞌwↄ̃wnↄ a kʋ̃ↄ ɓaar kʋrↄ a nɩ-pabɩ sɩ basɩmɛ kãw, a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ par-tuure ʋ ɩ, kↄ̃ wa faa a ʋ yar fɩ̃ɩ wa.”
40011001	A lɛ a Jeeju na jaan a ʋ par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi baar, ʋ yi na cen a Jufisɩ ten pʋʋr a ƴɛrɩ̃ jaanfʋ nɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃ hierfʋ ɩnɛ.
40011002	Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ a Jã na cãa a kasu pʋↄ, ɩ̃ wõ a ala a Kirisi na maala, ʋ tʋ̃ na a ʋ par-tuurbe
40011003	a ba cen na soor ʋ: “Fʋ̃ʋ ɩ a ʋlↄ na waara, mɩɩ sɩ cãa cɛlɛ nɩ-kpee?”
40011004	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ cen na yel a Jã a ala nyɩ na nyɛ ɩ̃ mɩ wõ:
40011005	a jↄn nyɛrɛ na, a gbɛɛ ir cere, a kↄn mɩ pↄlↄ, a won wono, a kũusɩ jawra, ɩ̃ a nãw deme mɩ pↄwrↄ a Yɛr-Son.
40011006	Nʋ̃ↄ be na a ʋlↄ jie a ɩ̃ maalfʋ na ma cɛ ʋ wa.”
40011007	A mɩnɛ a Jã par-tuurbe na lɩɛb cere, a Jeeju nyↄw na a Jã ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a nɩbɛ yele nɩ: “Bõ nyɩ cen na Ꞌwuor a be a wɛkar pʋↄ? Ci kakɩr a sɛsɛb na dama mɩɩ?
40011008	Ɩ̃-cɛ bõ ʋlↄ nyɩ cen na Ꞌwuor? A daba na ƴaarɩ̃ cẽcẽ-vɛlɛ ʋ mɩɩ? Ɩ̃-cɛ a bala na ma ƴaarɩ̃ a cẽcẽ-vɛlɛ, jamana yir ba ma be.
40011009	Ɩ̃ bõ ʋlↄ nyɩ cen na Ꞌwuor? A Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere nyɩ cen na Ꞌwuor mɩɩ? Ↄↄ, a lɛ ʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ gãw na a ƴɛr-hiere bar.
40011010	A Jã ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a ʋlↄ ba na dãa sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ yele: ʻNyɛ, ɩ̃ na tʋ̃ na nɩrɛ ʋ de nĩe cen, na pɛl a sↄr a fʋ ɩnɛ.ʼ
40011011	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, nɩrɛ kãw ma be be ba na dↄw ka a tẽw pʋↄ na gãw a Jã-Batii wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na nyɩrɩ̃ pab a saa juu fãw pʋↄ gãw ʋ na.
40011012	Wa nyↄw nɩ a Jã-Batii daar wa ta nɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, a saa juu fãw be na a gborgbor deme jie, ɩ̃ ba ma faa ʋ na a nɩbɛ jie.
40011013	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a jaa, a Jã ba ƴɛr wa bɛw.
40011014	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ nyɩ na tʋↄ na sↄw a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃, a Jã ʋlↄ ɩ na a Eli na dãa sɛw ʋ wa.
40011015	Á ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a tobo wono nɩ, ú bↄ̃w cɛlɛ!
40011016	“Babõ ɩ̃ na tʋↄ de a dɩnaa nɩbɛ na manʼɩ̃? Ba wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a bibiir na jɛ a gbulĩ pʋↄ, ɓolo bʋↄlↄ nɩ taa yele nɩ:
40011017	ʻSɩ ŋme na a kʋↄr, a nyaa sɛ wa, a sɩ mɩ ŋme a ko-bɩnɛ a nyaa mɩ kõ wa.ʼ
40011018	A-na-ɩ a Jã wa na, ma bʋn dɩrɛ lɛ wa, ɩ̃ ma mɩ nyuure a dãa wa, a ba yel á kↄ̃tↄ̃-nɩrɛ ʋ.
40011019	A Nɩbɛ Bie wa dɩrɛ ƴↄnↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ nyuure a dãa, a ba lɛ yel go: ʻNyɩ́ nyɛ dɩdɩrɛ nɩ dã-nyuure na ɩ a lãpo-dierbe nɩ a maal-faar deme baraa.ʼ Ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn tʋmↄ miile na a mɩnɛ a ʋ kpaarfʋ na tor.”
40011020	A Jeeju nyↄw na ɩ̃ gala a ten nɩbɛ bala na nyɛ a ʋ nↄ-kofʋ tʋn yaw ɩ̃ ma sↄw lɩɛb a yɛ̃ wa, yele nɩ:
40011021	“Nabier na ta na a nyɩmɩ Kↄrajɩ̃-tẽ-deme! Nabier na ta na a nyɩmɩ Bɛsada-tẽ-deme mɩ! A-na-ɩ a ala ɩ a Tɩɩr nɩ a Sɩdↄ̃ ten deme ɩ̃ dãa nyɛ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ ala nyɩ na nyɛ, ba naa dãa na lɩɛb a ba yɛ̃ korĩ-cɛ, su nɩ a yel-jaar, ŋme nɩ a tãpɛlɩ̃.
40011022	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ dayen, a Tɩɩr nɩ a Sɩdↄ̃ ten hʋʋr nyɛfʋ na sa na a nyɩ ben.
40011023	Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ Kapɛɛnam-tẽ-deme, nyɩ tɩɛr beeka ba na jɛw nyɩ na wa ta nɩ a saꞋlon mɩ? Ɩ̃-cɛ ba na ɛ̃ɛ na suu nɩ nyɩ wa ta nɩ a kpɩɩn tɛ̃w. A-na-ɩ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ nyɩ na nyɛ, a ala dãa ɩ a Sↄdↄm-tẽ-deme ɩ̃ nyɛ a lɛ, a tẽw ʋlↄ naa cãa na wa ta nɩ a dɩnaa.
40011024	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ dayen, a Sↄdↄm hʋʋr nyɛfʋ na sa na a nyɩ ben.”
40011025	A ʋna daarʼãa a Jeeju lɛ yelʼã: “Ɩ̃ Sãa, ɩ̃ puor fʋ na, a fʋ̃ʋ na ɩ a saa juu nɩ a tẽw pʋↄ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, a mɩnɛ fʋ na sↄↄlɩ̃ a yele ala a yɛ̃-deme nɩ a nɩ-kpaarsɩ jiir, ɩ̃ de kʋ a bibiir.
40011026	Ɩ̃ Sãa, a lɛ ʋ, a-na-ɩ lɛ fʋ dãa bʋↄrↄ.
40011027	“A ɩ̃ Sãa barʼã a yele a jaa a ɩ̃ nurɩ̃. Nɩrɛ ma bↄ̃w a Bie, ɩ̃ ma ɩ a Sãa tɛw ʋ wa. Ɩ̃ nɩrɛ ma mɩ bↄ̃w a Sãa, ɩ̃ ma mɩ ɩ a Bie tɛw ʋ wa, nɩ a bala a Bie na bʋↄrↄ ʋ miil ba.
40011028	“A nyɩmɩ jaa na tuo a to-tɩmɩsɩ mɩ vↄwrↄ nɩ, nyɩ́ wa ka a ɩ̃ sɛ̃, ɩ̃ ɩ̃ na kʋ nyɩ na a pɩɛnfʋ.
40011029	Nyɩ́ ɩ a sɩ lãa tuo a da-kpile-ŋmãa, a nyɩ bar a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ jaan nyɩ. A-na-ɩ ɩ̃ ɩ na nɩ-hɛlɛlɛ ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ a su-ɓaar, ɩ̃ nyɩ na pↄw na a nyɩ suur pʋↄ pɩɛnfʋ.
40011030	A-na-ɩ a ɩ̃ da-kpile-ŋmãa yↄw na a tuofʋ, ɩ̃ a ɩ̃ tuor ɩ̃ na kʋrↄ nyɩ, pe na.”
40012001	A ʋna daarʼãa pʋↄ a Jeeju tↄlↄ na a ci puo pʋↄ a bibi-ciiraa dayen, a kↄ̃ nyↄw a ʋ par-tuurbe a ba nyↄw a ci ɩ̃ fↄrↄ Ꞌwↄbↄ cere nɩ.
40012002	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ na nyɛ a lɛ, ba yelʼã a Jeeju: “Je kãa! A fʋ par-tuurbe maala na a ala na ma sɛw a bibi-ciiraa dayen wa.”
40012003	Ʋ mɩ yel ba: “Nyaa Ꞌwuor a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ nyɛ a ala a Davɩtɩ na dãa maal, nɩ a ʋ nɩbɛ, a lɛ a kↄ̃ na dãa wa nyↄw ba wa mɩɩ?
40012004	Ba kpɛ na a Naaŋmɩn yir, de a buru ba na bin a Naaŋmɩn Ꞌwↄb, ɩ̃-cɛ a Davɩtɩ nɩ a ʋ nɩbɛ bala, ma dãa tɛrɛ sↄr wa, a-na-ɩ a baar-lorbo tɛw ɩ̃ ma Ꞌwↄb a ana buru.
40012005	Mɩɩ, nyaa Ꞌwuor a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn sɛbɛ pʋↄ nyɛ, a bibi-ciiraa dayen, a baar-lorbo bala na tʋnↄ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ maa tʋↄ ciir a ʋna bibir, ɩ̃ ma mɩ sãw wa?
40012006	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a ʋlↄ na gãw a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ be na ka.
40012007	A ala ɩ nyɩ dãa na sɩrɩ̃ bↄ̃w a sɛb-bie ala na yel: ʻMaa bʋↄrↄ a baar lofʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a nã-bↄ̃wfʋ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ,ʼ nyɩ kↄ̃ↄ dãa ƴↄ̃w a nɩ-sono a ƴɛrɩ̃ wa.
40012008	A-na-ɩ a Nɩbɛ Bie ɩ na a bibi-ciiraa Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ.”
40012009	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na yi a be, ʋ cenʼã a ba puorfʋ yir pʋↄ.
40012010	Ɩ̃ a ba pʋↄ, daba be na be a nuu na kpi, a ba soor ʋ, á sↄr be na be a ba na kpaar a wʋlɩ̃ sʋbↄ a bibi-ciiraa dayen mɩɩ? A-na-ɩ ba bʋↄrↄ na ba ƴↄ̃w ʋ a ƴɛrɩ̃.
40012011	A Jeeju mɩ soor ba: “A ala ɩ a nyɩ pʋↄ, nɩrɛ tɛrɛ na a pɛr bõ-ƴen tɛw, ʋ lo a ɩ̃ bↄw kpolo pʋↄ a bibi-ciiraa dayen, Ꞌwaa cere nyↄwrↄ ʋ bara, ʋ yire wa mɩɩ?
40012012	Wa yele nɩ, nɩrɛ na gãw a pɛr! Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ sↄr be na be a vɩlaa maalfʋ a bibi-ciiraa dayen.”
40012013	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju yelʼã a daba: “Tur a fʋ nuu,” ʋ tur, ɩ̃ a nu-kũu lɩɛb wↄ̃ taa nɩ a nu-son.
40012014	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ yi na cen na gor taa, a mɩnɛ ba na ɩrɛ ɩ̃ bũbure a Jeeju bara.
40012015	Ɩ̃-cɛ a-na-ɩ a Jeeju bↄ̃w nɩ ba na, ʋ yi na cere, ɩ̃ a nɩ-yaw tuure ʋ, ʋ kpaar a ba wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme ba jaa,
40012016	ɩ̃ kpãa ba a ba taa wa yele a ala ʋ na ɩ wa.
40012017	A ta na a lɛ a na ɩ a ƴɛr-hiere Ejayi ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ na dãa yel:
40012018	“Nyɩ́ nyɛ a ɩ̃ Tʋ̃tʋnↄ ɩ̃ na vɛl ir, a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na nʋnↄ, na mɩ kpɛ ma a nyãa. Ɩ̃ na ƴↄ̃w ʋ na a ɩ̃ Sɩɛ, ɩ̃ ʋ na mana na a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ kʋrↄ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ.
40012019	ꞋWaa wa jɛbɛ nɩ nɩrɛ mɩɩ tana nɩrɛ wa. Baa mɩ wa wono a ʋlↄ nɩ nɩrɛ cɩɩrɛ taa a sↄr pʋↄ wa.
40012020	A kakɩr na ka jɛ̃jɛɛlɩ̃, ʋ kↄ̃ wa baar ʋ ka bar wa. A lãpa na bʋↄrↄ a kpiinfʋ, ʋ kↄ̃ wa mɩ baar ʋ kpiin bar wa. A lɛ ʋ na maal wa ta nɩ a daar ʋlↄ a torfʋ nↄↄ pↄwrↄ a tʋↄfʋ.
40012021	A nɩ-bʋlsɩ ba jaa nↄↄ tɛrɛ nɩ ʋ na a tɩɛrɩ̃-son.”
40012022	Ba wɩ nɩ na a kↄ̃tↄn-ire na jↄ̃w lãa wõw nɩ a Jeeju sɛ̃ a Jeeju kpaar ʋ, ʋ lɛ nyɛrɛ wono nɩ.
40012023	A nʋↄr kpalʼã a nɩbɛ ba jaa a ba yele: “A nanɩ, ú wa ɩ a Davɩtɩ bie mɩɩ?”
40012024	Ɩ̃ a lɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ na wõ a ala, ba yelʼã: “A daba na, Ꞌwaa diwre a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ pↄrↄ, ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Bɛɛjɛbul ɩ̃ kʋ ʋ a tʋↄfʋ wa.”
40012025	A Jeeju bↄ̃w a ba tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ ɩ̃ yel ba: “A tẽw ʋlↄ na ŋma ayi jɛbɛ taa na wɛlʼã ʋ jaa. Tẽw kãw ma be be, mɩɩ a yir kãw ʋ, ŋma ayi jɛbɛ taa ɩ̃ cãa beree be wa.
40012026	A ala ɩ a Satã diw a Satã bar, ʋ ŋma na ayi jɛbɛ taa ʋ yẽ. Mɩnɛ a ʋ fãw na tʋↄ ɩ ɩ̃ cãa be be?
40012027	A ala ɩ nyɩ yelʼã a maa, a Bɛɛjɛbul tʋↄfʋ ɩ̃ diwre nɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ bara, ɩ̃ a bala na tuure nyɩ, ala tʋↄfʋ ba mɩ diwre nɩ ba? Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a nɩbɛ bala na tuure nyɩ, bala nↄↄ ɩ a nyɩ ƴɛr-guorbo.
40012028	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ɩ̃ diwre nɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ, a lɛ yelʼã a Naaŋmɩn fãw ta na a nyɩ jie.
40012029	“Mɩnɛ a nɩrɛ na ɩ ɩ̃ kpɛ a gãdaa yir faa ʋ a yele, ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ ʋ de na nĩe lũ ʋ wa? Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ ʋ lũ ʋ na, ala ʋ na tʋↄ wob a ʋ yele.
40012030	“A ʋlↄ na ma be nɩ ma wa, ʋ ɩ na a ɩ̃ san-sʋbↄ, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na ma sũono ma a sɩ lãa kaala wa, ʋ yɛ̃yɛlɛ na bara.
40012031	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a maal-faar a jaa, nɩ a Naaŋmɩn yo-sãwfʋ a jaa, a Naaŋmɩn na tʋↄ na de bar kʋ a nɩbɛ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩrɛ wa sãw a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ yuor, aa be a Naaŋmɩn na de bar kʋ ʋ wa.
40012032	Ɩ̃ a nɩrɛ lɛ wa ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛr-fãa ƴↄnↄ a Nɩbɛ Bie, a Naaŋmɩn na tʋↄ na de bar kʋ ʋ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩrɛ lɛ wa ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛr-fãa ƴↄnↄ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ, aa be a Naaŋmɩn na de bar kʋ ʋ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ daar nɩ a daar ʋlↄ nↄↄ waara wa.
40012033	“A fʋ̃ʋ tɛrɛ a tɩ-son, fʋ na pↄw na a wↄ̃-sono, ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ̃ʋ tɛrɛ a tɩ-kpana, a wↄ̃-kpansɩ fʋ na mɩ pↄw, a-na-ɩ a wↄmↄ ba ma bↄ̃w nɩ a tɩɛ.
40012034	Nyɩna waab bibiir yaa! Mɩnɛ nyɩ na ɩ ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩ-faar ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛr-sono? A-na-ɩ a ala na sɛw a fʋ suur pʋↄ, ala yire a fʋ nʋↄrɩ̃.
40012035	A ala ɩ a nɩ-son tɛrɛ na a yel-vɛlɛ, a yel-vɛlɛ ʋ na de po a nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ a ala mɩ ɩ a nɩ-fãa tɛrɛ na a yel-kpansɩ, a ala ʋ na mɩ de po a nɩbɛ.
40012036	Ɩ̃ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ dayen, ba na soorʼã a nɩbɛ ba jaa a ba ƴɛr-pↄrsɩ ba na ƴɛrɛ a jaa.
40012037	A-na-ɩ a fʋ ƴɛr-bie nↄↄ miile a fʋ torfʋ, ɩ̃ a fʋ ƴɛr-bie ɩnɛ ba nↄↄ mɩ ƴↄ̃w fʋ a ƴɛrɩ̃.”
40012038	A ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ yelʼã a Jeeju: “Jãjaana, sɩ bʋↄrↄ na sɩ nyɛ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋn ʋ ɩ sɩ a jɩbaa.”
40012039	Ʋ yel ba: “A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩbɛ na ɩ a nɩ-faar nɩ a nɩ-burbur, ba bʋↄrↄ na ba nyɛ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋn ʋ ɩ ba a jɩbaa. Ɩ̃-cɛ ba kↄ̃ nyɛ bom kpee ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a ƴɛr-hiere Jonasɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa.
40012040	A-na-ɩ a mɩnɛ a Jonasɩ na dãa maal a bibie ata a jɩm-kpɛ̃ɛ pʋ̃ↄ, a lɛ ʋ mɩ, a Nɩbɛ Bie na mɩ maal a bibie ata a yaa pʋↄ.
40012041	A Nɩnɩvɩ-tẽ-deme nↄↄ ƴↄ̃w na a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩbɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ dayen, a-na-ɩ a daar ʋlↄ a Jonasɩ na dãa luer a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ a ba tẽw pʋↄ, ba lɩɛbʼã a ba yɛ̃, ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, nyɩ nyɛ na a ʋlↄ na gãw a Jonasɩ a nyɩ pʋↄ.
40012042	A ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ dayen mɩ, a tẽ-nɩdaa pↄw jamana nↄↄ mɩ ƴↄ̃w na a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩbɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃, a-na-ɩ ʋ yi na a tẽ-nɩdaa ɩ̃ wa cɛl a jamana Salʋmↄ̃ yɛ̃, ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, nyɩ nyɛ na a ʋlↄ na gãw a Salʋmↄ̃ a nyɩ pʋↄ.
40012043	“A lɛ a kↄ̃tↄn bier na yi a nɩrɛ pʋↄ, ʋ ma cenʼã na yʋↄrↄ a wɛ-kon pʋʋr bʋↄrↄ a jie ʋlↄ ʋ na tʋↄrↄ pɩɛnɛ, ɩ̃ ma faa,
40012044	ɩ̃ ma lɛ yel a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ: ʻƖ̃ na lɩɛbʼã kul a ɩ̃ yir pʋↄ ɩ̃ na dãa yi.ʼ A ʋlↄ wa kul, ʋ ma nyɛ na a yir ʋ ɩ bõ-jaalaa ba na pɩɩr gbɛɛrɩ̃ bar.
40012045	Ʋ ma lɩɛbʼã cen na bↄ a ʋ tↄ deme anuu-nʼayi na nyɩrɩ̃ ɩ a kↄ̃tↄn-faar gãw ʋ, kulʼɩ̃, a ba jɛ a be. A ala ɩ̃ baar, a daba ʋlↄ ben ma nyɩrɩ̃ na bɛlɩ̃ gãw a dãdãw. A lɛ a nↄↄ mɩ wↄ̃ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩ-faar jie.”
40012046	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na cãa ƴɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛ, a ʋ mã nɩ a ʋ yɛɛr wɩ na ɩraa a yẽw, ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ba ƴɛrʼɩ̃ ʋ.
40012047	A nɩrɛ kãw yel a Jeeju: “A fʋ mã nɩ a fʋ yɛɛr ɩraa na be yẽw bʋↄrↄ nyɩ ƴɛr taa.”
40012048	Ʋ yel a ʋna nɩrɛ: “Ala ɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ mã, ɩ̃ babõ mɩ ɩ a ɩ̃ yɛɛr?”
40012049	Ɩ̃ tur a ʋ par-tuurbe a nuu ɩ̃ yel: “Nyɩ́ nyɛ a ɩ̃ mã nɩ a ɩ̃ yɛɛr.
40012050	A-na-ɩ a nɩrɛ lɛ na maala a ɩ̃ Sãa na be a saa juu pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ yɛbɛ, a ɩ̃ yɛ-pↄw, mɩɩ a ɩ̃ mã. ”
40013001	A ʋna daarʼãa pʋↄ, a Jeeju yi na a yir ɩ̃ cen na jɛ a man gbẽgbere nʋↄr,
40013002	ɩ̃ a nɩ-yaw wɩ na a ʋ sɛ̃, ʋ ir kpɛ jɛ a gbor pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a nɩbɛ ba jaa ɩraa a gbẽgbere nʋↄr,
40013003	ʋ nyↄw ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ lↄbↄ nɩ a sʋkpar miile nɩ ba a yele yayaw. Ʋ yelʼã: “Daba kãw wa dãa na cen a ci yaarɩ̃fʋ jie.
40013004	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na yaara a ci, a ŋmɛɛ lo na a sↄr nʋↄr a wɛ-lili wa nɩɩr dɩ.
40013005	A ŋmɛɛ lɛ lo na a kʋsɩpan juu, a jie a tene na ma kpɛ wa, ɩ̃ a jie naan a bulʼã, a-na-ɩ a kↄ-tan ma bↄ̃w be a be wa.
40013006	A mɩnɛ a mↄtↄ̃w na do baar, a jʋↄlɩ̃ na ko, a-na-ɩ a nyɩbɛ ma kpɛ pʋ̃ↄ wa.
40013007	A ci ŋmɛɛ go lɛ lo na a gʋʋr pʋↄ, a gʋʋr karɩ̃ piw ba tɛɛlɛ.
40013008	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ci ŋmɛɛ lo na a tẽ-vɩlaa pʋↄ, ɩ̃ dↄw. A ci tɩ-bõ-ƴen tɛrɛ na ci-bie kʋbaa, a kãw tɛrɛ lɩjaata, ɩ̃ a kãw mɩ tɛrɛ lɩjɛrʼɩ̃-pie.”
40013009	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju pãa yel: “A ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a tobo wono nɩ, ú bↄ̃w cɛlɛ!”
40013010	A ʋ par-tuurbe taw na ta ʋ ɩ̃ soor ʋ: “Bõ ɩnɛ fʋ ƴɛrɛ lↄbↄ nɩ ba a sʋkpar a lɛ?”
40013011	Ʋ yel ba: “A nyɩmɩ, ba miil nyɩ na a nyɩ bↄ̃w a saa juu fãw ƴɛr-sↄↄlsɩ, ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩbɛ basɩmɛ baa pↄw wa.
40013012	A-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ, ba na dↄↄl ʋ na ʋ tɛrɛ a yaw, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na ma pↄw wa, ba na fáa na a fɩ̃ɩ ala ʋ na tɛrɛ.
40013013	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ lↄbↄ nɩ ba a sʋkpar a lɛ, a-na-ɩ ba Ꞌwuoro na ɩ̃ maa nyɛ wa; ba cɛlɛ na ɩ̃ maa wõ bↄ̃w a par wa.
40013014	A lɛ a ta a ba jie a na ɩ a mɩnɛ a ƴɛr-hiere Ejayi ƴɛrɩ̃ na dãa yel: ʻNyɩ nↄↄ wonaa na, ɩ̃ kↄ̃ wa bↄ̃w a par wa; nyɩ nↄↄ bↄ̃w na Ꞌwuor, ɩ̃ kↄ̃ wa nyɛ fɩ̃ɩ wa.
40013015	A-na-ɩ a nɩbɛ bala sube lɩɛbʼã kpɛmɛ, a ba tobo wõw na, a ba mimie mɩ jↄ̃w, a mɩnɛ a ba kↄ̃ wa nyɛ nɩ a ba mimie wa, ɩ̃ mɩ wõ nɩ a ba tobo, a ba sube kↄ̃ mɩ bↄ̃w a par wa, a mɩnɛ a ba yɛ̃ kↄ̃ wa lɩɛb, ɩ̃ naa kpaar ba wa.ʼ
40013016	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩmɩ, nyɩ pↄw na nʋ̃ↄ, a-na-ɩ a nyɩ mimie nyɛrɛ na, a nyɩ tobo mɩ wono.
40013017	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe nɩ a nɩ-torisɩ yaw dãa na bʋↄrↄ ba nyɛ a ala nyɩ na nyɛrɛ, ɩ̃ ma nyɛ wa. Ba mɩ dãa na bʋↄrↄ ba wõ a ala nyɩ na wono, ɩ̃ ma wõ wa.
40013018	“Nyɩ́ cɛlɛ a ci yaarɩ̃fʋ sʋkpa par.
40013019	A ci ala na lo a sↄr nʋↄr ɩ na a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na wõ a Naaŋmɩn fãw ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ ma bↄ̃w a par wa, a Fãa Sʋbↄ wɩ ir a ala na be a ʋ suur pʋↄ, ɩ̃ cɛ ʋ bar.
40013020	A ci ala na lo a kʋsɩpan juu ɩ na a ʋlↄ na wõ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ sↄw a jie naan a vɩlaa,
40013021	ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ maa kam wa, a-na-ɩ Ꞌwaa bá a nyɩbɛ wa. A lɛdaar a won mɩɩ a hʋↄlfʋ na ta ʋ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ala ɩnɛ, a ma tↄ ʋ na ʋ de bar.
40013022	A ci ala na lo a gʋʋr pʋↄ ɩ na a ʋlↄ na wõ a ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃-cɛ a daarʼãa pʋↄ na-tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ, nɩ a tẽw pʋↄ yel-bɛlɩsɩ ma piw na a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ tɛɛlɛ, a Ꞌwaa lɛ wↄnↄ wa.
40013023	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ci ala na lo a tẽ-vɩlaa pʋↄ ɩ na a ʋlↄ na wõ a ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ mɩ bↄ̃w a par. Ʋ ma wↄ̃ na a wↄmↄ, a tɩ-bõ-ƴen kʋbaa, a kãw lɩjaata, a kãw mɩ lɩjɛrʼɩ̃-pie.”
40013024	A Jeeju lɛ lↄbʼã a sʋkpa ƴen sʋbↄ miilʼɩ̃ ba. Ʋ yelʼã: “A saa juu fãw wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a daba na dãa yaarɩ̃ a ci a ʋ puo pʋↄ.
40013025	Ɩ̃-cɛ a tɩsↄw, a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ na gur, a ʋ san-sʋbↄ wɩ na yaarɩ̃ a yaya ƴↄ̃w a ci pʋↄ ɩ̃ lɩɛb kul.
40013026	A mɩnɛ a ci na bul karɩ̃ dↄwrↄ, a mʋ̃ↄ mɩ pↄwrↄ na,
40013027	a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ taw ta a pʋↄ sʋbↄ ɩ̃ soor ʋ: ʻAa ɩ ci nɩ̃ɛ fʋ dãa bʋrↄ a fʋ puo pʋↄ wa? Ɩ nyɩnɛ a yaya lↄↄ yi be?ʼ
40013028	Ʋ yel ba: ʻA san-sʋbↄ ɩ̃ maal.ʼ A ba lɛ soor ʋ: ʻFʋ bʋↄrↄ na sɩ cen na vↄ̃ bar mɩɩ?ʼ
40013029	Ʋ yel ba: ʻNyɩ taa maal a lɛ wa. A-na-ɩ a nyɩmɩ vↄnↄ a yaya nyɩ nↄↄ lãa na vʋ̃ↄ nɩ a ci ŋmɛɛ.
40013030	Nyɩ́ bar ba a ba ɓã taa karɩ̃ wa ta nɩ a ci ŋmafʋ daar. Á ci ŋmafʋ wa ta ɩ̃ na yelʼã a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ a ba de nĩe vↄ̃ a yaya lũ ƴↄ̃w a vũu pʋↄ, ɩ̃ pãa ŋma a ci woor ƴↄ̃w a boorɩ̃.ʼ ”
40013031	A Jeeju lɛ lↄbʼã a sʋkpa kãw miilʼɩ̃ ba. Ʋ yelʼã: “A saa juu fãw wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a muta-tɩɛ bir a daba na de bʋr a ʋ puo pʋↄ.
40013032	A ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a bir na nyɩrɩ̃ pab gãw a bie a jaa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ wa bul karɩ̃, ʋ ma gãw na a yel-kʋↄrsɩ nɩ a yel-sɛlsɩ a jaa, ɩ̃ ma ɩ a tɩɛ a wɛ-lili ma wɩ gana a ʋ wulbie jur. ”
40013033	Ʋ lɛ lↄbʼã a sʋkpa kãw go yelʼɩ̃: “A saa juu fãw lɛ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a tabɩr a pↄw na de ƴↄ̃w a man-bil lɩjaanaan jↄ̃ pʋↄ pↄw bar, a tabɩr wa maal a jↄ̃ a jaa a vʋ̃.”
40013034	A sʋkpar a Jeeju lↄbↄ nɩ a ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a jaa kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ. ꞋWaa ƴɛrʼɩ̃ ba ƴɛrɩ̃ kãw ɩ̃ ma lↄbʼɩ̃ a sʋkpa wa,
40013035	a na ɩ a ala a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere na dãa yel: “ Ɩ̃ na haa na a ɩ̃ nʋↄr lↄbʼɩ̃ a sʋkpar miilʼɩ̃ ba. Ɩ̃ na mɩ hierʼã a yele ala na dãa sↄↄlɩ̃ a tẽw maalfʋ daar jaa, kʋ ba.”
40013036	A Jeeju barʼã a nɩbɛ ɩ̃ kul a yir, a ʋ par-tuurbe taw ta ʋ, ɩ̃ yel: “Ir a yaya na be a puo pʋↄ sʋkpa par kʋ sɩ.”
40013037	Ʋ yel ba a nↄhↄ̃: “A ʋlↄ na yaarɩ̃ a ci ɩ na a Nɩbɛ Bie.
40013038	A puo miile na a tẽw, a ci mɩ miile a Naaŋmɩn fãw nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ a yaya mɩ miile a Fãa Sʋbↄ nɩbɛ.
40013039	A ʋlↄ na yaarɩ̃ a yaya ɩ na a Satã, ɩ̃ a ci ŋmafʋ daar miile na a tẽw baarfʋ daar, a ci ŋmarba ɩ̃ mɩ ɩ a sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ.
40013040	A mɩnɛ ba na wobo a yaya ƴↄnↄ a vũu pʋↄ a dɩrɛ, a lɛ a na mɩ be a tẽw baarfʋ daar.
40013041	A Nɩbɛ Bie nↄↄ tʋ̃ na a ʋ sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ a ba cen na tuur a ʋ fãw nɩbɛ pʋↄ a bala na saa a nɩbɛ loro a maal-fãa pʋↄ, nɩ a maal-bebe deme ba jaa,
40013042	ɩ̃ lↄb ba ƴↄ̃w a vũu kpõ-kpõ pʋↄ. Ɩ̃ a be, ba na kono na nyɩrɛ nɩ a nyɩmɛ.
40013043	Ɩ̃-cɛ a bala na tor nↄↄ nyɩlɛ na wↄ̃ taa nɩ a mↄtↄ̃w, a ba Sãa Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ. A ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a tobo wono nɩ, ú bↄ̃w cɛlɛ!
40013044	“A saa juu fãw wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a na-yele ba na ũu sↄↄlɩ̃ bar a puo pʋↄ, a daba wa cen na nyɛ, ɩ̃ lɛ cↄↄrɩ̃ sↄↄlɩ̃ bar, a nʋ̃ↄ nyɩrɩ̃ nyↄw ʋ, ʋ cen na de a ʋ yele a jaa da, lɩɛb cenʼɩ̃ da nɩ a ʋna puo.
40013045	“A saa juu fãw mɩ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a ƴaƴaba na bʋↄrↄ a lɛr-vɛlɛ,
40013046	ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na nyɛ a kãw na nyɩrɩ̃ vɩɛlɛ ɩ̃ mɩ kpɛmɛ a dafʋ, ʋ kulʼã wob a ʋ yele a jaa da, cenʼɩ̃ na da nɩ a ʋna lɛr-birʼãa.
40013047	“A saa juu fãw mɩ lɛ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a jʋↄ ba na lↄb ƴↄ̃w a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ, ʋ nyↄↄr a yel-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ a jaa.
40013048	A mɩnɛ a jʋↄ na sɛw, a jɩ̃-bɛrbɛ taw na yi nɩ a kʋlaa gbẽgbere nʋↄr, ɩ̃ jɛ tuur a jɩmɛ ƴↄ̃w a pɩɩr pʋʋr, ɩ̃ lↄb a yel-kpansɩ bar.
40013049	A lɛ a na mɩ be a tẽw baarfʋ daar. A sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ na wa na ow a nɩ-faar a nɩ-torisɩ sↄ̃w,
40013050	ɩ̃ lↄb ba ƴↄ̃w a vũu kpõ-kpõ pʋↄ. Ɩ̃ a be, ba na kono na nyɩrɛ nɩ a nyɩmɛ.”
40013051	A Jeeju soor ba: “Nyɩ wonaa na a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ asɩmɛ a jaa mɩɩ?” A ba yel ʋ, á Ↄↄ.
40013052	Ʋ yel ba: “Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩrɛ jaa wa lɩɛb ɩ a saa juu fãw par-tuure, ʋ na wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a naaba na ire a ʋ na-yele pʋↄ a yel-paala nɩ a yel-koro poro a nɩbɛ.”
40013053	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na lↄb a sʋkpar ala baar, ʋ yi na a be
40013054	ɩ̃ kul a ʋ tẽw, a Najarɛtɩ, ɩ̃ kpɛ a ba puorfʋ yir pʋↄ jaana ba, a nʋↄr ko ba a ba yele taa: “Nyɩnɛ a daba na yɛ̃ yi, nɩ a ʋ nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ ala ʋ na maal?
40013055	Aa ɩ a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a dafↄↄrↄ bi-daba wa? Aa ɩ a ʋ mã ɩ̃ dɩ a Maarɩɩ wa? Aa mɩ ɩ a Jakɩ, a Jojɛfʋ, a Sɩmↄ̃, nɩ a Judi ɩ̃ ɩ a ʋ yɛɛr wa?
40013056	Ɩ̃ saa lãa be nɩ a ʋ yɛ-pↄↄbↄ ba jaa a ka wa? Ɩ̃ nyɩnɛ a daba na pↄw a ana yele a lɛ?”
40013057	Ɩ̃ a ʋ maal-bie cɛ ba na. Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju yel ba: “Ba ma ƴↄnↄ na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere a jiir a jaa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ma ɩ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ tẽw, nɩ a ʋ yir wa.”
40013058	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na ma tɛrɛ nɩ ʋ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa wa, a Jeeju ma tʋ̃ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ a be yaw wa.
40014001	A ʋna daarʼãa a Ɛrↄdɩ na ɩ a Galile jamana wõ na a Jeeju ƴɛrɩ̃
40014002	ɩ̃ yel a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ: “A Jã-Batii nɩ a nanɩ. Ʋ irʼã a kũu pʋↄ, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ tɛrɛ a fãgã tʋnↄ nɩ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ a lɛ.”
40014003	-
40014004	A-na-ɩ a Jã dãa na yel a Ɛrↄdɩ áa ƴɛr-kpɛn ma kʋ ʋ sↄr ʋ na faa a ʋ yɛbɛ Fɩlɩpɩ pↄw Ɛrↄdɩya kul wa. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Ɛrↄdɩ ƴↄ̃w na a ba nyↄw a Jã lũ ƴↄ̃w a kasu pʋↄ.
40014005	Ʋ dãa na bʋↄrↄ ʋ kú ʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw ʋ na a nɩbɛ ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ ba bↄ̃w ka a Jã ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere.
40014006	A mɩnɛ a Ɛrↄdɩ dↄwfʋ bibir fɛtɩ na ta, a Ɛrↄdɩya bi-pↄw sɛ na a bɩnɛ a ba nii-sↄw, a nʋ̃ↄ nyɩrɩ̃ nyↄw a Ɛrↄdɩ,
40014007	ʋ ir pↄ yelʼɩ̃, á ʋ na kʋ na a poole a bom lɛ ʋ na sʋↄrↄ ʋ.
40014008	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a poole mã na kpãa ʋ baar, ʋ cenʼã na yel a Ɛrↄdɩ á ʋ ƴↄ̃w a Jã-Batii juu a lagbaal pʋↄ kʋ ʋ.
40014009	A jamana suur sãw, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋ pↄfʋ ʋ na pↄ a ʋ lãa-dɩrbɛ nii-sↄw saa, ʋ sↄw,
40014010	ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w a ba cen na ŋmaa a Jã juu a kasu pʋↄ.
40014011	Ba wɩ nɩ na a Jã juu a lagbaal pʋↄ kʋ a poole, ʋ de kʋ a ʋ ma.
40014012	A Jã par-tuurbe cenʼã na de a kũu ũu, ɩ̃ pãa cen na man a Jeeju a ala na ta.
40014013	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na wõ a ala na ta a Jã, ʋ yi na cen na kpɛ a gbor nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe á ba cen na sↄↄlɩ̃ a wɛkar pʋↄ a man gaan. Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ na wõ a lɛ, ba yi na a ba ten pʋʋr lara a man gbẽgbere bɩɛrɛ ʋ.
40014014	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na ta a man gaan ʋ nyɛ na a nɩ-yaw, a nãw nyↄw ʋ, ʋ kpaar a bala na ɩ a baalsɩ.
40014015	A lɛ a jaanʋↄr na ta a ʋ par-tuurbe taw na ta ʋ ɩ̃ yel: “Wɛkar pʋↄ sɩ be, ɩ̃ a mↄtↄ̃w mʋrↄ. Wɛl a nɩbɛ bar a ba cen a tẽw pʋↄ na da a bõ-dɩraa.”
40014016	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju yel ba: “Aa sɛw a ba na cen wa. Nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ, nyɩ́ kʋ ba a bõ-dɩraa.”
40014017	A ba yel ʋ: “Saa tɛrɛ bom ka, ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ bur-bie anuu nɩ jɩmɛ ayi tɛw wa.”
40014018	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ de wa nɩ kʋ ma ka”,
40014019	ɩ̃ yel a nɩbɛ á ba jɛ a mʋ̃ↄ juu. Ʋ de na a buru anuu nɩ a jɩmɛ ayi ala, dʋↄ Ꞌwuoro nɩ a saa juu puorʼɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃ ŋma a buru kʋ a ʋ par-tuurbe a ba de po a nɩbɛ.
40014020	A ba jaa bõ-ƴene-ƴene Ꞌwↄbʼã pi, ɩ̃ a par-tuurbe nɩɩr a bõ-ŋmara ala na cɛ sɛw pɩɩr pie-nʼayi.
40014021	A bala na Ꞌwↄb a buru na ta na dabsɩ ture anuu, ɩ̃ a pↄↄbↄ nɩ a bibiir ma be tↄ wa.
40014022	A jie naan a Jeeju ƴↄ̃w na a ʋ par-tuurbe a ba kpɛ a gbor pʋↄ de nĩe gãwna ʋ a man gaan, ɩ̃ ʋ wɛlɛ a nɩbɛ bara.
40014023	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na wɛl ba bar baar, ʋ do na a tãw lõkor pʋↄ sↄↄlɩ̃, sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn. A jaanʋↄr ta na pↄw ʋ a be a ʋ yẽ,
40014024	ɩ̃-cɛ a gbor ʋlↄ dãa na cen jãa nɩ a gbẽgbere, a kʋ̃ↄ cara dama ʋ, a-na-ɩ sɛsɛb fure na tuoro ba.
40014025	A nↄraa kuon daar a Jeeju cere na a kʋ̃ↄ juu wɩɛrɛ a ʋ par-tuurbe sɛ̃.
40014026	A lɛ ba na nyɛ ʋ, ʋ cere a kʋ̃ↄ juu a lɛ, a nyɩrɩ̃ na dama ba a ba yel: “Kpɩɩn ʋ!” ɩ̃ wuure a dãbɛ̃-wuurfʋ.
40014027	Ɩ̃ a jie naan a Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ bar nyãa! Maa ʋ. Nyɩ taa ɩ a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw nyɩ wa.”
40014028	A Pɩɛr yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, a ala ɩ fʋ̃ʋ ʋ, ɩ ɩ̃ mɩ cen a kʋ̃ↄ juu wɩ a fʋ sɛ̃.”
40014029	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Wa!” a Pɩɛr yi a gbor pʋↄ cere a kʋ̃ↄ juu wɩɛrɛ a Jeeju sɛ̃.
40014030	Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ ʋ na nyɛ a sɛsɛb ʋ fure, dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw ʋ na, ʋ nyↄw ɩ̃ mʋrↄ a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ wuur yel: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, faa ma!”
40014031	A jie naan a Jeeju turʼã a nuu nyↄw nɩ ʋ ɩ̃ yel: “A fʋna ƴↄ̃w-nyãa pabaa sʋbↄ naa, bõ ɩ a fʋ baalɩ̃?”
40014032	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na kpɛ a gbor pʋↄ baar, a sɛsɛb ŋmaa na.
40014033	A bala na be a gbor pʋↄ lo na gburĩ a dume puoro nɩ ʋ, yele nɩ: “Fʋ sɩrɩ̃ na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Bie.”
40014034	A lɛ ba na gãw a man baar, ba ta na a Jenejarɛ-tẽw.
40014035	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a ʋna tẽw nɩbɛ na nyɛ ʋ bↄ̃w ka a Jeeju ʋ, ba tʋ̃ na yel a ten cɛ̃cɛn deme ba jaa, a ba wɩ nɩ a wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme ba jaa,
40014036	ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ ʋ a ʋ bar ba a ba sɩɩr a ʋ cẽcen nʋↄr tɛw, ɩ̃ a bala ba jaa na sɩɩr, ba kpaarʼã.
40015001	A ala ɩ̃ baar, a Jerujalɛm Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ wɩ na a Jeeju sɛ̃ ɩ̃ soor ʋ:
40015002	“Bõ ɩ a fʋ par-tuurbe ma sãwna a sɩ tẽkorɩ̃ nɩ-bɛrɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a lɛ? A-na-ɩ a bala dɩrɛ a dɩb, ba maa pɛw a ba nur a mɩnɛ a puorfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ na yel wa.”
40015003	A Jeeju mɩ lɩɛb soor ba: “Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, bõ ɩ a nyɩ ma de a nyɩ tẽkorɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ sãw nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn?
40015004	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ yelʼã: ʻYↄnↄ a fʋ sãa nɩ a fʋ mã,ʼ ɩ̃ lɛ yel: ʻA ʋlↄ na tʋrↄ a ʋ sãa mɩɩ a ʋ mã, a sɛw na a ba na kú ʋ.ʼ
40015005	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩmɩ, nyɩ yelʼã, áa nɩrɛ wa yel a ʋ sãa, mɩɩ a ʋ mã, áa bom lɛ ʋ naa dãa sũo nɩ ba, á ʋ de na kʋ a Naaŋmɩn,
40015006	áa nɩrɛ ʋlↄ ma lɛ tɛrɛ sↄr na sũo a ʋ sãa nɩ a ʋ mã go wa. A nↄhↄ̃ nyɩ ma de a nyɩ tẽkorɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ sãw nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ bar.
40015007	Nyɩna bɛbɛlbɛ naa! A Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere Ejayi dãa na sɩrɩ̃ tɛrɛ yel-mɩ̃ɛ a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa yel a nyɩ ɩnɛ:
40015008	ʻNʋↄr tɛw a nɩbɛ basɩmɛ ƴↄnↄ nɩ ma, ɩ̃-cɛ a ba suur jãa nɩ ma na.
40015009	A ba puorfʋ ba na puoro ma ma tɛrɛ par wa, ɩ̃ a ba jaanfʋ ba na jaana a nɩbɛ ɩ na a nɩbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ tɛw.ʼ ”
40015010	A Jeeju bʋↄlʼã a nɩbɛ ba jaa a ba wɩ a ʋ sɛ̃, ʋ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ cɛl wõ a ƴɛrɩ̃ nanɩ.
40015011	Aa ɩ a ala na kpɛɛrɛ a nɩrɛ nʋↄr pʋↄ ɩ̃ sãwna ʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ala na yire a nɩrɛ nʋↄr pʋↄ, ala sãwna ʋ.”
40015012	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, a ʋ par-tuurbe taw na ta ʋ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Fʋ bↄ̃w ka a mɩnɛ fʋ na ƴɛrɛ a lɛ, a cɛ na a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ mɩɩ?”
40015013	A Jeeju yel ba: “A tɩɛ lɛ a ɩ̃ saa juu Sãa na ma sɛl wa, na vʋ̃ↄ na.
40015014	Nyɩ́ bar ba be! Jↄn ɩ̃ tawra taa. Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a jↄ̃w tawra na a jↄ̃w, ba jaa ayi na lo na bↄw kpolo pʋↄ.”
40015015	A Pɩɛr de na a ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Man sɩ a sʋkpa naa par.”
40015016	A Jeeju yel: “Nyɩmɩ mɩ, nyaa tɛrɛ a yɛ̃ na bↄ̃w a par wa?
40015017	Nyaa bↄ̃w ka a bom lɛ na kpɛɛrɛ a nɩrɛ nʋↄr pʋↄ ma suu na a puorɩ̃, ɩ̃ lɛ lɩɛb yi a sãɓanɩ̃ wa?
40015018	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala na yire a nɩrɛ nʋↄrɩ̃ yi na a ʋ suur pʋↄ; ala sãw na a nɩrɛ.
40015019	A-na-ɩ a tɩɛrɩ̃-faar, a nɩrɛ kúfʋ, a pↄↄ-kpee nɩ a dab-kpee ganɩfʋ, a pebfʋ, a jufʋ, a mɩl-taa, nɩ a korfʋ,
40015020	ala yire a nɩrɛ suur pʋↄ sãwna ʋ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a dɩb dɩfʋ nɩ a nu-dɛɛr ala a puorfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ na ciire ma sãwna nɩrɛ wa.”
40015021	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na yi a be, ʋ cenʼã a Tɩɩr nɩ a Sɩdↄ̃-ten nↄɛ.
40015022	Ɩ̃ a Kana-tẽw pↄw kãw na be a be yi na wuure tuoro nɩ ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yaa! Davɩtɩ Bie wee! Bↄ̃w ma nãw! A kↄ̃tↄn ire na a ɩ̃ bi-pↄw, a nyɩrɩ̃ wono ʋ.”
40015023	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju ma yel ʋ bom wa. A ʋ par-tuurbe taw ta ʋ ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ ʋ a ʋ diw a pↄw bar, a-na-ɩ ʋ wuure na tuure nɩ ba.
40015024	A Jeeju yel: “A Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ na bↄr a piir kaarɩ̃, bala ɩnɛ tɛw ba tʋ̃ ma.”
40015025	Ɩ̃-cɛ a pↄw wa na lo gburĩ a dume a ʋ nii-sↄw ɩ̃ yel: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, sũo ma!”
40015026	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Aa vɩɛlɛ a ba na de a bibiir dɩb lↄb ƴↄ̃w a baar wa.”
40015027	A pↄw yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, sɩrɛ jaa ʋ, ɩ̃ má a baar ma dɩrɛ na a dɩb ŋmara ala na loro a ba súↄrbↄ pulẽe.”
40015028	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Pↄw, a fʋ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa bɛrmɛ na. A na maalʼã a fʋ jie a mɩnɛ fʋ na bʋↄrↄ.” Ɩ̃ a daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ a ʋ bi-pↄw kpaarʼã.
40015029	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na yi a be, ʋ cenʼã a Galile man nʋↄr ɩ̃ do a tãw jɛ.
40015030	A nɩbɛ yayaw wɩ na a ʋ sɛ̃ tɛrɛ nɩ a gbɛɛ, a ɩ̃gan saansɩ deme, a jↄn, a won, nɩ a wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme ŋmɛɛ yaw go, na bin a ʋ pulẽe, ɩ̃ ʋ kpaar ba.
40015031	A nɩbɛ nʋↄr ko ba a mɩnɛ ba na nyɛ a won a ba ƴɛrɛ, a ɩ̃gan saansɩ deme kpaar, a gbɛɛ cere, ɩ̃ a jↄn mɩ nyɛrɛ, ɩ̃ ba nyↄw na ɩ̃ pɛwrɛ a Ɩsɩrayɛl Naaŋmɩn.
40015032	A Jeeju bʋↄlʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe a ba wɩ, ʋ yel ba: “A nãw nyↄw ma na a nɩbɛ basɩmɛ ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ ba be nɩ ma na a bibie ata, ɩ̃ baa cãa tɛrɛ dɩb dɩrɛ wa. Maa bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ bar ba a lɛ nɩ a kↄ̃ wa, a mɩnɛ ba kↄ̃ wa lo sↄr pʋↄ wa.”
40015033	A ʋ par-tuurbe soor ʋ: “Nyɩnɛ sɩ na tʋↄ nyɛ a bõ-dɩraa a na sɛw a nɩ-par-bʋrↄ na, a ka a wɛkarʼã pʋↄ?”
40015034	A Jeeju lɩɛb soor ba: “Bur-bie amɩnɛ nyɩ tɛrɛ?” a ba yel: “Sɩ tɛrɛ na bur-bie anuu-nʼayi, ɓã jɩm-bil ŋmɛɛ.”
40015035	Ʋ ƴↄ̃w na a nɩbɛ a ba jɛ a tene,
40015036	ʋ de a bur-bie anuu-nʼayi nɩ a jɩmɛ, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na puor a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w, ʋ ŋma na kʋ a ʋ par-tuurbe, a ba de po a nɩbɛ,
40015037	a ba Ꞌwↄb pi ba jaa, ɩ̃ cɛ a bõ-ŋmara na cɛ, a par-tuurbe nɩɩr sɛw pɩɩr anuu-nʼayi.
40015038	A bala na Ꞌwↄb a buru, ba ɩ na dabsɩ ture anaan, ɩ̃ a pↄↄbↄ nɩ a bibiir ma be tↄ wa.
40015039	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na bar a nɩbɛ a ba kul, ʋ kpɛ na a gbor cen a Magadã-tẽw nʋↄr.
40016001	A Farɩsɩ nɩ a Saduse nɩbɛ taw na ta a Jeeju, sʋↄrↄ bɩɩrɛ nɩ ʋ, á ʋ miil ba a nↄ-kofʋ tʋn na yi a saa juu, ʋ ɩ ba a jɩbaa.
40016002	Ʋ yel ba: “A mɩnɛ a jaanʋↄr na ma ta nyɩ ma yelʼã áa wɩɛr na kpaarʼã, a-na-ɩ a saꞋlon lo na a gbar,
40016003	ɩ̃ a dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ ɓaaraa nyɩ ma yelʼã áa saa na wa na, a-na-ɩ a saꞋlon lo na a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃-salba. Nyɩ bↄ̃w na a saꞋlon jɩbsɩ par irfʋ, ɩ̃ mɩnɛ nyaa tʋↄ bↄ̃w a yele ala na tara a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ par irfʋ wa?
40016004	A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩbɛ na ɩ a nɩ-faar nɩ a nɩ-burbur, ba bʋↄrↄ na ba nyɛ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋn ʋ ɩ ba a jɩbaa. Ɩ̃-cɛ ba kↄ̃ nyɛ bom kpee ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Jonasɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa.” Ɩ̃ ʋ bar ba na ɩ̃ cere.
40016005	A mɩnɛ a ʋ par-tuurbe na gãw a man gaan ba hiinʼã a buru tɛrɛfʋ bar.
40016006	Á Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ, jʋʋrↄ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩ a Saduse nɩbɛ tabɩr ɩnɛ”,
40016007	a ba tɩɛrɛ sooro nɩ taa yele nɩ: “A-na-ɩ saa tɛrɛ a buru wa, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ʋ ƴɛrɛ a lɛ.”
40016008	A Jeeju bↄ̃w nɩ ba ɩ̃ yel ba: “Nyɩna ƴↄ̃w-nyãa pabaa deme naa, bõ ɩ a nyɩ tɩɛrɛ ƴↄnↄ taa a nyaa tɛrɛ buru wa?
40016009	Nyaa bↄ̃w a par sɛr wa mɩɩ? Nyaa cãa bↄ̃w nɩ a bur-bie anuu a nɩbɛ turʼanuu na Ꞌwↄb wa? Nɩ a pɩɩr amɩnɛ nyɩ na wobʼɩ̃ a ŋmara wa..?
40016010	Nɩ a bur-bie anuu-nʼayi a nɩbɛ turʼanaan ɩnɛ wa? Nɩ a pɩɩr amɩnɛ nyɩ na wob wa?
40016011	Mɩnɛ a ɩ a nyaa bↄ̃w ka a aa ɩ buru ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ nɩ nyɩ wa? Ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ bↄ̃w tɛrɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩ a Saduse nɩbɛ tabɩr ɩnɛ.”
40016012	A ba pãa bↄ̃w ka a Ꞌwaa yele ba a ba tɛrɛ ba mɩ̃ɛ a buru tabɩr ɩnɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩ a Saduse nɩbɛ jaanfʋ ɩnɛ ʋ.
40016013	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na ta a Fɩlɩpɩ Sejare-tẽw wɩɛr, ʋ soorʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe: “Á Nɩbɛ Bie, ala a nɩbɛ tɩɛrɛ ʋ ɩ?”
40016014	A par-tuurbe yel ʋ: “A ŋmɛɛ yelʼã a Jã-Batii fʋ ɩ. A ŋmɛɛ lɛ yel a Eli fʋ ɩ. A ŋmɛɛ lɛ yel go, a Jeremi, mɩɩ a ƴɛr-hiere kãw fʋ ɩ.”
40016015	A Jeeju soor ba: “Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, nyɩ yelʼã a ala ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ?”
40016016	A Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr yel ʋ: “Fʋ ɩ na a Kirisi, a Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a baafʋ Bie.”
40016017	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Jonasɩ bie, Sɩmↄ̃! Nʋ̃ↄ be na a fʋ jie, a-na-ɩ aa ɩ nɩrɛ tɩɛrʋ̃ fʋ bↄ̃w nɩ a ala wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ̃ Sãa na be a saa juu ɩ̃ miil fʋ.
40016018	Pɩɛr, maa ɩ̃ yele fʋ: fʋ ɩ na kʋsɩr, ɩ̃ a ʋna kʋsɩrʼãa juu ɩ̃ na mɛ a ɩ̃ yir na ɩ a duo-puorbo. Ɩ̃ a ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a kũu ʋ, ʋ kↄ̃ↄ tʋↄ ʋ fɩ̃ɩ wa.
40016019	Ɩ̃ na kʋ fʋ na a saa juu fãw nakilsɩ. A ala fʋ na mↄ̃w bar a ka a tẽw pʋↄ na mɩ mↄ̃w na a saa juu. Ɩ̃ a ala fʋ na sↄw bar a sↄr a ka a tẽw pʋↄ, a sↄr mɩ be na be a saa juu.”
40016020	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju kpãkpanʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe, a ba taa yele kʋrↄ nɩrɛ áa Kirisi ʋ ɩ wa.
40016021	A daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ, a Jeeju nyↄw na ɩ̃ mana a ʋ par-tuurbe áa sɛw na ʋ na cen a Jerujalɛm, na dɩ a tuo yaw a ni-dierbe nɩ a Naaŋmɩn baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ jie, á ba na kú ʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ a bibie ata pʋↄ, ʋ na lɛ irʼã a kũu pʋↄ.
40016022	A Pɩɛr taw ʋ na yi nɩ a cɛ̃cɛ̃w na kpãana ʋ yele nɩ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ! Naaŋmɩn ma sↄwrↄ wa. A kↄ̃ maal a fʋ jie a lɛ wa.”
40016023	A Jeeju lɩɛb yel ʋ: “Satã! Taw yi ka a ɩ̃ nii-sↄw. Fʋ ɩ na cakpow a ɩ̃ jie. A-na-ɩ faa tɩɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn kaarɩ̃ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ nɩrɛ kaarɩ̃ fʋ tɩɛrɛ.”
40016024	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju yelʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe: “A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ bʋↄrↄ na ʋ tuure ma, ú jɛ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ bar, ɩ̃ naa ʋ tuo a ʋ nɩ-kʋ-daa tuure nɩ ma.
40016025	A-na-ɩ a nɩrɛ lɛ na bʋↄrↄ ʋ faa a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ, a ʋ baafʋ na bↄrʼã. Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩrɛ lɛ na bar a ʋ baafʋ ʋ bↄr a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ, ʋ na pↄw ʋ na.
40016026	Bõ a na ɩ a nɩrɛ jie a ʋlↄ pↄw a tẽw pʋↄ yele a jaa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋ baafʋ bↄr? Bom be na be a nɩrɛ na tʋↄ de tɛw nɩ a ʋ baafʋ mɩɩ?
40016027	A-na-ɩ a Nɩbɛ Bie na sɩrɩ̃ na wa nɩ a ʋ Sãa yo-yifʋ yele, nɩ a ʋ sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ. Ɩ̃ a daar ʋlↄ, ʋ na ya na a nɩbɛ ba jaa tu nɩ a ba maal-bie.
40016028	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a bala na be a ka, nɩŋmɛɛ be na be kↄ̃ kpi sɛr wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ba na nyɛ na a Nɩbɛ Bie ʋ waara nɩ a ʋ fãgã.”
40017001	A lɛ a bibie ayʋↄb na tↄl baar, a Jeeju taw na a Pɩɛr, a Jakɩ nɩ a ʋ yɛbɛ Jã do nɩ a tã-kpɛ̃ɛ juu,
40017002	ɩ̃ ʋ nalɩ̃ na a ba nii-sↄw. A ʋ nii-sↄw lɩɛbʼã wↄ̃ taa nɩ a mↄtↄ̃w, ɩ̃ a ʋ cẽcene pɛlɩ̃ wↄ̃ taa nɩ a cãa.
40017003	Ɩ̃ a ʋ par-tuurbe ata bala nyɛ na a Mowisi nɩ a Eli a ba ƴɛrɛ nɩ a Jeeju.
40017004	A Pɩɛr de na a ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ yel a Jeeju: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ! A vɩɛlɛ na a sɩ na be a ka. A fʋ̃ʋ bʋↄrↄ, ɩ̃ na ƴↄ̃w na sɛɛr ata, bõ-ƴen na ɩ na a fʋ ben, a bõ-ƴen ɩ a Mowisi ben, ɩ̃ a bõ-ƴen mɩ ɩ a Eli ben.”
40017005	A lɛ a Pɩɛr na cãa ƴɛrɛ, a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃ma na nyɩlɛ wa na pↄw ba, ɩ̃ ba wõ na a kↄkɩr a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃ma pʋↄ na yel: “A ʋlↄ ɩ na a ɩ̃ Bi-nʋnaa na kpɛ ma a nyãa. Nyɩ́ cɛlɛ ʋ.”
40017006	A mɩnɛ a ʋ par-tuurbe na wõ a ʋna kↄkɩr, dãbɩ̃ɛ nyɩrɩ̃ na nyↄw ba, a ba lo pↄw a ba nii-sↄw a tene.
40017007	A Jeeju ta na sɩɩr ba ɩ̃ yel: “Nyɩ́ ir! Nyɩ taa jↄrↄ dãbɩ̃ɛ wa.”
40017008	Ɩ̃ ba jɛɛrʼã Ꞌwuor, ma lɛ nyɛ nɩrɛ wa, ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Jeeju tɛw ʋ wa.
40017009	A lɛ ba na yi a tãw juu ɩ̃ suure, a Jeeju kpãa ba na a ba taa wa ƴɛrɛ a ala ba na nyɛ kʋrↄ nɩrɛ wa, wa tara nɩ a lɛdaar a Nɩbɛ Bie na ire a kũu pʋↄ.
40017010	A ʋ par-tuurbe soor ʋ na: “Bõ ɩnɛ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ yel a Eli sɛw na na de nĩe wa?”
40017011	A Jeeju yel ba: “A Eli na sɩrɩ̃ na wa, na cↄↄrɩ̃ a yele a jaa.
40017012	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a Eli gↄrʼã wa, ɩ̃ baa dãa bↄ̃w ʋ wa, ɩ̃ maal ʋ a mɩnɛ a na nʋmↄ ba. A lɛ a Nɩbɛ Bie nↄↄ mɩ dɩ a tuo a ba jie.”
40017013	A ʋ par-tuurbe pãa na bↄ̃w ka a Jã-Batii ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ miile ba.
40017014	A mɩnɛ ba na lɩɛb wa pↄw a nɩ-yaw, daba kãw wɩ na a Jeeju sɛ̃ na ʋ lo gburĩ a dume
40017015	ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, bↄ̃w a ɩ̃ bi-daba nãw. Ŋme-kpar ɩ̃ nyↄw ʋ, a bɛlɩ̃ ʋ. A daar a jaa ʋ ma lo a vũu pʋↄ, mɩɩ a kʋ̃ↄmɩ.
40017016	Ɩ̃ taw ʋ wɩ nɩ a fʋ par-tuurbe jie, ɩ̃-cɛ a baa tʋↄ kpaar ʋ wa.”
40017017	A Jeeju yel: “A nyɩmɩ ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ su-kpɛn deme, na ma tɛrɛ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa wa, ɩ̃ be nɩ nyɩ wa ta nɩ dabor? Ɩ̃ dɩ nɩ nyɩ tuo wa ta nɩ dabor? Nyɩ́ wa nɩ a bile kʋ ma ka.”
40017018	A Jeeju ful ƴↄ̃w a kↄ̃tↄn ʋ yi ɩ̃ cɛ a bile bar, ʋ kpaar a daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ.
40017019	A ʋ par-tuurbe taw na ta a Jeeju ba yẽ, ɩ̃ soor ʋ: “Bõ ɩ a saa tʋↄ diw ʋ bar wa?”
40017020	Ʋ yel ba: “A-na-ɩ a nyɩ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa nyɩrɩ̃ na pab. Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ala ɩ a nyɩ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa jɛ̃ na taa nɩ a muta-tɩɛ bir na nyɩrɩ̃ pab, nyɩ na ma yelʼã a tãw naa, ú ir cen be ka, ɩ̃ ʋ na ma cenʼã. Bom kãw kↄ̃ ma kpɛmɛ nyɩ wa. [
40017021	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn sʋↄrfʋ nɩ a nʋↄr lũfʋ tɛw ba na tʋↄ diw nɩ a kↄ̃tↄn nↄhↄ̃ bar.”]
40017022	A mɩnɛ ba na duo taa a Galile wɩɛr, a Jeeju yel ba na: “Ba na nyↄw na a Nɩbɛ Bie ƴↄ̃w a nɩbɛ nur pʋʋr,
40017023	a ba kú ʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ a bibie ata pʋↄ ʋ na lɛ irʼã a kũu pʋↄ.” A ʋ par-tuurbe sube nyɩrɩ̃ na sãw ba.
40017024	A lɛ a Jeeju nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe na lɩɛb cen a Kapɛɛnam-tẽw, a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ lãpo-dierbe taw na ta a Pɩɛr ɩ̃ soor ʋ: “A nyɩ jãjaana, ʋ maa ya a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ lãpo wa?”
40017025	A Pɩɛr yelʼã á ↄↄ, ʋ ma ya na. Ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na kpɛ a yir pʋↄ, a Jeeju de na nĩe soor ʋ: “Sɩmↄ̃, mɩnɛ fʋ tɩɛr? A tẽw pʋↄ jamansɩ, babõ jie ba ma de a ba lãpo? A ba bibiir jie, mɩɩ a sáanba jie ʋ?”
40017026	A Pɩɛr yel: “A sáanba jie ʋ.” Ʋ lɛ yel: “A ala ɩ lɛ ʋ, a bibiir ma be tↄ wa.
40017027	Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ a sɩ maalfʋ kↄ̃ wa cɛ ba wa, cen a manɩ̃ na ƴↄ̃w a fʋ jɩ̃-pĩi a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a dãdãw jɩm na nyↄwrↄ, taw ʋ yi nɩ, haa a nʋↄr, ɩ̃ fʋ na nyɛ na libir a be. Ir cenʼɩ̃ na tɩɩr, ʋ ɩ a maa nɩ a fʋ̃ʋ ben.”
40018001	A ʋna daarʼãa pʋↄ a par-tuurbe wɩ na a Jeeju sɛ̃ na sooro ʋ: “Ala ɩ̃ ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ a saa juu fãw pʋↄ?”
40018002	Ʋ bʋↄl a bibile ʋ wa ɩraa a ba nii-sↄw,
40018003	ɩ̃ ʋ yel: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ala ma ɩ nyɩ lɩɛbʼã wↄ̃ taa nɩ a bibiir basɩmɛ wa, nyaa tʋↄrↄ kpɛɛrɛ a saa juu fãw pʋↄ fɩ̃ɩ wa.
40018004	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ʋlↄ na lɩɛb wur a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ wↄ̃ a bibile na kaarɩ̃, ʋlↄ ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ a saa juu fãw pʋↄ.
40018005	Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na sↄw de a bibile kãw a nↄhↄ̃ a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ, a maa ʋ sↄw de a lɛ.
40018006	“A bibile ʋlↄ na ƴↄ̃w ma a nyãa, a ala ɩ a nɩrɛ wa maal ʋ na ʋ lo a tule pʋↄ, a ala ɩ ba lũ na a nɛ-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴↄ̃w ʋ a nyɩɩmɩ, ɩ̃ ɓↄw ʋ lↄb ƴↄ̃w a man pʋↄ ʋ mʋr kpi, a na cãa na sa ʋ.
40018007	Nabier na ta na a tẽw na nɩbɛ jie, a mɩnɛ a ba maal-bie na saa a nɩŋmɛɛ loro a tule pʋↄ. A sɩrɩ̃ na sɛw a ana maal-bie na be, ɩ̃-cɛ nabier na ta na a ʋna nɩrɛ jie na saa.
40018008	“A ala ɩ a fʋ nuu, mɩɩ a fʋ gbɛr ɩ̃ ƴↄnↄ fʋ a tule pʋↄ, fú ŋmaa ʋ lↄb bar, a-na-ɩ a sa na a fʋ na kpɛ a baafʋ pʋↄ nɩ a nu-gãw, mɩɩ a gbɛ-gãw, gãw a nur ayi nɩ a gbɛɛ ayi fʋ na tɛrɛ, ɩ̃ a ba lↄb fʋ ƴↄ̃w a vũu ʋlↄ pʋↄ na ma tɛrɛ a kpiinfʋ wa.
40018009	Ɩ̃ a ala mɩ ɩ a fʋ mimir ƴↄnↄ fʋ a tule pʋↄ, Ꞌlow ʋ lↄb bar, a-na-ɩ a sa na a fʋ na kpɛ a baafʋ pʋↄ nɩ a mimi-gãw, gãw a mimie ayi fʋ na tɛrɛ, ɩ̃ a ba lↄb fʋ ƴↄ̃w a wɛfʋ vũu pʋↄ.
40018010	“Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ kↄ̃ wa kpɛrɛ bile bõ-ƴen a bibiir basɩmɛ pʋↄ wa. Ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na a ba sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ na be a saa juu ma ɩraa na a ɩ̃ saa juu Sãa nii-sↄw a daar a jaa. [
40018011	A-na-ɩ a Nɩbɛ Bie wa na na faa a bala na dãa bↄr.]
40018012	“Bõ nyɩ tɩɛr? A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ tɛrɛ na a piir kʋbaa, ɩ̃ a bõ-ƴen wa bↄr, ʋ kↄ̃ bar a kʋbaa-for-bir bala a be a tãw juu ɩ̃ suu cen na bↄ a ʋlↄ na bↄr wa mɩɩ?
40018013	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ ʋ wa nyɛ ʋ na, yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, ʋ ma cɩlɛ nɩ ʋ na gãw a kʋbaa-for-bir bala na ma bↄr wa.
40018014	A lɛ a be a nyɩ saa juu Sãa nii-sↄw. ꞋWaa mɩ bʋↄrↄ a bibile bõ-ƴen ʋ wa bↄr a basɩmɛ pʋↄ wa.
40018015	“A ala ɩ a fʋ yɛbɛ wa maal fʋ na a fãa, cen fʋ yẽ na miil ʋ a ʋ fãa. A ʋlↄ wa sↄw, fʋ pↄw na a fʋ yɛbɛ.
40018016	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ wa jaar, taw nɩrɛ kãw mɩɩ nɩbɛ ayi lɛ cenʼɩ̃, a mɩnɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a jaa na yi a nɩbɛ ayi mɩɩ nɩbɛ ata bala jie.
40018017	A ʋlↄ wa cãa jaar a ba ƴɛrɩ̃, fú yel kʋ a duo-puorbo. Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ wa mɩ cãa jaar a duo-puorbo ƴɛrɩ̃, fú de ʋ ʋ wↄ̃ taa nɩ tɩɩb sʋbↄ mɩɩ a lãpo-diere.
40018018	“Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ala nyɩ na mↄ̃w bar a ka a tẽw pʋↄ, na mɩ mↄ̃w na a saa juu, ɩ̃ a ala nyɩ na sↄw bar a sↄr a ka a tẽw pʋↄ, a sↄr mɩ be na be a saa juu.
40018019	“Ɩ̃ lɛ yele nyɩ na go, a ala ɩ a nyɩ pʋↄ, nɩbɛ ayi tɛrɛ na nↄ-bõ-ƴen a ka a tẽw pʋↄ, sʋↄrↄ nɩ a bom lɛ, a ɩ̃ Sãa na be a saa juu na maalʼã kʋ ba.
40018020	A-na-ɩ a jie a nɩbɛ ayi mɩɩ a nɩbɛ ata na duo taa nɩ a ɩ̃ yuor, ɩ̃ mɩ be na be a ba sↄ̃w.”
40018021	A Pɩɛr taw na ta a Jeeju ɩ̃ soor ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ! A ɩ̃ yɛbɛ wa maal ma a fãa, gbɛɛ amɩnɛ ɩ̃ na de bar kʋ ʋ? A na ta na gbɛɛ anuu-nʼayi mɩɩ?”
40018022	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Maa yel fʋ a gbɛɛ anuu-nʼayi wa dɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ a na ta na a gbɛɛ anuu-nʼayi jiir lɩjaata-nɩ-pie.
40018023	Ála-ɩ̃-sↄ a saa juu fãw wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a jamana na gbɛɛrɛ a libie a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ jie.
40018024	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na nyↄw a gbɛɛrɩ̃fʋ, ba wɩ nɩ na a daba na tɛrɛ ʋ a san a ture ture kʋbaa.
40018025	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋna daba naa, Ꞌwaa tɛrɛ bom na ya a san wa, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel a ba da ʋ, nɩ a ʋ pↄw, nɩ a ʋ bibiir nɩ a yele a jaa ʋ na tɛrɛ, ya a ʋ san.
40018026	A tʋ̃tʋnↄ ʋlↄ lo na gburĩ a dume a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nii-sↄw ɩ̃ yel ʋ: ʻTaa nyɛ suur wa. Bar a ɩ fɩ̃ɩ, ɩ̃ ɩ̃ na ya fʋ na,ʼ
40018027	a nãw nyↄw a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋ de ʋ bar, ʋ cere nɩ a ʋ san.
40018028	“A daba ʋlↄ yi na tuorʼɩ̃ a ʋ lãa-tʋnↄ ƴen sʋbↄ na tɛrɛ ʋ a san bile. Ʋ nyↄw ʋ na, ɩ̃ cɩm ʋ a kↄkɩ-jile ɩ̃ yel: ʻYa ma a ɩ̃ libie.ʼ
40018029	A ʋ lãa-tʋnↄ lo na gburĩ a dume ɩ̃ yel ʋ: ʻTaa nyɛ suur wa. Bar a ɩ fɩ̃ɩ, ɩ̃ ɩ̃ na ya fʋ na.ʼ
40018030	Ɩ̃-cɛ Ꞌwaa sↄw wa, ɩ̃ nyↄw ʋ cenʼɩ̃ pↄw a kasu pʋↄ, ʋ be a be lɛɛ wa ta nɩ a lɛdaar ʋ na ya a ʋ san a jaa.
40018031	A lɛ a ʋ lãa-tʋnbↄ ŋmɛɛ na nyɛ a ala na maal, a ba sube nyɩrɩ̃ na sãw ba, a ba cen na man a ba nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ a ala a jaa na maal,
40018032	a nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ bʋↄl a tʋ̃tʋnↄ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: ʻFʋna nɩsaa fãa naa! Ɩ̃ dãa na bar fʋ a fʋ san a jaa, a-na-ɩ fʋ sʋↄr ma na.
40018033	A sɛw na a fʋ naa mɩ dãa bↄ̃w a fʋ lãa-tʋnↄ nãw ɩ̃ bar ʋ, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na dãa bↄ̃w fʋ a nãw ɩ̃ bar fʋ.ʼ
40018034	Ɩ̃ a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nyɛ na a suur ɩ̃ ɩ a ba mɩ nyↄw ʋ pↄw a kasu pʋↄ, a ba kpãa ʋ lɛɛ wa ta nɩ a lɛdaar ʋ na ya a ʋ san a jaa.”
40018035	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju yel ba: “A lɛ a ɩ̃ Sãa na be a saa juu nↄↄ mɩ maal a nyɩ jie, a ala ma ɩ a nyɩmɩ nyɩ jaa fɛw de na a nyɩ yɛɛr maal-faar bar kʋ ba a nyɩ sube pʋʋr wa.”
40019001	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na baar a ana jaanfʋ, ʋ yi na a Galile wɩɛr ɩ̃ cen na ta a Jude wɩɛr nʋↄr a Jʋrdɛ̃ man gaan.
40019002	A nɩ-yaw tuure ʋ na ʋ kpaar a wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme a be.
40019003	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ taw na ta ʋ, bɩɩrɛ ʋ yele nɩ: “Sↄr be na be a nɩrɛ na tʋↄ diw a ʋ pↄw bar bom kãw ɩnɛ lɛ mɩɩ?”
40019004	Ʋ mɩ lɩɛb soor ba: “Nyaa Ꞌwuor nyɛ a mɩnɛ a na yel a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ wa? Áa korĩ-cɛ jaa a ʋlↄ na ɩ a Yel-mɩɛrɛ mɛ ba na a daba nɩ a pↄw,
40019005	ɩ̃ yel, áa ala ɩnɛ a daba na barʼã a ʋ sãa nɩ a ʋ mã, ɩ̃ mar taa nɩ a ʋ pↄw a ba lɩɛb ɩ nɩ-bõ-ƴen.
40019006	A lɛ, baa lɛ cãa ɩ ayi go wa, ɩ̃-cɛ nɩ-bõ-ƴen ba ɩ. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a nɩrɛ ʋ taa wa ŋmara a ala a Naaŋmɩn na ɓã taa bar wa.”
40019007	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ lɛ soor ʋ: “Ɩ̃ bõ ɩnɛ a Mowisi ƴↄ̃w sɩ a sɩ ma kʋ a pↄw a diwfʋ sɛbɛ ɩ̃ pãa diw ʋ bar?”
40019008	A Jeeju yel ba: “A Mowisi kʋ nyɩ na a sↄr a nyɩ ma diw a nyɩ pↄↄbↄ bar, a-na-ɩ a nyɩ sube kpɛmɛ na. Ɩ̃-cɛ a korĩ-cɛ, aa dãa be a lɛ wa.
40019009	Ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a ala ɩ a nɩrɛ diw na a ʋ pↄw bar na ma maala a burbur wa, ɩ̃ lɩɛb kul a pↄw kpee, ʋ maalʼã fãa.”
40019010	A ʋ par-tuurbe yel ʋ: “A ala ɩ lɛ a be a daba nɩ a ʋ pↄw jie, a kulfʋ barfʋ sa na.”
40019011	A Jeeju yel ba: “Aa ɩ a dabsɩ ba jaa ɩ̃ tʋↄrↄ sↄwrↄ a ƴɛrɩ̃ naa wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a bala tɛw a Naaŋmɩn na kʋ a tʋↄfʋ.
40019012	A-na-ɩ a ŋmɛɛ be na be a ba dↄw ba a ba ab, a ŋmɛɛ mɩ be be a ɩ nɩbɛ ɩ̃ maal ba a ba ab, ɩ̃ a ŋmɛɛ mɩ jɛ a lɛ a saa juu fãw ɩnɛ. A ʋlↄ na tʋↄrↄ sↄwrↄ, ú sↄw.”
40019013	Ɩ̃ ba wɩ nɩ na a bibi-bil a Jeeju sɛ̃, a ʋ dↄↄl ba a nuu sʋↄrʼɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w ba, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋ par-tuurbe gala ba na.
40019014	A Jeeju lɩɛb yel ba: “Nyɩ́ bar a bibiir a ba wa a ɩ̃ sɛ̃. Nyɩ taa mↄ̃wnↄ ba bar wa, a-na-ɩ a bala na wↄ̃ a ba kaarɩ̃, bala sↄ a saa juu fãw.”
40019015	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na dↄↄl ba a nur baar, ʋ irʼã a be cen.
40019016	Daba kãw taw na ta a Jeeju ɩ̃ soor ʋ: “Jãjaana, bõ-son buor ɩ̃ na maal wa pↄw a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw?”
40019017	A Jeeju lɩɛb soor ʋ: “Bõ ɩ a fʋ sooro ma a bõ-son ɩnɛ? Bõ-ƴen tɛw ɩ̃ ɩ a son. Ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ̃ʋ bʋↄrↄ fʋ pↄw a baafʋ, fú jↄrↄ a ƴɛr-kpɛn.”
40019018	Ʋ soor ʋ, á abõ? A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Taa kʋrↄ nɩrɛ wa, taa gana nɩ pↄↄ-kpee wa, taa jure wa, taa ŋmara a jir-kara ƴↄnↄ a nɩrɛ wa,
40019019	ƴↄnↄ a fʋ sãa nɩ a fʋ mã, ɩ̃ nʋnↄ a fʋ tↄ-sʋbↄ a fʋ kaarɩ̃.”
40019020	A polbile yel ʋ: “Ɩ̃ maalʼã a ala a jaa fɛw. Ɩ̃ bõ lɛ cɛ ma go?”
40019021	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A fʋ̃ʋ bʋↄrↄ fʋ ɩ a cɛcɛ, cen na woor a fʋ yele da, de a libie po a nãw deme, ɩ̃ wa tuure ma, ɩ̃ fʋ na pↄw na a na-yele a saa juu.”
40019022	A mɩnɛ a polbile na wõ a ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, a ʋ suur sãw ʋ na, ʋ cere, a-na-ɩ naaba ʋ ɩ.
40019023	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Jeeju yel a ʋ par-tuurbe: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a kpɛmɛ na a naaba na kpɛɛrɛ a saa juu fãw pʋↄ.
40019024	Ɩ̃ lɛ yele nyɩ na, a yↄw na a nyʋↄmɩ na tↄlↄ a mɩsɩn bↄw pʋↄ gãw a naaba na kpɛɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ.”
40019025	A lɛ a ʋ par-tuurbe na wõ a ala, a ba nↄɛ nyɩrɩ̃ na ko ba a ba yel: “A ala ɩ lɛ ʋ, ala na tʋↄ pↄw a faafʋ?”
40019026	A Jeeju Ꞌwuor ba ɩ̃ yel ba: “A kpɛmɛ na a nɩbɛ jie, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn jie bom ma kpɛmɛ wa.”
40019027	Á Pɩɛr yel ʋ: “Nyɛ a sɩmɩ, sɩ barʼã a yele a jaa ɩ̃ tuure fʋ; bõ sɩ nↄↄ wa pↄw?”
40019028	A Jeeju yel ba: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a tẽ-paalaa daar, a lɛ a Nɩbɛ Bie nↄↄ jɩnɛɛ a ʋ yo-yifʋ naa-dakↄw juu, a nyɩmɩ mɩ na tuure ma, nyɩ nↄↄ mɩ jɛ na a naa-dakↄↄr pie-nʼayi jur nyɩ jaa, ɩ̃ guoro a Ɩsɩrayɛl bal pie-nʼayi ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ.
