40019029	Ɩ̃ a bala ba jaa na bar a ba yie, a ba yɛɛr, a ba yɛ-pↄↄbↄ, a ba saanba, a ba mã nʋmↄ, a ba bibiir mɩɩ a ba por, ba nↄↄ pↄw na a dↄↄlaa gbɛɛ kʋbaa, ɩ̃ cãa lɛ pↄw a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw.
40019030	Ɩ̃-cɛ a yaw jie na ɩ a ni-dierbe nↄↄ ɩ na a par-pↄↄrbↄ, ɩ̃ a bala na ɩ a par-pↄↄrbↄ nↄↄ lɛ ɩ na a ni-dierbe.”
40020001	“A-na-ɩ a saa juu fãw wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a da-yi-kpɛɛrɛ na yi a dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ ɓaaraa bʋↄrↄ a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ ƴↄnↄ a ʋ dɩvɛ̃ tɩɩr puo pʋↄ.
40020002	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na nyɛ ba, a ba sↄr taa a libie ala na sɛw nɩ a bibir bõ-ƴen tʋn, ʋ ƴↄ̃w ba na a ba cen a ʋ puo pʋↄ.
40020003	Ʋ lɛ yi na a mɩnɛ a mↄtↄ̃w na pur duoro, na ʋ lɛ nyɛ a nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ a ba ɩraa a daa pʋↄ a pↄrↄ,
40020004	ʋ yel ba: ʻA nyɩmɩ mɩ, nyɩ́ cen a dɩvɛ̃ tɩɩr puo pʋↄ ɩ̃ ɩ̃ na ya nyɩ na a ala na sɛw nyɩ,ʼ
40020005	a ba cen. A ʋna yi-kpɛɛrɛ lɛ yi na a mↄtↄ̃-tuo nɩ a mↄtↄ̃w gↄrfʋ daar lɛ maal a lɛ go.
40020006	A mↄtↄ̃w balfʋ daar, ʋ lɛ yi na nyɛ a nɩŋmɛɛ a ba ɩraa, ʋ soor ba: ʻBõ ɩ a nyɩ ɩraa a ka a mↄtↄ̃w jaa a pↄrↄ?ʼ
40020007	A ba yel ʋ: ʻA-na-ɩ saa tɛrɛ tʋn wa.ʼ Ʋ yel ba: ʻA nyɩmɩ mɩ, nyɩ́ cen a ɩ̃ dɩvɛ̃ tɩɩr puo pʋↄ.ʼ
40020008	“A lɛ a jaanʋↄr na ta, a yi-kpɛɛrɛ yelʼã a ʋlↄ na Ꞌwuoro a ʋ tʋmↄ á ʋ bʋↄl a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ ɩ̃ ya ba. Á ʋ de nĩe ya a par-pↄↄrbↄ, wa ta nɩ a bala na dãa de nĩe cen.
40020009	A bala na bɩɛr cen a mↄtↄ̃w balfʋ daar, ba mɩ pↄw na a bibir bõ-ƴen yar nɩ a dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ deme.
40020010	Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ ʋ na ya wa ta a dãdãw nɩbɛ, ba tɩɛrʼã beeka a ba yar na gãw na a lɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ a bala mɩ, a ʋna yar bõ-ƴen ba mɩ pↄw ba jaa.
40020011	A lɛ ba na pↄw a ba libie baar, ba hũhune na a yi-kpɛɛrɛ
40020012	yele nɩ: ʻA basɩmɛ na bɩɛr wɩ, a lɛɛr-bõ-ƴen tʋn ba tʋ̃ ɩ̃ a fʋ ya ba a sɩ jɛ̃ tar, ɩ̃-cɛ a sɩmɩ, a mↄtↄ̃w jaa sɩ tʋ̃ a tʋn a mↄtↄ̃w wõ sɩ.ʼ
40020013	Ɩ̃ a yi-kpɛɛrɛ yelʼã a kãw: ʻƖ̃ baraa! Maa bɛlɩ̃ fʋ wa. Aa ɩ a nↄhↄ̃ sɩ dãa sↄr taa wa?
40020014	De a fʋ ben cere nɩ. A nʋmↄ ma na ɩ̃ na kʋ a ʋlↄ na bɩɛr cen a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na mɩ kʋ fʋ.
40020015	Maa tɛrɛ sↄr na maalʼɩ̃ a ɩ̃ yele a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na ƴↄ̃w nyãa wa? Mɩɩ nyuur fʋ tɛrɛ a ɩ̃ pʋ-pɩlaa ɩnɛ?ʼ ”
40020016	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju pãa yel: “A nↄhↄ̃ a nↄↄ wↄ̃. A par-pↄↄrbↄ nↄↄ ɩ na a ni-dierbe, ɩ̃ a ni-dierbe lɛ ɩ a par-pↄↄrbↄ.”
40020017	A lɛ a Jeeju na duoro a Jerujalɛm, ʋ ŋmaa na a ʋ par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi kpee ɩ̃ mana kʋrↄ ba cere nɩ:
40020018	“Nyɩ́ nyɛ, sɩ duoro na a Jerujalɛm, ɩ̃ ba na nyↄw na a Nɩbɛ Bie ƴↄ̃w a Naaŋmɩn baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nuu pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a bala, ba na ƴↄ̃w na a ba na kʋ ʋ,
40020019	ɩ̃ taw ʋ cenʼɩ̃ na kʋ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ a ba na la ʋ, ɩ̃ fↄb ʋ nɩ a kpaarsɩ, ɩ̃ kpa ʋ a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu, ɩ̃-cɛ a bibie ata pʋↄ ʋ na lɛ irʼã a kũu pʋↄ.”
40020020	A Jebede pↄw taw na a ʋ bi-dabsɩ cenʼɩ̃ a Jeeju sɛ̃, ɩ̃ lo gburĩ a dume bʋↄrↄ ʋ sʋↄr ʋ bom.
40020021	A Jeeju soor ʋ: “Bõ fʋ bʋↄrↄ?” Ʋ yel: “A ɩ̃ bi-dabsɩ ayi basɩmɛ fʋ na nyɛ, sↄw a bõ-ƴen na jɛ a fʋ dʋrɩ̃ loor ɩ̃ a kãw a fʋ gʋbaa loor a lɛdaar fʋ na ɩrɛɛ a jamana.”
40020022	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyaa bↄ̃w a ala nyɩ na sʋↄrↄ wa. Nyɩ na tʋↄ na nyu nɩ a ŋman tuo ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na wa nyuure nɩ mɩɩ?” A ba yel á Ↄↄ, á ba na tʋↄ na.
40020023	A Jeeju lɛ yel ba: “Nyɩ na sɩrɩ̃ na nyu nɩ a ɩ̃ ŋman tuo ʋlↄ; ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ̃ dʋrɩ̃ nɩ a ɩ̃ gʋbaa loor jɛfʋ, aa ɩ maa sɛw na tɩɩr wa. A na ɩ na a bala ɩnɛ a ɩ̃ Sãa na gbɛɛrɩ̃.”
40020024	A lɛ a par-tuurbe pie ŋmɛɛ na wõ a ala, nyuur nyↄw ba na a ba yɛɛr ayi bala ɩnɛ.
40020025	A Jeeju bʋↄl ba ba jaa ɩ̃ yel: “Nyɩ bↄ̃w ka a ten bʋrↄ bʋrↄ jamansɩ ma fɛrɛ na a ba nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ a ba nɩ-bɛrɛ ma fule ba.
40020026	Ɩ̃ aa ɩ lɛ a na wↄ̃ a nyɩ jie wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na ɛ̃ɛ bʋↄrↄ ʋ ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ a nyɩ pʋↄ, ʋ sɛw na na ɩ a nyɩ tʋ̃tʋnↄ,
40020027	ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na bʋↄrↄ ʋ ɩ a dãdãw sʋbↄ, ʋ sɛw na na ɩ a nyɩ gbãgbaa.
40020028	A-na-ɩ a Nɩbɛ Bie ma mɩ wa a ba na tʋnↄ kʋrↄ ʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ wa na na tʋnↄ kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ ɩ̃ naa ʋ tɩɩr a ʋ baafʋ tɛ̃w nɩ a nɩ-yaw baafʋ ɩ̃ faa ba.”
40020029	A mɩnɛ ba na yire a Jeriko-tẽw pʋↄ, a nɩ-yaw tuure ʋ na.
40020030	Jↄn ayi jɛ na be a sↄr nʋↄr, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na wõ áa Jeeju ɩ̃ tↄlↄ, ba wuure na yele nɩ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yaa! Davɩtɩ Bie wee! Bↄ̃w sɩ nãw!”
40020031	Ɩ̃ a nɩbɛ tana ba yele nɩ á ba sine gↄn, ɩ̃-cɛ a ba jaar ɩ̃ wuure nɩ kpɛ̃w: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yaa! Davɩtɩ Bie wee! Bↄ̃w sɩ nãw!”
40020032	A Jeeju ɩraa, ɩ̃ bʋↄl ba soor: “Bõ nyɩ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ maal nyɩ?”
40020033	a ba yel: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, maal a sɩ mimie a nyɛrɛ,”
40020034	a nãw nyↄw a Jeeju, ʋ sɩɩr a ba mimie, a ba lɛ nyɛrɛ a jie naan ɩ̃ tuure ʋ.
40021001	A lɛ ba na pɩɛlɛ a Jerujalɛm ba ta na a Bɛfaje-tẽw na be a Olivi-tɩɩr tãw juu, a Jeeju tʋ̃ a ʋ par-tuurbe ayi
40021002	ɩ̃ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ cen a tẽ-bile ʋlↄ na be a nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ nyɩ na kpɛɛrɛ nyɩ na nyɛ na a bʋ̃ↄ ba na lũ bar, ʋ ɩraa nɩ a ʋ bile. Nyɩ Ꞌlor ba, wa nɩ kʋ ma.
40021003	A nɩrɛ wa soor nyɩ, nyɩ yel ʋ, áa Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ, ɩ̃ a jie naan ʋ na bar nyɩ na a nyɩ waara.”
40021004	A ala maalʼã a lɛ, a na ɩ a ala a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere na dãa yele:
40021005	“Nyɩ́ yel a Sɩ̃ↄ-tẽw nɩbɛ: Nyɩ́ nyɛ a nyɩ jamana na waara a nyɩ sɛ̃! Su-ɓaar sʋbↄ ʋ, ɩ̃ do a bʋ̃ↄ juu, a bʋ̃-bile a bʋ̃ↄ na dↄw.”
40021006	A Jeeju par-tuurbe cen na maal a ala ʋ na man ba.
40021007	Ba taw na a bʋ̃ↄ nɩ a ʋ bile wa nɩ a ʋ sɛ̃, ɩ̃ de a ba cẽcene dↄↄl a ba jur, ʋ do jɛ.
40021008	A nɩ-yayaw yɛrɛ na a ba kparsɩ pↄwrↄ a sↄr, ɩ̃ a nɩŋmɛɛ ŋmara a tɩɩr wulbie yɛrɛ pↄwrↄ a sↄr.
40021009	A nɩbɛ bala na de a Jeeju nĩe nɩ a bala na tuure, cɩlɛ na pɛwrɛ nɩ ʋ: “Davɩtɩ Bie, Oojana!” “A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Naaŋmɩn ú be nɩ a ʋlↄ na waara nɩ a ʋ yuor!” “A Naaŋmɩn na be a saa juu, Oojana!”
40021010	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na kpɛ a Jerujalɛm, a tẽw dama na ʋ jaa, a ba sooro: “Ala nɩ a nanɩ?”,
40021011	a nɩ-yaw bala yel: “A Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere Jeeju ʋ, a ʋlↄ na yi a Najarɛtɩ-tẽw a Galile wɩɛr.”
40021012	A Jeeju kpɛ na a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ ɩ̃ diw a bala ba jaa na ƴaba nɩ a bala na daara a yele a be, mɩ cãgbalɩ̃ nɩ a bala na tɛwrɛ a libie tabalsɩ bar, nɩ a bala na ƴaba a naŋmama dakↄↄr,
40021013	ɩ̃ yel ba: “A sɛbʼã a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: ʻA ɩ̃ yir na dɩ na a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ,ʼ ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩ de ʋ maal ʋ ɩ nyanyube sↄↄlɩ̃fʋ jie.”
40021014	Ɩ̃ a jↄn nɩ a gbɛɛ taw na ta ʋ a be a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ ʋ kpaar ba.
40021015	Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ na nyɛ a ana nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ ʋ na maala, ɩ̃ mɩ wõ a mɩnɛ a bibiir na cɩlɛ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ puoro nɩ ʋ, á Davɩtɩ Bie, á Oojana, a tↄ ba na,
40021016	a ba soor ʋ: “Fʋ wonaa na a ala a bibiir na yele?” A Jeeju sↄw, ɩ̃ soor ba: “Nyaa dãa Ꞌwuor a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ a mɩnɛ a na yel: ʻFʋ ƴↄ̃w na a bibi-bil nɩ a bi-pɩɩlsɩ a ba na tʋↄ pɛwrɛ fʋʼ wa mɩɩ?”
40021017	Ɩ̃ ʋ bar ba na ɩ̃ yi a tẽw pʋↄ, cen a Betani na gã a be.
40021018	A dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ ɓaaraa, a mɩnɛ ʋ na lɩɛb cere a tẽw pʋↄ, a kↄ̃ nyↄw ʋ na,
40021019	ʋ nyɛ a fɩgɩ tɩɛ ʋ ɩraa a sↄr nʋↄr, ʋ taw ta ɩ̃ nyɛ ʋ tɛrɛ a vɛɛ tɛw, ʋ yel a tɩɛ: “Fʋ kↄ̃ lɛ tɛrɛ wↄmↄ fɩ̃ɩ go wa!” A jie naan a fɩgɩ tɩɛ ko ʋ jaa ɩraa.
40021020	A ʋ par-tuurbe nyɛ a lɛ, a nↄɛ ko ba, a ba soor ʋ: “Mɩnɛ a fɩgɩ tɩɛ wa ɩ ɩ̃ ko a jie naan a lɛ?”
40021021	A Jeeju yel ba: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ala ɩ̃ ɩ nyɩ tɛrɛ na a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa, ɩ̃ ma baala wa, aa ɩ a ala ɩ̃ na maal a fɩgɩ tɩɛ tɛw nyɩ na maala wa, ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ na ma tʋↄ na yel a tãw naa, á ʋ aw cen na lo a man kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a na ma maalʼã a lɛ.
40021022	A bom jaa lɛ nyɩ na sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn jie nɩ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa nyɩ na pↄw na.”
40021023	A Jeeju kpɛ na a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ ɩ̃ jaana a nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a Jufisɩ ni-dierbe wɩ na na soor ʋ: “Tʋↄfʋ buor fʋ maala nɩ a yele asɩmɛ? Ala ɩ̃ kʋ fʋ a tʋↄfʋ ʋlↄ?”
40021024	A Jeeju yel ba: “Ɩ̃ na mɩ soor nyɩ na bom bõ-ƴen. A nyɩmɩ wa kʋ ma a sↄwfʋ, ɩ̃ na mɩ miil nyɩ na a tʋↄfʋ buor ɩ̃ na maala nɩ a yele asɩmɛ.
40021025	A Jã-Batii kʋ̃ↄ mʋrfʋ, nyɩnɛ ʋ yi? A Naaŋmɩn jie ʋ mɩɩ a nɩbɛ jie ʋ?” A ba nyↄw ɩ̃ pɛrɛ ƴↄnↄ taa yele nɩ: “A sɩmɩ yel á Naaŋmɩn jie ʋ yi, ʋ na soor sɩ na, ɩ̃-cɛ mɩnɛ saa tɩɛrɛ ʋ wa?
40021026	A sɩmɩ lɛ yel ʋ, á nɩbɛ jie ʋ yi, sɩ jↄrↄ na a nɩbɛ dãbɩ̃ɛ, a-na-ɩ ba jaa sↄw na de ʋ ʋ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere.”
40021027	A ba yel a Jeeju: “Saa bↄ̃w wa.” A Jeeju mɩ lɩɛb yel ba: “A maa mɩ, maa mɩ yele nyɩ a tʋↄfʋ buor ɩ̃ na maala nɩ a yele asɩmɛ wa.”
40021028	“Mɩnɛ nyɩ tɩɛr a ƴɛrɩ̃ nanɩ pʋↄ? Daba dãa na be be na tɛrɛ bi-dabsɩ ayi. Ʋ wa taw na ta a dãdãw sʋbↄ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: ʻƖ̃ bi-daba, cen na tʋ̃ a tʋmↄ a dɩvɛ̃ tɩɩr puo pʋↄ a dɩnaa.ʼ
40021029	Ʋ yel: ʻMaa tʋↄrↄ cere wa.ʼ Ɩ̃ a fɩ̃ɩ pʋↄ ʋ lɩɛbʼã a tɩɛrʋ̃ ɩ̃ cen a puo pʋↄ.
40021030	A sãa lɛ taw ta a gbɛɛ ayi sʋbↄ ɩ̃ mɩ yel ʋ a lɛ. Ʋ yel á ʻↄↄ,ʼ á ʋ na cenʼã, ɩ̃ ma cen wa.
40021031	Buor sʋbↄ ɩ̃ maal a ʋ sãa pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃?” A bana Jufisɩ ni-dierbe yel áa dãdãw sʋbↄ ʋ. A Jeeju yel ba: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a lãpo-dierbe nɩ a pↄw-baar diere nyɩ na a nĩe a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ.
40021032	A-na-ɩ a Jã wɩ na a nyɩ sɛ̃ miil nyɩ a torfʋ sↄr, ɩ̃ a nyaa tɩɛrɛ ʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a bala na ɩ a lãpo-dierbe nɩ a pↄw-baar, bala tɩɛrɛ ʋ. Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ nyɩ na nyɛ a ala, nyaa mɩ lɩɛb a nyɩ yɛ̃ ɩ̃ tɩɛrɛ ʋ wa.”
40021033	“Nyɩ́ cɛlɛ a sʋkpa ƴen sʋbↄ. Yi-kpɛɛrɛ kãw dãa na be be na sɛl a dɩvɛ̃ tɩɩr a ʋ puo pʋↄ ɩ̃ wↄw pↄw kolĩ, ɩ̃ mɩ tuu a bↄw ʋ ɩ a tɩɩr ala wↄmↄ nɛbfʋ jie, mɩ mɛ nɩ a yel-gure jaajie, ɩ̃ pãa de a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ ƴↄ̃w a puo pʋↄ ɩ̃ cen jie kãw.
40021034	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a tɩ-wↄmↄ daar na ta, a yi-kpɛɛrɛ tʋ̃ na a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ a ba cen a po-Ꞌwuorbo bala jie na de a ʋ tɩ-wↄmↄ wa nɩ kʋ ʋ.
40021035	Ɩ̃-cɛ a po-Ꞌwuorbo nyↄↄr ba na, fↄb a ƴen sʋbↄ, ɩ̃ kú a kãw, ɩ̃ lↄb a bõ-ƴen nɩ kubie.
40021036	Ʋ lɛ tʋ̃ a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ ŋmɛɛ na waa gãw a dãdãw deme, ɩ̃ a ba lɛ maal ba a lɛ go.
40021037	A ala ɩ̃ baar, ʋ pãa na tʋ̃ a ʋ bi-daba ɩ̃ yel: ʻBa na jↄ na a ɩ̃ bi-daba.ʼ
40021038	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a po-Ꞌwuorbo na nyɛ a bi-daba, ba yelʼã taa: ʻNyɩ́ nyɛ a ʋlↄ na ɩ a gã-diere. Nyɩ́ ɩ a sɩ kú ʋ bar, ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a ʋ gãw.ʼ
40021039	Ɩ̃ ba nyↄw ʋ na, taw yi nɩ a puo pʋↄ, ɩ̃ kú ʋ.”
40021040	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju soor ba: “A lɛ a puo sʋbↄ nↄↄ lɩɛbɛ waara, bõ ʋ na maalʼɩ̃ a po-Ꞌwuorbo bala?”
40021041	A ba yel ʋ: “A bana nɩ-bebe, a ba baarfʋ daar na bierʼã. Ɩ̃ ʋ na de na a dɩvɛ̃ tɩɩr puo kʋ a nɩ-kpeesɩ na sↄwrↄ kʋrↄ ʋ a ʋ wↄmↄ a yomo a jaa.”
40021042	A Jeeju lɛ soor ba: “Nyaa dãa Ꞌwuor nyɛ a mɩnɛ a na sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ wa? ʻA kubir ʋlↄ a dacin-mɩɛrbɛ na dãa jaar bar lɩɛbʼã ɩ a dacin gbɛr kubir kpɛ̃ɛ. A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ maalʼã a lɛ, a sɩ na nyɛ a nyɩrɩ̃ vɩɛlɛ.ʼ
40021043	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, ba na ir nyɩ na bar a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ, ɩ̃ cɛ bar kʋ a nɩ-kpeesɩ na maala a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃. [
40021044	Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ nↄↄ loro a kubir ʋlↄ juu, ʋ na ŋmɛrʼã pũpurĩ, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ juu a kubir ʋlↄ nↄↄ loro, ʋ na pũpurĩ ʋ na, ʋ lɩɛb ɩ a tãbuulĩ.”]
40021045	Ɩ̃ a lɛ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ na wõ a Jeeju sʋkpar, ba bↄ̃w na ka a bala ʋ ƴɛrɛ,
40021046	ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ a sↄr a ʋ nyↄwfʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw ba a nɩ-yaw ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ a ba jaa de na a Jeeju ʋ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere.
40022001	A Jeeju lɛ nyↄw na ɩ̃ lↄbↄ a sʋkpar ƴɛrɛ nɩ ba.
40022002	Ʋ yelʼã: “A saa juu fãw wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a jamana na gbɛɛrɩ̃ a ʋ bi-daba kul-taa fɛtɩ.
40022003	Ʋ tʋ̃ na a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ a ba cen na yel a bala ʋ na dãa bʋↄl a fɛtɩ ɩnɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ baa bʋↄrↄ a wɩfʋ wa.
40022004	Ʋ lɛ tʋ̃ a tʋ̃tʋ̃-kpeesɩ a ba cen na yel a bala ʋ na bʋↄl a fɛtɩ ɩnɛ: ʻA ma ɩ̃ gbɛɛrɩ̃ na baar. Á ɩ̃ kú na a nadɛɛ nɩ a dʋn karɩ̃sɩ ɩ̃ mɩ cↄↄrɩ̃ a yele a jaa baar. Á ba wa a fɛtɩ jie.ʼ
40022005	Ɩ̃ aa bá ba wa, a ba jaar Ɩ̃ cere a ba tʋmↄ jie; a bõ-ƴen cenʼã a ʋ puo pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a kãw cen a ʋ ƴab jie,
40022006	ɩ̃ a ŋmɛɛ nyↄↄr a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ bala, kpow ba ɩ̃ kú.
40022007	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a jamana nyɛ a suur, ɩ̃ tʋ̃ a ʋ sↄdaalsɩ a ba cen na mɩ kú a bana nɩ-kʋrbↄ, ɩ̃ su a ba tẽw bar,
40022008	ɩ̃ pãa yel a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ: ʻƖ̃ gbɛɛrɩ̃ na a fɛtɩ dɩb baar, ɩ̃-cɛ a bala ɩ̃ na bʋↄl ma sɛw na dɩ wa.
40022009	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, nyɩ́ cen a nɩbɛ tↄlfʋ jiir, ɩ̃ a nɩrɛ lɛ nyɩ na nyɛrɛ, nyɩ́ bʋↄl ʋ ʋ wa a fɛtɩ jie.ʼ
40022010	A tʋ̃tʋnbↄ bala yi na cen a sↄɛ pʋʋr ɩ̃ kaal a nɩbɛ ba jaa ba na nyɛ, a nɩ-sono nɩ a nɩ-kpansɩ, a fɛtɩ die sɛw nɩ a nɩbɛ na wɩ a dɩb dɩfʋ.
40022011	“A jamana kpɛ na a die pʋↄ ʋ Ꞌwuor a dɩb-dɩrbɛ kãa, ɩ̃ ʋ nyɛ na daba kãw be na ma su a fɛtɩ kparʋ wa,
40022012	ʋ yel ʋ: ʻƖ̃ baraa, mɩnɛ fʋ ɩ ɩ̃ kpɛ a ka ɩ̃ ma su a fɛtɩ kparʋ wa?ʼ A daba sine.
40022013	A jamana yel a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ: ʻNyɩ́ nyↄw ʋ, lũ a gbɛɛ nɩ a nur, lↄb ʋ bar a yẽw a libe pʋↄ, a jie ʋlↄ a nɩbɛ na kono nyɩrɛ nɩ a nyɩmɛ.ʼ
40022014	A-na-ɩ a bala ba na bʋↄl waa na, ɩ̃ a bala ba na vɛl ir pabʼã.”
40022015	A ala ɩ̃ baar, a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ cenʼã na guor taa a mɩnɛ ba na ɩrɛ ɩ̃ lɩɛbɛ nyↄwrↄ a Jeeju nɩ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ.
40022016	Ba tʋ̃ na a ba par-tuurbe ŋmɛɛ nɩ a Ɛrↄdɩ nɩbɛ, a ba cen na yel a Jeeju: “Jãjaana, sɩ bↄ̃w ka fʋ ɩ na a yel-mɩ̃ɛ sʋbↄ ɩ̃ mɩ jaana a nɩbɛ a Naaŋmɩn sↄr nɩ yel-mɩ̃ɛ. Faa Ꞌwuoro a nɩbɛ kpee kpee wa, a-na-ɩ fʋ maa Ꞌwuor a ala a nɩrɛ na ɩ wa.
40022017	Yel sɩ a ala fʋ na tɩɛrɛ. Sↄr be na be a sɩ na ya a lãpo kʋ a Orom jaman-kpẽɛɛ, mɩɩ sↄr ma be be wa?”
40022018	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na bↄ̃w a ba tɩɛrɩ̃-faar, ʋ yel ba na: “Nyɩna poe ayi deme naa, bõ ɩnɛ nyɩ bʋↄrↄ nyɩ bɩɩr ma a lɛ?
40022019	Nyɩ́ ir a libir ʋlↄ ba na ma ya a Orom jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃ je-kãa.” A ba ir, wɩ nɩ kʋ ʋ,
40022020	ʋ soor ba: “Ala nii-sↄw nɩ ala yuor ɩ̃ be tↄ?”
40022021	A ba yel: “A Orom jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋ.” Ʋ yel ba: “Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, nyɩ́ kʋrↄ a Orom jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ a ala na ɩ a Orom jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ ben, ɩ̃ mɩ kʋrↄ a Naaŋmɩn a ala na mɩ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ben.”
40022022	Á mɩnɛ ba na wõ a ala, a nʋↄr ko ba na, a ba bar ʋ ɩ̃ cere.
40022023	A ʋna bibir bõ-ƴen naa pʋↄ, a Saduse nɩbɛ na ma yel áa kũu-pʋↄ-irfʋ ma be be wa, taw na ta a Jeeju ɩ̃ man ʋ a nↄhↄ̃:
40022024	“Jãjaana, a Mowisi dãa na yel sɩ, áa nɩrɛ wa kul a pↄw, ɩ̃ ma dↄw a bie wa, ɩ̃ kpi, á ʋ yɛbɛ sɛw na na de a kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄw dↄw a bibiir a ʋ yɛbɛ yuor ɩnɛ.
40022025	Yɛɛr anuu-nʼayi dãa na be ka a sɩ sↄ̃w. A dãdãw sʋbↄ kulʼã a pↄw, ɩ̃ ma dↄw a bie wa, ɩ̃ kpi ɩ̃ bar a kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄw, a ʋ yɛbɛ de kul.
40022026	A lɛ a mɩ wↄ̃ nɩ a ʋ tuuraa, nɩ a gbɛɛ ata sʋbↄ, wa ta nɩ a ba jaa anuu-nʼayi,
40022027	ɩ̃ a pↄw wa bɩɛr kpi.”
40022028	A Saduse nɩbɛ bala pãa soor a Jeeju: “A kũusɩ irfʋ daar wa ta, ala na sↄ a pↄw? A-na-ɩ a ba jaa dãa na tɛrɛ ʋ.”
40022029	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ bↄrʼã, a-na-ɩ nyaa bↄ̃w a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ par nɩ a Naaŋmɩn tʋↄfʋ wa.
40022030	A kũusɩ wa ir a kũu pʋↄ, a dabsɩ nɩ a pↄↄbↄ ma lɛ kule taa wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ba na be na be wↄ̃ taa nɩ a saa juu sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ.
40022031	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a kũu-pʋↄ-irfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ, nyaa dãa Ꞌwuor a ƴɛr-bir ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na yel nyɩ a ʋ Sɛbɛ pʋↄ wa mɩɩ? Ʋ yelʼã:
40022032	ʻMaa ɩ̃ ɩ a Abʋraham, nɩ a Ɩjakɩ, nɩ a Jakↄb Naaŋmɩn.ʼ A Naaŋmɩn ma ɩ nɩ-kpɩmɛ Naaŋmɩn wa. Nɩ-mimie Naaŋmɩn ʋ ɩ.”
40022033	A lɛ a bana nɩ-yaw na wõ a ʋ jaanfʋ, nʋↄr ko ba na.
40022034	Ɩ̃ a lɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ na wõ áa Jeeju kpalʼã a Saduse nɩbɛ nʋↄr, ba tiw na taa guor taa,
40022035	ɩ̃ ir bõ-ƴen na ɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄ̃wnↄ, a ʋ bɩɩr a Jeeju. Ʋ soor ʋ na:
40022036	“Jãjaana, a ƴɛr-kpɛn pʋↄ, buor ɩ̃ ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ?”
40022037	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “ ʻFʋ na nʋnↄ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na ɩ a fʋ Naaŋmɩn nɩ a fʋ suur ʋ jaa, nɩ a fʋ baafʋ ʋ jaa, nɩ a fʋ tɩɛrʋ̃ a jaa.ʼ
40022038	A nanɩ ɩ̃ ɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛ̃w na ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a dãdãw.
40022039	A tuuraa mɩ wↄ̃ na a lɛ: ʻFʋ na nʋnↄ na a fʋ tↄ-sʋbↄ a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ kaarɩ̃.ʼ
40022040	A basɩmɛ ayi pʋↄ a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe jaanfʋ a jaa yi.”
40022041	A mɩnɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ na kpaarɩ̃ taa, a Jeeju soor ba na a nↄhↄ̃:
40022042	“Bõ nyɩ tɩɛr a Kirisi ʋ ɩ? Ala bie ʋ?” A ba yel, áa Davɩtɩ bie ʋ.
40022043	Ʋ yel ba: “A ala ɩ lɛ ʋ, mɩnɛ a ɩ a Davɩtɩ na dãa sɛw nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ lɛ tʋↄ bʋↄl ʋ a ʋ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ?
40022044	A-na-ɩ a Davɩtɩ sɛbʼã a ʋ sɛbɛ pʋↄ: ʻA Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Naaŋmɩn yelʼã a ɩ̃ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ: Jɛ a ɩ̃ dʋrɩ̃ loor, wa ta nɩ a lɛ ɩ̃ nↄↄ ƴↄnↄ a fʋ sama-deme a fʋ pulẽe.ʼ
40022045	A ala ɩ a Davɩtɩ bʋↄlↄ ʋ na a ʋ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, mɩnɛ ʋ na tʋↄ lɛ ɩ a ʋ bie?”
40022046	Nɩ-bõ-ƴen ma lɛ tʋↄ ƴɛrʼɩ̃ a Jeeju wa. Ɩ̃, wa nyↄw nɩ a ʋna bibir, nɩrɛ kãw ma lɛ Ꞌla soor ʋ bom go wa.
40023001	A ala ɩ̃ baar, a Jeeju ƴɛrɛ nɩ na a nɩbɛ ba jaa nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe,
40023002	ɩ̃ yel: “A ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ de na a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn jaanfʋ jaana nyɩ.
40023003	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a bom jaa lɛ ba na yele nyɩ, nyɩ́ sↄw ɩ̃ maala, ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ taa wa tↄↄnↄ ba wa, a-na-ɩ ba ma ƴɛrɛ na ɩ̃ maa maala wa.
40023004	Ba ma lũ na a to-bɛrɛ, ɩ̃ ma ɓↄw dↄↄl a nɩbɛ bↄ̃wmɩ, ɩ̃-cɛ baa sɩɩrɛ nɩ a ba nuu fɩ̃ɩ wa.
40023005	Ɩ̃ a ba tʋmↄ a jaa ba na maala, ba ma maala na a nɩbɛ na Ꞌwuoro ba. Ba ma maalʼã a ƴɛr-kpɛn wↄ-bɛrɛ lũ ƴↄ̃w a ba diirɩ̃ mɩɩ a ba nurɩ̃, ɩ̃ mɩ ƴↄ̃w a yel-gbɛ̃gbɛɛlsɩ bɛ̃bɛrɛ a ba cẽcen nʋↄr cere nɩ.
40023006	A bala cen a fɛtɩ jie, a ma nʋmↄ ba na a ba na ma jɛ a dakↄↄ-dɩɛlsɩ jur nɩ a nii-sↄw dakↄↄr a ba puorfʋ yie pʋↄ, a nɩbɛ na tʋↄ nyɛ ba.
40023007	A bala kpɛ a daa pʋↄ, a ma nʋmↄ ba na a nɩbɛ ba jaa na puoro ba, bʋↄlↄ nɩ ba a ʻJãjaanaʼ.
40023008	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩmɩ, nyɩ taa ɩ a ba bʋↄlↄ nyɩ ʻJãjaanaʼ wa, a-na-ɩ nyɩ jaa ɩ na yɛɛr, ɩ̃ bõ-ƴen tɛw ɩ̃ ɩ a nyɩ Jãjaana.
40023009	Ɩ̃ nyɩ taa bʋↄlↄ nɩrɛ a ʻsãaʼ ka a tẽw pʋↄ wa, a-na-ɩ Sãa bõ-ƴen nyɩ tɛrɛ, a ʋlↄ na be a saa juu.
40023010	Nyɩ taa mɩ ɩ a ba bʋↄlↄ nyɩ a ʻni-diereʼ wa, a-na-ɩ Ni-diere bõ-ƴen nyɩ tɛrɛ, a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a Kirisi.
40023011	A ʋlↄ na ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ a nyɩ sↄ̃w na ɩ na a nyɩ tʋ̃tʋnↄ.
40023012	Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na bʋↄrↄ a yo-yifʋ, a ʋ yuor na suu na, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na pab a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ, a ʋ yuor na do na.”
40023013	“Nabier na pↄw na a nyɩmɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ. Nyɩ ɩ na bɛbɛlbɛ! A-na-ɩ nyɩ ma piw na a saa juu fãw tɛɛlɛ a nɩbɛ kpɛfʋ ɩnɛ. A nyɩmɩ mɩ̃ɛ ma kpɛɛrɛ wa, ɩ̃ ma mɩ bara a bala na bʋↄrↄ a ba na kpɛ wa. [
40023014	“Nabier na pↄw na a nyɩmɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ. Nyɩ ma ŋmama na a kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄↄbↄ yele diere a jaa, ɩ̃ ma bɛlɩ̃ puoro kama nɩ, a nɩbɛ na nyɛ nyɩ. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ nyɩ na pↄw na a kpãafʋ ʋ bɛlɩ̃.]
40023015	“Nabier na pↄw na a nyɩmɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ. Nyɩ ma yʋↄrↄ na a jiir a jaa a ten a jaa pʋↄ, bʋↄrↄ nyɩ lɩɛb nɩ-bõ-ƴen ʋ puoro a nyɩ kaarɩ̃. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ wa sↄw, nyɩ ma maal ʋ na ʋ ɩ nɩrɛ na sɛw nɩ a wɛfʋ vuu pʋↄ kpɛfʋ, gãw nyɩ gbɛɛ ayi.
40023016	“Nabier na pↄw na a nyɩmɩ tↄtↄↄrbↄ. Nyɩ ɩ na jↄn. Nyɩ ma yelʼã, áa nɩrɛ wa pↄ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ, áa nyↄwrↄ ʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ wa pↄ nɩ a sɛlmɛ ʋlↄ na be a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, áa na nyↄw ʋ na.
40023017	Nyɩ ɩ na gẽgemsɩ nɩ jↄn! Buor ɩ̃ ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ? A sɛlmɛ ʋ mɩɩ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ na lɩɛb ʋ ʋ ɩ a bõ-ciiraa?
40023018	Nyɩ ma lɛ yelʼã, áa nɩrɛ wa pↄ nɩ a baar lofʋ jie, áa nyↄwrↄ ʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ wa pↄ nɩ a baar-lo-bom, áa na nyↄw ʋ na.
40023019	Nyɩna jↄn naa! Buor ɩ̃ ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ? A baar-lo-bom ʋ mɩɩ a baar lofʋ jie na maal ʋ ʋ ɩ a bõ-ciiraa?
40023020	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a ʋlↄ na pↄ nɩ a baar lofʋ jie, ʋ pↄ nɩ na a ʋlↄ nɩ a baar-lo-yele a jaa na be a ʋ juu.
40023021	Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na pↄ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ, ʋ pↄ nɩ na a yir nɩ a Naaŋmɩn.
40023022	A ʋlↄ mɩ na mɩ pↄ nɩ a saa juu, ʋ pↄ nɩ na a Naaŋmɩn tẽw nɩ a Naaŋmɩn na be a be.
40023023	“Nabier na pↄw na a nyɩmɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ. Nyɩ ɩ na bɛbɛlbɛ! Nyɩ ma irʼã a Naaŋmɩn ben a nyɩ jɛɛ-yele pʋↄ, wↄ̃ taa nɩ a sãɓaan nɩ a bɩr nɩ a gbẽ-vaar, ɩ̃ ma lɛ bar a ala na lɛ ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ a ƴɛr-kpɛn pʋↄ, wↄ̃ taa nɩ a torfʋ, a son ɩfʋ nɩ a dẽdẽ ɩfʋ. A asɩmɛ ɩ̃ dãa sɛw a maalfʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ a yel-bil pãa tuure.
40023024	Nyɩna tↄtↄↄr-jↄn naa! Nyɩ ma corĩ na a dʋ̃bil bar a nyɩ kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ ma lɛ vↄl a nyʋↄmɩ!
40023025	“Nabier na pↄw na a nyɩmɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ. Nyɩ ɩ na bɛbɛlbɛ! Nyɩ ma pɛw na a nyɩ ŋman nɩ a nyɩ lakpow puo-sↄw bar, ɩ̃-cɛ a ba pʋʋr, a nyɩ nyanyu-yele nɩ a nyɩ burbur maalfʋ ɩ̃ sɛɛr.
40023026	Fʋna Farɩsɩ nɩ-jↄ̃w naa! Pɛw a fʋ ŋman pʋ̃ↄ sɛr, ɩ̃ fʋ na nyɛ na a puo-sↄw ʋ mɩ vɩɛlɛ.
40023027	“Nabier na pↄw na a nyɩmɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ. Nyɩ ɩ na bɛbɛlbɛ! Nyɩ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a yar ba na pã a vɩɛlɛ a Ꞌwuorfʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ a pʋ̃ↄ a kũu kↄbↄ nɩ a yel-kpansɩ bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ɩ̃ sɛw.
40023028	A nyɩmɩ, a lɛ nyɩ mɩ wↄ̃. A nɩbɛ nii-sↄw nyɩ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ nyɩ torʼã, ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩ pʋ̃ↄ, nyɩ sɛw nɩ na a bɛlɩ̃fʋ nɩ a maal-faar.
40023029	“Nabier na pↄw na a nyɩmɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ. Nyɩ ɩ na bɛbɛlbɛ! Nyɩ ma mɛ na a dacin kolĩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe ũufʋ jiir, ɩ̃ ma mɩ ƴaarɩ̃ a nɩ-torisɩ yar,
40023030	ɩ̃ ma yel: ʻA ala ɩ sɩ dãa na be ka a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ daar, sɩ kↄ̃ↄ dãa pↄw ba lãa kú nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe wa.ʼ
40023031	A nyɩ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ miile na áa bala na dãa kú a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe, á ba bibiir nyɩ ɩ.
40023032	Ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ cãa maala a ala a nyɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ na dãa maala, wa baar!
40023033	Nyɩna wɩɩrʼãa! Nyɩ ɩ na dↄ̃pan bal! Mɩnɛ nyɩ na ɩ ɩ̃ tʋↄ faa a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ jie na wa ƴↄnↄ nyɩ a wɛfʋ vũu pʋↄ?
40023034	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ nyɩ́ nyɛ, ɩ̃ na tʋ̃ na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe nɩ a nɩsaa kpaarsɩ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ a nyɩ jie. Nyɩ na kú na a ŋmɛɛ, ɩ̃ kpa a ŋmɛɛ yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu, ɩ̃ mɩ fↄb a ŋmɛɛ nɩ a kpaarsɩ a nyɩ puorfʋ yie pʋʋr, ɩ̃ hʋↄlↄ a ŋmɛɛ go yʋↄrↄ nɩ a ten ten.
40023035	Ála-ɩ̃-sↄ, a Naaŋmɩn kpãafʋ na lo na a nyɩ juu a nɩ-torisɩ bala ba jaa nyɩ na kú a tẽw pʋↄ ɩnɛ, wa nyↄw nɩ a nɩ-toraa Abɛl kʋ̃fʋ, wa ta nɩ a Barasɩ bie Jakarɩ nyɩ na dãa kú a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a baar lofʋ jie sↄↄlɩ̃sↄw.
40023036	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ana yele a jaa nyɩ na dãa maal, a ba kpãafʋ na lo na a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩbɛ juu.
40023037	“A nyɩmɩ Jerujalɛm tẽ-deme na ma kú a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe, ɩ̃ ma lↄb a bala a Naaŋmɩn na tʋ̃ a fʋ jie nɩ a kubie kúrↄ, gbɛɛ amɩnɛ ɩ̃ dãa bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ kpaarɩ̃ nyɩ ƴↄ̃w a ɩ̃ pulẽe wↄ̃ taa nɩ a mɩnɛ a nʋ̃ↄ na ma kpaarɩ̃ a ʋ bil ƴↄ̃w a ʋ pɩrɛ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a nyaa sↄw wa.
40023038	Nyɩ́ nyɛ, a nyɩ yir na lɩɛbʼã ɩ dakpolo.
40023039	Ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, wa nyↄw nɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, nyɩ kↄ̃ lɛ nyɛ ma wa ta nɩ a lɛdaar nyɩ nↄↄ yele: ʻA Naaŋmɩn ú be nɩ a ʋlↄ na de a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yuor waara nɩ.ʼ ”
40024001	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na yi a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ ɩ̃ cere, a ʋ par-tuurbe taw na ta ʋ, na ba miile ʋ a mɩnɛ ba na mɛ a Naaŋmɩn yir ʋ vɩɛlɛ.
40024002	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ nyɛ na a asɩmɛ a jaa? Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, kubir kãw kↄ̃ lↄↄ tʋↄ ɩraa dↄↄl a ʋ tↄ sʋbↄ juu wa. A na wɛlʼã a jaa.”
40024003	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na do jɛ a Olivi-tɩɩr tãw juu, a ʋ par-tuurbe taw na ta ʋ ba yẽ ɩ̃ sooro ʋ: “Man sɩ a dabor a yele ala nↄↄ tara, ɩ̃ jɩbaa buor na miile a fʋ lɩɛb-wafʋ nɩ a tẽw baarfʋ daar.”
40024004	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a mɩnɛ a nɩrɛ kↄ̃ wa bɛlɩ̃ nyɩ wa.
40024005	A-na-ɩ a nɩ-yaw nↄↄ wa na nɩ a ɩ̃ yuor, na ba yele nɩ a bala ɩ a Kirisi, ɩ̃ ba na bɛlɩ̃ na a nɩ-yaw.
40024006	Nyɩ na wõ na a jɛb ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ nɩ a ten nɩdaa damfʋ, ɩ̃ nyɩ taa wa ɩ a dama nyɩ wa, a-na-ɩ a sɛw na a na ta a lɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ a kↄ̃ ɩ a tẽw baarfʋ daar sɛr wa.
40024007	A tẽw na nɩbɛ nↄↄ irʼã jɛbɛ nɩ a tẽ-kpee nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ a jamana kãw na mɩ irʼã jɛbɛ nɩ jaman-kpee. A tẽw nↄↄ miine na a ji-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ, ɩ̃ a kↄ̃ kpɛ̃ɛ nↄↄ lo na.
40024008	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ana yele a jaa na wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a walfʋ na nyↄw a pↄw.
40024009	“A ʋna daarʼãa, ba na nyↄw nyɩ na ƴↄ̃w a hʋↄlfʋ pʋↄ ɩ̃ kúrↄ nyɩ, ɩ̃ a ten a jaa na mɩ Ꞌlaar nyɩ na a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ.
40024010	A lɛdaar mɩ, a nɩ-yaw na barʼã a puorfʋ, ɩ̃ Ꞌlaar taa cile nɩ taa a ba sama-deme jie.
40024011	A ƴɛr-hierbe yaw na mɩ wa na na ŋmara a jirsɩ, bɛlɛ nɩ a nɩ-yaw.
40024012	A bier maalfʋ na dↄↄlↄ taa, na saa na a nɩ-yaw nʋfʋ naa ɓãa,
40024013	ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a su-varkpara ɩraa nɩ wa ta nɩ a baarfʋ daar nↄↄ pↄw na a faafʋ.
40024014	A tẽw ʋ jaa nↄↄ wõ na a Naaŋmɩn fãw ƴɛr-son naa, ʋ ɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ manfʋ a ten nɩbɛ ba jaa jie, ɩ̃ a baarfʋ daar pãa ta.
40024015	-
40024016	“Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a lɛdaar nyɩ nↄↄ nyɛrɛ a bõ-ciiraa ʋlↄ na sãwna a bom, na ɩ a ʋlↄ ƴɛrɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere Danɩɛl na dãa ƴɛr, ʋ be a ji-ciiraa pʋↄ, a bala na be a Jude wɩɛr pʋↄ bá jↄrↄ duoro a tan jur. (A ʋlↄ na Ꞌwuoro a sɛbɛ, ú bↄ̃w bↄ̃w a ƴɛrɩ̃ na par).
40024017	Ɩ̃ a ʋna daarʼãa, a ʋlↄ na be a garɩ̃, ʋ taa bʋↄrↄ ʋ suu a diem a bom defʋ wa,
40024018	ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na mɩ be a puo pʋↄ, ʋ taa wa lɩɛb kule a kparʋ defʋ wa.
40024019	Nabier na nyɩrɩ̃ na ta a pↄↄ-pʋʋr deme nɩ a bala na tɛrɛ a bi-pɩɩlsɩ a lɛdaar.
40024020	Nyɩ́ sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn a nyɩ jↄfʋ kↄ̃ wa ta a sɩ̃ɛw mɩɩ a bibi-ciiraa dayen wa.
40024021	A-na-ɩ a daarʼãa pʋↄ, a won na nyɩrɩ̃ na kpɛmɛ gãw a ala sɩ na bↄ̃w, a tẽw nyↄwfʋ daar wa ta nɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ɩ̃ a kↄ̃ lↄↄ ta a lɛ go wa.
40024022	Nɩrɛ ma be na cɩ̃ɛnɛ, ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ ba ŋmaa na a bibie ala bar wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a bala a Naaŋmɩn na vɛl ir ɩnɛ, ʋ na ŋmaa na a bibie ala bar.
40024023	“Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a nɩrɛ wa yel nyɩ á nyɩ nyɛ a Kirisi a ka, mɩɩ á beka ʋ be, nyɩ taa wa sↄↄrↄ wa.
40024024	A-na-ɩ a jir-ŋma-Kirisisɩ nɩ a jir-ŋma-ƴɛr-hierbe nↄↄ wa na tʋnↄ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋ̃-bɛrɛ miile nɩ a ba kpɛ̃w, bʋↄrↄ ba bɛlɛ nɩ a bala a Naaŋmɩn na vɛl ir.
40024025	Ɩ̃ nyɩ́ nyɛ, ɩ̃ de na nĩe man kʋ nyɩ.
40024026	“Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a bala wa yel nyɩ á nyɩ nyɛ ʋ beka wɛkar pʋↄ, nyɩ taa wa cere be wa, mɩɩ a bala wa yel nyɩ á nyɩ nyɛ ʋ a be a sↄↄlɩ̃fʋ jie, nyɩ taa wa sↄwrↄ wa.
40024027	A mɩnɛ a saa nyɩɩlɩ̃fʋ na ma pilpil pↄw a saꞋlon wa nyↄw nɩ a tẽw parɩ̃ wa ta nɩ a tẽw iin, a lɛ a Nɩbɛ Bie lɛb waa nↄↄ wↄ̃.
40024028	A wɩɛr ʋlↄ a bom na kpi, be a sidume ma loro.
40024029	“A mɩnɛ a bibie ala won nↄↄ baara, a jie naan a mↄtↄ̃w na ka na ɓʋrɩ̃, ɩ̃ a cuu ma lɛ caarɛɛ wa. A ŋmarbie na pↄrʼã lo, ɩ̃ a fãgã ala na be a saꞋlon iin na dama na,
40024030	ɩ̃-cɛ a Nɩbɛ Bie jɩbaa na nyɩrʼã a saꞋlon. A tẽw pʋↄ nɩ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ba jaa na waala na, ɩ̃ ba na nyɛ na a Nɩbɛ Bie ʋ yi a saꞋlon waara a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃sɩ pʋʋr nɩ a ʋ fãw nyɩrɩ̃ nyɩnyɩlɛ nɩ.
40024031	Ba na pɛɛlʼã a ɩl kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ a ʋ sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ na kpaarɩ̃ na a nɩbɛ bala a Naaŋmɩn na vɛl ir a tẽw lõbobo pʋↄ a jaa, wa ta nɩ a saꞋlon bɛwfʋ jie.
40024032	“Nyɩ́ bↄ̃w a fɩgɩ tɩɛ jaanfʋ par. A lɛ nyɩ na nyɛ ʋ ʋ tↄbↄ a vaꞋwolo nyɩ ma bↄ̃w ka a susuur daar tara na.
40024033	A lɛ ʋ mɩ, a nyɩmɩ wa nyɛ a yele asɩmɛ a jaa a maala, nyɩ́ bↄ̃w ka a Nɩbɛ Bie waa daar tara na.
40024034	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩbɛ pʋↄ, ŋmɛɛ kↄ̃ wa kpi wa, wa ta nɩ a ana yele a jaa nↄↄ maala.
40024035	A saꞋlon nɩ a tene na tↄlʼã, ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ ma tↄlↄ fɩ̃ɩ wa.
40024036	“Nɩrɛ ma bↄ̃w a Nɩbɛ Bie waa bibir ʋlↄ nɩ a daar wa. A saa juu sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ nɩ a Bie ma mɩ bↄ̃w wa, ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Sãa tɛw ʋ wa.
40024037	A-na-ɩ a mɩnɛ a na dãa be a Nowe daar, a lɛ a na lɛ be a Nɩbɛ Bie waa daar.
40024038	A lɛdaar a kʋ̃ↄ kpɛ̃ɛ na ma dãa wa sɛr wa, nɩbɛ dãa na dɩrɛ nyuure nɩ, kule taa ɩ̃ mɩ tɩɩrɛ a ba bi-pↄↄbↄ a ba kule, wa ta nɩ a ʋna bibir a Nowe na kpɛ a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ.
40024039	Baa dãa bↄ̃w bom, wa ta nɩ a ʋna bibir a kʋ̃ↄ kpɛ̃ɛ na wa wob ba ba jaa. A lɛ a na mɩ be a Nɩbɛ Bie waa daar mɩ.
40024040	Dabsɩ ayi na be na a puo pʋↄ, ɩ̃ ba na de na a bõ-ƴen ɩ̃ cɛ a kãw bar.
40024041	Pↄↄbↄ ayi na ƴɛrɛ na a jↄ̃ a nɩɛr juu a ba de a bõ-ƴen ɩ̃ cɛ a kãw bar.
40024042	Ála-ɩ̃-sↄ, nyɩ́ bↄ̃w jʋʋrↄ, a-na-ɩ nyaa bↄ̃w a bibir ʋlↄ a nyɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na waara wa.
40024043	Nyɩ́ bↄ̃wnaa, a ala ɩ a yir sʋbↄ dãa na bↄ̃w a tɩsↄw ʋlↄ daar a nyanyuur nↄↄ waara, ʋ naa dãa na jɛ gu, ɩ̃ kↄ̃ↄ bar ʋ ʋ wa faa kpɛ a ʋ yir pʋↄ wa.
40024044	A lɛ ʋ mɩ a nyɩmɩ mɩ, nyɩ́ bↄ̃w gbɛɛrɩ̃ a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ, a-na-ɩ a Nɩbɛ Bie na wa na a daar ʋlↄ nyɩ na ma gure ʋ wa.
40024045	“Tʋ̃tʋ̃-buor ɩ̃ ɩ a dẽdẽ sʋbↄ na tɛrɛ a yɛ̃? Ʋ ɩ na a ʋlↄ a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na ƴↄ̃w a ʋ Ꞌwuoro a ʋ yir deme kʋrↄ ba a dɩb a daar ʋlↄ na sɛw.
40024046	Nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a ʋna tʋ̃tʋnↄ jie, a mɩnɛ a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na lɩɛbɛ waara nyɛrɛ ʋ ʋ maala a lɛ.
40024047	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na kʋ ʋ na a ʋ yele a jaa ʋ Ꞌwuoro.
40024048	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a ʋna tʋ̃tʋnↄ ɩ na a nɩ-fãa, ɩ̃ yel a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ á ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ kama na,
40024049	ɩ̃ nyↄw a ʋ lãa-tʋnbↄ pↄbↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ dɩrɛ nyuure nɩ a dã-kʋrbↄ,
40024050	a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nↄↄ wa na a bibir nɩ a daar ʋlↄ ʋ na ma bↄ̃w wa,
40024051	ɩ̃ ŋma ʋ ayi ƴↄ̃w a bɛbɛlbɛ pʋↄ, a ba lãa pↄw a kpãafʋ, a jie ʋlↄ ba na kono nyɩrɛ nɩ a nyɩmɛ.
40025001	“A ʋna daarʼãa pʋↄ, a saa juu fãw nↄↄ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a pↄsabil pie na de a ba lãpar, yi cenʼɩ̃ a pↄw sɩrɛ tuorfʋ jie.
40025002	A ba pʋↄ, anuu be na be ɩ a dãbolo ɩ̃ a anuu ɩ a yɛ̃ deme.
40025003	A-na-ɩ a dãbolo bala de na a ba lãpar ɩ̃ ma tɛrɛ a kãa cenʼɩ̃ wa.
40025004	Ɩ̃-cɛ a yɛ̃ deme de na a ba lãpar, ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ a kãa nɩ a butulsɩ lãa cenʼɩ̃.
40025005	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a sɩrɛ na kama a wɩfʋ, a gʋ̃ↄ nyↄw ba na ba jaa a ba gur.
40025006	“A lɛ a wɩɛr na po jɛ̃ taa, ba wõ na a nɩrɛ na wuur yel: ʻNyɩ́ nyɛ a sɩrɛ na waara. Nyɩ́ ir cen na tuor ʋ.ʼ
40025007	A lɛ, a pↄsabil bala ba jaa jaw na gbɛɛrɛ a ba lãpar.
40025008	A dãbolo bala yelʼã a yɛ̃ deme: ʻNyɩ́ pʋr a nyɩ kãa fɩ̃ɩ ƴↄ̃w sɩ, a-na-ɩ a sɩ lãpar kpiine na.ʼ
40025009	A yɛ̃ deme yel ba: ʻAa tʋↄrↄ tara sɩ nɩ a nyɩmɩ wa. Nyɩ́ cen a ƴaƴaba jie na da.ʼ
40025010	A lɛ a dãbolo bala na cere a dafʋ jie, a sɩrɛ ta na, ɩ̃ a bala na gbɛɛrɩ̃ lãa na kpɛ nɩ a sɩrɛ a kulfʋ fɛtɩ die pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a ba kpal a pan.
40025011	A ɩ na fɩ̃ɩ a pↄsabil bala na cɛ ta ŋmeere a pan yele nɩ: ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ! Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ! Yuo sɩ a pan.ʼ
40025012	Ɩ̃-cɛ a sɩrɛ yel ba: ʻYel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, Maa bↄ̃w nyɩ wa.ʼ ”
40025013	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju pãa yel ba: “Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ nyɩ́ jʋʋrↄ, a-na-ɩ nyaa bↄ̃w a Nɩbɛ Bie waa bibir nɩ a daar wa.
40025014	“A na mɩ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a nɩrɛ na bʋↄrↄ ʋ cen a yↄfʋ jie, ɩ̃ bʋↄl a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ naa ʋ de a ʋ yele kʋ ba.
40025015	Ʋ kʋ na a bõ-ƴen a sɛlmɛ bie kↄↄr anuu, ɩ̃ kʋ a ƴen sʋbↄ kↄↄr ayi, ɩ̃ mɩ kʋ a kãw kʋbaa, tu nɩ a mɩnɛ a ba yɛ̃ na be, ɩ̃ pãa cen a ʋ yↄfʋ jie.
40025016	A tʋ̃tʋnↄ ʋlↄ na pↄw a sɛlmɛ bie kↄↄr anuu cenʼã a jie naan na ƴabʼɩ̃, ɩ̃ pↄw a dↄↄlaa a kↄↄr anuu mɩ.
40025017	A lɛ mɩ, a ʋlↄ na pↄw a sɛlmɛ bie kↄↄr ayi, ʋ ƴabʼɩ̃ na pↄw a dↄↄlaa a kↄↄr ayi mɩ.
40025018	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na pↄw a sɛlmɛ bie kʋbaa, ʋ cenʼã na tuu bↄw, ɩ̃ ũu a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ libie.
40025019	“A kamʼã ɩ̃-cɛ a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ lɛ wa, naa ʋ gbɛɛrɛ a libie ala ʋ na dãa kʋ ba.
40025020	A ʋlↄ na dãa pↄw a sɛlmɛ bie kↄↄr anuu, ʋ ta na kpɛ, ɩ̃ de a kↄↄr anuu na ɩ a dↄↄlaa kʋ a nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ yel ʋ: ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, fʋ dãa na kʋ ma a sɛlmɛ bie kↄↄr anuu. Nyɛ! Ɩ̃ pↄw na a dↄↄlaa a kↄↄr anuu mɩ.ʼ
40025021	A ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ʋ: ʻFʋ maalʼã vɩlaa. Fʋ ɩ na tʋ̃tʋ̃-dẽdẽ nɩ nɩ-son. A mɩnɛ fʋ na ɩ a dẽdẽ a yel-bil maalfʋ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ na ƴↄ̃w fʋ na a yel-bɛrɛ Ꞌwuorfʋ pʋↄ. Wa mɩ pↄw a ɩ̃ nʋↄ̃.ʼ
40025022	A ʋlↄ na mɩ dãa pↄw a sɛlmɛ bie kↄↄr ayi, ʋ mɩ ta na kpɛ ɩ̃ yel: ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, fʋ dãa na kʋ ma a sɛlmɛ bie kↄↄr ayi. Nyɛ! Ɩ̃ pↄw na a dↄↄlaa a kↄↄr ayi mɩ.ʼ
40025023	A ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ʋ: ʻFʋ maalʼã vɩlaa. Fʋ ɩ na tʋ̃tʋ̃-dẽdẽ nɩ nɩ-son. A mɩnɛ fʋ na ɩ a dẽdẽ a yel-bil maalfʋ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ na ƴↄ̃w fʋ na a yel-bɛrɛ Ꞌwuorfʋ pʋↄ. Wa mɩ pↄw a ɩ̃ nʋↄ̃.ʼ
40025024	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na dãa pↄw a sɛlmɛ bie kʋbaa, ʋ mɩ ta na kpɛ, ɩ̃ yel: ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ bↄ̃w fʋ na. A fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ kpɛmɛ na, a-na-ɩ fʋ ma ŋma na a ci ala fʋ na maa bʋr wa, ɩ̃ ma mɩ nɩɩr a wↄmↄ ala fʋ na maa yaarɩ̃ a bie wa.
40025025	Dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw ma na, ɩ̃ de a fʋ libie cenʼɩ̃ na ũu. Nyɛ! De a fʋ libie nʋↄr.ʼ
40025026	A ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ʋ: ʻFʋna tʋ̃tʋ̃-fãa naa, tõtol sʋbↄ fʋ ɩ! Fʋ bↄ̃w na bↄ̃w ka ɩ̃ ma ŋma na a ci ala ɩ̃ na ma bʋr wa, ɩ̃ mɩ nɩɩr a wↄmↄ ala ɩ̃ na maa yaarɩ̃ a bie wa.
40025027	Fʋ na bↄ̃w a lɛ, a dãa na sɛw a fʋ naa de a ɩ̃ libie kʋ a ƴaƴaba ʋ ƴaba nɩ, a maa wa wa, ɩ̃ de a ɩ̃ libie nɩ a dↄↄlaa.
40025028	Nyɩ́ faa a ʋ sɛlmɛ bie kʋbaa, kʋ a ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a tur.
40025029	A-na-ɩ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ, ba na lɛ kʋ ʋ na dↄↄl, a waa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na ma tɛrɛ wa, ɩ̃ saarɩ̃ tɛrɛ a fɩ̃ɩ, ba na faa na a fɩ̃ɩ ala ʋ na tɛrɛ.
40025030	Nyɩ́ nyↄw a tʋ̃tʋ̃-pↄrↄ na, lↄb bar a yẽw a libe pʋↄ. A be ba na kono, nyɩrɛ nɩ a nyɩmɛ.ʼ
40025031	“A lɛdaar a Nɩbɛ Bie na waara nɩ a ʋ yo-yifʋ nɩ a ʋ sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ jaa, ʋ na jɛ na a ʋ yo-yifʋ naa-dakↄw juu,
40025032	ɩ̃ a nɩ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ba jaa na duo na taa a ʋ nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ ʋ na ŋma ba na ji-gbulĩsɩ ayi, wↄ̃ taa nɩ a mɩnɛ a dↄ-cɩɩnaa na ma ŋma a piir nɩ a bʋʋr a kpee kpee.
40025033	Ʋ na tɛrɛ na a piir a ʋ dʋrɩ̃ loor, ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a bʋʋr a ʋ gʋbaa loor.
40025034	A ala ɩ̃ baar a jamana na yelʼã a bala na be a ʋ dʋrɩ̃ loor: ʻƖ̃ Sãa nɩ-nʋnɩsɩ! Nyɩ́ wa kpɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ, de a gã-yele ala ba na dãa gbɛɛrɩ̃ a nyɩ ɩnɛ a tẽw nyↄwfʋ daar.
40025035	A-na-ɩ kↄ̃ dãa na nyↄw ma, ɩ̃ nyɩ kʋ ma na a bõ-dɩraa, a kʋ̃ↄ-nyuur mɩ dãa nyↄw ma, a nyɩ kʋ ma a kʋ̃ↄ ɩ̃ nyu. Ɩ̃ dãa na ɩ a saana, a nyɩ de ma kulʼɩ̃ ir ma a saan.
40025036	Ɩ̃ mɩ dãa na tɛrɛ a salĩɓuor, a nyɩ kʋ ma a cẽcen ɩ̃ su, ɩ̃ mɩ dãa ɩ a wʋlɩ̃ a nyɩ wɩ na Ꞌwuor ma kãa. Ɩ̃ dãa na be a kasu pʋↄ a nyɩ wɩ sũo ma.ʼ
40025037	Ɩ̃ a nɩ-torisɩ bala na soor ʋ na: ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, dabor sɩ dãa nyɛ fʋ, a kↄ̃ nyↄw fʋ a sɩ kʋ fʋ a bõ-dɩraa? Mɩɩ a kʋ̃ↄ-nyuur mɩ nyↄw fʋ a sɩ kʋ fʋ a kʋ̃ↄ a fʋ nyu?
40025038	Dabor sɩ dãa nyɛ fʋ, a fʋ ɩ a saana a sɩ taw fʋ kulʼɩ̃ ir fʋ a saan? Mɩɩ a fʋ tɛrɛ a salĩɓuor a sɩ kʋ fʋ a cẽcen a fʋ su?
40025039	Dabor sɩ lɛ nyɛ fʋ, a fʋ ɩ a wʋlɩ̃, mɩɩ a fʋ be a kasu pʋↄ, a sɩ wɩ na Ꞌwuor fʋ kãa?ʼ
40025040	A jamana na yel ba na: ʻYel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a mɩnɛ nyɩ na ma maal a ala a ɩ̃ yɛbɛ na nyɩrɩ̃ pab jie, a maa nyɩ ma maal kʋ a lɛ.ʼ
40025041	“Ɩ̃-cɛ a jamana na mɩ yelʼã a bala na be a ʋ gʋbaa loor: ʻNyɩ́ taw yi ka a ɩ̃ nii-sↄw, nyɩmɩ a Naaŋmɩn na pↄ ƴↄ̃w, naa nyɩ kpɛ a vũu ʋlↄ pʋↄ na ma tɛrɛ a kpiinfʋ daar wa, a vũu ʋlↄ ba na dãa gbɛɛrɩ̃ a Satã nɩ a ʋ sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ ɩnɛ.
40025042	A-na-ɩ a kↄ̃ dãa na nyↄw ma, ɩ̃ nyaa kʋ ma bõ-dɩraa wa. A kʋ̃ↄ-nyuur mɩ dãa na nyↄw ma, ɩ̃ nyaa kʋ ma a kʋ̃ↄ ɩ̃ nyu wa.
40025043	Ɩ̃ dãa na ɩ a saana, ɩ̃ nyaa taw ma kulʼɩ̃ ir ma a saan wa. Ɩ̃ mɩ dãa na tɛrɛ a salĩɓuor, ɩ̃ nyaa kʋ ma cẽcen ɩ̃ su wa. Ɩ̃ dãa na ɩ a wʋlɩ̃, ɩ̃ mɩ dãa be a kasu pʋↄ, ɩ̃ nyaa wɩ Ꞌwuor ma kãa wa.ʼ
40025044	Ɩ̃ a bala mɩ, ba na mɩ soor ʋ na: ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, dabor sɩ dãa nyɛ fʋ a kↄ̃ nyↄw fʋ, mɩɩ a kʋ̃ↄ-nyuur nyↄw fʋ, mɩɩ a fʋ ɩ a saana, mɩɩ a fʋ tɛrɛ a salĩɓuor, mɩɩ a fʋ ɩ a wʋlɩ̃, mɩɩ a fʋ be a kasu pʋↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a saa wɩ sũo fʋ wa?ʼ
40025045	A jamana na mɩ yel ba na: ʻYel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a mɩnɛ nyɩ na ma dãa maal a ala a ɩ̃ yɛbɛ na nyɩrɩ̃ pab jie wa, a ɩ̃ jie nyaa maal wa.ʼ
40025046	A bala, ba na cenʼã a kpãafʋ ʋlↄ pʋↄ na ma tɛrɛ a baarfʋ daar wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩ-torisɩ cen a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw pʋↄ.”
40026001	A lɛ a Jeeju na man a ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ baar, ʋ yelʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe:
40026002	“Nyɩ bↄ̃w ka a Pakɩ fɛtɩ cɛ na bibie ayi, ɩ̃ a ba na nyↄw a Nɩbɛ Bie tɩɩr, a ba kpa ʋ a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu.”
40026003	A daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ, a Naaŋmɩn baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a Jufisɩ ni-dierbe kpaarɩ̃ na taa a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Kayifi gbalɩ̃ pʋↄ.
40026004	Ɩ̃ ba mana na taa a mɩnɛ ba na ɩrɛ ɩ̃ sↄↄlↄ nyↄwrↄ a Jeeju kʋrↄ.
40026005	Ba yelʼã taa: “Á taa ɩ a fɛtɩ daar wa, a mɩnɛ a damfʋ kↄ̃ wa be a nɩbɛ jie wa.”
40026006	A lɛ a Jeeju na be a Betani-tẽw, a Sɩmↄ̃ ʋlↄ na ɩ a kↄ̃w, a ʋ yir,
40026007	a pↄw wɩ nɩ a kã-nyu-vɩlaa na nyɩrɩ̃ kpɛmɛ a dafʋ ba na dãa ƴↄ̃w a kubir yole pʋↄ a sɛw, ʋ de kpaar ƴↄ̃w a Jeeju juumɩ, a lɛ ʋ na jɛ a dɩb par.
40026008	A mɩnɛ a ʋ par-tuurbe na nyɛ a lɛ, suur nyↄw ba na a ba sooro taa: “Bõ ɩ ʋ sãwna a kãa bara a lɛ?
40026009	Ʋ naa dãa na da pↄw a libie yaw kʋ a nãw deme.”
40026010	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju bↄ̃w na a ala ba na ƴɛrɛ, ɩ̃ yel ba: “Bõ ɩ a nyɩ dama a pↄw na? Ʋ maalʼã vɩlaa a ɩ̃ jie.
40026011	Á-na-ɩ nyɩ be na taa nɩ a nãw deme a daar a jaa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a maa, nyaa nyɛrɛ ma ɩ̃ beree nɩ nyɩ a daar a jaa wa.
40026012	A pↄw na, a mɩnɛ ʋ na deer a kãa ƴↄ̃w a ɩ̃ ɩ̃gan pʋↄ, a ɩ̃ ũufʋ ɩnɛ ʋ gbɛɛrɩ̃ ma.
40026013	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a lɛ ba nↄↄ mana a ƴɛr-son naa a jiir a jaa, ba nↄↄ mɩ mana a ala a pↄw naa na maal, a ba kↄ̃ wa hiin ʋ wa.”
40026014	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi ƴen sʋbↄ na dɩ a Judasɩ Isikaryↄtɩ, cenʼã a Naaŋmɩn baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ jie
40026015	na soor ba: “A maa ƴↄ̃w a Jeeju a nyɩ nuumɩ, bõ nyɩ na kʋ ma?” A ba ya ʋ libi-kure lɩjɛrʼɩ̃-pie.
40026016	Ɩ̃ wa nyↄw nɩ a ʋna bibirʼãa, ʋ nyↄw na ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ a mɩnɛ ʋ na ɩrɛ ɩ̃ ƴↄnↄ a Jeeju a ba nuumɩ.
40026017	A bur-pʋↄr fɛtɩ bibir dãdãw dayen, a Jeeju par-tuurbe taw na ta ʋ ɩ̃ soor ʋ: “Nyɩnɛ fʋ bʋↄrↄ sɩ gbɛɛrɩ̃ fʋ a Pakɩ fɛtɩ dɩb?”
40026018	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ cen a Jerujalɛm, a daba kãw jie na yel ʋ: ʻA Jãjaana yelʼã áa ʋ daar ta na, ʋ na dɩ a Pakɩ fɛtɩ dɩb nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe a be a fʋ yir.ʼ ”
40026019	A ʋ par-tuurbe maal a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na yel ba, na ba gbɛɛrɩ̃ a Pakɩ fɛtɩ dɩb.
40026020	A jaanʋↄr, a Jeeju lãa na jɛ nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi a dɩb pulẽe,
40026021	ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na dɩrɛ a dɩb, a Jeeju yel ba: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, bõ-ƴen be na a nyɩ sↄ̃w nↄↄ diere ma a juu.”
40026022	A ʋ par-tuurbe nii-sↄↄr nyɩrɩ̃ sↄb ba, a ba sooro ʋ bõ-ƴene-ƴene: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, maa ʋ mɩɩ?”
40026023	A Jeeju yel ba: “A ʋlↄ na tune ɓara nɩ ma a laa pʋↄ, ʋlↄ wa diere ma a juu.
40026024	A Nɩbɛ Bie na kpi na tu nɩ a mɩnɛ a na dãa sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ a ʋ ɩnɛ. Ɩ̃-cɛ nabier na pↄw na a ʋna nɩrɛ na diere a Nɩbɛ Bie juu. A dãa na sa a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ jie, a ba kãa dãa dↄw ʋ wa.”
40026025	A Judasɩ ʋlↄ na diere a Jeeju a juu soor ʋ na: “Jãjaana, maa ʋ mɩɩ?” A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Fʋ̃ʋ yel fʋ yẽ.”
40026026	A lɛ ba na dɩrɛ a dɩb, a Jeeju de na a buru, ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na puor a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w, ʋ ŋma na kʋ a ʋ par-tuurbe, ɩ̃ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ de Ꞌwↄb. A naa ɩ na a ɩ̃ ɩ̃gan.”
40026027	Ɩ̃ ʋ lɛ de na a dɩvɛ̃ nɩ a ŋman, puorʼɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃ cɛ kʋ ba yele nɩ: “Nyɩ́ de nyu nyɩ jaa.
40026028	A-na-ɩ a naa ɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ jɩ̃ɩ na cↄↄrↄ a pʋlɩ̃-taa a Naaŋmɩn na pʋlɩ̃ nɩ a nɩ-yaw, na mɩ cire a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na de a ba maal-faar bar kʋ ba.
40026029	Ɩ̃ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, maa lↄↄ nyuure a bom naa fɩ̃ɩ, wa tara nɩ a lɛdaar ɩ̃ nↄↄ lãa lɛ nyuure nɩ nyɩ a dɩvɛ̃ paalaa a ɩ̃ Sãa fãw pʋↄ wa.”
40026030	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na cɛ a puorfʋ fɛtɩ yele baar, ba yi na cen a Olivi-tɩɩr tãw juu.
40026031	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju yelʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe: “A dɩnaa tɩsↄw, nyɩ na bɩlʼã faa nyɩ jaa ɩ̃ bar ma ɩ̃ jↄ, a-na-ɩ a sɛbʼã a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: ʻƖ̃ na ŋme na a dↄ-cɩɩnaa kú, ɩ̃ a piir jↄ yaarɩ̃.ʼ
40026032	Ɩ̃-cɛ a maa wa ir a kũu pʋↄ, ɩ̃ na de nyɩ na nĩe cen na gu nyɩ a Galile.”
40026033	A Pɩɛr yel a Jeeju: “A ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a ba jaa na bɩlʼã faa ɩ̃ bar fʋ ɩ̃ jↄ, a maa, maa bara fʋ fɩ̃ɩ wa.”
40026034	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele fʋ, a tɩsↄw na, a nↄraa kↄ̃ kõ sɛr wa, ɩ̃ fʋ na cɩɩrɩ̃ na gbɛɛ ata, á faa bↄ̃w ma wa.”
40026035	A Pɩɛr yel ʋ: “A ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a sɛw na ɩ̃ na kpi nɩ fʋ, maa cɩɩrɛ fʋ fɩ̃ɩ wa.” Ɩ̃ a ʋ par-tuurbe ba jaa mɩ yelʼã a lɛ.
40026036	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju taw na a ʋ par-tuurbe cenʼɩ̃ a jie ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Jesemane, ɩ̃ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ jɛ a ka, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ cen beka na sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn.”
40026037	Ɩ̃ ʋ taw na a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jebede bi-dabsɩ ayi lãa cenʼɩ̃ a nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ a ni-sↄbaa nyↄw ʋ, lãa dama nɩ ʋ a tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ yaw,
40026038	ʋ yel ba: “Ni-sↄbaa nyɩrɩ̃ na kpɛ ma wↄ̃ taa nɩ ɩ̃ na kpi na. Nyɩ́ ɩraa a ka; nyɩ taa wa gure wa.”
40026039	Ɩ̃ ʋ cenʼã a nii-sↄw fɩ̃ɩ na lo gburĩ a dume ɩ̃ kpa pↄw a ʋ nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn yele nɩ: “Ɩ̃ Sãa, a ala ɩ a na tʋↄ na ɩ a lɛ, ir ma a tuo ŋman naa bar, ɩ̃ kↄ̃ nyu nɩ ʋ wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a taa ɩ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na bʋↄrↄ wa, ɩ̃ a ɩ a mɩnɛ fʋ na bʋↄrↄ.”
40026040	A Jeeju lɩɛbʼã wa na nyɛ a ʋ par-tuurbe ata a ba gur, ʋ yel a Pɩɛr: “Nyaa tʋↄrↄ gala a gʋ̃ↄ ɩ̃ pↄwrↄ ma a lɛɛr-bõ-ƴen pʋↄ wa?
40026041	Nyɩ taa gure wa. Nyɩ́ sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn, kↄ̃ wa kpɛ a bɩɩrfʋ pʋↄ wa. A nɩrɛ sɩɛ bʋↄrↄ na a son maalfʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ̃gan balʼã.”
40026042	A Jeeju lɛ bar ba na ɩ̃ cen a gbɛɛ ayi pʋↄ, na puoro yele nɩ: “Ɩ̃ Sãa, a ala ɩ a tuo ŋman naa ma tʋↄrↄ diere bara ma ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ ɩ̃ na nyu nɩ ʋ na wa, maal a mɩnɛ fʋ na bʋↄrↄ.”
40026043	A Jeeju lɛ wa na a ʋ par-tuurbe sɛ̃ na nyɛ ba a ba gure, a-na-ɩ a gʋ̃ↄ nyɩrɩ̃ na gãw ba,
40026044	ʋ lɛ bar ba ɩ̃ cen a gbɛɛ ata pʋↄ, lɛ puor a lɛ,
40026045	ɩ̃ pãa lɛ wa a ʋ par-tuurbe sɛ̃ na yel ba: “Nyɩ cãa na be ka gure? Nyɩ́ nyɛ, a daar ta na ba na ƴↄnↄ a Nɩbɛ Bie a maal-faar deme nuumɩ.
40026046	Nyɩ́ ir a sɩ cen. Nyɩ́ nyɛ, a ʋlↄ na diere ma a juu tara na ka.”
40026047	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na cãa ƴɛrɛ, a Judasɩ na ɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi ƴen sʋbↄ ta na. Ʋ wa nɩ na a nɩ-yaw na tɛrɛ a bãjɩnsɩ, nɩ a gʋdɛɛ, a Jufisɩ ni-dierbe nɩ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ na tʋ̃.
40026048	A ʋlↄ na diere a Jeeju a juu dãa na kʋ ba a jɩbaa ɩ̃ yel: “A ʋlↄ ɩ̃ nↄↄ woro, a ʋlↄ ʋ. Nyɩ́ nyↄw ʋ.”
40026049	A jie naan a Judasɩ taw na ta a Jeeju ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Jãjaana, yaanɩ!” ɩ̃ worĩ ʋ.
40026050	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Ɩ̃ baraa, a ala fʋ na wa a maalfʋ, maal,” ɩ̃ ba ta na nyↄw ʋ.
40026051	A ƴen sʋbↄ na lãa be nɩ a Jeeju vʋ̃ↄ na a ʋ bãjɩnɛ, cɛ nɩ a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ tʋ̃tʋnↄ toor ŋmaa.
40026052	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Su a fʋ bãjɩnɛ a sↄkpa pʋↄ, a-na-ɩ a bala na jɛbɛ nɩ a bãjɩnsɩ, a bãjɩnsɩ ɩ̃ nↄↄ mɩ kú ba.
40026053	Faa bↄ̃w ka ɩ̃ na tʋↄ na sʋↄr a ɩ̃ Sãa, ʋ tɩɩr a ʋ sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ a jie naan, a ba ta ture ture ɩ̃ dↄↄl, naa ba wa sũo ma wa?
40026054	Ɩ̃-cɛ, a ala ɩ a lɛ ʋ, mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na yel áa sɛw na a na ta a lɛ, na tʋↄ maal wa baar?”
40026055	A lɛdaar a Jeeju yelʼã a nɩbɛ: “Nyanyuur ɩ̃ ɩ a nyɩ wa nɩ a bãjɩnsɩ nɩ a gʋdɛɛ na nyↄwrↄ nɩ ma mɩɩ? A bibie a jaa ɩ̃ ma dãa na jɛ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ mana nyɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ nyaa dãa nyↄw ma wa.
40026056	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala a jaa ta na a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ na tʋↄ maal baar.” Ɩ̃ a ʋ par-tuurbe ba jaa bar ʋ na ɩ̃ jↄ.
40026057	A bala na nyↄw a Jeeju, ba taw ʋ na cenʼɩ̃ a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Kayifi yir, a jie ʋlↄ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a ni-dierbe na kpaarɩ̃ taa.
40026058	Ɩ̃ a Pɩɛr bɩɛrʼã tu a Jeeju cen na ta a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yir, na kpɛ a gbalɩ̃ pʋↄ lãa jɛ nɩ a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ, bʋↄrↄ ʋ nyɛ a ala na tara.
40026059	A baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ ba jaa bʋↄrↄ na a jiri ba na ŋmaara ƴↄnↄ a Jeeju, a mɩnɛ ba na ɩrɛɛ ɩ̃ nyɛrɛ a sↄr ɩ̃ kúrↄ ʋ.
40026060	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a nɩ-yaw na wɩ ŋmara a jiri ƴↄnↄ ʋ, baa nyɛ a jiri ʋlↄ na tʋↄrↄ ƴↄnↄ ʋ a kũu pʋↄ wa. Ɩ̃ a nɩbɛ ayi pãa na wɩ ɩraa,
40026061	ɩ̃ yel: “A daba na yelʼã á ʋ na tʋↄ na wɛl a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ lɛ mɛ ʋ bibie ata pʋↄ.”
40026062	A baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ irʼã soor a Jeeju: “Faa yele bom wa? Boolo nɩ a ala a nɩbɛ na ƴɛrɛ ƴↄnↄ fʋ?”
40026063	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju sine. A baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ʋ: “Pↄl a fʋ puor ɩ̃ yel sɩ nɩ a baafʋ Naaŋmɩn yuor a ala ɩ fʋ ɩ na a Kirisi na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Bie.”
40026064	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Fʋ̃ʋ yel. Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, ka nɩ fɩ̃ɩ pʋↄ nyɩ nↄↄ wa nyɛ na a Nɩbɛ Bie ʋ jɛ a Fãw Sʋbↄ dʋrɩ̃ loor, ɩ̃ waara a saꞋlon a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃sɩ pʋↄ.”
40026065	A baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɓer a ʋ cẽcene ɩ̃ yel: “A Naaŋmɩn ʋ kpɛrɛ! Sɩ lɛ bʋↄrↄ na ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-manba go? Nyɩ nyɛ na a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na kpɛ a Naaŋmɩn.
40026066	Mɩnɛ nyɩ tɩɛr?” A ba yel: “Ʋ sɛw nɩ na a kũu.”
40026067	Ɩ̃ ba pʋʋrↄ na a natɛɛr ƴↄnↄ ʋ a nii-sↄw, pↄbↄ nɩ ʋ, ɓara ɓara ʋ
40026068	yele nɩ: “A fʋna Kirisi naa! Bↄ̃w a ʋlↄ na ŋme fʋ!”
40026069	A Pɩɛr cãa na jɛ a be a yẽw a gbalɩ̃ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a tʋ̃tʋ̃-poole wɩ na na yel ʋ: “A fʋ̃ʋ mɩ, fʋ mɩ dãa na be nɩ a Jeeju, a Galile nɩrɛ ʋlↄ.”
40026070	Ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ cɩɩrɛ na a nɩbɛ ba jaa nii-sↄw yele nɩ: “Maa bↄ̃w a ala fʋ na ɩraa ƴɛrɛ wa.”
40026071	Ɩ̃ ʋ irʼã cen a gbalɩ̃ dↄ̃dↄr nʋↄr, a tʋ̃tʋ̃-poole ƴen sʋbↄ nyɛ ʋ, ɩ̃ yel a bala na be a be: “A daba na mɩ dãa na be nɩ a Najarɛtɩ Jeeju.”
40026072	A Pɩɛr lɛ cɩɩrɛ, pↄrↄ nɩ yele nɩ: “Maa bↄ̃w a daba na wa.”
40026073	A ɩ na fɩ̃ɩ, ɩ̃ a bala na ɩraa a be ta na yel a Pɩɛr: “Sɩrɛ jaa ʋ. Fʋ ɩ na a ba nɩrɛ kãw, a-na-ɩ fʋ ƴɛrɛ na a ba kaarɩ̃.”
40026074	Ɩ̃ ʋ nyↄw na ɩ̃ pↄrↄ ƴↄnↄ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ bʋↄlↄ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn yuor yele nɩ: “Maa bↄ̃w a daba na wa.” Ɩ̃ a jie naan a nↄraa kõ na,
40026075	a Pɩɛr tɩɛr yuo a ala a Jeeju na dãa yel ʋ: “A nↄraa kↄ̃ kõ sɛr, ɩ̃ fʋ na cɩɩrɩ̃ ma na gbɛɛ ata.” Ɩ̃ ʋ yi na tɩɛrɛ kono nɩ.
40027001	A dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ ɓaaraa a Jufisɩ baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ba ni-dierbe guorʼã taa a Jeeju kʋfʋ,
40027002	ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w a ba lũ ʋ, taw cenʼɩ̃ kʋ a jamana Pɩlatɩ.
40027003	A mɩnɛ a Judasɩ ʋlↄ na de a Jeeju a juu, na nyɛ a ɩ ba na kú na a Jeeju, a dama ʋ na, ʋ de a libi-kure lɩjɛrʼɩ̃-pie ala, lɩɛb cenʼɩ̃ na kʋrↄ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ni-dierbe
40027004	yele nɩ: “Ɩ̃ maalʼã fãa a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na de a nɩ-cɛcɛ a juu a ba na kú ʋ.” A ba yel ʋ: “Aa bá sɩ wa. A fʋ jie a be.”
40027005	A Judasɩ de a libie lↄb bar a be a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ yi cen na yaal miir kpi.
40027006	A baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ woor a libie ɩ̃ yel: “A sɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn ma kʋ sɩ sↄr a sɩ na ƴↄ̃w a libie asɩmɛ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ libie pʋↄ wa, a-na-ɩ kũu libie ʋ.”
40027007	A mɩnɛ ba na guor taa baar, ba da na lakpo-mɩɛrɛ puo nɩ a ana libie, ʋ ɩ sáanba ũufʋ jie.
40027008	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ba bʋↄlↄ a ʋna puo wa ta nɩ a dɩnaa, á “Jɩ̃ɩ puo.”
40027009	Nↄhↄ̃ a wↄ̃ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere Jeremi na dãa yel: “Ba de na a libie ala a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ na dãa man taa a ʋ yafʋ ɩnɛ, a libi-kure lɩjɛrʼɩ̃-pie ala,
40027010	da nɩ a lakpo-mɩɛrɛ puo, tu nɩ a mɩnɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na dãa man ma.”
40027011	A Jeeju ɩraa na a Pɩlatɩ nii-sↄw, ʋ sooro ʋ: “Fʋ̃ʋ ɩ a Jufisɩ jamana mɩɩ?” A Jeeju yel: “A mɩnɛ fʋ na yel, a lɛ ʋ.”
40027012	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a Jufisɩ baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ni-dierbe na ɩraa mana a ʋ maal-bebe, Ꞌwaa yel bom wa.
40027013	A Pɩlatɩ yel ʋ: “Faa wonaa a fʋ maal-bebe ba na mana wa?”
40027014	Ɩ̃-cɛ Ꞌwaa mɩ haa nʋↄr cↄw ʋ wa, a nʋↄr ko a jamana.
40027015	A yomo a jaa, a Pakɩ fɛtɩ daar, a jamana ma irʼã a kasu nɩrɛ ʋlↄ a nɩbɛ na bʋↄrↄ bar.
40027016	Ɩ̃ a lɛdaar, kasu nɩrɛ kãw dãa na be be ɩ̃ dɩ a Barabasɩ ba na nyɩrɩ̃ bↄ̃w.
40027017	A be jie a Pɩlatɩ soor a nɩbɛ na duo: “Ala nyɩ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ bar kʋ nyɩ? A Barabasɩ ʋ, mɩɩ a Jeeju ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Kirisi ʋ?”
40027018	A-na-ɩ a Pɩlatɩ bↄ̃w na áa ba nyuur ɩ̃ saa a ba nyↄw a Jeeju wɩ nɩ kʋ ʋ.
40027019	A lɛ a Pɩlatɩ na cãa jɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ dakↄw juu, a ʋ pↄw tʋ̃ na yel ʋ: “Taa wa maala a ʋna nɩ-cɛcɛ bom wa, a-na-ɩ a tɩsↄw, ɩ̃ nyɛ na nãw a jãasʋlɩ̃ pʋↄ a ʋ ɩnɛ.”
40027020	Ɩ̃ cɛ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ni-dierbe kpãa na a nɩbɛ a ba sʋↄr a ba bar a Barabasɩ, ɩ̃ kú a Jeeju.
40027021	A Pɩlatɩ lɛ soor ba: “Buor nyɩ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ bar a basɩmɛ ayi pʋↄ?” A ba yel, áa Barabasɩ.
40027022	A Pɩlatɩ lɛ soor ba go: “Ɩ̃ bõ ɩ̃ na maalʼɩ̃ a Jeeju ba na bʋↄlↄ a Kirisi?” A ba jaa yel: “Kpa ʋ a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu!”
40027023	Ʋ lɛ bↄ̃w soor: “Bõ ɩnɛ? Bõ fãa ʋ maal?” Ɩ̃-cɛ ba lɛ nyɩrɩ̃ na wuure nɩ kpɛ̃w yele nɩ: “Kpa ʋ a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu!”
40027024	A mɩnɛ a Pɩlatɩ na nyɛ bↄ̃w ka Ꞌwaa tʋↄrↄ maala bom wa, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a tẽw na mɩ nyↄw ɩ̃ dama, ʋ Ꞌwↄ̃w na a kʋ̃ↄ pɛw a nur a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw ɩ̃ yel: “Maa be tↄ a daba na kʋfʋ ɩnɛ wa. Nyɩ jie a be.”
40027025	A nɩbɛ ba jaa yel ʋ: “A ʋ kũu ƴɛrɩ̃, á mar sɩ, sɩmɩ nɩ a sɩ bibiir.”
40027026	A Pɩlatɩ irʼã a Barabasɩ a kasu pʋↄ bar a ba ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na ƴↄ̃w a ba fↄb a Jeeju nɩ a kpaara, ʋ tɩɩrʼã a sↄr a ba taw ʋ cere nɩ a kpafʋ jie a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu.
40027027	A jamana sↄdaalsɩ taw na a Jeeju kulʼɩ̃ a jamana yir, ɩ̃ bʋↄl a sↄdaalsɩ ba jaa a ba wɩ tiw kolĩ ʋ.
40027028	Ba yaw ʋ na a yele, ɩ̃ su ʋ kpar-jɩ̃ɛw,
40027029	ɩ̃ wob a gʋʋr sapi kpa ʋ a juumɩ, ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w ʋ a kakɩr a dʋrɩ̃ nuumɩ, ɩ̃ gburĩ a dume a ʋ nii-sↄw laara wuolo nɩ ʋ yele nɩ: “Jufisɩ jamana yaa, yaanɩ!”
40027030	Ɩ̃ pʋʋrↄ a natɛɛr ƴↄnↄ ʋ, ɩ̃ de a kakɩr ŋmeere nɩ ʋ a juumɩ.
40027031	A mɩnɛ ba na la ʋ baar, ba yaw ʋ na a kpar-jɩ̃ɛw ʋlↄ, ɩ̃ lɛ su ʋ a ʋ yele, ɩ̃ taw ʋ cere nɩ a kpafʋ jie.
40027032	A mɩnɛ ba na yire a tẽw pʋↄ, ba tuorʼɩ̃ na a daba na yi a Sɩɩrɛn, ba na bʋↄlↄ a Sɩmↄ̃, a sↄdaalsɩ fɛr ʋ ʋ de a Jeeju nɩ-kʋ-daa tuo.
40027033	A lɛ ba na ta a jie ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Gↄlgↄta, a lɛ yelʼã a “Juŋman Jie”,
40027034	ba kʋ ʋ na a dɩvɛ̃ ba na nyakarɩ̃ a tɩ̃ɩ. Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na Ꞌlɛm nyɛ a lɛ, Ꞌwaa bʋↄrↄ a nyufʋ wa.
40027035	A lɛ ba na kpa ʋ yaal baar, ba ŋme na a gbã po nɩ a ʋ cẽcẽne,
40027036	ɩ̃ jɛ a be gu ʋ.
40027037	Ba sɛbʼã a sɛbɛ kpa a ʋ ju-sↄ̃w na miile a ʋ kpafʋ par. A yelʼã a be: “A Jufisɩ Jamana Jeeju nɩ a nanɩ”.
40027038	Ba mɩ kpa na nyanyube ayi a be, a bõ-ƴen a ʋ dʋrɩ̃ loor, ɩ̃ a kãw a ʋ gʋbaa loor.
40027039	A nɩbɛ bala na dãa tↄlↄ a be vavire na a jur, tʋrↄ nɩ ʋ
40027040	yele nɩ: “A fʋ̃ʋ na dãa yel á fʋ na wɛlʼã a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ lɛ mɛ ʋ a bibie ata pʋↄ, a ala ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Bie fʋ ɩ, faa a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ suu nɩ a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu.”
40027041	A baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a bala na ɩ a ni-dierbe, mɩ laara ʋ na a lɛ yele nɩ:
40027042	“Ʋ faa na nɩŋmɛɛ, ɩ̃ ma lɛ tʋↄrↄ faara a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ wa. Ʋ ɩ na a Ɩsɩrayɛl jamana! u suu a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu, ɩ̃ sɩ na tɩɛrɛ ʋ na.
40027043	Ʋ barʼã a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a Naaŋmɩn. A ala ɩ a Naaŋmɩn bʋↄrↄ ʋ na, ú faa ʋ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a-na-ɩ ʋ yelʼã á Naaŋmɩn Bie ʋ ɩ.”
40027044	Ɩ̃ a nyanyube bala ba na mɩ kpa a be, kpɛrɛ ʋ na a lɛ.
40027045	A mↄtↄ̃-tuo daar a wɩɛr liw na a tẽw pʋↄ ʋ jaa wa ta nɩ a mↄtↄ̃w gↄrfʋ daar.
40027046	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a mↄtↄ̃w na gↄr, a Jeeju wuurʼã nɩ kↄkɩr kpɛ̃w yele: “Eli, Eli, lɛma sabatanɩ?” A lɛ yelʼã: “Ɩ̃ Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃ Naaŋmɩn, bõ ɩ a fʋ bar ma?”
40027047	A bala na dãa ɩraa a be, a nɩŋmɛɛ wõ na a ʋ wuurfʋ ɩ̃ yel: “A Eli a nanɩ bʋↄlↄ”.
40027048	Ɩ̃ a jie naan a bõ-ƴen jↄ na cen na de cẽcen kãw ƴↄ̃w dã-ɓiirũ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ ir tũ ƴↄ̃w kakɩr pʋↄ, tur a Jeeju a ʋ nyu.
40027049	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩŋmɛɛ yel, á ú ɩra-lɛ. Á ba Ꞌwuor je kãa, a ala ɩ a Eli na wa na faa ʋ.
40027050	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju lɛ wuurʼã nɩ kↄkɩr kpɛ̃w, ɩ̃ kpi.
40027051	A daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ, a cẽcen kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ ba na dãa yaal a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ ʋ ŋma a der ayi, nyↄw na a saꞋlon ɩ̃ ɓer wa suu nɩ a pulẽe. A tẽw damʼã, a kʋsɩ-bɛrɛ wɛl,
40027052	a yar yuo, ɩ̃ a duo-puorbo yaw bala na dãa kpi, irʼã a kũu pʋↄ.
40027053	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na ir a kũu pʋↄ baar, a bana nɩbɛ yi na a yar pʋʋr ɩ̃ kpɛ a Jerujalɛm-tẽw pʋↄ, a nɩ-yaw nyɛ ba.
40027054	A lɛ a Orom sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a bala na dãa be nɩ ʋ gure a Jeeju na nyɛ a mɩnɛ a tẽw na dam, nɩ a ala a jaa na ta, a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyɩrɩ̃ na nyↄw ba, a ba yel: “Sɩrɛ jaa ʋ! A daba na dãa na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Bie.”
40027055	A pↄↄ-yaw dãa na be be ɩ̃ ɩraa a nɩdaa Ꞌwuoro, a pↄↄbↄ bala na dãa tuure a Jeeju sũono ʋ, wa yi nɩ a Galile-tẽw pʋↄ.
40027056	A ba pʋↄ, Madala Maarɩɩ dãa na be be, nɩ a Maarɩɩ ʋlↄ na ɩ a Jakɩ nɩ a Jojɛfʋ mã, pↄw nɩ a Jebede bi-dabsɩ ayi mã.
40027057	A mɩnɛ a jaanʋↄr na ta, dab-naaba na dɩ a Jojɛfʋ yi na a Arimate-tẽw ɩ̃ wɩ. (A Jojɛfʋ ʋlↄ, ʋ mɩ dãa na ɩ a Jeeju par-tuure).
40027058	Ʋ cenʼã a Pɩlatɩ sɛ̃ na sʋↄr a kũu, a Pɩlatɩ sↄw, ɩ̃ yel a ba kʋ ʋ,
40027059	ʋ de a kũu vilĩ nɩ ʋ a cẽcen paalaa,
40027060	ɩ̃ cenʼɩ̃ ʋ na ƴↄ̃w a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ ya-paalaa pʋↄ ba na dãa kpu a kʋsɩpan pʋↄ, ɩ̃ bilĩ a kʋsɩr kpɛ̃ɛ pↄw a yaa nʋↄr, ɩ̃ kul.
40027061	A Madala Maarɩɩ nɩ a Maarɩɩ ƴen sʋbↄ jɛ na a be a yaa par.
40027062	A lɛ a bibi-ciiraa gbɛɛrɩ̃fʋ na vɩɛ, a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ cenʼã a Pɩlatɩ sɛ̃
40027063	na yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, sɩ tɩɛrʼã yuo a mɩnɛ a bɛbɛlɛ na na dãa yel a lɛ ʋ na dãa cãa, á bibie ata pʋↄ, á ʋ na irʼã a kũu pʋↄ.
40027064	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, ƴↄ̃w nɩbɛ a ba cen na gu a yaa, wa ta nɩ a bibie ata dayen, a ʋ par-tuurbe kↄ̃ↄ wɩ ju a kũu, ɩ̃ yel a nɩbɛ, á ʋ irʼã a kũu pʋↄ wa, a mɩnɛ a ba bɛlɩ̃fʋ kↄ̃ wa gãw a dãdãw ben wa.”
40027065	A Pɩlatɩ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ nyɛ a gugurbe. Nyɩ́ taw ba cenʼɩ̃ na ƴↄ̃w a ba gu a mɩnɛ nyɩ na bʋↄrↄ”,
40027066	a ba taw ba cenʼɩ̃ na man a mɩnɛ ba na gure a yaa, ɩ̃ maal a ba jɩbaa mar a yaa kubir juu.
40028001	A mɩnɛ a bibi-ciiraa na tↄl, a Madala Maarɩɩ nɩ a Maarɩɩ ƴen sʋbↄ ca na cen a jɩmaasɩ dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ ɓaaraa a yaa Ꞌwuorfʋ.
40028002	Ɩ̃ a jie naan a tẽw damʼã nɩ kpɛ̃w, a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnaa kãw yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ suu wa bɩlɩ̃ a kubir a yaa nʋↄr yuo bar, ɩ̃ do jɛ.
40028003	Ʋ nyɩnyɩlɛ na wↄ̃ taa nɩ a saa na nyɩɩlɛ, a ʋ cẽcene mɩ pɛlɩ̃ na a gon kʋↄraa kaarɩ̃.
40028004	Dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw na a bala na gu a yaa, a ba mine, lɩɛb wↄ̃ taa nɩ kũusɩ.
40028005	Ɩ̃-cɛ a sɩ-tʋnaa yel a pↄↄbↄ bala: “Nyɩ taa jↄrↄ dãbɩ̃ɛ wa. Ɩ̃ bↄ̃w na bↄ̃w ka a Jeeju ʋlↄ ba na dãa kpa a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu, ʋlↄ nyɩ bʋↄrↄ.
40028006	ꞋWaa cãa ka wa. Ʋ irʼã lɛ tɛrɛ a baafʋ, a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa yel. Nyɩ́ wa nyɛ a jie ʋlↄ ba na dãa gaal ʋ.
40028007	Nyɩ́ cen fↄfↄw, na yel a ʋ par-tuurbe, á ʋ irʼã a kũu pʋↄ, á ʋ de ba na nĩe cen a Galile; á be ba na nyɛ ʋ. A ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩ a ʋlↄ, ɩ̃ na yel kʋ nyɩ.”
40028008	A jie naan ba yi na a yaa par, a dãbɩ̃ɛ nɩ a nʋ̃ↄ kpɛ̃ɛ nyↄw ba, a ba jↄrↄ cere a ʋ par-tuurbe yelfʋ jie.
40028009	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na cere, a Jeeju tuorʼɩ̃ ba na, ɩ̃ puor ba á Yaanɩ! A ba taw ta ʋ, lo gburĩ a dume a ʋ pulẽe, ɩ̃ nyↄw ʋ a gbɛɛ puoro nɩ ʋ.
40028010	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ taa jↄrↄ dãbɩ̃ɛ wa. Nyɩ́ cen na yel kʋ a ɩ̃ yɛɛr, á bá wɩ be a Galile; á be ba na nyɛ ma.”
40028011	A lɛ a pↄↄbↄ na cãa be a sↄr pʋↄ cere, a sↄdaalsɩ bala na dãa gure a yaa ŋmɛɛ lɩɛbʼã kul a tẽw pʋↄ na man a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ a ala a jaa na ta,
40028012	a ba kpaarɩ̃ taa nɩ a ni-dierbe guor taa, ɩ̃ ya a sↄdaalsɩ a libie yaw, ɩ̃ yel ba:
40028013	“Nyɩ́ ma yel a nɩbɛ á ʋ par-tuurbe ɩ̃ wɩ a tɩsↄw ju yaa a kũu a lɛ sɩ na gur baar.
40028014	Ɩ̃ a jamana wa wõ a ƴɛrɩ̃ naa, sɩ na bↄ̃w na a mɩnɛ sɩ na mana ʋ, ʋ kↄ̃ wa ɩ nyɩ bom wa.”
40028015	A sↄdaalsɩ de na a libie ɩ̃ maal tu nɩ a mɩnɛ ba na man ba. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ƴɛrɩ̃ na yɛrʼã pↄw a Jufisɩ sↄ̃w wa ta nɩ a dɩnaa.
40028016	A par-tuurbe pie-nɩ-bõ-ƴen cenʼã a Galile wɩɛr, a tãw ʋlↄ juu a Jeeju na dãa tʋ̃ miil ba.
40028017	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na nyɛ ʋ, ba lo na gburĩ a dume ɩ̃ puoro ʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩŋmɛɛ cãa baala.
40028018	A Jeeju taw ta ba ɩ̃ yel: “A ɩ̃ Sãa kʋ ma na a kpɛ̃w ʋ jaa, a saa juu nɩ a ka a tẽw juu.
40028019	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, nyɩ́ cen a nɩ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ jiir a jaa, na maal ba a ba ɩ a ɩ̃ par-tuurbe, de nɩ a Sãa yuor nɩ a Bie yuor nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ yuor mʋrʼɩ̃ ba a kʋ̃ↄ,
40028020	ɩ̃ jaan ba a ba maala a ala a jaa ɩ̃ na man nyɩ. Ɩ̃ nyɩ́ bↄ̃wnaa, ɩ̃ na be nɩ nyɩ na a daar a jaa, wa ta nɩ a tẽw baarfʋ daar.”
41001001	Ka a ƴɛr-son na mana a Naaŋmɩn Bie Jeeju-Kirisi ƴɛrɩ̃ nyↄw.
41001002	A mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na yel a ʋ ƴɛr-hiere Ejayi ʋ sɛb ƴↄ̃w a ʋ sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “Nyɛ, ɩ̃ na tʋ̃ na nɩrɛ ʋ de fʋ nĩe pɛl a fʋ sↄr.
41001003	Ʋ ɩ na a nɩrɛ na wuure a wɛkar pʋↄ, yele: Nyɩ́ gbɛɛrɩ̃ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sↄr, nyɩ́ cↄↄrɩ̃ a ʋ sↄr-bil a tor.”
41001004	Lɛ a Jã dãa yi a wɛkar pʋↄ na ʋ mʋrↄ a nɩbɛ a kʋ̃ↄ, ɩ̃ na ʋ kpãkpana ba yele: “Nyɩ́ lɩɛb a nyɩ yɛ̃, ɩ̃ ɩ a ba mʋr nyɩ a kʋ̃ↄ, a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na de a nyɩ faar a jaa bar kʋ nyɩ.”
41001005	A Jude loor tẽ-deme nɩ a Jerujalɛm-tẽw nɩbɛ ba jaa cenʼã a Jã jie na ba caala a ba maal-faar ɩ̃ a Jã mʋrↄ ba a kʋ̃ↄ a Jʋrdɛ̃ manɩ̃.
41001006	A Jã dãa na su a kparʋ ba na maalʼɩ̃ a nyʋↄmɩ kↄbↄ, ɩ̃ na ʋ sɛ a sɩɛ gan. A ʋ bõ-dɩraa a be a wɛkar pʋↄ dãa na ɩ a sãsobo nɩ a sɩɩr.
41001007	Ʋ hiere na yele a nɩbɛ: “Nɩrɛ be na a ɩ̃ puo-sↄw waara, na tɛrɛ fãw gãw ma. Maa sɛw na gũu sɩɩr a ʋ nafaba wa.
41001008	A maa, kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ ɩ̃ mʋr nyɩ, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ, Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ pʋↄ ʋ nↄↄ mʋr nyɩ.”
41001009	A daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ, a Jeeju yi na a Najarɛtɩ-tẽw a Galile loor ɩ̃ wa a Jʋrdɛ̃ manɩ̃, a Jã mʋr ʋ a kʋ̃ↄ.
41001010	A lɛ ʋ na yire a kʋ̃ↄmɩ, ʋ nyɛ na a saꞋlon ʋ ɓar ayi ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ suure a ʋ juu, ŋmam kaarɩ̃,
41001011	ɩ̃ a kↄkɩr kãw bʋrↄ be a saꞋlon: “Fʋ̃ʋ ɩ a ɩ̃ Bi-nʋnaa, na kpɛ a ɩ̃ suur pʋↄ.”
41001012	A be a jie naan a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ taw na a Jeeju cenʼɩ̃ a wɛkar pʋↄ,
41001013	ʋ maal be bibie lɩjaayi, a Satã bɩɩrɛ ʋ. A Jeeju dãa na be a wɛ-dʋn sↄ̃w ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ hana ʋ a be.
41001014	A mɩnɛ ba na nyↄw a Jã ƴↄ̃w a kasu pʋↄ baar, a Jeeju cenʼã a Galile-wɩɛr pʋↄ, hiere a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ
41001015	yele: “A daar ta na ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn fãw mɩ pɩɛl. Nyɩ́ lɩɛb a nyɩ yɛ̃, ɩ̃ sↄw de a ƴɛr-son.”
41001016	A mɩnɛ ʋ na lara a Galile man gbẽgbere nʋↄr, ʋ nyɛ na a Sɩmↄ̃ nɩ a ʋ yɛbɛ Ãdire, a ba lↄbↄ a jʋↄ a man pʋↄ, a-na-ɩ jɩm-bɛrbɛ ba dãa ɩ.
41001017	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ tuure ma. Ɩ̃ na lɩɛb nyɩ na a nyɩ bʋↄrↄ a nɩbɛ a jɩm-nyↄↄrbↄ kaarɩ̃.”
41001018	A jie naan ba barʼã a ba jʋʋr ɩ̃ tuure ʋ.
41001019	A mɩnɛ ba na cen jãa fɩ̃ɩ, a Jeeju nyɛ na a Jakɩ nɩ a ʋ yɛbɛ Jã, na ɩ a Jebede bi-dabsɩ, a ba mɩ be a ba gbor pʋↄ cↄↄrↄ a ba jʋʋr.
41001020	A jie naan ʋ bʋↄl ba na, a ba ir bar a ba sãa Jebede nɩ a tʋ̃tʋ̃-biir a be a gbor pʋↄ ɩ̃ tu a Jeeju.
41001021	A Jeeju nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe cenʼã a Kapɛɛnam-tẽw. A be a Jeeju kpɛ na a ba puorfʋ yir a bibi-ciiraa dayen, ɩ̃ jaana a nɩbɛ.
41001022	Nↄɛ dãa na ko ba a ʋ jaanfʋ ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ ʋ tɛrɛ na tʋↄfʋ a ʋ jaanfʋ pʋↄ. ꞋWaa jaana ba wↄ̃ taa nɩ a ba ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ wa.
41001023	A daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na be a be a puorfʋ yir, daba kãw a kↄ̃tↄn bier na ire kpɛ na be na ʋ wuur,
41001024	yel: “Najarɛtɩ Jeeju, bõ ɩnɛ fʋ wa a ka? Má a sɩ sãwfʋ ɩnɛ fʋ wa! Ɩ̃ bↄ̃w na a ʋlↄ fʋ na ɩ. Fʋ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn nɩ-cɛcɛ.”
41001025	A Jeeju ful ƴↄ̃w ʋ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Pↄw a nʋↄr! Yi cen ɩ̃ cɛ a daba na!”
41001026	A kↄ̃tↄn bier damʼã a daba nɩ fãgã kpar, ɩ̃ wuurʼɩ̃ kↄkɩr kpɛ̃w, ɩ̃ yi ɩ̃ cɛ ʋ.
41001027	A nↄɛ ko na a nɩbɛ ba jaa, a ba sooro taa, yele: “Bõ nɩ a naa? Jaan-paalaa ʋ jaana nɩ tʋↄfʋ, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ wa mɩ yel a kↄ̃tↄn-bebe a bom, ba ma sↄw na jↄrↄ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ.”
41001028	Wa nyↄw nɩ a bibir ʋlↄ, a Jeeju yuor yi na pↄw a Galile wɩɛr ʋ jaa.
41001029	A mɩnɛ ba na yi a ʋna puorfʋ yir baar, ba lãa na cenʼɩ̃ a Jakɩ nɩ a Jã na ta a Sɩmↄ̃ nɩ a Ádire yir.
41001030	A be a Sɩmↄ̃ dɩ̃ɛ-mã ɩ̃gan dãa na kpor, ʋ gã. A jie naan, ba manʼã kʋ a Jeeju,
41001031	ʋ taw ta, na ʋ nyↄw ʋ a nuu ɩ̃ ɩ ʋ ir, a ɩ̃gan lɛ ɓãa ʋ a jie naan, ʋ ir ir ba a saan.
41001032	A jaanʋↄr daar, a mɩnɛ a mↄtↄ̃w na mʋr baar, a nɩbɛ wɩ nɩ na a baalsɩ ba jaa nɩ a kↄ̃tↄn deme a ʋ jie,
41001033	ɩ̃ a ʋna tẽw nɩbɛ ba jaa jilĩ na pↄw a dↄ̃dↄr nʋↄr,
41001034	ʋ kpaar a wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme yayaw na dãa tɛrɛ a wʋlɩ̃-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ diw a kↄ̃tↄn-yaw bar. Ʋ maa kʋ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ sↄr a ba ƴɛr ƴɛrɩ̃ wa, a-na-ɩ ba bↄ̃w ʋ na.
41001035	A dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ ɓaaraa, a mɩnɛ a wɩɛr na cãa sↄb a gbib, a Jeeju irʼã yi, na ʋ cen a wɛkar pʋↄ sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn.
41001036	A Sɩmↄ̃ nɩ a bala ʋ na lãa be nɩ, nyↄw na ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ʋ yʋↄrↄ nɩ.
41001037	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na wa nyɛ ʋ, ba yel ʋ na: “A nɩbɛ ba jaa bʋↄrↄ fʋ na.”
41001038	A Jeeju yel ba: “Sɩ́ cen ji-kpee, a tẽ-cɛɛlsɩ pʋʋr, ɩ̃ mɩ ƴɛr a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ a be, a-na-ɩ a ala ɩnɛ ɩ̃ wa.”
41001039	Ɩ̃ ʋ yↄ na a Galile wɩɛr ʋ jaa, na ʋ ƴɛr a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ a puorfʋ yie pʋʋr, ɩ̃ diw a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ bar.
41001040	A kↄ̃w wa na a Jeeju jie na lo gburĩ a dume a ʋ nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ ʋ a ʋ sũo ʋ, yele nɩ: “A fʋ̃ʋ sↄw, fʋ na tʋↄ na pↄlɩ̃ ma.”
41001041	A nãw nyↄw na a Jeeju a ʋ ɩnɛ, ʋ tur a nuu sɩɩrʼɩ̃ ʋ, ɩ̃ yel: “Ɩ̃ sↄw na, pↄlɩ̃!”
41001042	A jie naan a kↄ̃w ɩ̃gan lɩɛbʼã pↄlɩ̃.
41001043	-
41001044	A be, a Jeeju kpãa ʋ na kpãkpanʼɩ̃ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Kule ɩ̃ taa wa ƴɛrɛ bom kʋrↄ nɩrɛ wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ, cen na miilʼɩ̃ a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ a Naaŋmɩn baar-loro, ɩ̃ tɩɩr a yele ala a Mowisi na dãa ƴↄ̃w, a nɩbɛ na bↄ̃w ka fʋ sɩrɩ̃ na pↄlɩ̃.”
41001045	Ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ yi na cen na nyↄw a ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ yʋↄrↄ nɩ kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ. Ala ɩ̃ saa a Jeeju ma lɛ dãa tʋↄrↄ kpɛɛrɛ a tẽw pʋↄ, a nɩrɛ lɛ bↄ̃wnↄ nɩ ʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a mↄↄ pʋↄ ʋ dãa be, ɩ̃ a nɩbɛ ma yi a lõbobo a jaa ɩ̃ waara a ʋ sɛ̃.
41002001	A lɛ a bibie fɩ̃ɩ na tↄl baar, a Jeeju lɛ bↄ̃w na wɩ a Kapɛɛnam-tẽw go, ɩ̃ a ba wõ a ʋ be na a yir.
41002002	A nɩ-yaw duo na taa pↄw a wɩɛr ʋ jaa, a vuo ma lɛ cãa be a dↄ̃dↄr teen wa, ɩ̃ a Jeeju ƴɛrɛ ba a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ.
41002003	Nɩbɛ ta na be ɩ̃ tɛrɛ gbɛr a nɩbɛ anaan na tuo.
41002004	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩbɛ na nyɩrɩ̃ waa a lɛ, baa dãa tʋↄrↄ tara nɩ ʋ a Jeeju nii-sↄw wa. A lɛ, ba ŋmaa na a gar puo a Jeeju ju-sↄ̃w ɩ̃ na ba de a gbɛr nɩ a ʋ gãw ba na ɓↄw nɩ ʋ wa nɩ, tur a bↄw ʋlↄ pʋↄ.
41002005	A lɛ a Jeeju na nyɛ a dabsɩ bala ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ʋ yelʼã a gbɛr: “Ɩ̃ bie! Ɩ̃ yele fʋ na, a Naaŋmɩn de na a fʋ faar bar kʋ fʋ.”
41002006	A ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ ŋmɛɛ na jɛ a be, ba pɛrɛ na a ba sube pʋʋr ɩ̃ yele:
41002007	“Mɩnɛ a daba na Ꞌla kpɛ a Naaŋmɩn a nↄhↄ̃? Ala ɩ̃ na tʋↄ de a nɩrɛ maal-faar bar kʋ ʋ? Naaŋmɩn ʋ yẽ na tʋↄ maal a lɛ.”
41002008	A jie naan a Jeeju bↄ̃w na a ala ba na pɛrɛ, ɩ̃ yel ba: “Bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a nyɩ tɛrɛ a ana tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ a nyɩ sube pʋʋr?
41002009	Buor ɩ̃ yↄw gãw a yelfʋ? A mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na yel a gbɛr áa Naaŋmɩn de na a ʋ maal-faar bar kʋ ʋ, mɩɩ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na yel á ú ir de a ʋ cẽcen cere nɩ?
41002010	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na nyɩ bↄ̃w ka a Nɩbɛ Bie tɛrɛ na sↄr a ka a tẽw pʋↄ na de a nɩrɛ maal-fãa bar kʋ ʋ.” Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ yel a gbɛr:
41002011	“A fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ yele. Ir de a fʋ cẽcen kule nɩ.”
41002012	A jie naan, ʋ irʼã de a ʋ cẽcen a nɩbɛ ba jaa nii-sↄw cere nɩ, a ba jaa nↄɛ ko ba a ba pɛwrɛ a Naaŋmɩn yele nɩ: “Saa dãa nyɛ bom lɛ sɛr wa.”
41002013	A Jeeju lɛ lɩɛbʼã cen a Galile man gbẽgbere nʋↄr, a nɩ-yaw wɩ a ʋ sɛ̃, ʋ mana ba a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃.
41002014	A lɛ a Jeeju na tↄlↄ, ʋ nyɛ na a Alfe bie Levi, ʋ jɛ a lãpo defʋ jie, ʋ yel ʋ: “Ir tuure ma,” a Levi ir tuure ʋ.
41002015	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na jɛ a dɩb par a Eevi yir, a lãpo-dierbe nɩ a nɩ-faar yaw lãa na jɛ nɩ ʋ nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe, a-na-ɩ a bala na wↄ̃ a lɛ ɩ̃ tuure ʋ, ba waa na.
41002016	A mɩnɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ na nyɛ a Jeeju ʋ lãa dɩrɛ a dɩb nɩ a nɩ-faar nɩ a lãpo-dierbe, ba soorʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe: “Bõ ɩ̃ ɩ ʋ lãa dɩrɛ a dɩb nɩ a lãpo-dierbe nɩ a nɩ-faar?”
41002017	A Jeeju wonaa ɩ̃ yel ba: “Aa ɩ a bala na kpɛmɛ ɩ̃ ma cen a dↄↄtↄrↄ yir wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme, bala ma cen. Maa wa a nɩ-torisɩ bʋↄlfʋ ɩnɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩ-faar ɩnɛ ɩ̃ wa.”
41002018	Daar kãw a Jã par-tuurbe nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ lũ na a nʋↄr, a nɩbɛ wɩ soor a Jeeju: “Bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a Jã par-tuurbe nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ par-tuurbe lũ a nʋↄr, ɩ̃ a fʋ par-tuurbe ma lũ wa?”
41002019	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ tɩɛrʼã bↄ̃w ka a bala ba na bʋↄl a pↄw kulfʋ fɛtɩ jie, ba na tʋↄ na lũ a nʋↄr a lɛdaar a sɩrɛ na cãa be a ba sↄ̃w mɩɩ? A daar ʋlↄ a sɩrɛ na cãa be nɩ ba, baa tʋↄrↄ luure a nʋↄr wa.
41002020	Ɩ̃-cɛ a daar nↄↄ ta na a ba de a sɩrɛ a ba sↄ̃w cenʼɩ̃; a ʋna bibirʼãa pʋↄ ba nↄↄ lũ na a nʋↄr.
41002021	“Nɩrɛ ma diere a cẽcen na ma nyʋr sɛr wa, sɛbɛ cowro a cẽcen kʋraa pʋↄ wa. A ʋlↄ ɩ̃ sɛ cow a lɛ, a cẽcen paalaa na taw na a cẽcen kʋraa ɓer, a ʋ gãw a korĩ-cɛ ɓerfʋ.
41002022	Ɩ̃ a nɩrɛ ma diere a dã-tↄↄraa ƴↄnↄ dʋʋ bɛraa pʋↄ wa. A ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w a lɛ, a dãa na wɛlʼã a dʋʋ, a dãa nɩ a dʋʋ wɛ. Ɩ̃-cɛ ba sɛw na na ƴↄ̃w a dã-tↄↄraa a dʋʋ paalaa pʋↄ.”
41002023	A bibi-ciiraa dayen, a Jeeju tↄlↄ na yi ci puo pʋↄ. A mɩnɛ a ʋ par-tuurbe na de a sↄr, ba fↄrↄ na a ci,
41002024	a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ yel a Jeeju: “Je kãa! Bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a fʋ par-tuurbe maala a ala a sɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn na ma bʋↄrↄ ba maal a bibi-ciiraa dayen wa?”
41002025	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ kↄ̃ dãa Ꞌwuor a sɛbɛ pʋↄ, nyɛ a ala a Davɩtɩ na maal wa? A lɛdaar ʋ na dãa be a nãw pʋↄ ɩ̃ a kↄ̃ mɩ nyↄw ʋ, ʋlↄ nɩ a bala na dãa lãa be nɩ ʋ,
41002026	ʋ kpɛ na a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ, de a buru ba na bin a Naaŋmɩn, Ꞌwↄb. A ʋna daarʼãa, a Ábiyataar ɩ̃ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ a ana buru, nɩ-pↄrↄ ma sɛw na Ꞌwↄb wa; a Naaŋmɩn baar-lorbo tɛw ɩ̃ ma Ꞌwↄb. Ɩ̃-cɛ a Davɩtɩ Ꞌwↄbʼã, ɩ̃ cɛ kʋ a bala ʋ na lãa be nɩ, a ba mɩ Ꞌwↄb.”
41002027	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, ʋ yel ba na: “A Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w na a bibi-ciiraa a nɩbɛ ɩnɛ; Ꞌwaa maal a nɩbɛ a bibi-ciiraa ɩnɛ wa.
41002028	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a Nɩbɛ Bie mɩ ɩ na a bibi-ciiraa Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ mɩ.”
41003001	A Jeeju lɛ kpɛ na a puorfʋ yir pʋↄ. A be, daba kãw be na be a nuu na kpi.
41003002	A bala na be a be jʋʋrↄ na a Jeeju ala ɩ̃ ɩ ʋ na kpɛmɛ na a daba nuu a bibi-ciiraa dayen, a-na-ɩ ba dãa na bʋↄrↄ ba ƴↄ̃w ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃.
41003003	A Jeeju yel a daba ʋlↄ a nuu na kpi: “Ir ɩraa a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw.”
41003004	A ala ɩ̃ baar ʋ yel ba: “A bibi-ciiraa dayen, sↄr be na be a nɩrɛ na maal vɩlaa, mɩɩ a bier? Sↄr mɩ be na be ʋ na faa nɩrɛ, mɩɩ ʋ na kú ʋ?” Ɩ̃-cɛ baa haa nʋↄr wa.
41003005	Ʋ Ꞌwuor ba na kpa ba jaa, a suur nyↄw ʋ lãa ɩ nɩ ʋ ni-sↄbaa a ba pʋʋr tomofʋ ɩnɛ, ʋ yel a daba: “Dↄl a fʋ nuu,” ʋ dↄl, a nuu lɛ kpɛmɛ a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa be.
41003006	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ yi na goro taa a jie naan nɩ a Ɛrↄdɩ nɩbɛ a mɩnɛ ba na ɩrɛ ɩ̃ kúrↄ a Jeeju.
41003007	A Jeeju cenʼɩ̃ na a ʋ par-tuurbe a Galile man nʋↄr, ɩ̃ a nɩ-yaw pↄw ʋ na cenʼɩ̃ a be. A nɩbɛ bala yi na a Galile nɩ a Jude,
41003008	a Jerujalɛm nɩ a Idume, a Jʋrdɛ̃ man gaan nɩ a Tɩɩr nɩ a Sɩdↄ̃ wɩɛr. Ba wa na yayaw a ʋ jie a lɛ, a-na-ɩ ba wõ na a ala ʋ na maala.
41003009	A Jeeju ƴↄ̃w na a ʋ par-tuurbe á bá bin ʋ gbor a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ kↄ̃ wa fʋr ʋ wa,
41003010	a-na-ɩ a nɩ-yaw wʋlɩ̃sɩ ʋ na kpaara, a nɩbɛ bala ba jaa a wʋlɩ̃sɩ na vↄwrↄ dara na taa wɩɛrɛ a ʋ sɛ̃ a ʋ sɩɩrfʋ ɩnɛ.
41003011	Ɩ̃ a kↄ̃tↄn-bebe wa nyɛ ʋ, ba ma lo na a ʋ nii-sↄw ɩ̃ wuure yele: “Fʋ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Bie.”
41003012	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju kpãa ba na kpãkpan á bá taa yele a sʋbↄ ʋlↄ ʋ na ɩ wa.
41003013	A ala ɩ̃ baar, a Jeeju do na a tãw juu. Ʋ bʋↄlʼã a nɩbɛ bala ʋ na bʋↄrↄ a ba wɩ a ʋ sɛ̃,
41003014	ʋ biin nɩbɛ pie-nʼayi a ba na lãa be nɩ ʋ, ɩ̃ a ʋ na tʋ̃ ba a ba cen na hier a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃,
41003015	ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ a tʋↄfʋ na ba diw nɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ.
41003016	A nɩbɛ pie-nʼayi bala ʋ na biin ɩ na: a Sɩmↄ̃ a Jeeju na pʋr a yuor Pɩɛr,
41003017	nɩ a Jebede bi-dabsɩ Jakɩ nɩ a Jã, a Jeeju na mɩ pʋr a Bↄↄnɛjɛsɩ, a lɛ yelʼã “A gↄ̃-pↄↄrbↄ.”
41003018	A bala na tuure ɩ na a Ãdire nɩ a Fɩlɩpɩ, a Batelemi, a Matie, a Tomasɩ, a Alfe bi-daba Jakɩ, a Tade, a Sɩmↄ̃ na ma jɛrɛ,
41003019	nɩ a Judasɩ Isikaryↄtɩ, a ʋlↄ nↄↄ diere a Jeeju a juu.
41003020	A Jeeju lɛ lɩɛbʼã kul a yir, ɩ̃ a nɩ-yaw lɛ duo pↄw a yir, a Jeeju nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe ma dãa nyɛ nĩe fɩ̃ɩ na dɩ bom wa.
41003021	A mɩnɛ a ʋ yir deme na wõ a lɛ, ba irʼã cere a ʋ nyↄwfʋ jie, a-na-ɩ ba yelʼã áa juu bↄr ʋ na.
41003022	A ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ na dãa yĩ a Jerujalɛm yelʼã áa Bɛɛjɛbul na ɩ a Satã ɩ̃ tɛrɛ ʋ, áa kↄ̃tↄnsɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ fãw ʋ diwre nɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ bara.
41003023	A Jeeju bʋↄl ba ɩ̃ lↄb a sʋkpar yel ba: “Mɩnɛ a Satã na ɩ ɩ̃ diw a Satã bar?
41003024	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a tẽw varʼã ayi lɩɛb jɛbɛ taa, a tẽw ʋlↄ ma tʋↄrↄ kama wa,
41003025	ɩ̃ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a yir varʼã ayi ɩ̃ lɩɛb jɛbɛ taa, a yir ʋlↄ ma tʋↄrↄ kama wa.
41003026	A lɛ ʋ, a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a Satã irʼã lɩɛb jɛbɛ nɩ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ, a ʋ tʋↄfʋ varʼã ayi ɩ̃ ma mɩ tʋↄrↄ kama wa; ʋ ta na a ʋ baarfʋ.
41003027	“Nɩrɛ ma tʋↄrↄ kpɛɛrɛ gãdaa yir wobo a ʋ yele ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ ʋ dãa na de nĩe nyↄw a gãdaa ʋlↄ lũ wa. A lɛ ʋ na tʋↄ woor a ʋ yele a jaa a yir pʋↄ.
41003028	“Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a maal-faar a nɩbɛ na maal nɩ a Naaŋmɩn yo-sãwfʋ a jaa a ba jie, a Naaŋmɩn na de na bar kʋ ba,
41003029	ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na wa sãwna a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ yuor, aa be a Naaŋmɩn na de a ʋ fãa bar kʋ ʋ wa. Ʋ maalʼã a fãa na ma be a barfʋ wa.”
41003030	A Jeeju ƴɛrʼã a lɛ a-na-ɩ ba yelʼã á kↄ̃tↄn bier ɩ̃ tɛrɛ ʋ.
41003031	A Jeeju mã nɩ a ʋ yɛɛr ta na ɩraa a yẽw, ɩ̃ tʋ̃ a ba bʋↄl ʋ.
41003032	Nɩ-yaw dãa na jɛ jilĩ kolĩ ʋ ɩ̃ a ba yel ʋ: “Nyɛ, a fʋ mã nɩ a fʋ yɛɛr ɩraa na be a yẽw ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ fʋ.”
41003033	Ʋ yel ba: “Ala ɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ mã, ɩ̃ ala ɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ yɛɛr?”
41003034	A mɩnɛ ʋ na yel a lɛ, ʋ dʋↄ na Ꞌwuor a bala na jɛ jilĩ kolĩ ʋ ɩ̃ yel: “Nyɛ a ɩ̃ mã nɩ a ɩ̃ yɛɛr,
41003035	a-na-ɩ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na maala a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ yɛbɛ, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ yɛ-pↄw, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ mã.”
41004001	A Jeeju lɛ nyↄw na a ƴɛrɩ̃ mana a man gbẽgbere nʋↄr. A nɩ-yaw tiw na kolĩ ʋ, ʋ kpɛ a gbor pʋↄ jɛ be a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a nɩbɛ ba jaa be a man gbẽgbere nʋↄr.
41004002	A sʋkpar ʋ lↄbↄ mana nɩ ba a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ yayaw. Ʋ mana ba na yele:
41004003	“Nyɩ́ cɛlɛ! Daba kãw yi na a ci yaarɩ̃fʋ jie.
41004004	A mɩnɛ ʋ na yaara, a ci ŋmɛɛ lo na a sↄr nʋↄr, a lili wa nɩɩr dɩ.
41004005	A ci ŋmɛɛ lo a gbãgbanɩ̃, a jie a tana na ma bↄ̃w be wa. A jie naan a bulʼã a-na-ɩ a tana ma bↄ̃w be a jie ʋlↄ wa.
41004006	Ɩ̃ a lɛ a mↄtↄ̃w na nyɩ̃ɛ vuul a ci, a jʋↄlɩ̃ na, a-na-ɩ a nyɩbɛ ma kpɛ pʋ̃ↄ wa.
41004007	A ci ŋmɛɛ go lo na a gʋʋr pʋↄ, a gʋʋr karɩ̃ piw ba a baa tʋↄ wↄ̃ wa.
41004008	Ɩ̃ a ci ŋmɛɛ lo a tan-vɩlaa pʋↄ, bul karɩ̃ wↄ̃. A ŋmɛɛ wↄ̃ na lɩjɛrʼɩ̃-pie, ŋmɛɛ lɩjaata, a ŋmɛɛ kʋbaa.”
41004009	A ala ɩ̃ baar, a Jeeju yel ba na: “A ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a tobo wono nɩ, ú bↄ̃w cɛlɛ.”
41004010	A lɛ a Jeeju na be nɩ a ʋ lãa-yʋↄrbↄ, nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi tɛw a kpee, ba sooro ʋ na a sʋkpar par.
41004011	Ʋ yel ba: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ nyɩmɩ ʋ, a Naaŋmɩn fãw ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ par nyɩrʼã a nyɩ jie, ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩ-kpeesɩ jie, a yele a jaa par sↄↄlɩ̃ na a sʋkpar pʋↄ,
41004012	a mɩnɛ ʻa ba na nyɛrɛ Ꞌwuoro a sɩrɛ ɩ̃ ma nyɛrɛ wa, ɩ̃ mɩ cɛlɛ wono a sɩrɛ, ɩ̃ ma bↄ̃wnↄ a par wa, a mɩnɛ ba kↄ̃ↄ lɩɛb a ba yɛ̃ a Naaŋmɩn bar a ba maal-faar kʋ ba wa.ʼ ”
41004013	A Jeeju lɛ soor ba: “Nyaa bↄ̃w a sʋkpa naa par wa? Ɩ̃ mɩnɛ nyɩ na ɩ ɩ̃ bↄ̃w a sʋkpar ala na cɛ par?
41004014	A ci-yaara ʋlↄ, a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ yaara.
41004015	A nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ na wõ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃, ba wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a ci ala na lo a sↄr nʋↄr. A lɛ ba na wõ a ƴɛrɩ̃, a Satã wa na a jie naan na ir a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ a ba sube pʋʋr.
41004016	A lɛ ʋ mɩ, a ci ala na lo a gbãgban pʋↄ, a ɩ na a bala na wõ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ sↄw a jie naan nɩ nʋ̃ↄ,
41004017	ɩ̃-cɛ aa kpɛ a ba pʋ̃ↄ a tɩɛ nyɩbɛ kaarɩ̃ wa. Ba maa yaarɩ̃ bal wa. A won, mɩɩ a hʋↄlfʋ ɩ̃ wa ta ba a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩnɛ, a ma tↄ ba na a ba ŋmaa yi.
41004018	A nɩŋmɛɛ go na wõ a ƴɛrɩ̃, ba wↄ̃ na a ci ala ba na yaarɩ̃ a gʋʋr pʋↄ.
41004019	Ba ma wõ na a ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ a tẽw naa yele dɛn nɩ a naalʋ̃ʋ bↄfʋ nɩ a yel-kpee vɩláa kpɛ pↄw ba, piw a ƴɛrɩ̃ a aa wↄnↄ wa.
41004020	A nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ go wↄ̃ na a ci ala ba na yaarɩ̃ a tan-vɩlaa pʋↄ. Ba ma wõ na a ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ sↄw de a wↄ̃ a wↄmↄ. A ŋmɛɛ ma wↄ̃ na lɩjɛrʼɩ̃-pie, ŋmɛɛ lɩjaata, a ŋmɛɛ kʋbaa.”
41004021	A Jeeju lɛ soor ba na: “A lãpa ba na ma kpɛ nɩ a diem, dʋʋ pʋↄ pↄwfʋ ɩnɛ ba ma kpɛ nɩ, mɩɩ gaajie pulẽe ba ma kpɛ nɩ su? Má a gbere juu ba ma kpɛ nɩ dↄↄl.
41004022	Á-na-ɩ a bom jaa lɛ na sↄↄlɩ̃, a na yi na cãa pʋↄ.
41004023	A ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a tobo wono nɩ, ú bↄ̃w cɛlɛ!”
41004024	A Jeeju lɛ bↄ̃w na yel ba: “Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a ala nyɩ na wono ɩnɛ. A mɩnɛ nyɩ na maala kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ, a Naaŋmɩn nↄↄ mɩ maalʼã a lɛ kʋ nyɩ, ɩ̃ lɛ dↄↄl nyɩ.
41004025	A-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ na tɛraa, ba na lɛ kʋ ʋ na dↄↄl, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na ma tɛraa wa, ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a fɩ̃ɩ, ba na de na a fɩ̃ɩ ala a ʋ jie.”
41004026	A Jeeju lɛ yelʼã: “A Naaŋmɩn fãw wↄ̃ na taa nɩ daba na yaara a ci a tene.
41004027	A ʋlↄ saarɩ̃ nʋ ʋ gure a tɩsↄw mɩɩ ʋ ir a mↄtↄ̃w yʋↄrↄ, ɩ̃ a ci bule na karɛɛ, ɩ̃ Ꞌwaa bↄ̃w a par wa.
41004028	A ci bulʼã a ʋ yẽ. A dãdãw a ɩ na a vaar, tuure ɩ a juu, na a pãa wↄ̃ a bie.
41004029	A lɛ a ci na bɩ, ʋ ƴↄ̃w na a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ a ba kpɛ a ci a-na-ɩ a ŋmafʋ daar ta na.”
41004030	A Jeeju lɛ yelʼã: “Bõ sɩ na manʼɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw na wↄ̃? Sʋkpa buor sɩ na de miilʼɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na wↄ̃?
41004031	Ʋ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a muta-tɩɛ bir. A mɩnɛ ba na bʋr ʋ, ʋ pabʼã gãw a bie a jaa na be a ka a tẽw pʋↄ,
41004032	ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛ ba na bʋr ʋ ʋ bul, ʋ karɩ̃ na gãw a mʋʋr a jaa, ɩ̃ ɓol wulbi-bɛrɛ a mↄↄ pʋↄ lili na tʋↄ ƴↄ̃w a ba cor a be.”
41004033	A Jeeju lↄbʼã sʋkpar yaw a nↄhↄ̃ mana nɩ a nɩbɛ bala na cɛlɛ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a mɩnɛ ba na tʋↄrↄ cɛlɛ.
41004034	ꞋWaa ƴɛrɛ nɩ ba ɩ̃ ma ɩ sʋkpa ʋ lↄb wa; ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛ ʋ na be a ji-kpee nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe, ʋ miil ba na a sʋkpar par a jaa.
41004035	A ʋna bibirʼãa jaanʋↄr, a Jeeju yelʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe: “Nyɩ́ ɩ a sɩ gãw a man gaan.”
41004036	Ba barʼã a nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ a Jeeju par-tuurbe de ʋ nɩ a gbor ʋlↄ pʋↄ ʋ na dãa be. A nɩŋmɛɛ mɩ dãa na tɛrɛ a gboro na ba lãa gãwna nɩ ba.
41004037	Sɛsɛb kpɛ̃ɛ nyↄw na ɩ̃ fure, a kʋ̃ↄ awra ŋmeere a gbor, loro a gbor pʋↄ, ʋ gↄr paala nɩ a kʋ̃ↄ.
41004038	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju gure a gbor parɩ̃ jew a juu nɩ a ju-jewraa, a ʋ par-tuurbe nyↄw ʋ sɩ̃w ɩ̃ yel: “Jãjaana, sɩ wɛrɛ na! Aa bá fʋ wa mɩɩ?”
41004039	Ʋ irʼã tan a sɛsɛb ɩ̃ yel a man kʋ̃ↄ: “Bar a gↄn ɩ̃ ŋmaa vʋʋrɩ̃!” a sɛsɛb ŋmaa, ɩ̃ a wɩɛr ŋmaa gboor.
41004040	Ʋ yel ba: “Bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw nyɩ a lɛ? Mɩnɛ a ɩ a nyaa tɛrɛ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa sɛr wa?”
41004041	Ɩ̃-cɛ a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyɩrɩ̃ na tɛrɛ ba a ba yele taa: “Ala nɩ a nyaa tↄr, a sɛsɛb nɩ a man na jↄrↄ a lɛ?”
41005001	Ba ta na a man gaan na ɩ a Jerasɛn nɩbɛ tẽw.
41005002	A lɛ a Jeeju na yire a gbor pʋↄ, a be a jie naan, daba kãw yi na a yar sↄ̃w ɩ̃ wa a ʋ tuorfʋ jie. A daba ʋlↄ, kↄ̃tↄn bier dãa na tɛrɛ ʋ,
41005003	ʋ ma gana a yar sↄ̃w. Nɩrɛ maa lɛ dãa tʋↄ lũ ʋ tɛɛlɛ wa, a ala saarɩ̃ nʋ ba lũ nɩ ʋ bↄ̃jↄrɩ̃.
41005004	A-na-ɩ ba ma dãa na kpal ʋ a kure a gbɛɛ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ lũ ʋ a nur nɩ a bↄ̃jↄrɩ̃sɩ, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ ma ŋma na a bↄ̃jↄrɩ̃sɩ, ɩ̃ kar a kure bar. Nɩrɛ ma dãa be be tɛrɛ fãgã maala ʋ ʋ bala wa.
41005005	A tɩsↄw nɩ a mↄtↄ̃w, a daar a jaa, ʋ ma be na a yar sↄ̃w nɩ a tan jur, na ʋ wuure ɩ̃ ma ŋmara ŋmara a ʋ ɩ̃gan nɩ a kʋsɩɛ.
41005006	A mɩnɛ ʋ na gbã nyɛ a Jeeju a nɩdaa, ʋ jↄ na tuor, na ʋ lo gburĩ dume a ʋ nii-sↄw,
41005007	ɩ̃ wuurʼɩ̃ kpɛ̃w ɩ̃ yel: “Bõ fʋ nyɛ nɩ ma, saa juu Naaŋmɩn Bie Jeeju? Ɩ̃ sʋↄr fʋ na nɩ a Naaŋmɩn yuor bɩlɛ, taa hʋↄlↄ ma wa.”
41005008	Ʋ yelʼã a lɛ a-na-ɩ a Jeeju dãa na yel: “A fʋna kↄ̃tↄn bierʼãa, yi ɩ̃ cɛ a daba na.”
41005009	Ɩ̃ ʋ soorʼã kↄ̃tↄn: “A fʋ yuorʼɩ̃ bõ?” “Kↄ̃-bↄ̃w-nʋↄr ɩ̃ dɩ, a-na-ɩ sɩ waa na,”
41005010	ɩ̃ nyↄw ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ a Jeeju tↄ̃tↄ̃tↄ̃ a ʋ taa ɩ a ba yi a wɩɛrʼã wa.
41005011	Do-yayaw dãa na be a tãw loor, bʋↄrↄ a ba yel-dɩrɩsɩ,
41005012	a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ sʋↄrↄ a Jeeju yele: “Kʋ sɩ sↄr bɩlɛ a sɩ yi cen na kpɛ a dor basɩmɛ jie”,
41005013	ʋ kʋ ba a sↄr, a kↄ̃tↄn-bebe yi cen na kpɛ a dor, a ba yi a be a tãw sɩɛ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ kaal taa suu lo a man kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ. A dor bala na lo a lɛ mʋr a man kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ, tara na dor ture ayi.
41005014	A nɩbɛ bala na dãa cɩɩnɛ a dor lɩɛbʼã jↄ kulʼɩ̃ hier a ala na ta Ꞌlʋↄrɩ̃ taa a tẽ-kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ wa ta nɩ a tẽ-bil pʋʋr, a nɩbɛ cen na nyɛ a ala na ta.
41005015	Ba wɩ na a Jeeju sɛ̃, na ba nyɛ a daba ʋlↄ a kↄ̃tↄn “Kↄ̃-bↄ̃w-nʋↄr” na dãa tɛrɛ, ʋ su cẽcene jɩnaa nɩ, lɛ ɩ nɩsaa-son, a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw ba.
41005016	A bala na dãa nyɛ a mɩnɛ a yele na maal, mana na kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ a ala na dãa ta a daba ʋlↄ a kↄ̃tↄn na dãa tɛrɛ, nɩ a dor.
41005017	A mɩnɛ a na be a lɛ, a nɩbɛ nyↄw na ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ a Jeeju a ʋ yi a ba tẽw bɩlɛ.
41005018	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na kpɛɛrɛ a gbor pʋↄ, a daba ʋlↄ a kↄ̃tↄn na dãa tɛrɛ sʋↄr ʋ na a ʋ kʋ ʋ sↄr ʋ pↄw ʋ a ba lãa cen.
41005019	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju mↄ̃w ʋ na a sↄr ɩ̃ yel: “Lɩɛb kul a fʋ yir deme jie, man ba a ala a jaa a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na maal fʋ nɩ a mɩnɛ ʋ na bↄ̃w fʋ a nãw.”
41005020	Ʋ cen na nyↄw ɩ̃ man pↄw a Ten-Pie tẽ-daa pʋↄ a ala a jaa a Jeeju na maal ʋ, a nɩbɛ ba jaa ha nↄɛ.
41005021	A lɛ a Jeeju na lɛ gãw nɩ a gbor a gaan kpee pʋↄ, a nɩ-yaw lɛ tiw na kolĩ ʋ a man gbẽgbere nʋↄr.
41005022	A puorfʋ yir ni-diere na dɩ a Jaarisi ta na nyɛ a Jeeju ɩ̃ lo gburĩ a dume,
41005023	ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ ʋ waala nɩ a ʋ sũo ʋ, yele nɩ: “A ɩ̃ bi-pↄw be na be kpiire. Ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ fʋ na, wa dↄↄl ʋ a fʋ nuu ʋ kpɛmɛ ir”,
41005024	a Jeeju pↄw ʋ cenʼɩ̃, a nɩ-yaw tuure ʋ fʋrↄ ʋ.
41005025	Pↄw be na be na tɛrɛ a sɩɛ na ma baara wa maalʼɩ̃ yomo pie-nʼayi.
41005026	Ʋ nyɛ na won yaw a dↄↄtↄrsɩ yayaw jie, sãw nɩ a ʋ libie a jaa. Ɩ̃ Ꞌwaa nyɛ kpɛ̃w wa; a wʋlɩ̃ lɛ ɛ̃ɛ na dↄↄlↄ cere.
41005027	Ʋ wõ na a ba bʋ a Jeeju ƴɛrɩ̃, ʋ cen a nɩ-yaw pʋↄ a ʋ puo-sↄw, ɩ̃ sɩɩr a ʋ fu.
41005028	A-na-ɩ ʋ yelʼã: “Maa saarɩ̃ sɩɩr a ʋ fu tɛw, ɩ̃ na kpɛmɛ na.”
41005029	A mɩnɛ ʋ na sɩɩr a Jeeju fu, a jie naan a ʋ jɩ̃ɩ barfʋ baarʼã, ʋ bↄ̃wnaa a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ, bↄ̃w ka ʋ kpɛmɛ na.
41005030	A ʋna daarʼãa pʋↄ, a Jeeju bↄ̃wnaa a fãgã kãw yi ʋ na, ɩ̃ lɩɛb a nɩ-yaw pʋↄ soor: “Ala ɩ̃ sɩɩr ma a fu?”
41005031	A ʋ par-tuurbe yel ʋ: “Fʋ nyɛ na a nɩbɛ na fʋr fʋ a lõbobo a jaa, ɩ̃ na fʋ lɛ bↄ̃w nɩ sooro a ala ɩ̃ sɩɩr fʋ?”
41005032	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju Ꞌwuoro a lõbobo pʋʋr kolo nɩ, bʋↄrↄ ʋ nyɛ a ʋlↄ na maal a lɛ.
41005033	A dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw a pↄw, ʋ mine, a-na-ɩ ʋ bↄ̃w na a ala na maal a ʋ jie, ʋ wa lo gburĩ dume a Jeeju nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ yel a ʋ yel-mɩ̃ɛ a jaa kʋ ʋ.
41005034	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Ɩ̃ bi-pↄw! A fʋ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa faa fʋ na. Gere nɩ su-ɓaar tɛrɛ nɩ a ɩ̃gan kpɛ̃w.”
41005035	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na cãa ƴɛrɛ, a nɩbɛ yi na a Jufisɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jaarisi yir, ɩ̃ wa yel ʋ: “A fʋ bi-pↄw kpi na. Bõ fʋ lɛ vↄwrↄ a Jãjaana ɩrɛ nɩ?”
41005036	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju ma mɩ cɛlɛ ba be wa, ɩ̃ yel a Jaarisi: “Taa jↄrↄ dãbɩ̃ɛ wa. Tɛrɛ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa tɛw.”
41005037	Ɩ̃ Ꞌwaa sↄw a nɩrɛ bɩɛl ʋ wa, ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jakɩ nɩ a ʋ yɛbɛ Jã ʋ wa.
41005038	Ʋ ta na a puorfʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yir, nyɛ a nɩbɛ a ba kono wuure nɩ kpɛ̃w,
41005039	ʋ po kpɛɛrɛ a diem ɩ̃ yel ba: “Bõ gↄmↄ nɩ a asɩmɛ nyɩ pↄↄrↄ kono nɩ a nↄhↄ̃? A bibile ma kpi wa, ʋ gurʼã”,
41005040	a ba laara ʋ, ʋ diw ba bar yẽw ba jaa, ɩ̃ taw a bibile sãa, nɩ a ʋ mã, nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe ata, kpɛ nɩ a die ʋlↄ pʋↄ a bibile na be.
41005041	Ʋ nyↄw na a bibile nuu ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Talita kum.” A lɛ yelʼã: “Poole, a fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ yele, ir!”
41005042	A jie naan a poole irʼã cere, a-na-ɩ ʋ tɛrɛ na yomo pie-nʼayi. A lɛ ba na nyɛ a ala, a ɩ ba na nↄ-kofʋ yaw.
41005043	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju kpãa ba na a ba taa ɩ nɩrɛ ʋ bↄ̃wnaa wa, ɩ̃ na ʋ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ kʋ ʋ bõ-dɩraa ʋ dɩ.”
41006001	A Jeeju yi na a jie ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na ʋ cen a tẽw ʋlↄ pʋↄ ʋ na nʋ̃ↄ, a ʋ par-tuurbe bɩɛl ʋ cenʼɩ̃.
41006002	A bibi-ciiraa dayen ʋ kpɛ na a ba puorfʋ yir ɩ̃ nyↄw ɩ̃ jaana a nɩbɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃. A nɩ-yaw bala na wõ a ʋ jaanfʋ ha na nↄɛ ɩ̃ yele: “Nyɩnɛ tↄr ʋ yi nɩ a tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ na? Yɛ̃ buor bʋrↄ nɩ a naa ʋ na tɛrɛ? Ɩ mɩnɛ ʋ ɩ ɩ̃ tʋↄ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ a lɛ?
41006003	Má a dafↄↄrↄ ʋ! Ɩ̃ aa ɩ a Maarɩɩ bi-daba ʋ wa? Má a Jakɩ nɩ a Jojɛsɩ nɩ a Judi nɩ a Sɩmↄ̃ yɛ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋ. Ɩ̃ a ʋ yɛ-pↄↄbↄ, má a ka sɩ lãa be taa!” Ɩ̃ a ʋ maal-bie cɛ ba na a ba jɛ ʋ bar.
41006004	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju yel ba: “A jiir a jaa ba ma ƴↄnↄ na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ tẽw, nɩ a ʋ nɩbɛ nɩ a ʋ yir deme sↄ̃w tɛw ba maa ƴↄ̃w ʋ wa.”
41006005	ꞋWaa tʋↄ maal nↄ-kofʋ tʋn a be, ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a baalsɩ ŋmɛɛ tɛw ʋ na dↄↄl a nuu a ba kpɛmɛ ʋ wa.
41006006	Ɩ̃ a nʋↄr ko ʋ a ba su-kpɛn ɩnɛ. A ala ɩ̃ baar, a Jeeju yↄ na cʋb a ten ala na viirĩ kolĩ, na ʋ jaana a nɩbɛ,
41006007	ɩ̃ na ʋ bʋↄl a ʋ par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi tʋnↄ ba ayi-yi ɩ̃ kʋ ba a tʋↄfʋ a ba na diw nɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ.
41006008	Ɩ̃ ʋ man ba na a ba taa tɛrɛɛ bom diere nɩ a sↄr wa, a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a dɩb ʋ, mɩɩ a wʋↄ mɩ, a ba taa mɩ tɛrɛɛ libie a ba ɩ̃ganɩ̃ wa, ɩ̃ ba tɛrɛ daa tɛw,
41006009	ɩ̃ lɛ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ su nafaba, ɩ̃ nyɩ taa su fu-bɛrɛ ayi wa.”
41006010	Ʋ lɛ yel ba na: “A yir lɛ pʋↄ nyɩ nↄↄ kpɛ, nyɩ́ jɛ a be wa ta nɩ a mɩnɛ nyɩ na yire a tẽw ʋlↄ pʋↄ.
41006011	Ɩ̃-cɛ a jie lɛ a nɩbɛ na ma sↄw de nyɩ ɩ̃ cɛl a nyɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa, nyɩ́ yi a be ɩ̃ tɛb a nyɩ gbɛɛ tãbuulĩ bar, a ɩ bõ-miilaa a ba jie.”
41006012	Ba cenʼã na hiere yele a nɩbɛ a ba lɩɛb a ba yɛ̃.
41006013	Ba diw na kↄ̃tↄn yaw bar, ɩ̃ na ba bol a kãa a baalsɩ yaw a ba kpɛmɛ.
41006014	A jamana Ɛrↄdɩ dãa na wõ a ba ƴɛr a Jeeju ƴɛrɩ̃ a-na-ɩ a ʋ yuor yire na a jiir a jaa, ɩ̃ na ʋ yel: “A Jã-Batii irʼã a kũu pʋↄ. Ala ɩnɛ ʋ tɛrɛ a tʋↄfʋ maala nɩ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ.”
41006015	Ɩ̃ a nɩŋmɛɛ yele na: “A Eli ʋ,” ɩ̃ a ŋmɛɛ go á ƴɛr-hiere kãw ʋ, na wↄ̃ a korĩ-cɛ ƴɛr-hierbe kaarɩ̃.
41006016	Ɩ̃-cɛ, a mɩnɛ a Ɛrↄdɩ na wõ a lɛ, ʋ yelʼã: “A Jã ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na ɩ a ba ŋmaa a juu, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ir a kũu pʋↄ.”
41006017	-
41006018	A-na-ɩ a Ɛrↄdɩ dãa na de a ʋ yɛbɛ Fɩlɩpɩ pↄw Ɛrↄdɩya kul, a Jã ma yele ʋ á Ꞌwaa tɛrɛ sↄr na de a ʋ yɛbɛ pↄw wa. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Ɛrↄdɩ dãa ɩ a ba nyↄw a Jã lũ ƴↄ̃w a kasu pʋↄ.
41006019	A Ɛrↄdɩya dãa na tɛrɛ nɩ a Jã suur, ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ʋ kú ʋ ɩ̃ ma nyɛ sↄr wa,
41006020	a-na-ɩ a Ɛrↄdɩ jↄrↄ na a Jã, ʋ na bↄ̃w ʋ ɩ nɩ-dẽdẽ nɩ nɩ-son. Ʋ maa sↄw a Jã ɩnɛ wa, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ wa cɛl a Jã ƴɛrɩ̃, a ma dɩrɛ ʋ na a suur, ɩ̃ a ma cãa na nʋmↄ ʋ a ʋ cɛlfʋ.
41006021	Bibir vɩlaa kãw wa yi na a Ɛrↄdɩya. A Ɛrↄdɩ dↄwfʋ yuon ta na, ʋ maal fɛtɩ kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃ bʋↄl a ʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ʋ sↄdaal-bɛrɛ nɩ a Galile-tẽw nɩ-bɛrɛ.
41006022	A Ɛrↄdɩya bi-pↄw kpɛ na a fɛtɩ jie ɩ̃ sɛ a bɩnɛ, a nʋ̃ↄ nyↄw a Ɛrↄdɩ nɩ a ʋ lãa-dɩrbɛ, ʋ yel a poole: “Sʋↄr ma a bom lɛ fʋ na bʋↄrↄ, ɩ̃ ɩ̃ na kʋ fʋ na,”
41006023	ɩ̃ lɛ pↄ yelʼɩ̃: “A bom lɛ fʋ na sʋↄrↄ ma, ɩ̃ na kʋ fʋ na, a ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ tẽw lõboor gãw ʋ.”
41006024	A poole yi soor a ʋ mã: “Bõ ɩ̃ na sʋↄr?” A ʋ mã yel ʋ: “Sʋↄr a Jã-Batii juu!”
41006025	Ʋ pↄw na fↄfↄw cen a jamana jie na yel ʋ: “Ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na fʋ ŋmaa a Jã-Batii juu a jie naan dↄↄl lagbaal juu kʋ ma”,
41006026	a ni-sↄbaa kpɛ a jamana, ɩ̃-cɛ a-na-ɩ ʋ faa na pↄ a ʋ lãa-dɩrbɛ nii-sↄw, Ꞌwaa tʋↄrↄ jaara wa.
41006027	Ʋ tʋ̃ na a ʋ sↄdaalaa kãw a jie naan, ɩ̃ yel ʋ á ʋ wa nɩ a Jã-Batii juu, a sↄdaalaa cen na ŋmaa a Jã juu a kasu pʋↄ
41006028	dↄↄl a lagbaal juu wa nɩ kʋ a poole, a poole ɩraa ɩ̃ de kʋ a ʋ mã.
41006029	A Jã par-tuurbe wõ na a lɛ, ɩ̃ cen na de a kũu ũu.
41006030	A nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ lɛ lɩɛbʼã wa tiw taa a Jeeju sɛ̃ na man ʋ a ala a jaa ba na maal, nɩ a ala a jaa ba na jaan a nɩbɛ.
41006031	A sↄ-tↄlbↄ waa na vara vara taa a jie ba na be a baa dãa mɩ nyɛ nĩe na dɩ bõ-dɩraa wa. A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ wa a sɩ yi cɛ̃cɛ̃w a wɛkar pʋↄ sɩ tɛw a nyɩ pɩɛn fɩ̃ɩ.”
41006032	A lɛ, ba kpɛ na a gbor pʋↄ, bala ba tɛw, yire a cɛ̃cɛ̃w a wɛkar pʋↄ.
41006033	A mɩnɛ ba na cere, nɩ-yaw nyɛ ba na bↄ̃w ba, ɩ̃ na ba yi a ten a jaa pʋↄ ɩ̃ jↄ nɩ gbɛɛ de ba nĩe cen na gure ba a jie ʋlↄ ba na cere.
41006034	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na yi a gbor pʋↄ, nyɛ a nɩ-yaw a lɛ, nãw nyↄw ʋ na a ba ɩnɛ a-na-ɩ ba wↄ̃ na taa nɩ piir na ma tɛrɛ dↄ-cɩɩnaa wa, ʋ nyↄw ɩ̃ jaana ba yel-yayaw.
41006035	A mɩnɛ a mↄ̃tↄ̃w na mʋrↄ, a Jeeju par-tuurbe taw na ta ʋ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “A jie na ɩ na wɛkar ɩ̃ a mↄtↄ̃w mʋrↄ.
41006036	Wɛl a nɩbɛ bar a ba cen a ten ala pʋↄ na pɩɛlʼɩ̃ a ka da a bõ-dɩraa.”
41006037	A Jeeju yel ba: “A nyɩmɩ mɩ̃ɛ, nyɩ́ kʋ ba a dɩb a ba dɩ.” Ɩ̃ a ba yel ʋ: “Mɩnɛ! A dɩb dafʋ na ta na ture lɩjaayi. Fʋ bʋↄrↄ na sɩ de a libi-kpɛ̃ɛ a lɛ cen na da nɩ a buru wa nɩ kʋ ba mɩɩ?”
41006038	A lɛ, a Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ cen na Ꞌwuor je kãa: bur-bie amɩnɛ nyɩ tɛrɛ?” A ba cen na Ꞌwuor ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Bur-bie anuu sɩ tɛrɛ, nɩ jɩm-bie ayi.”
41006039	A Jeeju ƴↄ̃w na a ʋ par-tuurbe a ba maal a nɩbɛ ba jaa a ba jɛ ji-gbulĩsɩ ji-gbulĩsɩ a mↄ-ɓaar juu,
41006040	a ba jɛ cʋr taa ŋmɛɛ ji-gbulĩsɩ kↄↄr-kↄↄr, ŋmɛɛ ji-gbulĩsɩ lɩjaayi nɩ piir-piir.
41006041	A ala ɩ̃ baar, a Jeeju de na a bur-bie anuu nɩ a jɩm-bie ayi ɩ̃ dʋↄ Ꞌwuor a saꞋlon puor a Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃ nyↄw a buru ŋma ŋma kʋ a ʋ par-tuurbe a ba de po a nɩbɛ. A lɛ ʋ mɩ ɩ a ba de a jɩm-bie ayi po a nɩbɛ ba jaa.
41006042	Ɩ̃ ba Ꞌwↄbʼã sɛw ba jaa
41006043	ɩ̃ a ʋ par-tuurbe wob a bur-ŋmara nɩ a jɩm-ŋmara ala na cɛ sɛw pɩɩr pie-nʼayi.
41006044	A bala na dãa Ꞌwↄb a buru ɩ na dabsɩ ture anuu.
41006045	A mɩnɛ a ala na yi tↄ, a Jeeju ɩ na a ʋ par-tuurbe a ba kpɛ a gbor pʋↄ a jie naan, na ba de ʋ nĩe gãwna a man gbẽgbere nʋↄr ʋlↄ na be a Bɛsada loor, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ ɩraa wɛlɛ a nɩbɛ bara.
41006046	A lɛ ʋ na wɛl ba bar baar, ʋ do na a tãw juu a Naaŋmɩn sʋↄrfʋ.
41006047	A mɩnɛ a wɩɛr na liwre, a gbor dãa na be a man sↄↄlɩ̃sↄw, ɩ̃ cɛ a Jeeju bar a ʋ yẽ be a tene.
41006048	Ʋ nyɛ na a ʋ par-tuurbe a ba mↄnↄ a gbor hana nɩ, a-na-ɩ a sɛsɛb dãa na gbãga tuoro ba. A nↄdɛɛ kuon daar, ʋ be na a kʋ̃ↄ juu cere a ba sɛ̃, nɩ a gbɛɛ, ɩ̃ dãa tɩɛr wↄ̃ ʋ vɩɛ ba bar.
