41006049	A mɩnɛ ba na nyɛ ʋ, ʋ cere a kʋ̃ↄ juu a lɛ, ba tɩɛrʼã beeka kpɩɩn ʋ, ɩ̃ wuure,
41006050	a-na-ɩ ba jaa dãa na nyɛ ʋ, ɩ̃ a ɩ ba ni-sↄbaa. A jie naan, a Jeeju bʋ nɩ ba na yel ba: “Nyɩ́ bar tɩɛrʋ̃, maa ʋ. Nyɩ taa ɩ a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw nyɩ wa!”
41006051	Ɩ̃ cen na kpɛ a ba sɛ̃ a gbor pʋↄ, a sɛsɛb ŋmaa. A nyãa nyɩl ba a ba ha nↄɛ,
41006052	a-na-ɩ baa dãa bↄ̃w a buru ala ƴɛrɩ̃ par wa, a yi a ba sube kpɛmɛfʋ jie.
41006053	A lɛ ba na gãw a man baar, ba cenʼã na ta ɩraa nɩ a gbor a Jenejarɛ wɩɛr,
41006054	ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na yi a gbor pʋↄ, a nɩbɛ nyɛ na a Jeeju bↄ̃w ʋ a jie naan,
41006055	ɩ̃ na ba jↄ cʋb a ʋna wɩɛrʼãa ʋ jaa, ɩ̃ nyↄw ɩ̃ tuoro a baalsɩ nɩ a gan cere nɩ a jiir a jaa ba na yel a be a Jeeju be.
41006056	Ɩ̃ a jie lɛ ʋ na wa ta, mɩɩ a tẽ-bil pʋʋr, mɩɩ a tẽ-bɛrɛ pʋʋr, mɩɩ a va-pↄrsɩ pʋʋr, a nɩbɛ ma wɩ nɩ na a baalsɩ gaal a dar pʋʋr, ɩ̃ ma sʋↄr ʋ a ʋ kʋ ba sↄr a ba sɩɩr a ʋ cẽcen nʋↄr tɛw, ɩ̃ a bala ba jaa na sɩɩr ʋ, ba kpaarʼã.
41007001	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ ŋmɛɛ na yi a Jerujalɛm, wa na na kpaarɩ̃ taa a Jeeju sɛ̃.
41007002	Ba nyɛ na a Jeeju par-tuurbe ŋmɛɛ a ba dɩrɛ a dɩb nɩ a nu-dɛɛr; a lɛ yelʼã a baa pɛɛr a nur tu nɩ a puorfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa.
41007003	A-na-ɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ nɩ a Jufisɩ ba jaa ma jↄrↄ na a ba tẽkorĩ nɩ-bɛrɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ. Ba maa sↄw dɩ dɩb, ɩ̃ ma ɩ ba bↄ̃w na pɛɛr a ba nur wa.
41007004	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na mↄↄ yi a daa pʋↄ kul, bala ma pↄl a ba mɩ̃ɛ wa, ba maa sↄw dɩ bom wa. Ba lɛ cãa na tɛrɛ tẽkorĩ maalfʋ yaw go, na wↄ̃ taa nɩ a ŋmama nɩ a yoli nɩ a kure lakpoor pɛɛrfʋ.
41007005	A be jie, a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ soorʼã a Jeeju: “Bõ ɩnɛ a fʋ par-tuurbe ma bar a sɩ tẽkorĩ nɩ-bɛrɛ maalfʋ ɩ̃ ma dɩrɛ a ba dɩb nɩ a nu-dɛɛr a lɛ?”
41007006	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩna bɛbɛlbɛ naa! A Ejayi tɛrɛ na yel-mɩ̃ɛ a mɩnɛ ʋ na hier yel a nyɩ ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ sɛb a ʋ sɛbɛ pʋↄ yele: ʻNʋↄr tɛw a nɩbɛ basɩmɛ ƴↄnↄ nɩ ma, ɩ̃-cɛ a ba suur jãa nɩ ma na.
41007007	A ba puorfʋ ba na puoro ma ma tɛrɛ par wa, ɩ̃ a jaanfʋ ala ba na jaana a nɩbɛ ɩ na nɩbɛ ƴɛr-kpɛn.ʼ
41007008	Nyɩ ma barʼã a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn ɩ̃ ma lɛ ɛ̃ɛ bil jↄrↄ a nyɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ.”
41007009	Ʋ lɛ bↄ̃w na yel ba: “Nyɩ sɩrɩ̃ na bↄ̃w a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn golfʋ, a nyɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ maalfʋ ɩnɛ ʋlↄ.
41007010	A-na-ɩ a Mowisi yelʼã: ʻYↄnↄ a fʋ sãa nɩ a fʋ mã,ʼ ɩ̃ ʋ mɩ yelʼã áa sɛw na a ba na kú a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na wa tʋrↄ a ʋ sãa, mɩɩ a ʋ mã.
41007011	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩmɩ, nyɩ ma yelʼã áa ala ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩrɛ yelʼã a ʋ sãa, mɩɩ a ʋ mã, áa yele ala na dãa sɛw ʋ de sũo nɩ ba ɩ na ʻkↄrbã,ʼ (a lɛ yelʼã, á Naaŋmɩn ʋ de a yele ala kʋ,)
41007012	nyɩ maa lɛ bar ʋ ʋ maal bom fɩ̃ɩ sũo nɩ a ʋ sãa, mɩɩ a ʋ mã wa.
41007013	Eɛ nyɩ ma de a nyɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ maalfʋ jaana Ꞌlʋↄrↄ taa, sãwna nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ bara. Ɩ̃ yel-yaw lɛ be na be na wↄ̃ a lɛ nyɩ na maala.”
41007014	A ala ɩ̃ yi tↄ, a Jeeju lɛ bʋↄlʼã a nɩbɛ ɩ̃ yel ba: “A nyɩmɩ nyɩ jaa, nyɩ́ bↄ̃w cɛl bↄ̃w a ƴɛrɩ̃ na ɩ̃ na ƴɛrɛ nyɩ par.
41007015	A bom lɛ a nɩrɛ na dɩrɛ ƴↄnↄ a ʋ pʋ̃ↄ ma tʋↄrↄ sãwna ʋ wa. A ala na sãwna a nɩrɛ ɩ na a ala na yire a ʋ suur pʋↄ. [
41007016	A ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a tobo wono nɩ, ú bↄ̃w cɛlɛ!”]
41007017	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na bar a nɩbɛ ɩ̃ kpɛ a yir pʋↄ, a ʋ par-tuurbe soor ʋ na a sʋkpa ʋlↄ par,
41007018	ʋ yel ba: “A nyɩmɩ mɩ, nyaa tɛrɛ a yɛ̃ na bↄ̃w a par wa? Nyaa bↄ̃w ka a dɩb lɛ na kpɛɛrɛ a nɩrɛ pʋ̃ↄ ma tʋↄrↄ sãwna ʋ wa?
41007019	A-na-ɩ aa ɩ a ʋ suur pʋↄ a kpɛɛrɛ wa. A ʋ puorɩ̃ a kpɛɛrɛ ʋ na wa cen a sãɓanɩ̃ ir bar.” A lɛ, a Jeeju bʋↄrↄ na ʋ yel áa yel-dɩrɩsɩ a jaa ɩ na bõ-son.
41007020	Ʋ lɛ yelʼã “Áa ala na yire a nɩrɛ suur pʋↄ, a ala ɩ̃ sãwna ʋ.
41007021	A-na-ɩ a nɩbɛ suur pʋↄ a tɩɛrɩ̃-burbur yire na ma ƴↄnↄ ba a pebfʋ nɩ a jufʋ nɩ a nɩrɛ kúfʋ pʋↄ.
41007022	A ma mɩ ƴↄnↄ ba na a pↄw-kpee mɩɩ a dab-kpee ganɩfʋ, nɩ a folfʋ, nɩ a po-tuo, nɩ a bɛlɩ̃fʋ, nɩ a pebfʋ, nɩ a mimir fãa, nɩ a kpɛfʋ, nɩ a yo-bↄfʋ, nɩ a yɛ̃ faafʋ pʋↄ.
41007023	A yel-dɛɛrsɩ asɩmɛ a jaa, a nɩrɛ suur pʋↄ a yire, sãwna nɩ ʋ.”
41007024	A Jeeju yi na a be ɩ̃ cen a Tɩɩr wɩɛr, na ʋ cen na kpɛ a yir kãw pʋↄ, ɩ̃ ma dãa bʋↄrↄ nɩrɛ ʋ bↄ̃w nɩ ʋ wa. Ɩ̃ Ꞌwaa dãa tʋↄrↄ sↄↄlↄ wa.
41007025	A-na-ɩ pↄw kãw na dãa tɛrɛ bi-pↄw a kↄ̃tↄn bier na ire, wõ na a ba ƴɛr a Jeeju ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ na ʋ wa a jie naan lo gburĩ a dume a ʋ nii-sↄw.
41007026	A pↄw ʋlↄ yi na a Siro-Fenisɩ wɩɛr ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a Gɩrɛkɩ ƴɛrɩ̃. Ʋ sʋↄrↄ na a Jeeju a ʋ diw a kↄ̃tↄn bar ʋ yi ɩ̃ cɛ a ʋ bi-pↄw.
41007027	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Bar a bibiir a ba dɩ pi sɛr, a-na-ɩ aa sɛw a ba na de a bibiir bõ-dɩraa lↄb ƴↄ̃w a baar wa.”
41007028	A pↄw lɛ lɩɛb yel ʋ: “Sɩrɛ jaa ʋ, Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ a baar na pɩɛlʼɩ̃ a dɩb dɩfʋ jie ma dɩrɛ na a bibiir dɩb-pʋrↄ na loro a tene.”
41007029	A be jie, a Jeeju lɩɛb yel a pↄw: “Kule! A ƴɛr-birʼãa fʋ na ƴɛr ɩnɛ, a kↄ̃tↄn yi na ɩ̃ bar ʋ.”
41007030	Ʋ lɩɛbʼã kul a yir nyɛ a bie ʋ gã, a kↄ̃tↄn yi ɩ̃ cɛ ʋ bar.
41007031	A Jeeju yi na a Tɩɩr wɩɛr ɩ̃ wa tↄlʼɩ̃ a Sɩdↄ̃ loor ɩ̃ cen na ta a Galile manɩ̃, a Ten Pie tẽ-daa pʋↄ.
41007032	Nɩbɛ wa nɩ na wõw na maa bↄ̃w tʋↄ ƴɛr ƴɛrɩ̃ wa a Jeeju sɛ̃, ɩ̃ sʋↄr ʋ a ʋ dↄↄl ʋ a nuu, ʋ kpɛmɛ.
41007033	A lɛ, ʋ taw ʋ na jãa nɩ a nɩbɛ, bala ba tɛw ayi, ɩ̃ na ʋ de a ʋ nubie su a wõw to-vɛ̃ɛ pʋʋr, ɩ̃ mɩ pʋʋr a natɛɛr ƴↄ̃w a ʋ nubir pʋↄ sɩɩrʼɩ̃ a ʋ dɛlɩ̃bir,
41007034	ɩ̃ dʋↄ Ꞌwuor a saꞋlon ɩ̃ hʋʋn yelʼɩ̃ a wõw: “Ɛfata,” a lɛ yelʼã: “Yuo!”
41007035	A jie naan, a daba tobo yuo na, a dɛlɩ̃bir Ꞌlaw ʋ, ʋ ma ƴɛr a ƴɛrɩ̃ vɩlaa yele.
41007036	A Jeeju kpãkpan ba a ba taa wa yele bom kʋrↄ nɩrɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛ ʋ na mɩ kpãkpana ba, a lɛ ba mɩ hiere pↄwrↄ a wɩɛr,
41007037	a nↄɛ nyɩrɩ̃ ko a nɩbɛ a ba yele: “Yel-vɛlɛ nɩ̃ɛ tɛw ʋ ma maala! Ʋ ma maalʼã a won a ba wono, ɩ̃ ma mɩ maal a nↄ-mu deme a ba lɛ ƴɛrɛ.”
41008001	A bibie ala pʋↄ, nɩ-yaw lɛ bↄ̃w na kpaarɩ̃ taa a Jeeju sɛ̃ go, ɩ̃ a bom ma dãa be be a ba dɩrɛ wa, a Jeeju bʋↄl a ʋ par-tuurbe ɩ̃ yel ba:
41008002	“Nãw nyↄw ma na a nɩbɛ basɩmɛ ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ bibie ata nɩ a dɩnaa ba na maal a ka a ɩ̃ sɛ̃, ɩ̃ a dɩb ma cãa be a ba dɩrɛ wa.
41008003	Maa wɛl ba bar a ba kule nɩ a kↄ̃ a lɛ, ba na faa na lo a sↄr juu, a-na-ɩ a ŋmɛɛ a ba sↄ̃w yi na nɩdaa.”
41008004	A ʋ par-tuurbe soor ʋ: “Nyɩnɛ nɩrɛ na pↄw a buru ka a wɛkarʼãa pʋↄ, kʋ a nɩ-yaw basɩmɛ a ba wa Ꞌwↄb pi?”
41008005	A Jeeju lɛ soor ba: “Bur-bie amɩnɛ nyɩ tɛrɛ?” A ba yel ʋ: “Anuu-nʼayi ʋ.”
41008006	A lɛ, a Jeeju ɩ na a nɩbɛ a ba jɛ, ɩ̃ ʋ de a bur-bie anuu-nʼayi puor a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w, ɩ̃ nyↄw ŋma ŋma kʋ a ʋ par-tuurbe a ba de po a nɩbɛ, a ba de po ba.
41008007	Ba mɩ dãa na tɛrɛ jɩ̃-bie fɩ̃ɩ, ʋ puor a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w, ɩ̃ yel a ʋ par-tuurbe a ba mɩ de po a nɩbɛ,
41008008	a ba Ꞌwↄb pi ɩ̃ cãa cɛ bõ-ŋmara a ba woor sɛɛr pɩɩr anuu-nʼayi.
41008009	A bala na Ꞌwↄb a buru ala tara na nɩbɛ ture anaan. A ala ɩ̃ baar, a Jeeju pãa na wɛl ba bar,
41008010	ɩ̃ kpɛ a gbor pʋↄ, ʋlↄ nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe, cere a Damanuta wɩɛr.
41008011	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ ta na ɩ̃ nyↄw nɩ a Jeeju a cɩɩrɩ̃fʋ, bʋↄrↄ ba jʋʋr ʋ bↄ̃w a ʋ tɛw. Ba sʋↄr ʋ na a ʋ maal bom miilʼɩ̃ ba, a ba bↄ̃w ka a ʋ fãw yi na a Naaŋmɩn jie.
41008012	A Jeeju hʋʋn a ʋ suur pʋↄ ɩ̃ yel: “Bõ ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a dɩnaa nɩbɛ a ba bʋↄrↄ bõ-miilaa? Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ: bõ-miilaa ma be na maal a ba nyɛ wa”,
41008013	ɩ̃ na ʋ bar ba a be, ɩ̃ lɛ kpɛ a gbor pʋↄ gãwna a man gaan.
41008014	A Jeeju par-tuurbe dãa na hiin a bõ-dɩraa defʋ. Bur-bir bõ-ƴen tɛw ba dãa tɛrɛ a be a gbor pʋↄ.
41008015	A Jeeju kpãkpan ba yel ba: “Nyɩ́ bↄ̃w yuo mimie ɩ̃ tɛrɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ nɩ a Ɛrↄdɩ tabɩr ɩnɛ.”
41008016	A ʋ par-tuurbe lɩɛb yele taa a ba nɩ̃ɛ: “A buru sɩ na ma tɛrɛ wa, ala ɩnɛ ʋ ƴɛrɛ a lɛ.”
41008017	A Jeeju bↄ̃wnaa ɩ̃ soor ba: “Bõ ɩnɛ nyɩ ƴɛrɛ taa áa buru nyɩ na ma tɛrɛ ʋ wa? Mɩnɛ! Nyaa bↄ̃w a par sɛr wa? Aa caarɩ̃ nyɩ sɛr wa? A yɛ̃ ɓↄr nyɩ na mɩɩ?
41008018	-
41008019	Mɩnɛ nyɩ tɛrɛ a mimie ɩ̃ ma nyɛrɛ wa? Nɩ a tobo ɩ̃ ma wono wa? Nyaa lɛ cãa bↄ̃w nɩ a daar ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na de a bur-bie anuu ŋma ŋma kʋ a dabsɩ ture anuu wa? Pɩɩr amɩnɛ nyɩ woor a bõ-ŋmara sɛɛr?” A ba yel ʋ: “Pɩɩr pie-nʼayi ʋ.”
41008020	“Ɩ̃ a daar ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na ŋma ŋma a bur-bie anuu-nʼayi kʋ a nɩbɛ ture anaan, pɩɩr amɩnɛ nyɩ woor a bõ-ŋmara sɛɛr?” A ba yel ʋ: “ Pɩɩr anuu-nʼayi ʋ.”
41008021	A Jeeju yel a ʋ par-tuurbe: “Lɛ ʋ, ɩ̃ a nyaa cãa bↄ̃w a par sɛr wa?”
41008022	Ba ta na a Bɛsada-tẽw pʋↄ a ba wɩ nɩ jↄ̃w a Jeeju sɛ̃, ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ ʋ a ʋ sɩɩr ʋ.
41008023	A Jeeju nyↄw na a jↄ̃w nuu taw ʋ yi nɩ a tẽw pʋↄ, ɩ̃ pʋʋr a natɛɛr ƴↄ̃w ʋ a mimie pʋↄ. A ala ɩ̃ baar, ʋ dↄↄl ʋ na a nur ɩ̃ soor ʋ, á ʋ nyɛ na bom mɩɩ?
41008024	A jↄ̃w caarɩ̃ a mimie ɩ̃ yel: “Ɩ̃ nyɛ na nɩbɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ tɩɩr kaarɩ̃ ba wↄ̃, ɩ̃ cere.”
41008025	A Jeeju lɛ bↄ̃w sɩɩr ʋ a mimie, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a jↄ̃w na Ꞌwuor a kir-kir-kir, a mimie yuo ʋ na, ʋ nyɛ a yele a jaa gbelẽgbelẽ.
41008026	A Jeeju ƴↄ̃w a ʋ kul a ʋ yir, ɩ̃ yel ʋ á ʋ taa kpɛɛrɛ a tẽw pʋↄ wa.
41008027	A Jeeju cenʼɩ̃ na a ʋ par-tuurbe a tẽ-bil ala na be a Fɩlɩpɩ-Sejare wɩɛr pʋↄ. A mɩnɛ ba na de a sↄr cere, ʋ sooro na a ʋ par-tuurbe: “Ala ʋlↄ a nɩbɛ ma de ma ɩ̃ ɩ?”
41008028	A ba yel ʋ: “A ŋmɛɛ ma yelʼã á Jã-Batii fʋ ɩ, a ŋmɛɛ ma lɛ yel, á Eli fʋ ɩ, a ŋmɛɛ go, á ƴɛr-hiere ƴen sʋbↄ fʋ ɩ.”
41008029	A Jeeju soor ba: “Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, ala ʋlↄ tↄr nyɩ de ma ɩ̃ ɩ?” A Pɩɛr yel ʋ: “Fʋ ɩ na a Kirisi.”
41008030	A be jie, a Jeeju bↄ̃w kpãkpan ba ɩ̃ yel a ba taa wa diere a ʋ yel, na ƴɛrɛ kʋrↄ nɩrɛ wa.
41008031	A ala ɩ̃ baar, a Jeeju nyↄw na ɩ̃ jaana a ʋ par-tuurbe áa sɛw na a Nɩbɛ Bie na nyɛ a won yaw a bɛlɩ̃, áa ni-dierbe nɩ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ na jɛ ʋ na bar, á ba na kú ʋ na, ɩ̃ a lɛ a bibie ata na tↄl baar á ʋ na irʼã a kũu pʋↄ.
41008032	Cãa pʋↄ ʋ dãa mana ba a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ a lɛ. A be juumɩ, a Pɩɛr bʋↄl ʋ, yi nɩ cɛ̃cɛ̃w, nyↄw ʋ fule.
41008033	A Jeeju ŋmelĩ Ꞌwuor a ʋ par-tuurbe, ɩ̃ tan a Pɩɛr ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Taw yi ka a ɩ̃ nii-sↄw Satã! A-na-ɩ faa tɩɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn kaarɩ̃ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ nɩrɛ kaarɩ̃ fʋ tɩɛrɛ.”
41008034	A Jeeju bʋↄlʼã a nɩbɛ nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe a ba wɩ a ʋ jie ʋ yel ba: “A ala ɩ nɩrɛ bʋↄrↄ na ʋ tuure ma, ú jɛ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ bar, ɩ̃ na ʋ tuo a ʋ nɩ-kʋ-daa tuure nɩ ma.
41008035	A nɩrɛ lɛ na bʋↄrↄ ʋ faa a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ, a ʋ baafʋ na bↄrʼã; ɩ̃ a nɩrɛ lɛ na bara a ʋ baafʋ ʋ bↄrↄ a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son ɩnɛ, a ʋ baafʋ na cɩ̃ɛ na.
41008036	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a nɩrɛ pↄw na a tẽw na yele a jaa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋ baafʋ sãw, bõ a na kʋ ʋ?
41008037	Bõ a nɩrɛ na tʋↄ de tɛw nɩ a ʋ baafʋ?
41008038	A-na-ɩ a nɩrɛ lɛ na jↄ a vĩ a maa nɩ a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a dɩnaa nɩbɛ sↄ̃w na bar a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ maala a burbur, a Nɩbɛ Bie na mɩ jↄ na a vĩ a ʋ ɩnɛ, a lɛdaar ʋ nↄↄ waara a ʋ Sãa yo-yifʋ pʋↄ, nɩ a ʋ sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ na ɩ a cɛcɛ.”
41009001	Ʋ lɛ yel ba na: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a bala na be a ka, a ŋmɛɛ na nyɛ na a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na diere a tẽw nɩ a fãw, ɩ̃ wa pãa bɩɛr kpi.”
41009002	A lɛ a bibie ayʋↄb na tↄl baar, a Jeeju taw na a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jakɩ nɩ a Jã, bala ba tɛw, cenʼɩ̃ a tã-kpɛ̃ɛ kãw juu. A be, ʋ nalɩ̃ na a ba nii-sↄw,
41009003	a ʋ cẽcene lɩɛb nyɩlɛ ƴala-ƴala-ƴala ɩ̃ pɛlɩ̃ a pɛlɩ̃fʋ bar, a mɩnɛ a cẽcen-mʋↄlↄ ma be ka a tẽw na juu tʋↄrↄ mʋↄlↄ ʋ a pɛlɛɛ a lɛ wa.
41009004	A be a Eli nɩ a Mowisi nyɩr ba, na ba ɩraa bʋrↄ nɩ a Jeeju.
41009005	A be jie, a Pɩɛr yel a Jeeju: “Jãjaana, a vɩɛlɛ na sɩ na be a ka. Sɩ na ƴↄ̃w na sɛɛr ata; a bõ-ƴen na ɩ na a fʋ ben, a kãw ɩ a Mowisi ben, ɩ̃ a bõ-ƴen ɩ a Eli ben.”
41009006	A-na-ɩ a pʋlɩ̃nyɛ dãa na vʋ̃ↄ ba, ʋlↄ nɩ a ʋ tↄ deme, Ꞌwaa bↄ̃w a ala na sɛw ʋ yel wa.
41009007	Dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃ma suu na pↄw ba, ɩ̃ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ yi na be a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃ma pʋↄ yele: “A ɩ̃ Bi-nʋnaa nɩ a naa. Nyɩ́ cɛlɛ ʋ.”
41009008	A jie naan, a Jeeju par-tuurbe Ꞌwuorʼã kolĩ nɩ a lõbobo a jaa, ma lɛ nyɛ nɩrɛ wa, a ala ma ɩ a Jeeju tɛw na be nɩ ba ʋ wa.
41009009	A lɛ ba na yi a tãw juu suure, a Jeeju kpãkpan ba na, a ba taa wa de a ala ba na nyɛ ƴɛrɛ kʋrↄ nɩrɛ, wa tara nɩ a daar ʋlↄ a Nɩbɛ Bie na ire a kũu pʋↄ wa.
41009010	Ba nyↄw na a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ tɛrɛ a ba pʋ̃ↄ, ɩ̃ sooro taa: “Á ʼir a kũu pʋↄꞋ, bõ a bʋↄrↄ a yel?”
41009011	Ba lɛ soor ʋ na a soorfʋ na: “Bõ ɩnɛ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ ma yel á Eli sɛw na ʋ de nĩe wa?”
41009012	Ʋ yel ba: “Eɛ ʋ! A Eli sɩrɩ̃ na sɛw ʋ de nĩe wa, gbɛɛrɩ̃ a yele a jaa baar, ɩ̃ bõ ɩnɛ a mɩ sɛb a Naaŋmin Sɛbɛ pʋↄ áa Nɩbɛ Bie na nyɛ na won yaw a bɛlɩ̃ ʋ, ɩ̃ a ba na kpɛ ʋ na?
41009013	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a Eli wa na, ɩ̃ ba maal ʋ na a mɩnɛ ba na bʋↄrↄ tu nɩ a mɩnɛ a na sɛb a Naaŋmin Sɛbɛ pʋↄ a ʋ ɩnɛ.”
41009014	A lɛ ba na tara a par-tuurbe bala na cɛ, ba nyɛ na a nɩ-yaw a ba jilĩ kolĩ ba, ɩ̃ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ iraa a ba cɩɩrɛ taa.
41009015	A mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ na nyɛ a Jeeju, a puurĩ ba na ba jaa, a ba jↄ cen a ʋ puorfʋ jie.
41009016	Ʋ soor ba: “Bõ ɩ̃ wa nɩ a cɩɩrɩ̃-taa a nyɩ sↄ̃w?”
41009017	A daba kãw iraa be a nɩbɛ sↄ̃w ɩ̃ ŋmaa yel ʋ: “Jãjaana, a ɩ̃ bi-daba kↄ̃tↄn nↄ-mu na tɛrɛ ɩ̃ wa nɩ a fʋ sɛ̃.
41009018	A jiir a jaa, a ala ɩ̃ wa ir ʋ, a ma ŋme ʋ na lↄb a tene, ʋ fure a natɛ-fube Ꞌwↄbↄ nɩ a nyɩmɛ, ɩ̃ ma tãgarɩ̃ ʋ jaa. Ɩ̃ sʋↄr a fʋ par-tuurbe a ba diw a ʋna kↄ̃tↄn bar, ɩ̃ a baa tʋↄ wa.”
41009019	A Jeeju yel ba: “A nyɩna ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩbɛ na ma tɛrɛ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa wa, ɩ̃ be nɩ nyɩ wa ta nɩ dabor? Ɩ̃ dɩ nɩ nyɩ a tuo wa ta nɩ dabor? Nyɩ́ taw a bile wa nɩ ka”,
41009020	a ba taw ʋ wa nɩ. A lɛ a kↄ̃tↄn na tↄ̃ↄ nyɛ a Jeeju, ʋ damʼã a bile nɩ kpɛ̃w lↄb a tene, a bile yʋↄrↄ fure nɩ a natɛ-fube.
41009021	A Jeeju soor a bile sãa: “Dabor a bom be ʋ a lɛ?” A sãa yel ʋ: “Wa nyↄw nɩ a ʋ bibile daar ʋ.
41009022	A kↄ̃tↄn lↄb ʋ na gbɛɛ amɩnɛ jaa a vũumɩ nɩ a kʋ̃ↄmɩ, bʋↄrↄ ʋ kú ʋ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ fʋ na tʋↄ na maal bom, bↄ̃w sɩ nãw ɩ̃ wa sũo sɩ bɩlɛ.”
41009023	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Bõ ɩnɛ fʋ yel, a ala ɩ fʋ na tʋↄ na? A-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa tʋↄrↄ na maala a yele a jaa.”
41009024	A be naan, a bile sãa wuurʼã yel: “Ɩ̃ tɛrɛ na ƴↄ̃w-nyãa. Wa sũo ma a jie a ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa na ɓↄr!”
41009025	A lɛ a Jeeju na nyɛ a nɩbɛ a ba kaal taa waara, ʋ mʋ̃ↄ na mimir ƴↄ̃w a kↄ̃tↄn bier ɩ̃ yel: “A fʋna kↄ̃tↄn nↄ-mu nɩ kↄ̃tↄn wõw naa, maa ɩ̃ yele fʋ, yi ɩ̃ cɛ a bile na, ɩ̃ taa wa lɛ kpɛɛrɛ ʋ go wa!”
41009026	A kↄ̃tↄn wuur ɩ̃ dam a bile nɩ kpɛ̃w ɩ̃ yi, a bile lɩɛb wↄ̃ taa nɩ kũu, a nɩbɛ bala na ɩraa a be, a ba yaw jie yele á ʋ kpi na.
41009027	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju nyↄw ʋ a nuu ɩ̃ ɩ ʋ ir, ʋ na ʋ ir ɩraa.
41009028	A lɛ a Jeeju na kul a yir, a ba be taa a bala tɛw nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe, ba soor ʋ na: “Bõ ɩnɛ saa tʋↄ diw a kↄ̃tↄn ʋlↄ bar wa?”
41009029	A Jeeju yel ba: “A ala ma ɩ a Naaŋmɩn sʋↄrfʋ pʋↄ tɛw ʋ wa, a kↄ̃tↄn par bʋrↄ na maa tʋↄ diw bar lɛ wa.”
41009030	Ba yi na a jie ʋlↄ ba na dãa be, ɩ̃ na ba tↄl gãw a Galile wɩɛr, a Ꞌwaa dãa bʋↄrↄ nɩrɛ ʋ bↄ̃w nɩ ba wa,
41009031	a-na-ɩ ʋ dãa na jaana a ʋ par-tuurbe yele nɩ ba: “Ba na nyↄw na a Nɩbɛ Bie ƴↄ̃w a nɩbɛ nuu pʋↄ, a ba kú ʋ, ɩ̃ ʋ na irʼã a kũu pʋↄ a bibie ata dayen.”
41009032	A ʋ parturbe ma dãa bↄ̃w a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ par wa, ɩ̃ baa Ꞌla soor ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa.
41009033	Ba cenʼã na ta a Kapɛɛnam; a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na kpɛ a die pʋↄ baar, ʋ soorʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe: “Yɛr-bõ nyɩ dãa guoro taa be a sↄr juu?”
41009034	Aba ŋma vʋʋrɩ̃sɩ, a-na-ɩ a be a sↄr juu, ba dãa na guoro taa, bʋↄrↄ ba bↄ̃w a ʋlↄ na ɩ a nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ a ba sↄ̃w.
41009035	A be jie, a Jeeju jɛ ɩ̃ bʋↄl a ʋ par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi, a ba wa ʋ yel ba: “A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ bʋↄrↄ na ʋ ɩ a ni-diere, ʋ sɛw na ʋ ɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa par-pↄↄrↄ nɩ a ba tʋ̃tʋnↄ.”
41009036	Ɩ̃ ʋ taw na bibile wa nɩ ƴↄ̃w a ba sↄ̃w, ɩ̃ na ʋ worĩ ʋ ɩ̃ yel:
41009037	“A nɩrɛ lɛ na sↄw de a bibi-bil basɩmɛ ƴen sʋbↄ a maa ɩnɛ, a maa mɩ̃ɛ ʋ sↄw de, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na sↄw de ma, aa ɩ a maa tɛw ʋ sↄw de wa, ɩ̃ ʋ mɩ sↄw na de a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma.”
41009038	A Jã yelʼã a Jeeju: “Jãjaana, sɩ nyɛ na nɩrɛ kãw ʋ de a fʋ yuor diwre nɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ, a sɩ dãa bʋↄrↄ sɩ pɩɛrɩ̃ ʋ bar, a-na-ɩ Ꞌwaa be a sɩ pʋↄ wa.”
41009039	A Jeeju yel: “Nyɩ taa pɩɛrɛ ʋ bara wa. A-na-ɩ nɩrɛ ma tʋↄrↄ diere a ɩ̃ yuor tʋnↄ nɩ nↄ-kofʋ tʋn, ɩ̃ lɛ lɩɛbɛ a be a jie naan bʋↄlↄ a ɩ̃ yo-fãa wa.
41009040	A-na-ɩ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na maa jaar a sɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa, sɩ nɩrɛ ʋ ɩ.
41009041	Ɩ̃ a nɩrɛ lɛ na Ꞌwↄ̃wnↄ kʋ̃ↄ kʋrↄ nyɩ a nyɩ nyuure, a-na-ɩ a Kirisi ɩ̃ sↄ nyɩ, yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, ʋ nↄↄ pↄw na a ʋ yar.
41009042	“A nɛ-kpɛ̃ɛ ba na luure yara a nɩrɛ nyɩɩmɩ ɩ̃ lↄbↄ ʋ ƴↄnↄ a man kʋ̃ↄmɩ, a na sa ʋ na, ʋ na wa maala a bibi-bil basɩmɛ na sↄw de ma ƴen sʋbↄ, ʋ kpɛɛrɛ a tule pʋↄ.
41009043	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a fʋ nuu ɩ na bom na maala fʋ a fʋ kpɛɛrɛ a tule pʋↄ, fú ŋmaa ʋ bar. Fʋ̃ʋ kpɛ a baafʋ pʋↄ nɩ a nu-gãw, a sa na fʋ na tɛrɛɛ a nur a jaa ayi, ɩ̃ na fʋ cere a wɛfʋ vũu pʋↄ na ma be a kpiinfʋ wa, [
41009044	a jie ʋlↄ a jãjule bala na vʋrↄ ba, na ma be kũu jie wa, ɩ̃ a vũu ma mɩ be kpiinfʋ wa.]
41009045	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a fʋ gbɛr ɩ̃ maala fʋ a fʋ kpɛɛrɛ a tule pʋↄ, fú ŋmaa ʋ bar. Fʋ̃ʋ kpɛ a baafʋ pʋↄ nɩ gbɛr gãw, a sa na fʋ na tɛrɛɛ a gbɛɛ a jaa ayi ɩ̃ na fʋ cere a wɛfʋ vũu pʋↄ, [
41009046	a jie ʋlↄ a jãjule bala na vʋrↄ ba, na ma be kũu jie wa, ɩ̃ a vũu ma mɩ be kpiinfʋ wa.]
41009047	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a fʋ mimir ɩ̃ mɩ maala fʋ a fʋ kpɛɛrɛ a tule pʋↄ, fʋ Ꞌlow ʋ bar. Fʋ̃ʋ kpɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw tẽw pʋↄ nɩ mimir gãw, a sa na fʋ na tɛrɛɛ a mimie a jaa ayi ɩ̃ cere a wɛfʋ vũu pʋↄ,
41009048	a jie ʋlↄ a jãjule bala na vʋrↄ ba, na ma be kũu jie wa, ɩ̃ a vũu ma mɩ be kpiinfʋ wa.
41009049	A-na-ɩ a vũu na maalʼã a nɩbɛ ba jaa a ba tɛrɛ a nasõ nʋ̃ↄ.
41009050	“A nasõ ɩ na bõ-son. Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a ʋ nʋ̃ↄ yi na, mɩnɛ fʋ na maal ʋ, ʋ lɛ bↄ̃w nʋmↄ? Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ nasõ a nyɩ pʋ̃ↄ, nyɩ́ bↄ̃w nyↄw taa bõ-ƴene-ƴene.”
41010001	A Jeeju yi na a be ɩ̃ cen a Jude wɩɛr na ʋ tↄl gãw a Jʋrdɛ̃ man gaan, a nɩ-yaw lɛ bↄ̃w tiw taa a ʋ sɛ̃, ʋ nyↄw ɩ̃ jaana ba a mɩnɛ ʋ na mɩlɩ̃ nɩ.
41010002	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ taw ta ʋ, bʋↄrↄ ba jʋʋr ʋ, bↄ̃w a ʋ tɛw, ɩ̃ na ba soor ʋ, á sↄr be na be a daba na diw a ʋ pↄw bar mɩɩ?
41010003	Ʋ mɩ lɩɛb soor ba: “Bõ a Mowisi ƴↄ̃w a nyɩ maal?”
41010004	A ba yel: “A Mowisi kʋ sɩ na a sↄr a sɩ na sɛb kul-taa ŋmafʋ sɛbɛ kʋ a sɩ pↄw ɩ̃ bar ʋ.”
41010005	A be jie, a Jeeju yel ba: “Á nyɩ sube kpɛmɛfʋ ɩnɛ a Mowisi ƴↄ̃w a nyɩ maala a lɛ.
41010006	A ala ma ɩ lɛ ʋ wa, a tẽw nyↄwfʋ daar, a Naaŋmɩn irʼã a daba nɩ a pↄw.
41010007	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a daba na yi na a ʋ sãa nɩ a ʋ mã nuumɩ na ʋ mar taa nɩ a ʋ pↄw,
41010008	a ba jaa ayi ɓã taa lɩɛb ɩ ɩ̃gan bõ-ƴen. A lɛ, baa lɛ cãa ɩ nɩbɛ ayi wa, ɩ̃gan bõ-ƴen ba lɩɛb ɩ.
41010009	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, nɩrɛ ʋ taa wa ŋma a ala a Naaŋmɩn na ɓã taa wa.”
41010010	A lɛ ba na lɩɛb kul a yir, a Jeeju par-tuurbe lɛ sooro ʋ na a ƴɛr-bir ʋlↄ naa,
41010011	ʋ yel ba: “Á ala ɩ̃ ɩ nɩrɛ barʼã a ʋ pↄw ɩ̃ lɛ de pↄw kpee, ʋ sãw na a kul-taa bar.
41010012	A lɛ ʋ mɩ, a ala ɩ a pↄw barʼã a ʋ sɩrɛ ɩ̃ jↄ de dab-kpee, ʋ mɩ sãw na a kul-taa bar.”
41010013	A nɩbɛ taw na a bibiir wɩɛrɛ nɩ a Jeeju sɛ̃ a ʋ sɩɩr ba, ɩ̃ a par-tuurbe tana ba.
41010014	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na nyɛ a lɛ, suur nyↄw ʋ na ʋ yel a ʋ par-tuurbe: “Nyɩ́ bar a bibiir a ba wa a ɩ̃ sɛ̃. Nyɩ taa vara ba bara wa, a-na-ɩ a bala na wↄ̃ a bibiirʼã kaarɩ̃, bala ɩ̃ sↄ a Naaŋmɩn fãw.
41010015	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ʋlↄ na ma sↄw a Naaŋmɩn ʋ tɛrɛ ʋ a bibile kaarɩ̃ wa, Ꞌwaa tʋↄrↄ kpɛɛrɛ be fɩ̃ɩ wa.”
41010016	A mɩnɛ ʋ na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, ʋ de na a bibiir ƴↄ̃w a ʋ nur pʋↄ, ɩ̃ bʋↄlↄ a ʋ Sãa sũofʋ ƴↄnↄ ba, dↄↄlↄ nɩ ba a ʋ nur.
41010017	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na de a sↄr cere, a daba jↄ na wɩ na lo gburĩ a dume a ʋ nii-sↄw ɩ̃ soor ʋ: “Jãjaan-son! Bõ ɩ̃ na maal wa pↄw a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw?”
41010018	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a fʋ bʋↄl ma a nɩ-son? Nɩ-son ma be ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Naaŋmɩn tɛw ʋ wa.
41010019	Fʋ bↄ̃w na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn: ʻTaa wa kúrↄ nɩrɛ wa; taa wa bʋↄrↄ pↄw kpee wa; taa wa jure wa; taa wa ŋmara jir-kara ƴↄnↄ nɩrɛ wa; taa wa bɛlɛ nɩrɛ bom diere wa; jↄrↄ a fʋ sãa nɩ a fʋ mã.ʼ ”
41010020	A daba yel ʋ: “Jãjaana, ɩ̃ maalʼã a ana ƴɛr-kpɛn a jaa, a ɩ̃ bibile daar wa ta nɩ a dɩnaa.”
41010021	A Jeeju Ꞌwuor ʋ nɩ nʋfʋ, ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Bom bõ-ƴen cɛ fʋ na. Cen na da a fʋ yele a jaa fʋ na tɛrɛ, de a libie po a nãw deme, ɩ̃ fʋ na pↄw na a na-yele a Naaŋmɩn tẽw, ɩ̃ na fʋ wa tuure ma.”
41010022	Ɩ̃ a lɛ a daba na wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃, ʋ sãw na nii-sↄw ɩ̃ tɩɛrɛ kule nɩ, a-na-ɩ ʋ sɩrɩ̃ na le.
41010023	A Jeeju Ꞌwuorʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe na tiw kolĩ ʋ, ɩ̃ yel ba áa kpɛmɛ na a nɩ-leraa na kpɛɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ.
41010024	A ʋ par-tuurbe nↄɛ ko ba a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ a Jeeju lɛ yel ba: “Ɩ̃ bibiir! A Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ kpɛfʋ kpɛmɛ na ma ɩ wa.
41010025	A yↄw na a nyʋↄmɩ na kpɛɛrɛ a mɩsɩn bↄw pʋↄ gãw a naaba na kpɛɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ”,
41010026	a kpal a par-tuurbe nↄɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ ɩnɛ, a ba sooro taa: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ lɛ ʋ, ala ɩ̃ na tʋↄ pↄw a faafʋ?”
41010027	A Jeeju Ꞌwuor ba ɩ̃ yel: “A gãw na a nɩbɛ tʋↄfʋ; ɩ̃-cɛ aa gãw a Naaŋmɩn tʋↄfʋ wa, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn tʋↄ na a yele a jaa.”
41010028	A Pɩɛr yel ʋ: “ꞋWuor nyɛ a sɩmɩ, sɩ barʼã a yele a jaa ɩ̃ tuure fʋ.”
41010029	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩrɛ barʼã a ʋ yir, mɩɩ a ʋ yɛɛr, nɩ a ʋ yɛ-pↄↄbↄ, nɩ a ʋ mã, nɩ a ʋ sãa, nɩ a ʋ bibiir, nɩ a ʋ por a maa ɩnɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-son ɩnɛ,
41010030	ʋ na pↄw na a dↄↄlaa gbɛɛ kʋbaa, a daarʼã pʋↄ sɩ na be a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃; ʋ na pↄw na a yie, nɩ a yɛɛr, nɩ a yɛ-pↄↄbↄ, nɩ a mã nʋmↄ, nɩ a bibiir, nɩ a por, ɓã taa nɩ a hʋↄlfʋ mɩ. Ɩ̃ a daar ʋlↄ na be a puo-sↄw waara, ʋ na pↄw na a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw.
41010031	Ɩ̃ a yaw jie na ɩ a ni-dierbe nↄↄ ɩ na a par-pↄↄrbↄ, ɩ̃ a bala na ɩ a par-pↄↄrbↄ nↄↄ lɩɛbʼã ɩ a ni-dierbe.”
41010032	Ba be na a sↄr juu cere a Jerujalɛm, a Jeeju de nĩe a ba tuure. A nↄɛ ko a ʋ par-tuurbe, ɩ̃ a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw a bala na dãa bɩɛrɛ tuure ba. A Jeeju lɛ bↄ̃w kpaarɩ̃ a ʋ par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi a ʋ pulẽe, ɩ̃ nyↄw ɩ̃ mana ba a ala na wa tara ʋ.
41010033	Ʋ yele ba na: “Nyɩ́ nyɛ, sɩ cere na a Jerujalɛm. A be, ba na nyↄw na a Nɩbɛ Bie ƴↄ̃w a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nuu pʋↄ. Ba na ƴↄ̃w ʋ na a yel ɩ̃ de ʋ kʋ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ
41010034	a ba la ʋ pʋʋrʼɩ̃ a natɛɛr ƴↄ̃w ʋ, ɩ̃ fↄbʼɩ̃ ʋ a kpaara, ɩ̃ cɛ ʋ, na ba kú. Ɩ̃ a bibie ata dayen ʋ na irʼã a kũu pʋↄ.”
41010035	A Jebede bi-dabsɩ Jakɩ nɩ a Jã wɩ na a Jeeju sɛ̃ na yel ʋ: “Jãjaana! Bom be na be sɩ na bʋↄrↄ sɩ sʋↄr fʋ a fʋ maal kʋ sɩ.”
41010036	A Jeeju soor ba: “Bõ nyɩ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ maal kʋ nyɩ?”
41010037	A ba yel ʋ: “Sɩ bʋↄrↄ na a fʋ̃ʋ wa jɛ a naa-dakↄw juu a fʋ yo-yifʋ daar, a sɩmɩ ayi, bõ-ƴen ʋ jɛ a fʋ dʋrɩ̃ loor ɩ̃ a kãw mɩ jɛ a fʋ gʋbaa loor.”
41010038	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyaa bↄ̃w a ala nyɩ na sʋↄrↄ wa. Nyɩ na tʋↄ na nyu nɩ a ŋman tuo ʋlↄ ɩ̃ nↄↄ nyuure nɩ, mɩɩ nyɩ na mɩ tʋↄ na kpɛ a tuo dɩfʋ pʋↄ ɩ̃ nↄↄ kpɛɛrɛ a kʋ̃ↄ mʋrfʋ kaarɩ̃?”
41010039	A ba yel ʋ: “Sɩ na tʋↄ na.” A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ na sɩrɩ̃ na nyu nɩ a ŋman ʋlↄ ɩ̃ nↄↄ nyuure nɩ, ɩ̃ mɩ mʋrↄ a kʋ̃ↄ mʋrfʋ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ nↄↄ mʋrↄ,
41010040	ɩ̃-cɛ, a ɩ̃ dʋrɩ̃ loor jɛfʋ, nɩ a ɩ̃ gʋbaa loor jɛfʋ, aa ɩ a ɩ̃ jie a ala yire wa, ɩ̃ a na ɩ na a bala ɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na dãa gbɛɛrɩ̃.”
41010041	A mɩnɛ a par-tuurbe pie na wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃, ba nyɛ na suur ƴↄ̃w a Jakɩ nɩ a Jã.
41010042	A Jeeju bʋↄl ba a ba wɩ, ʋ yel ba: “Nyɩ bↄ̃w ka a bala ba na bʋↄlↄ a jamansɩ a tẽ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ pʋʋr ma fɛrɛ na a ba nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ a ten nɩ-bɛrɛ ma fule ba na.
41010043	Aa ɩ lɛ a be a nyɩ jie wa. A ʋlↄ na bʋↄrↄ ʋ ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ a nyɩ sↄ̃w, ú ɛ̃ɛ ɩ a nyɩ tʋ̃tʋnↄ,
41010044	ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na bʋↄrↄ ʋ ɩ a ni-diere a nyɩ sↄ̃w, ú ɩ a nyɩ jaa gbãgbaa.
41010045	A-na-ɩ a Nɩbɛ Bie mɩ̃ɛ ma wa a nɩbɛ na tʋnↄ kʋrↄ ʋ wa, ɩ̃ ʋ wa na tʋnↄ kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ na ʋ tɩɩr a ʋ baafʋ tɛw nɩ a nɩ-yaw baafʋ.”
41010046	A Jeeju ta na a Jeriko, ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na yire a ʋna tẽw pʋↄ nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe nɩ a nɩ-yaw, a jↄ̃w ba na bʋↄlↄ Batime (a lɛ yelʼã, a Time bie ʋ) jɛ na be a sↄr nʋↄr sʋↄrↄ a yele.
41010047	A mɩnɛ ʋ na wõ áa Najarɛtɩ Jeeju ɩ̃ waara, ʋ nyↄw na ɩ̃ wuure: “Davɩtɩ Bie Jeeju yaa, bↄ̃w ma nãw!”
41010048	Ɩ̃ a nɩbɛ yaw jie tana ʋ na a ʋ sine; ʋ pãa lɛ bↄ̃w nyɩrɩ̃ wuurʼɩ̃ kpɛ̃w: “Davɩtɩ Bie, bↄ̃w ma nãw!”
41010049	A Jeeju ɩraa ɩ̃ yel: “Nyɩ́ bʋↄl ʋ,” a ba bʋↄl a jↄ̃w ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “ʻBãa suur ɩ̃ ir. Ʋ bʋↄlↄ fʋ na,”
41010050	ʋ lↄb a ʋ cẽcen bar ɩ̃ aw ir wɩɛrɛ a Jeeju sɛ̃,
41010051	a Jeeju soor ʋ: “Bõ fʋ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ maal fʋ?” A jↄ̃w yel ʋ: “Jãjaana! Maal ma ɩ̃ lɛ nyɛrɛ.”
41010052	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Cere. A fʋ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa faa fʋ na.” A jie naan ʋ lɛ nyɛrɛ na, na ʋ pↄw a Jeeju cere nɩ.
41011001	A lɛ ba na pɩɛlɛ a Jerujalɛm na ba tara a Bɛfaje nɩ a Betani na be a Olivi-tɩɩr tãw loor, a Jeeju tʋ̃ na a ʋ par-tuurbe ayi
41011002	ɩ̃ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ cen a tẽw ʋlↄ na be a nyɩ nii-sↄw. Nyɩmɩ wa tↄ̃ↄ ta kpɛ, nyɩ na nyɛ na bʋ̃-bile kãw nɩrɛ na ma do a ʋ juu sɛr wa, a ba lũ bar. Nyɩ́ Ꞌlor ʋ wa nɩ.
41011003	A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ wa soor nyɩ na a bõ nɩ a ala nyɩ na maala a lɛ, nyɩ́ yel ʋ, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ʋ, ɩ̃ ʋ na bar nyɩ na a jie naan a nyɩ taw ʋ lɩɛb wa nɩ a ka.”
41011004	Ba cenʼã na nyɛ bʋ̃-bile a ba lũ be a yẽw pan nʋↄr a sↄr pʋↄ, a ba ta Ꞌlor.
41011005	A nɩbɛ bala na dãa be a be ŋmɛɛ soor ba na: “Bõ ɩnɛ nyɩ Ꞌloro a bʋ̃-bile?”
41011006	A ba man a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na dãa yel, a ba bar ba a ba cen.
41011007	Ba taw na a bʋ̃-bile cenʼɩ̃ a Jeeju sɛ̃, na ba yɛr a ba cẽcene dↄↄl a ʋ juu, a Jeeju do jɛ.
41011008	Nɩ-yaw yɛrʼã a ba cẽcene a sↄr juu, a ŋmɛɛ kar a vɛɛ a por pʋↄ pɩɛrɩ̃ pↄw a sↄr.
41011009	A nɩbɛ bala na dãa de a Jeeju nĩe nɩ a bala na tuure ʋ cɩlɛ na yele nɩ: “Oojana, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Naaŋmɩn ú be nɩ a ʋlↄ na waara nɩ a ʋ yuor!”
41011010	“A Naaŋmɩn ú be nɩ a jamana tẽw ʋlↄ na waara, na ɩrɛɛ a sɩ sãa-kʋmↄ Davɩtɩ ben.” “A Naaŋmɩn na be a saꞋlon iin, Oojana!”
41011011	A Jeeju cenʼã na kpɛ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ be a Jerujalɛm. Á mɩnɛ ʋ na Ꞌwuor a yele a jaa kolĩ na tuor, ʋ yi na cere a Betani nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi, a-na-ɩ a wɩɛr dãa na faa ba.
41011012	A dɩvɩɛ bio, a mɩnɛ ba na yi a Betani ɩ̃ de a sↄr cere, kↄ̃ nyↄw na a Jeeju.
41011013	Ʋ gbã na nyɛ tɩɛ kãw ba na bʋↄlↄ fɩgɩ, ʋ tɛrɛ vɛɛ, ʋ cen na Ꞌwuor a ala ɩ̃ ɩ ʋ na nyɛ na wↄmↄ a ʋ juu. Ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na taw pɩɛl a tɩɛ, va-jaala tɛw ʋ nyɛ, a-na-ɩ aa dãa ɩ a fɩgɩ wↄ̃fʋ daar wa.
41011014	Ʋ yel a fɩgɩ tɩɛ: “Aa be a nɩrɛ na lɛ Ꞌwↄb a fʋ wↄmↄ wa!” A ʋ par-tuurbe wõ a ala ʋ na yel.
41011015	Ba ta na a Jerujalɛm, a Jeeju kpɛ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, na ʋ nyↄw ɩ̃ diwre a ƴaƴabsɩ nɩ a bala na daara a yele a ƴaƴabsɩ jie a be. Ʋ cãgbalɩ̃ na a libi-tɛwrbɛ tabalsɩ lↄb, cãgbalɩ̃ nɩ a naŋmam-daarba dakↄↄr bar,
41011016	ɩ̃ ma kʋrↄ nɩrɛ sↄr ʋ na de bom tↄl yi nɩ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ wa.
41011017	Ʋ jaana na a nɩbɛ yele: “A sɛbʼã a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ a ba na bʋↄlↄ na a ɩ̃ yir a ta-ten nɩbɛ ba jaa puorfʋ yir, ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ de ʋ na maal ʋ lɩɛb ɩ nyanyube sↄↄlɩ̃fʋ jie.”
41011018	A baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ wõ na a ala ɩ̃ na ba bʋↄrↄ a mɩnɛ ba na ɩrɛ ɩ̃ kúrↄ ʋ, a-na-ɩ dãbɩ̃ɛ dãa na nyↄw ba a mɩnɛ a ʋ jaanfʋ na kpaw a nɩbɛ ba jaa nↄɛ.
41011019	A lɛ a jaanʋↄr na ta, a Jeeju nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe yi na a ʋna tẽw pʋↄ.
41011020	A mɩnɛ ba na tↄl cere a dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃, a Jeeju par-tuurbe nyɛ na a fɩgɩ tɩɛ ʋ ko wa ta nɩ a nyɩbɛ pʋↄ.
41011021	A Pɩɛr tɩɛr yuo a ala na dãa ta, ɩ̃ yel a Jeeju: “Jãjaana, Ꞌwuor nyɛ! A fɩgɩ tɩɛ ʋlↄ fʋ na pↄ ƴↄ̃w, ʋ ko na.”
41011022	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa a Naaŋmɩn jie.
41011023	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩrɛ yelʼã a tãw na á ú taw yi a ka ɩ̃ cen na lo a man kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ ma baala a ʋ suur pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃ sↄw nɩ puor a ala ʋ na yel áa maal, a na maalʼã kʋ ʋ.
41011024	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a bom jaa lɛ nyɩ na wa sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn jie, nyɩ́ sↄw nɩ puor a nyɩ de na nĩe pↄw, ɩ̃ a na maalʼã kʋ nyɩ.
41011025	Ɩ̃ a lɛ nyɩ na ir ɩraa sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn, a ala ɩ̃ ɩ nyɩ tɛrɛ na ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩ nɩrɛ, nyɩ́ de bar kʋ ʋ. A lɛ a nyɩ saa juu Sãa na mɩ de na a nyɩ cɛfʋ jiir bar kʋ nyɩ. [
41011026	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ nyaa de bar ʋ wa, a nyɩ saa juu Sãa ma mɩ diere a nyɩ cɛfʋ jiir bara kʋrↄ nyɩ wa.”]
41011027	Ba lɛ ta na a Jerujalɛm, a Jeeju kpɛ yʋↄrↄ a be a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ, a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a ni-dierbe wɩ a ʋ sɛ̃,
41011028	na soor ʋ: “Nyɩnɛ fʋ pↄw a sↄr maala nɩ a yele asɩmɛ? Ala ɩ̃ kʋ fʋ a sↄr a fʋ maala?”
41011029	A Jeeju yel ba: “Ɩ̃ na soor nyɩ na soorfʋ bõ-ƴen tɛw. Nyɩmɩ wa kʋ ma a sↄwfʋ, ɩ̃ na man nyɩ na a jie ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na pↄw a sↄr maala nɩ a yele ala.
41011030	A Jã-Batii kʋ̃ↄ mʋrfʋ, nyɩnɛ ʋ yi? A Naaŋmɩn jie ʋ, mɩɩ a nɩbɛ jie ʋ? Nyɩ́ kʋ ma a sↄwfʋ.”
41011031	A ba nyↄw ɩ̃ pɛrɛ ƴↄnↄ taa a ba nɩ̃ɛ, yele: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ sɩ yelʼã á Naaŋmɩn jie ʋ yi, ʋ na soor sɩ na á bõ ɩnɛ saa sↄw de a Jã ƴɛrɩ̃ wa?
41011032	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ sɩ yelʼã á nɩbɛ jie ʋ yi,” ba dãa na jↄrↄ a nɩbɛ dãbɩ̃ɛ, a-na-ɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa dãa na de a Jã ʋ sɩrɩ̃ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere.
41011033	A be jie, a ba yel a Jeeju: “Saa bↄ̃w wa.” A Jeeju lɩɛb yel ba: “A maa mɩ, ɩ̃ kↄ̃ mɩ yel nyɩ a jie ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na pↄw a sↄr maala nɩ a yele ala wa.”
41012001	A Jeeju de na a sʋkpar lↄbↄ kʋrↄ ba, na ʋ yele: “Daba kãw sɛlʼã dɩvɛ̃-tɩɩr a ʋ puo pʋↄ, ɩ̃ wↄw kolĩ. Ʋ mɩ lãa na tuu nɩ a tɩɩr ala wↄmↄ nɛbfʋ jie, mɛ nɩ a yel-gure jaajie, ɩ̃ pãa de kʋ a po-Ꞌwuorbo ɩ̃ yↄ cen a jie.
41012002	A lɛ a tɩ-wↄmↄ daar na ta, ʋ tʋ̃ na a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnↄ a po-Ꞌwuorbo bala jie, a ʋ cen a ba kʋ ʋ a dɩvɛ̃-tɩɩr wↄmↄ ala na ɩ a ʋ ben, ʋ wa nɩ,
41012003	ɩ̃-cɛ a ba nyↄw ʋ fↄb, ɩ̃ cɛ ʋ bar ʋ kulʼɩ̃ nu-jaala.
41012004	Ʋ lɛ tʋ̃ a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnↄ ƴen-sʋbↄ, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ mɩ, ba nar ʋ na a juu puo, ɩ̃ tʋ tʋ ʋ.
41012005	Ʋ lɛ tʋ̃ na tʋ̃tʋnↄ ƴen-sʋbↄ a ba jie go. A ʋlↄ ʋlↄ, ba kú ʋ na. Lɛ ba mɩ maal a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ yaw jie. Ba pↄbʼã a nɩŋmɛɛ ɩ̃ kú a nɩŋmɛɛ.
41012006	A bõ-ƴen cãa na be a ʋ jie na ɩ a ʋ bi-nʋnaa. Ʋ baarʼã tʋ̃ ʋ a ba jie ɩ̃ yel: ʻBa na jↄ na a ɩ̃ bie ʋlↄ.ʼ
41012007	Ɩ̃-cɛ a po-Ꞌwuorbo yele na taa: ʻNyɛ! A naa ɩ̃ ɩ a gã-diere. Nyɩ́ ɩ a sɩ kú ʋ bar, ɩ̃ de a gãw.ʼ
41012008	Ba nyↄw na a ʋ bie kú lↄb bar a puo cɛ̃cɛ̃w.”
41012009	A Jeeju soorʼã: “Bõ a dɩvɛ̃-tɩɩr nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na pãa maal? Ʋ na wa na na kú a po-Ꞌwuorbo bala bar, ɩ̃ de a puo kʋ nɩ-kpeesɩ.
41012010	Nyaa dãa Ꞌwuor a ƴɛr-birʼãa a Naaŋmin Sɛbɛ pʋↄ wa? ʻA kubir ʋlↄ a dacin-mɩɛrbɛ na dãa jaar bar, lɛ lɩɛbʼã ɩ a kubir ʋlↄ ba na de ƴↄ̃w a dacin gbɛr pʋↄ.
41012011	A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃ maal a lɛ, a sɩ na nyɛ a nyɩrɩ̃ vɩɛlɛ.ʼ ”
41012012	A mɩnɛ a Jufisɩ nɩ-bɛrɛ na bↄ̃w ka bala a Jeeju lↄbↄ nɩ a sʋkpa, ba bʋↄrↄ na sↄr a ʋ nyↄwfʋ. Ɩ̃-cɛ ba dãa na jↄ a nɩbɛ a dãbɩ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ bar ʋ ɩ̃ cen.
41012013	Ba tʋ̃ na a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ nɩ a jamana Ɛrↄdɩ nɩbɛ banʋmↄ a Jeeju sɛ̃, a ba gu ʋ nyↄw a ʋ nʋↄr ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ pʋↄ.
41012014	A ba cen na yel ʋ: “Jãjaana, sɩ bↄ̃w ka yel-mɩ̃ɛ sʋbↄ fʋ ɩ. Faa Ꞌwuoro a nɩbɛ kpee kpee wa, a-na-ɩ fʋ maa Ꞌwuor a ala a nɩrɛ na ɩ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ fʋ ma jaana na a nɩbɛ a Naaŋmɩn sↄr a yel-mɩ̃ɛ pʋↄ. Sↄr be na be a sɩ na ya a lãpo kʋ a Orom jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ mɩɩ sↄr ma be be wa? Sɩ sɛw na sɩ ma ya, mɩɩ sɩ taa ma ya wa?”
41012015	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju bↄ̃w nɩ ba a poe ayi ba na tɛrɛ, ɩ̃ yel: “Bõ ɩnɛ nyɩ bɩɩrɛ ma a lɛ? Nyɩ́ wa nɩ libi-kur kʋ ma ɩ̃ je kãa.”
41012016	Ba wa nɩ na kʋ ʋ, ʋ lɩɛb soorʼɩ̃ ba: “Ala nii-sↄw nɩ ala yuor ɩ̃ be tↄ?” A ba yel ʋ: “A Orom jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋ.”
41012017	A be jie, a Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ lɩɛb kʋ a Orom jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ a ala na ɩ a Orom jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ ben, ɩ̃ mɩ kʋ a Naaŋmɩn a ala na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ben.” A nↄɛ ko ba a ʋ ɩnɛ.
41012018	A Saduse bala na yel áa kũu-pʋↄ-irfʋ ma be be wa, a ba ŋmɛɛ wa na a Jeeju sɛ̃, ɩ̃ soor ʋ:
41012019	“Jãjaana, a Mowisi sɛbʼã a ʋ sɛbɛ pʋↄ yel sɩ, a ala ɩ a nɩrɛ kãw yɛbɛ wa kpi na ɩ̃ cɛ a ʋ pↄw bar a Ꞌwaa tɛrɛ bibiir wa, áa ʋ yɛbɛ ú de a pↄw dↄw a bibiir a ʋ yɛbɛ ʋlↄ yuor ɩnɛ.
41012020	Yɛɛr anuu-nʼayi dãa na be be, a ba kpɛ̃ɛ kulʼã pↄw ma dↄw bie wa ɩ̃ kpi,
41012021	a ʋ tuuraa de a kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄw ma mɩ dↄw bie wa ɩ̃ kpi. A lɛ a mɩ wↄ̃ nɩ a ata sʋbↄ.
41012022	A yɛɛr anuu-nʼayi bala ba jaa ma tʋↄ dↄw bie a ba yɛbɛ yuor ɩnɛ wa. Ba kpi na ba jaa, ɩ̃ a pↄw wa pãa bɩɛr kpi.
41012023	A kũusɩ irfʋ daar, bala wa ir a kũu pʋↄ, buor sʋbↄ ɩ̃ na sↄ a pↄw? A-na-ɩ a ba jaa anuu-nʼayi dãa na kul ʋ.”
41012024	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ bↄrʼã. Bõ ɩnɛ? A-na-ɩ nyaa bↄ̃w a Naaŋmin Sɛbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ par nɩ a Naaŋmɩn tʋↄfʋ wa.
41012025	A lɛdaar ba na ire a kũu pʋↄ, a dabsɩ nɩ a pↄↄbↄ ma lɛ kule taa wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ba na wↄ̃ na a saa juu sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ kaarɩ̃.
41012026	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a kũusɩ irfʋ ʋ, nyaa Ꞌwuor a Mowisi sɛbɛ pʋↄ a jie ʋlↄ na mana a Tɩ-bile a vũu na Ꞌlere ƴɛrɩ̃, a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na yel a Mowisi wa? ʻMaa ɩ̃ ɩ a Abʋraham nɩ a Ɩjakɩ nɩ a Jakↄb Naaŋmɩn.ʼ
41012027	ꞋWaa ɩ kũusɩ Naaŋmɩn wa, nɩ-mimie Naaŋmɩn ʋ ɩ. Nyɩ tɩɩ na nyɩrɩ̃ bↄr.”
41012028	A ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄ̃wnↄ kãw dãa na wõ a mɩnɛ ba na cɩɩrɛ taa, ɩ̃ mɩ nyɛ a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na tɩɩr a sↄwfʋ nɩ yɛ̃, ɩ̃ na ʋ taw ta ʋ ɩ̃ soor: “A ƴɛr-kpɛn a jaa pʋↄ, buor ɩ̃ ɩ a bõ-kpɛ̃ɛ?”
41012029	A Jeeju yel: “A ʋlↄ na ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ na: ʻlsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ, nyɩ́ cɛlɛ! A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na ɩ a sɩ Naaŋmɩn, ʋlↄ ʋ yẽ tɛw ɩ̃ ɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ.
41012030	Nʋnↄ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na ɩ a fʋ Naaŋmɩn nɩ a fʋ suur ʋ jaa, nɩ a fʋ pʋↄ ʋ jaa, nɩ a fʋ tɩɛrʋ̃ ʋ jaa, nɩ a fʋ fãgã ʋ jaa.ʼ
41012031	Nyɛ a ʋlↄ na tuure: ʻNʋnↄ a fʋ tↄ sʋbↄ a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ kaarɩ̃.ʼ Yɛr-kpɛ̃w ma be be na lɛ gãw a ƴɛr-kpɛn asɩmɛ wa.”
41012032	A ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄ̃wnↄ yel ʋ: “Jãjaana, a vɩɛlɛ na. Yel-mɩ̃ɛ fʋ yel áa Naaŋmɩn ɩ na bõ-ƴen tẽtẽ, á Naaŋmɩn kpee ma be ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a ʋlↄ tɛw ʋ wa.
41012033	A Naaŋmɩn fʋ na nʋnↄ nɩ a fʋ suur ʋ jaa, nɩ a fʋ tɩɛrʋ̃ ʋ jaa, nɩ a fʋ fãgã ʋ jaa, nɩ a fʋ tↄ sʋbↄ fʋ na nʋnↄ a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ kaarɩ̃, a ala gãw na a dʋn ba jaa fʋ na ma kú lo nɩ a baar, kʋ a Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃ su a vũu a dɩ, nɩ a baar-lo-yele a jaa.”
41012034	A Jeeju nyɛ na a mɩnɛ ʋ na ƴɛrʼɩ̃ a kpaarfʋ ɩ̃ yel ʋ á Ꞌwaa jãa nɩ a Naaŋmɩn fãw wa. A ala na yi tↄ, nɩrɛ ma lɛ Ꞌla soor ʋ soorfʋ wa.
41012035	A Jeeju nyↄw na ɩ̃ jaana a nɩbɛ be a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ yele: “Mɩnɛ ɩ̃ ɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ ma yel áa Davɩtɩ bie a Kirisi ɩ?
41012036	A Davɩtɩ mɩ̃ɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ dãa tↄw ʋ yel: ʻA Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Naaŋmɩn yelʼã a ɩ̃ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ: Jɛ a ɩ̃ dʋrɩ̃ loor wa ta nɩ a daar ʋlↄ ɩ̃ nↄↄ ƴↄnↄ a fʋ sama-deme a fʋ pulẽe.ʼ
41012037	A Davɩtɩ mɩ̃ɛ bʋↄlↄ ʋ na a ʋ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ. Mɩnɛ ʋ na lɛ tʋↄ ɩ a ʋ bie?” A nɩ-yaw cɛlɛ na a Jeeju ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a nʋmↄ ba.
41012038	Ʋ mɩ dãa na jaana ba yele: “Nyɩ́ gu nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ ɩnɛ, na ma su a cẽcẽ-bɛrɛ yʋↄrↄ nɩ, bʋↄrↄ nɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa ba puoro ba a dar pʋↄ.
41012039	Ba nʋ na a nii-sↄw jaajiir a ba puorfʋ yie pʋʋr, mɩ nʋ nɩ a nɩ-bɛrɛ dakↄↄr jur jɩnaafʋ a fɛtɩsɩ jie.
41012040	Bala ɩ̃ ma bɛlɛ a kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄↄbↄ yele fara dɩrɛ, ɩ̃ ma bↄ̃w nɩ sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn kamʼɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ a nɩbɛ ba Ꞌwuoro ba. Yɛrɩ̃ na dↄↄlʼã a ba juumɩ, bɛrmɛ.”
41012041	A Jeeju jɩnaa na a libie ƴↄ̃wfʋ jie par, ɩ̃ Ꞌwuoro a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ na waara nɩ a libie ƴↄnↄ. A tɛraa deme yaw jie ƴↄnↄ na libie yayaw.
41012042	Kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄw, na nyɛrɛ nãw, wɩ na ƴↄ̃w libi-kure ayi na wↄ̃ tama ayi kaarɩ̃, na ma tara warbir wa.
41012043	A Jeeju bʋↄl a ʋ par-tuurbe na ʋ yel ba: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄw na na nyɛrɛ a nãw, ƴↄ̃w na gãw a bala ba jaa na ƴↄnↄ a libie a libie ƴↄ̃wfʋ jie.
41012044	A-na-ɩ a bala ba jaa, a ala ba na dɩ ɩ̃ cɛ ba ƴↄ̃w, ɩ̃-cɛ a pↄw ʋlↄ nɩ a ʋ nãw jaa, ʋ ƴↄ̃w na a ala a jaa ʋ na dãa tɛrɛ bin, gu nɩ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ.”
41013001	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na yi a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ cere, a ʋ par-tuure kãw yel ʋ na: “Jãjaana, Ꞌwuor nyɛ kʋsɩ-vɛlɛ ka tↄr! Fʋ nyɛ ma na yi-vɛlɛ ka tↄr!”
41013002	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Má fʋ nyɛ na a yi-bɛrɛ asɩmɛ! Kʋsɩr kãw kↄ̃ lↄↄ tʋↄ dↄↄl ɩraa a ʋ tↄ sʋbↄ juu wa. A na wɛlʼã a jaa.”
41013003	A Jeeju do na jɛ a Olivi-tɩɩr tãw juu na tor a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ, a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jakɩ, nɩ a Jã, nɩ a Ádire wɩ a bala ba tɛw na sooro ʋ:
41013004	“Yel sɩ a dabor a yele ala nↄↄ tara, nɩ a bom ʋlↄ na miile áa yele ala a jaa maala na baara.”
41013005	A Jeeju nyↄw na ɩ̃ yele ba: “Nyɩ́ gu nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a nɩrɛ kↄ̃ wa bɛlɩ̃ nyɩ wa.
41013006	Nɩbɛ yaw jie na de na a ɩ̃ yuor wa nɩ na ba yele a bala ɩ̃ ɩ a Kirisi, ɩ̃ ba na bɛlɩ̃ na a nɩbɛ yaw pↄw.
41013007	A daar ʋlↄ nyɩ nↄↄ wono a jɛb ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ nɩ a tẽ-nɩdar damfʋ, nyɩ taa wa ɩrɛɛ a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄwrↄ nyɩ wa. A sɛw na a na be a lɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ a kↄ̃ ɩ a tẽw baarfʋ daar sɛr wa.
41013008	A-na-ɩ tẽw na nɩbɛ na irʼã jɛbɛ nɩ tẽ-kpee nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ a jamana kãw na irʼã jɛbɛ nɩ jaman-kpee. A tẽw nↄↄ ɓĩine na a ji-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ɩ̃ a kↄ̃ kpɛ̃ɛ na lo na. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ana yele a jaa na wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a walfʋ na nyↄw a pↄw.
41013009	“Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, nyɩ́ gu nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ. Ba na wa nyↄↄr nyɩ na ƴↄ̃w a ƴɛr-guorbo nuu pʋↄ; ba na fↄbʼɩ̃ nyɩ na nɩ kpaarsɩ a puorfʋ yie pʋↄ, ɩ̃ na ba bʋↄl nyɩ cenʼɩ̃ a fãgã deme nɩ a jamansɩ jie a maa ɩnɛ, a nyɩ na man ba a nyɩ yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃.
41013010	Ɩ̃ a sɛw na a ƴɛr-son na de nĩe ta a bal bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ba jaa baar.
41013011	A daar ʋlↄ ba na wa nyↄwrↄ nyɩ cere nɩ a ƴɛr-guorbo jie, nyɩ́ taa gↄr waala a ala nyɩ na wa yele wa, ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ yel a ala a Naaŋmɩn na kʋrↄ nyɩ a be naan, a-na-ɩ aa ɩ a nyɩmɩ mɩ̃ɛ na ƴɛrɛ wa, a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ʋ.
41013012	A yɛbɛ na ma ƴↄ̃w na a ba kú a ʋ yɛbɛ, ɩ̃ a sãa ƴↄ̃w a ba kú a ʋ bie. A bibiir na irʼã Ꞌlaar a ba dↄↄrbↄ ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w a ba kú ba.
41013013	A nɩbɛ ba jaa na Ꞌlaar nyɩ na a maa ɩnɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a su-varkpara ɩraa nɩ wa ta nɩ a baarfʋ daar na pↄw na a faafʋ.
41013014	“A lɛdaar ʋlↄ nyɩ na nyɛrɛ a bõ-ciiraa ʋlↄ na sãwna a bom ʋ ɩraa be a jie ʋlↄ ʋ na ma sɛw ʋ be wa, (a ʋlↄ na Ꞌwuoro a sɛbɛ na ú bↄ̃w bↄ̃w a par), a bala na be a Jude, bá jↄrↄ duoro a tan jur,
41013015	a ʋlↄ na be a garɩ̃, ʋ taa suure die pʋↄ yele defʋ wa,
41013016	ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na be a puo pʋↄ, ʋ taa lɩɛbɛ kule kparʋ defʋ wa.
41013017	Won na nyɩrɩ̃ na ta a pↄↄ-pʋʋr deme, nɩ a bala na tɛrɛ a bi-pɩɩlsɩ a lɛdaar.
41013018	Nyɩ́ sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn a yele ala naa kↄ̃ wa ta a sɩ̃ɛw wa.
41013019	A-na-ɩ a bibie ala na ɩ na a won kpɛ̃ɛ daar. A won bʋrↄ ʋlↄ ma dãa ta sɛr, wa nyↄw nɩ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na maal a tẽw, wa ta nɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ wa, ɩ̃ a kↄ̃ↄ lↄↄ ta a lɛ wa.
41013020	A ala ɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ma dãa ŋmaa a bibie bar wa, nɩrɛ kↄ̃ↄ tʋↄ cɩ̃ɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a bala ʋ na vɛl ir na ʋ sↄ ɩnɛ, ʋ ŋmaa na a bibie ala bar.
41013021	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩrɛ wa yel nyɩ na: ʻNyɩ́ nyɛ! Ka a Kirisi be!ʼ mɩɩ ʻBeka ʋ be!ʼ nyɩ taa wa sↄwrↄ wa.
41013022	A jir-ŋma-Kirisisɩ nɩ a jir-ŋma-ƴɛr-hierbe na irʼã tʋnↄ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ miile nɩ a ba kpɛ̃w, bʋↄrↄ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ ba tʋↄ na, ba bɛlɩ̃ nɩ a bala a Naaŋmɩn na vɛl ir.
41013023	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a nyɩmɩ ʋ, nyɩ́ gu nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ; ɩ̃ gↄrʼã man nyɩ a yele ala a jaa nↄↄ tara.
41013024	“Ɩ̃-cɛ, a daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ, a lɛ a won kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ na tↄl baar, a mↄtↄ̃w na liw na pↄw, a cuu kↄ̃ lɛ caara wa,
41013025	a ŋmarbie na yi na a saꞋlon ɩ̃ pↄrↄ loro a tene, ɩ̃ a fãw ala na be a saa juu na dama na.
41013026	A lɛdaar, ba na nyɛ na a Nɩbɛ Bie, ʋ be a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃sɩ pʋↄ, nyɩnyɩlɛ waara nɩ fãgã kpɛ̃w.
41013027	Ɩ̃ ʋ na tʋ̃ na a ʋ sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ a ba kpaarɩ̃ a bala ʋ na vɛl ir a tẽw lõbobo pʋʋr a jaa, nyↄw nɩ a tẽw parɩ̃ wa cen na ta nɩ a tẽw iin.
41013028	“Nyɩ́ bↄ̃w a fɩgɩ tɩɛ jaanfʋ par. A lɛ nyɩ na nyɛ ʋ ʋ tↄbↄ a vaꞋwↄlↄ nyɩ ma bↄ̃w ka a susuur daar tara na.
41013029	A lɛ ʋ mɩ, a nyɩmɩ wa nyɛ a yele ala á maala, nyɩ́ bↄ̃w ka a Nɩbɛ Bie waa daar tara na.
41013030	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩbɛ pʋↄ, ŋmɛɛ kↄ̃ wa kpi wa, wa ta nɩ a ana yele a jaa nↄↄ maala.
41013031	A saꞋlon nɩ a tene na tↄlʼã, ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ ma be tↄlfʋ jie fɩ̃ɩ wa.
41013032	“Nɩrɛ ma bↄ̃w a ʋna bibir nɩ a daar ʋlↄ wa. A saa juu sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ nɩ a Nɩbɛ Bie ma mɩ bↄ̃w wa, a Sãa tɛw ɩ̃ bↄ̃w.
41013033	Nyɩ́ gu nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ, nyɩ taa wa gure wa! A-na-ɩ nyaa bↄ̃w a dabor a daar ʋlↄ nↄↄ tara wa.
41013034	A na wↄ̃ na taa nɩ daba kãw na bʋↄrↄ ʋ yↄ cen tẽw kãw. Ʋ barʼã a ʋ yele a jaa ƴↄ̃w a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ nuu pʋↄ, miilʼɩ̃ ba bõ-ƴene-ƴene a ba tʋmↄ, ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w a dↄ̃dↄr-gure ʋ bↄ̃w jʋʋrↄ, ɩ̃ pãa yi cen.
41013035	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ nyɩ́ jʋʋrↄ, a-na-ɩ nyaa bↄ̃w a daar ʋlↄ a yir sʋbↄ na waara wa. A ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a jaanʋↄr ʋ, mɩɩ a tẽ-porɩ̃ ʋ, mɩɩ a nↄdɛɛ kuon daar ʋ, mɩɩ a dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ ɓaaraa ʋ,
41013036	ʋ taa wa puurĩ nyɩ a gʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ wa.
41013037	A ala ɩ̃ na yele nyɩ, a nɩbɛ ba jaa ɩ̃ yele kʋrↄ, nyɩ́ jʋʋrↄ!”
41014001	A Pakɩ nɩ a Bur-Pʋↄr Fɛtɩ dãa na cɛ bibie ayi. A baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ bʋↄrↄ na a mɩnɛ ba na ɩrɛ ɩ̃ sↄↄlↄ nyↄwrↄ a Jeeju kúrↄ.
41014002	A-na-ɩ ba dãa na yele taa: “A taa ɩ a fɛtɩ daar wa. A ala ma ɩ lɛ ʋ wa, a nɩbɛ na irʼã dama a tẽw.”
41014003	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na be a Betani, a Sɩmↄ̃ ʋlↄ na ɩ a kↄ̃w yir, na ʋ jɛ a dɩb par, pↄw kãw wɩ nɩ na a kã-nyu-vɩlaa na ma kpɛmɛ a dafʋ ɩɛ wa, ba na bʋↄlↄ a naar na sɛw a kubir yole, na ʋ ŋme a yole puo ɩ̃ kpaar a kãa ƴↄnↄ a Jeeju juumɩ.
41014004	Á nɩbɛ bala na be a be, a ŋmɛɛ nyɛ na suur ɩ̃ yele taa: “Bõ ɩ a ba de a kãa sãw bar a lɛ?
41014005	A-na-ɩ ʋ naa tʋↄ na de a ʋna kã-nyu-vɩlaa da war ture lɩjaata nɩ dↄↄlaa, ɩ̃ de a libie kʋ a nãw deme,” ɩ̃ na ba vavire a jur ƴↄnↄ a pↄw.
41014006	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju yel: “Nyɩ́ bar ʋ. Bõ ɩnɛ nyɩ dama ʋ a lɛ? Ʋ maalʼã vɩlaa a ɩ̃ jie.
41014007	A-na-ɩ nyɩ lãa na be taa nɩ a nãw deme a daar a jaa, ɩ̃ nyɩ na tʋↄ na maal ba a vɩlaa a daar lɛ nyɩ na bʋↄrↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a maa, maa beree a nyɩ sↄ̃w a daar a jaa wa.
41014008	A pↄw naa maalʼã a ala ʋ na dãa tʋↄrↄ maala. Ʋ gↄrʼã jɛ ma a kãa gbɛɛrɩ̃ a ɩ̃ ɩ̃gan a ũufʋ ɩnɛ.
41014009	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a lɛ ba nↄↄ mana a ƴɛr-son naa a jiir a jaa, ba nↄↄ mɩ manʼã a ala a pↄw na na maal, a ba kↄ̃ wa hiin ʋ wa.”
41014010	A Judasɩ Isikaryↄtɩ na ɩ a Jeeju par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi ƴen sʋbↄ cenʼã a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ sɛ̃ a Jeeju juu defʋ.
41014011	A mɩnɛ ba na wõ a lɛ, a nʋmↄ ba na a ba pʋlɩ̃ yel a ba na kʋ ʋ na libie, ʋ nyↄw ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ a mɩnɛ ʋ na ɩrɛ ɩ̃ ƴↄnↄ ʋ a ba nuumɩ.
41014012	A Bur-Pʋↄr fɛtɩ bibir dãdãw, a mɩnɛ ba na kúrↄ a Pakɩ peli, a Jeeju par-tuurbe soor ʋ na: “Nyɩnɛ jie fʋ bʋↄrↄ sɩ cen na gbɛɛrɩ̃ fʋ a Pakɩ fɛtɩ dɩb?”
41014013	Ʋ tʋ̃ na a ʋ par-tuurbe ayi ɩ̃ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ cen a tẽw pʋↄ; nyɩ na tuorʼɩ̃ na daba kãw na tuo kʋ̃ↄ nɩ yuor. Nyɩ́ tuure ʋ,
41014014	ɩ̃ a jie ʋlↄ ʋ na wa kpɛɛrɛ, nyɩ́ yel a yir sʋbↄ: A jãjaana yelʼã a sɩ soor fʋ á nyɩnɛ a die be, áa jie ʋlↄ ʋ na dɩrɛ a Pakɩ Fɛtɩ dɩb nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe.
41014015	Ʋ na miil nyɩ na bↄↄpɩɛn die ba na bↄ̃w gbɛɛrɩ̃ vɩlaa. A be nyɩ na maal a dɩb a sɩ ɩnɛ.”
41014016	A ʋ par-tuurbe bala cenʼã a tẽw pʋↄ na ba nyɛ a yele a be a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa yel ba, ɩ̃ na ba maal a Pakɩ fɛtɩ dɩb.
41014017	A jaanʋↄr, a Jeeju nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi ta na a be.
41014018	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na jɛ dɩrɛ a dɩb, a Jeeju yel ba na: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a nyɩmɩ na dɩrɛ nɩ ma a dɩb, bõ-ƴen be na a nyɩ sↄ̃w nↄↄ diere ma a juu.”
41014019	A sube sãw na a ʋ par-tuurbe a ba nyↄw ɩ̃ sooro ʋ bõ-ƴene-ƴene: “Maa ʋ mɩɩ?”
41014020	Ʋ yel ba: “A nɩrɛ ʋlↄ be na a nyɩmɩ pie-nʼayi sↄ̃w, a ʋlↄ na tune ɓara nɩ ma a laa pʋↄ.
41014021	A Nɩbɛ Bie na kpi na tu nɩ a mɩnɛ a na dãa sɛb a Naaŋmin Sɛbɛ pʋↄ a ʋ ɩnɛ. Ɩ̃-cɛ nabier na pↄw na a ʋna nɩrɛ na diere a Nɩbɛ Bie juu. A nɩrɛ ʋlↄ, a bala ma dãa dↄw ʋ wa, a naa sa ʋ na.”
41014022	A lɛ ba na cãa be a dɩb juu, a Jeeju de na a buru puor a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w, ɩ̃ kʋ a ʋ par-tuurbe ɩ̃ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ de Ꞌwↄb. A naa ɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ ɩ̃gan.”
41014023	A lɛ ʋ mɩ de a dɩvɛ̃ nɩ a ŋman puor a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w, ɩ̃ de kʋ ba a ba nyu ba jaa.
41014024	A Jeeju yel ba: “A naa ɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ jɩ̃ɩ, a jɩ̃ɩ ala nↄↄ cire cↄↄrↄ a pʋlɩ̃-taa a Naaŋmɩn na pʋlɩ̃ nɩ a nɩ-yaw.
41014025	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, maa be na lɛ nyu a dɩvɛ̃ wa tara nɩ a bibir ʋlↄ ɩ̃ nↄↄ nyuure a dɩvɛ̃ paalaa a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ wa.”
41014026	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na cɛ a puorfʋ fɛtɩ yele baar, ba yi na cen a Olivi-tɩɩr tãw juu.
41014027	A Jeeju yelʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe: “Nyɩ na bɩlʼã faa nyɩ jaa ɩ̃ jↄ ɩ̃ cɛ ma, a-na-ɩ a sɛbʼã a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: ʻƖ̃ na ŋme na a dↄ-cɩɩnaa kú, ɩ̃ a piir jↄ yaarɩ̃.ʼ
41014028	Ɩ̃-cɛ a maa wa ir a kũu pʋↄ, ɩ̃ na de nyɩ na nĩe cen na gu nyɩ a Galile.”
41014029	A Pɩɛr yel ʋ: “A ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a ba jaa na bɩlʼã faa ɩ̃ jↄ, a maa, maa be na jↄ wa!”
41014030	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele fʋ, a dɩnaa tɩsↄw naa, a nↄraa kↄ̃ kõ gbɛɛ ayi sɛr wa, ɩ̃ fʋ na gↄrʼã cɩɩrɩ̃ gbɛɛ ata á faa bↄ̃w ma wa.”
41014031	A Pɩɛr lɛ bↄ̃w yelʼɩ̃ kpɛ̃w: “A ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a sɛw na ɩ̃ na lãa kpi nɩ fʋ, aa be ɩ̃ na cɩɩrɩ̃ fʋ wa.” Ɩ̃ a par-tuurbe ba jaa mɩ yel a lɛ.
41014032	Ba cenʼã na ta a jie ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Jesemane, ʋ yel a ʋ par-tuurbe: “Nyɩ́ jɛ a ka, ɩ̃ ɩ̃ cen na sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn.”
41014033	Ɩ̃ na ʋ tɛrɛ a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jakɩ nɩ a Jã cenʼɩ̃ a nii-sↄw, a pʋlɩ̃nyɛ nyↄw ɩ̃ vʋ̃ↄnↄ ʋ, lãa nyɩrɩ̃ dama nɩ ʋ a tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ,
41014034	ʋ yel ba: “Ni-sↄbaa nyɩrɩ̃ na kpɛ ma wↄ̃ taa nɩ ɩ̃ na kpi na. Nyɩ́ ɩraa a ka; nyɩ taa wa gure wa.”
41014035	Ɩ̃ na ʋ taw jãa fɩ̃ɩ, ɩ̃ kpa pↄw a nii-sↄw a tene, ɩ̃ sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn, a ala ɩ a na tʋↄ na, ú ɩ a won ʋlↄ ʋ tↄl, ɩ̃ cɛ ʋ bar.
41014036	Ʋ yelʼã: “Ɩ̃ Sãa, fʋ tʋↄ na a yele a jaa. Ɩ a tuo ŋman na ʋ na jãa nɩ ma, ɩ̃ a taa ɩ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na bʋↄrↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ a mɩnɛ fʋ na bʋↄrↄ.”
41014037	Ʋ lɩɛbʼã wa a ʋ par-tuurbe ata jie, na ʋ nyɛ ba a ba gure, ʋ yel a Pɩɛr: “Sɩmↄ̃, fʋ gure na? Faa tʋↄ jɛ nɩ mimir lɛɛr-bõ-ƴen wa?
41014038	Nyɩ taa gure wa. Nyɩ́ sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn, kↄ̃ wa kpɛ a bɩɩrfʋ pʋↄ wa. A nɩrɛ sɩɛ bʋↄrↄ na a son maalfʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ̃gan balʼã.”
41014039	Ɩ̃ na ʋ lɛ cen ɩ̃ sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn, na ʋ lɛ bↄ̃w ƴɛr a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ naa.
41014040	Ʋ lɛ lɩɛbʼã wa a ba jie, na ʋ nyɛ ba a ba gur, a-na-ɩ a gʋ̃ↄ dãa na nyɩrɩ̃ tɛrɛ ba; a baa dãa bↄ̃w a ala ba na yele ʋ wa.
41014041	Ʋ lɛ lɩɛbʼã wa a gbɛɛ ata ɩnɛ na ʋ yel ba: “Nyɩ cãa na be tↄ a gʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ? A baarʼã! A daar ta na. Nyɩ́ nyɛ! Ba na nyↄw na a Nɩbɛ Bie ƴↄ̃w a maal-faar deme nuumɩ.
41014042	Nyɩ́ ir a sɩ cen! A ʋlↄ na diere ma a juu tara na ka.”
41014043	A lɛ a Jeeju na cãa ƴɛrɛ, a Judasɩ na ɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi ƴen sʋbↄ ta na a be, ɩ̃ lãa be nɩ nɩbɛ na tɛrɛ bãjɩnsɩ nɩ gʋdɛɛ, a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a ni-dierbe na tʋ̃.
41014044	A ʋlↄ na diere a Jeeju a juu dãa na miil a nɩbɛ bala a jɩmɛ ʋlↄ ba na bↄ̃wnↄ nɩ a Jeeju. Ʋ yelʼã: “A ʋlↄ ɩ̃ nↄↄ worĩ, ʋlↄ ʋ. Nyɩ́ nyↄw ʋ na nyɩ bↄ̃w tɛrɛ ʋ cenʼɩ̃.”
41014045	A lɛ a Judasɩ na tↄ̃ↄ cãa ta, ʋ taw na gbʋr a Jeeju, ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Jãjaana!” ɩ̃ na ʋ worĩ ʋ,
41014046	a nɩbɛ bala ta nyↄw ʋ.
41014047	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩrɛ kãw na be a be vʋ̃ↄ na a ʋ bãjɩnɛ cɛ nɩ a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ tʋ̃tʋnↄ toor ŋmaa bar.
41014048	A Jeeju lɩɛb yel a nɩbɛ: “Nyanyuur ɩ̃ ɩ a nyɩ wa nɩ a bãjɩnsɩ nɩ a gʋdɛɛ na nyↄwrↄ nɩ ma mɩɩ?
41014049	A bibie a jaa ɩ̃ ma dãa na be be a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ mana nyɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ nyaa dãa nyↄw ma wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ta na a na ɩ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ na dãa yel.”
41014050	A ʋ par-tuurbe ba jaa bar ʋ a be ɩ̃ jↄ.
41014051	Polbile kãw dãa na tuure ʋ ɩ̃ vaar gãw tɛw, a ba nyↄw ʋ,
41014052	ʋ mɩr a gãw bar ɩ̃ jↄ nɩ ɩ̃gan ɓãɓuol.
41014053	Ba taw na a Jeeju cenʼɩ̃ a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ jie. A be a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a Jufisɩ ni-dierbe nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ ba jaa na kpaarɩ̃ taa.
41014054	A Pɩɛr bɩɛrʼã tu a Jeeju na ʋ cen na ta kpɛ a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yir gbalɩ̃ pʋↄ, na ʋ lãa jɛ nɩ a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ Ꞌwuoro a vũu.
41014055	A baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ ba jaa bʋↄrↄ na ƴɛrɩ̃ ba na dↄↄlↄ a Jeeju juu, ɩ̃ tʋↄrↄ nyɛrɛ a sↄr kúrↄ ʋ, ɩ̃ ba bↄ na faa.
41014056	A-na-ɩ a nɩ-yaw dãa na ŋmara a jir-kara ƴↄnↄ ʋ, ɩ̃ a ba ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ma dãa tuure taa wa.
41014057	A nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ pãa ir ŋma jir-kara ƴↄ̃w a Jeeju, na ba yel:
41014058	“Sɩ wõ na ʋ yel á ʋ na wɛlʼã a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ na bar a nɩbɛ na mɛ, ɩ̃ a bibie ata sↄ̃w, ʋ na lɛ mɛ na bõ-kpee a nɩrɛ na ma maal wa.”
41014059	Ba saarɩ̃ na yele a lɛ, ɩ̃ a ba ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ma dãa tuure taa wa.
41014060	A baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ pãa ir ɩraa a nɩbɛ ba jaa nii-sↄw ɩ̃ soor a Jeeju: “Faa yele bom wa? Bõ ƴɛrɩ̃ a nɩbɛ basɩmɛ dↄↄlↄ fʋ a lɛ?”
41014061	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju sine. ꞋWaa haa nʋↄr ƴɛr ƴɛrɩ̃ fɩ̃ɩ wa. A baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ lɛ bↄ̃w soor ʋ: “Fʋ̃ʋ ɩ a Kirisi na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ sɩ na puoro Bi-daba?”
41014062	A Jeeju yel: “Ↄↄ, maa ʋ. Nyɩ nↄↄ nyɛ na a Nɩbɛ Bie ʋ jɛ a Fãw Sʋbↄ dʋrɩ̃ loor, ɩ̃ nyɩ nↄↄ mɩ nyɛ ʋ na ʋ be a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃sɩ pʋↄ waara.”
41014063	A ala ɩnɛ, a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɓer a ʋ cẽcene bar ɩ̃ yel: “Bõ ɩnɛ sɩ lɛ cãa bʋↄrↄ ƴɛr-manba go?
41014064	Nyɩ wõ na a mɩnɛ ʋ na sãw a Naaŋmɩn yuor. Mɩnɛ nyɩ tɩɛrɛ?” Á ba jaa yel á ʋ sɛw na na kpi.
41014065	A bana nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ nyↄw ɩ̃ pʋʋrↄ a natɛɛr ƴↄnↄ ʋ, ɩ̃ pↄw ʋ a nii-sↄw, tʋↄrↄ tʋↄrↄ nɩ ʋ a nu-gbule yele nɩ ʋ: “Bↄ̃w a bala na ŋme fʋ,” ɩ̃ cɛ ʋ kʋ a parsãdiele a ba ɓa ɓa ʋ.
41014066	A lɛ a Pɩɛr na dãa cãa be a pulẽe a gbalɩ̃ pʋↄ, a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ tʋ̃tʋ̃-poole kãw ta na nyɛ ʋ na Ꞌwuoro a vũu,
41014067	ɩ̃ Ꞌwuor ʋ bↄ̃w ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “A fʋ̃ʋ, fʋ mɩ dãa na lãa be nɩ a ʋna Najarɛtɩ Jeeju.”
41014068	A Pɩɛr cɩɩrɩ̃ ɩ̃ yel: “Maa bↄ̃w a tɛw wa. Maa bↄ̃w a ala fʋ na bʋↄrↄ fʋ yel wa,” ɩ̃ na ʋ cen yi a yẽw a dↄ̃dↄr nʋↄr par, a nↄraa kokolĩ.
41014069	A tʋ̃tʋ̃-poole nyɛ ʋ, ɩ̃ lɛ bↄ̃w mana kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ bala na ɩraa a be yele nɩ: “A daba na ɩ na a ba tↄ sʋbↄ,”
41014070	a Pɩɛr lɛ bↄ̃w cɩɩrɩ̃. A ɩ na fɩ̃ɩ, a nɩbɛ bala na be a be yel ʋ: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ʋ, fʋ sɩrɩ̃ na ɩ a ba tↄ sʋbↄ, a-na-ɩ fʋ ɩ na a Galile nɩrɛ.”
41014071	A Pɩɛr nyↄw ɩ̃ pↄrↄ ƴↄnↄ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ bʋↄlↄ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn yuor yele nɩ: “Maa bↄ̃w a daba ʋlↄ nyɩ na yele wa.”
41014072	A jie naan, a nↄraa lɛ tu na kõ a ɩ gbɛɛ ayi, a Pɩɛr tɩɛr bↄ̃w nɩ a ala a Jeeju na dãa yel ʋ: “A nↄraa kↄ̃ kõ gbɛɛ ayi sɛr wa, ɩ̃ fʋ na gↄrʼã cɩɩrɩ̃ gbɛɛ ata a faa bↄ̃w ma wa.” A Pɩɛr tↄ̃ↄ cɛ a kuon.
41015001	A dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ ɓaaraa pipi, a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ni-dierbe nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ, nɩ a ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ ba jaa duo na ɩ̃ mana taa. A ala ɩ̃ baar, ba ƴↄ̃w na a ba lũ a Jeeju cenʼɩ̃ na kʋ a Pɩlatɩ.
41015002	A Pɩlatɩ soor ʋ: “Fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ ɩ a Jufisɩ jamana?” A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A lɛ fʋ yel.”
41015003	A baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ ƴɛrɛ na ƴɛr-faar yaw dↄↄlↄ a ʋ juu,
41015004	ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Pɩlatɩ lɛ bↄ̃w soor ʋ: “Faa ƴɛrɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa? Fʋ wõ na a ƴɛr-faar ala ba na dↄↄlↄ a fʋ juu!”
41015005	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju ma lɛ ƴɛr ƴɛrɩ̃ fɩ̃ɩ wa, a ko a Pɩlatɩ nʋↄr.
41015006	A Pakɩ fɛtɩ daar, a Pɩlatɩ ma barʼã a kasu nɩrɛ ʋlↄ a nɩbɛ na ma sʋↄr ʋ.
41015007	Daba dãa na be be a kasu pʋↄ ɩ̃ dɩ Barabasɩ. Ba lũ na a ʋlↄ nɩ a ʋ tↄ deme ƴↄ̃w a kasu pʋↄ a-na-ɩ ba kú na nɩrɛ a lɛdaar ba na ir jɛbɛ nɩ a fãgã deme.
41015008	A nɩbɛ cenʼã a Pɩlatɩ sɛ̃ na ba nyↄw ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ ʋ a ʋ maal ba a ala ʋ na ma dãa maala ba.
41015009	A Pɩlatɩ soor ba: “Nyɩ bʋↄrↄ na ɩ̃ bar a Jufisɩ jamana kʋ nyɩ mɩɩ?”
41015010	A-na-ɩ ʋ bↄ̃w ka nyube be na a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ jie, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ba nyↄw a Jeeju wɩ nɩ a ʋ sɛ̃.
41015011	Ɩ̃-cɛ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ tↄ na a nɩbɛ ƴↄ̃w a ba sʋↄr a Pɩlatɩ a ʋ ɛ̃ɛ bar a Barabasɩ kʋ ba,
41015012	a Pɩlatɩ lɛ soor ba: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a lɛ ʋ, bõ nyɩ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ ɩ nɩ a ʋlↄ nyɩ na bʋↄlↄ a Jufisɩ jamana?”
41015013	A ba wuur ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Kpa ʋ yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu!”
41015014	A Pɩlatɩ soor ba: “Mɩnɛ? Fãa buor ʋ maal?” A ba lɛ bↄ̃w wuurʼɩ̃ kpɛ̃w: “Kpa ʋ yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu!”
41015015	A Pɩlatɩ bʋↄrↄ na ʋ maal a nʋmↄ a nɩbɛ bala, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ bar a Barabasɩ kʋ ba, ɩ̃ ɩ a sↄdaalsɩ a ba fↄb a Jeeju, ɩ̃ cɛ cenʼɩ̃ a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu a kpafʋ jie.
41015016	A sↄdaalsɩ taw na a Jeeju cen na kpɛ nɩ a gbalɩ̃ pʋↄ, a lɛ yelʼã áa jamana yir ba cenʼɩ̃ ʋ, ɩ̃ na ba bʋↄl a ba sↄdaal-taar ba jaa.
41015017	Ba su na a Jeeju a kpar-jɩ̃ɛw, ɩ̃ vilĩ gʋʋr sapi kpa ʋ a juumɩ,
41015018	ɩ̃ nyↄw ɩ̃ puoro ʋ yele nɩ: “Jufisɩ jamana yaa! Sɩ puor fʋ na.”
41015019	Ɩ̃ na ba ŋmeere ʋ a juu nɩ a pã-bir ɩ̃ pʋʋrↄ a natɛɛr ƴↄnↄ ʋ, ɩ̃ loro gbure a dume a ʋ nii-sↄw.
41015020	A lɛ ba na la la ʋ baar, ba yaa na a kpar-jɩ̃ɛw, ɩ̃ lɛ su ʋ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ cẽcene. A ala ɩ̃ baar ba pãa na taw ʋ yi cenʼɩ̃ a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu a kpafʋ jie.
41015021	A Sɩɩrɛn-tẽw nɩrɛ kãw na dɩ Sɩmↄ̃, na ɩ a Alɛsãdɩrɛ nɩ a Urufusi sãa, tↄlʼã cen a puo pʋↄ, ɩ̃ waara, a sↄdaalsɩ fɛr ʋ ƴↄ̃wʋ de a Jeeju nɩ-kʋ-daa tuo.
41015022	Ba taw na a Jeeju cenʼɩ̃ a jie ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Gↄlgↄta, a lɛ yelʼã a “Ju-ŋman jie”.
41015023	A be, ba dãa na bʋↄrↄ ba kʋ ʋ a dɩvɛ̃ ba na nyakarɩ̃ nɩ a tɩ̃ɩ ba na bʋↄlↄ mɩɩr, ɩ̃ a Jeeju ma sↄw nyu wa.
41015024	Ba kpa ʋ na yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu, ɩ̃ de a ʋ cẽcene po. Gbãbie ba dãa lↄbↄ bↄ̃wnↄ nɩ a bala na diere a cẽcene.
41015025	A dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ ɓaaraa, a lɛ a mↄtↄ̃w na cãa pur duoro, lɛdaar ba kpa ʋ yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu.
41015026	Ba sɛbʼã sɛbɛ yaal a ʋ ju-sↄ̃w, na miile a ʋ Ꞌlaarfʋ par. Nyɛ a mɩnɛ ba na sɛb: Á Jufisɩ jamana ʋ.
41015027	Ba mɩ kpa na nyanyube ayi a nɩ-kʋ-dar jur a Jeeju lõbobo pʋↄ, bõ-ƴen a ʋ dʋrɩ̃ loor, a kãw a ʋ gʋbaa loor. [
41015028	A maalʼã a lɛ tuure nɩ a mɩnɛ a na sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “Ba sↄr ʋ na ƴↄ̃w a nɩ-faar pʋↄ.”]
41015029	A sↄ-tↄlbↄ gↄↄrↄ na a jur, tʋrↄ nɩ ʋ yele: “A fʋ̃ʋ na bʋↄrↄ fʋ wɛl a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ lɛ mɛ a bõ-kpee a bibie ata pʋↄ!
41015030	Fáa a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ, suu a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu.”
41015031	A lɛ naan, a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ mɩ kpɛrɛ ʋ, na ba yele nɩ taa: “Ʋ fáa na a nɩŋmɛɛ, ɩ̃ ma lɛ tʋↄrↄ faara a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ wa.
41015032	A fʋ̃ʋ Kirisi, na ɩ a Ɩsɩrayɛl jamana! Suu a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, a sɩ na nyɛ ɩ̃ sↄw de fʋ.” A bala ba na lãa kpa yaalʼɩ̃ a Jeeju mɩ tʋrↄ ʋ na.
41015033	A mↄtↄ̃-tuo daar, a wɩɛr liw na pↄw a jiir a jaa, lɛɛ wa ta nɩ a mↄtↄ̃w gↄrfʋ daar.
41015034	Ɩ̃ a mↄtↄ̃w gↄrfʋ daar, a Jeeju wuurʼã nɩ kpɛ̃w: “Elo! Elo! Lama sabatanɩ?” A lɛ yelʼã: “Ɩ̃ Naaŋmɩn! Ɩ̃ Naaŋmɩn! Bõ ɩ a fʋ jaar ma bar?”
41015035	A nɩbɛ nɩŋmɛɛ na ɩraa a be wonaa na, ɩ̃ na ba yel: “Nyɩ́ cɛlɛ! A ƴɛr-hiere Eli ʋ bʋↄlↄ.”
41015036	A ƴen sʋbↄ a ba pʋↄ jↄ na cen na ɓĩ a tabi-Ꞌlʋↄrↄ nɩ a bom mɩɩrʋ̃, kurʼɩ̃ a ɓɛ̃ɓɛmɛ tur a Jeeju a ʋ nyu, ɩ̃ yel: “Nyɩ́ ɩraa lɛ, a sɩ je kãa ala ɩ a Eli na wa na yaw ʋ a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu suu nɩ.”
41015037	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju wuurʼã nɩ kpɛ̃w, ɩ̃ ŋmaa a vʋʋrʋ̃.
41015038	A Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ cẽcen ɓerʼã ayi, a saꞋlon wa ta nɩ a tene.
41015039	A Orom sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na dãa ɩraa a Jeeju nii-sↄw, nyɛ na a mɩnɛ ʋ na kpi, ɩ̃ yel: “Sɩrɛ jaa! A daba na dãa na sɩrɩ̃ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Bie.”
41015040	A pↄↄbↄ ŋmɛɛ mɩ dãa na be be ɩraa a nɩdaa ɩ̃ Ꞌwuoro. A bana pↄↄbↄ sↄ̃w, a Madala Maarɩɩ be na be, nɩ a Maarɩɩ ʋlↄ na ɩ a Jakɩ bile nɩ a Jojɛsɩ mã, nɩ a Salome.
41015041	Ba dãa na tuure a Jeeju a lɛdaar ʋ na be a Galile, na ba sũono ʋ. A pↄↄ-yaw ŋmɛɛ mɩ be na be na dãa pↄw ʋ do nɩ a Jerujalɛm.
41015042	A jaanʋↄr ta na na ɩ a gbɛɛrɩ̃fʋ bibir. A lɛ yelʼã, áa bibi-ciiraa walfʋ dayen.
41015043	A Jojɛfʋ, na ɩ a Arimate-tẽw nɩrɛ ta na. Ʋ be na a Jufisɩ ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ sↄ̃w a ba ƴↄnↄ ʋ, ɩ̃ ʋ mɩ dãa cɛlɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw waa. Ʋ nyↄw na nyãa ɩ̃ cen a Pɩlatɩ sɛ̃, na ʋ sʋↄr a kũu.
41015044	A nʋↄr ko na a Pɩlatɩ a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na kpi a lɛ a fↄfↄw, ʋ bʋↄl a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, na ʋ soor ʋ áa kamʼã a Jeeju na kpi mɩɩ?
41015045	A lɛ a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na miil ʋ ʋ bↄ̃w a par, ʋ kʋ na a Jojɛfʋ sↄr ʋ de a Jeeju.
41015046	A Jojɛfʋ da na cẽcen, cenʼɩ̃ na yaw nɩ a kũu a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu suu nɩ, ɩ̃ de a cẽcen vilĩ pↄw ʋ, cenʼɩ̃ ũu a yaa kãw pʋↄ ba na kpu a kubir pʋↄ, ɩ̃ bilĩ a kubir kpɛ̃ɛ pↄw a yaa nʋↄr.
41015047	A Madala Maarɩɩ nɩ a Maarɩɩ ʋlↄ na ɩ a Jojɛsɩ mã, Ꞌwuoro na a jie ʋlↄ ba na uune ʋ.
41016001	A lɛ a bibi-ciiraa dayen na tↄl baar, a Maarɩɩ na yi a Madala nɩ a Maarɩɩ ʋlↄ na ɩ a Jakɩ mã, nɩ a Salome da na a kã-nyu-vɩlaa cere nɩ a kũu jɛfʋ ɩnɛ.
41016002	A jɩmaasɩ bibir dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ ɓaaraa, a lɛ a mↄtↄ̃w na cãa pure, ba cenʼã a yaa pʋↄ.
41016003	Ba dãa na sooro taa yele: “Ala na bilĩ sɩ a kubir a yaa nʋↄrɩ̃ bar?”
41016004	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na dʋↄ Ꞌwuor, ba nyɛ na a kubir ʋlↄ na dãa bɛrmɛ ma ɩ wa ʋ bilĩ gã a lõboorɩ̃.
41016005	A lɛ ba na kpɛ a yaa pʋↄ, ba nyɛ na polbile kãw na su kpar-pɩlaa ʋ jɛ be a dʋrɩ̃ loor, a pʋlɩ̃nyɛ vʋ̃ↄ ba.
41016006	Ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ yel ba na: “Nyɩ taa ɩ a pʋlɩ̃nyɛ vʋ̃ↄnↄ nyɩ wa. Má a Najarɛtɩ Jeeju ʋlↄ ba na kpa yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu nyɩ bʋↄrↄ. ꞋWaa cãa a ka wa. Ʋ irʼã a kũu pʋↄ. Nyɩ́ Ꞌwuor nyɛ a jie ʋlↄ ba na dãa gaal ʋ.
41016007	Ɩ̃ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, nyɩ́ cen na yel a ʋ par-tuurbe lãa nɩ a Pɩɛr á ʋ na de na nĩe cen na gu nyɩ a Galile. Be nyɩ na nyɛ ʋ a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa yel nyɩ.”
41016008	Ba yi na a yaa pʋↄ, a nʋↄr ko ba a ba ɓine, ɩ̃ na ba ƴↄ̃w gbɛɛ jↄ. Baa yel bom kʋ nɩrɛ wa, a-na-ɩ dãbɩ̃ɛ dãa na gãw ba. [
41016009	A Jeeju irʼã a kũu pʋↄ a jɩmaasɩ dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ ɓaaraa, na ʋ de nĩe nyɩr a Madala Maarɩɩ ʋlↄ ʋ na dãa diw a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ anuu-nʼayi a ʋ pʋↄ bar.
41016010	A Maarɩɩ cenʼã na man kʋ a bala na dãa ɩ a Jeeju lãa-yʋↄrbↄ, na be a ni-sↄbaa pʋↄ kono nɩ.
41016011	Ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛ ba na wõ ʋ yel áa Jeeju irʼã ɩ nɩ-mimir ʋ nyɛ ʋ, baa dãa sↄw wa.
41016012	A ala na yi tↄ, a ʋ par-tuurbe ayi be na a sↄr juu cere a tẽ-bile kãw pʋↄ, ʋ nyɩr ba a be, be kpee.
41016013	Ba lɩɛbʼã wa na man a ba tↄ deme a lɛ, ɩ̃ a baa cãa sↄw wa.
41016014	A Jeeju pãa na bɩɛr nyɩr a ʋ par-tuurbe pie-nɩ-bõ-ƴen a lɛ ba na be a dɩb par, ɩ̃ na ʋ ful ba a ba ƴↄ̃w-nyãa faafʋ ɩnɛ, nɩ a mɩnɛ a ba suur na kpɛmɛ, a-na-ɩ baa dãa sↄw a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ bala na dãa nyɛ ʋ ʋ ir a kũu pʋↄ wa.
41016015	Ɩ̃ na ʋ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ yↄ a tẽ-daa ʋ jaa juu, hier a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son kʋ a nɩbɛ ba jaa.
41016016	A ʋlↄ na wa sↄw ɩ̃ a ba mʋr ʋ a kʋ̃ↄ, ʋ na pↄw na a faafʋ, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na ma sↄw wa, ƴɛrɩ̃ na dↄↄlʼã a ʋ juu.
41016017	Ɩ̃ nyɩ́ nyɛ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ ala na wa tuure a bala na sↄw: ba na de na a ɩ̃ yuor diw nɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ bar, ba na ƴɛrɛ na ƴɛr-bʋlsɩ,
41016018	ba nↄↄ bibʼã a wɩɩr ɩ̃ a ala ɩ ba wa nyu na a bom na tɛrɛ a lↄw, a kↄ̃ maal ba bier wa. Ba na ma dↄↄlʼã a baalsɩ a nur a ba kpɛmɛ.”
41016019	A mɩnɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju na ƴɛrʼɩ̃ ba a lɛ baar, a Naaŋmɩn maal ʋ na ʋ do a saa juu jɛ be a ʋ dʋrɩ̃ loor.
41016020	Ɩ̃ a ʋ par-tuurbe yi yʋↄrↄ a jiir a jaa hiere a ƴɛr-son. A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ dãa na sũono ba a tʋn ʋlↄ pʋↄ ɩ̃ maala a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ miile nɩ a nɩbɛ áa ala ba na yele ɩ na yel-mɩ̃ɛ.]
42001001	Ɩ̃ baraa Towfɩl! Nɩ-yaw dɩ na tuo ɩ̃ sɛb a yele ala na maal a sɩ sↄ̃w.
42001002	A be na a lɛ a mɩnɛ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛr-manba na man kʋ sɩ a wↄ̃, na ɩ a bala na dãa nyɛ nɩ a ba mimir, wa nyↄw nɩ a nyↄwfʋ daar, ɩ̃ mɩ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son tʋ̃tʋnbↄ.
42001003	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a maa mɩ, ɩ̃ mɩ bↄ̃w na Ꞌlo a yele a jaa, cenʼɩ̃ na ta a nyↄwfʋ jie, ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ sɛb fʋ a mɩnɛ a yele na tu taa,
42001004	a fʋ na tʋↄ bↄ̃w ka a jaanfʋ ala fʋ na pↄw ɩ na yel-mɩ̃ɛ.
42001005	A lɛdaar a Ɛrↄdɩ na dãa ɩ a Jude jamana, a Naaŋmɩn baar-loro ƴen sʋbↄ be na be na dɩ a Jakarɩ, na be a baar-lorbo bala ba na bʋↄlↄ a Abiya ji-gbulĩ pʋↄ. A ʋ pↄw ba bʋↄlↄ a Elijabɛtɩ na mɩ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn baar-loro bi-pↄw.
42001006	A ba jaa ayi ɩ na nɩ-torisɩ a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ jↄrↄ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴɛr-kpɛn nɩ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a jaa.
42001007	Ɩ̃-cɛ baa dãa tɛrɛ bie wa, a-na-ɩ a Elijabɛtɩ ɩ na pↄw ab, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ nɩ a Jakarɩ yomo dãa tↄl.
42001008	A daar ta na a Jakarɩ nɩ a ʋ lãa-tʋnbↄ jew taa a tʋmↄ, ʋ be a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw a lɛ, tʋnↄ a ʋ baar-lo-tʋmↄ.
42001009	Gbãbie ba lↄb vɛl ʋ ir tu nɩ a mɩnɛ a ba baar-lo-tʋmↄ na be, ʋ kpɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ na ʋ ƴↄ̃w a tɩ̃ɩ-nyu-vɩlaa a vũu pʋↄ a dɩ.
42001010	A nɩ-yaw ɩraa na be a yẽw sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn a tɩ̃ɩ-nyu-vɩlaa dɩfʋ daar.
42001011	A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sɩ-tʋnaa nyɩrʼã a Jakarɩ, na ʋ ɩraa a tɩ̃ɩ-nyu-vɩlaa dɩfʋ jie a dʋrɩ̃ loor.
42001012	A lɛ a Jakarɩ na nyɛ ʋ, a ʋ suur dama ʋ na, ɩ̃ a pʋlɩ̃nyɛ vʋ̃ↄnↄ ʋ.
42001013	Ɩ̃-cɛ a sɩ-tʋnaa yelʼã: “Jakarɩ! Taa jↄrↄ dãbɩ̃ɛ wa. A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn sↄw na a fʋ sʋↄrfʋ. A fʋ pↄw Elijabɛtɩ na dↄw na dabile, fú pʋr ʋ a yuor Jã.
42001014	Nʋ̃ↄ na nyↄw fʋ na a fʋ cɩlɛ, ɩ̃ a na mɩ nʋmↄ na a nɩ-yaw a ʋ dↄwfʋ ɩnɛ.
42001015	A-na-ɩ ʋ na ɩ na gãdaa a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nii-sↄw. Ʋ kↄ̃ wa nyu a dɩvɛ̃ nɩ a dã-tuo fɩ̃ɩ wa; ɩ̃ wa nyↄw nɩ a bile ʋlↄ pʋↄ tɛrɛfʋ daar, ʋ na sɛw nɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.
42001016	Ʋ na maalʼã a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ yaw jie a ba lɛ lɩɛb wa a ba Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Naaŋmɩn jie.
42001017	Ʋ na de na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nĩe cenʼɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ʋlↄ nɩ a fãgã ʋlↄ a Eli na dãa tɛrɛ. Ʋ na lɩɛbʼã a saanba sube a ba ɩ bõ-ƴen nɩ a ba bibiir, ɩ̃ mɩ lɩɛb a to-wownbo yɛ̃, a ba na tɛrɛ a nɩ-torisɩ yɛ̃; ʋ na maalʼã a nɩbɛ a ba gbɛɛrɩ̃ a ba mɩ̃ɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩnɛ.”
42001018	A Jakarɩ soor a sɩ-tʋnaa: “Mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na ɩ ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka a ɩ na yel-mɩ̃ɛ? A-na-ɩ ɩ̃ korʼã, ɩ̃ a ɩ̃ pↄw yomo mɩ tↄl.”
42001019	A sɩ-tʋnaa yel ʋ: “Maa ɩ̃ ɩ a Gabɩyɛl na ma ɩraa a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw. A ʋlↄ ɩ̃ tʋ̃ ma a ɩ̃ wa ƴɛrʼɩ̃ fʋ, ɩ̃ man fʋ a ƴɛr-son na.
42001020	Nyɛ! A nʋↄr na kpal fʋ na, fʋ kↄ̃ tʋↄ ƴɛr ƴɛrɩ̃ wa ta nɩ a bibir ʋlↄ a ana yele na maala wa. A-na-ɩ faa sↄw nɩ puor a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ na sɛw a maal a daar ɩ̃ wa ta wa.”
42001021	A nɩbɛ bala cãa na ɩraa gu a Jakarɩ, a nↄɛ ko ba a mɩnɛ ʋ na kam a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ a lɛ.
42001022	A lɛ ʋ na yi, Ꞌwaa dãa tʋↄrↄ ƴɛrɛ nɩ ba wa, a ba bↄ̃w ka bom nyɩr ʋ na a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ. A nur ʋ mɩɩnɛ nɩ ba, ɩ̃ Ꞌwaa tʋↄrↄ ƴɛrɛ wa.
42001023	A lɛ a ʋ Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ tʋmↄ jewfʋ bibir na ta, ʋ yi na kul a ʋ yir.
42001024	A ɩ na fɩ̃ɩ ɩ̃ a ʋ pↄw Elijabɛtɩ tɛrɛ pʋↄ na ʋ sↄↄlɩ̃ nɩ cur anuu,
42001025	yele nɩ: “Nyɛ a ala a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na maal a ɩ̃ jie. A daar ta na, ʋ Ꞌwuor ma, ɩ̃ ir a ɩ̃ vĩ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na dãa tɛrɛ a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw.”
42001026	A lɛ a Elijabɛtɩ na tɛrɛ a ʋ pʋↄ maalʼɩ̃ cur ayʋↄb, a Naaŋmɩn tʋ̃ na a ʋ sɩ-tʋnaa Gabɩyɛl a Galile, tẽw kãw pʋↄ na dɩ a Najarɛtɩ,
42001027	be a pↄsabile kãw sɛ̃, na ɩ a Jojɛfʋ baraa. A Jojɛfʋ sãa-kʋmↄ nɩ a Davɩtɩ na dãa ɩ a jamana. Ɩ̃ a pↄsabile ʋlↄ yuor ɩ̃ dɩ a Maarɩɩ.
42001028	A sɩ-tʋnaa kpɛ na a ʋ sɛ̃ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Ɩ̃ puor fʋ na, a fʋ̃ʋ a Naaŋmɩn na vɛl ir maal a vɩlaa. A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ be nɩ fʋ na.”
42001029	A ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ dama na a Maarɩɩ suur, ʋ sooro a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ a puorfʋ ʋlↄ par.
42001030	A sɩ-tʋnaa yel ʋ: “Maarɩɩ! Taa jↄrↄ dãbɩ̃ɛ wa. A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn vɛl fʋ na ir maal a vɩlaa.
42001031	Nyɛ, fʋ na tɛrɛ na a pʋↄ, dↄw dabile, na fʋ pʋr ʋ a yuor Jeeju.
42001032	Ʋ na ɩ na nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ ba na bʋↄlↄ ʋ na a saa juu Naaŋmɩn Bie. A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Naaŋmɩn na biin ʋ na ʋ ɩ a jamana a ʋ sãa-kʋmↄ Davɩtɩ kaarɩ̃.
42001033	Ʋ na ɩ na a Jakↄb yir deme jamana a daar a jaa, ɩ̃ a ʋ fãw kↄ̃ tɛrɛ baarfʋ daar wa.”
42001034	A Maarɩɩ soor a sɩ-tʋnaa: “Mɩnɛ a na tʋↄ ɩ a lɛ? A-na-ɩ maa bↄ̃w daba sɛr wa.”
42001035	A sɩ-tʋnaa yel ʋ: “A Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na suu na a fʋ jie ɩ̃ a saa juu Naaŋmɩn fãw na piw fʋ na. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a bie ʋlↄ fʋ na dↄwrↄ na ɩ na cɛcɛ, ɩ̃ ba na bʋↄlↄ ʋ na a Naaŋmɩn Bie.
42001036	Nyɛ, a fʋ yɛbɛ Elijabɛtɩ ba na dãa bʋↄlↄ a pↄw ab, ʋ tɛrɛ na pʋↄ a ʋ korfʋ daar a ɩ cur ayʋↄb a dɩnaa.
42001037	A-na-ɩ bom ma be be a Naaŋmɩn maala faara wa.”
42001038	A Maarɩɩ yel: “Ɩ̃ ɩ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ tʋ̃tʋnↄ. Á maal a lɛ a ɩ̃ jie a mɩnɛ fʋ na yel.” A sɩ-tʋnaa bar ʋ na ɩ̃ yi cen.
42001039	A ʋna daarʼãa, a Maarɩɩ yi na pↄↄrↄ cere a Jude wɩɛr kãw pʋↄ na be a tan loor.
42001040	Ʋ ta na kpɛ a Jakarɩ yir, puor a Elijabɛtɩ.
42001041	A mɩnɛ a Elijabɛtɩ na wõ a Maarɩɩ puorfʋ, a ʋ bie lɩɛbɛ na a ʋ puorɩ̃, ɩ̃ ʋ sɛw nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ,
42001042	ɩ̃ ʋ wuurʼɩ̃ kpɛ̃w yele: “A Naaŋmɩn be nɩ fʋ na gãw a pↄↄbↄ ba jaa, ɩ̃ ʋ mɩ be nɩ na a bie ʋlↄ na be a fʋ puorɩ̃.
42001043	Bõ ɩ mɩ ɩ a ɩ̃ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ mã mɩ wa a ɩ̃ sɛ̃?
42001044	A-na-ɩ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na tↄↄ wõ a fʋ puorfʋ, a nʋmↄ na a bie ʋ lɩɛbɛ a ɩ̃ puorɩ̃.
42001045	A nʋmↄ fʋ na a-na-ɩ fʋ sↄw nɩ na puor, áa ala a jaa a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na yel fʋ na maalʼã a lɛ.”
42001046	A Maarɩɩ yel: “Ɩ̃ pɛwrɛ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ a ɩ̃ pʋↄ pʋↄ,
42001047	ɩ̃ a ɩ̃ sɩɛ mɩ cɩlɛ na a ɩ̃ Fafaara Naaŋmɩn ɩnɛ,
42001048	a-na-ɩ ʋ Ꞌwuorʼã a ʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃-poole na pab. Wa nyↄw nɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, a bal par bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ba jaa na yelʼã a nʋ̃ↄ ƴala ma na,
42001049	a-na-ɩ a Fãw Sʋbↄ maalʼã tʋ̃-bɛrɛ a ɩ̃ jie. A ʋ yuor ɩ na cɛcɛ.
42001050	A ʋ nã-bↄ̃wfʋ ma be nɩ na a bal par bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ba jaa na jↄrↄ ʋ.
42001051	Ʋ miilʼã a mɩnɛ a ʋ nuu fãgã na wↄ̃, ʋ yɛ̃yɛlɩ̃ na a bala na dãa tɛrɛ a yo-bↄfʋ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ a ba suur pʋↄ bar.
42001052	Ʋ irʼã a jamansɩ a ba jaajiir bar, ɩ̃ maal a bala na pab a ba lɩɛb ɩ nɩ-bɛrɛ.
42001053	Ʋ kʋ na a kↄ̃ deme a yel-sono a sɛw ba, ɩ̃ diw a tɛraa deme bar a ba cenʼɩ̃ nu-jaalsɩ.
42001054	-
42001055	Ʋ wa na sũo a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnↄ Ɩsɩrayɛl a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa pʋlɩ̃ nɩ a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ, ɩ̃ Ꞌwaa hiin a ʋ nã-bↄ̃wfʋ ʋ na tɛrɛ nɩ a Abʋraham nɩ a ʋ bal par deme a daar a jaa wa.”
42001056	A Maarɩɩ maalʼã cur ata a Elijabɛtɩ sɛ̃, ɩ̃ wa pãa kul.
42001057	A Elijabɛtɩ bie dↄwfʋ daar ta na, ʋ dↄw dabile.
42001058	A ʋ taarba nɩ a ʋ yir deme wõ na a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na sɩrɩ̃ maal ʋ a vɩlaa, ɩ̃ na ba mɩ tɛrɛ a nʋ̃ↄ a ʋ kaarɩ̃.
42001059	A bibie anuu-nʼata dayen ba wɩ na a bie yʋↄr ŋmaafʋ ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ba pʋr ʋ a yuor a Jakarɩ na ɩ a ʋ sãa yuor.
42001060	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋ mã yelʼã a Ꞌwaa dɩrɛ a lɛ wa, á Jã ba na bʋↄlↄ ʋ.
42001061	A ba yel ʋ: “Nɩrɛ ma be be a fʋ yir deme sↄ̃w na dɩ a ʋna yuor wa.”
42001062	Ɩ̃ na ba mɩɩn a sãa nɩ a nur bʋↄrↄ ba bↄ̃w a yo-buor ʋ na bʋↄrↄ ba pʋr ʋ.
42001063	A Jakarɩ ɩ a ba kʋ ʋ sɛbɛ, ʋ sɛb ƴↄ̃w yel áa ʋ yuor dɩ na Jã. A nↄɛ ko a nɩbɛ ba jaa.
42001064	A jie naan, a Jakarɩ nʋↄr Ꞌlaw na, a ʋ dɛlɩ̃bir mɩ Ꞌlor, ʋ lɛ ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ pɛwrɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn.
42001065	A dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw a ba lãa-pɩɛlbɛ ba jaa, ɩ̃ a ba mɩ mana a ala na ta kʋrↄ taa a Jude wɩɛr ʋ jaa pʋↄ na be a tan jur.
42001066	A bala ba jaa na wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃, de ʋ na ƴↄ̃w a ba suur pʋↄ ɩ̃ yele: “Mɩnɛ a bibile na nↄↄ be? A-na-ɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ fãw be nɩ ʋ na sɩrɛ jaa.”
42001067	A Jã sãa Jakarɩ sɛw nɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ, ɩ̃ hiere yele nɩ:
42001068	“Nyɩ́ pɛwrɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na ɩ a Ɩsɩrayɛl Naaŋmɩn, a-na-ɩ ʋ wa na a ʋ nɩbɛ sɛ̃ na ʋ faa ba.
42001069	Ʋ ƴↄ̃w sɩ na Fafaar-gãdaa be a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnↄ Davɩtɩ yir deme sↄ̃w,
42001070	a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa ƴↄ̃w a ʋ ƴɛr-hier-sono a ba yel a korĩ-cɛ jaa.
42001071	Ʋ yel sɩ na á ʋ na faa sɩ na a sɩ sama-deme jie, lãa faa nɩ sɩ a bala ba jaa na Ꞌlaar sɩ nuumɩ.
42001072	Lɛ ʋ ma miilʼɩ̃ a ʋ nã-bↄ̃wfʋ a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ jie, ɩ̃ ma mɩ tɩɛr bↄ̃w nɩ a ʋ pʋlɩ̃-son,
42001073	tu nɩ a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa pʋlɩ̃ nɩ a sɩ sãa-kʋmↄ Abʋraham,
42001074	a ʋ na faa sɩ na a sɩ sama-deme nuumɩ, a sɩ na tʋↄ tʋnↄ a ʋ tʋmↄ, kↄ̃ jↄrↄ dãbɩ̃ɛ wa,
42001075	ɩ̃ na sɩ ow kpee ɩ cɛcɛ, ɩ nɩ nɩ-torisɩ a ʋ nii-sↄw a sɩ baafʋ bibie a jaa pʋↄ.
42001076	Ɩ̃ a fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ bie, ba na bʋↄlↄ fʋ na a saa juu Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere a-na-ɩ fʋ na de na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nĩe gbɛɛrɛ a ʋ sↄr,
42001077	na fʋ miil a ʋ nɩbɛ a ba bↄ̃w a faafʋ sↄr,
42001078	a na yi a ba maal-faar a Naaŋmɩn na diere bara kʋrↄ ba ɩnɛ. A-na-ɩ a nã-bↄ̃wfʋ ƴala na a sɩ Naaŋmɩn jie, a ala ɩnɛ a saꞋlon caa nↄↄ wa pur caarɩ̃ sɩ,
42001079	a mɩnɛ ʋ na tʋↄ caarɩ̃ a bala na be a libe pʋↄ, nɩ a bala na pɩɛlʼɩ̃ a kũu, ɩ̃ tↄwrↄ sɩ ƴↄnↄ a pɩɛnfʋ sↄr pʋↄ.”
42001080	A bile nʋ̃ↄnↄ na ɩ̃ a ʋ sɩɛ mɩ pↄwrↄ a fãgã. A wɛkar pʋↄ ʋ be wa ta nɩ a ʋna bibir ʋ na wa yi a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ nii-sↄw.
42002001	A ʋna daarʼãa a ƴɛrɩ̃ yi na a jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ Ogusi sɛ̃ na yel a ba sↄr a nɩbɛ ba jaa na be a ʋ ten a jaa pʋↄ.
42002002	A sↄrfʋ na ɩ̃ ɩ a dãdãw sↄrfʋ na maal a lɛdaar a Kirinisi na ɩ a Sɩrɩ jamana.
42002003	A nɩbɛ ba jaa bõ-ƴene-ƴene cenʼã a ba mɩ̃ɛ ten pʋʋr a sↄrfʋ ɩnɛ.
42002004	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Jojɛfʋ mɩ yi na a Najarɛtɩ na be a Galile wɩɛr ɩ̃ cen a Jude, a jamana Davɩtɩ tẽ-dↄwraa ba na bʋↄlↄ a Bɛtɩlɛm, a-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ mɩ ɩ na a Davɩtɩ yir sʋbↄ nɩ a ʋ bal nɩrɛ.
42002005	Ʋ cenʼɩ̃ na a ʋ baraa Maarɩɩ na tɛrɛ a pʋↄ, a ba na lãa sↄr ba.
42002006	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na dãa cãa be a be, a Maarɩɩ dↄwfʋ daar ta na,
42002007	ʋ dↄw a ʋ pↄsabie ʋ ɩ dabile, ɩ̃ vilĩ ʋ a cẽcen gaal a dʋn mʋ̃ↄ ƴↄ̃wfʋ jie, a-na-ɩ baa pↄw a die a sáanba yir pʋↄ wa.
42002008	A ʋna tẽw naa pʋↄ, dↄ-cɩɩnbɛ dãa na be be gana a mↄↄ pʋↄ a tɩsↄw, gure a ba piir,
42002009	a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnaa nyɩr ba a be ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn cãa nyɩnyɩl pↄw ba, a pʋlɩ̃nyɛ nyɩrɩ̃ vʋ̃ↄ ba.
42002010	Ɩ̃ a sɩ-tʋnaa yel ba: “Nyɩ taa jↄrↄ dãbɩ̃ɛ wa. Yɛr-son ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ kʋrↄ nyɩ na ɩrɛɛ nʋ̃ↄ kpɛ̃ɛ a nɩbɛ ba jaa jie.
42002011	A dɩnaa tɩsↄw na, a Davɩtɩ tẽw pʋↄ, ba dↄw na a Fafaara a nyɩ ɩnɛ, na ɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a Kirisi.
42002012	Nyɩ́ nyɛ a jɩbaa ʋlↄ nyɩ na bↄ̃wnↄ nɩ ʋ: nyɩ na nyɛ na bi-pɩɩlaa ba na vilĩ cẽcen gaal a dʋn mʋ̃ↄ ƴↄ̃wfʋ jie.”
42002013	Ɩ̃ a jie naan, a saꞋlon sↄdaalsɩ yaw jie wa na pↄw a sɩ-tʋnaa ʋlↄ, ɩ̃ pɛwrɛ a Naaŋmɩn yele nɩ:
42002014	“A Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ sↄ a ju-kpɛ̃ɛ a saꞋlon iin ɩ̃ a pɩɛnfʋ ú be a tẽw pʋↄ, a bala ʋ na nʋnↄ jie.”
42002015	A lɛ a sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ na bar a dↄ-cɩɩnbɛ ɩ̃ lɩɛb do a saꞋlon, ba yele na taa: “Nyɩ ɩ a sɩ cen a Bɛtɩlɛm na nyɛ a ala na ta, a ala ɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na tʋ̃ yel sɩ.”
42002016	Ba pↄw na cen na ta nyɛ a Maarɩɩ, nɩ a Jojɛfʋ, nɩ a bi-pɩɩlaa ba na gaal a dʋn mʋ̃ↄ ƴↄ̃wfʋ jie.
42002017	A lɛ ba na nyɛ ʋ, ba manʼã a ala a sɩ-tʋnaa na dãa yel ba a bibile ʋlↄ ɩnɛ,
42002018	a nↄɛ ko a bala ba jaa na wõ a ala a dↄ-cɩɩnbɛ na yele ba.
42002019	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Maarɩɩ bↄ̃w na tɛrɛ a ana yele a jaa a ʋ pʋ̃ↄ ɩ̃ pɛrɛ.
42002020	A dↄ-cɩɩnbɛ lɩɛbʼã cen na kʋrↄ a Naaŋmɩn a ju-kpɛ̃ɛ pɛwrɛ nɩ ʋ a ala a jaa ɩnɛ ba na wõ ɩ̃ mɩ nyɛ, a be a lɛ a mɩnɛ a sɩ-tʋnaa na dãa yel ba.
42002021	A bibie anuu-nʼata dayen, na ɩ a ʋ yʋↄr ŋmaafʋ bibir ta na, a ba pʋr ʋ a yuor Jeeju, na ɩ a yuor ʋlↄ a sɩ-tʋnaa na dãa tɩɩr, ɩ̃ a ʋ mã Maarɩɩ ma dãa tɛrɛ a ʋ pʋↄ sɛr wa.
42002022	-
42002024	A mɩnɛ a Maarɩɩ pↄdↄↄr na baar ʋ yi a ʋ pↄdↄↄr diem, a ʋlↄ nɩ a Jojɛfʋ irʼã tu a ƴɛr-kpɛn sↄr a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na dãa miil a Mowisi, á ba de a dabil ba jaa na ɩ a pↄsabiir kʋ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ. Ba de na a bie cenʼɩ̃ a Jerujalɛm a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ kʋfʋ jie, ɩ̃ mɩ de a baar-lo-bom a mɩnɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴɛr-kpɛ̃w na yel: a ŋmama ayi mɩɩ naŋmam-pↄlↄ ayi.
42002025	A be a Jerujalɛm, daba kãw be na be na dɩ Sɩmẽw. Ʋ ɩ na nɩ-toraa ɩ̃ mɩ jↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃ jɛ ƴↄ̃w toor cɛlɛ a ʋlↄ na waara faara a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ a ba won pʋↄ. A Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ be nɩ ʋ na,
42002026	ɩ̃ yel ʋ a ʋ na de na nĩe nyɛ a Kirisi ʋlↄ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na tʋ̃ ɩ̃ wa pãa bɩɛr kpi.
42002027	A Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tↄw na a Sɩmẽw cenʼɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a Jojɛfʋ nɩ a Maarɩɩ wɩ nɩ na a ba bie Jeeju a be, a mɩnɛ a ba na maal ʋ a ala a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn na yel.
42002028	A Sɩmẽw de ʋ na ƴↄ̃w a ʋ nuu pʋↄ, ɩ̃ pɛw a Naaŋmɩn yel:
42002029	“A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, fʋ na tʋↄ na bar a fʋ tʋ̃tʋnↄ ʋ cenʼɩ̃ pɩɛnfʋ, a-na-ɩ a fʋ pʋlɩ̃fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ maalʼã baar:
42002030	a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ mimir nyɛ na a fʋ faafʋ
42002031	ʋlↄ fʋ na gbɛɛrɩ̃ a bal bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ba jaa nii-sↄw,
42002032	na ɩ a cãa na caara a nɩ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ a ba bↄ̃wnↄ fʋ, ɩ̃ mɩ maala a Ɩsɩrayɛl na ɩ a fʋ nɩbɛ yuor ʋ yire.”
42002033	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju sãa nɩ a ʋ mã na wõ a ala a Sɩmẽw na yel, nʋↄr ko ba na.
42002034	A Sɩmẽw sʋↄrʼã a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w ba ɩ̃ yel a Jeeju mã, Maarɩɩ: “A Naaŋmɩn vɛlʼã ir a bie na a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ yaw lofʋ ɩnɛ, nɩ a ba lɩɛb irfʋ ɩnɛ. A Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w ʋ na ʋ ɩ jɩbaa a nɩ-yaw na ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛr-bebe ƴↄnↄ ʋ,
42002035	a mɩnɛ a yaw jie pʋ-tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ na yi a cãa pʋↄ. Ɩ̃ a fʋ̃ʋ mɩ, a na wʋlↄ fʋ na wↄ̃ taa nɩ bãjɩnɛ ba na cↄrʼɩ̃ fʋ a suur.”
42002036	Pↄw kãw mɩ dãa na be be na dɩ a An na ma ƴɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, a ʋ sãa na dɩ Panʋwɛl na ɩ a Asɛɛr bal nɩrɛ. A pↄw ʋlↄ korʼã yaw. Ʋ dãa na kul a sɩrɛ a ʋ pↄsabile daar maalʼɩ̃ yomo anuu-nʼayi,
42002037	ɩ̃ jɛ ɩ kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄw wa ta nɩ yomo lɩjaanaan nʼanaan. ꞋWaa yire a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ wa; ʋ tʋnↄ na a Naaŋmɩn tʋn a tɩsↄw nɩ a mↄtↄ̃w, ma lũ nɩ a nʋↄr puoro nɩ a Naaŋmɩn.
42002038	Ʋ ta na a be a daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ, pɛwrɛ a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a Jeeju ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ ba jaa bala na gu a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn nↄↄ faara a Jerujalɛm-tẽw.
42002039	A lɛ a Maarɩɩ nɩ a Jojɛfʋ na maal a tʋmↄ a jaa baar tu nɩ a mɩnɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴɛr-kpɛn na yel, ba lɩɛbʼã kul a ba tẽw, Najarɛtɩ, na be a Galile wɩɛr.
42002040	A Jeeju nʋ̃ↄnↄ na lãa pↄwrↄ nɩ a fãgã mɩ tɛrɛ nɩ a kpaarfʋ, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn sũofʋ be a ʋ jie.
42002041	A yomo a jaa, a Jeeju dↄↄrbↄ ma cenʼã a Jerujalɛm a Pakɩ fɛtɩ ɩnɛ.
42002042	A lɛ a Jeeju na pↄw a yomo pie-nʼayi, ba cenʼɩ̃ ʋ na a fɛtɩ ʋlↄ jie a mɩnɛ ba na ma cere a yomo a jaa.
42002043	A lɛ a fɛtɩ bibie na tↄl baar, ba lɛ lɩɛbʼã kule ɩ̃ a Jeeju cãa jɛ be a Jerujalɛm, ɩ̃ a ʋ dↄↄrbↄ ma dãa bↄ̃wnaa wa.
42002044	Ba dãa na tɩɛr beeka ʋ pↄw na a ba nɩbɛ kule nɩ, ɩ̃ maal bibir bõ-ƴen a sↄr juu, ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ʋ yʋↄrↄ nɩ a ba yir deme nɩ a ba nɩ-bↄ̃wsɩ jie.
42002045	Ɩ̃-cɛ baa nyɛ ʋ wa, ɩ̃ lɛ lɩɛb cen a Jerujalɛm a ʋ bↄfʋ jie.
42002046	Ba bↄ ʋ na maalʼɩ̃ bibie ata ɩ̃ wa pãa nyɛ ʋ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, ʋ lãa jɛ nɩ a Jufisɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn-jaanba, cɛlɛ a ba ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, sooro nɩ ba a yele par.
42002047	A bala ba jaa na wõ a mɩnɛ ʋ na ire a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ par, nↄɛ ko ba na a ʋ yɛ̃ ɩnɛ.
42002048	A lɛ a ʋ dↄↄrbↄ na nyɛ ʋ, nↄɛ kpal ba na. Ɩ̃ a ʋ mã soor ʋ: “Ɩ̃ bie! Bõ ɩ a fʋ maal sɩ a nↄhↄ̃? A fʋ bↄfʋ ƴↄ̃w na a maa nɩ a fʋ sãa dɛn.”
42002049	A Jeeju yel ba: “Bõ ɩ a nyɩ bʋↄrↄ ma? Nyaa dãa bↄ̃w ka a sɛw na ɩ̃ na jɛ a ɩ̃ Sãa yir pʋↄ wa mɩɩ?”
42002050	Ɩ̃-cɛ baa bↄ̃w a ala ʋ na yel ba par wa,
42002051	ɩ̃ na ʋ ir pↄw ba kulʼɩ̃ a Najarɛtɩ, ɩ̃ wono ba a toor, ɩ̃ a ʋ mã ƴↄ̃w a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a jaa a ʋ suur pʋↄ.
42002052	A Jeeju nʋ̃ↄnↄ na, a ʋ yɛ̃ mɩ dↄↄlↄ, ɩ̃ a ʋ ben nʋmↄ a Naaŋmɩn nɩ a nɩbɛ mɩ.
42003001	A daar ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ na ta a Jã, a ɩ na a jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ Tɩbɛɛr yomo pie-nʼanuu pʋↄ. A lɛdaar a Pↄ̃sɩ Pɩlatɩ mɩ ɩ a Jude-tẽw jamana, a Ɛrↄdɩ mɩ ɩ a Galile jamana, ɩ̃ a ʋ yɛbɛ Fɩlɩpɩ ɩ a Iture nɩ a Tirakoni jamana, ɩ̃ a Lɩsanɩya ɩ a Abɩlɛn-tẽw jamana.
42003002	A ʋna daar, a An nɩ a Kayifi ɩ̃ mɩ dãa ɩ a Naaŋmɩn baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ. A Naaŋmɩn de na a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋ a Jã na ɩ a Jakarɩ bi-daba a be a wɛkar pʋↄ,
42003003	ʋ yↄ a ten ala a jaa pʋↄ na pɩɛlʼɩ̃ a Jʋrdɛ̃ man, hiere yele a nɩbɛ a ba lɩɛb a ba yɛ̃ ɩ̃ wa ʋ mʋr ba a kʋ̃ↄ, a Naaŋmɩn de a ba maal-faar bar kʋ ba.
42003004	A yele ala ta na a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere Ejayi na dãa sɛb ƴↄ̃w a ʋ sɛbɛ pʋↄ yele: “Ʋ ɩ na a nɩrɛ na wuure a wɛkar pʋↄ yele: Nyɩ́ gbɛɛrɩ̃ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sↄr, nyɩ́ cↄↄrɩ̃ a ʋ sↄr-bil a tor.
42003005	A kokorsɩ a jaa na ɓʋrʼã, a tã-bɛrɛ nɩ a tã-bil a jaa na wɛlʼã gaal tene, a jiir ala na gↄ̃w na torʼã, a sↄr nyara-nyarasɩ na ɩ na pↄlↄ-pↄlↄ,
42003006	ɩ̃ a bal bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ba jaa na nyɛ na a Naaŋmɩn faafʋ.”
42003007	A Jã ma dãa na yele a nɩ-yaw bala na waara a ʋ jie a ʋ mʋr ba a kʋ̃ↄ: “Nyɩna waab bibiirʼãa! Ala ɩ̃ man nyɩ a nyɩ na tʋↄ na jↄ cɩ̃ɛ a Naaŋmɩn su-tuo ɩnɛ na waara?
42003008	Nyɩ́ ɩ a nyɩ maal-bie a miile áa nyɩ yɛ̃ lɩɛbʼã, ɩ̃ nyɩ taa cãa yele a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ á nyɩ ɩ na a Abʋraham bibiir wa. Ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na: a Naaŋmɩn na tʋↄ na maal a kʋsɩɛ asɩmɛ a lɩɛb ɩ a Abʋraham bibiir.
42003009	Wa nyↄw nɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ ba gↄrʼã jɛw a kpãakpo bʋↄrↄ nɩ a tɩɛ nyɩbɛ ŋmaafʋ. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a tɩɛ lɛ na ma wↄnↄ a wↄ̃-sono wa, ba na ŋmaa ʋ na lↄb ƴↄ̃w a vũu pʋↄ.”
42003010	A mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ na wõ a lɛ, ba soorʼã a Jã-Batii a bõ ba sɛw ba maal,
42003011	ʋ yel ba: “A nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a kparsɩ ayi ú ir bõ-ƴen kʋ a ʋlↄ na ma tɛrɛ wa, ɩ̃ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a bõ-dɩraa, ú mɩ maal a lɛ.”
42003012	A lãpo-dierbe mɩ wa na, bʋↄrↄ a Jã ʋ mʋr ba a kʋ̃ↄ, ɩ̃ na ba soor ʋ: “Jãjaana, bõ sɩ sɛw sɩ maal?”
42003013	Ʋ yel ba: “Nyɩ taa diere bom dↄↄlↄ a ala juu ba na ƴↄ̃w á nyɩ ma de wa.”
42003014	A sↄdaalsɩ mɩ soor ʋ: “Ɩ̃ a sɩmɩ, bõ sɩ sɛw sɩ maal?” Ʋ yel ba: “Nyɩ taa diere nɩrɛ bom nɩ fãgã wa, nyɩ taa ŋmaara jir-kar ƴↄnↄ nɩrɛ wa. Nyɩ́ ɩ a nyɩ yar a sɛw nɩ nyɩ.”
42003015	A nɩbɛ dãa na jɛ ƴↄ̃w a toor cɛlɛ ɩ̃ pɛrɛ a ba sube pʋↄ a ala ɩ a Jã ɩ̃ ɩ a Kirisi,
42003016	a Jã yel a ba jaa: “A maa, ɩ̃ mʋrↄ nɩ nyɩ na a kʋ̃ↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a fãw gãw ma be na be waara, ɩ̃ maa sɛw nɩ a ʋ nafaba sɩɩrfʋ wa. A ʋlↄ, a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nɩ a vũu pʋↄ ʋ na mʋr nyɩ.
42003017	Ʋ tɛrɛ na a ʋ ci-ŋme-daa a ʋ nuu pʋↄ, ʋ na ŋmeere nɩ a ci ɩ̃ yɛlɛ, suure a ci-bie a ʋ boor pʋↄ, ɩ̃ ƴↄnↄ a ure a vũu pʋↄ na ma be kpiinfʋ wa.”
42003018	A Jã lɛ jaan ba na yele yaw, ƴɛrɛ nɩ ba a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son.
42003019	Ɩ̃ ʋ mɩ de na a jamana Ɛrↄdɩ fãa miilʼɩ̃ ʋ a ʋ yɛbɛ pↄw Ɛrↄdɩya ɩnɛ ʋ na de, ɩ̃ mɩ miilʼɩ̃ ʋ a ʋ tʋ̃-faar a jaa ʋ na tʋ̃,
42003020	a Ɛrↄdɩ lɛ dↄↄl a asɩmɛ a ʋ maal-faar a jaa juu: ʋ ɩ na a ba nyↄw a Jã ƴↄ̃w a kasu pʋↄ.
42003021	A mɩnɛ a Jã na dãa mʋr a nɩbɛ ba jaa a kʋ̃ↄ baar, lãa nɩ a Jeeju, a Jeeju sʋↄrↄ na a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ a saꞋlon yuo,
42003022	ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ de a naŋmam ɩ̃gan suu wa jɛ a ʋ juu, ɩ̃ a ba wõ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a yi be a saꞋlon yele: “Fʋ̃ʋ ɩ a ɩ̃ Bi-nʋnaa, na kpɛ a ɩ̃ suur pʋↄ.”
42003023	A Jeeju yomo dãa na tara lɩjɛrʼɩ̃-pie a mɩnɛ ʋ na nyↄw a ʋ tʋn. A nɩbɛ dãa na tɩɛrɛ á ʋ ɩ na a Jojɛfʋ bie, na ɩ a Eli bi-daba.
42003024	-
42003038	Nyɛ a mɩnɛ a Jeeju bal-par na be: A Naaŋmɩn mɛ na a Adã, a Adã dↄw a Sɛtɩ, a Sɛtɩ ɩraa ɩ̃ dↄw a Enↄsɩ, a Enↄsɩ ɩraa ɩ̃ dↄw a Kayɩna, a Kayɩna dↄw a Malele, a Malele dↄw a Jarɛdɩ, a Jarɛdɩ dↄw a Ɛnↄkɩ, a Ɛnↄkɩ dↄw a Matusala, a Matusala dↄw a Lamɛkɩ, a Lamɛkɩ dↄw a Nowe, a Nowe dↄw a Sɛm, a Sɛm dↄw a Afasadɩ, a Afasadɩ dↄw a Kayɩna, a Kayɩna dↄw a Sala, a Sala dↄw a Ebɛɛr, a Ebɛɛr dↄw a Falɛkɩ, a Falɛkɩ dↄw a Aragayi, a Aragayi dↄw a Seriki, a Seriki dↄw a Nakↄↄr, a Nakↄↄr dↄw a Tara, a Tara dↄw a Abʋraham, a Abʋraham dↄw a Ɩjakɩ, a Ɩjakɩ dↄw a Jakↄb, a Jakↄb dↄw a Juda, a Juda dↄw a Farɛsɩ, a Farɛsɩ dↄw a Ɛsɩrↄ̃, a Ɛsɩrↄ̃ dↄw a Arɩnɩ, a Arɩnɩ dↄw a Adɩmɩ, a Adɩmɩ dↄw a Aminadab, a Aminadab dↄw a Naasõ, a Naasõ dↄw a Sala, a Sala dↄw a Booji, a Booji dↄw a Obɛdɩ, a Obɛdɩ dↄw a Jɛsɩ, a Jɛsɩ dↄw a Davɩtɩ, a Davɩtɩ dↄw a Natã, a Natã dↄw a Matata, a Matata dↄw a Mɛna, a Mɛna dↄw a Meleya, a Meleya dↄw a Elaakɩm, a Elaakɩm dↄw a Jonam, a Jonam dↄw a Jojɛfʋ, a Jojɛfʋ dↄw a Juda, a Juda dↄw a Sɩmẽw, a Sɩmẽw dↄw a Levi, a Levi dↄw a Mata, a Mata dↄw a Jorim, a Jorim dↄw a Elajɛɛr, a Elajɛɛr dↄw a Jeeju, a Jeeju dↄw a Ɛɛr, a Ɛɛr dↄw a Ɛmadã, a Ɛmadã dↄw a Kosam, a Kosam dↄw a Adɩ, a Adɩ dↄw a Mɛlɩkɩ, a Mɛlɩkɩ dↄw a Neri, a Neri dↄw a Salatɩɛl, a Salatɩɛl dↄw a Jorobabɛl, a Jorobabɛl dↄw a Eresa, a Eresa dↄw a Jowana, a Jowana dↄw a Joda, a Joda dↄw a Jojɛkɩ, a Jojɛkɩ dↄw a Semeyi, a Semeyi dↄw a Matatɩya, a Matatɩya dↄw a Maatɩ, a Maatɩ dↄw a Nagayi, a Nagayi dↄw a Ɛsɩlɩ, a Ɛsɩlɩ dↄw a Nahom, a Nahom dↄw a Amↄsɩ, a Amↄsɩ dↄw a Matatɩya, a Matatɩya dↄw a Jojɛfʋ, a Jojɛfʋ dↄw a Janayi, a Janayi dↄw a Mɛlɩkɩ, a Mɛlɩkɩ dↄw a Levi, a Levi dↄw a Mata, a Mata dↄw a Eli, a Eli dↄw a Jojɛfʋ, ʋlↄ a nɩbɛ na dãa tɩɛrɛ ʋ ɩ a Jeeju sãa.
42004001	A Jeeju paalʼɩ̃ na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na ʋ yi a Jʋrdɛ̃ man wɩɛr ɩ̃ lɩɛb wa, a Sɩɛ tↄw ʋ cenʼɩ̃ a wɛkar pʋↄ,
42004002	a Satã bɩɩr ʋ maalʼɩ̃ bibie lɩjaayi. ꞋWaa dãa dɩ bom a bibie ala pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a daar ʋlↄ na tↄl, kↄ̃ nyↄw ʋ na.
42004003	A Satã yel ʋ: “A ala ɩ fʋ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Bie, yel a kʋsɩrʼã ʋ lɩɛb ɩ bõ-dɩraa.”
42004004	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A sɛbʼã a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: ʻAa ɩ a bõ-dɩraa tɛw ɩ̃ na tʋↄ kʋ a nɩrɛ a baafʋ wa.ʼ ”
42004005	A Satã do nɩ ʋ tãw ju-sↄ̃w ɩ̃ miil ʋ a ten a jaa na be a ka a tẽ-daa ʋ jaa juu, ʋ nyɛ ba lɛ dilo,
42004006	ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Ɩ̃ na kʋ fʋ na a fãw a ten ala pʋↄ a jaa, nɩ a ba na-yele, a-na-ɩ maa ba kʋ, ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ na sↄr na kʋ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na bʋↄrↄ.
42004007	Fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ na sↄ a ala a jaa, a ala ɩ fʋ gburi na a dume ɩ̃ puor ma.”
42004008	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A sɛbʼã a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: ʻA Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na ɩ a fʋ Naaŋmɩn fʋ sɛw fʋ puor, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ tɛw ɩ̃ sɛw fʋ tʋnↄ kʋrↄ.ʼ ”
42004009	A Satã lɛ cenʼɩ̃ ʋ na a Jerujalɛm na ʋ dↄↄl ʋ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ ju-sↄ̃w ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “A ala ɩ fʋ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Bie, aw lo a tene, a-na-ɩ a sɛbʼã a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ:
42004010	ʻA Naaŋmɩn na ƴↄ̃w na a ʋ sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ a ba gu fʋ tɛɛlɛ,ʼ
42004011	ɩ̃ a lɛ sɛbʼã go: ʻBa na cↄw fʋ na nɩ a ba nur, a mɩnɛ fʋ kↄ̃ wa ŋme gbɛr wa.ʼ ”
42004012	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A yelʼã a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: ʻTaa bɩɩrɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na ɩ a fʋ Naaŋmɩn wa.ʼ ”
42004013	A mɩnɛ a Satã na bɩɩr a Jeeju a lõbobo a jaa baar, ʋ cenʼã ɩ̃ cɛ ʋ, ɩ̃ gu a daar ʋlↄ na sɛw ʋ lɛ wa.
42004014	A Jeeju lɩɛbʼã kul a Galile nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ fãw, a ba ƴɛrɛ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ a Galile wɩɛr ʋ jaa pʋↄ.
42004015	Ʋ dãa na jaana a nɩbɛ a Naaŋmɩn sↄr a ba puorfʋ yie pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a ba jaa kpiire ʋ.
42004016	A Jeeju cenʼã a Najarɛtɩ na ɩ a tẽw ʋlↄ ʋ na dãa nʋ̃ↄ, na ʋ kpɛ a puorfʋ yir pʋↄ a bibi-ciiraa dayen, a mɩnɛ ʋ na ma maala, ɩ̃ ʋ irʼã bʋↄrↄ ʋ Ꞌwuor a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ kʋ a nɩbɛ.
42004017	A ba de a ƴɛr-hiere Esayi sɛbɛ kʋ ʋ, ʋ yuo nyɛ a jie ʋlↄ a na sɛb yel:
42004018	“A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ vɛl ma na ir ɩ̃ bar a ʋ Sɩɛ ʋ be nɩ ma, ɩ̃ na hier a ƴɛr-son kʋ a nãw deme. Ʋ tʋ̃ ma na ɩ̃ na hier yel a gbãgbaar a ba na sↄ ba mɩ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ mɩ hier yel a jↄn a ba lɛ nyɛrɛ. Ʋ tʋ̃ ma na ɩ̃ na faa a bala ba na kpowro,
42004019	ɩ̃ mɩ hier a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ maal-vɩlaa yuon kʋ a nɩbɛ,”
42004020	ɩ̃ na ʋ pↄw a sɛbɛ lɛ kʋ a tʋ̃tʋnↄ, ɩ̃ jɩnaa. A nɩbɛ bala ba jaa na dãa be be a puorfʋ yir pʋↄ vↄ̃ na a mimir cↄw ʋ,
42004021	ʋ nyↄw ɩ̃ yele ba: “A Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ na nyɩ na wõ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ maalʼã baar a dɩnaa.”
42004022	A nɩbɛ ba jaa ƴɛrɛ a ʋ son, ɩ̃ a nↄɛ ko ba a mɩnɛ ba na wõ a ƴɛr-vɛlɛ na yire a ʋ nʋↄrɩ̃, a ba yele: “Aa ɩ a Jojɛfʋ bi-daba nɩ a naa wa?”
42004023	A Jeeju yel ba: “Ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka nyɩ na lↄb ma na a sʋkpa na na yel: ʻDↄↄtʋrↄ, kpaar a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ wʋlɩ̃, ɩ̃ maal a ka a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ tẽw pʋↄ a ala a jaa sɩ na wõ a fʋ maalʼã a Kapɛɛnam-tẽw pʋↄ.ʼ ”
42004024	Ʋ lɛ yel ba na: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere ma be be a ʋ nɩbɛ bↄ̃w sↄw de ʋ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ tẽw pʋↄ wa.
42004025	Sɩrɛ jaa ɩ̃ yel nyɩ, a ƴɛr-hiere Eli daar, a lɛ a saa na dãa ŋmaa a yomo ata nɩ a cur ayʋↄb, a kↄ̃ kpɛ̃ɛ lo a tẽw ʋ jaa juu, kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄↄbↄ yayaw dãa na be be a Ɩsɩrayɛl-tẽw pʋↄ,
42004026	ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn ma dãa tʋ̃ a Eli bõ-ƴen kãw jie ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Sarɛpɩta-tẽw pↄw kãw jie na be a Sɩdↄ̃ wɩɛr ʋ wa.
42004027	A kↄn yayaw mɩ dãa na be a Ɩsɩrayɛl-tẽw pʋↄ a ƴɛr-hiere Elije daar, ɩ̃-cɛ bõ-ƴen kãw a ba sↄ̃w ma dãa pↄlɩ̃ ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Sɩrɩ-tẽw daba Naamã ʋ wa.”
42004028	A mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ bala na be a puorfʋ yir na wõ a ala, suur nyↄw ba na po nɩ,
42004029	a ba ir dar ʋ a tẽw pʋↄ yi nɩ cɛ̃cɛ̃w, na ba cenʼɩ̃ ʋ a tãw ʋlↄ juu a ba tẽw na be, ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ba daa ʋ kpar a tãw bↄw gbolĩkoor pʋↄ.
42004030	Ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ tↄl yi a ba sↄↄlɩ̃sↄw ɩ̃ cere.
42004031	A Jeeju cenʼã a Kapɛɛnam-tẽw na be a Galile wɩɛr, jaana a nɩbɛ a puorfʋ yir pʋↄ a bibi-ciiraa dayen.
42004032	A nↄɛ ko ba a yele ala ʋ na jaana ba ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ ʋ tɛrɛ na tʋↄfʋ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ pʋↄ.
42004033	A puorfʋ yir pʋↄ, daba kãw dãa na be be kↄ̃tↄn bier na tɛrɛ, ʋ wuurʼɩ̃ kpɛ̃w na ʋ yel:
42004034	“Waai! Najarɛtɩ Jeeju! Bõ ɩnɛ fʋ wa a ka? Má a sɩ sãwfʋ ɩnɛ fʋ wa. Ɩ̃ bↄ̃w na a ʋlↄ fʋ na ɩ, fʋ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn nɩ-cɛcɛ.”
42004035	A Jeeju ful ƴↄ̃w ʋ ɩ̃ yel: “Pↄw a nʋↄr! Yi cen ɩ̃ cɛ a daba,” a kↄ̃tↄn lↄb a daba a tene a nɩbɛ sↄ̃w ɩ̃ yi ɩ̃ cɛ ʋ, ɩ̃ ma ƴↄ̃w ʋ wʋlɩ̃ fɩ̃ɩ wa,
42004036	a ɩ ba jaa nↄ-kpaar a ba ƴɛrɛ kʋrↄ taa: “Yɛr-bõ nɩ a naa? A daba na tɛrɛ na tʋↄfʋ nɩ fãgã ma yel a sɩ-bebe a ba cen yi, a ba ma sɩrɩ̃ yi.”
42004037	Ɩ̃ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ ta na a ten ala a jaa na be a wɩɛr ʋlↄ pʋↄ.
42004038	A Jeeju yi na a puorfʋ yir pʋↄ ɩ̃ cen a Sɩmↄ̃ yir. A Sɩmↄ̃ dɩ̃ɛ-mã dãa na be be a ɩ̃gan kpor ʋ kpõ-kpõ, a ba sʋↄr a Jeeju a ʋ sũo ʋ,
42004039	ʋ gũu cↄw a pↄw ɩ̃ mʋ̃ↄ mimir ƴↄ̃w a ɩ̃gan kporfʋ, ʋ yi ɩ̃ cɛ ʋ, ʋ ir a jie naan ir ba a saan.
42004040	A mɩnɛ a wɩɛr na liwre, a nɩbɛ bala ba jaa na tɛrɛ a baalsɩ a wʋlɩ̃-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ na nyↄw, ba de ba na wa nɩ a Jeeju sɛ̃, ʋ dↄↄl ba a ʋ nur bõ-ƴene-ƴene ɩ̃ kpɛmɛ ba.
