42004041	A kↄ̃tↄnsɩ mɩ yi na a nɩ-yaw ɩ̃gana pʋↄ wuure yele nɩ: “Fʋ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Bie!” Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju ful ba ɩ̃ ma bara ba a ba na ƴɛr ƴɛrɩ̃ wa, a-na-ɩ ba bↄ̃w ka ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a Kirisi.
42004042	A lɛ a bio na vɩɛ, ʋ yi na cen wɛ-cɛ̃cɛ̃w. A nɩbɛ nyↄw ʋ a bↄfʋ wa cenʼɩ̃ ta pↄw ʋ, ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ba gↄw ʋ bin ʋ kↄ̃ cen wɩɛr ɩ̃ cɛ ba wa.
42004043	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju yel ba: “A sɛw na ɩ̃ na mɩ hier a Naaŋmɩn fãw ƴɛr-son a ten nɩŋmɛɛ pʋↄ kʋ a nɩbɛ, a-na-ɩ a ala ɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn tʋ̃ ma ɩ̃ wa.”
42004044	Ɩ̃ na ʋ nyↄw a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ hiere yʋↄrↄ nɩ a Jude puorfʋ yie pʋↄ.
42005001	Bibir kãw a Jeeju be na a Jenejarɛ-man nʋↄr, a nɩbɛ wa fʋr ʋ jilĩ kolĩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ cɛlfʋ ɩnɛ.
42005002	Ʋ nyɛ na gboro ayi a man nʋↄr, a jɩ̃-bɛrbɛ yi a be ɩ̃ suu pɛwrɛ a ba jʋʋr,
42005003	ʋ kpɛ a gbor bõ-ƴen pʋↄ na ɩ a Sɩmↄ̃ ben ɩ̃ sʋↄr ʋ a ʋ jãa nɩ a gbẽgbere nʋↄr fɩ̃ɩ. A ala ɩ̃ baar, ʋ jɛ na be a gbor pʋↄ ɩ̃ jaana a nɩbɛ.
42005004	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na ƴɛr a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ baar, ʋ yelʼã a Sɩmↄ̃: “Duur a gbor cenʼɩ̃ a kʋ̃ↄ sↄↄlɩ̃sↄw ɩ̃ a nyɩ lↄb a jʋʋr.”
42005005	A Sɩmↄ̃ yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, sɩ dɩ na tuo a tɩsↄw jaa wa vɩɛ nɩ a bio ɩ̃ na sɩ faa pulpul. Ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ juumɩ, ɩ̃ na lↄbʼã a jʋʋr.”
42005006	Ba lↄbʼã a ɩ ba pↄw na a jɩmɛ yayaw a ba jʋʋr nyↄw ɩ̃ ɓere,
42005007	a ba Ꞌlɛɛr a ba tↄ deme na be a gbor kpee pʋↄ á ba wa sũo ba. Ba wa na a ba nyↄↄr a jɩmɛ sɛw gboro ayi a vɩrɛ na mʋr.
42005008	A mɩnɛ a Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr na nyɛ a lɛ, ʋ lo na gburĩ a dume a Jeeju nii-sↄw ɩ̃ yel: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, taw jãa nɩ ma, a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ ɩ na maal-fãa nɩrɛ.”
42005009	Ʋ yelʼã a lɛ a-na-ɩ nʋↄr kpaw ba na, ʋlↄ nɩ a bala ba jaa ʋ na be nɩ, a jɩm-yaw ala ba na nyↄↄr ɩnɛ.
42005010	Lɛ a mɩ dãa wↄ̃ a Sɩmↄ̃ tↄ deme, Jakɩ nɩ a Jã na ɩ a Jebede bi-dabsɩ. Ɩ̃ a Jeeju yel a Sɩmↄ̃: “Taa ɩ a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw fʋ̃ wa. Wa nyↄw nɩ a dɩnaa, nɩbɛ fʋ na nyↄwrↄ.”
42005011	Ɩ̃ na ba lɛ duur a gboro lɩɛb wa nɩ a man gbẽgbere nʋↄr na bin, ɩ̃ bar a yele a jaa ɩ̃ tu a Jeeju.
42005012	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na dãa be a tẽw kãw pʋↄ, daba kãw a kↄn wʋlɩ̃ na pↄw a ɩ̃gan nyɛ ʋ na ɩ̃ lo kpa pↄw a nii-sↄw ɩ̃ sʋↄr ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, a fʋ̃ʋ sↄw, fʋ na tʋↄ na pↄlɩ̃ ma.”
42005013	A Jeeju turʼã a nuu sɩɩr ʋ ɩ̃ yel: “Ɩ̃ sↄw na, pↄlɩ̃!” A jie naan, a ʋ kↄn wʋlɩ̃ baarʼã,
42005014	ɩ̃ a Jeeju yel ʋ á ʋ taa yele bom kʋrↄ nɩrɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ á ʋ cen na miilʼɩ̃ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ a Naaŋmɩn baar-loro, ɩ̃ tɩɩr a baar-lo-yele ala a Mowisi na dãa ƴↄ̃w, a nɩbɛ na bↄ̃w ka ʋ sɩrɩ̃ na pↄlɩ̃.
42005015	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju yuor jaar ɩ̃ yire dↄↄlↄ, ɩ̃ a nɩ-yaw ma wa na cɛlɛ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ nɩ ʋ a ʋ kpɛmɛ ba.
42005016	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ, ʋ ma yi na a cɛ̃cɛ̃w sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn.
42005017	Bibir kãw a Jeeju jaana na a nɩbɛ. A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-jaanba na yi a ten ala a jaa na be a Galile nɩ a Jude wɩɛr, nɩ a Jerujalɛm wa na na jɛ a be a ʋ sɛ̃, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn fãw dãa be nɩ ʋ ʋ kpaara a nɩbɛ wʋlɩ̃sɩ.
42005018	Nɩbɛ tuo na dab-gbɛr gaajie juu wa nɩ bʋↄrↄ ba kpɛ nɩ ʋ na bin a Jeeju nii-sↄw,
42005019	ɩ̃-cɛ baa dãa bↄ̃w a jie na ba na tuure ɩ̃ kpɛɛrɛ nɩ ʋ wa, a-na-ɩ a nɩbɛ waa na. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ba do na a garɩ̃ na ba yuo a bↄw ɩ̃ tur ʋ bar nɩ a ʋ gaajie a nɩbɛ sↄ̃w be a Jeeju nii-sↄw.
42005020	A Jeeju nyɛ na a ba ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ɩ̃ yel a gbɛr: “Ɩ̃ baraa! A Naaŋmɩn de na a fʋ faar bar kʋ fʋ.”
42005021	A ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ nyↄw ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ nɩ a ba pʋↄ: “Ala nɩ a naa tↄr ɩ̃ kpɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn a lɛ? Ala ɩ̃ tɛrɛ sↄr na yel áa Naaŋmɩn de na a maal-fãa bar kʋ a nɩrɛ ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Naaŋmɩn tɛw ʋ wa?”
42005022	A Jeeju bↄ̃w a ala ba na tɩɛrɛ ɩ̃ yel ba: “Bõ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ nɩ a ala nyɩ na tɛrɛ a nyɩ pʋ̃ↄ?
42005023	Buor ɩ̃ yↄw gãw a yelfʋ: a Naaŋmɩn de na a ʋ maal-fãa bar kʋ ʋ, mɩɩ a ʋ ir cere?
42005024	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na nyɩ bↄ̃w ka a Nɩbɛ Bie tɛrɛ na sↄr a ka a tẽw pʋↄ na de a nɩrɛ maal-fãa bar kʋ ʋ.” Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ yel a gbɛr: “A fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ yele: ir de a fʋ gaajie kule nɩ.”
42005025	A jie naan, a gbɛr irʼã a ba nii-sↄw, de a ʋ gaajie pɛwrɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn kule nɩ.
42005026	A nↄɛ ko a nɩbɛ ba jaa a ba pɛwrɛ a Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃ a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw ba a ba yele: “Sɩ nyɛ na a yel-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ a dɩnaa bibir.”
42005027	A ala ɩ̃ baar, a Jeeju yi na nyɛ lãpo-diere kãw na dɩ Levi ʋ jɛ be a ʋ tʋn tʋ̃fʋ jie, ʋ yel ʋ: “Ir, tuure ma”,
42005028	a Levi bar a ʋ yele a jaa ɩ̃ ir tuure ʋ.
42005029	A Levi maalʼã fɛtɩ kpɛ̃ɛ a Jeeju ɩnɛ be a ʋ yir, a lãpo-dierbe yayaw jie nɩ a nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ dãa lãa jɛ dɩrɛ nɩ ba a dɩb.
42005030	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ nɩ a ba ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ hũhune ɩ̃ yel a Jeeju par-tuurbe: “Bõ ɩ a nyɩ lãa dɩrɛ nyuure nɩ a lãpo-dierbe nɩ a nɩ-faar?”
42005031	A Jeeju yel ba: “Aa ɩ a ɩ̃gan-kpɛn deme ɩ̃ ma cen a dↄↄtↄrↄ yir wa, a wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme ʋ.
42005032	Maa wa a nɩ-torisɩ bʋↄlfʋ ɩnɛ wa, a nɩsaa faar ɩ̃ wa bʋↄl a ba na lɩɛb a ba yɛ̃.”
42005033	A ba yel ʋ: “A Jã par-tuurbe nɩ a Farɩsɩ par-tuurbe ma luure na a nʋↄr sʋↄrↄ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn tↄ̃-tↄ̃-tↄ̃, ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ par-tuurbe ʋlↄ ma tↄ̃ↄ dɩrɛ nyuure nɩ.”
42005034	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ na tʋↄ na ɩ a bala ba na bʋↄl a pↄw kulfʋ jie a ba lũ a nʋↄr a mɩnɛ a sɩrɛ na cãa be a ba sↄ̃w mɩɩ?
42005035	A daar na ta na, ba na de na a sɩrɛ yi nɩ a ʋ badɛɛ sↄ̃w. A lɛdaar ba na lũ na a nʋↄr.”
42005036	Ʋ lɛ lↄbʼã a sʋkpa na kʋ ba: “Nɩrɛ ma ɓere cẽcẽ-ŋmãa a kpar-paalaa pʋↄ na ʋ ɓana nɩ kpar-kʋraa wa. A ala ɩ ʋ ɩ na a lɛ, ʋ ɓerʼã a kpar-paalaa bar, ɩ̃-cɛ a cẽcẽ-ŋmãa ʋlↄ ʋ na ɓer a kpar-paalaa ʋlↄ pʋↄ ma diere taa nɩ a kpar-kʋraa wa.
42005037	A lɛ ʋ mɩ, nɩrɛ ma diere dã-tↄↄraa ƴↄnↄ dʋʋ bɛraa pʋↄ wa. A ʋlↄ ƴↄ̃w a lɛ, a dã-tↄↄraa na wɛlʼã a dʋʋ, a ɩ a ʋ dãa nɩ a ʋ dʋʋ wɛ na.
42005038	Ɩ̃-cɛ a sɛw na a ba na ƴↄ̃w a dã-tↄↄraa a dʋʋ paalaa pʋↄ.
42005039	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a nɩrɛ nyu na a dã-bɩn, Ꞌwaa lɛ bʋↄrↄ a dã-tↄↄraa wa, a-na-ɩ ʋ ma yelʼã áa dã-bɩn nʋmↄ na gãw.”
42006001	A bibi-ciiraa kãw, a Jeeju tↄlʼã yi puo pʋↄ, a ʋ par-tuurbe ɓʋrↄ a ci fↄfↄrↄ Ꞌwↄbↄ,
42006002	a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ yel ba: “Bõ ɩ a nyɩ maala a ala na ciire a sɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn sↄr pʋↄ a bibi-ciiraa dayen?”
42006003	A Jeeju mɩ yel ba: “Nyaa Ꞌwuor a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ nyɛ a ala a Davɩtɩ nɩ a ʋ nɩbɛ na maal a lɛ a kↄ̃ na dãa nyↄw ba wa?
42006004	Ʋ kpɛ na a Naaŋmɩn yir de a buru ba na bin a Naaŋmɩn Ꞌwↄb ɩ̃ mɩ kʋ a ʋ nɩbɛ a ba Ꞌwↄb; ɩ̃ a buru ala, nɩsaa pↄrↄ ma dãa tɛrɛ sↄr na Ꞌwↄb ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a baar-lorbo tɛw ʋ wa.”
42006005	Ɩ̃ na ʋ lɛ yel ba: “A Nɩbɛ Bie ɩ̃ ɩ a bibi-ciiraa Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ.”
42006006	A bibi-ciiraa kãw go, a Jeeju kpɛ na a puorfʋ yir kãw pʋↄ, ɩ̃ nyↄw ɩ̃ jaana a nɩbɛ. Daba kãw be na a be a ʋ dʋrɩ̃ nuu na kpi.
42006007	A ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ jʋʋrↄ a Jeeju bʋↄrↄ ba bↄ̃w a ala ɩ ʋ na kpaarʼã nɩrɛ a bibi-ciiraa dayen, a-na-ɩ ba bʋↄrↄ na sↄr ba ƴↄ̃w ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃.
42006008	Ɩ̃ ʋ bↄ̃wnaa a ala ba na tɩɛrɛ ɩ̃ yel a daba ʋlↄ a nuu na ko: “Ir ɩraa a ka a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw.” Ʋ pal ir ɩraa.
42006009	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju yel ba: “Ɩ̃ sooro nyɩ na, a bibi-ciiraa dayen, a nɩrɛ tɛrɛ na sↄr na maal a vɩlaa, mɩɩ a bier, na faa a nɩrɛ mɩɩ na kú ʋ?”
42006010	Ɩ̃ na ʋ Ꞌwuor ba kolĩ ba jaa, ɩ̃ yel a daba: “Dↄl a fʋ nuu,” ʋ dↄl, ʋ lɛ lɩɛb ɩ nu-son.
42006011	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩbɛ bala, a suur gãw ba na a ba nyↄw ɩ̃ guoro taa a ala ba na tʋↄrↄ maala a Jeeju.
42006012	A ʋna daarʼãa a Jeeju do na a tãw juu Naaŋmɩn sʋↄrfʋ, na ʋ be a be sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn wa vɩɛ nɩ a bio.
42006013	A lɛ a wɩɛr na caarɩ̃ baar, ʋ bʋↄlʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe na ʋ vɛl ir pie-nʼayi, bʋↄlↄ ba nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ:
42006014	a Sɩmↄ̃ ʋ na pʋr a Pɩɛr, nɩ a ʋ yɛbɛ Ãdire, nɩ a Jakɩ nɩ a Jã, a Fɩlɩpɩ nɩ a Batelemi,
42006015	a Matie nɩ a Tomasɩ nɩ a Alfe bi-daba Jakɩ nɩ a Sɩmↄ̃ ʋlↄ na ma jɛrɛ,
42006016	a Jakɩ bi-daba Judasɩ nɩ a Judasɩ Isikaryↄtɩ ʋlↄ na dãa lɩɛb de a Jeeju a juu.
42006017	A Jeeju yi nɩ ba na a tãw juu ɩ̃ suu ɩraa nɩ ba dalɩ̃pʋↄ juu, a jie ʋlↄ a ʋ par-tuurbe yayaw na be. Nɩ-yayaw mɩ dãa na yi a Jude wɩɛr ʋ jaa nɩ a Jerujalɛm, nɩ a Tɩɩr nɩ a Sɩdↄ̃ na be a man nʋↄr,
42006018	ɩ̃ wa a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ cɛlfʋ jie nɩ a ba ɩ̃gan kpɛmɛfʋ, ɩ̃ a bala a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ na dama mɩ nyɛ na a kpɛ̃w.
42006019	A nɩbɛ ba jaa bʋↄrↄ na ba sɩɩr a Jeeju, a-na-ɩ a fãw mɩ yi na a ʋ jie ɩ̃ kpɛmɛ ba ba jaa.
42006020	A Jeeju Ꞌwuorʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe ɩ̃ yel: “Nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a nyɩmɩ jie na ɩ a nãw deme a-na-ɩ nyɩmɩ ɩ̃ sↄ a Naaŋmɩn fãw.
42006021	Nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a nyɩmɩ jie a kↄ̃ na nyↄw a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a-na-ɩ nyɩ nↄↄ pi na. Nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a nyɩmɩ jie na kono a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a-na-ɩ nyɩ nↄↄ laara na.
42006022	Nyɩ́ ɩ a nʋmↄ nyɩ a lɛ a nɩbɛ nↄↄ Ꞌlaara nyɩ, ɩ̃ jaara nyɩ bara, ɩ̃ tʋrↄ nyɩ, sãwna nɩ a nyɩ yuor ʋ wↄ̃ bom kpana kaarɩ̃ a Nɩbɛ Bie ɩnɛ.
42006023	A bibir ʋlↄ, nyɩ́ ɩ a nʋmↄ nyɩ a nyɩ cɩlɛ, a-na-ɩ a nyɩ yar na bɛrmɛ na a be a saa juu. A lɛ a ba sãa-kʋnbↄ mɩ dãa maal a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe.
42006024	Ɩ̃-cɛ nabier na pↄw na a nyɩmɩ tɛraa deme a-na-ɩ nyɩ gↄrʼã pↄw a nyɩ nʋ̃ↄ a jaa.
42006025	Nabier na pↄw na a nyɩmɩ na pi a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a-na-ɩ kↄ̃ nↄↄ nyↄw nyɩ na. Nabier na pↄw na a nyɩmɩ na laara a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a-na-ɩ ni-sↄbaa nↄↄ kpɛ nyɩ na a nyɩ kono.
42006026	“A na ɩ nyɩ na nabier a lɛ a nɩbɛ ba jaa nↄↄ yele a nyɩ son! A lɛ a ba sãa-kʋnbↄ dãa maalʼɩ̃ a jirsɩ ƴɛr-hierbe.
42006027	“Ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩmɩ na cɛlɛ ma, ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, nyɩ́ nʋnↄ a nyɩ dↄ̃ deme. Nyɩ́ maala a bala na Ꞌlaar nyɩ vɩlaa,
42006028	nyɩ́ bʋↄlↄ a son ƴↄnↄ a bala na sↄnↄ nyɩ, nyɩ́ sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄnↄ a bala na hʋↄlↄ nyɩ.
42006029	A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ ɓa fʋ na a tʋkpal bõ-ƴen pʋↄ, lɩɛb a tʋkpal gãw na cↄw ʋ. A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ de fʋ na a fu, bar ʋ mɩ de a fʋ kparle.
42006030	A nɩrɛ lɛ ɩ̃ wa sʋↄr fʋ a bom fú kʋ ʋ, ɩ̃ taa wa sooro a fʋ bom a nɩrɛ na de wa.
42006031	A ala nyɩ na bʋↄrↄ a nɩbɛ ba maala nyɩ, nyɩ́ mɩ maala ba a lɛ.
42006032	“Á ala ɩ nyɩ nʋnↄ na a bala tɛw na nʋnↄ nyɩ, bõ ƴↄ̃wfʋ nyɩ na pↄw? A-na-ɩ a nɩ-faar mɩ̃ɛ ma mɩ nʋnↄ na a bala na nʋnↄ ba.
42006033	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ nyɩ maala na a vɩlaa a bala tɛw na maala nyɩ a vɩlaa, bõ ƴↄ̃wfʋ nyɩ na pↄw? A-na-ɩ a nɩ-faar mɩ̃ɛ ma mɩ maala na a lɛ.
42006034	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a bala tɛw nyɩ na tɩɛrɛ a nyɩmɩ pɛ̃w ba a bom ba na wa ya na kʋ nyɩ, nyɩ ma pɛ̃w, bõ ƴↄ̃wfʋ nyɩ na pↄw? A nɩ-faar mɩ̃ɛ ma mɩ pɛ̃w na a ba tↄ deme, a ba na mɩ lɩɛb ya ba a libie nʋↄr.
42006035	Ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ nʋnↄ a nyɩ dↄ̃-deme, nyɩ́ maala ba a vɩlaa, nyɩ́ ma pɛ̃w ba a bom ɩ̃ nyɩ taa cɛlɛ a ba na lɩɛb ya nyɩ wa. A lɛ, a nyɩ yar na bɛrmɛ na, ɩ̃ nyɩ na mɩ ɩ na a saa juu Naaŋmɩn bi-dabsɩ a-na-ɩ ʋ ma maala na a vɩlaa a nɩsaa saansɩ nɩ a nɩ-bebe jie.
42006036	Nyɩ́ ɩ pʋ-pɩlaa deme a mɩnɛ a nyɩ Sãa na ɩ a pʋ-pɩlaa sʋbↄ.
42006037	“Nyɩ taa koro nɩrɛ wa, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn kↄ̃ mɩ guor a nyɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa. Nyɩ taa ƴↄnↄ nɩrɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn ma mɩ ƴↄnↄ nyɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa. Nyɩ́ de a nɩbɛ mabfʋ bar kʋ ba; a lɛ a Naaŋmɩn na mɩ de a nyɩ mabfʋ bar kʋ nyɩ.
42006038	Nyɩ́ tɩɩrɛ; a lɛ a Naaŋmɩn na mɩ tɩɩrɛ kʋrↄ nyɩ. Ʋ na bↄ̃w na sɛw a bõ-mɩɩnaa a nɛ taa, ɩ̃ dam, a sɛw deere, ʋ kʋ nyɩ, a-na-ɩ a bom ʋlↄ nyɩ na de mana nɩ a yele, a ʋna bom a Naaŋmɩn na mɩ de manʼɩ̃ a nyɩ ben.”
42006039	A Jeeju lɛ lↄb ba na a sʋkpa na: “A jↄ̃w na tʋↄ na tawra a ʋ jↄ̃-tↄ mɩɩ? Má a ba jaa ayi na lo na bↄw pʋↄ.
42006040	Par-tuure ma be be na gãw a ʋ jãjaana wa, ɩ̃ a par-tuure lɛ na jaan baar, ʋ na wↄ̃ na a ʋ jãjaana kaarɩ̃.
42006041	“Mɩnɛ ɩ̃ ɩ a fʋ ga a mimir ƴↄ̃w a mobir na be a fʋ yɛbɛ mimirɩ̃, ɩ̃ ma lɛ ɛ̃ɛ bil nyɛ a dakpur na be a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ mimirɩ̃ wa?
42006042	Mɩɩ mɩnɛ fʋ na tʋↄ yel a fʋ yebɛ: ʻƖ̃ yɛbɛ, ɩraa ɩ̃ ir fʋ mobir a mimirɩ̃ bar,ʼ a fʋ̃ʋ na ma nyɛ a dakpur na be a fʋ mimirɩ̃ wa? Fʋna bɛbɛlɛ naa! De nĩe ir a dakpur a fʋ mimirɩ̃ sɛr; lɛ fʋ na bↄ̃w nyɛrɛ tʋↄ ir a mobir na be a fʋ yɛbɛ mimirɩ̃.
42006043	“Tɩ-son ma be be na wↄnↄ bi-kpana wa; a lɛ ʋ mɩ, tɩ-kpana ma be be na wↄnↄ bi-son wa.
42006044	A-na-ɩ a wↄmↄ ba bↄ̃wnↄ nɩ a tɩɛ; ba maa Ꞌwↄ̃w Ꞌwↄrↄ gʋ-pɩlaa juu wa, ba maa mɩ Ꞌwↄ̃w aaraa gʋ-salaa juu wa.
42006045	A nɩ-son ma irʼã a yel-vɛlɛ ala ʋ na bin a ʋ pʋ-vɩlaa pʋↄ yi nɩ, ɩ̃ a nɩ-kpana ma ir a yel-kpansɩ ala ʋ na bin a ʋ pʋ-bier pʋↄ yi nɩ, a-na-ɩ a ala na sɛw a nɩrɛ pʋↄ, ala ɩ̃ yire a nʋↄr pʋↄ.
42006046	“Mɩnɛ ɩ̃ ɩ a nyɩ bʋↄlↄ ma a ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ! Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ!ʼ ɩ̃ maa maala a ala ɩ̃ na ma yele nyɩ wa?
42006047	A nɩrɛ lɛ na wa a ɩ̃ sɛ̃ cɛl a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ sↄw maala, ɩ̃ na miil nyɩ na a ʋlↄ kaarɩ̃ ʋ na wↄ̃.
42006048	Ʋ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ daba na mɩɛrɛ yir ɩ̃ tuu a bↄw ʋ kpɛ, ʋ kpar a dacin a kubir-pan juu. A kʋ̃ↄ wa na a kʋlaa paal yi ŋmeere a yir ʋlↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ Ꞌwaa tʋↄ ʋ wɛl bar wa, a-na-ɩ ba dãa na bↄ̃w mɛ ʋ.
42006049	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na wono a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ ma sↄw maala wa, ʋ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a daba ʋlↄ na mɛ a yir a tẽ-buur juu, ɩ̃ ma tuu a bↄw ɩ̃ kpar a dacin wa. A kʋ̃ↄ ŋme na a yir ʋ tↄ̃ↄ lo a jie naan ɩ̃ a ʋ lofʋ ʋlↄ bɛlɩ̃ na.”
42007001	A lɛ a Jeeju na ƴɛr a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a jaa kʋ a nɩbɛ baar, ʋ cenʼã a Kapɛɛnam.
42007002	Sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ be na be ɩ Orom nɩrɛ ɩ̃ tɛrɛ tʋ̃tʋnↄ ʋ na nyɩrɩ̃ nʋ. A tʋ̃tʋnↄ ʋlↄ, a dãa na Ꞌwↄbↄ ʋ, ʋ pɩɛlʼɩ̃ a kũu.
42007003	A lɛ a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ na wõ a ba ƴɛr a Jeeju ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ tʋ̃ na a Jufisɩ ni-dierbe ŋmɛɛ a ʋ sɛ̃ a ba sʋↄr ʋ ʋ wɩ faa a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnↄ.
42007004	Ba ta na a Jeeju sɛ̃ nyↄw ɩ̃ lↄbↄ ʋ a nur yele nɩ: “A daba na sɛw na a fʋ na sũo ʋ,
42007005	a-na-ɩ ʋ nʋ na a sɩmɩ Jufisɩ, ɩ̃ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ mɩ ƴↄ̃w a ba mɛ a sɩ puorfʋ̃ yir.”
42007006	A Jeeju pↄ̃w ba cere nɩ. Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na pɩɛlʼɩ̃ a yir, a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ tʋ̃ na a ʋ badɛɛ a ba tuor yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ! Taa vↄw fʋ mɩ̃ɛ wa, a-na-ɩ maa sɛw a fʋ na kpɛ a ɩ̃ yir wa.
42007007	A ala ɩnɛ a maa mɩ̃ɛ ma nyɛ sↄr tʋↄ ta fʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ƴɛr ƴɛrɩ̃ tɛw, ɩ̃ a ɩ̃ tʋ̃tʋ̃-bie na kpɛmɛ na.
42007008	A-na-ɩ a maa mɩ̃ɛ tɛrɛ na a ɩ̃ nɩ-bɛrɛ na ɩ̃ jↄrↄ ba, ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ a ɩ̃ sↄdaalsɩ a ba jↄrↄ ma. Ɩ̃ ma yelʼã a bõ-ƴen: Cen ka! ʋ ma cen, ɩ̃ yel a ƴen sʋbↄ: Wa ka! ʋ ma wa; ɩ̃ ma yelʼã a ɩ̃ tʋ̃tʋnↄ: Maal asɩmɛ! ʋ ma maal.”
42007009	A lɛ a Jeeju na wõ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ, nʋↄr ko ʋ na ʋ kpiir a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃ lɩɛb yel a nɩbɛ na tuure ʋ: “Ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ sↄ̃w, maa nyɛ nɩrɛ ʋ tɛrɛ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ta a daba na wa.”
42007010	A nɩbɛ bala a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na tʋ̃ lɩɛbʼã kul ɩ̃ nyɛ a tʋ̃tʋnↄ ʋ kpɛmɛ.
42007011	A ala na yi tↄ, a Jeeju cenʼã tẽw kãw ba na bʋↄlↄ Nayɩ̃, a ʋ par-tuurbe nɩ a nɩ-yayaw dãa pↄw ʋ a ba lãa cere.
42007012	A mɩnɛ ʋ na pɩɛlɛ nɩ a tẽw ʋlↄ dↄ̃dↄr nʋↄr, nɩbɛ mɩ yire nɩ na kũu a ũufʋ jie. Ʋ ɩ na a ʋ mã bi-daa ɩ̃ a ʋ mã ɩ kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄw. Nɩ-yaw yi na a tẽw ʋlↄ pʋↄ ɩ̃ pↄw ʋ cere nɩ a kũu ũufʋ jie.
42007013	Á lɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na nyɛ a pↄw, nãw nyↄw ʋ na, ʋ yel ʋ: “Taa kono wa.”
42007014	Ɩ̃ na ʋ taw ta sɩɩr a da-gbarɩ̃sɩ ʋlↄ a kũu na be, a bala na de a kũu ɩraa. A Jeeju yel: “Polbile! A fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ yele, ir!”
42007015	A kũu pal ir jɩnaa ɩ̃ nyↄw a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ, ʋ de ʋ kʋ a ʋ mã.
42007016	A dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw a ba jaa a ba pɛwrɛ a Naaŋmɩn yele: “A Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hier-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴen sʋbↄ irʼã a sɩ sↄ̃w ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn mɩ wa na Ꞌwuor a ʋ nɩbɛ.”
42007017	A nɩbɛ ƴɛrɛ na taa a ʋ ɩnɛ a Jude wɩɛr ʋ jaa pʋↄ de nɩ a tẽ-pɩɛlsɩ a jaa, a ala ʋ na maal.
42007018	A Jã par-tuurbe man ʋ na a yele ala a jaa, ʋ bʋↄl ayi a ba sↄ̃w
42007019	tʋ̃ ba a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ jie a ba cen na soor ʋ: “Fʋ̃ʋ ɩ a ʋlↄ na sɛw ʋ wa mɩɩ sɩ cãa gure nɩ-kpee?”
42007020	A nɩbɛ bala ta na a Jeeju sɛ̃ na ba yel ʋ: “A Jã-Batii ɩ̃ tʋ̃ sɩ a sɩ wa soor fʋ a fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ ɩ a ʋlↄ na sɛw ʋ wa mɩɩ, a sɩ cãa gure nɩ-kpee?”
42007021	A be a jie naan, ʋ kpɛmɛ na a wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme yayaw nɩ a nɩ-baalsɩ nɩ a kↄ̃tↄn-irbe ɩ̃ yuo a jↄn yayaw mimie.
42007022	Ɩ̃ na ʋ yel a bala a Jã na tʋ̃: “Nyɩ́ cen na man a Jã a ala nyɩ na nyɛ ɩ̃ mɩ wõ: a jↄn nyɛrɛ na, a gbɛɛ ir cere, a kↄn mɩ pↄlↄ, ɩ̃ a won wono, a kũusɩ jawra na ire, a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son ta na a nãw deme jie.
42007023	Á nʋmↄ a ʋlↄ a ɩ̃ maalfʋ na ma cɛ ʋ wa.”
42007024	A lɛ a bala a Jã na tʋ̃ na lɩɛb kul baar, a Jeeju nyↄw na a Jã ƴɛrɩ̃ mana kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ yele: “Bõ nyɩ cen na Ꞌwuor nyɛ a be a wɛkar pʋↄ? Kakɩr a sɛsɛb na dama?
42007025	Bõ ʋlↄ nyɩ cen na Ꞌwuor? A daba na ƴaarɩ̃ cẽcen-vɛlɛ? Ɩ̃-cɛ a bala na ma ƴaarɩ̃ a cẽcen-vɛlɛ dɩrɛ nɩ a dɩb vɛlɛ, a jamansɩ yie ba ma be.
42007026	Bõ ʋlↄ tↄr nyɩ cen na Ꞌwuor? A Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere? Ↄↄ, ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, nɩrɛ ʋ na gãw a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere.
42007027	A-na-ɩ a Jã ɩ̃ ɩ a ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ na yel: ʻA maa, Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ tʋ̃ a ɩ̃ ƴɛƴɛrɛ ʋ de fʋ nĩe gbɛɛrɩ̃ a fʋ sↄr.ʼ
42007028	“Ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, nɩrɛ kãw ma be be ba na dↄw ka a tẽw pʋↄ na gãw a Jã-Batii wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na nyɩrɩ̃ pab a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ gãw ʋ na.”
42007029	A nɩbɛ ba jaa nɩ a lãpo-dierbe na wõ a Jã kↄkɩr, ba bↄ̃w na áa Naaŋmɩn torʼã ɩ̃ sↄw a Jã mʋr ba a kʋ̃ↄ.
42007030	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ jaarʼã a ala a Naaŋmɩn na bʋↄrↄ a ba jie bar, a mɩnɛ ba na ma sↄw a Jã mʋr ba a kʋ̃ↄ wa.
42007031	“Babõ ɩ̃ na de a dɩnaa nɩbɛ manʼɩ̃, ɩ̃ babõ kaarɩ̃ ba wↄ̃?
42007032	Ba wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a bibiir na jɛ a daa pʋↄ ɓolo bʋↄlↄ nɩ taa yele: ʻSɩ ŋme na a kʋↄr ƴↄ̃w nyɩ ɩ̃ nyaa sɛ wa, a sɩ mɩ ŋme a ko-bɩnɛ ƴↄ̃w nyɩ ɩ̃ nyaa mɩ kõ wa.ʼ
42007033	A-na-ɩ a Jã-Batii dãa na wa ma bʋn dɩrɛ lɛ wa, ma mɩ nyuure a dãa wa, a nyɩ yel a kↄ̃tↄn ɩ̃ tɛrɛ ʋ.
42007034	A Nɩbɛ Bie wa dɩrɛ ƴↄnↄ nyuure nɩ, a nyɩ lɛ yel go: ʻNyɩ nyɛ dɩdɩrɛ nɩ dã-nyuure, na ɩ a lãpo-dierbe nɩ a nɩ-faar baraa.ʼ
42007035	Ɩ̃-cɛ a bala ba jaa na sↄw a Naaŋmɩn kpaarfʋ miile na a yel-mɩ̃ɛ be na a kpaarfʋ ʋlↄ jie.”
42007036	A Farɩsɩ nɩrɛ kãw bʋↄlʼã a Jeeju a ʋ wɩ a ba lãa dɩ a dɩb, a Jeeju kpɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩrɛ ʋlↄ yir jɛ a dɩb par.
42007037	Ɩ̃ a be a ʋna tẽw pʋↄ, pↄw kãw dãa na be be na ɩ pↄw fãa. Ʋ bↄ̃w ka a Jeeju jɛ na a dɩb par be a Farɩsɩ nɩrɛ ʋlↄ yir, ɩ̃ de a kã-nyu-vɩlaa na sɛw a kubir yole wɩ kpɛ ɩraa nɩ a Jeeju gbɛɛ par,
42007038	ɩ̃ kono. A ʋ mↄtↄ̃-kʋ̃ↄ ɓɩnɛ a Jeeju gbɛɛ, ʋ pãa lɩɛb a ʋ jukↄbↄ fↄfↄrↄ nɩ, ɩ̃ nyↄw a Jeeju gbɛɛ ɩ̃ de a kã-nyu-vɩlaa kpaar ƴↄ̃w.
42007039	A lɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na bʋↄl a Jeeju na nyɛ a lɛ, ʋ yelʼã a ʋ pʋ̃ↄ: “A ala ɩ a daba na dãa na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere, ʋ naa bↄ̃w na a pↄw na na sɩɩrɛ ʋ, nɩ a mɩnɛ ʋ na wↄ̃. Ʋ na bↄ̃w ka pↄw fãa ʋ ɩ.”
42007040	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Sɩmↄ̃, ɩ̃ tɛrɛ na ƴɛrɩ̃ na ƴɛr fʋ.” A Sɩmↄ̃ yel: “Jãjaana, ƴɛr!”
42007041	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Nɩbɛ ayi dãa na tɛrɛ san a ʋlↄ jie ba na ma pɛ̃wnɛ a libie. A bõ-ƴen tɛrɛ na warbie ture kʋbaa san, ɩ̃ a kãw tɛrɛ warbie ture pie san.
42007042	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na ma tɛrɛ bom na tʋↄ ya a ba sama wa, a libie sʋbↄ de na bar kʋ ba a ba jaa ayi. A nɩbɛ bala ayi pʋↄ, buor ɩ̃ na nyɩrɩ̃ nʋnↄ a libie sʋbↄ?”
42007043	A Sɩmↄ̃ yel ʋ: “Ɩ̃ tɩɛr ka a ʋlↄ na dãa tɛrɛ a san yaw ʋ.” A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ fʋ yel.”
42007044	Ɩ̃ lɩɛb miile a pↄw ɩ̃ yel a Sɩmↄ̃: “Fʋ nyɛ na a pↄw naa? A mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na kpɛ a ka a fʋ yir, faa kʋ ma kʋ̃ↄ ɩ̃ pɛw gbɛɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a pↄw na, a ʋ mↄtↄ̃-kʋ̃ↄ ʋ ɓɩ̃ nɩ a ɩ̃ gbɛɛ ɩ̃ fↄfↄ nɩ a ʋ jukↄbↄ bar.
42007045	A fʋ̃ʋ, faa nyↄw ma nuu puor wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a pↄw na, wa nyↄw nɩ a lɛ ɩ̃ na kpɛ, ʋ nyↄw ma na a gbɛɛ puoro nɩ ma ma bara wa.
42007046	Faa mɩ kpaar a kãa ƴↄ̃w ma a juu pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a pↄw na, ʋ kpaarʼã a kã-nyu-vɩlaa ƴↄ̃w ma a gbɛɛ pʋↄ.
42007047	A ala ɩnɛ ɩ̃ yele fʋ na, a ʋ nʋfʋ ʋ na nyɩrɩ̃ nʋ ma, a miile na áa Naaŋmɩn de na a ʋ maal-faar na waa bar kʋ ʋ. Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ ba na de a fɩ̃ɩ bar kʋ, ʋ ma mɩ miile na a nʋfʋ fɩ̃ɩ.”
42007048	A ala ɩ̃ baar, a Jeeju yelʼã a pↄw: “A Naaŋmɩn de na a fʋ maal-faar bar kʋ fʋ.”
42007049	A bala na dãa lãa jɛ nɩ ʋ ƴɛrɛ na a ba pʋ̃ↄ: “Ala nɩ a naa tↄr ɩ̃ ma mɩ de a nɩrɛ maal-fãa bar kʋ ʋ?”
42007050	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju yelʼã a pↄw: “A fʋ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa faa fʋ na. Cenʼɩ̃ su-ɓaar.”
42008001	A ala na yi tↄ, a Jeeju yʋↄrↄ na a tẽ-bɛrɛ nɩ a tẽ-bil pʋↄ, hiere a Naaŋmɩn fãw ƴɛr-son kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ a ʋ par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi dãa na lãa be nɩ ʋ.
42008002	A pↄↄbↄ bala ʋ na dãa diw a kↄ̃tↄn-bebe a ba pʋↄ bar, kpaarɩ̃ ba a wʋlɩ̃sɩ, mɩ lãa na be nɩ ʋ: a Maarɩɩ ʋlↄ na yi a Madala, a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ anuu-nʼayi na dãa yi a ʋ pʋↄ;
42008003	nɩ a Kuja pↄw Jaan, a Kuja ʋlↄ na ɩ a jamana Ɛrↄdɩ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, nɩ a Sujan, nɩ a pↄↄ-yaw ŋmɛɛ go. A bala ɩ̃ ma dãa de a ba yele sũono nɩ a Jeeju nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe.
42008004	A nɩbɛ yi na a ten a jaa ɩ̃ wa a Jeeju sɛ̃. A lɛ a nɩ-yaw bala na taw tiw taa, ʋ lↄbʼã a sʋkpa na:
42008005	“Daba kãw yi na a ʋ ci yaarɩ̃fʋ jie ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na yaara a ci, a ŋmɛɛ lo na a sↄr juu, a ba nɛbʼɩ̃ gbɛɛ ɩ̃ a wɛ-lili nɩɩr dɩ.
42008006	A ŋmɛɛ lo a kubir-pan juu ɩ̃ a lɛ a na bul baar, a ko na, a-na-ɩ aa pↄw a ɓaar wa.
42008007	A ŋmɛɛ go lo a gʋʋr sↄ̃w, a gʋʋr lãa irʼɩ̃ ba piw ba tɛrɛ.
42008008	A ŋmɛɛ lo na a tẽ-vɩlaa pʋↄ naa bul bɩ bie kʋbaa lɛ bↄ̃w dↄↄl.” A lɛ a Jeeju na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, ʋ yelʼɩ̃ na kpɛ̃w: “A ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a tobo wono nɩ, ú bↄ̃w cɛlɛ!”
42008009	A Jeeju par-tuurbe soor ʋ na a sʋkpa ʋlↄ par,
42008010	ʋ yel ba: “A ala ɩ a nyɩmɩ ʋ, a Naaŋmɩn fãw ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ par nyɩrʼã a nyɩ jie. Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ, a sʋkpar tɛw ba na wono, a mɩnɛ ʻa ba na Ꞌwuoro ɩ̃ ma nyɛrɛ wa, ɩ̃ mɩ cɛlɛ wono ɩ̃ ma bↄ̃wnↄ a par wa.ʼ
42008011	“Nyɩ́ cɛlɛ a sʋkpa par: a ci ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃.
42008012	A nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a ci ala na lo a sↄr juu. A lɛ ba na wõ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃, a Satã wa na na ir ʋ a ba sube pʋↄ, a mɩnɛ a ba kↄ̃ sↄw ɩ̃ pↄw a faafʋ wa.
42008013	A nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a ci ala na lo a kubie wɩɛr. A lɛ ba na wõ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ba ma sↄw na de nɩ nʋ̃ↄ ɩ̃-cɛ aa kpɛ a ba pʋ̃ↄ a tɩɛ nyɩbɛ kaarɩ̃ wa. A ba ƴↄ̃w-nyãa maa kam wa. A bɩɩrfʋ ɩ̃ wa ta ba, ba ma ŋmaa na yi.
42008014	A ci ala na lo a gʋʋr pʋↄ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a bala na wõ a ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃-cɛ ba barʼã a tẽw naa baafʋ dɛn nɩ a naalʋ̃ʋ bↄfʋ, nɩ a yele vɩláa a kpɛ pↄw ba piw ba tɛɛlɛ; a ba wↄmↄ maa karɩ̃ wa.
42008015	A ci ala na lo a tẽ-son pʋↄ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a bala na wõ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ de ʋ tɛrɛ nɩ su-son nɩ su-pɩlaa; a ba cĩcĩ ɩraafu pʋↄ ba ma wↄ̃ na a wↄmↄ.
42008016	“Nɩrɛ maa ƴↄ̃w lãpa de pↄw dʋʋ pʋↄ, mɩɩ de su gaajie pulẽe wa. Ʋ ma ɛ̃ɛ na bin ʋ a jie ʋlↄ ʋ na tʋↄrↄ caara, a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ bala na kpɛɛrɛ na tʋↄ nyɛ a ʋ cãa.
42008017	A bom jaa lɛ na sↄↄlɩ̃, a na yi na cãa pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a bom lɛ na ɩ bõ-gbul, a na yi na yẽw a nɩbɛ bↄ̃wnaa.
42008018	“Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, nyɩ́ tɛrɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a mɩnɛ nyɩ na cɛlɛ, a-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ na tɛraa, ba na lɛ kʋ ʋ na dↄↄl, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na ma tɛraa wa, ba na de na a ala ʋ na tɩɛr beeka ʋlↄ ɩ̃ sↄ.”
42008019	A Jeeju mã, nɩ a ʋ yɛɛr wa na pↄw ʋ, ɩ̃ baa dãa tʋↄ ta ʋ wa, a-na-ɩ a nɩbɛ waa na,
42008020	a ba yel ʋ: “A fʋ mã nɩ a fʋ yɛɛr be na a yẽw ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ba nyɛ fʋ.”
42008021	A Jeeju yel ba: “A bala na cɛlɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ sↄw maala, bala ɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ mã nɩ a ɩ̃ yɛɛr.”
42008022	A bibir kãw, a Jeeju nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe kpɛ na a gbor pʋↄ ʋ yel ba á bá gãw a man gaan, a ba cen.
42008023	A mɩnɛ ba na gãwna, a Jeeju gã na gure. A sɛsɛb kpɛ̃ɛ puurĩ ba na a man pʋↄ, a kʋ̃ↄ kpɛ paala a gbor, a ba vɩrɛ na mʋr,
42008024	a ba taw ta a Jeeju sɩ̃wnɛ ʋ yele nɩ: “Jãjaana! Jãjaana! Sɩ wɛrɛ na!” A Jeeju ir, na ʋ tan a sɛsɛb nɩ a kʋ̃ↄ na dama nɩ a kpɛ̃w, a sɛsɛb ŋmaa a fufu ɩ̃ a kʋ̃ↄ lɛ lo a lɛ a jom.
42008025	A lɛ a na baar, a Jeeju soorʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe: “Nyɩnɛ a nyɩ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa be?” A dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw ba lãa ko nɩ ba nʋↄr a ba sooro taa: “Ala nɩ a naa tↄr, a kʋ̃ↄ tↄr jaa nɩ a sɛsɛb na jↄrↄ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ a lɛ?”
42008026	Ba cenʼã na ta a tẽw ʋlↄ na ɩ a Jerasɛn nɩbɛ tẽw, na tor taa nɩ a Galile.
42008027	A lɛ a Jeeju na yi a gbor pʋↄ, a ʋna tẽw nɩrɛ ƴen sʋbↄ tuor ʋ na. A kↄ̃tↄnsɩ ma ire ʋ na, ɩ̃ a korĩ-cɛ jaa ʋ maa suu bom wa. Ʋ maa mɩ gã yir wa, a yar pʋↄ ʋ ma gana.
42008028	A lɛ ʋ na nyɛ a Jeeju, ʋ wuurʼã ɩ̃ lo a ʋ nii-sↄw ɩ̃ ƴɛrʼɩ̃ kpɛ̃w yel: “Saa juu Naaŋmɩn Bie Jeeju wee! Bõ fʋ nyɛ nɩ ma? Ɩ̃ sʋↄr fʋ na, taa hʋↄl ma wa!”
42008029	Ʋ yelʼã a lɛ a-na-ɩ a Jeeju yele na a kↄ̃tↄn bier a ʋ yi a daba jie. A gbɛɛ yayaw jaa, a ir ʋ na, a ba lũ ʋ a nur nɩ a bↄ̃jↄrɩ̃sɩ, ɩ̃ mɩ kpal ʋ a gbɛɛ nɩ a kure, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ ma ŋma bar, ɩ̃ a kↄ̃tↄn ir ʋ kpɛ nɩ a wɛkar pʋↄ.
42008030	A Jeeju soor ʋ: “Mɩnɛ a fʋ yuor dɩ?” Ʋ yel ʋ: “Kↄ̃-bↄ̃w-nʋↄr ɩ̃ dɩ,” a-na-ɩ kↄ̃tↄn-yaw ɩ̃ dãa ire ʋ.
42008031	A kↄ̃tↄnsɩ bala sʋↄrↄ na a Jeeju tↄ̃-tↄ̃-tↄ̃ a ʋ taa ir ba bar a ba suu a ba kpãafʋ jie wa.
42008032	A dor yayaw dãa na be be a tãw lõboorɩ̃ Ꞌwↄbↄ a yele yʋↄrↄ nɩ, a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ sʋↄr a Jeeju á ʋ kʋ ba sↄr a ba yi kpɛ ba, ʋ kʋ ba a sↄr.
42008033	A kↄ̃tↄnsɩ yi a daba jie kpɛ a dor, a ba dar taa ba jaa suu a tãw fʋↄlaa, lo a man kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ lim.
42008034	A nɩbɛ bala na cɩɩnɛ a dor nyɛ na a ala na ta ɩ̃ jↄ kul hier kʋ a nɩbɛ a tẽ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a tẽ-bil pʋʋr.
42008035	A nɩbɛ yi na cen áa ba Ꞌwuor je kãa a ala na maal. Ba ta na a Jeeju sɛ̃, nyɛ a daba ʋlↄ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ na yi a ʋ jie, ʋ ɩ nɩ-son, su a cẽcene jɛ nɩ a Jeeju pulẽe, a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw ba.
42008036	A bala na dãa nyɛ a ala na maal mɩɩnɛ na kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ a mɩnɛ a kↄ̃tↄn-ire na kpɛmɛ.
42008037	A be jie, a Jerasɛn ten deme ba jaa sʋↄrↄ a Jeeju a ʋ yi ɩ̃ bar ba, a-na-ɩ dãbɩ̃ɛ nyɩrɩ̃ na nyↄw ba. A Jeeju lɛ kpɛ a gbor pʋↄ lɩɛb cen.
42008038	Ɩ̃ a daba ʋlↄ jie a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ na dãa yi sʋↄrↄ na a Jeeju a ʋ ɩ a ba lãa cen. Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju lɩɛb ʋ bar ɩ̃ yel ʋ:
42008039	“Lɩɛb kul a fʋ yir na mɩɩn a ala a jaa a Naaŋmɩn na maal iu,” ʋ cen na hier yↄ nɩ a tẽw pʋↄ ʋ jaa kʋ a nɩbɛ a ala a Jeeju na maal ʋ.
42008040	A lɛ a Jeeju na lɛ lɩɛb cen, a nɩbɛ tuor ʋ na, a-na-ɩ ba jaa dãa na gure ʋ.
42008041	A daba kãw ba na bʋↄlↄ a Jaarisi na ɩ a puorfʋ yir nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ta na a be, lo gburĩ a dume a Jeeju nii-sↄw ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ ʋ, lↄbↄ nɩ ʋ a nur, a ʋ wa a ʋ yir,
42008042	a-na-ɩ ʋ tɛrɛ na bi-pↄw bõ-ƴen tẽ-tẽ-tẽ na tↄↄ yomo pie-nʼayi na be be kpiire. A lɛ a Jeeju na cere a be, a nɩbɛ fʋr ʋ na a lõbobo a jaa.
42008043	Ɩ̃ pↄw be na be na tɛrɛ sɩɛ maalʼɩ̃ yomo pie-nʼayi ɩ̃ aa baara wa. Ʋ sãw na a ʋ yele a jaa a dↄↄtↄrsɩ jie ɩ̃ bõ-ƴen kãw ma dãa tʋↄ kpaar ʋ wa.
42008044	Ʋ taw na ta a Jeeju puo-sↄw, ɩ̃ sɩɩr a ʋ kparʋ nʋↄr. A jie naan, a ɩ a ʋ jɩ̃ɩ barfʋ ŋmaa na.
42008045	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju yel: “Ala ɩ̃ sɩɩr ma?” A ba jaa yele á baa sɩɩr ʋ wa. A Pɩɛr yel: “Jãjaana, a ɩ na a nɩ-yaw na fʋr fʋ ɩ̃ gbʋr fʋ a nↄhↄ̃!”
42008046	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju lɛ yel: “Nɩrɛ sɩɩr ma na, a-na-ɩ fãw yi ma na ɩ̃ bↄ̃wnaa.”
42008047	A pↄw nyɛ bↄ̃w ka a Ꞌwaa tʋↄrↄ sↄↄlↄ wa, ɩ̃ mine wa lo gburĩ a dume a Jeeju pulẽe, ɩ̃ yel a nɩbɛ ba jaa nii-sↄw a ala ɩnɛ ʋ na sɩɩr ʋ, nɩ a mɩnɛ ʋ na kpɛmɛ a jie naan.
42008048	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Ɩ̃ bi-pↄw, a fʋ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa faa fʋ na. Cere nɩ su-ɓaar.”
42008049	A lɛ a Jeeju na cãa ƴɛrɛ, nɩrɛ yi na a nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jaarisi yir ɩ̃ wa ta yel: “A fʋ bi-pↄw kpi na. Taa lɛ vↄwrↄ a jãjaana wa.”
42008050	Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na wõ a lɛ, ʋ yelʼã a Jaarisi: “Taa jↄrↄ dãbɩ̃ɛ wa. Tɛrɛ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa tɛw ɩ̃ ʋ na kpɛmɛ na.”
42008051	A lɛ ʋ na ta a yir, Ꞌwaa sↄw nɩrɛ ʋ pↄw ba kpɛ nɩ, ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Pɩɛr, nɩ a Jakɩ, nɩ a Jã lãa nɩ a bile sãa nɩ a ʋ mã wa.
42008052	A nɩbɛ ba jaa dãa na kono yãyara nɩ a bile ʋlↄ ɩnɛ, a Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ taa kono wa; Ꞌwaa kpi wa, ʋ gurʼã.”
42008053	Ɩ̃ baa cɛl ʋ be wa, a-na-ɩ ba bↄ̃w ka a bile kpi na.
42008054	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju nyↄw ʋ a nuu ɩ̃ yel: “Bile wee, ir!”
42008055	A ʋ sɩɛ lɛ lɩɛb wa a ʋ pʋↄ, ʋ pal ir a jie naan, ɩ̃ a Jeeju yel a ba kʋ a bile bõ-dɩraa.
42008056	A pↄsabile dↄↄrbↄ ha nↄɛ ɩ̃ a Jeeju yel ba a ba taa yele bom kʋrↄ nɩrɛ a ala na ta wa.
42009001	A Jeeju bʋↄlʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi tiw, ɩ̃ kʋ ba a fãgã nɩ a tʋↄfʋ a ba na diw nɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ ba jaa fɛw bar, ɩ̃ mɩ kpaar a wʋlɩ̃sɩ,
42009002	ɩ̃ na ʋ tʋ̃ ba a ba cen na hier a Naaŋmɩn fãw kʋ a nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ kpɛmɛ a wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme.
42009003	Ʋ yel ba na: “Nyɩ taa tɛrɛɛ bom diere nɩ a sↄr wa, a daa, mɩɩ a wʋↄ, mɩɩ a dɩb, mɩɩ a libie, ɩ̃ nyɩ taa tɛrɛɛ kpar-bɛrɛ ayi wa.
42009004	A yir lɛ pʋↄ nyɩ nↄↄ kpɛ, nyɩ́ jɛ a be wa ta nɩ a mɩnɛ nyɩ na yire a tẽw ʋlↄ pʋↄ.
42009005	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a nɩbɛ ma sↄw de nyɩ wa, nyɩ́ yi a tẽw ʋlↄ pʋↄ ɩ̃ tɛb a nyɩ gbɛɛ tãbuulĩ bar, a ɩ bõ-miilaa a ba jie.”
42009006	A ba cen na yʋↄrↄ a ten-ten hiere a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son, kpaara nɩ a nɩbɛ wʋlɩ̃sɩ a jiir a jaa.
42009007	A lɛ a jamana Ɛrↄdɩ na wõ a ala jaa na maala, a tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ nyanyaa ʋ na, a-na-ɩ a nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ yele na áa Jã Batii ɩ̃ ir a kũu pʋↄ.
42009008	A ŋmɛɛ yele á Eli ɩ̃ lɛ miilʼɩ̃ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ a ŋmɛɛ go lɛ yele á korĩ-cɛ ƴɛr-hiere kãw ɩ̃ lɛ jaw ir.
42009009	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Ɛrↄdɩ yel: “Ɩ̃ ɩ na a ba ŋmaa a Jã juu, ɩ̃ ala nɩ a naa ɩ̃ na wono a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a ʋ ɩnɛ a lɛ?” Ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ʋ nyɛ a Jeeju.
42009010	A Jeeju nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ lɩɛbʼã wa na man ʋ a ala a jaa ba na maal, a Jeeju taw ba vɩrɩ̃ nɩ a Bɛsada-tẽw loor.
42009011	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩbɛ vɩrɩ̃ na bↄ̃wnaa ɩ̃ bɩɛr cen a ʋ jie, a Jeeju sↄw de ba na ʋ man ba a Naaŋmɩn fãw, ɩ̃ kpɛmɛ a wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme.
42009012	A mɩnɛ a wɩɛr na liwre, a ʋ par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi taw na ta yel ʋ á ʋ wɛl a nɩbɛ bar a ba cen a tẽ-pɩɛlsɩ pʋↄ na ba bↄ a bõ-dɩraa nɩ a gaajie, a-na-ɩ a jie ʋlↄ ba na be ɩ na wɛkar.
42009013	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju lɩɛbʼã yel ba: “A nyɩmɩ mɩ̃ɛ, nyɩ́ kʋ ba a bõ-dɩraa a ba dɩ.” A ba yel: “Bur-bie anuu nɩ jɩm-bie ayi tɛw sɩ tɛrɛ. Fʋ bʋↄrↄ na a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ sɩ́ cen na da a bõ-dɩraa wa nɩ kʋ a nɩ-yaw basɩmɛ mɩɩ?”
42009014	A-na-ɩ a nɩbɛ bala na dãa be a be, a dabsɩ tɛw, tara na ture anuu. A Jeeju lɛ yel a ʋ par-tuurbe: “Nyɩ́ ŋma a nɩbɛ a ba jɩnaa ji-gbulĩsɩ lɩjaayi nɩ piir-piir.”
42009015	A par-tuurbe sↄw ɩ̃ maal a lɛ, a nɩbɛ ba jaa jɛ.
42009016	A ala ɩ̃ baar, a Jeeju de na a bur-bie anuu nɩ a jɩm-bie ayi ɩ̃ na ʋ dʋↄ Ꞌwuor a saꞋlon ɩ̃ puor a Naaŋmɩn a bõ-dɩraa ala ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ na ʋ ŋma ŋma kʋ a ʋ par-tuurbe a ba de po a nɩbɛ,
42009017	a ba jaa Ꞌwↄb pi ɩ̃ cãa cɛ, a ba woor a bur-ŋmara sɛw pɩɩr pie-nʼayi.
42009018	A bibir kãw, a Jeeju be na a cɛ̃cɛ̃w sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn, a ʋlↄ nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe, ʋ soor ba: “Ala ʋlↄ a nɩbɛ ma de ma ɩ̃ ɩ?”
42009019	A ba yel: “A ŋmɛɛ ma yelʼã a Jã-Batii fʋ ɩ, a ŋmɛɛ go, a Eli fʋ ɩ, ɩ̃ a ŋmɛɛ yele a korĩ-cɛ ƴɛr-hiere ƴen sʋbↄ ɩ̃ jaw yi a kũu pʋↄ.”
42009020	A Jeeju soor ba: “Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, ala ʋlↄ tↄr nyɩ de ma ɩ̃ ɩ?” A Pɩɛr yel: “Fʋ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Kirisi.”
42009021	A Jeeju bↄ̃w kpãkpan ba ɩ̃ yel a ba taa wa ƴɛrɛ kʋrↄ nɩrɛ wa.
42009022	Ɩ̃ na ʋ lɛ yel áa sɛw na a Nɩbɛ Bie na nyɛ won yaw a bɛlɩ̃, áa Jufisɩ ni-dierbe nɩ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ na jɛ ʋ na bar, a ba na kú ʋ na, ɩ̃ a bibie ata dayen a ʋ na irʼã a kũu pʋↄ.
42009023	A ala na yi tↄ, ʋ yelʼã a ba jaa: “A ala ɩ nɩrɛ bʋↄrↄ na ʋ tuure ma, ú jɛ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ bar ɩ̃ de a ʋ nɩ-kʋ-daa tuo tuure nɩ ma a bio bio jaa.
42009024	A-na-ɩ a nɩrɛ lɛ na bʋↄrↄ ʋ faa a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ, a ʋ baafʋ na bↄrʼã, ɩ̃ a nɩrɛ lɛ na bara a ʋ baafʋ ʋ bↄrↄ a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ, ʋ na cɩ̃ɛ na.
42009025	A-na-ɩ a ala ɩ a nɩrɛ pↄw na a tẽw na yele a jaa, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ bũburĩ, mɩɩ ʋ wɛ, bõ a na kʋ ʋ?
42009026	A-na-ɩ a nɩrɛ lɛ a vĩ na nyↄw a maa nɩ a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ɩnɛ, a vĩ na mɩ nyↄw na a Nɩbɛ Bie a ʋ ɩnɛ, a lɛ ʋ nↄↄ waara nɩ a ʋ cãa kpɛ̃ɛ na mɩ ɩ a ʋ Sãa cãa, nɩ a ʋ sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ na ɩ a cɛcɛ ben mɩ.
42009027	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a bala na be a ka, a ŋmɛɛ na nyɛ na a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na diere a ʋ fãw, ɩ̃ wa pãa bɩɛr kpi.”
42009028	A lɛ a Jeeju na ƴɛr a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala baar, a maalʼã bibie anuu-nʼata, ɩ̃ ʋ taw a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jã nɩ a Jakɩ do nɩ tãw juu a Naaŋmɩn sʋↄrfʋ.
42009029	A mɩnɛ ʋ na sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn, a ʋ nii-sↄw lɩɛbʼã, ɩ̃ a ʋ kparʋ lɩɛb pɛlɩ̃ nyɩlɛ ƴala-ƴala-ƴala,
42009030	ɩ̃ a dabsɩ ayi ɩraa ƴɛrɛ nɩ ʋ. A nɩbɛ bala ɩ na a Eli nɩ a Mowisi
42009031	na nyɩr a cãa kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, a ba mana taa a Jeeju kũu ɩnɛ ʋ na cere kpiire a Jerujalɛm.
42009032	A gʋ̃ↄ dãa na tɛrɛ a Pɩɛr nɩ a ʋ tↄ deme, ɩ̃-cɛ ba jaw na nyɛ a Jeeju a cãa kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ nɩ a dabsɩ ayi na lãa ɩraa nɩ ʋ.
42009033	A lɛ a dabsɩ bala na bar a Jeeju ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ba cen, a Pɩɛr yelʼã a Jeeju: “Jãjaana, a vɩɛlɛ na sɩ na be a ka. Sɩ na ƴↄ̃w na sɛɛr ata; a bõ-ƴen na ɩ na a fʋ ben, a ƴen sʋbↄ ɩ a Mowisi ben, ɩ̃ a kãw ɩ a Eli ben.” ꞋWaa dãa bↄ̃w a ala ʋ na yele wa.
42009034	A lɛ ʋ na cãa ƴɛrɛ a lɛ, dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃ma suu na pↄw ba, ɩ̃ a lɛ a Mowisi nɩ a Eli na kpɛɛrɛ a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃ma ʋlↄ pʋↄ, dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw na a par-tuurbe.
42009035	Ɩ̃ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ yi be a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃ma pʋↄ yele: “A ɩ̃ Bi-daba nɩ a naa, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ vɛl ir: nyɩ́ cɛlɛ ʋ.”
42009036	A lɛ ba na wõ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala baar, ba nyɛ na a Jeeju ʋ ɩraa ʋ yẽ. A ʋ par-tuurbe ŋma vʋʋrʋ̃sɩ ɩ̃ baa man a ala ba na nyɛ a daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ kʋ nɩrɛ wa.
42009037	A dɩvɩɛ bio, a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na yi a tãw juu suu nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe, nɩ-yayaw tuor ʋ na.
42009038	A be a nɩbɛ sↄ̃w, daba kãw wuurʼɩ̃ na kpɛ̃w yele: “Jãjaana, ɩ̃ sʋↄr fʋ na bɩlɛ, Ꞌwuor ma a bile, a-na-ɩ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ bi-bõ-ƴen tẽ-tẽ-tẽ.
42009039	Kↄ̃tↄn kãw ɩ̃ ire ʋ, ɩ̃ ma maal ʋ ʋ wuure a jie naan, vara nɩ fãgã ɩ̃ ma fure a natɛ-fube, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ wa pãa bar ʋ, a ɩ̃gan ma kar ʋ na.
42009040	Ɩ̃ sʋↄrʼã a fʋ par-tuurbe a ba diw a kↄ̃tↄn bar, ɩ̃ baa tʋↄ wa.”
42009041	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na wõ a lɛ, ʋ yelʼã: “A nyɩmɩ dɩnaa su-kpɛn deme na ma tɛrɛ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa wa! Ɩ̃ be nɩ nyɩ, ɩ̃ dɩ nɩ nyɩ a tuo wa ta nɩ dabor?” Ɩ̃ na ʋ yel a daba: “Taw a fʋ bie wa nɩ ka.”
42009042	A lɛ a daba na taw a bie wa tara nɩ a Jeeju, a kↄ̃tↄn dam ʋ na nɩ kpɛ̃w lↄb a tene, ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju mʋ̃ↄ na mimir ƴↄ̃w a kↄ̃tↄn bier, ɩ̃ na ʋ kpɛmɛ a bile kʋ a sãa,
42009043	a nʋↄr ko a nɩbɛ ba jaa a lɛ ba na nyɛ a Naaŋmɩn bɛrmɛfʋ. A mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ ba jaa na kpiire a Jeeju a ala a jaa ɩnɛ ʋ na maala, ʋ yelʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe:
42009044	“A nyɩmɩ, nyɩ́ bↄ̃w cɛlɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ na: ba na nyↄw na a Nɩbɛ Bie ƴↄ̃w a nɩbɛ nuu pʋↄ.”
42009045	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋ par-tuurbe ma dãa bↄ̃w a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ par wa. A dãa na liw ba a ba bↄ̃w faa, ɩ̃ a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw ba a baa Ꞌla soor a Jeeju a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ wa.
42009046	Cɩɩrɩ̃-taa irʼã a Jeeju par-tuurbe sↄ̃w a ba bʋↄrↄ ba bↄ̃w a ʋlↄ na ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ a ba pʋↄ.
42009047	A Jeeju bↄ̃w a ala ba na tɩɛrɛ ɩ̃ taw bibile wa nɩ ʋ ɩraa a ʋ lõboorɩ̃,
42009048	ɩ̃ ʋ yel ba: “A nɩrɛ lɛ na sↄw de a bibile na a maa ɩnɛ, a maa mɩ̃ɛ ʋ sↄw de, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na sↄw de ma, mɩ sↄw na de a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma. A-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ na nyɩrɩ̃ pab a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ a nyɩ jaa sↄ̃w, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ.”
42009049	A Jã yel: “Jãjaana, sɩ nyɛ na nɩrɛ kãw ʋ de a fʋ yuor diwre nɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ bara, a sɩ dãa bʋↄrↄ sɩ pɩɛrɩ̃ ʋ bar, a-na-ɩ Ꞌwaa be a sɩ pʋↄ wa.”
42009050	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Nyɩ taa pɩɛrɛ ʋ bara wa, a-na-ɩ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na ma jaar a nyɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa, nyɩ nɩrɛ ʋ ɩ.”
42009051	A mɩnɛ a daar ʋlↄ ba na diere a Jeeju duoro nɩ a saꞋlon na pɩɛlɛ, ʋ ŋme na nyãa a Jerujalɛm cenfʋ ɩnɛ.
42009052	Ʋ tʋ̃ na nɩbɛ a ba de ʋ nĩe cen na kpɛ Samari tẽ-bile kãw pʋↄ a ʋ gaajie gbɛɛrɩ̃fʋ ɩnɛ.
42009053	Ɩ̃-cɛ a tẽw ʋlↄ nɩbɛ ma sↄw de ʋ wa, a-na-ɩ a Jerujalɛm ʋ dãa cere.
42009054	A mɩnɛ a ʋ par-tuurbe Jakɩ nɩ a Jã na nyɛ a lɛ, ba yelʼã: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, fʋ bʋↄrↄ na sɩ bʋↄl a vũu ʋ yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ suu wa dɩ ba mɩɩ?”
42009055	A Jeeju lɩɛb mʋ̃ↄ mimir ƴↄ̃w ba.
42009056	Ɩ̃ na ba lɛ cen tẽ-kpee.
42009057	A lɛ ba na cãa be a sↄr juu cere, daba kãw yelʼã a Jeeju: “Ɩ̃ na tuure fʋ na a jiir a jaa fʋ na cere.”
42009058	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A sɛ̃nɛ tɛrɛ na a ba bↄↄr, ɩ̃ a wɛ-lili mɩ tɛrɛ a ba cor, ɩ̃-cɛ a Nɩbɛ Bie ma mɩ tɛrɛ jie ʋ na gaala a ʋ juu wa.”
42009059	Ʋ lɛ yelʼã nɩsaa kpee: “Wa tuure ma.” Ʋ yel: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ! Kʋ ma sↄr ɩ̃ kulʼɩ̃ ũu a ɩ̃ sãa baar.”
42009060	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju yel ʋ na: “Bar a nɩ-kũusɩ a ba uune a ba kũusɩ, ɩ̃ a fʋ̃ʋ, cen na hier a Naaŋmɩn fãw kʋ a nɩbɛ.”
42009061	A kãw yel: “Ɩ̃ na tu fʋ na, ɩ̃-cɛ kʋ ma sↄr ɩ̃ de nĩe kulʼɩ̃ puor a ɩ̃ yir deme baar.”
42009062	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na de a nii kʋↄrↄ nɩ, ɩ̃ ŋmele Ꞌwuoro a puo-sↄw, Ꞌwaa sɛw nɩ a Naaŋmɩn fãw wa.”
42010001	A ala na yi tↄ, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ lɛ bʋↄlʼã a par-tuurbe lɩjaata nɩ pie-nʼayi ŋmɛɛ go, tʋ̃ ba ayi-yi a ba de ʋ nĩe cen a ten a jaa pʋↄ nɩ a jiir a jaa a ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ na sɛw ʋ cen.
42010002	Ʋ yel ba na: “A puo bɛrmɛ na, ɩ̃-cɛ a ci-ŋmarba ma jɛ̃ bom wa. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ nyɩ́ sʋↄr a Puo Sʋbↄ ʋ ƴↄ̃w a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ a ba cen na ŋma a ʋ ci.
42010003	Nyɩ́ cere, ɩ̃ bↄ̃wnaa, peli kaarɩ̃ ɩ̃ tʋnↄ nyɩ a wɛ-baar sↄ̃w.
42010004	Nyɩ taa tɛrɛɛ libie wole wa, nyɩ taa tɛrɛɛ wʋↄ wa, nyɩ taa tɛrɛɛ nafaba wa, nyɩ taa mɩ ɩrɛɛ a sↄr pʋↄ puoro nɩrɛ wa.
42010005	A yir lɛ pʋↄ nyɩ na kpɛɛrɛ nyɩ́ de nĩe yel: ʻSu-ɓaar ú be nɩ a yir na.ʼ
42010006	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ nɩrɛ be na na ɩ a su-ɓaar sʋbↄ, a nyɩ su-ɓaar na be na a ʋ jie; a ala ma ɩ lɛ ʋ wa, a na lɩɛbʼã wa a nyɩ sɛ̃.
42010007	Nyɩ́ jɛ be a yir ʋlↄ pʋↄ dɩrɛ nyuure nɩ a ala ba na kʋrↄ nyɩ, a-na-ɩ a tʋ̃tʋnↄ sɛw nɩ na a ʋ yar. Nyɩ taa mɩ lɩɛrɛ a yie yʋↄrↄ nɩ wa.
42010008	A tẽw jaa lɛ nyɩ nↄↄ kpɛ a ba sↄw de nyɩ, nyɩ́ dɩrɛ a dɩb ala ba na kʋrↄ nyɩ,
42010009	nyɩ́ kpaar a wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme bala na be a be ɩ̃ yel a tẽw ʋlↄ nɩbɛ: ʻÁ Naaŋmɩn fãw ta na pɩɛlʼɩ̃ nyɩ.ʼ
42010010	Ɩ̃-cɛ a tẽw jaa lɛ pʋↄ nyɩ nↄↄ kpɛ a baa sↄw de nyɩ wa, nyɩ́ yi a ʋ sↄɛ pʋↄ ɩ̃ yel:
42010011	ʻA nyɩ tẽw tãbuulĩ tɩɛ na mar sɩ a gbɛɛ, sɩ pine na ƴↄnↄ nyɩ, ɩ̃ nyɩ́ cãa bↄ̃wnaa a Naaŋmɩn fãw pɩɛlʼã.ʼ
42010012	Ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ dayen, a Sↄdↄm hʋʋr nyɛfʋ na sa na a tẽw naa ben.
42010013	“Nabier na ta na a nyɩmɩ Kↄrajɩ̃-tẽ-deme! Nabier na ta na a nyɩmɩ Bɛsada-tẽ-deme! A-na-ɩ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ ala na maal a nyɩ sↄ̃w, a ala ɩ̃ dãa ɩ a Tɩɩr nɩ a Sɩdↄ̃ a maal a lɛ, ba naa su na cẽcen jaar a jie naan jɛ nɩ tãpɛlɩ̃ jɩnaa nɩ, miilʼɩ̃ áa ba yɛ̃ lɩɛbʼã.
42010014	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a lɛ a Naaŋmɩn na guoro a nɩbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, a Tɩɩr nɩ a Sɩdↄ̃ hʋʋr nyɛfʋ na sa na a nyɩ ben.
42010015	Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, Kapɛɛnam-tẽ-deme, nyɩ tɩɛrʼã beeka a nyɩ na do na a saꞋlon mɩɩ? Nyɩ na ɛ̃ɛ na wur suu ta a kpɩɩn tẽw.”
42010016	Ʋ lɛ yelʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe: “A ʋlↄ na cɛlɛ a nyɩ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, mɩ cɛlɛ na a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃; a ʋlↄ na jaar nyɩ, maa ʋ mɩ jaar, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na jaar ma, ʋ mɩ jaarʼã a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma.”
42010017	A par-tuurbe lɩjaata nɩ pie-nʼayi bala lɩɛbʼã wa, a nʋ̃ↄ ƴala ba a ba yel: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, a fʋ yuor maalʼã a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ tↄr jaa bal a ba mɩ̃ɛ a sɩ jie.”
42010018	A Jeeju yel ba: “Ɩ̃ dãa na Ꞌwuor nyɛ a Satã na yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ lo a mɩnɛ a saa na ma nyɩɩlɛ.
42010019	Nyɩ́ nyɛ, ɩ̃ kʋ nyɩ na tʋↄfʋ a nyɩ na nɛbʼɩ̃ a wɩɩr nɩ a lan, nɩ a Bier Sʋbↄ fãw ʋ jaa. Bom jaa ma be be tʋↄrↄ maala nyɩ bier wa.
42010020	A be na a lɛ ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ taa cɩlɛ a-na-ɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ balʼã a ba mɩ̃ɛ a nyɩ jie wa, ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ cɩlɛ a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn sɛbʼã a nyɩ yoe a be a saa juu.”
42010021	A daar ʋlↄ naan pʋↄ, nʋ̃ↄ ƴala na a Jeeju a yi a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ jie, ʋ yel: “Ɩ̃ Sãa, ɩ̃ puoro fʋ na, a fʋ̃ʋ na ɩ a saa juu nɩ a tẽw Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, a mɩnɛ fʋ na sↄↄlɩ̃ a yele ala a nɩ-kpaarsɩ nɩ a yɛ̃ deme jie, ɩ̃ miilʼɩ̃ a bibiir. Ɩ̃ Sãa, a lɛ ʋ, fʋ̃ʋ a nʋmↄ a fʋ maal a lɛ.”
42010022	“A ɩ̃ Sãa barʼã a yele a jaa ƴↄ̃w a ɩ̃ nurɩ̃. Nɩrɛ ma bↄ̃w a ala a Bie na ɩ ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Sãa tɛw ʋ wa. Nɩrɛ ma mɩ bↄ̃w a ala a Sãa na ɩ ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Bie tɛw ʋ wa, nɩ a ʋlↄ a Bie na bʋↄrↄ ʋ miilʼɩ̃.”
42010023	Ɩ̃ naa ʋ lɩɛb yel a ʋ par-tuurbe tɛw: “A nʋmↄ na a bala a ba mimie na nyɛ a ala nyɩ na nyɛrɛ!
42010024	A-na-ɩ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe nɩ a jamansɩ yayaw dãa na bʋↄrↄ ba nyɛ a ala nyɩ na nyɛrɛ ɩ̃ baa nyaa wa; ba mɩ dãa na bʋↄrↄ ba wõ a ala nyɩ na wono, ɩ̃ baa wonaa wa.”
42010025	A ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄ̃wnↄ kãw irʼã bʋↄrↄ ʋ bɩɩr a Jeeju, na ʋ soor ʋ: “Jãjaana, bõ ɩ̃ na maal ɩ̃ pↄw a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw?”
42010026	A Jeeju soor ʋ: “Bõ ɩ̃ sɛb a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn sɛbɛ pʋↄ? Bõ fʋ ma Ꞌwuor nyɛ a be?”
42010027	A daba yel: “Fʋ na nʋnↄ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na ɩ a fʋ Naaŋmɩn nɩ a fʋ suur ʋ jaa nɩ a fʋ baafʋ nɩ a fʋ fãw nɩ a fʋ tɩɛrʋ̃ ʋ jaa, ɩ̃ mɩ nʋnↄ a fʋ tↄ sʋbↄ a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ kaarɩ̃.”
42010028	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ fʋ yel. A fʋ̃ʋ maal a lɛ, fʋ na pↄw na a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw.”
42010029	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄ̃wnↄ ʋlↄ bʋↄrↄ na ʋ miilʼɩ̃ a ʋ torfʋ, ɩ̃ yel a Jeeju: “Ala ɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ tↄ sʋbↄ?”
42010030	A Jeeju lɛ lɩɛb yel ʋ: “Daba kãw dãa na yi a Jerujalɛm ɩ̃ cere a Jeriko-tẽw. Ʋ lo na a nyanyube sↄ̃w a ba nyↄw ʋ yaar a yele, ɩ̃ naa ba pↄb pↄb ʋ bar, a cɛ fɩ̃ɩ ʋ naa kpi.
42010031	A be na a lɛ, a Naaŋmɩn baar-loro kãw mɩ de a ʋna sↄr cere. A lɛ ʋ na nyɛ a ʋna daba, ʋ golʼã de a lõboor sↄr cen.
42010032	A lɛ ʋ mɩ, a Levi bal nɩrɛ kãw mɩ ta na a be a ʋna jie naan mɩ nyɛ a daba ʋ gã a lɛ, ʋ mɩ gol tↄl de a lõboor sↄr cen.
42010033	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Samari-tẽw nɩrɛ kãw na tↄlↄ nɩ a sↄr ta na nyɛ a lɛ, a nãw nyↄw ʋ,
42010034	ʋ taw ta de dɩvɛ̃ pɛw nɩ ʋ a natɩɛ ɩ̃ pur a kãa ƴↄ̃w, ɩ̃ de cẽcen vilĩ pↄw. A ala ɩ̃ baar, ʋ ɓↄw ʋ na dↄↄl a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ bʋ̃ↄ juu cenʼɩ̃ a saanba yir pʋↄ, naa ʋ gaal ɩ̃ gã gu ʋ a tɩsↄw.
42010035	A mɩnɛ a bio na vɩɛ, ʋ tũ na ir warbie kↄↄr anaan kʋ a yir sʋbↄ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: ʻꞋWuoro a daba na vɩlaa. A maa lↄↄ lɩɛb wa, ɩ̃ na kʋ fʋ na a ala fʋ na maala dↄↄlↄ a ʋ ɩnɛ.ʼ ”
42010036	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, ʋ soorʼã a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄ̃wnↄ: “Mɩnɛ fʋ tɩɛr? A nɩbɛ ata bala pʋↄ, buor ɩ̃ ɩ a daba ʋlↄ a nyanyube na pↄb tↄ sʋbↄ?”
42010037	Ʋ yel ʋ: “A ʋlↄ na wɩɛ ʋ, ʋlↄ ʋ.” A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A fʋ̃ʋ mɩ, cen na mɩ maal a lɛ.”
42010038	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe na be a sↄr juu cere, ʋ vɩɛ na kpɛ tẽ-bile kãw pʋↄ, na ʋ cen pↄw kãw na dɩ Martɩ yir, ʋ de ʋ ir a saan.
42010039	A pↄw ʋlↄ dãa na tɛrɛ yɛ-bile na dɩ Maarɩɩ. A Maarɩɩ wa na jɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ pulẽe cɛlɛ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ.
42010040	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Martɩ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ ma dãa jɛ ji-bõ-ƴen wa, a yi a tʋ̃-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ʋ na maala jie, ʋ taw na ta yel a Jeeju: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ! Aa ɩ fʋ bom a ɩ̃ yɛ-bile na jɛ ɩ̃ bar ma ɩ̃ tʋnↄ a tʋn a ɩ̃ yẽ wa mɩɩ? Yel ʋ ʋ wa sũo ma!”
42010041	A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ʋ: “Martɩ wee! Fʋ barʼã a tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ a dama fʋ, a kpɛmɛ kʋ fʋ, a yel-yaw fʋ na maala ɩnɛ.
42010042	Ɩ̃-cɛ bom bõ-ƴen tɛw ɩ̃ sa gãw a jaa. A Maarɩɩ vɛlʼã ir a ʋna bom son a nɩrɛ na ma tʋↄrↄ faara wa.”
42011001	Bibir bõ-ƴen, a Jeeju sʋↄrↄ na a Naaŋmɩn jie kãw. A lɛ ʋ na sʋↄr baar, a ʋ par-tuure kãw yel ʋ na: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, jaan sɩ a Naaŋmɩn sʋↄrfʋ a mɩnɛ a Jã na jaan a ʋ par-tuurbe.”
42011002	A Jeeju yel ba: “A lɛ nyɩ na sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn, nyɩ́ yel: ʻSɩ Sãa! A fʋ yuor ú ow kpee, a fʋ fãw ú wa.
42011003	Kʋrↄ sɩ a bibie a jaa, a bõ-dɩraa ala na sɛw nɩ sɩ.
42011004	De a sɩ faar bar kʋ sɩ, a-na-ɩ a sɩmɩ mɩ, sɩ ma de na a nɩrɛ lɛ na bɩɛ a sɩ jie bɩɛfʋ bar kʋ ʋ. Taa bar sɩ a sɩ kpɛ a bɩɩrfʋ pʋↄ wa.ʼ ”
42011005	A Jeeju lɛ yel ba na go: “A ala ɩ a kãw a nyɩ sↄ̃w tɛrɛ na a ba-daba na ʋ cen na nyɛ ʋ a tɩsↄw porɩ̃ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: ʻƖ̃ ba yaa! Pɛ̃w ma bur-bie ata,
42011006	a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ baraa kãw yi na wɩɛr wa a ɩ̃ sɛ̃, ɩ̃ a maa tɛrɛ bom jaa kʋrↄ ʋ wa,ʼ
42011007	a nʋmↄ-wa-sↄw a ʋ tↄ sʋbↄ ʋlↄ na be a diem na yel ʋ na: ʻTaa vↄwrↄ ma wa; sɩ pↄw na a pan baar, a maa nɩ a ɩ̃ bibiir gã na; maa lɛ tʋↄrↄ ire kʋrↄ fʋ buru wa.ʼ
42011008	Ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a ʋlↄ ma saarɩ̃ ir kʋ ʋ bom a-na-ɩ a ʋ baraa ʋ ɩ wa, ɩ̃ ʋ na irʼã kʋ ʋ a yele a jaa ʋ na bʋↄrↄ, a-na-ɩ ʋ vↄwrↄ ʋ na.
42011009	“Ɩ̃ a maa, ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, nyɩ́ sʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ nyɩ na pↄw na, nyɩ́ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ nyɩ na nyaa na, nyɩ́ ŋmeere a pan ɩ̃ ba na yuo nyɩ na.
42011010	A-na-ɩ a nɩrɛ lɛ na sʋↄrↄ ma pↄw na; a ʋlↄ na bʋↄrↄ ma nyaa na, ɩ̃ ba ma yuo na a pan a ʋlↄ na ŋmeere ɩnɛ.
42011011	Sãa buor ɩ̃ be a nyɩ sↄ̃w, a ala ɩ a ʋ bie sʋↄr ʋ na a jɩm ʋ de waab kʋ ʋ?
42011012	Mɩɩ a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ sʋↄr ʋ a nↄjɛl, ʋ de lãw kʋ ʋ?
42011013	A ala ɩ a nyɩmɩ na ɩ a nɩ-faar, nyɩ bↄ̃w na yel-vɛlɛ ma kʋ a nyɩ bibiir, mɩnɛ ɩ̃ ɩ a kↄ̃ nyɩrɩ̃ nʋmↄ a nyɩ Sãa na be a saa juu ʋ na tɩɩr a ʋ Sɩɛ kʋ a bala na sʋↄrↄ ʋ wa?”
42011014	A Jeeju dãa na diwre kↄ̃tↄn na maal daba ʋ ɩ nↄ-mu sʋbↄ. A lɛ a kↄ̃tↄn na yi baar, a nↄ-mu sʋbↄ lɛ ƴɛrɛ na a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, a nↄɛ ko a nɩbɛ.
42011015	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ yelʼã: “A Bɛɛjɛbul na ɩ a kↄ̃tↄn nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, a ʋ fãw ʋ diwre nɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ bara.”
42011016	Ɩ̃ a nɩŋmɛɛ bʋↄrↄ na ba jʋʋr ʋ bↄ̃w a ʋ tɛw ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ ʋ a ʋ maal bom miilʼɩ̃ ba a ba bↄ̃w ka a Naaŋmɩn jie a ʋ fãw sɩrɩ̃ yi.
42011017	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju bↄ̃w na a ala ba na tɩɛrɛ ɩ̃ yel ba: “A tẽw jaa lɛ na var ayi jɛbɛ nɩ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ ʋ na wɛlʼã, ɩ̃ a ʋ yie na lo na dↄↄl taa bõ-ƴene-ƴene.
42011018	A lɛ ʋ mɩ, a ala ɩ a Sãta lɩɛbʼã jɛbɛ nɩ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ, mɩnɛ a ʋ fãw na ɩ ɩ̃ tʋↄ cãa be be? Ɩ̃ yelʼã a lɛ a-na-ɩ nyɩ yelʼã a Bɛɛjɛbul fãw ɩ̃ de diwre nɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ.
42011019	Ɩ̃ a maa, a ala ɩ a Bɛɛjɛbul fãw ɩ̃ diwre nɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ, a bala na tuure nyɩ, ala fãw ba ma diw nɩ ba? Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a bala tↄr jaa ɩ̃ na ɩ a nyɩ ƴɛr-guorbo.
42011020	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ a Naaŋmɩn tʋↄfʋ ɩ̃ diwre nɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ, a miile na áa Naaŋmɩn fãw ta na a nyɩ jie.
42011021	“A gãdaa na bↄ̃w tɛrɛ a jɛb yele gu nɩ a ʋ yir, a ʋ yele ma jɛ na vɩlaa.
42011022	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ a ʋlↄ fãgã na gãw ʋ wa na tʋↄ ʋ, maal ʋ ʋ bal, ʋ na fa na a ʋna gãdaa jɛb yele ala ʋ na dãa tɩɛrɛ nɩ ɩ̃ de a ʋ yele a jaa po a nɩbɛ.
42011023	“A ʋlↄ na ma be a ɩ̃ jie wa, ʋ ɩ na a ɩ̃ san-sʋbↄ, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na ma sũono ma a sɩ lãa kaala wa, ʋ yɛ̃yɛlɛ na bara.”
42011024	“A kↄ̃tↄn bier ɩ̃ yi a nɩrɛ pʋↄ, ʋ ma cenʼã na viire yʋↄrↄ a wɛkar pʋↄ, bʋↄrↄ a jie ʋlↄ ʋ na tʋↄrↄ pɩɛnɛ. A ʋlↄ ɩ̃ wa faa, ʋ ma yelʼã: ʻƖ̃ na lɩɛbʼã kul a ɩ̃ yir ʋlↄ pʋↄ ɩ̃ na yi ɩ̃ cɛ bar.ʼ
42011025	A lɛ ʋ na lɩɛb wa, ʋ nyɛ na a ba pɩɩr a yir ʋlↄ ɩ̃ gbɛɛrɩ̃ a yele vɩlaa.
42011026	A lɛ, ʋ ma lɩɛbʼã cen na bↄ a ʋ tↄ deme anuu-nʼayi na nyɩrɩ̃ ɩ a kↄ̃tↄn-faar gãw ʋ, a ba lãa lɩɛb wa kpɛ a yir ʋlↄ pʋↄ jɛ a be. A ala ɩ̃ baar, a daba ʋlↄ ben ma nyɩrɩ̃ na bɛlɩ̃ gãw a dãdãw.”
42011027	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na ƴɛrɛ a lɛ, pↄw kãw yel ʋ na nɩ kpɛ̃w be a nɩbɛ sↄ̃w: “A nʋmↄ a pↄw ʋlↄ na dↄw fʋ nɩ a ʋ bɩr fʋ na ƴɛn.”
42011028	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju yelʼã: “A ɛ̃ɛ nʋmↄ a bala na cɛlɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ sↄw maala.”
42011029	A mɩnɛ a nɩ-yaw na tiwre taa a Jeeju sɛ̃, ʋ nyↄw na ɩ̃ yele: “A dɩnaa nɩbɛ ɩ na nɩ-faar. Ba bʋↄrↄ na ba nyɛ nↄ-kofʋ tʋn ʋ ɩ ba jɩbaa, ɩ̃-cɛ baa be na nyɛ bom ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Jonasɩ jɩbaa ʋ wa.
42011030	A mɩnɛ a Jonasɩ na ɩ a jɩbaa a Nɩnɩvɩ-tẽ-deme jie, lɛ a Nɩbɛ Bie na mɩ ɩ a jɩbaa a dɩnaa nɩbɛ jie.
42011031	A ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ guorfʋ dayen, a tẽ-nɩdaa pↄↄ-jamana na irʼã ɩraa a dɩnaa nɩbɛ nii-sↄw ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w ba a ƴɛrɩ̃, a-na-ɩ ʋ yi na a tẽw baarfʋ jie ɩ̃ wa cɛl a jamana Salʋmↄ̃ yɛ̃. Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, nyɩ nyɛ na a ʋlↄ na gãw a Salʋmↄ̃ a nyɩ sↄ̃w.
42011032	A ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ guorfʋ dayen, a Nɩnɩvɩ-tẽ-deme na mɩ irʼã ɩraa a dɩnaa nɩbɛ nii-sↄw ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w ba a ƴɛrɩ̃, a-na-ɩ ba lɩɛbʼã a ba yɛ̃ a lɛ ba na wõ a Jonasɩ ʋ hier a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃. Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, nyɩ nyɛ na a ʋlↄ na gãw a Jonasɩ a nyɩ sↄ̃w.
42011033	“Nɩrɛ ma ƴↄnↄ a lãpa ɩ̃ diere sↄↄlↄ, mɩɩ pↄwrↄ lakpow pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a jie ʋlↄ ʋ na tʋↄrↄ caara ba, ba ma ɛ̃ɛ dↄↄl ʋ, a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ bala na kpɛɛrɛ a be na nyɛ a cãa.
42011034	A fʋ mimie ɩ̃ ɩ a fʋ ɩ̃gan lãpa; a ala ɩ a fʋ mimie ɩ na mimi-sono, a fʋ ɩ̃gan ʋ jaa na mɩ caarɩ̃ na, ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a fʋ mimie sãw na, a fʋ ɩ̃gan na mɩ liw na.
42011035	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, bↄ̃w tɛrɛ a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ, a cãa ʋlↄ na be a fʋ pʋ̃ↄ ʋ taa wa lɩɛb ɩ libe wa.
42011036	A ala ɩ a fʋ ɩ̃gan ʋ jaa caarɩ̃ na, ma cɛ jie bar a libe pʋↄ wa, ʋ na be na a cãa pʋↄ ʋ jaa, wↄ̃ taa nɩ a mɩnɛ a lãpa na ma caarɩ̃ fʋ.”
42011037	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃, a Farɩsɩ nɩrɛ kãw bʋↄl ʋ na be a ʋ yir a dɩb dɩfʋ ɩnɛ, ʋ cen na kpɛ jɛ a dɩb par.
42011038	A nʋↄr ko na a Farɩsɩ nɩrɛ ʋlↄ a lɛ ʋ na nyɛ a Jeeju ʋ jɛ a dɩb par ɩ̃ ma dãa de nĩe pↄl a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ wa.
42011039	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ʋ na: “A nyɩmɩ Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ! Nyɩ́ nyɛ a mɩnɛ nyɩ na wↄ̃: nyɩ ma pɛw na a nyɩ ŋman nɩ a nyɩ laa puo-sↄw bar, ɩ̃ a nyɩ pʋↄ sɛw nɩ na a nyanyu-tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ nɩ a fãa maalfʋ.
42011040	Dãbolo nyɩ ɩ lɛɛ! A ʋlↄ na maal a puo-sↄw, má a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ mɩ maal a pʋↄ!
42011041	Nyɩ́ ɛ̃ɛ de a ala na be a pʋ̃ↄ kʋ a nãw deme, ɩ̃ a yele a jaa na ɩ na cɛcɛ a nyɩ jie.
42011042	“Ɩ̃-cɛ nabier na pↄw na a nyɩmɩ Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ, a-na-ɩ nyɩ ma irʼã a Naaŋmɩn ben a nyɩ jɛɛ-yele pʋↄ nɩ a yel-bulisɩ a jaa na ɩ a jɩɛr, ɩ̃ ma lɛ ɛ̃ɛ bar a Naaŋmɩn torfʋ nɩ a ʋ nʋfʋ; a ala ɩ̃ dãa sɛw nyɩ maala ɩ̃ kↄ̃ hiin a yel-bil ala wa.
42011043	“Nabier na pↄw na a nyɩmɩ Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ, a-na-ɩ nyɩ nʋ na a nii-sↄw jaajiir a puorfʋ yie pʋↄ, ɩ̃ ma mɩ bʋↄrↄ a nɩbɛ ba jaa ba puoro nyɩ a dar pʋↄ.
42011044	Nabier na pↄw nyɩ na! A-na-ɩ nyɩ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a yar ala kaarɩ̃ a nɩbɛ na ma nɛbɛ, ɩ̃ ma bↄ̃wnaa wa, a-na-ɩ bom ma be be miile a yar ʋ wa.”
42011045	A ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄ̃wnↄ kãw yel a Jeeju: “Jãjaana, a lɛ fʋ na ƴɛrɛ, má a sɩmɩ mɩ fʋ mɩ tʋrↄ.”
42011046	A Jeeju yel: “Nabier na mɩ pↄw nyɩ na a nyɩmɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ, a-na-ɩ nyɩ ma tuo na a nɩbɛ a to-bɛrɛ na kpɛmɛ a tuofʋ, ɩ̃ nyɩ maa ir a nyɩ nuu sɩɩrʼɩ̃ fɩ̃ɩ wa.
42011047	Nabier na pↄw nyɩ na! A-na-ɩ nyɩ ma cↄↄrɩ̃ na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe yar ɩ̃ a ɩ a nyɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ ɩ̃ kú.
42011048	A lɛ, nyɩ miilʼã a nyɩ sↄw na a ala a nyɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ na dãa maal, a-na-ɩ bala ɩ̃ kú a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe ɩ̃ a nyɩ cↄↄrɩ̃ a ba yar.
42011049	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Naaŋmɩn na ɩ a Kpaarfʋ Sʋbↄ yel: ʻƖ̃ na tʋ̃ nɩ na a ƴɛr-hierbe nɩ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ a ba jie; ba na kú na a ŋmɛɛ ɩ̃ hʋↄl a ŋmɛɛ,ʼ
42011050	a mɩnɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ na tuo a dɩnaa nɩbɛ juu a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe jɩ̃ɩ ɩnɛ ba na deer, wa nyↄw nɩ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na maal a tẽw,
42011051	ɩ̃ wa mɩ nyↄw nɩ a mɩnɛ ba na kú a Abɛl wa ta nɩ a Jakarɩ ba na kú a baar lofʋ jie nɩ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ sↄↄlɩ̃sↄw. Sɩrɛ jaa ɩ̃ yel nyɩ, ba na tuo na a dɩnaa nɩbɛ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃.
42011052	“Nabier na pↄw na a nyɩmɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ, a-na-ɩ nyɩ irʼã a bↄ̃wfʋ nakili bar. Nyɩmɩ mɩ̃ɛ ma kpɛ wa, ɩ̃ nyɩ mɩ varʼã a sↄr a bala na dãa bʋↄrↄ ba kpɛ.”
42011053	A lɛ a Jeeju na yi a jie ʋlↄ baar, a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ nyↄw na ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ʋ a gↄn, papire nɩ ʋ, bʋↄrↄ ʋ ƴɛr ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ yayaw
42011054	na ba bɩɩrɛ nɩ ʋ, ʋ na ƴɛr ƴɛrɩ̃ lɩɛb nyↄw nɩ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ.
42012001	A daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ, a nɩbɛ tiw na taa ture-ture, fʋrↄ taa nɛbɛ taa, a Jeeju ƴɛrʼɩ̃ a ʋ par-tuurbe na ʋ yel ba: “A dãdãw bom ɩ na: nyɩ́ gu nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ tabɩr ɩnɛ na ɩ a ba poe ayi tɛrɛfʋ.
42012002	Bom ma be be na sↄↄlɩ̃ ɩ̃ mↄↄ yire eãa pʋↄ wa.
42012003	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ala a jaa nyɩ na yele a libe pʋↄ na yi na cãa pʋↄ a ba bↄ̃wnaa, ɩ̃ a ala nyɩ na hũhune a di-bile pʋↄ ba na hierʼã a ala a gara jur.
42012004	“A nyɩmɩ na ɩ a ɩ̃ badɛɛ, ɩ̃ yele na kʋrↄ nyɩ, nyɩ taa jↄrↄ dãbɩ̃ɛ a bala ɩnɛ na ma kú a ɩ̃gan baar, ɩ̃ ma lɛ tʋↄrↄ maala bom kãw wa.
42012005	Ɩ̃ na miil nyɩ na a ʋlↄ na sɛw a nyɩ na jↄrↄ: nyɩ́ jↄrↄ a ʋlↄ na tʋↄrↄ diere a nɩrɛ baafʋ ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ a tʋↄfʋ lↄbↄ nɩ ʋ ƴↄnↄ a wɛfʋ jie. Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, ʋlↄ nyɩ sɛw na jↄrↄ.
42012006	“A tɩ̃ɩtɩ̃ɩ, má a libie pie ba ma da nɩ a ba bõ-bie anuu. Ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn maa hiin bõ-ƴen a ba pʋↄ bar wa.
42012007	Ɩ̃ aa ɩ a ala tɛw ʋ wa; ʋ sↄrʼã a nyɩ jukↄbↄ tɩɛ jaa bↄ̃w a nʋↄr. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ nyɩ taa ɩ a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw nyɩ wa: nyɩ sa na a tɩ̃ɩtɩ̃ɩ-yayaw.
42012008	“Ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a nɩrɛ lɛ na cã yel a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw á ɩ̃ ben ʋ ɩ, a maa Nɩbɛ Bie na mɩ yelʼã a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ nii-sↄw a ɩ̃ ben a sʋbↄ ʋlↄ ɩ.
42012009	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩrɛ lɛ na cɩɩrɛ a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw a Ꞌwaa bↄ̃w ma wa, a maa Nɩbɛ Bie na mɩ cɩɩrɩ̃ na a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ nii-sↄw a maa bↄ̃w a sʋbↄ ʋlↄ wa.
42012010	“A nɩrɛ lɛ na kpɛrɛ a maa, Nɩbɛ Bie, a Naaŋmɩn na de na a ʋ fãa bar kʋ ʋ; ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩrɛ lɛ na sãwna a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ yuor, a Naaŋmɩn ma be na de a ʋ fãa bar kʋ ʋ wa.
42012011	“A lɛ ba nↄↄ tawra nyɩ cere nɩ a puorfʋ yie pʋↄ, mɩɩ a tẽw nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a fãgã deme nii-sↄw, nyɩ taa ɩ a ɩ nyɩ tɩɛrʋ̃ a mɩnɛ nyɩ na ɩrɛ ɩ̃ mana a nyɩ ben, mɩɩ a ala nyɩ na sɛw nyɩ yel wa,
42012012	a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na mɩɩn nyɩ na a daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ a ala nyɩ na sɛw nyɩ yel.”
42012013	Daba dãa na be be a nɩbɛ sↄ̃w ɩ̃ yel a Jeeju: “Jãjaana, yel a ɩ̃ yɛbɛ ʋ ɩ a sɩ po a sɩ gã-yele.”
42012014	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Daba wee! Ala ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w ma ɩ̃ ɩ a nyɩ ƴɛr-guoro, mɩɩ ɩ̃ na poro nyɩ a nyɩ gã-yele?”
42012015	Ɩ̃ na ʋ yel a nɩbɛ: “Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ jɩmɛ ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a yel-yaw bↄfʋ ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ a nɩrɛ baafʋ ma yi a ʋ yel-yaw tɛrɛfʋ ɩnɛ wa.”
42012016	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Jeeju lↄb a sʋkpa na kʋ ba. Ʋ yelʼã: “Daba dãa na be be na ɩ naaba, na ma pↄw yel-yayaw a ʋ por pʋↄ.
42012017	Ʋ nyↄw na ɩ̃ pɛrɛ a ʋ suur pʋↄ yele nɩ: ʻMɩnɛ ɩ̃ na ɩ? A-na-ɩ maa tɛrɛ a jie ɩ̃ na bine a ɩ̃ yele wa.ʼ
42012018	Ɩ̃ na ʋ yel: ʻNↄhↄ̃ ɩ̃ na maal: Ɩ̃ na wɛlʼã a ɩ̃ bobo ɩ̃ lɛ mɛ bõ-bɛrɛ, na ɩ̃ woor a ɩ̃ ci nɩ a ɩ̃ yele a jaa ƴↄ̃w,
42012019	ɩ̃ na ɩ̃ pãa yel a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ: Daba wee! Fʋ tɛrɛ na yele yayaw na fʋ bin yomo yayaw ɩnɛ. Tɛrɛ nʋ̃ↄ jɛ nɩ, dɩrɛ nyuure nɩ.ʼ
42012020	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn yelʼã a daba ʋlↄ: ʻFʋ ɩ na dãbol! A dɩnaa tɩsↄw na, ba na de na a fʋ baafʋ ɩ̃ a ana yele fʋ na gbɛɛrɩ̃ bin, ala na sↄ?ʼ ”
42012021	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju yel ba: “A lɛ a mɩ wↄ̃ nɩ a ʋlↄ na wobo a yel-yaw bine a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɩnɛ ɩ̃ ma ɩ naaba a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw wa.”
42012022	A ala ɩ̃ baar, a Jeeju yelʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe: “Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, nyɩ taa waala a nyɩ baafʋ ɩnɛ yele nɩ a bõ nyɩ na dɩrɛ, mɩɩ waala nɩ a nyɩ ɩ̃gan ɩnɛ a bõ nyɩ na nyɛ su wa.
42012023	Má a baafʋ gãw na a bõ-dɩraa ɩ̃ má a ɩ̃gan mɩ gãw na a cẽcen.
42012024	Nyɩ́ Ꞌwuor nyɛ a gbagbar: ba maa bʋr wa, ba maa ŋma wa, baa mɩ tɛrɛ gar mɩɩ boor ma bin ci wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ guolo ba. Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, má nyɩ sa na a lili.
42012025	A nyɩ waalɩ̃fʋ pʋↄ, ala a nyɩ pʋↄ na tʋↄ tↄ a ʋ baafʋ bibie dↄↄl fɩ̃ɩ?
42012026	A ala ɩ nyaa tʋↄrↄ maala a ala na ɩ a fɩ̃ɩ wa, bõ ɩ a nyɩ waala a ala ɩnɛ na cɛ?
42012027	Nyɩ́ Ꞌwuor a tɩ-pube: ba maa tʋ̃ tʋn wa, ba maa wob cẽcen su wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a Salʋmↄ̃ mɩ̃ɛ nɩ a ʋ na-yele a jaa ma dãa su cẽcen ʋ vɩlaa ta a tɩ-pube asɩmɛ bõ-ƴen wa.
42012028	A ala ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ma ƴaarɩ̃ na a tɩ-pube ala a lɛ, na be a mↄↄ pʋↄ a dɩnaa ɩ̃ a ba lↄbↄ ƴↄnↄ a vũu pʋↄ a bio, ʋ kↄ̃ tʋↄ maal nyɩ a gãw a lɛ wa mɩɩ? A nyɩ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa pabʼã a Naaŋmɩn jie.
42012029	Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, nyɩ taa bʋↄrↄ a ala nyɩ na dɩrɛɛ wa, mɩɩ a ala nyɩ na nyuure wa, ɩ̃ nyɩ taa ɩ a pʋlɩ̃nyɛ vʋ̃ↄnↄ nyɩ a ala ɩnɛ wa.
42012030	A-na-ɩ a bala na ma bↄ̃w a Naaŋmɩn wa ɩ̃ ma bʋↄrↄ a yele ala a jaa, ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, a nyɩ Sãa bↄ̃w ka nyɩ bʋↄrↄ na a ana yele.
42012031	Nyɩ́ ɛ̃ɛ bʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn fãw ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ na kʋ nyɩ na a yele ala dↄↄl.
42012032	“Ɩ̃ piir, nyaa jɛ̃ bom wa, ɩ̃ nyɩ taa jↄrↄ dãbɩ̃ɛ wa, a-na-ɩ a nyɩ Sãa, a nʋmↄ ʋ na ʋ de nyɩ ƴↄ̃w a ʋ fãw pʋↄ.
42012033	Nyɩ́ da a nyɩ yele de a libie po a nãw deme; nyɩ́ bʋↄrↄ a libie wʋʋr ala na ma sãwna wa, ɩ̃ kaala a na-yele na ma be baarfʋ jie wa bine a saa juu, a-na-ɩ a nyanyuur ma pɩɛlɛ be wa, ɩ̃ a kpolo ma be be mↄↄrↄ wa.
42012034	Nyɩ́ bↄ̃wnaa, a jie a nyɩ na-yele na be, be a nyɩ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ na mɩ be.
42012035	“Nyɩ́ gbɛɛrɩ̃ a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w a nyɩ lãpar,
42012036	ɩ̃ wↄ̃ taa nɩ a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ na gure a ba nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, a daar ʋlↄ ʋ na yire a kul-taa fɛtɩ jie waara, a mɩnɛ a ʋlↄ wa wa ta ŋmeere a pan, ba yuo ʋ a jie naan.
42012037	Á nʋmↄ a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ bala a ba nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na waara nyɛrɛ a ba jɩnɛɛ nɩ a mimir. Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, ʋ na gbɛɛrɩ̃ na a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w ba a ba jɛ a dɩb par ɩ̃ ʋ taw ta po ba a dɩb.
42012038	A ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a tɩsↄw porɩ̃, mɩɩ a nↄdɛɛ kuon daar ʋ wa nyɛ a lɛ, a na nʋmↄ na a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ bala.
42012039	Nyɩ́ bↄ̃wnaa, a ala ɩ a yir sʋbↄ dãa na bↄ̃w a lɛɛr-buor a nyanyuur na waara, ʋ kↄ̃ bar ʋ ʋ wa kpɛ a yir pʋↄ wa.
42012040	A nyɩmɩ mɩ, nyɩ́ gbɛɛrɩ̃ gu, a-na-ɩ a Nɩbɛ Bie na wa na a daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ nyɩ na ma tɩɛrʼɩ̃ ʋ wa.”
42012041	A Pɩɛr soor a Jeeju: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, sɩmɩ tɛw fʋ lↄb a sʋkpa na kʋ mɩɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa fʋ mɩ yele?”
42012042	A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel: “Tʋ̃tʋ̃-buor ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩ-dẽdẽ na tɛrɛ a yɛ̃? Ʋ ɩ na a ʋlↄ a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na ƴↄ̃w a ʋ Ꞌwuoro a ʋ yir deme kʋrↄ ba a dɩb a daar ʋlↄ na sɛw.
42012043	Nʋ̃ↄ na be na a ʋna tʋ̃tʋnↄ jie a mɩnɛ a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na lɩɛbɛ waara nyɛrɛ ʋ ʋ maala a lɛ.
42012044	Sɩrɛ jaa ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na kʋ ʋ na a ʋ yele a jaa ʋ Ꞌwuoro.
42012045	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a tʋ̃tʋnↄ ʋlↄ yelʼã a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ á ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ma waara fↄw wa, ɩ̃ nyↄw ɩ̃ pↄbↄ a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ nɩ a tʋ̃tʋ̃-pooli, na ʋ dɩrɛ nyuure nɩ, a dãa kʋrↄ ʋ,
42012046	a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na wa na a bibir ʋlↄ ʋ na ma tɩɛrʼɩ̃ wa nɩ a daar ʋlↄ ʋ na ma bↄ̃w wa, ɩ̃ ʋ na ŋma ʋ na ayi lↄb ʋ ƴↄ̃w a bala pʋↄ na ma tɛrɛ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa wa.
42012047	“A tʋ̃tʋnↄ ʋlↄ na bↄ̃w a ala a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ ma gbɛɛrɩ̃ a yele ɩ̃ maal tu nɩ a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ wa, ba na nar ʋ na yayaw.
42012048	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na ma bↄ̃w buon wa ɩ̃ maal a ala na sɛw a ba na pↄb ʋ, ba na nar ʋ na fɩ̃ɩ tɛw. A ʋlↄ ba na kʋ a yayaw ba na soor ʋ na yaw mɩ, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ nuumɩ ba na ƴↄ̃w a yayaw, ba na soorʼã a gãw a lɛ.
42012049	“Vũu ɩ̃ wa nɩ lↄb ƴↄ̃w a tẽw pʋↄ, ɩ̃ na ɩ̃ tɩɩ bʋↄrↄ ʋ gↄr Ꞌle.
42012050	Ɩ̃ sɛw na ɩ̃ kpɛ a won pʋↄ a wↄ̃ taa nɩ kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ ba mʋrↄ ma, ɩ̃ a tɩɩ na kpɛmɛ kʋ ma wa tara nɩ a mɩnɛ a na maala baara.
42012051	Nyɩ tɩɛrʼã beeka pɩɛnfʋ ɩ̃ wa nɩ ƴↄnↄ a tẽw pʋↄ mɩɩ? Kpee! Ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, wɛ-taa ɩ̃ ɛ̃ɛ wa nɩ.
42012052	Wa nyↄw nɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, a nɩbɛ anuu na be a yir bõ-ƴen, na wɛrɛ na taa; ata na jɛbɛ nɩ na ayi, ɩ̃ ayi mɩ jɛbɛ nɩ ata.
42012053	A sãa na jɛbɛ nɩ na a ʋ bi-daba ɩ̃ a bi-daba mɩ jɛbɛ nɩ a ʋ sãa; a mã na jɛbɛ nɩ na a ʋ bi-pↄw ɩ̃ a bi-pↄw mɩ jɛbɛ nɩ a ʋ mã; a dɩ̃ɛ-mã na jɛbɛ nɩ na a ʋ bi-daba pↄw, ɩ̃ a bi-daba pↄw mɩ jɛbɛ nɩ a ʋ dɩ̃ɛ-mã.”
42012054	A Jeeju mɩ dãa na yele a nɩbɛ: “A nyɩmɩ wa nyɛ a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃-salaa a mↄtↄ̃w mʋrfʋ loor, nyɩ ma yelʼã a jie naan áa saa na wa na, ɩ̃ a lɛ a ma sɩrɩ̃ maal.
42012055	Ɩ̃ a sɛsɛb ɩ̃ wa yi a tẽw parɩ̃ ɩ̃ tɛbɛ, nyɩ ma yelʼã a susuur na kú na, ɩ̃ a lɛ a ma sɩrɩ̃ maal.
42012056	Nyɩna poe ayi deme naa! Nyɩ ma tʋↄ na bↄ̃w a mɩnɛ a yele na be a tẽw pʋↄ nɩ a saꞋlon, ɩ̃ mɩnɛ a ɩ a nyɩ maa lɛ ɛ̃ɛ bↄ̃w a mɩnɛ a daar na na be a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ wa?
42012057	“Mɩnɛ a ɩ a nyɩ maa tɩɛr nyɛ a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a ala na tor sɛw a nyɩ na maal wa?
42012058	A ala ɩ a fʋ san-sʋbↄ bʋↄl fʋ na cere nɩ a ƴɛr-guoro jie, dɩ tuo a nyɩ guor a ƴɛrɩ̃ be a sↄr juu a baar. A ala ma ɩ lɛ ʋ wa, ʋ na fɛr fʋ na ta nɩ a ƴɛr-guoro nii-sↄw, a ƴɛr-guoro de fʋ kʋ a kasu-gure, ɩ̃ a kasu-gure de fʋ pↄw a kasu pʋↄ.
42012059	Ɩ̃ yele fʋ na, faa be na yi a be, ɩ̃ ma ɩ fʋ ya na a fʋ san a jaa baar wa.”
42013001	A daar ʋlↄ naan, a nɩbɛ wa na mana kʋrↄ a Jeeju a mɩnɛ a jamana Pɩlatɩ na ɩ a ba kú a Galile nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ a daar ʋlↄ ba na be a baar lofʋ jie.
42013002	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ tɩɛrʼã beeka a ba kú ba na a lɛ a-na-ɩ ba nyɩrɩ̃ na maal a fãa gãw a Galile nɩbɛ ba jaa mɩɩ?
42013003	Aa ɩ lɛ ʋ wa! Ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩmɩ mɩ, a ala ɩ nyaa lɩɛb a nyɩ yɛ̃ wa, lɛ nyɩ na mɩ kpi nyɩ jaa.
42013004	Mɩɩ a nɩbɛ pie-nʼanuu-nʼata bala a yir woor na kar lo kú a be a Silowe, nyɩ tɩɛrʼã beeka a bala ɩ̃ nyɩrɩ̃ bɩɛ gãw a Jerujalɛm tẽ-deme ba jaa mɩɩ?
42013005	Aa ɩ lɛ ʋ wa! Ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩmɩ mɩ, a ala ɩ nyaa lɩɛb a nyɩ yɛ̃ wa, lɛ nyɩ na mɩ kpi nyɩ jaa.”
42013006	A Jeeju mɩ lↄbʼã a sʋkpa na kʋ ba: “Daba kãw dãa na tɛrɛ fɩgɩ tɩɛ a ʋ puo pʋↄ. Bibir kãw, ʋ cenʼã a ʋ Ꞌwↄ̃w a wↄmↄ, ɩ̃ na ʋ bↄ faa.
42013007	A lɛ a be, ʋ yel a ʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃-bie: ʻGɛlɛ! Yomo ata nɩ a dɩnaa ɩ̃ na ma wa a tɩɛ na wↄmↄ Ꞌwↄ̃wfʋ ɩ̃ ma bↄ faa. Bõ ɩnɛ ʋ na piw a wɩɛr a lɛ a pↄrↄ? Ŋmaa ʋ lↄb bar!ʼ
42013008	A tʋ̃tʋ̃-bie yel ʋ: ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, bar ʋ a yuon na go. Ɩ̃ na kↄ na viirĩ kolĩ ʋ ɩ̃ na ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w a pʋↄrʋ̃.
42013009	A nʋmↄ wa sↄw, a ka nɩ a yuon na na waara, ʋ na wↄnↄ. A ala ma ɩ lɛ ʋ wa, fú ɩ a ba ŋmaa ʋ lↄb bar.ʼ ”
42013010	A bibi-ciiraa dayen, a Jeeju jaana na a nɩbɛ a puorfʋ yir kãw pʋↄ.
42013011	A be, ʋ nyɛ na pↄw a kↄ̃tↄn na ka, ʋ ɩ wʋlɩ̃ maalʼɩ̃ yomo pie-nʼanuu-nʼata ɩ̃ maa mɩ tʋↄ dↄl fɩ̃ɩ wa.
42013012	A Jeeju nyɛ ʋ na ɩ̃ bʋↄl ʋ ʋ wa, ʋ yel ʋ: “Pↄw wee, a fʋ wʋlɩ̃ baar fʋ na!”
42013013	Ɩ̃ na ʋ dↄↄl ʋ a nur, a pↄw dↄl a jie naan, ɩ̃ nyↄw ɩ̃ pɛwrɛ a Naaŋmɩn.
42013014	Ɩ̃-cɛ suur nyↄw na a puorfʋ yir nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na kpaar a pↄw a bibi-ciiraa dayen, ʋ yel a nɩbɛ: “Bibie ayʋↄb nyɩ sɛw nyɩ tʋ̃ a tʋn. Nyɩ́ ma wa a bibie ala pʋↄ a ba kpaar a nyɩ wʋlɩ̃sɩ. Nyɩ taa ma waara a bibi-ciiraa dayen wa!”
42013015	A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ʋ: “Nyɩna poe ayi deme naa! A nyɩ jaa bõ-ƴene-ƴene maa yuo a nyɩ nii mɩɩ a nyɩ bʋn a bibi-ciiraa dayen cenʼɩ̃ a ba nyu kʋ̃ↄ wa mɩɩ?
42013016	Nyɩ́ nyɛ a pↄw na. Ʋ ɩ na a Abʋraham yãw a Satã na hʋↄl a yomo pie-nʼanuu-nʼata. Aa dãa sɛw ɩ̃ na faa ʋ a ʋna hʋʋr naan ɩnɛ a bibi-ciiraa dayen wa mɩɩ?”
42013017	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na ƴɛrɛ a lɛ, vĩ nyↄw na a ʋ sama-deme, ɩ̃ a nɩbɛ ba jaa cɩlɛ a tʋ̃-vɛlɛ ala a jaa ʋ na maala ɩnɛ.
42013018	A Jeeju lɛ yel ba na go: “Bõ a Naaŋmɩn fãw wↄ̃ taa nɩ? Bõ ɩ̃ na de manʼɩ̃ ʋ?
42013019	Ʋ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a muta-tɩɛ bir kaarɩ̃ a daba na de bʋr a ʋ nakʋↄ pʋↄ, ʋ bul nʋ̃ↄ ɩ tɩɛ, a lili cen na ƴↄ̃w a ba cor a ʋ wulbie juu.”
42013020	Ʋ lɛ yelʼã: “Bõ ɩ̃ na de manʼɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn fãw?
42013021	Ʋ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a tabɩr a pↄw na de ƴↄ̃w a buru jↄ̃ yaw pʋↄ ʋ maal a jↄ̃ a jaa a vʋ̃ ir.”
42013022	A Jeeju cere na a Jerujalɛm na ʋ cʋbↄ a tẽ-bɛrɛ nɩ a tẽ-bil jaana a nɩbɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃,
42013023	a nɩrɛ kãw soor ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, a nɩbɛ bala na pↄwrↄ a Naaŋmɩn faafʋ, fɩ̃ɩ tɛw ba ɩ mɩɩ?” Á Jeeju yel ba:
42013024	“Nyɩ́ dɩ tuo kpɛ nɩ a dↄ̃dↄr nↄ-bile pʋↄ. Maa ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, nɩ-yaw na bʋↄrↄ na ba kpɛ ɩ̃ ba kↄ̃ tʋↄ wa.
42013025	“A daar ɩ̃ wa ta a yir sʋbↄ ir nyↄw a pan kpal, nyɩ na ɩraa na a be a yẽw ɩ̃ ŋmeere a pan yele nɩ: ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, yuo sɩ a pan bɩlɛ.ʼ Ɩ̃ ʋ na yel nyɩ na: ʻMaa bↄ̃w a jie nyɩ na yi wa!ʼ
42013026	A be nyɩ na nyↄw ɩ̃ yele: ʻMá a sɩmɩ ɩ̃ lãa dɩ taa a dɩb, lãa nyu nɩ, ɩ̃ a fʋ man a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ a sɩ tẽw.ʼ
42013027	Ʋ na lɛ yel nyɩ na: ʻMaa bↄ̃w a nyɩ yifʋ jie wa. Nyɩ́ taw yi ɩ̃ cɛ ma, a nyɩmɩ nyɩ jaa na maala a fãa!ʼ
42013028	A be, a na ɩ nyɩ na kõ-yel-bie nɩ nyɩmɛ nyɩrfʋ, a lɛ nyɩ na nyɛrɛ a Abʋraham nɩ a Ɩjakɩ nɩ a Jakↄb nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe ba jaa a Naaŋmɩn tẽw, ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ ʋlↄ, a ɩ ba lↄb nyɩ na bar a yẽw.
42013029	A nɩbɛ na mɩ yi na a mↄtↄ̃w purfʋ jie nɩ a mↄtↄ̃w mʋrfʋ jie nɩ a tẽw lõbobo a jaa ɩ̃ wa jɛ dɩrɛ a dɩb a be a Naaŋmɩn tẽw.
42013030	Nyɩ́ cɛlɛ: a par-pↄↄrbↄ ŋmɛɛ na lɩɛbʼã ɩ a ni-dierbe ɩ̃ a ni-dierbe ŋmɛɛ lɩɛb ɩ a par-pↄↄrbↄ.”
42013031	A ala na yi tↄ, a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ wa na yel a Jeeju: “Ir yi cen ji-kpee, a-na-ɩ a jamana Ɛrↄdɩ bʋↄrↄ na ʋ kú fʋ.”
42013032	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ cen na yel a ʋna sɩ̃sↄl naan, áa dɩnaa nɩ a bio, á ɩ̃ na diw na a kↄ̃tↄn-bebe bar, ɩ̃ kpaar a nɩbɛ wʋlɩ̃sɩ, ɩ̃ a bibie ata dayen á ɩ̃ tʋn na baarʼã.
42013033	Ɩ̃-cɛ a dɩnaa nɩ a bio nɩ a dayere, a sɛw na ɩ̃ cere nɩ a ɩ̃ sↄr, a-na-ɩ aa sɛw a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere na kpi ji-kpee, ɩ̃ ma ɩ a Jerujalɛm-tẽw pʋↄ ʋ wa.
42013034	“A nyɩmɩ Jerujalɛm tẽ-deme na ma kú a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe ɩ̃ ma lↄb a bala ʋ na tʋ̃ a nyɩ sↄ̃w nɩ a kubie, gbɛɛ amɩnɛ ɩ̃ dãa bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ kpaarɩ̃ nyɩ ƴↄ̃w a ɩ̃ pulẽe, a mɩnɛ a nʋ̃ↄ na ma kpaarɩ̃ a ʋ bil ƴↄ̃w a ʋ pɩrɛ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a nyaa sↄw wa.
42013035	Nyɩ́ cɛlɛ! A nyɩ yir na lɩɛbʼã ɩ da-kpolo. Ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, nyɩ kↄ̃ lɛ su ma mimir wa tara nɩ a daar ʋlↄ nyɩ na yele áa nʋmↄ a ʋlↄ na waara nɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yuor wa!”
42014001	Bibi-ciiraa dayen, a Jeeju kpɛ na a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ kãw yir dɩb dɩfʋ jie, a ba jʋʋrↄ ʋ.
42014002	A be, daba kãw wʋlɩ̃-mↄraa na nyↄw ɩraa na a ʋ nii-sↄw,
42014003	a Jeeju soor a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ: “Sↄr be na be a nɩrɛ na kpɛmɛ a wʋlɩ̃ sʋbↄ a bibi-ciiraa dayen mɩɩ, sↄr ma be be wa?”
42014004	Ɩ̃-cɛ baa haa ʋ nʋↄr wa. A lɛ, a Jeeju nyↄw a wʋlɩ̃ sʋbↄ kpaar a ʋ wʋlɩ̃, ɩ̃ ɩ ʋ yi cere.
42014005	Ɩ̃ ʋ yel ba: “A ala ɩ nɩrɛ a nyɩ sↄ̃w tɛrɛ na bi-daba mɩɩ naab ʋ lo a bule pʋↄ a bibi-ciiraa dayen, ʋ na bar ʋ na a be mɩɩ? Má ʋ na ir ʋ na fↄfↄw.”
42014006	A baa tʋↄ haa nʋↄr ƴɛr ƴɛrɩ̃ wa.
42014007	A Jeeju nyɛ na a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ bala ba na bʋↄl a dɩb ɩnɛ na tuure a nii-sↄw jaajiir ɩ̃ lↄb a sʋkpa na kʋ ba jaa:
42014008	“A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ bʋↄl fʋ na a kul-taa fɛtɩ jie, taa de nĩe cen na jɛ a nii-sↄw jaajie wa. Nɩrɛ kãw na gãw fʋ ba na mɩ bʋↄl na tʋↄ na ta,
42014009	ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na bʋↄl nyɩ wa wa yel fʋ á fʋ ir ɩ̃ cɛ a jaajie kʋ ʋ, a lɛ, vĩ na kpɛ fʋ na, a mɩnɛ fʋ na ire eere a jaaji-baaraa pʋↄ.
42014010	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ ba bʋↄl fʋ na, ɛ̃ɛ cen na jɛ a jaaji-baaraa pʋↄ. A lɛ a ʋlↄ na bʋↄl fʋ nↄↄ kpɛɛrɛ ʋ na yel fʋ na: ʻƖ̃ baraa wee! Ir do ka iin a nii-sↄw jaajie pʋↄ.ʼ Be a fʋ yuor na tɩmɛ a nɩbɛ ba jaa nii-sↄw fʋ na jɛ dɩrɛ nɩ a dɩb.
42014011	A-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ na bʋↄrↄ ʋ bɛrmɛ a juu, a Naaŋmɩn na wur ʋ na suu nɩ, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na sↄw wur a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ, a Naaŋmɩn na jɛw ʋ na irʼɩ̃.”
42014012	A ala ɩ̃ baar a Jeeju yelʼã a ʋlↄ na bʋↄl ʋ a fɛtɩ ɩnɛ: “A ala ɩ fʋ bʋↄlↄ na nɩbɛ a dɩb ɩnɛ, taa bʋↄlↄ a fʋ badɛɛ, mɩɩ a fʋ yɛɛr, mɩɩ a fʋ bal nɩbɛ, mɩɩ a fʋ tↄ deme na ɩ a naabsɩ wa, a-na-ɩ ba na mɩ tʋↄ na maal fʋ a ala fʋ na maal ba, na ba ya fʋ.
42014013	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ fʋ bʋↄlↄ na a nɩbɛ a fɛtɩ ɩnɛ, bʋↄl a nãw deme, nɩ a nɩ-kↄↄr, nɩ a gbɛɛ, nɩ a jↄn.
42014014	A lɛ, nʋ̃ↄ na be na a fʋ jie a-na-ɩ baa tʋↄrↄ yara fʋ wa, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ na ya fʋ a daar ʋlↄ a nɩ-torisɩ na ire a kũu pʋↄ.”
42014015	A bala na lãa be nɩ a Jeeju a dɩb dɩfʋ jie, bõ-ƴen wõ na a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ yel a Jeeju: “A nʋmↄ a ʋlↄ nↄↄ dɩrɛ a dɩb a Naaŋmɩn tẽw!”
42014016	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Daba kãw maalʼã fɛtɩ dɩb ɩ̃ bʋↄl nɩ-yayaw.
42014017	A lɛ a dɩb dɩfʋ daar na ta, ʋ tʋ̃ na a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnↄ ʋ cen na yel a bala ʋ na bʋↄl a fɛtɩ jie, á ba wa a-na-ɩ ba gbɛɛrɩ̃ na a yele a jaa baar.
42014018	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ba jaa bõ-ƴene-ƴene nyↄw na a yele ɩ̃ sↄrↄ. A dãdãw sʋbↄ yelʼã a tʋ̃tʋnↄ: ʻƖ̃ da na po-paalaa a sɛw ɩ̃ cen na Ꞌwuor kãa. Gaafɩra, maa tʋↄrↄ wɩɛrɛ wa.ʼ
42014019	A kãw yel ʋ: ʻƖ̃ da na nadɛɛ pie ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ tʋ̃ nɩ ba tʋn Ꞌwuor je kãa. Gaafɩra, maa tʋↄrↄ wɩɛrɛ wa.ʼ
42014020	A bõ-ƴen lɛ yel ʋ: ʻƖ̃ de na pↄw paalʋ̃ʋ na. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ maa tʋↄrↄ wɩɛrɛ be wa.ʼ
42014021	Á tʋ̃tʋnↄ lɩɛb kul a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sɛ̃ na man ʋ a lɛ, a suur nyↄw a yir sʋbↄ ʋ yel a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnↄ: ʻLɩɛb cen fↄfↄw a daa pʋↄ nɩ a sↄɛ pʋↄ bↄ a nãw deme, nɩ a nɩ-kↄↄr, nɩ a jↄn, nɩ a gbɛɛ wa nɩ a ka.ʼ
42014022	A ɩ na fɩ̃ɩ a tʋ̃tʋnↄ lɩɛb wa yel: ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ maalʼã a mɩnɛ fʋ na yel ɩ̃-cɛ jaajiir cãa na cɛ.ʼ
42014023	A be jie, a nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ʋ: ʻLɩɛb cen a sↄr-bil pʋↄ nɩ a sɛɛr pʋↄ na fʋ fɛr a nɩbɛ a ba wa kpɛ, a ɩ̃ yir na sɛw.
42014024	Ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a bala ɩ̃ na dãa bʋↄl, nɩrɛ kãw a ba sↄ̃w ma be na Ꞌlɛm a ɩ̃ dɩb wa.ʼ ”
42014025	A nɩ-yaw dãa na tuure a Jeeju ʋ lɩɛb yel ba:
42014026	“A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ waara na a ɩ̃ sɛ̃ ɩ̃ ma Ꞌlaar a ʋ sãa, mɩɩ a ʋ mã, mɩɩ a ʋ pↄw, mɩɩ a ʋ bibiir, mɩɩ a ʋ yɛɛr, mɩɩ a ʋ yɛ-pↄↄbↄ, nɩ a ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ jaa wa, Ꞌwaa tʋↄrↄ ɩrɛ a ɩ̃ par-tuure wa.
42014027	A ʋlↄ na ma de a ʋ nɩ-kʋ-daa tuo tuure nɩ ma wa, Ꞌwaa tʋↄrↄ ɩrɛ a ɩ̃ par-tuure wa.
42014028	A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ a nyɩ sↄ̃w bʋↄrↄ na ʋ mɛ yir woor, má ʋ na jɛ na sɛr ɩ̃ sↄr a yele je kãa a ala ɩ a libie ala ʋ na tɛrɛ na ta na a yir tʋmↄ a jaa.
42014029	A ala ma ɩ lɛ ʋ wa, ʋ kpar a yir baar ɩ̃ ma lɛ tʋↄrↄ a yir mɩɛrɛ baara wa, a bala ba jaa na nyɛrɛ a lɛ, ba na laara ʋ na yele nɩ:
42014030	ʻA daba na mɛ na a ʋ yir ta nɩ sↄ̃w ɩ̃ ma tʋↄ baar wa.ʼ
42014031	Mɩɩ a ala ɩ a jamana kãw bʋↄrↄ na ʋ cen na jɛbʼɩ̃ a ʋ jaman-tↄ sʋbↄ kãw, má ʋ na jɛ na pɛ je kãa a ala ɩ ʋ na tʋↄ na de dabsɩ ture pie tuoro nɩ a ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ dabsɩ ture lɩjɛr waara nɩ a ʋ jie.
42014032	A ala ɩ Ꞌwaa tʋↄrↄ wa, a lɛ a jamana ʋlↄ na cãa be a nɩdaa waara, ʋ na tʋ̃ na nɩbɛ a ʋ jie a ba ɓaalɩ̃ ʋ.
42014033	A lɛ ʋ mɩ, nɩrɛ ma be a nyɩ sↄ̃w na tʋↄrↄ ɩrɛ a ɩ̃ par-tuure ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ ʋ jaarʼã a ʋ yele a jaa ʋ na sↄ bar wa.
42014034	“A nasõ ɩ na bõ-son ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ a ʋ nʋ̃ↄ yi na, mɩnɛ ba na ɩ ɩ̃ maal ʋ ʋ lɛ nʋmↄ?
42014035	Aa tʋↄrↄ saala a tene nãw wa, aa mɩ tʋↄrↄ ɩrɛ pʋↄrʋ̃ wa. Yẽw ba ma lↄb ʋ bar. A ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ tobo cɛlɛ nɩ, ú wonaa!”
42015001	A lãpo-dierbe nɩ a nɩ-faar ba jaa taw na pɩɛl a Jeeju cɛlɛ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃,
42015002	a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ hũhune ɩ̃ yele: “A daba na sↄw na de a nɩ-faar a ba lãa dɩrɛ a dɩb.”
42015003	A Jeeju lↄb a sʋkpa na kʋ ba:
42015004	“A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ a nyɩ sↄ̃w tɛrɛ na piir kʋbaa, ɩ̃ a bõ-ƴen wa bↄr, ʋ kↄ̃ bar a kʋbaa for bir bala na cɛ be a dↄ-cɩɩn-bãa ɩ̃ yↄ bↄ a ʋlↄ na bↄr, wa ta nɩ a lɛ ʋ na nyɛrɛ ʋ wa mɩɩ?
42015005	A lɛ ʋ na wa nyɛ ʋ, nʋ̃ↄ nyↄw ʋ na ʋ ɓↄw ʋ dↄↄl bↄ̃w juu
42015006	kulʼɩ̃ ɩ̃ bʋↄl a ʋ badɛɛ nɩ a ʋ tↄ deme tiw ɩ̃ yel ba: ʻNyɩ́ ɩ a nʋmↄ nyɩ a ɩ̃ kaarɩ̃, a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ nyɛ na a ɩ̃ pɛr ʋlↄ na dãa bↄr.ʼ ”
42015007	A Jeeju yel ba na: “Lɛ a nʋↄ kpɛ̃ɛ na mɩ be a Naaŋmɩn tẽw a maal-fãa sʋbↄ bõ-ƴen ɩnɛ na lɩɛb a ʋ yɛ̃, gãw a nɩ-torisɩ kʋbaa for bir na ma lɛ sɛw a yɛ̃ lɩɛbfʋ wa.
42015008	“Mɩɩ a ala ɩ a pↄw tɛrɛ na libi-kure pie ɩ̃ a bõ-ƴen wa bↄr, ʋ kↄ̃ ƴↄ̃w lãpa ɩ̃ de a saar pɩɩrʼɩ̃ a dir ɩ̃ bↄ̃w bↄ ʋ wa nyɛ ʋ wa?
42015009	A lɛ ʋ na nyɛ ʋ, ʋ ma bʋↄlʼã a ʋ badɛɛ nɩ a ʋ tↄ deme tiw ɩ̃ yel ba: ʻNyɩ́ ɩ a nʋmↄ nyɩ a ɩ̃ kaarɩ̃, a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ nyɛ na a ɩ̃ libi-kur ʋlↄ na dãa bↄ̃r.ʼ ”
42015010	A Jeeju lɛ yel ba na: “A lɛ ʋ, nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ jie a maal-fãa sʋbↄ bõ-ƴen ɩnɛ na lɩɛb a ʋ yɛ̃.”
42015011	A Jeeju lɛ yelʼã go: “Daba kãw dãa na tɛrɛ bi-dabsɩ ayi,
42015012	a bidab-bile yel a sãa: ʻƖ̃ sãa wee! Kʋ ma a fʋ yele ala na ɩrɛ a ɩ̃ ben,ʼ a ʋ sãa de a ʋ yele po ba ba jaa ayi.
42015013	A ɩ na fɩ̃ɩ, a bidab-bile woor a ʋ yele a jaa yi cenʼɩ̃ nɩdaa tẽ-kpee pʋↄ, na ʋ bũburĩ bar a burbur maalfʋ pʋↄ.
42015014	A lɛdaar ʋ na sãw a ʋ yele a jaa baar, kↄ̃ tuo lo na a ʋna tẽw pʋↄ ɩ̃ a nãw nyↄw ɩ̃ kpɛɛrɛ ʋ.
42015015	Ʋ cenʼã a ʋna tẽw naa nɩrɛ kãw jie, na ɩ ʋ tʋ̃tʋnↄ, ʋ de ʋ ƴↄ̃w a ʋ puo pʋↄ ʋ cɩɩnɛ dor.
42015016	Ʋ ma bʋↄrↄ na ʋ mɩ Ꞌwↄb a jↄ̃-pↄbↄ ala a dor na Ꞌwↄbↄ ɩ̃-cɛ nɩrɛ maa dãa kʋ ʋ wa.
42015017	A be jie, ʋ pɛ na a ʋ suur pʋↄ ɩ̃ yel: ʻA ɩ̃ sãa tʋ̃tʋnbↄ ba jaa tɛrɛ na bõ-dɩraa a ƴↄ ba, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ be ka kpiire nɩ kↄ̃.
42015018	Ɩ̃ na irʼã lɩɛb kul a ɩ̃ sãa sɛ̃, na ɩ̃ yel ʋ: Ɩ̃ sãa, ɩ̃ maalʼã fãa a Naaŋmɩn jie nɩ a fʋ jie.
42015019	Maa lɛ sɛw a fʋ na bʋↄl ma a fʋ bi-daba wa. De ma ɩ̃ wↄ̃ taa nɩ a fʋ tʋ̃tʋnↄ ƴen sʋbↄ,ʼ
42015020	ɩ̃ na ʋ ir lɩɛb kule a ʋ sãa sɛ̃. “A lɛ ʋ na cãa be a nɩdaa waara, a ʋ sãa gbã na nyɛ ʋ a nãw nyↄw ʋ, ʋ jↄ tuor worĩ ʋ.
42015021	A bi-daba yel ʋ: ʻƖ̃ sãa, ɩ̃ maalʼã fãa a Naaŋmɩn jie nɩ a fʋ jie. Maa lɛ sɛw a fʋ na bʋↄl ma a fʋ bi-daba wa.ʼ
42015022	Ɩ̃-cɛ a sãa yelʼã a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ: ʻNyɩ́ cen fↄfↄw na de a fu ʋlↄ na nyɩrɩ̃ vɩɛlɛ wa nɩ su ʋ. Nyɩ́ mɩ de a nubi-suuraa su ʋ, ɩ̃ su ʋ a nafaba.
42015023	Nyɩ́ nyↄw a nale Ꞌwↄr wa nɩ kú a sɩ Ꞌwↄbↄ cɩlɛ nɩ,
42015024	a-na-ɩ a ɩ̃ bie na, ʋ dãa na kpi, ɩ̃ ʋ lɩɛbʼã ɩ nɩ-mimir. Ʋ dãa na bↄr, ɩ̃ sɩ lɛ nyɛ ʋ na,ʼ ɩ̃ na ba nyↄw ɩ̃ cɩlɛ.
42015025	“A bidab-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ dãa na be a puo pʋↄ. A lɛ ʋ na lɩɛb wa pɩɛlɛ a yir, ʋ wõ na a bɩnɛ ba na sɛbɛ hele nɩ,
42015026	ɩ̃ bʋↄl a tʋ̃tʋnↄ ƴen sʋbↄ soor a ala na be be,
42015027	ʋ yel ʋ: ʻA fʋ yɛ-bile lɩɛbʼã wa, a fʋ sãa ɩ a ba kú a nale Ꞌwↄr, a-na-ɩ ʋ lɛ nyɛ na a ʋ bie nɩ ɩ̃gan kpɛ̃w.ʼ
42015028	A bidab-kpɛ̃ɛ nyɛ suur ɩ̃ jaar a yir pʋↄ kpɛfʋ, a ʋ sãa yire á ʋ ɓaalɩ̃ ʋ ʋ wa kpɛ.
42015029	Ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ yelʼã a sãa: ʻNyɛ, a yomo waa na ɩ̃ na tʋnↄ fʋ a tʋn ɩ̃ maa dãa wõw toor a fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ kãw pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ faa mɩ kʋ ma bʋle gbɛ-bõ-ƴen sɛr ɩ̃ ɓolĩ a ɩ̃ badɛɛ wa.
42015030	Ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ bie na na sãw a fʋ yele nɩ a pↄↄ-baar, ɩ̃ lɩɛb wa, a fʋ ɩ a ba kú a nale Ꞌwↄr ƴↄ̃w ʋ!ʼ
42015031	A sãa yel ʋ: ʻƖ̃ bie, fʋ be na ka a ɩ̃ sɛ̃ a daar a jaa. A yele a jaa ɩ̃ na tɛrɛ a mɩ ɩ na a fʋ ben,
42015032	ɩ̃-cɛ a sɛw na a sɩ na ɓolo cɩlɛ nɩ, a-na-ɩ a fʋ yɛbɛ na, ʋ dãa na kpi, ɩ̃ ʋ lɛ lɩɛbʼã ɩ nɩ-mimir. Ʋ dãa na bↄr, ɩ̃ sɩ lɛ nyɛ ʋ na.ʼ ”
42016001	A Jeeju lɛ yelʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe go: “Dab-naaba kãw dãa na tɛrɛ yel-Ꞌwuoro, ɩ̃ a ba wa man kʋ ʋ a mɩnɛ a ʋ yel-Ꞌwuoro ʋlↄ na sãwna ʋ a yele,
42016002	a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ bʋↄl ʋ ʋ wa ʋ soor ʋ: ʻBõ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ nɩ a ala ɩ̃ na wono a fʋ ɩnɛ? Sↄr a yele miilʼɩ̃ ma a mɩnɛ fʋ na tʋ̃ a fʋ tʋn, a-na-ɩ faa lɛ tʋↄrↄ ɩrɛ a ɩ̃ yel-Ꞌwuoro go wa.ʼ
42016003	A yel-Ꞌwuoro lɩɛb yel a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ: ʻMɩnɛ ɩ̃ na ɩ? A-na-ɩ a ɩ̃ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na de na a ʋ yele ɩ̃ cɛ ma. Ɩ̃ kʋↄrↄ mɩɩ? Maa mɩlɩ̃ nɩ a kↄb wa. Ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ dɩrɛ mɩɩ? Vĩ na nyↄw ma na.
42016004	Ɩ̃ pãa na bↄ̃w a ala ɩ̃ na maala a nɩbɛ na sↄw de ma a ba yir, a lɛ a ɩ̃ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nↄↄ bara ma a tʋn pʋↄ.ʼ
42016005	Ɩ̃ ʋ bʋↄlʼã a bala ba jaa na dãa pɛ̃pɛ̃ a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yele, a ba wa bõ-ƴene-ƴene. Ʋ soor a dãdãw sʋbↄ: ʻAmɩnɛ fʋ tɛrɛ a ɩ̃ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ a san?ʼ
42016006	Ʋ yel ʋ: ʻA kãa na sɛw a tasa-bɛrɛ kʋbaa ʋ,ʼ a yel-Ꞌwuoro yel ʋ: ʻDe a fʋ sɛbɛ, jɛ fↄfↄw ɩ̃ sɛb lɩjaayi nɩ pie ƴↄ̃w.ʼ
42016007	Ɩ̃ lɛ soor a kãw: ʻƖ̃ a fʋ̃ʋ, amɩnɛ san fʋ tɛrɛ?ʼ Ʋ yel ʋ: ʻCi bↄtↄr kↄↄr anuu ʋ.ʼ A yel-Ꞌwuoro yel ʋ: ʻDe a fʋ sɛbɛ. Sɛb kↄↄr anaan ƴↄ̃w.ʼ
42016008	A yel-Ꞌwuor-gõgolaa ʋlↄ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ pɛw ʋ na a lɛ ʋ na tɩɛr a nɩdaar a ʋ yele maalfʋ pʋↄ, a-na-ɩ a tẽw na nɩbɛ ma tɛrɛ na yɛ̃ a ba tↄ deme jie gãw a cãa pʋↄ nɩbɛ.
42016009	“Ɩ a maa ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, nyɩ́ de a tẽw na na-yele na ɩ a gõgolĩfʋ bom, na nyɩ ŋma nɩ ba, a mɩnɛ a daar ʋlↄ a na mↄↄ lɛ tʋↄrↄ sũono nyɩ wa, a ba na de nyɩ kpɛ nɩ a daadaa kpɛfʋ jiir pʋↄ.
42016010	A ʋlↄ na ɩ yel-mɩ̃ɛ sʋbↄ a yel-bil pʋↄ, ʋ na mɩ ɩ na yel-mɩ̃ɛ sʋbↄ a yel-bɛrɛ pʋↄ. A ʋlↄ na gõgolo a yel-bil pʋↄ, ʋ na mɩ gõgolo na a yel-bɛrɛ pʋↄ.
42016011	A ala ɩ nyaa dãa ɩ yel-mɩ̃ɛ deme a tẽw na na-yele pʋↄ wa, ala na ƴↄ̃w nyɩ a nyɩ Ꞌwuoro a yel-sono?
42016012	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ nyaa dãa ɩ yel-mɩ̃ɛ deme a nɩrɛ bom pʋↄ wa, ala na kʋ nyɩ a ala na ɩ a nyɩ ben?
42016013	“Tʋ̃tʋnↄ ma be be na tʋↄrↄ tʋnↄ nɩ-bɛrɛ ayi tʋn wa. Ʋ na Ꞌlaarʼã a kãw ɩ̃ nʋ a ƴen sʋbↄ, mɩɩ ʋ na marʼã a kãw ɩ̃ kpɛrɛ a ƴen sʋbↄ. Nyaa tʋↄrↄ puoro a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ mɩ ɩrɛ a na-yele gbãgbaar wa.”
42016014	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ, na dãa nʋ a libie, cɛlɛ na a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala a jaa, ɩ̃ na ba laara a Jeeju.
42016015	A Jeeju yel ba: “A nyɩmɩ, a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw nyɩ ma maalʼã wↄ̃ taa nɩ nyɩ torʼã, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn bↄ̃w na a nyɩ sube. A-na-ɩ a ala a nɩbɛ na Ꞌwuoro a ɩ bõ-kpɛ̃ɛ, a ɩ na bõ-kpana a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw.
42016016	“Wa ta nɩ a Jã-Batii daar, a dãa na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn nɩ a ʋ ƴɛr-hierbe daar. Wa nyↄw nɩ a daar ʋlↄ, ala ba hiere a Naaŋmɩn fãw ƴɛr-son a nɩbɛ ba jaa ƴↄ̃w kpɛ̃w bʋↄrↄ ba kpɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw ʋlↄ pʋↄ.
42016017	Ɩ̃-cɛ a saꞋlon nɩ a tene tↄlfʋ nyɩrɩ̃ na yↄw gãw a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn bõ-bile fɩ̃ɩ sãwfʋ.
42016018	“A daba lɛ na diw a ʋ pↄw bar ɩ̃ lɛ kul pↄw kpee, ʋ maalʼã a fãa, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na kule a pↄw ʋlↄ a ʋ sɩrɛ na diw bar, ʋ mɩ maalʼã a fãa.
42016019	“Dab-naaba dãa na be be na ma dãa suure cẽcẽ-vɛlɛ na kpɛmɛ a dafʋ, ɩ̃ mɩ dɩrɛ a dɛ̃w a bibie a jaa.
42016020	Ɩ̃ nãw sʋbↄ mɩ dãa na be be na dɩ Lajaar, a natɩɛ na pↄw a ʋ ɩ̃gan ʋ jaa ʋ ma gana nɩ a naaba yir dↄ̃dↄr nʋↄr.
42016021	Ʋ ma dãa na bʋↄrↄ ʋ tʋↄ dɩ a dɩb-pʋrↄ ala na loro a naaba dɩb dɩfʋ jie, ɩ̃ aa ɩ a ala tɛw ʋ wa, a baar tↄr jaa ma lɛ wɩ na dɛlɛ a ʋ natɩɛ.
42016022	A nãw sʋbↄ ʋlↄ wa kpi na, a sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ de ʋ cenʼɩ̃ ʋ lãa jɛ nɩ a Abʋraham a Naaŋmɩn ji-vɩlaa, ɩ̃ a naaba wa mɩ kpi na, a ba ũu.
42016023	A be a kpɩɩn tẽw, a mɩnɛ ʋ na be a hʋʋr nyɛfʋ pʋↄ ʋ gbã na nyɛ a Abʋraham a nɩdaa ʋ lãa jɛ nɩ a Lajaar.
42016024	A be ʋ wuur yel: ʻƖ sãa Abʋraham wee, bↄ̃w ma nãw bɩlɛ. Tʋ̃ a Lajaar ʋ cen na ɓɛ kʋ̃ↄ nɩ a ʋ nubir wa ɓãa nɩ ma a dɛlɩ̃bir, a-na-ɩ a wono ma na yayaw a ka a vũu na pʋↄ.ʼ
42016025	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Abʋraham yel ʋ na: ʻƖ̃ bie, tɩɛr bↄ̃w nɩ a mɩnɛ fʋ na dãa pↄw a fʋ nason a lɛ fʋ na dãa cãa be a tẽw juu, ɩ̃ a Lasaar mɩ dãa pↄw a nabebe ɩ̃ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na ʋ be na a ka na ʋ bar tɩɛrʋ̃, ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ be a won pʋↄ.
42016026	Aa ɩ a lɛ tɛw ʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ bↄw kpɛ̃ɛ mɩ be na be ba na ƴↄ̃w ʋ var a sɩmɩ nɩ a nyɩmɩ, a mɩnɛ a ʋlↄ na bʋↄrↄ ʋ yi a ka ɩ̃ wɩ a nyɩ sɛ̃ Ꞌwaa tʋↄrↄ wa, ɩ̃ a nɩrɛ kↄ̃ mɩ tʋↄ yi a nyɩ sɛ̃ ɩ̃ gãw a sɩ jie wa.ʼ
42016027	A be jie, a naaba yel: ʻƖ̃ sãa, a ala ɩ a lɛ ʋ, ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ fʋ na: tʋ̃ a Lajaar a ɩ̃ sãa yir
42016028	a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ tɛrɛ na yɛɛr anuu a be, ʋ cen na kpãkpan ba a mɩnɛ ba kↄ̃ wa mɩ wa a hʋʋr nyɛfʋ jie na wa.ʼ
42016029	A Abʋraham yel ʋ: ʻA fʋ yɛɛr tɛrɛ na a Mowisi nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe. Bá cɛlɛ a ala ba na sɛb!ʼ
42016030	A naaba yel: ʻƖ̃ sãa Abʋraham, aa ɩrɛɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ nɩrɛ yi na a kũu pʋↄ cen a ba jie, ba na lɩɛbʼã a ba yɛ̃.ʼ
42016031	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Abʋraham yel ʋ na: ʻA ala ɩ baa cɛlɛ a Mowisi nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe ƴɛrɩ̃ wa, ɩ̃ a nɩrɛ saarɩ̃ yi a kũu pʋↄ a kↄ̃ maal ba a ba lɩɛb a ba yɛ̃ wa.ʼ ”
42017001	A ala na yi tↄ a Jeeju yelʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe: “Yele na be na be a daar a jaa maala a nɩbɛ a ba kpɛɛrɛ a tule pʋↄ. Ɩ̃-cɛ nabier na pↄw na a ʋlↄ na saa a wa tara.
42017002	A nɛ-kpɛ̃ɛ ba na luure yara a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ nyɩɩmɩ ɩ̃ lↄbↄ ʋ ƴↄnↄ a man kʋ̃ↄmɩ, a na cãa na sa ʋ gãw ʋ na wa maala a nɩ-kↄmsɩ basɩmɛ ƴen sʋbↄ ʋ kpɛɛrɛ a tule pʋↄ.
42017003	Nyɩ́ bↄ̃w tɛrɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ! “A ala ɩ a fʋ yɛbɛ wa maal fʋ na a fãa, fú gal ʋ, a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ lɩɛb a ʋ yɛ̃, de bar kʋ ʋ.
42017004	A ala saarɩ̃ ɩ ʋ maal fʋ na bier gbɛɛ anuu-nʼayi a bibir bõ-ƴen pʋↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ lɩɛb wa a gbɛɛ anuu-nʼayi yel fʋ á ʋ lɩɛbʼã a ʋ yɛ̃, fú de bar kʋ ʋ.”
42017005	A nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ yelʼã a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ: “Maal a sɩ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ʋ bɛrmɛ dↄↄl.”
42017006	A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel: “A ala ɩ nyɩ dãa na tɛrɛ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ʋ jɛ̃ a muta-tɩɛ bir kaarɩ̃, nyɩ naa tʋↄ na yel a tɩɛ na a ʋ elĩ cen na ba a man kʋ̃ↄmɩ, ɩ̃ ʋ na maalʼã a lɛ nyɩ na yel.
42017007	“A ala ɩ nɩrɛ kãw a nyɩ sↄ̃w tɛrɛ na tʋ̃tʋnↄ ʋ kʋↄrↄ ʋ, mɩɩ ʋ ŋmaara ʋ a dʋn, ɩ̃ wa yi a puo pʋↄ wa, ʋ na yel ʋ na á ʋ wa fↄfↄw jɛ dɩ dɩb mɩɩ?
42017008	Má ʋ na ɛ̃ɛ na yel ʋ: ʻMaal ma bõ-dɩraa ɩ̃ gbɛɛrɩ̃ de bin ma, a maa wa dɩ nyu nɩ sɛw baar, fú pãa mɩ dɩ nyu nɩ.ʼ
42017009	Ʋ na puorʼã a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnↄ a-na-ɩ ʋ maalʼã a ala ʋ na ƴↄ̃w ʋ ʋ maal mɩɩ?
42017010	Lɛ a mɩ wↄ̃ a nyɩ jie. A nyɩmɩ wa maal a ala ba na ƴↄ̃w nyɩ baar, nyɩ́ yel: ʻSɩ ɩ na tʋ̃tʋ̃-pↄrsɩ. A ala na sɛw sɩ maal, ala tɛw sɩ maal.ʼ ”
42017011	A Jeeju cere na a Jerujalɛm na ʋ tↄl yi a Samari nɩ a Galile cara pʋↄ.
42017012	Ʋ cenʼã na kpɛɛrɛ tẽ-bile kãw pʋↄ a kↄn pie jↄ tuor ʋ ta sↄ̃w ɩraa
42017013	ɩ̃ bʋↄlↄ ʋ nɩ kpɛ̃w yele: “Jeeju, Jãjaana, bↄ̃w sɩ nãw bɩlɛ!”
42017014	A Jeeju nyɛ ba ɩ̃ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ cen na de a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ miilʼɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn baar-lorbo.” Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na cãa be a sↄr juu cere, ba pↄlɩ̃ na.
42017015	A bõ-ƴen a ba sↄ̃w nyɛ na a ɩ ʋ pↄlɩ̃ na ɩ̃ lɛ lɩɛb de a ʋ gbɛ-tule pɛwrɛ a Naaŋmɩn nɩ kpɛ̃w cere nɩ.
42017016	Ʋ lo na kpa vↄↄl a nii-sↄw a Jeeju gbɛɛ par ɩ̃ puoro ʋ. A daba ʋlↄ ɩ na Samari-tẽw nɩrɛ.
42017017	A be jie, a Jeeju yel: “Aa ɩ nɩbɛ pie ba ɩ na pↄlɩ̃ wa? Ɩ̃ a pie for bir bala, nyɩnɛ ba be?
42017018	A ala ma ɩ a saana na tɛw ʋ wa, nɩ-bõ-ƴen ma be be na tɩɛr a ʋ lɩɛb wa pɛw a Naaŋmɩn wa?”
42017019	Ɩ̃ na ʋ yel ʋ: “Ir kule. A fʋ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa faa fʋ na.”
42017020	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ soorʼã a Jeeju a dabor a Naaŋmɩn fãw na waara, ʋ yel ba: “A Naaŋmɩn fãw ma waara a nɩrɛ nyɛrɛ ʋ wa.
42017021	Ba kↄ̃ yel a ka ʋ be mɩɩ, a be ka ʋ be wa. Ɩ̃ nyɩ́ bↄ̃wnaa a Naaŋmɩn fãw be na a nyɩ sↄ̃w.”
42017022	A ala na yi tↄ, a Jeeju lɛ yelʼã a par-tuurbe: “Daar kãw na ta na a nyɩ na bʋↄrↄ nyɩ nyɛ a Nɩbɛ Bie bibir ƴen sʋbↄ, ɩ̃ nyɩ kↄ̃ nyɛ wa.
42017023	Ba na yel nyɩ na: ʻNyɩ́ nyɛ ʋ ka!ʼ mɩɩ ʻNyɩ́ nyɛ ʋ be ka!ʼ Nyɩ taa cere be wa, nyɩ taa jↄrↄ tuure ba wa.
42017024	A-na-ɩ a mɩnɛ a saa na ma nyɩnyɩl a saꞋlon caarɩ̃ a lõboor bõ-ƴen wa cen na ta nɩ a lõboor kpee, lɛ a Nɩbɛ Bie na be a ʋ bibir.
42017025	Ɩ̃-cɛ a sɛw na ʋ na de nĩe nyɛ hʋʋr yayaw ɩ̃ a dɩnaa nɩbɛ jaar ʋ bar.
42017026	A ala na dãa ta a Nowe daar, na lɛ bↄ̃w na ta a Nɩbɛ Bie daar mɩ.
42017027	A nɩbɛ dãa na dɩrɛ nyuure nɩ kule nɩ taa, ɩ̃ mɩ tɩɩrɛ a ba bibiir a ba kule, wa ta nɩ a bibir ʋlↄ a Nowe na kpɛ a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a kʋ̃ↄ wa ŋme pↄw ba a ba kpi ba jaa.
42017028	A lɛ ʋ mɩ, a ala na dãa ta a Lↄtɩ daar na lɛ bↄ̃w na ta go. A nɩbɛ dãa na dɩrɛ nyuure nɩ, daara a yele ƴaba nɩ, bʋrↄ a yele, mɩɛrɛ nɩ a yie.
42017029	Ɩ̃-cɛ a bibir ʋlↄ a Lↄtɩ na yi a Sↄdↄm-tẽw pʋↄ, Naaŋmɩn ɩ na a vũu nɩ a kʋsɩ-Ꞌlerisɩ a yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ lo pↄw ba a ba kpi ba jaa.
42017030	A lɛ a na mɩ be a bibir ʋlↄ a Nɩbɛ Bie nↄↄ nyɩrɛ.
42017031	“A bibir ʋlↄ, a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na be a gar juu ɩ̃ a ʋ yele be a diem, ʋ taa suure diere wa. A lɛ ʋ mɩ, a ʋlↄ na be a puo pʋↄ, ʋ taa lɩɛbɛ puo-sↄw wa.
42017032	Nyɩ́ tɩɛrʼɩ̃ a ala na dãa ta a Lↄtɩ pↄw!
42017033	A ʋlↄ na bʋↄrↄ ʋ faa a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ, ʋ na ɛ̃ɛ na bↄr, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na sↄw a ʋ bↄrfʋ, ʋ na baa na.
42017034	Ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a ʋna daarʼãa, nɩbɛ ayi na lãa na gã a tɩsↄw a gaajie bõ-ƴen juu, a Naaŋmɩn na de na bõ-ƴen ɩ̃ cɛ a bõ-ƴen bar.
42017035	Pↄↄbↄ ayi na lãa na ƴɛrɛ jↄ̃, ʋ na de na bõ-ƴen ɩ̃ cɛ a bõ-ƴen bar. [
42017036	Dabsɩ ayi na be na a puo pʋↄ, ɩ̃ ba na de na a bõ-ƴen ɩ̃ cɛ a kãw bar.”]
42017037	A par-tuurbe soor ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, nyɩnɛ a ana yele na maal?” A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ba: “A jie ʋlↄ a bõ-kũu na be, be a sidune na mɩ lo duo.”
42018001	A Jeeju lɛ bↄ̃w na lↄb a sʋkpa na kʋ ba bʋↄrↄ ʋ miil ba a ba sɛw na na sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn a daar a jaa kↄ̃ bala wa.
42018002	Ʋ yelʼã: “Yɛr-guoro dãa na be tẽw kãw pʋↄ. ꞋWaa jↄrↄ Naaŋmɩn wa, Ꞌwaa mɩ ƴↄnↄ nɩrɛ wa.
42018003	Kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄw kãw mɩ dãa na be a ʋna tẽw naa pʋↄ, ma cere a ʋ jie tↄ̃-tↄ̃-tↄ̃ yele ʋ: ʻGuor a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ a ɩ̃ san-sʋbↄ ɩnɛ.ʼ
42018004	A ƴɛr-guoro jaarʼã gbɛɛ amɩnɛ jaa, ɩ̃ a ala ɩ̃ baar, ʋ yelʼã a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ: ʻYel-mɩ̃ɛ ʋ, maa jↄrↄ Naaŋmɩn wa, maa mɩ ƴↄnↄ nɩrɛ wa,
42018005	ɩ̃-cɛ a-na-ɩ a kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄw na vↄwrↄ ma na a lɛ, ɩ̃ na guorʼã a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃. A ala ma ɩ lɛ ʋ wa, ʋ na ma wa na wɛlɛ ma a juu a daar a jaa.ʼ ”
42018006	A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju yelʼã: “Nyɩ́ wõ a ala a ƴɛr-guor-gõgolaa sʋbↄ ʋlↄ na yel.
42018007	Ɩ̃ a nɩbɛ bala a Naaŋmɩn na vɛl ir na ma wuure bʋↄlↄ nɩ ʋ a mↄtↄ̃w nɩ a tɩsↄw, a Naaŋmɩn kↄ̃ guor a ba ƴɛrɩ̃ miilʼɩ̃ a ba yel-mɩ̃ɛ wa mɩɩ? Ʋ na kama na a ba sũofʋ?
42018008	Ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, ʋ na guorʼã a ba ƴɛrɩ̃ fↄfↄw. Ɩ̃-cɛ a Nɩbɛ Bie, ʋ na nyɛ na a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa a nɩbɛ jie a ka a tẽw juu a lɛ ʋ nↄↄ lɩɛbɛ waara mɩɩ?”
42018009	A Jeeju lɛ bↄ̃w na lↄb a sʋkpa na a bala ɩnɛ na ma tɩɛrɛ a ba ɩ na a nɩ-torisɩ a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw ɩ̃ ma kpɛrɛ a nɩbɛ.
42018010	Ʋ yelʼã: “Nɩbɛ ayi dãa na cen a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ Naaŋmɩn sʋↄrfʋ jie. Bõ-ƴen ɩ na Farɩsɩ nɩrɛ, ɩ̃ a bõ-ƴen ɩ lãpo-diere.
42018011	A Farɩsɩ nɩrɛ ɩraa na iin ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn yele nɩ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ: ʻNaaŋmɩn, ɩ̃ puoro fʋ na a-na-ɩ maa wↄ̃ a nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ kaarɩ̃ na ɩ a nyanyube, nɩ a nɩ-gõgolĩsɩ, nɩ a pepebsɩ, mɩɩ a lãpo-diere na kaarɩ̃ wa.
42018012	Ɩ̃ ma lũ na nʋↄr gbɛɛ ayi a bibie anuu-nʼayi pʋↄ, ɩ̃ ma mɩ ir a bõ-ƴen pie pʋↄ a yele a jaa pʋↄ ɩ̃ na ma pↄw.ʼ
42018013	Ɩ̃-cɛ a lãpo-diere ɩraa jãa fɩ̃ɩ ma Ꞌlara dʋↄrↄ Ꞌwuoro a saꞋlon wa, ɩ̃ lↄbↄ a nur yele: ʻNaaŋmɩn, bↄ̃w ma nãw bɩlɛ, a maa na ɩ a maal-fãa sʋbↄ.ʼ
42018014	“Ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a daba ʋlↄ lɩɛbʼã kulʼɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn torfʋ, ɩ̃ ɛ̃ɛ cɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩrɛ ʋlↄ bar, a-na-ɩ a nɩrɛ lɛ na bʋↄrↄ ʋ bɛrmɛ a juu, a Naaŋmɩn na wur ʋ na suu nɩ, ɩ̃ a nɩrɛ lɛ na sↄw wur a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ, a Naaŋmɩn na jɛw ʋ na irʼɩ̃.”
42018015	A nɩbɛ wa nɩ na bibi-bil a Jeeju sɛ̃ a ʋ sɩɩr ba, a par-tuurbe nyɛ a lɛ ɩ̃ gala ba.
42018016	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju ɩ na a ba taw ta hɩ ʋ a bibiir bala, ɩ̃ ʋ yel: “Nyɩ́ bar a bibiir a ba wa a ɩ̃ sɛ̃, nyɩ taa pɩɛrɛ ba bara wa a-na-ɩ a bala na wↄ̃ a ba kaarɩ̃, bala ɩ̃ sↄ a Naaŋmɩn fãw.
42018017	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ʋlↄ na ma sↄw a Naaŋmɩn ʋ tɛrɛ ʋ a bibile kaarɩ̃ wa, Ꞌwaa be na tʋↄ kpɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ wa.”
42018018	A Jufisɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ kãw soorʼã a Jeeju: “Jãjaan-son, bõ ɩ̃ sɛw ɩ̃ na maal ɩ̃ pãa pↄw a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw?”
42018019	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a fʋ bʋↄl ma a nɩ-son? Nɩ-son ma be, ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Naaŋmɩn tɛw ʋ wa.
42018020	Fʋ bↄ̃w na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn: taa wa gana nɩ pↄw kpee wa, taa wa kúrↄ nɩrɛ wa, taa wa jure wa, taa wa ŋmara jir-kara ƴↄnↄ nɩrɛ wa; jↄrↄ a fʋ sãa nɩ a fʋ mã.”
42018021	A daba yel: “Ɩ̃ maalʼã a ana yele a jaa a ɩ̃ bibile daar wa ta nɩ a dɩnaa.”
