42018022	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na wõ a lɛ, ʋ yelʼã a daba: “Bom bõ-ƴen cãa na cɛ fʋ. Da a fʋ yele a jaa fʋ na tɛrɛ, de a libie po a nãw deme, ɩ̃ fʋ na pↄw na a na-yele a Naaŋmɩn tẽw. A ala ɩ̃ baar, fú wa tuure ma.”
42018023	Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ a daba na wõ a ala, nyãa nyɩl ʋ na, a-na-ɩ ʋ sɩrɩ̃ na le.
42018024	A Jeeju nyɛ na a mɩnɛ a nyãa na nyɩl a daba, ɩ̃ yel áa kpɛmɛ na a mɩnɛ a naabsɩ na kpɛɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ.
42018025	Ʋ lɛ yelʼã: “A na yↄw na a nyʋↄmɩ na kpɛɛrɛ a mɩsɩn-bↄw pʋↄ gãw a naaba na kpɛɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ.”
42018026	A nɩbɛ bala na wõ a ala, ba yelʼã: “A ala ɩ a lɛ ʋ, ala na pↄw a faafʋ?”
42018027	A Jeeju yel: “A ala a nɩrɛ na ma tʋↄrↄ maala wa, a Naaŋmɩn ma tʋↄ na maal.”
42018028	A be jie a Pɩɛr yel: “Nyɛ a sɩmɩ, sɩ barʼã a yele ala sɩ na dãa tɛrɛ, ɩ̃ tuure fʋ.”
42018029	A Jeeju yel ba: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a nɩrɛ lɛ na bar a ʋ yir, mɩɩ a ʋ pↄw, mɩɩ a ʋ yɛɛr, mɩɩ a ʋ dↄↄrbↄ, mɩɩ a ʋ bibiir a Naaŋmɩn fãw ɩnɛ,
42018030	ʋ na pↄw na a gãw a lɛ a daarʼã pʋↄ sɩ na be a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ ʋ na mɩ pↄw na a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw a daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ na be a puo-sↄw waara.”
42018031	A Jeeju taw na a ʋ par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi kpaarɩ̃ a ʋ pulẽe, ɩ̃ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ nyɛ, sɩ cere na a Jerujalɛm, ɩ̃ a be, a ala a jaa a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe na sɛb a Nɩbɛ Bie ɩnɛ, a na maalʼã baar.
42018032	A-na-ɩ ba na nyↄw ʋ na kʋ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ a ba la ʋ, ɩ̃ na ba tʋ ʋ, ɩ̃ puur a natɛɛr ƴↄ̃w ʋ,
42018033	ɩ̃ fↄbʼɩ̃ ʋ a kpaara ɩ̃ cɛ ʋ kú. Ɩ̃ a bibie ata dayen, ʋ na irʼã a kũu pʋↄ.”
42018034	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋ par-tuurbe ma dãa bↄ̃w a ala ʋ na yele par fɩ̃ɩ wa. A ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ dãa na liw ba a baa dãa tʋↄ bↄ̃w a par wa.
42018035	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na pɩɛlɛ a Jeriko-tẽw, jↄ̃w kãw dãa na jɛ a sↄr nʋↄr sʋↄrↄ a yele.
42018036	Ʋ wõ na a nɩbɛ na tↄlↄ ɩ̃ soor a ala na be be,
42018037	a ba yel ʋ áa Najarɛtɩ Jeeju ɩ̃ tↄlↄ
42018038	ʋ wuur yel: “Davɩtɩ Bie Jeeju yaa, bↄ̃w ma nãw bɩlɛ!”
42018039	A bala na de a nĩe, gala ʋ na, a ʋ pↄw a nʋↄr, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ jaarʼã ɩ̃ ɛ̃ɛ wuurʼɩ̃ kpɛ̃w yele: “Davɩtɩ Bie, bↄ̃w ma nãw!”
42018040	A Jeeju ɩraa ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w a ba taw ʋ wa nɩ a ʋ sɛ̃. A lɛ a jↄ̃w na ta pɩɛl ʋ baar, a Jeeju soor ʋ na:
42018041	“Bõ fʋ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ maal fʋ?” A jↄ̃w yel: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, maal ɩ̃ lɛ nyɛrɛ.”
42018042	Á Jeeju yel ʋ: “Lɛ bↄ̃w nyɛrɛ! A fʋ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa faa fʋ na.”
42018043	A jie naan, ʋ lɛ bↄ̃w na nyɛrɛ, ɩ̃ pɛwrɛ a Naaŋmɩn tuure nɩ a Jeeju, a nɩbɛ ba jaa nyɛ a lɛ ɩ̃ mɩ pɛw a Naaŋmɩn.
42019001	A Jeeju kpɛ na a Jeriko-tẽw pʋↄ tↄlↄ.
42019002	A be, dab-naaba kãw ba na bʋↄlↄ a Jake, na ɩ a lãpo-dierbe nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ,
42019003	bʋↄrↄ na ʋ nyɛ a Jeeju bↄ̃w a sʋbↄ ʋlↄ ʋ na ɩ, ɩ̃ Ꞌwaa dãa tʋↄrↄ wa a-na-ɩ a nɩbɛ waa na, ɩ̃ ʋ ɩ nɩ-ŋmãa.
42019004	A lɛ, ʋ jↄ na cen nii-sↄw na do tɩɛ kãw juu ba na bʋↄlↄ sɩkomↄↄr, a Jeeju nyɛfʋ ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ be ʋ sɛw ʋ tↄlʼɩ̃.
42019005	A lɛ a Jeeju na ta a tɩɛ ʋlↄ par, ʋ dʋↄ na Ꞌwuor a tɩɛ juu ɩ̃ bʋↄl yel: “Jake, suu fↄfↄw, a-na-ɩ a sɛw na ɩ̃ na kpɛ a fʋ yir a dɩnaa.”
42019006	A Jake suu na fↄfↄw de ʋ, a nʋ̃ↄ ƴala ʋ.
42019007	A mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ na nyɛ a lɛ, ba hũhune na ba jaa ɩ̃ yele: “A maal-fãa sʋbↄ yir ʋ cen na kpɛ!”
42019008	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jake irʼã ɩraa a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nii-sↄw ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ na de na a ɩ̃ yele po jɛ̃ taa kʋ a nãw deme, ɩ̃ a ala ɩ ɩ̃ dãa na bɛlɩ̃ nɩrɛ bom de, ɩ̃ na lɩɛbʼã kʋ ʋ gbɛɛ anaan dↄↄk.”
42019009	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A faafʋ ta na a yirʼã pʋↄ a dɩnaa, a-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ, ʋ mɩ ɩ na a Abʋraham yãw.
42019010	A-na-ɩ a Nɩbɛ Bie wa na na bʋↄrↄ a bala na bↄr, ʋ faa ba.”
42019011	A lɛ a nɩbɛ na cɛlɛ a ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, a Jeeju lɛ lↄbʼã a sʋkpa kʋ ba go, a-na-ɩ ʋ dãa na pɩɛlɛ a Jerujalɛm, ɩ̃ a nɩbɛ mɩ dãa tɩɛrɛ áa Naaŋmɩn fãw na ta na fↄfↄw.
42019012	Ʋ yelʼã: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ kãw dãa na be be. Ʋ wa yi na cen tẽ-nɩdaa a ba na ƴↄ̃w ʋ ʋ ɩ jamana ɩ̃ ʋ lɛ lɩɛb wa.
42019013	A lɛ ʋ na bʋↄrↄ a cenfʋ, ʋ bʋↄlʼã a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ pie de sɛlɩ̃-bie na ɩ a ba libie kʋ ba bõ-ƴene-ƴene ba jaa ɩ̃ yel ba: ʻNyɩ́ de ƴaba nɩ wa ta nɩ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na lɩɛbɛ waara.ʼ
42019014	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋna nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ tẽw nɩbɛ dãa na Ꞌlaar ʋ. Ba irʼã nɩbɛ tʋ̃ a ba bɩɛr ʋ cen na yel á baa bʋↄrↄ a daba ʋlↄ ʋ ɩ a ba jamana wa.
42019015	“A lɛ ʋ na ɩ a jamana baar ɩ̃ lɛ wa, ʋ ƴↄ̃w na a ba bʋↄl a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ bala ʋ na dãa kʋ a libie, a ba wa ʋ soor ba a amɩnɛ ba na pↄw.
42019016	A dãdãw sʋbↄ ta na yel: ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, sɛlɩ̃-bie pie ɩ̃ pↄw dↄↄl a ʋlↄ fʋ na kʋ ma juu.ʼ
42019017	A jamana yel ʋ: ʻA vɩɛlɛ na. Fʋ ɩ na tʋ̃tʋ̃-son. A mɩnɛ fʋ na ɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ sʋbↄ a bõ-bile pʋↄ, ɩ̃ na ƴↄ̃w fʋ na a fʋ Ꞌwuoro a ten pie.ʼ
42019018	A tuure mɩ ta na ɩ̃ yel: ʻSɛlɩ̃-bie anuu ɩ̃ pↄw nɩ a ʋlↄ fʋ na kʋ ma.ʼ
42019019	A jamana mɩ yel a ʋlↄ: ʻA fʋ̃ʋ mɩ, fʋ na Ꞌwuoro na a ten anuu.ʼ
42019020	A tʋ̃tʋnↄ ƴen sʋbↄ ta na mɩ yel: ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, nyɛ a fʋ sɛlɩ̃-bir ɩ̃ na ƴↄ̃w cẽcen pʋↄ tɛɛlɛ fʋ.
42019021	Ɩ̃ jↄrↄ fʋ na dãbɩ̃ɛ, a-na-ɩ a fʋ ben kpɛmɛ na. Fʋ ma de na a ala na ma ɩ a fʋ bom wa, ɩ̃ ma mɩ ŋma a ala fʋ na ma bʋr wa.ʼ
42019022	A jamana yel ʋ: ʻFʋna tʋ̃tʋ̃-fãa naa! A fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ na de lɩɛb dↄↄl a fʋ juu. Fʋ na dãa bↄ̃w ka ɩ̃ ben kpɛmɛ na, ɩ̃ ma diere a ala na ma ɩ a ɩ̃ bom wa, ɩ̃ mɩ ŋmara a ala ɩ̃ na ma dãa bʋr wa,
42019023	ɩ̃ mɩnɛ a ɩ a faa dãa de a ɩ̃ libie kʋ a ƴaƴabsɩ, a maa wa lɩɛb wa, ɩ̃ nyɛ dↄↄlaa wa?ʼ
42019024	Ɩ̃ na ʋ yel a bala na ɩraa a be: ʻNyɩ́ faa a ʋ sɛlɩ̃-bir kʋ a ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a sɛlɩ̃-bie pie.ʼ
42019025	A ba yel ʋ: ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, má pie jaa ʋ tɛrɛ!ʼ
42019026	Ʋ yel ba: ʻƖ̃ yele nyɩ na, a ʋlↄ na tɛraa, ba na lɛ kʋ ʋ na a dↄↄl, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na ma tɛraa wa, ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a fɩ̃ɩ, ba na de na a lɩ̃ɩ ala a ʋ jie.
42019027	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ̃ sama-deme bala na ma dãa bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a ba jamana wa, nyɩ́ nyↄↄr ba wa nɩ a ka, na nyɩ kú a ɩ̃ nii-sↄw.ʼ ”
42019028	A lɛ a Jeeju na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, ʋ de ba na nĩe a ba cere a Jerujalɛm.
42019029	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na tara a Bɛfaje nɩ a Betani na pɩɛlʼɩ̃ a tãw ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Olivi-tɩɩr tãw, ʋ tʋ̃ na a ʋ par-tuurbe ayi, ɩ̃ yel ba:
42019030	“Nyɩ́ cen a tẽw ʋlↄ na be a nii-sↄw. A nyɩmɩ wa ta a be, nyɩ na nyɛ na bʋ̃-bile ba na lũ, nɩrɛ na ma do sɛr wa. Nyɩ́ Ꞌlor wa nɩ.
42019031	A nɩrɛ wa soor nyɩ á bõ nyɩ Ꞌloro ɩrɛ nɩ, nyɩ́ yel áa Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ʋ.”
42019032	A bala ʋ na tʋ̃ cenʼã na nyɛ a be a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na yel ba.
42019033	A lɛ ba na cãa Ꞌloro a bʋ̃-bile, a bʋ̃ↄ deme soor ba na: “Bõ nyɩ Ꞌloro a bʋ̃-bile ɩrɛ nɩ?”
42019034	A ba yel ba áa Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ʋ,
42019035	ɩ̃ na ba de a bʋ̃-bile cenʼɩ̃ a Jeeju sɛ̃, ɩ̃ lↄb a ba cẽcene dↄↄl a ʋ juu, ɩ̃ ɩ a Jeeju ʋ do jɛ.
42019036	A lɛ ʋ na cere, a lɛ a nɩbɛ mɩ yɛrɛ a ba cẽcene pↄwrↄ a sↄr cere nɩ.
42019037	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na tara a Jerujalɛm, suure nɩ a Olivi-tɩɩr tãw sↄr, nʋ̃ↄ ƴala na a nɩ-yaw bala ba jaa na ma tuure ʋ, a ba pɛwrɛ a Naaŋmɩn nɩ kpɛ̃w a ana tʋ̃-kpɛn a jaa ba na nyɛ ɩnɛ.
42019038	Ba yele na: “A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Naaŋmɩn ú be nɩ a jamana ʋlↄ na waara nɩ a ʋ yuor! A pɩɛnfʋ ʋ be a saꞋlon, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn ʋ sↄ a ju-kpɛ̃ɛ a saꞋlon iin!”
42019039	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ na dãa be a nɩbɛ sↄ̃w, yelʼã a Jeeju: “Jãjaana, tan a fʋ par-tuurbe a ba sine.”
42019040	A Jeeju yel ba: “Ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a bala ɩ̃ sine, a kʋsɩɛ na wuure na.”
42019041	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na tara a Jerujalɛm, nyɛ a tẽw, ʋ kõ na a ʋ ɩnɛ
42019042	ɩ̃ yel: “A nyɩmɩ mɩ, a ala ɩ nyɩ dãa na bↄ̃w a dɩnaa bibirʼã, a ana yele na kʋrↄ nyɩ a pɩɛnfʋ ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a liw na a nyɩ jie.
42019043	A-na-ɩ a daar nↄↄ ta na a nyɩ sama-deme wa tiw kolĩ nyɩ, jɛ var gu nyɩ, ɩ̃ jɛbɛ nɩ nyɩ a lõbobo a jaa.
42019044	Ba na bũburĩ nyɩ na, ɩ̃ wɛl a nyɩ tẽw bar. Ba kↄ̃ bar kubie a lɛ dↄↄl taa fɩ̃ɩ wa, a-na-ɩ a daar ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na wa a nyɩ faafʋ ɩnɛ, nyaa bↄ̃wnaa wa.”
42019045	A Jeeju kpɛ na a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, diwre a bala na ƴaba bara
42019046	ɩ̃ yele ba: “A sɛbʼã a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: ʻA ɩ̃ yir na ɩ na a puorfʋ yir,ʼ ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ lɩɛb ʋ na ʋ ɩ a nyanyube sↄↄlɩ̃fʋ jie.”
42019047	A bibie a jaa, a Jeeju ma jaana na a nɩbɛ a be a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, a Jufisɩ baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ba ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a ba nɩ-bɛrɛ dãa bʋↄrↄ ba kú ʋ,
42019048	ɩ̃-cɛ baa bↄ̃w a mɩnɛ ba na ɩrɛ wa, a-na-ɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa nyɩrɩ̃ na ƴↄ̃w toor cɛlɛ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ.
42020001	Bibir kaw, a Jeeju jaana na a nɩbɛ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, ƴɛrɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son, a Jufisɩ baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ, nɩ a ba ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ, nɩ a ba ni-dierbe ta
42020002	soor ʋ: “Yel sɩ a nyɩnɛ fʋ na pↄw a sↄr maala nɩ a yele asɩmɛ? Ala ɩ̃ kʋ fʋ a sↄr?”
42020003	A Jeeju yel ba: “Ɩ̃ na mɩ soor nyɩ na bom bõ-ƴen. Nyɩ́ man ma:
42020004	a Jã-Batii kʋ̃ↄ mʋrfʋ, nyɩnɛ a yi? A Naaŋmɩn jie ʋ, mɩɩ a nɩbɛ jie ʋ?”
42020005	Ɩ̃-cɛ ba nyↄw na ɩ̃ pɛrɛ ƴↄnↄ taa a ba mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele: “A ala ɩ sɩ yelʼã á Naaŋmɩn jie a yi, ʋ na soor sɩ na á bõ ɩnɛ saa sↄw de a Jã wa.
42020006	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ sɩ yelʼã á nɩbɛ jie a yi, a nɩbɛ ba jaa na lↄb sɩ na nɩ a kʋsɩɛ kú, a-na-ɩ ba dãa na sↄw nɩ a ba pʋↄ ʋ jaa áa Jã ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere.”
42020007	A be jie, ba yelʼã: “Saa bↄ̃w a jie a ʋ kʋ̃ↄ mʋrfʋ na yi wa.”
42020008	A Jeeju lɩɛb yel ba: “A maa mɩ, ɩ̃ kↄ̃ mɩ yel nyɩ a jie ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na pↄw a sↄr maala nɩ a yele ala wa.”
42020009	A ala na yi tↄ, a Jeeju lↄbʼã a sʋkpa na kʋ a nɩbɛ. Ʋ yelʼã: “Daba kãw sɛlʼã dɩvɛ̃-tɩɩr a ʋ puo pʋↄ ɩ̃ bↄ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ ƴↄ̃w a ba Ꞌwuoro, ɩ̃ yↄ cen jie kãw kam a be.
42020010	A lɛ a tɩ-wↄmↄ daar na ta, ʋ tʋ̃ na tʋ̃tʋnↄ kãw a nɩbɛ bala jie a ʋ cen a ba kʋ ʋ a ala na ɩ a ʋ ben, ʋ wa nɩ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ bala narʼã a ʋlↄ ʋ na tʋ̃ ɩ̃ diw ʋ bar ʋ kulʼɩ̃ nu-jaala.
42020011	A puo sʋbↄ lɛ bↄ̃w tʋ̃ a tʋ̃tʋnↄ ƴen sʋbↄ, a ba mɩ nar ʋ ɩ̃ tʋ tʋ ʋ, ɩ̃ diw ʋ bar ʋ mɩ kulʼɩ̃ nu-jaala.
42020012	Ʋ lɛ bↄ̃w tʋ̃ a ata sʋbↄ a ba nyↄw ʋ nar ƴↄ̃w wʋlɩ̃, ɩ̃ lↄb ʋ bar yẽw.
42020013	A be jie, a puo sʋbↄ yel: ʻMɩnɛ ɩ̃ na ɩ? Ɩ̃ na tʋ̃ na a ɩ̃ bi-nʋnaa; a nʋmↄ wa sↄw ba na jↄ na a ʋlↄ.ʼ
42020014	Ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛ a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ bala na nyɛ ʋ, ba yelʼã kʋ taa: ʻA naa ɩ̃ ɩ a gã-diere; nyɩ́ ɩ a sɩ kú ʋ bar ɩ̃ de a gãw.ʼ
42020015	Ɩ̃ na ba nyↄw ʋ vu yi nɩ a puo cɛ̃cɛ̃w, kú ʋ bar. “A na be a lɛ, bõ a puo sʋbↄ na pãa maal ba?
42020016	Ʋ na wa na na kú a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ bala bar, ɩ̃ de a puo kʋ a nɩ-kpeesɩ.” A lɛ a nɩbɛ na wõ a ƴɛr-bir ʋlↄ, ba yelʼã: “A taa be a lɛ wa!”
42020017	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju Ꞌwuor ba na kir-kir-kir ɩ̃ yel: “A ala ɩ a lɛ ʋ, bõ a ƴɛrɩ̃ na na sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ bʋↄrↄ a yel? ʻA kubir ʋlↄ a dacin-mɩɛrbɛ na dãa jaar bar, lɛ lɩɛbʼã ɩ a kubir ʋlↄ ba na de ƴↄ̃w a dacin gbɛr pʋↄ.ʼ
42020018	“A nɩrɛ lɛ nↄↄ loro a kubir ʋlↄ juu, a sʋbↄ ʋlↄ na karʼã, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ juu a kubir ʋlↄ nↄↄ loro, ʋ na pʋ̃pʋrɩ̃ ʋ na bar.
42020019	A mɩnɛ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ na bↄ̃w ka bala a Jeeju lↄbↄ nɩ a sʋkpa, ba dãa na bʋↄrↄ ba nyↄw ʋ a ʋna daarʼãa pʋↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ ba dãa na jↄ dãbɩ̃ɛ a nɩbɛ ɩnɛ.”
42020020	Ba nyↄw na ɩ̃ jʋʋrↄ a Jeeju, ɩ̃ ir jʋjʋʋrbↄ bar a ba cen a ʋ sɛ̃, maala wↄ̃ nɩ-sono ba ɩ, bʋↄrↄ ʋ ƴɛr ƴɛrɩ̃ lɩɛb nyↄw nɩ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ, a ba ƴↄ̃w ʋ a fãgã sʋbↄ nuumɩ na ɩ a ba tẽw nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ.
42020021	Ba soor ʋ na: “Jãjaana, sɩ bↄ̃w ka a fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ nɩ a fʋ jaanfʋ fʋ na jaana a nɩbɛ de na a sↄr. Fʋ maa Ꞌwuor a ala a nɩrɛ na ɩ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ fʋ ma jaana na a nɩbɛ a Naaŋmɩn sↄr a yel-mɩ̃ɛ pʋↄ.
42020022	Sↄr be na be a sɩ na ma ya a lãpo kʋ a Orom jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ, mɩɩ sↄr ma be be wa?”
42020023	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju bↄ̃w nɩ na a ba bɛraa ɩ̃ yel ba:
42020024	“Nyɩ́ miilʼɩ̃ ma libi-kur. Ala nii-sↄw nɩ ala yuor ɩ̃ be be?” A ba yel ʋ: “A Orom jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋ.”
42020025	A be jie, a Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ lɩɛbɛ kʋrↄ a Orom jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ a ala na ɩ a Orom jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ ben, ɩ̃ mɩ kʋrↄ a Naaŋmɩn a ala na mɩ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ben.”
42020026	Baa tʋↄ nyɛ mabfʋ jie a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ pʋↄ ʋ na ƴɛrɛ a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw wa; ɩ̃ nↄɛ ɛ̃ɛ na ko ba a ba ŋma vʋʋrɩ̃sɩ.
42020027	A Saduse nɩbɛ na ma yele áa kũusɩ ma ire a kũu pʋↄ wa, nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ ta na soor a Jeeju:
42020028	“Jãjaana, a Mowisi sɛbʼã a ʋ sɛbɛ pʋↄ yel sɩ, a ala ɩ a nɩrɛ tɛrɛ na yɛbɛ ʋ wa kpi ɩ̃ cɛ a pↄw bar, a Ꞌwaa tɛrɛ bibiir wa, a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ ʋ de a kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄw dↄw bibiir a ʋ yɛbɛ ʋlↄ yuor ɩnɛ.
42020029	Yɛɛr anuu-nʼayi dãa na be be; a ba kpɛ̃ɛ kulʼã pↄw ma dↄw bie wa ɩ̃ kpi,
42020030	a ʋ tuure de a kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄw ma mɩ dↄw bie wa ɩ̃ mɩ kpi,
42020031	a ata sʋbↄ de, a mɩ ɩ a wãa naa. A lɛ a wↄ̃ nɩ a yɛɛr anuu-nʼayi bala ba jaa. Baa tʋↄ dↄw bie wa ɩ̃ mɩ kpi,
42020032	ɩ̃ a pↄw wa pãa bɩɛr kpi.
42020033	A na be a lɛ, a kũu-pʋↄ-irfʋ daar, buor sʋbↄ ɩ̃ na sↄ a pↄw? A-na-ɩ a ba jaa anuu-nʼayi dãa na kul ʋ.”
42020034	A Jeeju yel ba: “A dabsɩ nɩ a pↄↄbↄ na be a tẽw na pʋↄ, kule na taa.
42020035	Ɩ̃-cɛ a bala a Naaŋmɩn na kʋ a sↄr a ba na ir a kũu pʋↄ, tɛrɛ nɩ a baafʋ a tẽw ʋlↄ na waara ɩnɛ, baa kule taa wa.
42020036	Baa lɛ be na kpi wa, a-na-ɩ ba na wↄ̃ na a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋmsɩ kaarɩ̃. Ba ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn bibiir a mɩnɛ ba na ir a kũu pʋↄ.
42020037	A ala ɩ a kũu-pʋↄ-irfʋ ʋ, a Mowĩsi miilʼã a ala a tɩ-bile a vũu na Ꞌlere ƴɛrɩ̃ pʋↄ, a mɩnɛ ʋ na yel áa Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ na a Abʋraham nɩ a Ɩjakɩ nɩ a Jakↄb Naaŋmɩn.
42020038	Ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn ma ɩ a nɩ-kpɩmɛ Naaŋmɩn wa, nɩ-mimie Naaŋmɩn ʋ ɩ, a-na-ɩ a ʋ jie a nɩbɛ ba jaa ɩ na nɩ-mimie.”
42020039	A be jie, a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ ŋmɛɛ yelʼã: “Jãjaana, sɩrɛ jaa ʋ!”
42020040	A-na-ɩ a nɩrɛ ma lɛ dãa Ꞌlara sooro ʋ bom kãw go wa.
42020041	A Jeeju yel ba: “Mɩnɛ ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩbɛ ma yel áa jamana Davɩtɩ bie a Kirisi ɩ?
42020042	A-na-ɩ a Davɩtɩ mɩ̃ɛ yelʼã a Pɛwfʋ sɛbɛ pʋↄ: ʻA Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Naaŋmɩn yelʼã a ɩ̃ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ: Jɛ a ɩ̃ dʋrɩ̃ loor
42020043	wa ta nɩ a daar ʋlↄ ɩ̃ nↄↄ maala a fʋ sama-deme a ba ɩrɛɛ a fʋ gbɛɛ dↄↄlfʋ jie.ʼ
42020044	A ala ɩ a Davɩtɩ bʋↄlↄ ʋ na Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, mɩnɛ ʋ na lɛ tʋↄ ɩ a ʋ bie?”
42020045	A mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ ba jaa na cɛlɛ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, a Jeeju yelʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe:
42020046	“Nyɩ́ gu nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ ɩnɛ. Ba ma su na a cẽcẽ-bɛrɛ yʋↄrↄ nɩ, bʋↄrↄ nɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa ba puoro ba a dar pʋↄ; ba nʋ na a nii-sↄw jaajiir a ba puorfʋ yie pʋↄ, mɩ nʋ nɩ a nɩ-bɛrɛ dakↄↄr jur jɩnaafʋ a fɛtɩsɩ jie.
42020047	Bala ɩ̃ ma bɛlɛ a kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄↄbↄ yele fara dɩrɛ, ɩ̃ ma bↄ̃w nɩ sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn kamʼɩ̃, bʋↄrↄ a nɩbɛ ba Ꞌwuoro ba. Yɛr-kpɛ̃ɛ na dↄↄlʼã a ba juumɩ.”
42021001	A Jeeju dʋↄ na Ꞌwuor nyɛ a mɩnɛ a tɛraa deme na ƴↄnↄ a ba libie, a be a Naaŋmɩn libie ƴↄ̃wfʋ jie.
42021002	Ʋ mɩ nyɛ na kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄw nã-dɩrɛ ʋ ƴↄnↄ libi-kure ayi na wↄ̃ taa nɩ tama ayi,
42021003	ɩ̃ yel: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄw na na nyɛrɛ a nãw, ƴↄ̃w na gãw a nɩbɛ ba jaa.
42021004	A-na-ɩ a ba jaa, ba ƴↄ̃w na a ala ba na dɩ ɩ̃ cɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ a pↄw na nɩ a ʋ nãw ʋ jaa, ʋ ƴↄ̃w na a ala a jaa ʋ na dãa bin gu nɩ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ.”
42021005	A nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ ƴɛrɛ na a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃, kpiire nɩ a mɩnɛ ba na mɛ nɩ ʋ a kubi-vɛlɛ, ɩ̃ ƴaarɩ̃ nɩ ʋ a yel-ɓↄmↄ ba na kʋ a Naaŋmɩn. A Jeeju yel ba:
42021006	“A ala nyɩ na nyɛ, a daar na ta na a kʋsɩr kãw kↄ̃ tʋↄ cɛ dↄↄl ɩraa a ʋ tↄ sʋbↄ juu wa. Ba na wɛlaa na a jaa kpar a tene.”
42021007	A be jie, ba soor ʋ na: “Jãjaana, dabor a yele ala na ta? Bõ-buor ɩ̃ miile a daar ʋlↄ a ana yele na tara?”
42021008	A Jeeju yel ba na: “Nyɩ́ gu nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ kↄ̃ bar nɩrɛ ʋ wa bɛlɩ̃ nyɩ wa, a-na-ɩ a nɩ-yaw na de na a ɩ̃ yuor wa nɩ yele á bala ɩ̃ ɩ a Kirisi. Ɩ̃ ba na mɩ yelʼã áa daar tara na. Nyɩ taa tuure ba wa.
42021009	A nyɩmɩ wa wõ a jɛb ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ nɩ a faa-taa, nyɩ taa wa ɩ a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄwrↄ nyɩ wa, a-na-ɩ a sɛw na a ala na de nĩe ta baar, ɩ̃-cɛ a kↄ̃ gↄr ɩ a tẽw baarfʋ wa.”
42021010	Ʋ lɛ yelʼã: “Tẽw na nɩbɛ na irʼã jɛbɛ nɩ tẽ-kpee nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ a jamana kãw na irʼã jɛbɛ nɩ a jaman-kpee.
42021011	A tẽw na dama na nɩ kpɛ̃w, ɩ̃ a wʋlɩ̃-yʋↄrsɩ nɩ a kↄ̃-bɛrɛ na lo na a tẽ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ pʋↄ. IIierũu na mɩ be na a saꞋlon ƴↄnↄ a nɩbɛ a dãbɩ̃ɛ pʋↄ.
42021012	Ɩ̃-cɛ a yele ala a jaa kↄ̃ ta sɛr wa, ɩ̃ ba na nyↄↄr nyɩ na hʋↄlↄ nyɩ. Ba na nyↄↄr nyɩ na cenʼɩ̃ a ba puorfʋ yie pʋↄ, nɩ a kasu yie pʋↄ. Ba na taw nyɩ na cenʼɩ̃ a jamansɩ nɩ a fãgã deme nii-sↄw a maa ɩnɛ.
42021013	Be nyɩ na nyɛ a sↄr ƴɛr a nyɩ yel-mɩ̃ɛ kʋ ba.
42021014	Nyɩ́ nyɛ a ala na sɛw nyɩ ƴↄ̃w a nyɩ jur pʋↄ: nyɩ taa de nĩe waala a ala ɩnɛ nyɩ nↄↄ yele faara nɩ a nyɩ juu wa,
42021015	a-na-ɩ a maa, ɩ̃ na kʋ nyɩ na a ala nyɩ na ƴɛrɛ, mɩ kʋ nɩ nyɩ a kpaarfʋ ʋlↄ a nyɩ sama-deme na faara a juu, ɩ̃ ma mɩ tʋↄrↄ cɩɩrɛ wa.
42021016	A nyɩ saanba mɩ̃ɛ, nɩ a nyɩ mã nʋmↄ, nɩ a nyɩ yɛɛr, nɩ a nyɩ bal nɩbɛ, nɩ a nyɩ badɛɛ na de nyɩ na a juu a fãgã deme jie. Ba na kú na a ŋmɛɛ a nyɩ sↄ̃w,
42021017	ɩ̃ a nɩbɛ ba jaa na Ꞌlaar nyɩ na a maa ɩnɛ.
42021018	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩ jukↄbir bõ-ƴen kↄ̃ be na bↄr wa.
42021019	Nyɩ́ nyↄw cĩcĩ. A lɛ nyɩ na faa a nyɩ baafʋ.
42021020	“A nyɩmɩ wa nyɛ a sↄdaalsɩ a ba kpal a Jerujalɛm, nyɩ́ bↄ̃wnaa, a ʋ wɛlfʋ pɩɛlʼã yɛ̃yɛ̃.
42021021	A lɛ, a bala nↄↄ beree a Jude, bá jↄrↄ duoro a tan jur. A bala nↄↄ beree a Jerujalɛm tẽ-pʋ̃ↄ bá jↄrↄ yire, ɩ̃ a bala nↄↄ beree a cɛ̃cɛ̃w ba taa kpɛɛrɛ a tẽw pʋ̃ↄ wa.
42021022	A bibie ala na ɩ na a daar ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na kpãana a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ, maala nɩ a ala a jaa na sɛb a ʋ Sɛbɛ pʋↄ.
42021023	Won na nyɩrɩ̃ na ta a pↄↄ-pʋʋr deme nɩ a bala na tɛrɛ a bi-pɩɩlsɩ a bibie ala cara pʋↄ. Á-na-ɩ won kpɛ̃ɛ na ta na a tẽw ʋlↄ, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn su-tuo na lo na a ʋ nɩbɛ juu.
42021024	Sↄ-bãjɩnɛ ba na kú nɩ ba. Ba na nyↄↄr ba na cenʼɩ̃ a ba ɩ gbãgbaar a tẽ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ a jaa pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ ɩ̃ na sãsarɩ̃ a Jerujalɛm-tẽw, wa ta nɩ a mɩnɛ a ba fãgã daar nↄↄ baara.
42021025	“Jɩbsɩ na nyɩrʼã a mↄtↄ̃w pʋↄ, nɩ a cuu pʋↄ, nɩ a ŋmarbie pʋↄ. Tuo na be na a tẽ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ nɩbɛ ba jaa jie a ka a tẽw juu, a ba ɓine a man kʋ̃ↄ ɩnɛ na hele, ɩ̃ kara duoro ɩ̃ suure.
42021026	A dãbɩ̃ɛ na maalʼã a nɩbɛ a ba pɛl a mɩnɛ ba na jɛ cɛlɛ a bier ala nↄↄ tara a tẽw pʋↄ, a-na-ɩ a fãgãsɩ ala na be a saꞋlon na damʼã nyãkarɩ̃ taa.
42021027	A lɛdaar, ba na nyɛ na a Nɩbɛ Bie ʋ be a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃ma pʋↄ nyɩnyɩlɛ waara nɩ a fãgã kpɛ̃w.
42021028	A yele ala ɩ̃ wa tara, nyɩ́ ir ɩraa ɩ̃ jɛw a jur, a-na-ɩ a nyɩ faafʋ daar pɩɛlʼã.”
42021029	A ala na yi tↄ, a Jeeju lↄbʼã a sʋkpa na kʋ ba: “Nyɩ́ nyɛ a fɩgɩ tɩɛ nɩ a tɩɩr a jaa.
42021030	A nyɩmɩ wa Ꞌwuor nyɛ a ba tↄbↄ, nyɩ ma bↄ̃w ka a susuur daar tara na.
42021031	A lɛ ʋ mɩ, a nyɩmɩ wa nyɛ a ana yele a tara, nyɩ́ bↄ̃w ka a Naaŋmɩn fãw mɩ tara na.
42021032	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na nɩbɛ kↄ̃ baar ba jaa wa, wa ta nɩ a ana yele a jaa nↄↄ tara.
42021033	A saꞋlon nɩ a tene na tↄlʼã, ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ ma be tↄlfʋ jie fɩ̃ɩ wa.
42021034	“Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ. Nyɩ taa bar a folfʋ, nɩ a dãa kʋfʋ, nɩ a tẽw na baafʋ dɛn, a ɩ tuor a nyɩ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ pʋↄ wa. A ala ma ɩ lɛ ʋ wa, a Kirisi waa bibir nↄↄ puurĩ nyɩ na,
42021035	a mɩnɛ a jʋↄ na ma lo pↄw a jɩmɛ, a-na-ɩ a na lo na pↄw a nɩbɛ ba jaa na be a ka a tẽw juu.
42021036	Nyɩ taa gure wa. Nyɩ́ ɛ̃ɛ sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn a daar a jaa, a mɩnɛ a nyɩ na tʋↄ cɩ̃ɛ a ala a jaa ɩnɛ na sɛw a ta, ɩ̃ na nyɩ tʋↄ ɩraa a Nɩbɛ Bie nii-sↄw.”
42021037	A Jeeju ma jaana na a nɩbɛ a mↄtↄ̃w a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a tɩsↄw wa ta, ʋ ma cenʼã na gã a tãw ʋlↄ juu ba na bʋↄlↄ a Olivi-tɩɩr tãw.
42021038	Ɩ̃ a nɩbɛ ba jaa ma ca na ir wa a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ a dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ ɓaaraa a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ cɛlfʋ ɩnɛ.
42022001	A bur-pʋↄr fɛtɩ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Pakɩ dãa na pɩɛlɛ.
42022002	A Naaŋmɩn baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ bʋↄrↄ na a mɩnɛ ba na ɩrɛ ɩ̃ bũbure a Jeeju, ɩ̃ a nɩrɛ kↄ̃ bↄ̃wnaa wa, a-na-ɩ ba dãa na jↄrↄ a nɩbɛ dãbɩ̃ɛ.
42022003	A daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ a Satã kpɛ na a Judasɩ ba na mɩ bʋↄlↄ a Isikaryↄtɩ,
42022004	ʋ ir cen na guor taa nɩ a Naaŋmɩn baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ gugurbe nɩ-bɛrɛ, a mɩnɛ ʋ na ɩrɛ ɩ̃ ƴↄnↄ a Jeeju a ba nur pʋↄ.
42022005	A nʋ̃ↄ ƴala ba a ala ba na wõ ɩnɛ, a ba man taa a libie ba na yara a Judasɩ,
42022006	ʋ sↄw ɩ̃ pãa bʋↄrↄ a daar ʋlↄ ʋ na tʋↄrↄ ƴↄnↄ ʋ a ba nur pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a nɩrɛ kↄ̃ bↄ̃wnaa wa.
42022007	A Bur-pʋↄr Fɛtɩ dayen ba na sɛw ba kú a Pakɩ peli ta na,
42022008	a Jeeju tʋ̃ a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jã na ʋ yel: “Nyɩ́ cen na gbɛɛrɩ̃ sɩ a Pakɩ dɩb a sɩ tɩ na dɩ.”
42022009	A ba soor ʋ: “Nyɩnɛ fʋ bʋↄrↄ sɩ cen na gbɛɛrɩ̃ a dɩb?”
42022010	Ʋ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ cɛlɛ, nyɩmɩ ta a tẽw pʋↄ, nyɩ na tuorʼɩ̃ na daba na tuo kʋ̃ↄ nɩ yuor. Nyɩ́ tu ʋ cen na ta kpɛ a yir ʋlↄ pʋↄ ʋ na kpɛɛrɛ,
42022011	ɩ̃ na nyɩ yel kʋ a yir sʋbↄ: ʻA sɩ Jãjaana yelʼã a sɩ wa soor fʋ, á nyɩnɛ a die be a ʋlↄ nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe na dɩrɛ a Pakɩ dɩb.ʼ
42022012	Ʋ na miil nyɩ na bↄↄpɩɛn di-kpɛ̃ɛ ba na bↄ̃w gbɛɛrɩ̃ vɩlaa. A be nyɩ na gbɛɛrɩ̃ a dɩb.”
42022013	Ba cenʼã na ta na ba nyɛ a yele a wↄ̃ a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na dãa yel ba, a ba gbɛɛrɩ̃ a Pakɩ fɛtɩ.
42022014	A dɩb dɩfʋ daar ta na, a Jeeju nɩ a ʋ nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ jɛ a dɩb nii-sↄw,
42022015	ʋ yel ba: “Ɩ̃ tɩɩ na nyɩrɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ lãa dɩ nɩ nyɩ a Pakɩ dɩbʼãa baar ɩ̃ pãa nyɛ a hʋʋr.
42022016	A-na-ɩ yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, maa lↄↄ dɩrɛ a Pakɩ bõ-dɩraa wa tara nɩ a daar ʋlↄ a fɛtɩ na par na wa nyɩrɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ wa.”
42022017	A mɩnɛ ʋ na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, ʋ de na a dɩvɛ̃ nɩ a ŋman ɩ̃ na ʋ puor a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ yel: “Nyɩ́ de a dɩvɛ̃ na na nyɩ nyu Ꞌlʋↄrɩ̃ taa.
42022018	A-na-ɩ yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, wa nyↄw nɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, maa lↄↄ nyuure a dɩvɛ̃ wa tara nɩ a daar ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn fãw nↄↄ waara wa.”
42022019	A ala ɩ̃ baar, ʋ de na buru na ʋ pɛw a Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃ ŋma kʋ ba ɩ̃ yel: “A naa ɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ ɩ̃gan [ɩ̃ na de tɩɩr a nyɩ ɩnɛ. Nyɩ́ maala a lɛ bↄ̃wnↄ nɩ ma.”
42022020	A mɩnɛ ba na dɩ a dɩb baar, ʋ mɩ de na a dɩvɛ̃ nɩ a ŋman kʋ ba ɩ̃ yel: “A dɩvɛ̃ na ɩ̃ ɩ a pʋlɩ̃-ta-paalaa ʋlↄ a ɩ̃ jɩ̃ɩ nↄↄ cire cↄↄrↄ a nyɩ ɩnɛ.]
42022021	Ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ bↄ̃wnaa, a ʋlↄ na ƴↄnↄ ma a ɩ̃ sama-deme nur pʋↄ lãa na jɛ nɩ ma a ka a dɩb dɩfʋ jie.
42022022	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ʋ, a Nɩbɛ Bie na sɩrɩ̃ na kpi, a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na biin a ʋ tɩɛrʋ̃, ɩ̃-cɛ nabier na pↄw na a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na diere ʋ a juu.”
42022023	A be jie, ba nyↄw na ɩ̃ sooro taa, á nɩ-buor a ba sↄ̃w ɩ̃ na maal a bom a lɛ.
42022024	A nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ nyↄw na ɩ̃ faara taa bʋↄrↄ ba bↄ̃w a buor sʋbↄ a ba sↄ̃w ba na sɛw ba Ꞌwuoro ʋ ɩ a nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ.
42022025	A be jie, a Jeeju yel ba: “A tẽw na jamansɩ ma fɛrɛ na a ba nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ a ba tʋtʋↄrbↄ ma ɩ a ba bʋↄlↄ ba a vɩlaa-maalba.
42022026	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩmɩ, nyɩ taa ɩ a be a lɛ a nyɩ sↄ̃w wa. Ɩ̃ a nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ a nyɩ sↄ̃w ú ɛ̃ɛ lɩɛb wↄ̃ taa nɩ a bibile, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na ɩ a ni-diere ú wↄ̃ taa nɩ a ʋlↄ na ɩ a tʋ̃tʋnↄ.
42022027	A-na-ɩ ala ɩ̃ ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ? A ʋlↄ na tɩɩr a sↄr a ba poro a dɩb ʋ, mɩɩ a ʋlↄ na poro ʋ? Má a ʋlↄ na tɩɩr a sↄr ɩ̃ ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ. Ɩ̃ a maa, na ɩ a nyɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ be na a nyɩ sↄ̃w wↄ̃ taa nɩ a ʋlↄ na poro.
42022028	“Á nyɩmɩ, nyɩ ɩ na a bala na lãa ɩraa nɩ ma a ɩ̃ won bʋrↄ bʋrↄ pʋↄ,
42022029	ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a ɩ̃ Sãa na biin ma ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a jamana fãw, ɩ̃ mɩ biin nyɩ na a nyɩ na tɛrɛ a jamansɩ fãw.
42022030	A lɛ, sɩ na lãa na dɩrɛ nyuure nɩ a ŋman bõ-ƴen pʋↄ a ɩ̃ fãw pʋↄ. Nyɩ na mɩ jɛ na a naa dakↄↄr jur na nyɩ guoro a Ɩsɩrayɛl bal bʋrↄ bʋrↄ pie-nʼayi ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ.”
42022031	A Jeeju yelʼã: “Sɩmↄ̃, cɛlɛ! A Satã sʋↄrʼã sↄr a ʋ yɛl nyɩ ci kaarɩ̃.
42022032	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ sʋↄrʼã a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w fʋ a fʋ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa kↄ̃ bũburĩ wa. Ɩ̃ a fʋ̃ʋ wa lɛ lɩɛb a fʋ yɛ̃ ɩ̃ wa, fú sũo a fʋ tↄ deme a ba ɩraa cĩcĩ.”
42022033	A Pɩɛr yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ sↄw na na lãa kpɛ nɩ fʋ a kasu pʋↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ lãa kpi nɩ fʋ.”
42022034	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Pɩɛr, ɩ̃ yele fʋ na, a nↄraa kↄ̃ kokolĩ a dɩnaa tɩsↄw naan sɛr wa, ɩ̃ fʋ na cɩɩrɩ̃ na gbɛɛ ata a faa bↄ̃w ma wa.”
42022035	A Jeeju lɛ bↄ̃w na yel ba go: “A mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na dãa tʋ̃ nɩ nyɩ a nu-jaala, a nyaa de a libie, mɩɩ a vɩrwʋↄ, mɩɩ a nafaba wa, bom dãa na ɓↄr nyɩ mɩɩ?” A ba yel ʋ: “Bom ma ɓↄr sɩ wa.”
42022036	Ʋ lɛ yel ba: “Yɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ libie, ú de tɛrɛ a ʋ ɩ̃ganɩ̃, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a wʋↄ, ú mɩ de tɛrɛ. A ʋlↄ na ma tɛrɛ a sↄ-bãjɩnɛ wa, ú da a ʋ kparʋ lɩɛb da nɩ.
42022037	A-na-ɩ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, ƴɛrɩ̃ be na a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ na sɛw na ta ma. A yelʼã: ʻBa de ʋ na ƴↄ̃w a nɩ-bebe pʋↄ.ʼ Sɩrɛ jaa ʋ, a ala na tor ma tara na a ʋ baarfʋ jie.”
42022038	A ba yel: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, nyɛ, sↄ-bãjɩnsɩ ayi be na ka.” Ʋ yel ba: “A sɛw na lɛ.”
42022039	A Jeeju yi na a tẽw pʋↄ cere a Olivi-tɩɩr tãw juu, a mɩnɛ ʋ na mɩlɩ̃ nɩ, a ʋ par-tuurbe pↄw ʋ cenʼɩ̃.
42022040	A mɩnɛ ba na ta a jie ʋlↄ, ʋ yel ba na: “Nyɩ́ sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn a mɩnɛ nyɩ kↄ̃ wa lo a bɩɩrfʋ pʋↄ wa”,
42022041	ɩ̃ na ʋ taw jãa nɩ ba, wↄ̃ taa nɩ a mɩnɛ a nɩrɛ na ma lↄb a kubir ʋ ta, ɩ̃ lo gburĩ a dume sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn
42022042	yel: “Ɩ̃ Sãa, a ala ɩ fʋ sↄw na, maal a tuo ŋman na ʋ jãa nɩ ma, ɩ̃-cɛ a taa ɩ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na bʋↄrↄ ʋ wa, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a fʋ̃ʋ na bʋↄrↄ.” [
42022043	A be jie, a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnaa kãw yi na a saꞋlon ɩ̃ suu nyɩr ʋ, kʋrↄ ʋ a Ꞌlafʋ.
42022044	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na be a ni-sↄbaa pʋↄ, ʋ dãa na nyɩrɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn, a ʋ hanfʋ lɩɛb wↄ̃ taa nɩ jɩ̃ɩ na Ꞌlɛmɛ a tene.]
42022045	A mɩnɛ ʋ na sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn baar, ʋ irʼã lɩɛb cen a ʋ par-tuurbe jie na nyɛ ba a suur sãw ba a ba gã gure.
42022046	Ʋ yel ba: “Mɩnɛ a ɩ a nyɩ gã gure a lɛ? Nyɩ́ ir sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn, kↄ̃ wa kpɛ a bɩɩrfʋ pʋↄ wa.”
42022047	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na cãa ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃, nɩbɛ wa na ta. A Judasɩ na ɩ a par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi ƴen sʋbↄ, ɩ̃ dãa tɛrɛ ba wa nɩ, ɩ̃ taw ta a Jeeju a ʋ worĩfʋ ɩnɛ.
42022048	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Judasɩ, a worĩfʋ fʋ na worĩ a Nɩbɛ Bie ƴↄ̃w ʋ a ʋ sama-deme nur pʋↄ?”
42022049	A Jeeju tↄ deme nyɛ na a ala nↄↄ tara, ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, sɩ́ de a sↄ-bãjɩnsɩ cɛ nɩ ba mɩɩ?”
42022050	Ɩ̃ a bõ-ƴen a ba sↄ̃w cɛ na a Naaŋmɩn baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ tʋ̃tʋnↄ dʋrɩ̃ toor ŋmaa lɛ hab!
42022051	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju yelʼã: “A sɛw na. Nyɩ́ bar lɛ!” Ɩ̃ na ʋ sɩɩr a daba ʋlↄ toor ʋ lɛ ɓↄ̃ pↄw.
42022052	Ɩ̃ ʋ soor a Naaŋmɩn baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn yir gugurbe nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a Jufisɩ ni-dierbe na wa a ʋ nyↄwfʋ jie: “Nyanyuur ɩ̃ ɩ a nyɩ waara nɩ sↄ-bãjɩnsɩ nɩ gʋdɛɛ a ɩ̃ nyↄwfʋ jie mɩɩ?
42022053	Sɩ ma dãa na lãa be taa bio bio jaa a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ nyaa dãa ir a nyɩ nuu sɩɩrʼɩ̃ ma wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a ɩ na a nyɩ daar, nɩ a libe fãw daar.”
42022054	Ba nyↄw na a Jeeju cenʼɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yir ɩ̃ a Pɩɛr be nɩdaa tuure ba.
42022055	A mɩnɛ ba na gbↄw a vũu a gbalɩ̃ pʋↄ jɛ nɩ, a Pɩɛr mɩ pↄw ba na jɛ nɩ.
42022056	A tʋ̃tʋ̃-poole nyɛ ʋ na a vũu na caarɩ̃ ɩ̃ Ꞌwuor ʋ kir-kir-kir ɩ̃ yel: “A daba na mɩ dãa na be nɩ ʋ.”
42022057	A Pɩɛr cɩɩrɩ̃ yel: “Poole wee, maa bↄ̃w ʋ wa.”
42022058	A ɩ na fɩ̃ɩ, nɩsaa kpee lɛ nyɛ ʋ na ɩ̃ yel: “A fʋ̃ʋ, fʋ mɩ be na a nɩbɛ bala pʋↄ.” A Pɩɛr yel ʋ: “Daba wee, maa be tↄ wa.”
42022059	A ɩ na fɩ̃ɩ a nɩ-kpee lɛ yel go: “Baalʋ̃ʋ ma be be wa, a daba na mɩ dãa na be nɩ ʋ, a-na-ɩ ʋ ɩ na a Galile nɩrɛ.”
42022060	A Pɩɛr yel: “Daba wee, maa bↄ̃w a ala fʋ na yele wa.” Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na cãa cɩɩrɛ, nↄraa kokolĩ na a jie naan.
42022061	A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ŋmelĩ Ꞌwuor a Pɩɛr kir-kir-kir, a Pɩɛr tɩɛr yuo a ala a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na dãa yel ʋ, áa nↄraa kↄ̃ kokolĩ a tɩsↄw na sɛr wa, ɩ̃ a Pɩɛr na cɩɩrɩ̃ na gbɛɛ ata a Ꞌwaa bↄ̃w ʋ wa.
42022062	Ɩ̃ a Pɩɛr irʼã yi yẽw kõ kõ-tuo ma ɩ ala wa.
42022063	A dabsɩ bala na gu a Jeeju, laara ʋ na pↄbↄ nɩ ʋ.
42022064	Ba lũ ʋ na a nii-sↄw pↄw ɩ̃ yele ʋ: “Ala ɩ̃ ŋme fʋ? Bↄ̃w a sʋbↄ!”
42022065	Ɩ̃ na ba lɛ tʋ tʋ ʋ tʋ-bi-yaw go.
42022066	A mɩnɛ a bio na vɩɛ, a Jufisɩ ni-dierbe nɩ a ba baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ba ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ kpaarɩ̃ na taa a ba ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ guorfʋ jie. Ba ɩ na a ba taw a Jeeju wɩ nɩ a ba nii-sↄw,
42022067	a ba yel ʋ: “A ala ɩ fʋ̃ʋ ɩ a Kirisi, yel kʋ sɩ.” Ʋ yel ba: “A maa yel nyɩ, nyɩ kↄ̃ sↄw wa,
42022068	ɩ̃ a maa soor nyɩ bom, nyɩ kↄ̃ haa ma nʋↄr wa.
42022069	Ɩ̃-cɛ wa nyↄw nɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ a Nɩbɛ Bie na jɛ na a Fãw Sʋbↄ Naaŋmɩn dʋrɩ̃ loor.”
42022070	A be jie, ba jaa soor ʋ na: “Fʋ sɩrɩ̃ na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Bie?” Ʋ yel ba: “A lɛ nyɩ na yel, a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ sɩrɩ̃ ɩ.”
42022071	A mɩnɛ a na be a lɛ, ba yelʼã: “Bõ ɩnɛ sɩ lɛ cãa bʋↄrↄ nɩbɛ a ba na wa man ƴɛrɩ̃ a ʋ ɩnɛ? A-na-ɩ a sɩ jaa wõ na a ala na yi a ʋ nʋↄr pʋↄ.”
42023001	A bala ba jaa na kpaarɩ̃ taa irʼã taw a Jeeju cenʼɩ̃ a Pɩlatɩ nii-sↄw,
42023002	na ba nyↄw ɩ̃ dↄↄlↄ ʋ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ yele: “Sɩ nyɛ na a daba na ʋ sãwna a nɩbɛ jur, yele ba a ba taa yara a lãpo kʋrↄ a jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ wa. Ʋ mɩ yele na a ʋlↄ tↄr jaa ɩ̃ ɩ a Kirisi, a lɛ yelʼã a jamana.”
42023003	A Pɩlatɩ soor ʋ na: “Fʋ̃ʋ ɩ a Jufisɩ jamana?” A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A lɛ fʋ na yel ʋ.”
42023004	A be jie, a Pɩlatɩ yelʼã a Naaŋmɩn baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛ: “Maa nyɛ cɛfʋ jie fɩ̃ɩ a daba na jie wa.”
42023005	Ɩ̃-cɛ ba jaarʼã ɩ̃ yele: “Ʋ tↄrↄ na a nɩbɛ ƴↄnↄ a ba dama a tẽw nɩ a ʋ jaanfʋ ʋ na jaana ba. A Galile ʋ nyↄw, ɩ̃ wa yi nɩ a Jude wɩɛr ʋ jaa pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ ta na a ka.”
42023006	A lɛ a Pɩlatɩ na wõ a ala, ʋ soorʼã a ala ɩ a Galile a daba na yi.
42023007	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na man ʋ áa Jeeju yi na a wɩɛr ʋlↄ a jamana Ɛrↄdɩ na Ꞌwuoro, ʋ ɩ na a ba cenʼɩ̃ ʋ a ʋ sɛ̃, a-na-ɩ a Ɛrↄdɩ mɩ dãa na be be a Jerujalɛm a ʋna daarʼãa.
42023008	A mɩnɛ a Ɛrↄdɩ na nyɛ a Jeeju, nʋ̃ↄ ƴala ʋ na a-na-ɩ a korĩ-cɛ jaa ʋ dãa na wõ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ʋ nyɛ ʋ. Ʋ mɩ dãa na bʋↄrↄ ʋ nyɛ ʋ ʋ maal nↄ-kofʋ tʋn.
42023009	Ʋ soorʼã a Jeeju yel-yayaw, ɩ̃-cɛ Ꞌwaa haa nʋↄr cↄw ʋ wa.
42023010	Ɩ̃ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ ɩraa na a be dↄↄlↄ a Jeeju a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ nɩ kpɛ̃w.
42023011	A Ɛrↄdɩ nɩ a ʋ sↄdaalsɩ maal ʋ na kpana, ɩ̃ la la ʋ, ɩ̃ pãa de kpar-vɩlaa lↄb yarɩ̃ ʋ, ɩ̃ a Ɛrↄdɩ ɩ a ba lɛ lɩɛb-ʼɩ̃ ʋ cenʼɩ̃ a Pɩlatɩ sɛ̃.
42023012	A Ɛrↄdɩ nɩ a Pɩlatɩ dãa na ɩ taa sama-deme a korĩ-cɛ, ɩ̃ a ʋna bibir ba lɩɛbʼã ɩ badɛɛ.
42023013	A Pɩlatɩ kpaarɩ̃ na a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a tẽw nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛ jaa,
42023014	ɩ̃ yel ba: “Nyɩ wa nɩ na a daba na a ɩ̃ sɛ̃ ɩ̃ yel á ʋ sãwna na a nɩbɛ jur. Ɩ̃ nyɩ́ nyɛ, ɩ̃ Ꞌlo na a ʋ ben a nyɩ nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ maa nyɛ cɛfʋ jie fɩ̃ɩ a daba na jie a ala nyɩ na dↄↄlↄ a ʋ juu wa.
42023015	A Ɛrↄdɩ ma mɩ nyɛ cɛfʋ jie a ʋ sɛ̃ wa. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ lɛ tɩɩr ʋ kʋ sɩ. Nyɩ́ nyɛ, a daba na ma maal bom kãw a sɛw a ba na kú ʋ wa.
42023016	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ na ɩ na a ba fↄb ʋ nɩ kpaara, ɩ̃ cɛ ʋ bar.” [
42023017	A Pakɩ fɛtɩ daar, a Pɩlatɩ sɛw na ʋ ma yuo kasu sʋbↄ bõ-ƴen bar kʋ ba.]
42023018	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ba jaa fɛw nyↄw na ɩ̃ lãa wuure yele: “Kú a daba na bar! Ɩ̃ yuo a Barabasɩ kʋ sɩ!”
42023019	(Damfʋ kãw dãa na ta be a tẽw pʋↄ a Barabasɩ kú nɩrɛ a ba nyↄw ʋ pↄw a kasu pʋↄ.)
42023020	A mɩnɛ a Pɩlatɩ na bʋↄrↄ ʋ bar a Jeeju, ʋ lɛ bↄ̃w na bʋↄl a nɩbɛ ƴɛrʼɩ̃.
42023021	Ɩ̃-cɛ ba wuure na yele nɩ: “Kpa ʋ yaal! Kpa ʋ yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu!”
42023022	A Pɩlatɩ lɛ bↄ̃w na soor ba a ɩ gbɛɛ ata: “Fãa buor ʋ maal? Maa nyɛ cɛfʋ jie fɩ̃ɩ a ʋ jie na ƴↄnↄ ʋ a kũu ƴɛrɩ̃ wa. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ na ɩ na a ba fↄb ʋ nɩ a kpaara ɩ̃ cɛ ʋ bar.”
42023023	Ɩ̃-cɛ ba jaarʼã ɩ̃ nyɩrɩ̃ wuure nɩ kpɛ̃w yele a ba kpa ʋ yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu, ɩ̃ a ba wuurfʋ tʋↄ a Pɩlatɩ
42023024	ʋ sↄw bar sↄr a na maal a mɩnɛ ba na sʋↄrↄ ʋ.
42023025	Ʋ yuo na a daba ʋlↄ ba na dãa sʋↄrↄ bar, na ɩ a ʋlↄ na dãa dam a tẽw kú nɩ a nɩrɛ a ba nyↄw ʋ ƴↄ̃w a kasu pʋↄ, ɩ̃ bar a Jeeju ƴↄ̃w a ba nurɩ̃ a ba na maal ʋ a ala ba na bʋↄrↄ.
42023026	A mɩnɛ ba na cere nɩ a Jeeju, ba tuorʼɩ̃ na a Sɩɩrɛn-tẽw nɩrɛ kãw na dɩ Sɩmↄ̃, ʋ yi a puo pʋↄ ɩ̃ waara, a sↄdaalsɩ fɛr ʋ ƴↄ̃w ʋ tuo a nɩ-kʋ-daa tuure nɩ a Jeeju.
42023027	A tẽw nɩbɛ yayaw mɩ dãa na tuure ʋ, lãa nɩ a pↄↄbↄ na kono waala nɩ ƴↄnↄ ʋ.
42023028	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju ŋmelĩ na yel ba: “Jerujalɛm pↄↄbↄ, nyɩ taa kono a maa ɩnɛ wa! Nyɩ́ ɛ̃ɛ kono a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ ɩnɛ nɩ a nyɩ bibiir ɩnɛ!
42023029	A-na-ɩ a daar na ta na, ba na yelʼã áa nʋmↄ a pↄↄbↄ bala na ab, nɩ a bala na ma dↄw a bie wa, ɩ̃ mɩ nʋmↄ a bala na ma dãa ƴɛn a bie wa.
42023030	A be ba na nyↄw ɩ̃ yele a tã-bɛrɛ: ʻNyɩ́ lo pↄw sɩ!ʼ ɩ̃ mɩ yele a tã-bil: ʻNyɩ́ piw sɩ!ʼ
42023031	A-na-ɩ a ala ɩ ba maalʼã a da-ɓaar a nↄhↄ̃, mɩnɛ a na be nɩ a da-kõw?”
42023032	Ba mɩ taw na nɩbɛ ayi na ɩ nɩ-bebe cenʼɩ̃ a ba na lãa kú ba nɩ a Jeeju.
42023033	A mɩnɛ ba na ta a jie ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a “Juŋman jie,” ba kpa na a Jeeju yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu a be, ɩ̃ mɩ kpa a nɩ-bebe ayi bala, a bõ-ƴen be a ʋ dʋrɩ̃ loor, ɩ̃ a kãw be a ʋ gʋbaa loor.
42023034	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju yelʼã: “Ɩ̃ Sãa, de bar kʋ ba, a-na-ɩ baa bↄ̃w a ala ba na maala wa.” Ɩ̃ ba de na gbãbie lↄb po nɩ a ʋ cẽcene.
42023035	A nɩbɛ ɩraa na a be ɩ̃ Ꞌwuoro ʋ. A Jufisɩ nɩ-bɛrɛ kpɛrɛ ʋ na yele: “Ʋ faa na a nɩbɛ. A ala ɩ ʋ ɩ na a Kirisi, a ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na vɛl ir, ú mɩ faa a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ!”
42023036	A sↄdaalsɩ mɩ laara ʋ na, ɩ̃ taw ta ture ʋ dã-ɓiirũu yele nɩ:
42023037	“A ala ɩ fʋ̃ʋ ɩ a Jufisɩ jamana, lɩɛb faa a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ!”
42023038	Ba mɩ dãa na sɛb a ƴɛr-bie na yaal a ʋ ju-sↄ̃w: “A naa ɩ̃ ɩ a Jufisɩ jamana.”
42023039	A nɩ-bebe bala ba na kpa yaal bõ-ƴen tʋrↄ ʋ na yele nɩ: “Aa ɩ a Kirisi fʋ ɩ wa? Lɩɛb faa a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ mɩ faa sɩ!”
42023040	Ɩ̃-cɛ a kãw ʋlↄ gala ʋ na yele nɩ: “Faa jↄrↄ Naaŋmɩn wa mɩɩ? A-na-ɩ a fʋ̃ʋ, fʋ mɩ be na a ʋna kpãafʋ naa pʋↄ.
42023041	A ala ɩ a sɩ jie ʋ, a kpãafʋ ʋlↄ torʼã, a-na-ɩ sɩ pↄw na a ala na sɛw nɩ a sɩ maal-bie, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ, Ꞌwaa sãw bom kãw pʋↄ fɩ̃ɩ wa.”
42023042	Ɩ̃ ʋ lɛ yelʼã: “Jeeju, tɩɛr bↄ̃w nɩ ma a lɛ fʋ nↄↄ waara nɩ a fʋ fãw.”
42023043	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele fʋ, a dɩnaa naan, fʋ na lãa na be nɩ ma a Naaŋmɩn ji-vɩlaa pʋↄ.”
42023044	A mↄtↄ̃w dãa na pɩɛlɛ a ju-sↄ̃w, ɩ̃ a ʋ cãa bↄr, a wɩɛr liw a lɛ a gbɛb pↄw a tẽw ʋ jaa lɛɛ wa ta nɩ a mↄtↄ̃w gↄrfʋ daar.
42023045	A cẽcen kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ na yaal a be a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ ɓerʼã ayi,
42023046	ɩ̃ a Jeeju wuurʼɩ̃ kpɛ̃w yel: “Ɩ̃ Sãa, ɩ̃ de na a ɩ̃ sɩɛ bar ƴↄ̃w a fʋ nuumɩ.” A mɩnɛ ʋ na yel a lɛ baar, ʋ ŋmaa na a vʋʋrʋ̃.
42023047	A sↄdal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nyɛ na a ala na ta ɩ̃ kpiire a Naaŋmɩn yele: “Sɩrɛ jaa ʋ, a daba na ɩ na nɩ-toraa.”
42023048	A nɩbɛ ba jaa na dãa kaal taa wa a Ꞌwuorfʋ jie, nyɛ na a ala na ta a nyɩrɩ̃ tↄ ba, a ba lɩɛb waala kule nɩ.
42023049	A Jeeju badɛɛ ba jaa lãa nɩ a pↄↄbↄ bala na dãa tu ʋ a Galile wa ta nɩ a be, ɩraa na nɩdaa ɩ̃ Ꞌwuoro a ala na tara.
42023050	-
42023051	Daba kãw dãa na be be na dɩ Jojɛfʋ. Ʋ yi na a Arimate na ɩ a Jufisɩ tẽw. Ʋ ɩ na pʋ-pɩlaa sʋbↄ nɩ nɩ-toraa, ɩ̃ dãa jɛ cɛlɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw waa. Ʋ mɩ dãa na be a ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ pʋↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ Ꞌwaa dãa sↄw a ala a ʋ ƴɛr-guor-tↄ deme na vɛl ir maal wa.
42023052	A daba ʋlↄ cenʼã a Pɩlatɩ sɛ̃ na sʋↄr á ʋ kʋ ʋ a kũu.
42023053	A ala ɩ̃ baar, ʋ yaw na a kũu suu nɩ ɩ̃ de cẽcen pɩlaa vilĩ pↄw ʋ, ɩ̃ ũu ʋ a yaa kãw pʋↄ ba na dãa kpu kubir pan juu, ɩ̃ a yaa ʋlↄ pʋↄ baa dãa ũu nɩrɛ be sɛr wa.
42023054	A dãa na ɩ a bibi-ciiraa gbɛɛrɩ̃fʋ bibir, ɩ̃ a bibi-ciiraa tara na a ʋ nyↄwfʋ jie.
42023055	A pↄↄbↄ bala na dãa pↄw a Jeeju a Galile wa ta nɩ a be, tu na a Jojɛfʋ. Ba Ꞌwuorʼã a yaa ɩ̃ mɩ nyɛ a mɩnɛ ba na gaal a kũu a be.
42023056	A ala ɩ̃ baar, ba lɩɛbʼã kulʼɩ̃ gbɛɛrɩ̃ a mↄ-nyuu nɩ a kã-nyu-vɩlaa a kũu jɛfʋ ɩnɛ. Ɩ̃ a bibi-ciiraa dayen, ba pɩɛnʼã a mɩnɛ a na yel a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn pʋↄ.
42024001	A jɩmaasɩ bibir dayen, a pↄↄbↄ bala ca na ir de a mↄ-nyuu ala ba na dãa gbɛɛrɩ̃ cenʼɩ̃ a yaa pʋↄ.
42024002	Ba nyɛ na a yaa kubir ʋ bilĩ ɩ̃ cɛ a yaa nʋↄr bar,
42024003	a ba kpɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ baa nyɛ a kũu wa.
42024004	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na cãa tɩɛrɛ ma bↄ̃w a par wa, dabsɩ ayi na su cẽcene na nyɩnyɩlɛ nyɩr ba na,
42024005	a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyɩrɩ̃ nyↄw ba a ba surĩ a jur. A dabsɩ bala yel ba: “Bõ ɩnɛ nyɩ bʋↄrↄ a ʋlↄ na ɩ a nɩ-mimir a kũusɩ sↄ̃w?
42024006	ꞋWaa be a ka wa; ʋ irʼã a kũu pʋↄ. Nyɩ́ tɩɛr bↄ̃w nɩ a ala ʋ na yel nyɩ a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa cãa be a Galile,
42024007	a á sɛw na a ba na nyↄw a Nɩbɛ Bie ƴↄ̃w a maal-faar deme nurɩ̃, á ba na kpa ʋ na yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu, ɩ̃ a bibie ata dayen á ʋ na irʼã a kũu pʋↄ.”
42024008	Ɩ̃ a pↄↄbↄ tɩɛrʼã yuo a Jeeju ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ,
42024009	ɩ̃ lɩɛb kulʼɩ̃ man a ala a jaa, kʋ a par-tuurbe pie-nɩ-bõ-ƴen, nɩ a ba tↄ deme ba jaa.
42024010	A bala na man a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ ɩ na a Madala Maarɩɩ, nɩ a Jaan, nɩ a Maarɩɩ na ɩ a Jakɩ mã. A pↄↄbↄ bala ba na lãa be nɩ taa, mɩ manʼã a ʋna ƴɛr-bõ-ƴen kʋ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ,
42024011	ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ ma sↄw wa, a-na-ɩ ba tɩɛrʼã á burbur ba ƴɛrɛ.
42024012	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Pɩɛr irʼã jↄ cen a yaa par, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na muul Ꞌwuor ʋ nyɛ na a kũu cẽcene tɛw, a ko ʋ nʋↄr ʋ lɩɛb kule tɩɛrɛ nɩ a ala na ta.
42024013	A ʋna bibirʼãa, par-tuurbe ayi dãa na cere tẽ-bile kãw pʋↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Emayisi. A be nɩ a Jerujalɛm ɩ na kilo pie-nɩ-bõ-ƴen.
42024014	Ba dãa na mana taa cere nɩ a yele ala a jaa na dãa ta.
42024015	A mɩnɛ ba na mana taa sooro nɩ taa, a Jeeju mɩ̃ɛ pↄw ba na lãa cere nɩ.
42024016	A ba mimie nyɛ ʋ na, ɩ̃-cɛ baa tʋↄ bↄ̃w a ala ʋ na ɩ wa.
42024017	A Jeeju soor ba: “Bõ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ nyɩ mana taa cere nɩ?” A ni-sↄbaa kpɛ ba a ba ɩraa,
42024018	ɩ̃ a bõ-ƴen ba na bʋↄlↄ a Kilopasɩ yel ʋ: “A fʋ̃ʋ tɛw be a Jerujalɛm ma bↄ̃w a ala na dãa ta a be a yɛ̃yɛ̃ na wa mɩɩ?”
42024019	Ʋ soor ba: “Yel bõ nʋmↄ ʋ?” A ba yel ʋ: “A ala na ta a Najarɛtɩ Jeeju. Yɛr-hiere ʋ dãa ɩ, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn nɩ a nɩbɛ jaa nyɛ ʋ na, a fãw be a ʋ tʋmↄ pʋↄ nɩ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ pʋↄ.
42024020	Ɩ̃ a sɩ baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a sɩ ni-dierbe nyↄw ʋ na tɩɩr a ba ƴↄ̃w ʋ a kũu ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ kpa ʋ yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu.
42024021	A sɩmɩ, sɩ dãa na tɩɛrɛ a ʋlↄ nↄↄ faa Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ. Ɩ̃-cɛ aa ɩ a ala tɛw ʋ wa; a bibie ata nɩ a dɩnaa a yele ala na ta.
42024022	Ɩ̃-cɛ a pↄↄbↄ ŋmɛɛ na be a sɩ pʋↄ ko sɩ na nʋↄr. Ba ca na ir cen a yaa pʋↄ a dɩnaa
42024023	ɩ̃-cɛ baa nyɛ a kũu wa. Ba mɩ lɩɛbʼã wa na man sɩ a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ nyɩr ba na, ɩ̃ yel kʋ ba áa Jeeju ɩ na nɩ-mimir.
42024024	A sɩ tↄ deme ŋmɛɛ cenʼã a be a yaa pʋↄ na ba nyɛ a yele a jaa a be a mɩnɛ a pↄↄbↄ na dãa yel. Ɩ̃-cɛ baa nyɛ a ʋlↄ tↄr jaa wa.”
42024025	A be jie, a Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ faa na yɛ̃! Nyaa sↄw nɩ puor a ala a jaa a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe na yel wa.
42024026	Aa dãa sɛw a Kirisi na nyɛ a hʋʋr a lɛ ɩ̃ pãa yi a yuor wa mɩɩ?”
42024027	Ɩ̃ ʋ man ba na a yele ala na be a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ a ʋ ɩnɛ, nyↄw nɩ a sɛbsɩ ala a Mowisi na sɛb, cen na de nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe sɛbsɩ a jaa.
42024028	A mɩnɛ ba na tara a tẽw ʋlↄ pʋↄ ba na cere, a Jeeju maalʼã wↄ̃ taa nɩ ʋ poro na.
42024029	Ɩ̃-cɛ ba gↄw ʋ na ɩ̃ yel: “Gã a ka a sɩ jie a-na-ɩ a jaanʋↄr gↄrʼã ta ɩ̃ a wɩɛr liwre,” ʋ kpɛ a be a ba jie.
42024030	A mɩnɛ ʋ na lãa jɛ nɩ ba a dɩb dɩfʋ jie, ʋ de na a buru, ɩ̃ puor a Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃ nyↄw ŋmaa kʋ ba,
42024031	a mimie yuo ba a ba bↄ̃w ʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ bↄrʼã a ba nii-sↄw a jie naan.
42024032	Ba yele na kʋrↄ taa: “Má a nʋ̃ↄ dãa na nyↄw sɩ a lɛ ʋ na ƴɛrʼɩ̃ sɩ a sↄr juu ɩ̃ man sɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ par,”
42024033	a ba ir a jie naan lɩɛb cen a Jerujalɛm. A be ba nyɛ na a par-tuurbe pie-nɩ-bõ-ƴen na kpaarɩ̃ taa nɩ a ba tↄ deme.
42024034	Ba yelʼã kʋ a bala ayi na ta: “A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sɩrɩ̃ na ir a kũu pʋↄ! Ʋ nyɩrʼã a Sɩmↄ̃.”
42024035	A ayi bala mɩ man kʋ a par-tuurbe a ala na dãa ta ba a sↄr juu, nɩ a mɩnɛ ba na dãa bↄ̃w a Jeeju a lɛ ʋ na ŋmara a buru.
42024036	A mɩnɛ ba na cãa ƴɛrɛ a lɛ, a Jeeju mɩ̃ɛ ta na ɩraa a ba sↄ̃w ɩ̃ yel ba: “Su-ɓaar ú be nɩ nyɩ.”
42024037	A pʋlɩ̃nyɛ vʋ̃ↄ ba a ba tɩɛr beeka nɩ-kpɩɩn ʋ.
42024038	Ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ yel ba na: “Bõ ɩnɛ a suur dama nyɩ a nyɩ baala ma a nyɩ pʋ̃ↄ?
42024039	Nyɩ́ Ꞌwuor nyɛ a ɩ̃ nur nɩ a ɩ̃ gbɛɛ, ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka maa ʋ, sɩrɛ jaa. Nyɩ́ sɩɩr ma nyɛ, a-na-ɩ a nɩ-kpɩɩn maa tɛrɛ nɩn nɩ a kↄbↄ a ɩ̃ kaarɩ̃ wa.”
42024040	Ɩ̃ na ʋ miilʼɩ̃ ba a fala na be a ʋ nur nɩ a ʋ gbɛɛ pʋↄ.
42024041	A nʋ̃ↄ tɩɩ na nyɩrɩ̃ nyↄw ba a baa bↄ̃w sↄw nɩ puor sɛr wa, ɩ̃ ɩraa a nↄɛ ko ba. Ála-ɩ̃-sↄ a Jeeju soor ba a ala ɩ bõ-dɩraa be na be,
42024042	a ba kʋ ʋ jɩm-bir ŋmãa ba na cɩ̃ɩ,
42024043	ʋ de Ꞌwↄb a ba nii-sↄw.
42024044	A ala ɩ̃ baar, ʋ yel ba na: “Nyɩ́ nyɛ a ala ɩ̃ na ma dãa yele nyɩ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na dãa cãa be nɩ nyɩ. Ɩ̃ yelʼã áa ala a jaa na sɛb a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn sɛbɛ pʋↄ, nɩ a ƴɛr-hierbe sɛbsɩ pʋↄ, nɩ a Pɛwfʋ sɛbɛ pʋↄ, a sɛw na a na ta a lɛ.”
42024045	Ɩ̃ ʋ caarɩ̃ na a ba sube a ba bↄ̃w a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ par,
42024046	miilʼɩ̃ ba a mɩnɛ a na sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ áa Kirisi sɛw na na nyɛ hʋʋr kpi, ɩ̃ pãa ir a kũu pʋↄ a bibie ata dayen.
42024047	Áa mɩ sɛw na ba de a ʋ yuor cenʼɩ̃ na hier kʋ a nɩbɛ, á bá lɩɛb a ba yɛ̃ a Naaŋmɩn na de a ba maal-faar bar kʋ ba. Á bá nyↄw be a Jerujalɛm ɩ̃ cen na ta nɩ a nɩ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ba jaa jie.
42024048	Ɩ̃ ʋ lɛ yelʼã go: “A nyɩmɩ na nyɛ a yele a mɩnɛ a na ta, nyɩmɩ na man kʋ a nɩbɛ.
42024049	Ɩ̃ a maa, ɩ̃ na tʋ̃ na a ʋlↄ a ɩ̃ Sãa na pʋlɩ̃ nɩ nyɩ, ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, nyɩ́ jɛ a Jerujalɛm-tẽw pʋↄ wa ta nɩ a daar ʋlↄ a saa juu fãw na suure pↄwrↄ nyɩ.”
42024050	A ala ɩ̃ baar, ʋ tɛrɛ na a ʋ par-tuurbe cenʼɩ̃ a Betani-tẽw loor, ɩ̃ tur a nur sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn sũofʋ ƴↄ̃w ba.
42024051	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na cãa sʋↄrↄ ƴↄnↄ ba, ʋ ŋmaa na yi a ba sↄ̃w duoro a Naaŋmɩn tẽw.
42024052	Ɩ̃ a bala, a mɩnɛ ba na puor ʋ baar, nʋ̃ↄ ƴala ba na a ba lɩɛb kul a Jerujalɛm,
42024053	ɩ̃ ma cere a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ a daar a jaa na pɛwrɛ a Naaŋmɩn.
43001001	A lɛ a tẽw na ma dãa be be sɛr wa, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na ɩ a Yɛrɩ̃ de na nĩe be be. A ʋna Yɛrɩ̃ be nɩ na a Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃ a Yɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn.
43001002	Ʋ be nɩ na a Naaŋmɩn a korĩ-cɛ jaa.
43001003	Ʋlↄ ɩ̃ maal a yele a jaa. Bom ma be be ʋ na ma maal wa.
43001004	A baafʋ be na a ʋ jie ɩ̃ a baafʋ ʋlↄ ɩ na cãa a nɩbɛ jie.
43001005	A cãa caara na a libe pʋↄ ɩ̃ a libe ma tʋↄ ʋ wa.
43001006	Daba kãw dãa na be be a Naaŋmɩn na tʋ̃, a ʋ yuor dɩ a Jã.
43001007	Ʋ wa na na ɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛr-mana, na ʋ mana a cãa ƴɛrɩ̃, a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ ba jaa na tʋↄ tɛrɛ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa.
43001008	A ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ ma ɩ a cãa wa, ɩ̃ ʋ ɛ̃ɛ na wa na mana a cãa ƴɛrɩ̃.
43001009	A cãa ʋlↄ ɩ na a yel-mɩ̃ɛ cãa na waara a tẽw pʋↄ caara a nɩbɛ ba jaa.
43001010	Ʋ dãa na be a tẽw pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ maal a tẽw, ɩ̃-cɛ a tẽw nɩbɛ ma dãa bↄ̃w ʋ wa.
43001011	Ʋ wa na a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ tẽw, ɩ̃ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ nɩbɛ ma sↄw de ʋ wa.
43001012	Ɩ̃-cɛ a bala na sↄw de ʋ tɛrɛ nɩ ʋ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa, ʋ kʋ ba na sↄr a ba lɩɛb ɩ a Naaŋmɩn bibiir.
43001013	A dↄwfʋ ʋlↄ ma ɩ a tẽw na dↄwfʋ wa; aa mɩ yi nɩrɛ pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ pʋↄ, mɩɩ daba tɩɛrʋ̃ pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ ɩ a ba Sãa.
43001014	A Yɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ lɩɛbʼã ɩ nɩrɛ, ɩ̃ jɛ a sɩ sↄ̃w. Sɩ nyɛ na a ʋ yo-yifʋ na ɩ a yo-yifʋ ʋlↄ a Bi-dab-daadaa na pↄw a ʋ Sãa jie. A ʋ maalfʋ nyɩrɩ̃ na vɩɛlɛ, ɩ̃ ʋ mɩ ɩ na yel-mɩ̃ɛ sʋbↄ.
43001015	A Jã ƴɛrɛ na a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩ kpɛ̃w yele: “A naa ɩnɛ ɩ̃ dãa yele nyɩ áa ʋlↄ na be a ɩ̃ puorɩ̃ waara ɩ na kpɛ̃ɛ a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ ʋ dãa na de nĩe be be ɩ̃ a ba wa bɩɛr dↄw ma.”
43001016	A maal-vɩlaa a jaa yi na a ʋ jie ma ƴala waara a sɩ jie dↄↄlↄ taa.
43001017	A-na-ɩ a Mowisi a Naaŋmɩn kʋ a ƴɛr-kpɛn ʋ tɩɩr, ɩ̃-cɛ a maal-vɩlaa nɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ yi na a Jeeju-Kirisi jie.
43001018	Nɩ-bõ-ƴen ma dãa nyɛ a Naaŋmɩn wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a Bi-dab-daadaa na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn, na be a Sãa lõboorɩ̃, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ miil a nɩbɛ a ba bↄ̃w ʋ.
43001019	A daar ʋlↄ a Jufisɩ bala na be a Jerujalɛm na dãa tʋ̃ a Naaŋmɩn baar-lorbo nɩ a Naaŋmɩn yir tʋ̃tʋnbↄ a ba soor a Jã-Batii á ala ʋ ɩ, nyɩ́ nyɛ a ala ʋ na dãa man ba.
43001020	ꞋWaa sↄↄlɩ̃ ba wa, ɩ̃ ʋ yel ba na cãa pʋↄ: “Aa ɩ maa ɩ̃ ɩ a Kirisi wa.”
43001021	Ba lɛ soor ʋ na: “Ɩ̃ ala fʋ ɩ? A Eli fʋ ɩ mɩɩ?” A Jã yel: “Maa ɩ a ʋlↄ wa.” A ba lɛ soor ʋ: “Fʋ̃ʋ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere ʋlↄ mɩɩ?” Ʋ yel: “Kpee!”
43001022	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ba soor ʋ na: “Ɩ̃ ala tↄr fʋ ɩ? A sɛw na a fʋ na yel sɩ a sʋbↄ ʋlↄ fʋ na ɩ, a sɩ yel kʋ a bala na tʋ̃ sɩ.”
43001023	A Jã yel ba: “Ɩ̃ ɩ na a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ kↄkɩr na yire a wɛkar pʋↄ yele: Nyɩ́ cↄↄrɩ̃ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sↄr bar ʋ tor,” a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere Ejayi na dãa yel.
43001024	A bala ba na tʋ̃ a Jã jie, Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ be na tↄ
43001025	ɩ̃ soor ʋ: “A fʋ na ma ɩ a Kirisi wa, ma mɩ ɩ a Eli wa, ma ɩ a ʋna Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere wa, bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a fʋ mʋrↄ a nɩbɛ a kʋ̃ↄ?”
43001026	A Jã yel ba: “A maa, kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ ɩ̃ mʋrↄ nyɩ, ɩ̃-cɛ nɩrɛ be na a nyɩ sↄ̃w nyɩ na ma bↄ̃w wa.
43001027	Ʋ be na a ɩ̃ puor waara ɩ̃ maa ɩ bom na tʋↄ gũu sɩɩr a ʋ nafaba wa.”
43001028	A ala a jaa maalʼã a Betani na be a Jʋrdɛ̃ man gaan, a jie ʋlↄ a Jã na dãa mʋrↄ a nɩbɛ a kʋ̃ↄ.
43001029	A dɩvɩɛ bio, a Jã nyɛ na a Jeeju ʋ wɩɛrɛ a ʋ sɛ̃, ʋ yel: “Nyɩ́ nyɛ a Naaŋmɩn Pẽle na ire a tẽw nɩbɛ maal-fãa bara.
43001030	A ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ dãa ƴɛr a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na yel á daba be na a ɩ̃ puorɩ̃ waara na ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ ʋ dãa na de nĩe be be ɩ̃ a ba wa bɩɛr dↄw ma.
43001031	Ɩ̃ a maa, maa dãa bↄ̃w a nɩ-buor ʋ na ɩ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ wa na na mʋrↄ a nɩbɛ a kʋ̃ↄ a mɩnɛ a na tʋↄ maal a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ a ba bↄ̃w ʋ.”
43001032	A Jã lɛ yelʼã: “Ɩ̃ nyɛ na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ʋ yi a saꞋlon wↄ̃ taa nɩ a ŋmam ɩ̃ suure waara na lo a ʋ juu.
43001033	Maa dãa bↄ̃w a sʋbↄ ʋlↄ ʋ na ɩ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma ɩ̃ mʋrↄ a nɩbɛ a kʋ̃ↄmɩ, ʋ dãa na yel ma á ɩ̃ nↄↄ nyɛ na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ʋ suure na lo a daba juu, áa daba ʋlↄ ɩ̃ nↄↄ mʋrↄ a nɩbɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ pʋↄ.
43001034	Ɩ̃ a maa, ɩ̃ nyɛ na a ala ɩ̃ mana kʋrↄ nyɩ a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Bie.”
43001035	A dɩvɩɛ bio, a Jã lɛ be na be nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe ayi
43001036	ɩ̃ nyɛ a Jeeju ʋ tↄlↄ, ʋ yel: “Nyɩ́ nyɛ a Naaŋmɩn Pẽle!”
43001037	A mɩnɛ a par-tuurbe ayi bala na wõ a ala ʋ na ƴɛr, ba tuure na a Jeeju.
43001038	A Jeeju lɩɛbʼã nyɛ a ba tuure ʋ, ʋ soor ba: “Bõ nyɩ bʋↄrↄ?” A ba yel ʋ: “Arabɩ! (A lɛ yelʼã, Jãjaana) Nyɩnɛ fʋ kpɛɛrɛ?”
43001039	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ wa bↄ̃w a jie.” A lɛ, ba cenʼã na nyɛ a jie, ɩ̃ jɛ nɩ ʋ a be a bibir ʋlↄ. A mↄtↄ̃w gↄrfʋ daar ba cen a be.
43001040	A bana nɩbɛ ayi ƴen sʋbↄ na dãa wõ a Jã ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ tuure a Jeeju ɩ na a Ãdire na ɩ a Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr yɛbɛ.
43001041	A Ãdire de na nĩe bↄ a ʋ yɛbɛ Sɩmↄ̃ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Sɩ nyɛ na a Mɛsɩ.” (A lɛ yelʼã, a ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na tʋ̃.)
43001042	Ɩ̃ ʋ taw na a Sɩmↄ̃ cenʼɩ̃ a Jeeju sɛ̃, a Jeeju Ꞌwuor ʋ ɩ̃ yel: “Fʋ ɩ na a Jã bie, Sɩmↄ̃, ɩ̃ ba nↄↄ bʋↄlↄ fʋ na Sefasɩ.” (A lɛ yelʼã, a Pɩɛr.)
43001043	A dɩvɩɛ bio, a Jeeju bʋↄrↄ na ʋ cen a Galile wɩɛr, ɩ̃ a be ʋ nyɛ na a Fɩlɩpɩ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Tuure ma!”
43001044	Ã Fɩlɩpɩ ɩ na a Bɛsada-tẽw nɩrɛ a Ãdire nɩ a Pɩɛr kaarɩ̃.
43001045	A Fɩlɩpɩ bↄ na a Natanɩɛl nyɛ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Sɩ nyɛ na a ʋlↄ a Mowisi na dãa ƴɛr a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ a ƴɛr-kpɛn sɛbɛ pʋↄ, na ɩ a ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe na mɩ dãa ƴɛr a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃. A Jeeju ʋ, na ɩ a Najarɛtɩ Jojɛfʋ bi-daba.”
43001046	A Natanɩɛl yel ʋ: “Bõ-vɩlaa na tʋↄ na yi a Najarɛtɩ-tẽw pʋↄ mɩɩ?” A Fɩlɩpɩ yel ʋ: “Wa su nɩ ʋ a fʋ mimir.”
43001047	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na nyɛ a Natanɩɛl ʋ waara a ʋ sɛ̃, ʋ yelʼã a ʋ ɩnɛ: “Nyɩ́ nyɛ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩrɛ sɩrɛ jaa. Bɛlɩ̃fʋ ma be a ʋ jie fɩ̃ɩ wa.”
43001048	A Natanɩɛl soor ʋ: “Mɩnɛ fʋ ɩ ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ma?” A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A lɛ a Fɩlɩpɩ na ma dãa bʋↄl fʋ sɛr wa, ɩ̃ dãa na de nĩe nyɛ fʋ a lɛ fʋ na be a fɩgɩ tɩɛ pulẽe.”
43001049	A Natanɩɛl yel ʋ: “Jãjaana, fʋ̃ʋ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Bie! Fʋ̃ʋ ɩ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ jamana!”
43001050	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Fʋ sↄw ma na a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ yel fʋ na a ɩ̃ dãa na nyɛ fʋ a be a fɩgɩ tɩɛ pulẽe. Fʋ nↄↄ nyɛ na yele a bɛrmɛ gãw a asɩmɛ.”
43001051	Ɩ̃ ʋ lɛ yelʼã go: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, nyɩ nↄↄ nyɛ na a saꞋlon ʋ yuo ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ duoro ɩ̃ suure a Nɩbɛ Bie jie.”
43002001	A lɛ a bibie ayi na tↄl baar, ba tɛrɛ na a pↄw kulfʋ fɛtɩ a Kana-tẽw na be a Galile wɩɛr. A Jeeju mã dãa na be be
43002002	ɩ̃ ba mɩ bʋↄlʼã a Jeeju nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe a fɛtɩ ʋlↄ jie.
43002003	A lɛ a dãa na baar, a Jeeju mã yel ʋ na: “Baa cãa tɛrɛ a dɩvɛ̃ wa.”
43002004	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Pↄw wee, bõ sɩ be taa? A ɩ̃ daar ma ta sɛr wa.”
43002005	A ʋ mã yel a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ: “Nyɩ́ maal a bom jaa lɛ ʋ na yele nyɩ.”
43002006	Ɩ̃ a kubie dʋr ayʋↄb be na be a Jufisɩ na ma ƴↄ̃w a kʋ̃ↄ pↄlↄ nɩ a ba mɩ̃ɛ. Yo-nↄɛ anuu kʋ̃ↄ ɩ̃ ma sɛw a ba jaa bõ-ƴene-ƴene.
43002007	A Jeeju yelʼã a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ: “Nyɩ́ Ꞌwↄ̃w a kʋ̃ↄ sɛɛr a dʋr,” a ba Ꞌwↄ̃w sɛɛr.
43002008	Ʋ lɛ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ Ꞌwↄ̃w cenʼɩ̃ na kʋ a fɛtɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ,” a ba Ꞌwↄ̃w cenʼɩ̃.
43002009	A fɛtɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Ꞌlɛmʼã a kʋ̃ↄ na lɩɛb ɩ a dɩvɛ̃, ɩ̃ Ꞌwaa bↄ̃w a jie a na yi wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ na dãa Ꞌwↄ̃w a kʋ̃ↄ, bala ʋlↄ bↄ̃w na. A nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ bʋↄlʼã a sɩrɛ
43002010	ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “A nɩbɛ ba jaa, a dɩvɛ̃ nʋ̃ↄ ba ma de nĩe kʋ a nɩbɛ ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na wa nyu tɩw baar, ala ba ma kʋ ba a ala na ma bↄ̃w nʋmↄ wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ̃ʋ, fʋ binʼã a dɩvɛ̃ nʋ̃ↄ wa ta nɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃.”
43002011	A Jeeju dãdãw nↄ-kofʋ tʋn nɩ a ʋlↄ ʋ na maal a Kana-tẽw na be a Gahle wɩɛr. Ʋ millʼɩ̃ na a ʋ yo-yifʋ a ʋ par-tuurbe sↄw ʋ.
43002012	A ala na baar, a Jeeju lãa na cenʼɩ̃ a ʋ mã nɩ a ʋ yɛɛr nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe a Kapɛɛnam-tẽw, a ba jɛ be jaa fɩ̃ɩ.
43002013	A Jufisɩ Pakɩ fɛtɩ daar tara na, a Jeeju cen a Jerujalɛm.
43002014	A mɩnɛ ʋ na cen a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, ʋ nyɛ na a nɩbɛ na daara a nii nɩ a piir nɩ a ŋmama, lãa nɩ a bala na jɛ tɛwrɛ a libie.
43002015	Ʋ de na a mibe lɩɛb maal a ɩ kpaara ʋ fↄbʼɩ̃ ba ba jaa diw bar yẽw, lãa nɩ a ba piir nɩ a ba nii, ɩ̃ yɛ̃yɛlɩ̃ a libi-tɛwrbɛ libie bar a tene, ɩ̃ lɩɛb a ba tabalsɩ vↄↄl.
43002016	Ɩ̃ ʋ yelʼã a ŋmam-daarba: “ Nyɩ́ de a yele ala yi nɩ a ka! Nyɩ taa de a ɩ̃ Sãa yir lɩɛb maal ʋ ɩ ƴaƴab-yir wa!”
43002017	A ʋ par-tuurbe tɩɛrʼã yuo a ƴɛr-bir ʋlↄ na sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “Ɩ̃ Naaŋmɩn, a fʋ yir tʋmↄ vɩláa nↄↄ dɩ ma na vũu kaarɩ̃.”
43002018	A be jie, a Jufisɩ soor ʋ na: “Nↄ-kofʋ tʋ̃-buor fʋ na maal miilʼɩ̃ sɩ a sɩ bↄ̃w ka fʋ tɛrɛ na sↄr maala a yele asɩmɛ?”
43002019	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩmɩ wɛl a Naaŋmɩn yirʼã, ɩ̃ a bibie ata pʋↄ ɩ̃ na lɛ mɛ ʋ na.”
43002020	A Jufisɩ yel ʋ: “Yomo lɩjaayi nʼayʋↄb ba mɛ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ naa maalʼɩ̃, ɩ̃ a fʋ̃ʋ, a fʋ yel a fʋ na lɛ mɛ ʋ na baar bibie ata pʋↄ?”
43002021	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn yir ʋlↄ a Jeeju na yele ɩ na a ʋ ɩ̃gan.
43002022	A daar ʋlↄ a Jeeju na ir a kũu pʋↄ baar, a ʋ par-tuurbe tɩɛrʼã yuo a ʋ dãa na yel a lɛ, ɩ̃ na ba sↄw de a ala na sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ nɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ a Jeeju na dãa ƴɛr.
43002023	A daar ʋlↄ a Jeeju na be a Jerujalɛm a Pakɩ fɛtɩ dɩfʋ jie, nɩ-yaw nyɛ na a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ ʋ na maala ɩ̃ sↄw ʋ.
43002024	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju ma de ba sɩrɛ jaa wa, a-na-ɩ ʋ bↄ̃w na a nɩbɛ ba jaa fɛw tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ.
43002025	ꞋWaa bʋↄrↄ nɩrɛ ʋ man ʋ nɩrɛ kãw ben wa, a-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ bↄ̃w na a ala na be a nɩrɛ pʋ̃ↄ.
43003001	Daba dãa na be be a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ pʋↄ ɩ̃ dɩ a Nikodɛ̃. Ʋ mɩ ɩ na a Jufisɩ ni-diere ƴen sʋbↄ.
43003002	Ʋ cenʼã a tɩsↄw a Jeeju sɛ̃ na yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, sɩ bↄ̃w ka fʋ ɩ na a Jãjaana na na yi a Naaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɩ̃ wa, a-na-ɩ nɩrɛ ma tʋↄrↄ maala a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ asɩmɛ fʋ na maala ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ be nɩ ʋ wa.”
43003003	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele fʋ, nɩrɛ ma nyɛrɛ sↄr kpɛɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a dↄw-paalaa ba dↄw ʋ wa.”
43003004	A Nikodɛ̃ soor ʋ: “Mɩnɛ ba na lɛ tʋↄ dↄw a nɩrɛ a lɛ ʋ na kor baar? A nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na tʋↄ na lɛ kpɛ a ʋ mã puorɩ̃ ʋ lɛ dↄw ʋ mɩɩ?”
43003005	A Jeeju yel: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele fʋ, nɩrɛ ma tʋↄrↄ kpɛɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ ba dↄw ʋ na a kʋ̃ↄ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ dↄwfʋ wa.
43003006	A ʋlↄ a nɩrɛ na dↄw, nɩrɛ ʋ ɩ, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na dↄw, a sɩɛ ʋ ɩ.
43003007	Taa ɩ a nʋↄr ko fʋ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na yel áa sɛw na a ba na dↄw nyɩ dↄw-paalaa wa.
43003008	A sɛsɛb ma fure na cere a jie ʋ na bʋↄrↄ. Fʋ ma wõ na a ʋ damfʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ fʋ maa bↄ̃w a jie ʋ na yi, mɩɩ a jie ʋ na cere wa. A lɛ a mɩ wↄ̃ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ jie a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na dↄw.”
43003009	A Nikodɛ̃ lɛ soor ʋ: “Mɩnɛ a ana yele na tʋↄ ɩ ɩ̃ maal a lɛ?”
43003010	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A fʋ̃ʋ na ɩ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ jãjaana, faa bↄ̃w a yele ala par wa?
43003011	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele fʋ, sɩ ƴɛrɛ na a ala sɩ na bↄ̃w ɩ̃ mɩ mana a ala sɩ na nyɛ, ɩ̃ nyaa bʋↄrↄ nyɩ sↄw a sɩ yel-mɩ̃ɛ wa.
43003012	A-na-ɩ a tẽw pʋↄ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ɩ̃ mana nyɩ ɩ̃ a nyaa sↄw wa, ɩ̃ a maa wa mana nyɩ a saꞋlon ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, mɩnɛ nyɩ na ɩ ɩ̃ sↄw?
43003013	Nɩrɛ ma dãa do be a saꞋlon ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Nɩbɛ Bie tɛw na yi a be a saꞋlon ɩ̃ suu ʋ wa.
43003014	A mɩnɛ a Mowisi na dãa maal a kur waab ba bar a daa juu a wɛkar pʋↄ, a lɛ ba na mɩ ba a Nɩbɛ Bie bar
43003015	a mɩnɛ a nɩrɛ lɛ na sↄw de ʋ na kpɛ na a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw pʋↄ.
43003016	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn nyɩrɩ̃ na nʋ a tẽw nɩbɛ ba jaa ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ tɩɩr a ʋ Bi-dab-daadaa kʋ ba, a mɩnɛ a nɩrɛ lɛ na sↄw de ʋ, ʋ kↄ̃ wɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ na kpɛ na a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw pʋↄ.
43003017	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ma tʋ̃ a ʋ Bie ʋ wa a tẽw pʋↄ a nɩbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ ƴↄ̃wfʋ jie wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ wa na a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ na tʋↄ nyɛ a faafʋ a ʋ jie.
43003018	A ʋlↄ na sↄw de ʋ, baa ƴↄnↄ ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na ma sↄw de ʋ wa, ba gↄrʼã ƴↄ̃w ʋ a ƴɛrɩ̃, a-na-ɩ Ꞌwaa sↄw de a Naaŋmɩn Bi-dab-daadaa wa.
43003019	A ala ɩnɛ ba na ƴↄnↄ a nɩbɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ na, a cãa na wa a ka a tẽw pʋↄ ɩ̃-cɛ a ba jaar a cãa, ɩ̃ nʋ a libe a-na-ɩ a ba tʋmↄ ɩ na tʋ̃-faar.
43003020	A nɩrɛ lɛ na maala a burbur ma Ꞌlaarʼã a cãa, ɩ̃ maa sↄwrↄ yire a cãa pʋↄ wa, a mɩnɛ a ʋ tʋ̃-bie kↄ̃ wa nyɩr wa.
43003021	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ tʋ̃-bie na tor, ʋ ma yi na a cãa pʋↄ, a mɩnɛ a ba na nyɛ bↄ̃w ka a ʋ tʋ̃-bie pʋↄ, a ʋ jↄrↄ na a Naaŋmɩn.”
43003022	A ala na baar, a Jeeju nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe cenʼã a Jude wɩɛr na ba jɛ a be fɩ̃ɩ, ʋ mʋrↄ a nɩbɛ a kʋ̃ↄ.
43003023	A Jã mɩ mʋrↄ na a nɩbɛ a Ɛnↄ na pɩɛlʼɩ̃ a Salim, a-na-ɩ a kʋ̃ↄ dãa na waa a be. A nɩbɛ wɩɛrɛ na a ʋ sɛ̃ ʋ mʋrↄ ba
43003024	a-na-ɩ a daar ʋlↄ, baa dãa ƴↄ̃w a Jã a kasu pʋↄ sɛr wa.
43003025	A Jã par-tuurbe ŋmɛɛ nyↄw na ɩ̃ cɩɩrɛ taa nɩ Jufi nɩrɛ kãw a mɩnɛ a ba ɩ̃gan pↄlfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ na wↄ̃.
43003026	Ba cenʼã a Jã sɛ̃ na yel ʋ: “Jãjaana, a daba ʋlↄ na dãa be nɩ fʋ a Jʋrdɛ̃ man gaan, a ʋlↄ ƴɛrɩ̃ fʋ na dãa ƴɛrɛ, ʋ mʋrↄ na a nɩbɛ a kʋ̃ↄ, a nɩbɛ ba jaa cere a ʋ sɛ̃.”
43003027	A Jã yel ba: “Nɩrɛ ma tʋↄrↄ pↄwrↄ bom ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ kʋ ʋ wa.
43003028	A nyɩmɩ mɩ̃ɛ, nyɩ na tʋↄ na man a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na dãa yel á maa ɩ a Klrisi wa, ɩ̃-cɛ á ba tʋ̃ ma na ɩ̃ de ʋ nĩe.
43003029	A ʋlↄ na kule a pↄw, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a pↄw sʋbↄ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a pↄw sʋbↄ baraa na ɩraa a be cɛlɛ ʋ, ʋ ma cɩlɛ na a mɩnɛ ʋ na wõ a pↄw sʋbↄ kↄkɩr. A lɛ a ɩ̃ nʋ̃ↄ mɩ wↄ̃; a sɛw ma na ƴala.
43003030	A sɛw na a ʋlↄ, ʋ jɛwrɛ duoro, ɩ̃ a maa, ɩ̃ wure suure.
43003031	“A ʋlↄ na yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ wa, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a yele a jaa Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ. Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na yi a ka a tẽw pʋↄ, ʋ ɩ na a tẽw pʋↄ nɩrɛ, ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a tẽw pʋↄ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ wa, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a yele a jaa Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ.
43003032	Ʋ mana na a ala ʋ na nyɛ ɩ̃ mɩ wõ, ɩ̃-cɛ nɩrɛ ma sↄw a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa.
43003033	Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na sↄw a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ miilʼã áa Naaŋmɩn ɩ na yel-mɩ̃ɛ sʋbↄ.
43003034	A ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na tʋ̃, a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ʋ ma ƴɛrɛ, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn vibʼã a ʋ Sɩɛ sɛw ʋ.
43003035	A Sãa nʋ na a ʋ Bie ɩ̃ de a yele a jaa bar ƴↄ̃w a ʋ nuumɩ.
43003036	A ʋlↄ na sↄw de a Bie, ʋ kpɛ na a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw pʋↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na jaar a Bie bar, Ꞌwaa nyɛrɛ a ʋna baafʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn su-tuo dↄↄlʼã a ʋ juu.”
43004001	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ wõ na áa Jeeju pↄwrↄ na a par-tuurbe ɩ̃ mɩ mʋrↄ ba a kʋ̃ↄmɩ, gãw a Jã.
43004002	Ɩ̃-cɛ aa ɩ a Jeeju mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ ma dãa mʋrↄ a nɩbɛ a kʋ̃ↄ wa, a ʋ par-tuurbe ʋ.
43004003	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na wõ a lɛ, ʋ yi na a be a Jude ɩ̃ lɩɛb cere a Galile,
43004004	ɩ̃-cɛ a sɛw na ʋ na tↄl yi a Samari.
43004005	A lɛ, ʋ cenʼã na ta a Sɩkaar-tẽw na be a Samari wɩɛr pʋↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ pɩɛlʼɩ̃ a Jakↄb puo ʋ na dãa kʋ a ʋ bi-daba Jojɛfʋ.
43004006	A be, a Jakↄb bulee be na be. A ɩ na a mↄtↄ̃-tuo daar, a Jeeju yↄ bal ɩ̃ jɛ a ʋna bulee nʋↄr,
43004007	a Samari pↄw kãw wa kʋ̃ↄ Ꞌwↄ̃wfʋ, a Jeeju yel ʋ: “Kʋ ma a kʋ̃ↄ ɩ̃ nyu.”
43004008	(A ʋ par-tuurbe ma dãa be be wa. Ba cenʼã tẽw pʋↄ a dɩb dafʋ.)
43004009	A Samari pↄw yel a Jeeju: “A fʋ̃ʋ na ɩ a Jufi nɩrɛ, mɩnɛ fʋ na tʋↄ sʋↄr kʋ̃ↄ a maa na ɩ a Samari nɩrɛ jie?” (Ʋ yelʼã a lɛ a-na-ɩ a Jufisɩ nɩ a Samari nɩbɛ maa mʋ̃ↄ taa vũu wa.)
43004010	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ fʋ dãa na bↄ̃w a ala a Naaŋmɩn na kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ mɩ bↄ̃w a ʋlↄ na sʋↄr fʋ a kʋ̃ↄ, fʋ̃ʋ naa ɛ̃ɛ dãa sʋↄr ʋ, ɩ̃ ʋ naa kʋ fʋ na a kʋ̃ↄ bunaa.”
43004011	A pↄw yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, faa tɛrɛ miir wa, ɩ̃ a bulee ma kpɛ ɩɛ wa. Mɩnɛ fʋ na ɩ ɩ̃ pↄw a kʋ̃ↄ bunaa?
43004012	Fʋ̃ʋ bɛrmɛ gãw a sɩ sãa-kʋmↄ Jakↄb mɩɩ? Ʋlↄ ɩ̃ kʋ sɩ a bulee na ɩ̃ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ mɩ nyu na a kʋ̃ↄ na nɩ a ʋ bibiir lãa nɩ a ʋ dʋn.”
43004013	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A nɩrɛ lɛ na nyu a kʋ̃ↄ na, kʋ̃ↄ-nyuur na lɛ nyↄw ʋ na,
43004014	ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩrɛ lɛ nↄↄ nyuure a kʋ̃ↄ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ nↄↄ kʋrↄ ʋ, kʋ̃ↄ-nyuur ma lↄↄ nyↄwrↄ ʋ go wa, a-na-ɩ a kʋ̃ↄ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na kʋrↄ ʋ na lɩɛbʼã ɩ kʋ̃ↄ bunaa a ʋ pʋ̃ↄ. A ʋna kʋ̃ↄ naa ɩ na a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw na bune yire a ʋ pʋ̃ↄ.”
43004015	A pↄw yel a Jeeju: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, kʋ ma a ʋna kʋ̃ↄ a mɩnɛ a kʋ̃ↄ-nyuur kↄ̃ↄ lↄↄ nyↄw ma, ɩ̃ lↄↄ wa a ka a kʋ̃ↄ Ꞌwↄ̃wfʋ wa.”
43004016	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Cen na bʋↄl a fʋ sɩrɛ a nyɩ lãa wa.”
43004017	A pↄw yel ʋ: “Maa tɛrɛ sɩrɛ wa.” A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ fʋ yel á faa tɛrɛ sɩrɛ wa,
43004018	a-na-ɩ fʋ dãa na kul dabsɩ anuu ɩ̃ a daba ʋlↄ fʋ na tɛrɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na ma ɩ a fʋ sɩrɛ wa. Yel-mɩ̃ɛ fʋ yel ma.”
43004019	A pↄw yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ bↄ̃w na Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere fʋ ɩ.
43004020	A tãw na juu a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ ma dãa puoro a Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩmɩ Jufisɩ yel áa Jerujalɛm ɩ̃ sɛw a nɩbɛ ba puoro.”
43004021	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Pↄw wee, sↄw a ala ɩ̃ na yele fʋ. A daar tara na, a kↄ̃ ɩ a tãw na juu, mɩɩ a Jerujalɛm nyɩ na lɛ puor a Sãa Naaŋmɩn wa.
43004022	A nyɩmɩ Samari deme, nyɩ puoro na a ala nyɩ na ma bↄ̃w wa, ɩ̃ a sɩmɩ Jufisɩ, sɩ bↄ̃w na a ala sɩ na puoro, a-na-ɩ a Fafaara yi na a Jufisɩ jie.
43004023	A daar tara na ɩ̃ ʋ gↄrʼã ta baar, a mɩnɛ a bala na puoro a Sãa Naaŋmɩn a sɩrɛ jaa, ba na puoro ʋ na a sɩɛ pʋↄ nɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ, a-na-ɩ a popuor-lɛ a Sãa bʋↄrↄ.
43004024	Sɩɛ a Naaŋmɩn ɩ, ɩ̃ a bala na puoro ʋ sɛw na na puoro ʋ a sɩɛ pʋↄ nɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ pʋↄ.”
43004025	A pↄw yel a Jeeju: “Ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka a ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na tʋ̃ na wa na, a ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Kirisi. A ʋlↄ wa wa, ʋ na man sɩ na a yele a jaa.”
43004026	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A maa naa na ƴɛrɛ nɩ fʋ, a maa ʋ.”
43004027	A jie naan, a Jeeju par-tuurbe lɩɛbʼã wa, a nↄɛ ko ba a mɩnɛ ba na nyɛ a Jeeju ʋ ƴɛrɛ nɩ a pↄw. Ɩ̃ kãw ma Ꞌla soor á bõ fʋ bʋↄrↄ, mɩɩ á bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a fʋ ƴɛrɛ nɩ a pↄw na wa?
43004028	A be jie, a pↄw barʼã a ʋ yuor ɩ̃ lɩɛb kpɛ a tẽw pʋↄ na yel a nɩbɛ:
43004029	“Nyɩ́ wa nyɛ daba na yel ma a yele ala a jaa ɩ̃ na dãa maal. Ã wa ɩ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a Kirisi mɩɩ?”
43004030	A nɩbɛ yi a tẽw ʋlↄ pʋↄ ɩ̃ wɩɛrɛ a Jeeju sɛ̃.
43004031	A daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ, a Jeeju par-tuurbe sʋↄrↄ ʋ na yele nɩ: “Jãjaana, dɩ a dɩb!”
43004032	Ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ yel ba na: “Ɩ̃ tɛrɛ na a dɩb ʋlↄ nyɩ na ma bↄ̃w wa.”
43004033	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ba sooro na taa: “Á wa ɩ nɩrɛ wa nɩ a bõ-dɩraa na kʋ ʋ mɩɩ?”
43004034	A Jeeju yel ba: “A ɩ̃ dɩb ɩ na ɩ̃ maal a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃, ɩ̃ mɩ tʋ̃ a tʋmↄ ala ʋ na kʋ ma baar.
43004035	A nyɩmɩ, nyɩ ma yelʼã á cur anaan pʋↄ áa ci ŋmafʋ na ta na. Ɩ̃-cɛ a maa, ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, nyɩ́ bↄ̃w Ꞌwuor a por nyɛ, a ci mʋ̃ↄ na sɛw a ŋmafʋ.
43004036	A ʋlↄ na ŋmara a ci gↄrʼã pↄwrↄ a ʋ yar, ɩ̃ ʋ mɩ wooro na a ci biine a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw ɩnɛ, a mɩnɛ a ʋlↄ na bʋr nɩ a ʋlↄ na ŋmara na tʋↄ lãa cɩlɛ.
43004037	A-na-ɩ a ƴɛr-birʼã ɩ na sɩrɛ na yel: a bõ-ƴen bʋrʼã ɩ̃ a kãw ŋma.
43004038	A maa, ɩ̃ tʋ̃ nyɩ na a nyɩ cen na ŋma a ci a puo ʋlↄ pʋↄ nyɩ na ma dãa kↄ wa. A ŋmɛɛ kↄ na ɩ̃ nyɩmɩ lɩɛb de a ala ba naa dãa pↄw.”
43004039	A Samari nɩbɛ yaw jie na be a ʋna tẽw pʋↄ sↄw na a Jeeju a-na-ɩ a ʋna pↄw dãa na man ba yel: “Ʋ yel ma na a yele ala a jaa ɩ̃ na dãa maal.”
43004040	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a lɛ a Samari nɩbɛ na ta a Jeeju sɛ̃, ba sʋↄr ʋ na a ʋ jɛ be a ba jie, ʋ jɛ a be maal bibie ayi.
43004041	Ɩ̃ a yaw jie mɩ lɛ sↄw ʋ na a ala a ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ na ƴɛrɛ ɩnɛ,
43004042	ɩ̃ yel a pↄw: “Aa cãa ɩ a ala fʋ na dãa yel sɩ ɩnɛ sɩ sↄw wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a sɩmɩ mɩ̃ɛ, sɩ mɩ wõ na ɩ̃ mɩ bↄ̃w ka ʋlↄ ɩ̃ sɩrɩ̃ ɩ a tẽw nɩbɛ ba jaa Fafaara.”
43004043	A lɛ a ana bibie na tↄl baar, a Jeeju yi na a be ɩ̃ cen a Galile,
43004044	a-na-ɩ a Jeeju mɩ̃ɛ dãa na yel áa nɩbɛ maa ƴↄ̃w a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ tẽw pʋↄ wa.
43004045	A lɛ ʋ na ta a Galile, a tẽw ʋlↄ nɩbɛ de ʋ na vɩlaa a-na-ɩ ba mɩ dãa na cen a Pakɩ fɛtɩ dɩfʋ jie a Jerujalɛm, ɩ̃ ba nyɛ na a ala a jaa ʋ na dãa maal a be.
43004046	Ʋ lɛ lɩɛbʼã cen a Kana be a Galile wɩɛr, na ɩ a jie ʋlↄ ʋ na dãa maal a kʋ̃ↄ a lɩɛb ɩ a dɩvɛ̃. A jamana yir nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ be na be a Kapɛɛnam ɩ̃ tɛrɛ bie ʋ ɩ wʋlɩ̃.
43004047	A lɛ ʋ na wõ áa Jeeju yi na a Jude ɩ̃ wɩ a Galile, ʋ cenʼã na sʋↄrↄ ʋ a ba lãa cen a Kapɛɛnam ʋ kpɛmɛ a ʋ bie na kpiire.
43004048	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A ala ma ɩ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ na miile a Naaŋmɩn kpɛ̃w nyɩ nyɛ wa, nyɩ maa ƴↄ̃w nyãa fɩ̃ɩ wa.”
43004049	A jamana yir nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, wa a sɩ cen, a mɩnɛ a ɩ̃ bie kↄ̃ ɓↄr wa.”
43004050	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Kul, a fʋ bie kpaarʼã,” a daba sↄw a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ ʋ na yel ʋ ɩ̃ kul.
43004051	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na cãa be a sↄr pʋↄ kule, a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ tuor ʋ na ɩ̃ yel: “A fʋ bie kpaarʼã,”
43004052	ʋ soor ba: “Dabor ʋ kpɛmɛ?” a ba yel ʋ: “Jamɩ mↄtↄ̃-tuo daar a ʋ ɩ̃gan kporfʋ baar.”
43004053	A lɛ, a sãa bↄ̃wnaa na bↄ̃w ka a daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ a Jeeju na yel ʋ áa ʋ bie kpaarʼã, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ nɩ a ʋ yir deme ba jaa sↄw de a Jeeju.
43004054	A Jeeju nↄ-kofʋ tʋn nɩ a naa ʋ na lɛ tu maal a lɛ ʋ na yi a Jude ɩ̃ cen a Galile.
43005001	A lɛ a ala na tↄl baar, a Jufisɩ tɛrɛ na a puorfʋ fɛtɩ, a Jeeju cen a Jerujalɛm.
43005002	A be a ʋna tẽw naa, kʋ̃ↄ puulĩfʋ jie be na be jɛ̃bɛrɩ̃sɩ anuu na kolĩ. A pɩɛlʼɩ̃ na a jie ba na bʋↄlↄ a Piir Dↄ̃dↄr, ɩ̃ a ba bʋↄlↄ nɩ a Jufi ƴɛrɩ̃ a Bɛsata.
43005003	A ana jɛ̃bɛrɩ̃sɩ naa pʋↄ, wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme yayaw dãa na gana a be. Ba ɩ na a jↄn nɩ a gbɛ-sãansɩ deme nɩ a gbɛɛ, [na ba eɛlɛ a kʋ̃ↄ damfʋ,
43005004	a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnaa kãw mↄↄ suu na dama a kʋ̃ↄ. A wʋlɩ̃ sʋbↄ ʋlↄ na de nĩe kpɛ a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ a lɛ a na dam baar, a ʋ wʋlɩ̃ ɩ̃ saarɩ̃ wↄ̃ mɩnɛ ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ ma kpɛmɛ na.]
43005005	Daba be na be a na Ꞌwↄb maalʼɩ̃ yomo lɩjaayi ŋmaaʼnuu nʼata.
43005006	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na nyɛ ʋ ʋ gã, ɩ̃ mɩ bↄ̃w ka ʋ dãa na ɩ wʋlɩ̃ nyɩrɩ̃ kam, ʋ soor ʋ na: “Fʋ bʋↄrↄ na fʋ kpɛmɛ?”
43005007	A wʋlɩ̃ sʋbↄ yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, maa tɛrɛ nɩrɛ ʋ na ƴↄ̃w ma a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ a ʋ damfʋ daar wa, ɩ̃ a lɛ ɩ̃ na ma bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ suu, nɩsaa kpee ma de ma na nĩe kpɛ.”
43005008	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Ir, ɓↄw a fʋ sɛn cere nɩ.”
43005009	A jie naan, a daba kpɛmɛ na ɩ̃ ir ɓↄw a ʋ sɛn cere nɩ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a-na-ɩ a bibi-ciiraa dayen ʋ,
43005010	a Jufisɩ yelʼã a daba ʋlↄ a Jeeju na kpɛmɛ: “A bibi-ciiraa dayen ʋ! Faa tɛrɛ sↄr na ɓↄw a fʋ sɛn cere nɩ wa.”
43005011	Ʋ yel ba: “A ʋlↄ na kpɛmɛ ma, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ yel ma á ɩ̃ ɓↄw a ɩ̃ sɛn cere nɩ.”
43005012	A ba soor ʋ: “Ala sʋbↄ ɩ̃ yel fʋ á fʋ ɓↄw a fʋ sɛn cere nɩ?”
43005013	Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na lɛ kpɛmɛ ma dãa bↄ̃w a sʋbↄ ʋlↄ na kpɛmɛ ʋ wa, a-na-ɩ a Jeeju kpɛ na bↄr a nɩ-yaw bala pʋↄ na dãa be a ʋna jie.
43005014	A ɩ na fɩ̃ɩ ɩ̃ a Jeeju nyɛ ʋ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Gɛlɛ, fʋ pãa na kpɛmɛ. Taa cãa maala fãa wa, a mɩnɛ a bom kↄ̃ↄ pↄw fʋ na bier gãw a korĩ-cɛ ben wa.”
43005015	A daba cenʼã na yel a Jufisɩ áa Jeeju ɩ̃ ɩ a ʋlↄ na dãa kpɛmɛ ʋ.
43005016	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Jufisɩ nyↄw na ɩ̃ hʋↄlↄ a Jeeju a-na-ɩ ʋ ma maala na a yele ala a bibi-ciirsɩ dayen.
43005017	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju yel ba na: “A daar a jaa a ɩ̃ Sãa tʋnↄ na a tʋn, ɩ̃ a maa mɩ, a lɛ ɩ̃ mɩ tʋnↄ.”
43005018	A ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ naa ɩnɛ a Jufisɩ pãa nyɩrɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ba kú ʋ, a-na-ɩ aa ɩ a bibi-ciiraa tɛw ʋ sãw wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ ma mɩ bʋↄlʼã a Naaŋmɩn a ʋ Sãa, de nɩ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ ʋ ɩ bõ-ƴen nɩ a Naaŋmɩn.
43005019	A Jeeju yel ba na: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a Bie ma tʋↄrↄ maala bom a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ʋ na nyɛ a ʋ Sãa ʋ maala, ala tɛw ʋ maala. A-na-ɩ a ala a jaa a Sãa na maala, ala a Bie mɩ maala.
43005020	A-na-ɩ a Sãa nʋ na a ʋ Bie ɩ̃ miil ʋ a yele a jaa ʋ na maala, ɩ̃ ʋ na lɛ miil ʋ na a tʋmↄ ala na bɛrmɛ gãw a asɩmɛ, a nↄɛ na ko nyɩ.
43005021	A-na-ɩ a mɩnɛ a Sãa na ma maal a kũusɩ a ba ir, ʋ kʋ ba a baafʋ, a lɛ a ʋ Bie ma mɩ kʋ a bala ʋ na bʋↄrↄ a baafʋ.
43005022	A Sãa maa gnor nɩrɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋ Bie ʋ ƴↄ̃w ʋ guoro a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a jaa,
43005023	a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ ba jaa na mɩ ƴↄnↄ a Bie a mɩnɛ ba na ƴↄnↄ a Sãa. A ʋlↄ na ma ƴↄnↄ a Bie wa, Ꞌwaa mɩ ƴↄnↄ a Sãa na tʋ̃ ʋ wa.
43005024	“Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ʋlↄ na wõ a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ɩ̃ sↄw a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma, ʋ kpɛ na a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw pʋↄ. Ba kↄ̃ↄ ƴↄ̃w ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa, ɩ̃-eɛ ʋ yi na a kũu pʋↄ kpɛ a baafʋ pʋↄ.
43005025	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a daar tara na ɩ̃ ʋ gↄrʼã ta baar. A ɩ na a daar ʋlↄ a kũusɩ na wono a Naaŋmɩn Bie kↄkɩr ɩ̃ a bala na wonaa, ba na irʼã lɛ baa.
43005026	A-na-ɩ a mɩnɛ a Sãa na ɩ a Baafʋ Sʋbↄ, lɛ ʋ mɩ ƴↄ̃w a ʋ Bie ʋ mɩ ɩ a Baafʋ Sʋbↄ.
43005027	Ʋ mɩ kʋ ʋ na a sↄr ʋ ɩ a ƴɛr-guoro, a-na-ɩ ʋ ɩ na a Nɩbɛ Bie.
43005028	Nyɩ taa ɩ a nʋↄr ko nyɩ a ala ɩnɛ wa, a-na-ɩ a daar tara na, a daar ʋlↄ a kũusɩ ba jaa nↄↄ wono a ʋ kↄkɩr
43005029	ɩ̃ yire a yar pʋↄ. A bala na maal a vɩlaa, ba na irʼã pↄw a baafʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ a bala na maal a fãa, ba na irʼã pↄw a yel.
43005030	“Maa tʋↄrↄ maala bom a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ wa. Ɩ̃ guoro na a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ tuure nɩ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na yel ma, ɩ̃ a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ torʼã, a-na-ɩ maa maala a ala a maa mɩ̃ɛ na bʋↄrↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ maala na a ala na nʋmↄ a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma.
43005031	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a maa ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ ƴↄnↄ a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ, ba kↄ̃ tʋↄ sↄw a ɩ̃ yel-mɩ̃ɛ wa,
43005032	ɩ̃-cɛ nɩ-kpee be na be na ƴɛrɛ ƴↄnↄ ma, ɩ̃ ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka a ala ʋ na ƴɛrɛ a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ ɩ na yel-mɩ̃ɛ.
43005033	Nyɩ dãa na tʋ̃ nɩbɛ a ba soor a Jã-Batii ɩ̃ ʋ man nyɩ na a ala na ɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ.
43005034	Ɩ̃ a maa, aa ɩ nɩrɛ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ʋ ƴɛr ƴↄ̃w ma wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ yelʼã a lɛ a nyɩ na tʋↄ nyɛ a cɩ̃ɛfʋ jie.
43005035	A Jã dãa na wↄ̃ taa nɩ a lãpa na Ꞌle caarɩ̃ a nʋmↄ nyɩ a nyɩ ɩraa fɩ̃ɩ a ʋ cãa pʋↄ.
43005036	Ɩ̃ a maa, ɩ̃ tɛrɛ na yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ na na tɩmɛ gãw a ala a Jã na dãa mana a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ. A-na-ɩ a tʋmↄ ala a ɩ̃ Sãa na kʋ ma ɩ̃ maala, a ana tʋmↄ ɩ̃ sɩrɩ̃ miile á ɩ̃ Sãa tʋ̃ ma na.
43005037	Ɩ̃ a ɩ̃ Sãa na tʋ̃ ma, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ mana a ɩ̃ yel-mɩ̃ɛ. Nyaa dãa wõ a ʋ kↄkɩr sɛr wa, nyaa mɩ dãa nyɛ a ʋ nii-sↄw wa,
43005038	ɩ̃ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ ma jɛ a nyɩ suur pʋↄ wa, a-na-ɩ nyaa sↄw de a ʋlↄ ʋ na tʋ̃ wa.
43005039	Nyɩ ma cɛ̃pɛrɛ na a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a-na-ɩ nyɩ tɩɛrʼã bↄ̃w ka ala ɩ̃ kʋrↄ nyɩ a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw, ɩ̃ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala, a ɩ na a maa ɩnɛ a ƴɛrɛ,
43005040	ɩ̃ nyaa bʋↄrↄ nyɩ wa a ɩ̃ jie na nyɩ pↄw a baafʋ wa.
43005041	“Maa bʋↄrↄ a nɩbɛ ba pɛwrɛ ma wa.
43005042	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ bↄ̃w nyɩ na: nyaa nʋ a Naaŋmɩn nɩ a nyɩ pʋↄ wa.
43005043	Ɩ̃ wa nɩ na a ɩ̃ Sãa yuor a nyaa bʋↄrↄ ma wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩrɛ wa nɩ na a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ yuor, nyɩ na bʋↄrↄ ʋ na.
43005044	A nyɩ jaa fɛw ma bʋↄrↄ na a nyɩ tↄ deme ba lɩɛb pɛwrɛ nyɩ, ɩ̃ nyɩ maa bʋↄrↄ a pɛwfʋ ʋlↄ na yi a Naaŋmɩn daadaa jie wa. Mɩnɛ nyɩ na tʋↄ ɩ ɩ̃ sↄw?
43005045	Nyɩ taa tɩɛr beeka maa ɩ̃ nↄↄ ƴↄnↄ nyɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a ɩ̃ Sãa nii-sↄw wa. A ʋlↄ nↄↄ ƴↄnↄ nyɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ na ɩ na a Mowisi ʋlↄ juu nyɩ na de a nyɩ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ dↄↄl.
43005046	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ nyɩ dãa na sↄw de a ala a Mowisi na sɛb sɩrɛ jaa, nyɩ naa mɩ sↄw na de ma, a-na-ɩ a ala na tor ma ʋ dãa sɛb.
43005047	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ nyɩ na ma sↄw de a ala ʋ na sɛb wa, mɩnɛ nyɩ na mɩ tʋↄ sↄw de a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ?”
43006001	A ala na tↄl baar, a Jeeju gãw na a man gaan, na ɩ a man ʋlↄ ba na mɩ bʋↄlↄ a Tiberiyadi.
43006002	Nɩ-yaw tuure ʋ na a-na-ɩ ba nyɛ na a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ ʋ na maala kpɛmɛɛ nɩ a wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme.
43006003	A Jeeju do na a tãw juu na jɛ nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe a be.
43006004	A Jufisɩ fɛtɩ daar na ɩ a Pakɩ pɩɛlʼã.
43006005	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na Ꞌwuor nyɛ a nɩ-yaw a ba wɩɛrɛ a ʋ sɛ̃, ʋ soorʼã a Fɩlɩpɩ: “Nyɩnɛ sɩ na tʋↄ nyɛ bom da kʋ a nɩbɛ basɩmɛ a ba dɩ?”
43006006	A Jeeju yelʼã a lɛ bʋↄrↄ ʋ bↄ̃w a mɩnɛ a Fɩlɩpɩ na yele, a-na-ɩ ʋ de na nĩe bↄ̃w a ala a ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ na maala.
43006007	A Fɩlɩpɩ yel ʋ: “A ala ɩ̃ saarɩ̃ ɩ war ture lɩjaayi sɩ tɛrɛ, aa mɩ ɩ bom na tʋↄ da bõ-dɩraa a ba na pↄw fɩ̃ɩ-fɩɩn ba jaa wa.”
43006008	A Jeeju par-tuure Ãdire na ɩ a Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr yɛbɛ yel ʋ na:
43006009	“Dabile be na ka tɛrɛ buru anuu ba na maalʼɩ̃ a ooji-bie nɩ jɩm-bie ayi. Ɩ̃-cɛ bõ a ala na tʋↄ maal a nɩ-yaw na?”
43006010	A Jeeju yel: “Nyɩ́ ɩ a nɩbɛ a ba jɛ.” A mʋ̃ↄ waa na a be a ʋna jie a ba jɛ. A nɩbɛ bala tara na dabsɩ ture anuu.
43006011	A lɛ, a Jeeju de na a buru, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na puor a Naaŋmɩn baar, ʋ po na a nɩbɛ bala na jɛ a be. Ʋ mɩ po ba na a jɩmɛ a mɩnɛ ba na bʋↄrↄ.
43006012	A lɛ a ba jaa na Ꞌwↄb pi baar, a Jeeju yelʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe: “Nyɩ́ woor a bõ-ŋmara na cɛ, a mɩnɛ a bom kↄ̃ wa bↄr wa”,
43006013	a ba woor a bõ-ŋmara ala ba na Ꞌwↄb a buru anuu ɩ̃ cɛ, sɛw pɩɩr pie-nʼayi.
43006014	A lɛ a nɩbɛ na nyɛ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋn ʋlↄ a Jeeju na maal, ba yelʼã: “A daba na sɩrɩ̃ na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere ʋlↄ na sɛw ʋ wa ka a tẽw pʋↄ!”
43006015	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na bↄ̃w ka ba na wa na nyↄw ʋ ʋ ɩ a ba jamana, ʋ yi na a ba pʋↄ lɛ cen a tãw juu, ʋlↄ ʋ yẽ.
43006016	A mɩnɛ a jaanʋↄr na ta, a Jeeju par-tuurbe suu na a manɩ̃
43006017	na kpɛ a gbor pʋↄ gãwna a Kapɛɛnam-tẽw. A wɩɛr liw na baar ɩ̃ a Jeeju ma dãa pↄw ba sɛr wa,
43006018	ɩ̃ a sɛsɛb kpɛ̃ɛ fure, a kʋ̃ↄ dama.
43006019	A mɩnɛ ba na duurʼɩ̃ a gbor a jãa ta kilo anuu mɩɩ kilo ayʋↄb, ba nyɛ na a Jeeju ʋ cere nɩ a gbɛɛ a kʋ̃ↄ juu tara a gbor par, a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw ba.
43006020	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju yel ba na: “Nyɩ taa ɩ a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw nyɩ wa. Maa ʋ.”
43006021	A be jie, ba bʋↄrↄ na ba de ʋ ƴↄ̃w a gbor pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a jie naan, a gbor ta na a jie ʋlↄ ba na cere.
43006022	A lɛ a bio na vɩɛ, a nɩ-yaw bala na dãa cãa ɩraa a ʋna gaan naa pʋↄ nyɛ na bↄ̃w ka gbor bõ-ƴen tɛw ɩ̃ dãa be be, ɩ̃ a Jeeju ma dãa kpɛ a gbor ʋlↄ pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋ par-tuurbe tɛw ɩ̃ kpɛ cen.
43006023	Ɩ̃-cɛ gboro ŋmɛɛ yi na a Tiberiyadi-tẽw ɩ̃ ta pɩɛl a jie ʋlↄ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na dãa puor a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ a ba Ꞌwↄb a buru.
43006024	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a nɩ-yaw bala na ma nyɛ a Jeeju nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe a be wa, ba kpɛ na a ana gboro cen a Kapɛɛnam a Jeeju bↄfʋ jie.
43006025	Ba nyɛ na a Jeeju a man gaan ɩ̃ soor ʋ: “Jãjaana, dabor daar fʋ ta a ka?”
43006026	A Jeeju yel ba: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, nyaa bʋↄrↄ ma a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ ɩnɛ nyɩ na nyɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ bʋↄrↄ ma na a-na-ɩ nyɩ Ꞌwↄbʼã a buru pi.
43006027	Nyɩ taa tʋnↄ a tʋn a dɩb ala na sãwna ɩnɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ tʋnↄ a dɩb ala na kamɛɛ ɩnɛ, na kʋrↄ nyɩ a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw. A ɩ na a dɩb ala a Nɩbɛ Bie na kʋrↄ nyɩ, a-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ a Sãa Naaŋmɩn kʋ a ʋ tʋↄfʋ a nyɩ na tʋↄ bↄ̃w ʋ.”
43006028	A ba soor ʋ: “Bõ sɩ sɛw na maal ɩ̃ a ɩ sɩ tʋ̃ na a tʋmↄ ala a Naaŋmɩn na bʋↄrↄ?”
43006029	A Jeeju yel ba: “A tʋn ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na bʋↄrↄ a nyɩ jie ɩ na nyɩ sↄw de a ʋlↄ ʋ na tʋ̃.”
43006030	A ba soor ʋ: “Nↄ-kofʋ tʋ̃-buor fʋ na maal a sɩ nyɛ ɩ̃ sↄw de fʋ? Bõ fʋ na maal?
43006031	A sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ dɩ na a dɩb ala ba na bʋↄlↄ a maan a wɛkar pʋↄ, a mɩnɛ a na yel a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: ʻƲ kʋ ba na a dɩb ala na yi a saꞋlon a ba dɩ.ʼ ”
43006032	A Jeeju yel ba: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, aa ɩ a Mowisi ɩ̃ dãa kʋ nyɩ a bõ-dɩraa ala na yi a saꞋlon wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ̃ Sãa, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ma kʋ nyɩ a bõ-dɩ-son ala na yi a saꞋlon.
43006033	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn bõ-dɩraa ʋlↄ ɩ na a ʋlↄ na yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ suu wa kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ a baafʋ.”
43006034	A ba yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, kʋrↄ sɩ a ʋna bõ-dɩraa a daar a jaa.”
43006035	A Jeeju yel ba: “Maa ɩ̃ ɩ a baafʋ dɩb. A ʋlↄ na wa a ɩ̃ sɛ̃, kↄ mↄↄ lↄↄ nyↄwrↄ ʋ go wa, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na sↄw de ma, kʋ̃ↄ-nyuur mↄↄ lↄↄ nyↄwrↄ ʋ go wa.
43006036	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ dãa na yel nyɩ, a nyɩmɩ nyɛ ma, ɩ̃-cɛ nyaa sↄw de ma wa.
43006037	A bala ba jaa a ɩ̃ Sãa na kʋrↄ ma na wa na a ɩ̃ sɛ̃, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na wa a ɩ̃ sɛ̃, ɩ̃ kↄ̃ be na jaar ʋ bar wa,
43006038	a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ yi na a saꞋlon ɩ̃ suu wa a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ maalfʋ ɩnɛ. Maa wa a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ maalfʋ wa.
43006039	A ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ par ɩ na áa bala ʋ na kʋ ma, a ɩ̃ taa bar a bõ-ƴen ʋ wa bↄrↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ̃ maal ba a ba ir a kũu pʋↄ a bibi-baaraa dayen.
43006040	A-na-ɩ a ɩ̃ Sãa pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ par ɩ na áa nɩrɛ lɛ na nyɛ a Bie ɩ̃ sↄw de ʋ, á ʋ na tɛrɛ na a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw, ɩ̃ a maa, ɩ̃ nↄↄ maal ʋ na ʋ ir a kũu pʋↄ a bibi-baaraa dayen.”
43006041	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Jufisɩ hũhune a Jeeju, a-na-ɩ ʋ yelʼã a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a dɩb na yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ suu.
43006042	Ba yele na: “Aa ɩ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a Jeeju na ɩ a Jojɛfʋ bie wa? Sɩ bↄ̃w na a ʋ sãa nɩ a ʋ mã. Mɩnɛ ʋ ɩ ɩ̃ yel a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ á ʋ yi na a saꞋlon ɩ̃ suu?”
43006043	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ bar a nyɩ hũhunfʋ.
43006044	Nɩrɛ ma tʋↄrↄ waara a ɩ̃ sɛ̃ ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Sãa na tʋ̃ ma, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ taw ʋ wa nɩ wa. Ɩ̃ a maa, ɩ̃ nↄↄ maal ʋ na ʋ ir a kũu pʋↄ a bibi-baaraa dayen.
43006045	A yelʼã a ƴɛr-hierbe sɛbɛ pʋↄ áa Naaŋmɩn na jaan ba na ba jaa. A bala ba jaa na cɛlɛ a ɩ̃ Sãa ƴɛrɩ̃ pↄw nɩ a ʋ jaanfʋ na wa na a ɩ̃ sɛ̃.
43006046	A lɛ ma yel a nɩrɛ nyɛ na a Sãa wa, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na yi a Naaŋmɩn jie, ʋlↄ tɛw ɩ̃ nyɛ a Sãa.
43006047	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ʋlↄ na sↄw de ma, ʋ tɛrɛ na a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw.
43006048	Maa ɩ̃ ɩ a baafʋ dɩb.
43006049	A nyɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ dãa na dɩ a dɩb ala a Naaŋmɩn na kʋ ba a wɛkar pʋↄ, ɩ̃ ba cãa na kpi,
43006050	ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩrɛ dɩ na a dɩb ʋlↄ na yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ suu, Ꞌwaa kpiire wa.
43006051	Maa ɩ̃ ɩ a baafʋ dɩb na yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ suu. A nɩrɛ ɩ̃ dɩ a ʋna dɩb, ʋ na tɛrɛ na a baafʋ daadaa kpoolaa. A dɩb ʋlↄ ɩ̃ nↄↄ kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ ɩ na a ɩ̃ ɩ̃gan. Ɩ̃ kʋrↄ ba na a lɛ a ba na tʋↄ tɛrɛ a baafʋ.”
43006052	A lɛ, a Jufisɩ faara na taa yele: “Mɩnɛ a daba na na tʋↄ kʋ sɩ a ʋ ɩ̃gan a sɩ Ꞌwↄb?”
43006053	A Jeeju yel ba: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a nyɩmɩ ma Ꞌwↄb a Nɩbɛ Bie ɩ̃gan, ɩ̃ mɩ nyu a ʋ jɩ̃ɩ wa, nyɩ kↄ̃ tɛrɛ baafʋ wa.
43006054	A ʋlↄ na Ꞌwↄb a ɩ̃ ɩ̃gan ɩ̃ mɩ nyu a ɩ̃ jɩ̃ɩ, ʋ tɛrɛ na a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw, ɩ̃ a maa, ɩ̃ na maal ʋ na ʋ ir a kũu pʋↄ a bibi-baaraa dayen.
43006055	A-na-ɩ a ɩ̃ ɩ̃gan sɩrɩ̃ na ɩ a dɩb, ɩ̃ a ɩ̃ jɩ̃ɩ mɩ sɩrɩ̃ ɩ a bõ-nyuuraa.
43006056	A ʋlↄ na Ꞌwↄb a ɩ̃ ɩ̃gan ɩ̃ mɩ nyu a ɩ̃ jɩ̃ɩ, ʋ be na a ɩ̃ pʋ̃ↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ be a ʋ pʋ̃ↄ.
43006057	A ɩ̃ Sãa tɛrɛ na a baafʋ ɩ̃ tʋ̃ ma. Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na tɛrɛ a baafʋ a yi a ʋ jie, a lɛ ʋ mɩ, a ʋlↄ na Ꞌwↄb ma na tɛrɛ na a baafʋ a yi a ɩ̃ jie.
43006058	A naa ɩ̃ ɩ a dɩb ʋlↄ na yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ suu, ɩ̃ aa wↄ̃ taa nɩ a dɩb ʋlↄ a nyɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ na kpi, na dãa dɩ wa. A ʋlↄ na dɩrɛ a dɩbʼã, ʋ na tɛrɛ na a baafʋ daadaa kpoolaa.”
43006059	A Jeeju ƴɛrʼã a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ asɩmɛ a lɛ ʋ na dãa jaana a nɩbɛ a puorfʋ yir a Kapɛɛnam.
43006060	A lɛ a Jeeju par-tuurbe na wõ a ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ baar, a yaw jie a ba pʋↄ yele na: “Á ƴɛrɩ̃ na kpɛmɛ na kpɛ! Ala ɩ̃ na tʋↄ sↄw?”
43006061	A Jeeju bↄ̃w nɩ na a ʋ par-tuurbe na hũhune a ala ɩnɛ ɩ̃ yel ba: “A cɛ nyɩ na mɩɩ?
43006062	Ɩ̃ mɩnɛ a na pãa wↄ̃ nyɩ, a nyɩmɩ wa nyɛ a Nɩbɛ Bie ʋ lɛ duoro a jie ʋlↄ ʋ na dãa be?
43006063	A ʋlↄ na kʋrↄ a nɩrɛ a baafʋ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ. A nɩrɛ mɩ̃ɛ fãgã ma tʋↄrↄ maala bom wa. A ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala ɩ̃ na ƴɛr nyɩ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩ a baafʋ ƴɛrɩ̃.
43006064	Ɩ̃-cɛ ŋmɛɛ be na a nyɩ pʋↄ na ma sↄw wa.” A-na-ɩ a Jeeju dãa na bↄ̃w a ʋlↄ nↄↄ diere ʋ a juu.
43006065	Ʋ lɛ yelʼã: “Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ yel nyɩ, a nɩrɛ ma tʋↄrↄ waara a ɩ̃ sɛ̃ ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a ɩ̃ Sãa ɩ̃ kʋ ʋ a sↄr wa.”
43006066	Wa nyↄw nɩ a ʋna daarʼãa, a ʋ par-tuurbe yaw jie ŋma na yi maa lɛ cãa tu ʋ wa.
43006067	A be jie, a Jeeju soorʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi: “A nyɩmɩ mɩ, nyɩ mɩ bʋↄrↄ na nyɩ ŋma yi mɩɩ?”
43006068	A Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ala jie sɩ na cen? A-na-ɩ fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ.
43006069	Ɩ̃ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, sɩ sↄw na ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Nɩ-son ʋ na tʋ̃.”
43006070	Ã Jeeju yel ba: “Aa ɩ maa ɩ̃ dãa vɛl ir a nyɩmɩ pie-nʼayi wa mɩɩ? Ɩ̃-cɛ bõ-ƴen a nyɩ pʋↄ ɩ na a Satã ben.”
43006071	A Sɩmↄ̃ Isikaryↄtɩ bie Judasɩ ʋ yele a lɛ, a-na-ɩ a mɩnɛ ʋ na saarɩ̃ ɩ a par-tuurbe pie-nʼayi ƴen sʋbↄ, ɩ̃ ʋlↄ nↄↄ de a Jeeju a juu.
43007001	A ala na tↄl baar, a Jeeju yʋↄrↄ na a Galile wɩɛr, ɩ̃ golo a Jude wɩɛr bara, a-na-ɩ a Jufisɩ nɩ-bɛrɛ bʋↄrↄ na ba kú ʋ.
43007002	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jufisɩ Sɛɛr fɛtɩ daar pɩɛlʼã,
43007003	a Jeeju yɛɛr yel ʋ: “Yi a ka ɩ̃ cen a Jude a mɩnɛ a fʋ par-tuurbe na mɩ tʋↄ nyɛ a tʋmↄ ala fʋ na maala.
43007004	A-na-ɩ a nɩrɛ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ba bↄ̃w ʋ a jiir a jaa, ʋ maa sↄↄlↄ tʋnↄ a ʋ tʋmↄ wa. A mɩnɛ fʋ na maala a yele ala, miilʼɩ̃ a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ a nɩbɛ ba jaa nyɛ fʋ.”
43007005	A-na-ɩ a ʋ yɛɛr mɩ̃ɛ ma dãa sↄw a ʋ ben wa.
43007006	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Jeeju yel ba: “A ɩ̃ daar ma ta sɛr wa, ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, a daar a jaa sɛw na a nyɩ jie.
43007007	A nɩbɛ ma tʋↄrↄ Ꞌlaara nyɩ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a maa, ba Ꞌlaar ma na a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ miil ba na áa ba tʋmↄ ɩ na tʋ̃-faar.
43007008	A nyɩmɩ, nyɩ́ cen a fɛtɩ jie. Maa cere a ʋna fɛtɩ jie wa, a-na-ɩ a ɩ̃ daar ma ta sɛr wa.”
43007009	A lɛ ʋ yel ba ɩ̃ cãa jɛ a Galile.
43007010	Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ a Jeeju yɛɛr na cen a fɛtɩ jie baar, ʋ mɩ tu na sↄↄlɩ̃ cen, a nɩrɛ ma nyɛ ʋ wa.
43007011	A Jufisɩ nɩ-bɛrɛ bʋↄrↄ ʋ na a fɛtɩ jie sooro nɩ: “Nyɩnɛ ʋ be?”
43007012	A nɩ-yaw búrↄ na taa a ʋ ɩnɛ. A ŋmɛɛ yele na a ʋ ɩ na nɩ-son, a ŋmɛɛ ma sↄw wa ɩ̃ yele a ʋ bɛlɛ na a nɩbɛ.
43007013	Ɩ̃-cɛ nɩrɛ ma dãa Ꞌlara ƴɛrɛ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ a yire cãa pʋↄ wa, a-na-ɩ a ba jaa jↄrↄ na a Jufisɩ nɩ-bɛrɛ dãbɩ̃ɛ.
43007014	A fɛtɩ bibie po na jɛ̃ taa, a Jeeju kpɛ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ nyↄw ɩ̃ jaana a nɩbɛ.
43007015	A nʋↄr ko na a Jufisɩ a ba sooro taa: “Mɩnɛ a daba na ɩ ɩ̃ bↄ̃w a sɛbɛ a lɛ, a ʋlↄ na ma mɩ dãa pↄw a jaanfʋ wa?”
43007016	A Jeeju yel ba: “A ala ɩ̃ na jaana a nɩbɛ ma yi a ɩ̃ jie wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a yi na a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma jie.
43007017	Ã ala ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩrɛ sↄw na maala a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃, ʋ na bↄ̃w na a ɩ̃ jaanfʋ yifʋ jie, a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn jie a yi mɩɩ maa ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ.
43007018	A ʋlↄ na ƴɛrɛ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ yuor ʋ bʋↄrↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na bʋↄrↄ a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ʋ yuor ʋ yire, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ sʋbↄ; bɛlɩ̃fʋ ma be a ʋ jie wa.
43007019	A Mowisi ma dãa kʋ nyɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn wa mɩɩ? Ɩ̃-cɛ nɩrɛ kãw a nyɩ pʋↄ ma jↄrↄ a ana ƴɛr-kpɛn wa. Bõ ɩnɛ nyɩ bʋↄrↄ nyɩ kú ma?”
43007020	A nɩbɛ yel ʋ: “Kↄ̃tↄn tɛrɛ fʋ na! Ala ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ʋ kú fʋ?”
43007021	A Jeeju yel ba: “Tʋn bõ-ƴen tɛw ɩ̃ maal ɩ̃ a nʋↄr ko nyɩ nyɩ jaa.
43007022	A Mowisi kʋ nyɩ na a yʋↄr ŋmaafʋ jɩbaa (ɩ̃ aa bↄ̃w yi a Mowisi jie wa, a nyɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ jie a yi). Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ nyɩ ma sↄw na ɩ̃ maal, a ala ɩ̃ saarɩ̃ ɩ a bibi-ciiraa dayen ʋ.
43007023	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ nyɩ ma ŋmaa na a bibile a yʋↄr a bibi-ciiraa dayen a mɩnɛ nyɩ kↄ̃ wa sãw a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn wa, bõ ɩnɛ nyɩ nyɛ a suur ƴↄ̃w ma a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ kpɛmɛ na nɩrɛ a daadaa a bibi-ciiraa dayen?
43007024	Nyɩ taa guoro a nɩrɛ ben tuure nɩ a ala a mimir na nyɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ ɩ a nyɩ guorfʋ a tor dẽdẽ.”
43007025	A Jerujalɛm nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ sooro na taa: “Aa ɩ a daba na ba bʋↄrↄ ba kú wa?
43007026	Ɩ̃ nyɛ, ʋ barʼã nyãa ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ, ɩ̃ a nɩrɛ ma yel ʋ bom wa. Á ɩ a sɩ ni-dierbe bↄ̃w na bↄ̃w ka ʋlↄ ɩ̃ sɩrɩ̃ ɩ a Kirisi mɩɩ?
43007027	Ɩ̃-cɛ a daba na, sɩ bↄ̃w na a ʋ yifʋ jie, ɩ̃ a Kirisi ɩ̃ wa wa, nɩrɛ kↄ̃ bↄ̃w a jie ʋ na yi wa.”
43007028	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na jaana a nɩbɛ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, ʋ ƴɛrʼã nɩ kpɛ̃w yel: “Nyɩ bↄ̃w ma na ɩ̃ mɩ bↄ̃w a jie ɩ̃ na yi, ɩ̃-cɛ maa wa nɩ a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ yuor wa. A ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma ɩ na Yel-mɩ̃ɛ Sʋbↄ, ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, nyaa bↄ̃w ʋ wa.
43007029	A maa, ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ʋ na, a-na-ɩ a ʋ jie ɩ̃ yi ɩ̃ wa, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ tʋ̃ ma.”
43007030	A be jie, ba dãa na bʋↄrↄ ba nyↄw ʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ nɩrɛ ma ir nuu sɩɩrʼɩ̃ ʋ wa, a-na-ɩ a ʋ daar ma dãa ta sɛr wa.
43007031	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩbɛ pʋↄ, yaw jie sↄw na de ʋ ɩ̃ yele: “A Kirisi ɩ̃ wa wa, ʋ na maalʼã a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ a gãw a ala a daba na na maal mɩɩ?”
43007032	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ wõ na a ala a nɩbɛ na búrↄ taa a Jeeju ɩnɛ, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a bala nɩ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ tʋ̃ a parsãdiele a ba nyↄw a Jeeju.
43007033	A Jeeju yel: “Fɩ̃ɩ tɛw ɩ̃ na cãa be nɩ nyɩ, ɩ̃ naa ɩ̃ lɩɛb cen a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma sɛ̃.
43007034	Nyɩ nↄↄ bʋↄrↄ ma na ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ kↄ̃ nyɛ ma wa, a-na-ɩ nyaa tʋↄrↄ wɩɛrɛ a jie ʋlↄ ɩ̃ nↄↄ beree wa.”
43007035	Á Jufisɩ sooro taa: “Nyɩnɛ ʋ na cen a sɩ kↄ̃ nyɛ ʋ wa? Ʋ na cenʼã a Gɩrɛkɩ ten ala pʋↄ a Jufisɩ na be na ʋ jaana a Gɩrɛkɩ nɩbɛ a be mɩɩ?
43007036	A ƴɛrɩ̃ na par ɩ na bõ ʋ na yel: Nyɩ nↄↄ bʋↄrↄ ma na, ɩ̃-eɛ nyɩ kↄ̃ nyɛ ma wa, a-na-ɩ nyaa tʋↄrↄ wɩɛrɛ a jie ʋlↄ ɩ̃ nↄↄ beree wa?”
43007037	A fɛtɩ bibi-baaraa dayen na ɩ a bibir kpɛ̃ɛ, a Jeeju irʼã ɩraa ɩ̃ ƴɛrʼɩ̃ kpɛ̃w yel: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ kʋ̃ↄ-nyuur nyↄw na nɩrɛ, ú wa a ɩ̃ sɛ̃ na nyu.
43007038	A mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na yel, a ʋlↄ na sↄw de ma, a baafʋ kʋ̃ↄ wɩlwɩl na jↄrↄ na yire a ʋ pʋ̃ↄ a kʋ̃ↄ bunaa kaarɩ̃.”
43007039	Ʋ yelʼã a lɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ɩnɛ a bala na sↄw de ʋ nↄↄ pↄwrↄ. A ʋna daarʼãa pʋↄ, a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ma dãa wa sɛr wa, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ma dãa miilʼɩ̃ a Jeeju yo-yifʋ sɛr wa.
43007040	A lɛ a nɩbɛ na wõ a ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ baar, a nɩŋmɛɛ a ba pʋↄ yelʼã: “A daba na sɩrɩ̃ na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere ʋlↄ ʋ na pʋlɩ̃ nɩ sɩ.”
43007041	A nɩŋmɛɛ yel: “A ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a Kirisi.” Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩŋmɛɛ yelʼã: “A Kirisi na tʋↄ na yi a Galile mɩɩ?
43007042	Aa yel a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ áa Kirisi na ɩ na a jamana Davɩtɩ bal par nɩrɛ wa? Á ʋ na yi na a Bɛtɩlɛm, na ɩ a jie ʋlↄ a Davɩtɩ na dãa be wa?”
43007043	A lɛ, a nɩbɛ ŋma na kpee kpee a ʋ ɩnɛ.
43007044	A nɩŋmɛɛ dãa bʋↄrↄ ba nyↄw ʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ nɩrɛ ma ir nuu sɩɩrʼɩ̃ ʋ wa.
43007045	A parsãdiele lɛ lɩɛbʼã cen a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ sɛ̃, a ba soor ba: “Bõ ɩnɛ nyaa nyↄw ʋ wa nɩ wa?”
43007046	A parsãdiele yel: “Nɩrɛ ma dãa ƴɛr ƴɛrɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a daba na na ƴɛrɛ wa.”
43007047	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ soor ba: “A nyɩmɩ mɩ, nyɩ mɩ sↄw na ʋ bɛlɩ̃ nyɩ pↄw mɩɩ?
43007048	Nyɩ nyɛ na nɩrɛ kãw a ni-dierbe sↄ̃w mɩɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ sↄ̃w na sↄw a ʋ ben mɩɩ?
43007049	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩbɛ na, baa bↄ̃w a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn wa, ba ɩ na a nɩbɛ bala ba na pↄ ƴↄ̃w.”
43007050	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ ƴen sʋbↄ na dɩ a Nikodɛ̃ na dãa cen na nyɛ a Jeeju yel ba na:
43007051	“A sɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn kʋ sɩ na sↄr a sɩ na tʋↄ ƴↄ̃w nɩrɛ ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ sɩ de na nĩe cɛl wõ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ bↄ̃w nɩ a ala ʋ na maala wa mɩɩ?”
43007052	A ba yel ʋ: “A fʋ̃ʋ mɩ, a Galile nɩrɛ fʋ mɩ ɩ mɩɩ? Bↄ̃w Ꞌlo nyɛ! Fʋ na bↄ̃w ka a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe pʋↄ, bõ-ƴen kãw ma dãa yi a Galile wa.” [
43007053	Ɩ̃ a lɛ, ba jaa wɛlʼã kule a ba yie.
43008001	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju cen a Olivi-tɩɩr tãw juu.
43008002	A lɛ a bio na vɩɛ, a Jeeju lɛ cenʼã a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ a dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ ɓaaraa, a nɩbɛ ba jaa wɩ a ʋ sɛ̃, ʋ jɛ ɩ̃ jaana ba.
43008003	Ɩ̃ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ wɩ nɩ na pↄw ba na nyɛ ʋ gã nɩ daba a ba nyↄw. Ba ƴↄ̃w ʋ na ʋ ɩraa a nɩbɛ ba jaa nii-sↄw,
43008004	ɩ̃ a ba yel a Jeeju: “Jãjaana, sɩ nyↄw na a pↄw naa a gã-ta-burbur pʋↄ.
43008005	A Mowisi yel sɩ na a ʋ ƴɛr-kpɛn pʋↄ á sɩ lↄb a pↄw-lɛ nɩ kʋsɩɛ kú. Ɩ̃ a fʋ̃ʋ, bõ fʋ tɛrɛ yele?”
43008006	Ba yelʼã a lɛ bʋↄrↄ ba bɩɩrʼɩ̃ a Jeeju, a mɩnɛ ba na tʋↄrↄ nyɛrɛ ƴɛr-fãa ƴↄnↄ ʋ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju gũu na nyɩrɛ a tene nɩ a ʋ nubir.
43008007	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na cãa sooro ʋ, ʋ irʼã ɩ̃ yel ba: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ nɩrɛ be na ka a nyɩ pʋↄ ɩ̃ ma maal fãa wa, ú de nĩe lↄbʼɩ̃ a pↄw a kʋsɩr”,
43008008	ɩ̃ na ʋ lɛ gũu nyɩrɛ a tene nɩ a nubir.
43008009	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na wõ a ʋna ƴɛr-bir, a nɩ-bɛrɛ de na nĩe yire bõ-ƴene-ƴene wa ta nɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa, ɩ̃ cɛ a Jeeju bar ʋ yẽ, nɩ a pↄw na cãa ɩraa a be.
43008010	A lɛ, a Jeeju irʼã soor a pↄw: “Nyɩnɛ ba be? Nɩrɛ ma ƴↄ̃w fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa mɩɩ?”
43008011	A pↄw yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, nɩrɛ ma ƴↄ̃w ma ƴɛrɩ̃ wa.” A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A maa mɩ, maa mɩ ƴↄnↄ fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa. Fʋ na tʋↄ na cen, ɩ̃ taa lↄↄ maala fãa wa.”]
43008012	A Jeeju lɛ ƴɛrʼã a ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋ a nɩbɛ yel: “Maa ɩ̃ ɩ a tẽw pʋↄ cãa. A ʋlↄ na tuure ma kↄ̃ cere a libe pʋↄ fɩ̃ɩ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ na tɛrɛ na a baafʋ cãa.”
43008013	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ yel ʋ: “Fʋ mɩ̃ɛ pʋↄ fʋ ƴɛrɛ ƴↄnↄ, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ala fʋ na mana ma tɛrɛ par wa.”
43008014	A Jeeju yel ba: “A ala ɩ̃ saarɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ pʋↄ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ ƴↄnↄ, a ala ɩ̃ na mana tɛrɛ na par, a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ bↄ̃w na a jie ɩ̃ na yi ɩ̃ wa, nɩ a jie ɩ̃ na cere. Ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩmɩ, nyaa bↄ̃w a jie ɩ̃ na yi ɩ̃ wa, nɩ a jie ɩ̃ na cere wa.
43008015	A nyɩmɩ, nɩbɛ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ nyɩ guoro nɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, ɩ̃ a maa, maa guoro nɩrɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa.
