43008016	Ɩ̃-cɛ a maa wa guoro nɩrɛ ƴɛrɩ̃, a ɩ̃ guorfʋ na torʼã dẽdẽ, a-na-ɩ maa be ɩ̃ yẽ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ̃ Sãa na tʋ̃ ma be nɩ ma na.
43008017	A sɛbʼã a nyɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn pʋↄ áa ala ɩ̃ ɩ nɩbɛ ayi manʼã a ƴɛrɩ̃, áa tɛrɛ na par.
43008018	A maa, ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ na ƴↄnↄ a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ a ɩ̃ Sãa na tʋ̃ ma, mɩ ƴɛrɛ na ƴↄnↄ ma.”
43008019	A ba soor ʋ: “Nyɩnɛ a fʋ Sãa be?” Ʋ yel ba: “Nyaa bↄ̃w a maa nɩ a ɩ̃ Sãa wa. A ala ɩ̃ ɩ nyɩ dãa na bↄ̃w ma, nyɩ naa mɩ bↄ̃w na a ɩ̃ Sãa.”
43008020	A Jeeju ƴɛrʼã a ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a libie ƴↄ̃wfʋ jie par, be a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ nɩrɛ ma nyↄw ʋ wa, a-na-ɩ a ʋ daar ma ta sɛr wa.
43008021	A Jeeju lɛ yel ba na: “Ɩ̃ cere na ɩ̃ nyɩ nↄↄ bʋↄrↄ ma na, ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ na kpi nɩ na a nyɩ maal-faar. A jie ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na cere, nyaa tʋↄrↄ wɩɛrɛ a be wa.”
43008022	A be jie, a Jufisɩ sooro na taa: “Ʋ na kú na a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ mɩɩ? A-na-ɩ ʋ yelʼã á saa tʋↄrↄ cere a jie ʋ na cere wa.”
43008023	A Jeeju yel ba: “A nyɩmɩ, ka tẽw pʋↄ nyɩ yi, ɩ̃-cɛ a maa, saꞋlon ɩ̃ yi. A nyɩmɩ, nyɩ ɩ na a tẽw naa nɩbɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ a maa, maa ɩ a tẽw naa nɩrɛ wa.
43008024	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ yel nyɩ a nyɩ na kpi nɩ na a nyɩ maal-faar, a-na-ɩ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ nyaa sↄw á maa ɩ̃ ɩ a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na ɩ wa, nyɩ na kpi nɩ na a nyɩ maal-faar.”
43008025	A ba soor ʋ: “Ala fʋ ɩ?” A Jeeju yel ba: “Ɩ̃ ɩ na a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na dãa yel nyɩ a korĩ-cɛ.
43008026	Ɩ̃ tɛrɛ na yele yaw na ƴɛr ɩ̃ guor a nyɩ ɩnɛ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma ɩ na Yel-mɩ̃ɛ Sʋbↄ, ɩ̃ a ala ɩ̃ na ƴɛrɛ kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ a ka a tẽw pʋↄ ɩ na a ala tɛw ɩ̃ na wõ a ʋ jie.”
43008027	Ɩ̃ a Jufisɩ ma dãa bↄ̃w ka a Sãa ɩnɛ a Jeeju ƴɛrɛ ba wa.
43008028	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Jeeju yel ba: “A daar ʋlↄ nyɩ nↄↄ jɛwrɛ a Nɩbɛ Bie duoro nɩ, ala nyɩ na bↄ̃w ka a maa ɩ̃ ɩ a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na ɩ. Nyɩ na mɩ bↄ̃w na á maa maala bom ɩ̃ yẽ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ala a Sãa na man ma, ala tɛw ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ.
43008029	A ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma be nɩ ma na. ꞋWaa bar ma ɩ̃ yẽ wa, a-na-ɩ a daar a jaa ɩ̃ maala na a ala na nʋmↄ ʋ.”
43008030	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na ƴɛrɛ a lɛ, yaw jie sↄw na de ʋ.
43008031	A Jeeju yelʼã a Jufisɩ bala na dãa sↄw de ʋ: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ nyɩ sɩrɩ̃ na jↄrↄ a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, nyɩ na sɩrɩ̃ na ɩ a ɩ̃ par-tuurbe.
43008032	Nyɩ na bↄ̃w na a yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ a ʋna yel-mɩ̃ɛ na Ꞌlor nyɩ na bar a nyɩ sↄ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ.”
43008033	Ã ba yel: “Sɩ ɩ na a Abʋraham bal par bibiir; saa dãa ɩ nɩrɛ kãw gbãgbaar wa. Ɩ̃ mɩnɛ fʋ ɩ ɩ̃ yel a sɩ na sↄ na sɩ mɩ̃ɛ?”
43008034	A Jeeju yel ba: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a nɩrɛ lɛ na maala a fãa, ʋ ɩ na a maal-fãa gbãgbaa.
43008035	Ɩ̃ a gbãgbaa ma tɛrɛ jaajie a yir deme sↄ̃w a daar a jaa wa, ɩ̃ a yir bie, ʋlↄ tɛrɛ na a jaajie a daar a jaa.
43008036	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a Bie Ꞌlor nyɩ na bar, nyɩ na sↄ na nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ sɩrɛ jaa.
43008037	Ɩ̃ bↄ̃w na bↄ̃w ka nyɩ ɩ na a Abʋraham bal par bibiir, ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ bʋↄrↄ na nyɩ kú ma, a-na-ɩ nyaa sↄw a ɩ̃ jaanfʋ wa.
43008038	A maa, ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ na a ala ɩ̃ na nyɛ a ɩ̃ Sãa sɛ̃, ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩmɩ, a ala nyɩ na wõ a nyɩ sãa jie, ala nyɩ maala.”
43008039	A ba yel a Jeeju: “Abʋraham ɩ̃ ɩ a sɩ sãa.” Ʋ yel ba: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a Abʋraham bibiir nyɩ dãa ɩ, nyɩ naa maala na a tʋ̃-bie ala ʋ na dãa maal.
43008040	Ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ ɛ̃ɛ na bʋↄrↄ nyɩ kú ma, a maa na yel nyɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ ala ɩ̃ na wõ a Naaŋmɩn jie. Á Abʋraham ma dãa maal a lɛ wa.
43008041	A nyɩ sãa tʋ̃-bie nyɩ maala.” A ba yel ʋ: “Saa ɩ sɛ̃sɛ̃-biir wa; sãa bõ-ƴen tɛw sɩ tɛrɛ, a Naaŋmɩn ʋ.”
43008042	A Jeeju yel ba: “A ala ɩ̃ dãa ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ sɩrɩ̃ ɩ a nyɩ Sãa, nyɩ naa nʋ ma na, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn jie ɩ̃ yi ɩ̃ wa. Maa wa nɩ a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ yuor wa, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ tʋ̃ ma.
43008043	Bõ ɩnɛ nyaa bↄ̃w a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ par wa? A-na-ɩ nyaa tʋↄrↄ bↄ̃wnↄ a ɩ̃ tɩɛrʋ̃ gbɛr wa.
43008044	A nyɩ sãa ɩ na a Satã, ɩ̃ nyɩ mɩ bʋↄrↄ na nyɩ maal a nyɩ sãa pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃. Wa nyↄw nɩ a korĩ-cɛ jaa, nɩ-kúrↄ ʋ ɩ, ɩ̃ Ꞌwaa ɩraa a yel-mɩ̃ɛ pʋↄ wa, a-na-ɩ yel-mɩ̃ɛ ma be a ʋ jie wa. A ʋlↄ ɩ̃ wa ŋmaara a jiri, a ʋ wãa ɩ̃ be a lɛ, a-na-ɩ jir-ŋmara ʋ ɩ, ɩ̃ mɩ ɩ a jiri sãa.
43008045	Ɩ̃-cɛ a maa, a yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ na yele nyɩ, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a nyaa sↄw de ma wa.
43008046	Ala ɩ̃ be a nyɩ pʋↄ na tʋↄ miilʼɩ̃ a ɩ yel-mɩ̃ɛ á ɩ̃ maalʼã a fãa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele, bõ ɩnɛ nyaa sↄw a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa?
43008047	A nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ben ma cɛlɛ na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃. Ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩmɩ, nyaa cɛlɛ wa, a-na-ɩ nyaa ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ben wa.”
43008048	A Jufisɩ yelʼã a Jeeju: “Má yel-mɩ̃ɛ sɩ yel a Samari nɩrɛ fʋ ɩ, ɩ̃ a kↄ̃tↄn mɩ tɛrɛ fʋ na!”
43008049	A Jeeju yel ba: “Kↄ̃tↄn ma tɛrɛ ma wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ̃ Sãa ɩ̃ ƴↄnↄ, ɩ̃ a nyɩ kpɛrɛ ma.
43008050	A maa, maa bʋↄrↄ a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ yuor ʋ yire wa, ɩ̃ a bõ-ƴen be na be na bʋↄrↄ a ɩ̃ yuor ʋ yire, ɩ̃ ʋlↄ mɩ ɩ a Yɛr-guoro.
43008051	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩrɛ jↄrↄ na a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, Ꞌwaa be na kpi wa.”
43008052	A Jufisɩ yel ʋ: “A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, sɩ pãa na bↄ̃w ka kↄ̃tↄn tɛrɛ fʋ na. A-na-ɩ a Abʋraham kpi na, a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe mɩ kpi, ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ yel áa ala ɩ̃ ɩ nɩrɛ jↄrↄ na a fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, a Ꞌwaa be na kpi wa.
43008053	Fʋ̃ʋ bɛrmɛ gãw a sɩ sãa Abʋraham mɩɩ? Ʋ kpi na, a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe mɩ kpi, ɩ̃ a fʋ̃ʋ, ala fʋ tɩɛr a fʋ ɩ?”
43008054	A Jeeju yel: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a maa mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ a yuor, a ɩ̃ yo-bↄfʋ na ɩ na pↄrↄ. Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na maala a ɩ̃ yuor ʋ yire ɩ na a ɩ̃ Sãa, a ʋlↄ nyɩ na yel áa nyɩ Naaŋmɩn ʋ.
43008055	Ɩ̃-cɛ nyaa bↄ̃w ʋ wa, ɩ̃ a maa, ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ʋ na. A maa ɩ̃ yel á maa bↄ̃w ʋ wa, ɩ̃ na mɩ ɩ na jir-ŋmara a nyɩ kaarɩ̃, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ʋ na ɩ̃ mɩ jↄrↄ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ.
43008056	A nyɩ sãa Abʋraham dãa na cɩlɛ a mɩnɛ ʋ na tɩɛrɛ a ʋ na nyɛ na a ɩ̃ bibir. Ʋ nyɛ ʋ na, a nʋ̃ↄ nyↄw ʋ.”
43008057	A Jufisɩ yel ʋ: “Faa mɩ pↄw yomo lɩjaayi nɩ pie sɛr wa, ɩ̃ yel a fʋ nyɛ na a Abʋraham?”
43008058	A Jeeju yel ba: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a lɛ ba na ma dãa dↄw a Abʋraham sɛr wa, a maa, ɩ̃ be na be.”
43008059	A be jie, ba woorʼã kubie bʋↄrↄ ba lↄbʼɩ̃ ʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju sↄↄlɩ̃ na yi a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ cen.
43009001	A lɛ a Jeeju na tↄlↄ, ʋ nyɛ na jↄ̃w ba na dↄw nɩ a lɛ.
43009002	A par-tuurbe soor a Jeeju: “Jãjaana, ala ɩ̃ maal a fãa a ba dↄw a daba na ʋ ɩ a jↄ̃w? A ʋ dↄↄrbↄ ʋ, mɩɩ a ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ ʋ?”
43009003	A Jeeju yel ba: “Aa ɩ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ maal a fãa wa, aa mɩ yi a ʋ dↄↄrbↄ jie wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ jↄ̃w na a lɛ a mɩnɛ a na saa a nɩbɛ na tʋↄ nyɛ a Naaŋmɩn tʋ̃-bie.
43009004	A lɛ a mↄtↄ̃w na cãa caara, a sɛw na a sɩ na tʋnↄ a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma tʋmↄ. A tɩsↄw tara na a nɩrɛ ma tʋↄrↄ tʋnↄ tʋn wa.
43009005	A lɛ ɩ̃ na cãa a tẽw pʋↄ, maa ɩ̃ ɩ a tẽw pʋↄ cãa.”
43009006	A mɩnɛ ʋ na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, ʋ cɩrʼã natɛɛr ƴↄ̃w a tana pʋↄ, ɩ̃ nyaka a tana ala de bol a jↄ̃w mimie,
43009007	ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Cen na pɛw a fʋ nii-sↄw a Silowe kʋ̃ↄ puulĩfʋ jie.” (A Silowe yuor par ɩ na “Tʋ̃fʋ.”) A daba cenʼã na pɛw a ʋ nii-sↄw nyɛrɛ lɩɛb waara nɩ.
43009008	A ʋ lãa-pɩɛlbɛ nɩ a bala na ma dãa nyɛ ʋ ʋ jɛ sʋↄrↄ a yele sooro na taa: “Aa ɩ a daba na ɩ̃ ma dãa jɛ sʋↄrↄ a yele wa?”
43009009	A nɩŋmɛɛ ma yelʼã á ʋlↄ ʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩŋmɛɛ ma yel á aa ɩ ʋlↄ ʋ wa, á nɩ-wↄ̃ tar ʋ. Ɩ̃ a jↄ̃w mɩ̃ɛ yele na: “Maa ʋ.”
43009010	A ba soor ʋ: “Mɩnɛ a fʋ mimie ɩ ɩ̃ yuo?”
43009011	Ʋ yel ba: “A daba ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Jeeju, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ nyaka a tana bol ma a mimie, ɩ̃ yel ma á ɩ̃ cen a Silowe kʋ̃ↄ puulĩfʋ jie na pɛw a nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ cen na pɛw, a ɩ̃ mimie yuo.”
43009012	A ba soor ʋ: “Nyɩnɛ a daba ʋlↄ be?” Ʋ yel ba: “Maa bↄ̃w wa.”
43009013	Ba taw na a daba ʋlↄ na dãa jↄ̃w cenʼɩ̃ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ jie,
43009014	a-na-ɩ a bibir ʋlↄ a Jeeju na nyaka a tana yuo nɩ ʋ a mimie ɩ na a bibi-ciiraa dayen.
43009015	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ mɩ sooro na a jↄ̃w a mɩnɛ ʋ na ɩ ɩ̃ nyɛrɛ, ʋ yel ba: “Tana ʋ bol ma a mimie ɩ̃ pɛw bar ɩ̃ nyɛrɛ.”
43009016	A lɛ, a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ yelʼã: “A ʋna sʋbↄ na maal a lɛ, Ꞌwaa yi a Naaŋmɩn jie wa, a-na-ɩ Ꞌwaa sↄmↄ a bibi-ciiraa wa.” Ɩ̃ a nɩŋmɛɛ yele na: “Mɩnɛ a nɩ-fãa na tʋↄ maal a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ a nↄhↄ̃?” Ɩ̃ a baa dãa ɩ nↄ-bõ-ƴen wa.
43009017	Ba lɛ bↄ̃w na soor a jↄ̃w: “A fʋ̃ʋ, ala fʋ tɩɛr a ʋ ɩ? A-na-ɩ a fʋ mimie ʋ yuo.” Ʋ yel ba: “Ʋ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere.”
43009018	A Jufisɩ ma sↄw a jↄ̃w ʋ dãa ɩ ɩ̃ wa nyɛrɛ wa, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ba bʋↄl a ʋ dↄↄrbↄ soor:
43009019	“A nyɩ bie nɩ a naa mɩɩ? A jↄ̃w nyɩ sɩrɩ̃ dↄw ʋ mɩɩ? Ɩ̃ mɩnɛ ʋ ɩ ɩ̃ nyɛrɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃?”
43009020	A ʋ dↄↄrbↄ yel: “Sɩ bↄ̃w ka ʋ ɩ na a sɩ bie sɩrɛ jaa, a sɩ mɩ dↄw ʋ ʋ ɩ a jↄ̃w,
43009021	ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ ʋ na ɩ ɩ̃ nyɛrɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, saa bↄ̃w wa. Saa mɩ bↄ̃w a ʋlↄ na yuo ʋ a mimie wa. Nyɩ́ soor ʋ, Ꞌwaa ɩ bibile wa, a ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ na man nyɩ na.”
43009022	A ʋ dↄↄrbↄ yelʼã a lɛ a-na-ɩ ba jↄrↄ na a Jufisɩ dãbɩ̃ɛ. A Jufisɩ dãa na man taa áa nɩrɛ ɩ̃ wa yel áa Jeeju ɩ na a Kirisi, á ba na diw ʋ na bar a ba puorfʋ yir.
43009023	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ʋ dↄↄrbↄ yel á Ꞌwaa ɩ bibile wa, á ba soor a ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ.
43009024	A lɛ a na be, a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ lɛ bʋↄlʼã a daba na dãa ɩ a jↄ̃w gbɛɛ ayi pʋↄ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Yel yel-mɩ̃ɛ a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw, a-na-ɩ a sɩmɩ, sɩ bↄ̃w ka a ʋna daba ɩ na nɩ-fãa.”
43009025	Ʋ yel ba: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ nɩ-fãa ʋ ɩ, maa bↄ̃w wa. Bõ-bõ-ƴen tɛw ɩ̃ bↄ̃w: jↄ̃w ɩ̃ dãa ɩ, ɩ̃-cɛ ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ɩ̃ nyɛrɛ na.”
43009026	A ba soor ʋ: “Bõ ʋ maal fʋ? Mɩnɛ ʋ ɩ ɩ̃ yuo fʋ a mimie?”
43009027	Ʋ yel ba: “Ɩ̃ dãa na man kʋ nyɩ, ɩ̃ nyaa eɛl ma wa. Bõ nyɩ bʋↄrↄ nyɩ lɛ wõ ɩ nɩ? A nyɩmɩ mɩ, nyɩ mɩ bʋↄrↄ na nyɩ lɩɛb ɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe mɩɩ?”
43009028	A ba tʋrↄ ʋ ɩ̃ yele: “Fʋ̃ʋ ɩ a ʋna daba naa par-tuure, ɩ̃-cɛ a sɩmɩ, Mowisi par-tuurbe sɩ ɩ.
43009029	Sɩ bↄ̃w ka a Naaŋmɩn dãa na ƴɛrʼɩ̃ a Mowisi ɩ̃-cɛ a daba ʋlↄ, saa bↄ̃w a jie ʋ na yi wa.”
43009030	A daba yel ba: “A ko ma na nʋↄr nyɩ na ma bↄ̃w a ʋ yifʋ jie wa, ɩ̃-eɛ ʋ yuo ma na a mimie.
43009031	Sɩ bↄ̃w ka a Naaŋmɩn maa cɛl a nɩ-faar wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩrɛ lɛ na jↄrↄ ʋ ɩ̃ maala a ʋ pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃, ʋlↄ ʋ ma cɛl.
43009032	Wa nyↄw nɩ a tẽkorĩ, nɩrɛ ma dãa wõ a ba yel a ba yuo na a nɩrɛ ba na dↄw ʋ ɩ a jↄ̃w mimie wa.
43009033	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a daba ʋlↄ ma dãa yi a Naaŋmɩn jie wa, Ꞌwaa tʋↄrↄ maala bom kãw wa.”
43009034	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ yel ʋ: “Wa nyↄw nɩ a fʋ dↄwfʋ daar, maal-fãa pʋↄ fʋ be. Mɩnɛ a ɩ a fʋ bʋↄrↄ fʋ jaan sɩ bom?” Ɩ̃ na ba diw ʋ bar a ba sↄ̃w.
43009035	A Jeeju wõ na a ba diw ʋ na bar a ba sↄ̃w, ɩ̃ bↄ ʋ soor: “Fʋ tɛrɛ na ƴↄ̃w-nyãa a Nɩbɛ Bie jie mɩɩ?”
43009036	A daba yel a Jeeju: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, yel ma a sʋbↄ ʋlↄ ʋ na ɩ, ɩ̃ na tʋↄ tɛrɛ nɩ ʋ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa.”
43009037	Ã Jeeju yel ʋ: “Fʋ nyɛ ʋ na; ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ nɩ fʋ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na.”
43009038	A daba yel: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ sↄw na,” ɩ̃ gburĩ a dume puor ʋ.
43009039	A Jeeju yel: “Yɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ ɩnɛ ɩ̃ wa a ka a tẽw pʋↄ, a mɩnɛ a bala na jↄ̃w na tʋↄ nyɛrɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ a bala na nyɛrɛ na lɩɛb ɩ a jↄn.”
43009040	A Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ na dãa be nɩ ʋ wõ na a ala ʋ na ƴɛr ɩ̃ soor ʋ: “A sɩmɩ mɩ, jↄn sɩ mɩ ɩ mɩɩ?”
43009041	A Jeeju yel ba: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ jↄn nyɩ dãa ɩ, nyɩ kↄ̃ↄ tɛrɛ cɛfʋ jie wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ nyɩ na yel a nyɩ nyɛrɛ na, a nyɩ fãa cãa na be a nyɩ jie.”
43010001	“Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ʋlↄ na maa kpɛ a piir jaw pʋↄ nɩ a dↄ̃dↄr wa, ɩ̃ ma do nɩ a dacin juu, a ʋna sʋbↄ naa ɩ na nyanyuur nɩ nɩ-bier.
43010002	Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na ma kpɛ nɩ a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a piir dↄ-cɩɩnaa.
43010003	A dↄ̃dↄr-gure ma yuo ʋ na a pan, a piir ma wõ a ʋ kↄkɩr, ɩ̃ ʋ bʋↄlↄ a ʋ piir yoe a ba tuure ʋ yire nɩ a yẽw.
43010004	A mɩnɛ ʋ na kpa a ʋ piir ba jaa yi nɩ, ʋ ma de na nĩe a ba tuure ʋ, a-na-ɩ ba bↄ̃w na a ʋ kↄkɩr.
43010005	Ba kↄ̃ tu a saana wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ba na ɛ̃ɛ na jↄ jãa nɩ ʋ, a-na-ɩ baa bↄ̃w a sáanba kↄkɩɛ wa.”
43010006	A Jeeju lↄbʼã a sʋkpa ʋlↄ kʋ ba, ɩ̃ baa bↄ̃w a ala ʋ na ƴɛrɛ ba par wa.
43010007	A Jeeju lɛ yel ba: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, maa ɩ̃ ɩ a piir dↄ̃dↄr nʋↄr.
43010008	A bala ba jaa na dãa de ma a nĩe wa ɩ na nyanyube nɩ nɩ-bebe, ɩ̃ a piir ma dãa sↄw cɛl ba wa.
43010009	Maa ɩ̃ ɩ a dↄ̃dↄr nʋↄr. A nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na kpɛɛrɛ nɩ a dↄ̃dↄr ʋlↄ, ʋ na nyɛ na a faafʋ. Ʋ na kpɛ na ɩ̃ yi, ɩ̃ ʋ na pↄw na a bõ-dɩraa.
43010010	A nyanyuur ma wa na a jufʋ nɩ a kúfʋ nɩ a sãwfʋ ɩnɛ tɛw. A maa, ɩ̃ wa na a nɩbɛ na tʋↄ pↄw a baafʋ, ɩ̃ a baafʋ ʋlↄ na ƴↄ ba.
43010011	“Maa ɩ̃ ɩ a dↄ-cɩɩn-son. A dↄ-cɩɩn-son sↄw na na kpi a ʋ piir ɩnɛ.
43010012	A ʋlↄ na tʋnↄ a libie tʋn, Ꞌwaa ɩ a dↄ-cɩɩnaa ʋlↄ na sↄ a piir wa. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ wa nyɛ a nyaanyiir ʋ waara, ʋ ma barʼã a piir ɩ̃ jↄ, a nyaanyiir ma yɛ̃yɛlɩ̃ ba bar ɩ̃ nyↄↄr a ŋmɛɛ.
43010013	Ʋ ma jↄ na a lɛ, a-na-ɩ libie tʋn ʋ tʋnↄ ɩ̃ a piir ben ma ba ʋ wa.
43010014	-
43010015	Maa ɩ̃ ɩ a dↄ-cɩɩn-son. A mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na bↄ̃w a ɩ̃ Sãa ɩ̃ a ɩ̃ Sãa mɩ bↄ̃w ma, a lɛ ɩ̃ mɩ bↄ̃w a ɩ̃ piir a ba mɩ bↄ̃w ma, ɩ̃ ɩ̃ sↄw na na kpi a ba ɩnɛ.
43010016	Ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ na piir ŋmɛɛ na ma be a jaw na pʋↄ wa. A sɛw na ɩ̃ na kpa ba wa nɩ; ba na cɛlɛ na a ɩ̃ kↄkɩr ɩ̃ a ba jaa nↄↄ ɩ na a dʋ̃-bõ-ƴen ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ a dↄ-cɩɩn-bõ-ƴen.
43010017	“A ɩ̃ Sãa nʋ ma na a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ sↄw na na kpi, ɩ̃ na lɛ tʋↄ ir de a ɩ̃ baafʋ.
43010018	Nɩrɛ ma faara ʋ a ɩ̃ jie wa, ɩ̃-cɛ maa mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ sↄw na kpi. Ɩ̃ tɛrɛ na a tʋↄfʋ na kpi a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ; ɩ̃ mɩ lɛ tɛrɛ na a tʋↄfʋ na lɛ ir de a ɩ̃ baafʋ. A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a ala a ɩ̃ Sãa na ƴↄ̃w ma a ɩ̃ maal.”
43010019	A ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ɩnɛ, a Jufisɩ lɛ ƴɛrɛ na kpee kpee.
43010020	A yaw jie a ba pʋↄ yele na: “Kↄ̃tↄn tɛrɛ ʋ na. Ʋ yaara na! Bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a nyɩ cɛlɛ ʋ?”
43010021	A ŋmɛɛ yele: “A ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ na ma ɩ kↄ̃tↄn-ire ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ wa. A kↄ̃tↄn na tʋↄ na yuo jↄ̃w mimie mɩɩ?”
43010022	A ɩ na a Ꞌwuon, a ba maala a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pↄlfʋ fɛtɩ a Jerujalɛm.
43010023	A Jeeju yʋↄrↄ na a Salʋmↄ̃ jɛ̃bɛrɩ̃ pʋↄ be a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ,
43010024	a Jufisɩ tiw kolĩ ʋ ɩ̃ sooro ʋ: “A baalɩ̃fʋ na fʋ na ƴↄ̃w sɩ, dabor a nↄↄ baar? A ala ɩ̃ ɩ fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ ɩ a Kirisi, yel kʋ sɩ cãa pʋↄ.”
43010025	A Jeeju yel ba: “Ɩ̃ yelʼã kʋ nyɩ, ɩ̃ nyaa sↄw wa. A tʋmↄ ala ɩ̃ na maala nɩ a ɩ̃ Sãa yuor, ala ɩ̃ miile a ɩ̃ yel-mɩ̃ɛ,
43010026	ɩ̃-cɛ nyaa sↄw wa, a-na-ɩ nyaa be a ɩ̃ piir pʋↄ wa.
43010027	A ɩ̃ piir ma wõ na a ɩ̃ kↄkɩr, ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ba, a ba tuure ma.
43010028	Ɩ̃ kʋrↄ ba na a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw ɩ̃ baa be na kpi wa, ɩ̃ nɩrɛ ma faara ba a ɩ̃ nuumɩ wa.
43010029	A ala a ɩ̃ Sãa na kʋ ma gãw na a yele a jaa, ɩ̃ nɩrɛ kↄ̃ tʋↄ faa bom a ɩ̃ Sãa nuumɩ wa.
43010030	A maa nɩ a ɩ̃ Sãa ɩ na bõ-ƴen.”
43010031	A Jufisɩ lɛ woorʼã a kubie bʋↄrↄ ba lↄb ʋ,
43010032	a Jeeju yel ba: “Ɩ̃ maalʼã a tʋ̃-sono yaw miilʼɩ̃ nyɩ nɩ a ɩ̃ Sãa fãw. Tʋn buor ɩnɛ nyɩ bʋↄrↄ nyɩ lↄb ma nɩ a kubie kú?”
43010033	A Jufisɩ yel ʋ: “Aa ɩ tʋn son ɩnɛ sɩ lↄbↄ fʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn fʋ na kpɛrɛ ɩnɛ ʋ, a-na-ɩ a fʋ̃ʋ na ɩ a nɩrɛ, fʋ bʋↄrↄ na ba de fʋ a fʋ ɩ Naaŋmɩn.”
43010034	A Jeeju yel ba: “A nyɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn pʋↄ, a Naaŋmɩn ma yel á ʻNyɩ ɩ na a naaŋmɩnsɩʼ wa mɩɩ?
43010035	A bala ʋ na bʋↄlↄ a naaŋmɩnsɩ ɩ na a nɩbɛ bala na pↄw a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ sɩ bↄ̃w ka a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ma tʋↄrↄ ɩrɛ jiri wa.
43010036	Ɩ̃ a maa a Sãa na vɛl ir tʋ̃ a ka a tẽw pʋↄ, a maa yel áa Naaŋmɩn Bie ɩ̃ ɩ, bõ ɩnɛ nyɩ yel áa Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ kpɛrɛ?
43010037	A maa ma maala a ɩ̃ Sãa tʋmↄ wa, nyɩ taa sↄw a ɩ̃ ben wa.
43010038	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ ɩ̃ maala na a ɩ̃ Sãa tʋmↄ, a nyɩmɩ ma saarɩ̃ sↄw a maa mɩ̃ɛ wa, ɩ̃ nyɩ́ sↄw a tʋmↄ ala ɩnɛ, a mɩnɛ a nyɩ na tʋↄ bↄ̃w bↄ̃w ka a ɩ̃ Sãa be na a ɩ̃ pʋ̃ↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ be a ɩ̃ Sãa pʋ̃ↄ.”
43010039	A lɛ, a Jufisɩ lɛ bʋↄrↄ na ba nyↄw ʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ cenʼã ɩ̃ cɛ ba bar.
43010040	A Jeeju lɛ cenʼã a Jʋrdɛ̃ man gaan, ta a jie ʋlↄ a Jã na dãa mʋrↄ a nɩbɛ a kʋ̃ↄ a korĩ-cɛ. Ʋ jɛ na a be,
43010041	a nɩ-yaw wɩ a ʋ sɛ̃ na yele: “A Jã ma dãa maal nↄ-kofʋ tʋn kãw wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ala a jaa ʋ na yel a daba na ɩnɛ ɩ na yel-mɩ̃ɛ.”
43010042	Ɩ̃ a nɩ-yaw sↄw na de a Jeeju a be.
43011001	Daba dãa na be be na dɩ Lajaar ɩ̃ ɩ wʋlɩ̃. Ʋ be na a Betani-tẽw na mɩ ɩ a Maarɩɩ nɩ a ʋ yɛbɛ Martɩ tẽw.
43011002	A Maarɩɩ ɩ na a ʋlↄ na dãa cir a kã-nyu-vɩlaa ƴↄ̃w a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju gbɛɛ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ lɩɛb a ʋ jukↄbↄ fↄfↄ nɩ, ɩ̃ a Lajaar ʋlↄ na ɩ a wʋlɩ̃ ɩ na a ʋ yɛ-daba.
43011003	A Lajaar yɛ-pↄↄbↄ ayi bala tʋ̃ na nɩrɛ ʋ cen na yel a Jeeju: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, a fʋ baraa ɩ na wʋlɩ̃.”
43011004	A lɛ a Jeeju na wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃, ʋ yelʼã: “A wʋlɩ̃ ʋlↄ ma kúrↄ ʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ɛ̃ɛ na ta ʋ a lɛ, na tʋↄ miilʼɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn yo-yifʋ, ɩ̃ mɩ maal a maa Naaŋmɩn Bie yuor ʋ yi.”
43011005	A Jeeju nʋ na a Martɩ nɩ a Maarɩɩ nɩ a ba yɛ-daba Lajaar.
43011006	A lɛ ʋ na wõ a Lajaar wʋlɩ̃, ʋ lɛ cãa na maal bibie ayi a jie ʋlↄ ʋ na be,
43011007	ɩ̃ pãa yel a ʋ par-tuurbe: “Nyɩ́ ɩ a sɩ lɩɛb cen a Jude.”
43011008	A ʋ par-tuurbe yel ʋ: “Jãjaana, aa ɩ a dayenɩ̃ yɛ̃yɛ̃ na a Jufisɩ dãa bʋↄrↄ ba lↄbʼɩ̃ fʋ a kʋsɩɛ kú wa? Ɩ̃ a fʋ lɛ bʋↄrↄ fʋ lɩɛb cen a be?”
43011009	A Jeeju yel ba: “A bibir tɛrɛ na a ʋ mↄtↄ̃w caarɩ̃fʋ daar. A nɩrɛ ɩ̃ cere a mↄtↄ̃w, Ꞌwaa ŋmeere gbɛr wa a-na-ɩ a wɩɛr caarɩ̃ ʋ na.
43011010	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a tɩsↄw a nɩrɛ cere ʋ na ŋme na a gbɛr, a-na-ɩ a cãa ma be a ʋ jie wa.”
43011011	A mɩnɛ ʋ na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, ʋ yel ba na: “A sɩ baraa Lajaar gurʼã ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ na cenʼã na sɩ̃w ʋ.”
43011012	A ʋ par-tuurbe yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ gur, ʋ na kpɛmɛ na.”
43011013	A Jeeju bʋↄrↄ na ʋ yel ba áa Lajaar kpi na ɩ̃-cɛ a par-tuurbe tɩɛrʼã beeka gʋ̃ↄ son ʋ yele ba.
43011014	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Jeeju yel ba cãa pʋↄ: “A Lajaar kpi na,
43011015	ɩ̃ a nyɩ ɩnɛ a nʋmↄ ma na ɩ̃ na ma be be wa, a mɩnɛ a nyɩ na tʋↄ tɛrɛ nɩ ma a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa. Ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ ɩ a sɩ cen a ʋ sɛ̃.”
43011016	A lɛ, a ʋ par-tuure ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Tomasɩ (na mɩ dɩ a Yɩb) yelʼã a ʋ tↄ deme: “Nyɩ́ ɩ a sɩ mɩ cen na lãa kpi nɩ a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ!”
43011017	A lɛ a Jeeju na ta a be, ʋ nyɛ na bↄ̃w ka a maalʼã bibie anaan ba na ũu a Lajaar.
43011018	Ɩ̃ a Betani nɩ a Jerujalɛm ma jãa ta wa, aa mɩ tara kilo ata wa,
43011019	a Jufisɩ yaw wɩ a Martɩ nɩ a Maarɩɩ sɛ̃ na ƴɛwrɛ ba a ba yɛ-daba na kpi ɩnɛ.
43011020	A lɛ a Martɩ na wõ áa Jeeju waara na, ʋ yi na tuoro ʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ a Maarɩɩ cãa jɛ a be a yir.
43011021	A Martɩ yelʼã a Jeeju: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, a fʋ̃ʋ dãa be ka, a ɩ̃ yɛ-daba kↄ̃ↄ dãa kpi wa.
43011022	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka a bom lɛ fʋ na sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn jie ʋ na kʋ fʋ na.”
43011023	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A fʋ yɛ-daba na irʼã a kũu pʋↄ.”
43011024	A Martɩ yel a Jeeju: “Ɩ̃ bↄ̃w na bↄ̃w ka ʋ na irʼã a kũusɩ irfʋ daar a bibi-baaraa dayen.”
43011025	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Maa ɩ̃ ɩ a kũu-pʋↄ-irfʋ nɩ a baafʋ sʋbↄ. A ʋlↄ na ƴↄ̃w ma a nyãa, a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ saarɩ̃ kpi, ʋ na cãa na tɛrɛ a baafʋ.
43011026	Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a baafʋ ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w ma a nyãa, kũu ma be na ta ʋ wa. Fʋ sↄw na a ala mɩɩ?”
43011027	A Martɩ yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ sↄw na. Ɩ̃ sↄw na a fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ ɩ a Kirisi na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Bie. Fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ ɩ a ʋlↄ na sɛw na wa a ka a tẽw pʋↄ.”
43011028	A lɛ a Martɩ na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, ʋ lɛ kulʼã a yir na bʋↄl a ʋ yɛ-bile Maarɩɩ, na ʋ bʋr yel ʋ: “A Jãjaana wa na ɩ̃ bʋↄlↄ fʋ.”
43011029	A lɛ a Maarɩɩ na wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃, ʋ irʼã fↄfↄw cen a Jeeju sɛ̃,
43011030	a-na-ɩ a Jeeju ma kpɛ a tẽw pʋↄ sɛr wa; a jie ʋlↄ a Martɩ na tuorʼɩ̃ ʋ ʋ cãa ɩraa.
43011031	A Jufisɩ bala na dãa lãa be nɩ a Maarɩɩ be a yir ƴɛwrɛ ʋ, nyɛ ʋ na ʋ ir a fↄfↄw yire. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ba tuure ʋ na, a-na-ɩ ba tɩɛrʼã beeka a yaa par ʋ cere a kõfʋ jie.
43011032	A lɛ a Maarɩɩ na ta a jie ʋlↄ a Jeeju na be, naa ʋ nyɛ ʋ, ʋ lo na a ʋ gbɛɛ pulẽe ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, a fʋ̃ʋ dãa be ka, a ɩ̃ yɛ-daba kↄ̃ↄ dãa kpi wa.”
43011033	A lɛ a Jeeju na nyɛ ʋ ʋ kono, ɩ̃ mɩ nyɛ a Jufisɩ bala na bɩɛl ʋ a ba mɩ kono, ni-sↄbaa kpɛ ʋ na, a tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ dama ʋ,
43011034	ʋ soor ba: “Nyɩnɛ nyɩ ũu ʋ?” a ba yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, wa nyɛ a jie,”
43011035	a Jeeju kõ.
43011036	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Jufisɩ yele taa: “Nyɩ́ nyɛ a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa nʋ ʋ!”
43011037	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩŋmɛɛ a ba sↄ̃w yele na: “Aa ɩ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ dãa yuo a jↄ̃w mimie wa? Ʋ kↄ̃ↄ dãa tʋↄ maal a Lajaar ʋ kↄ̃ kpi wa mɩɩ?”
43011038	A ni-sↄbaa lɛ nyɩrɩ̃ na kpɛ a Jeeju, ʋ cen a yaa par. A yaa ɩ na tãw bↄw, ɩ̃ a ba pↄw kubir kpɛ̃ɛ a bↄw nʋↄr.
43011039	A Jeeju yel: “Nyɩ́ bilĩ a kubir bar,” a Martɩ na ɩ a ʋlↄ na kpi yɛ-pↄw yel a Jeeju: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ʋ nyuure na a-na-ɩ bibie anaan nɩ a dɩnaa ʋ na maal a yaa pʋↄ.”
43011040	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Maa dãa yel fʋ a fʋ̃ʋ tɛrɛ nɩ ma a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa fʋ na nyɛ na a Naaŋmɩn yo-yifʋ wa mɩɩ?”
43011041	A lɛ, ba bilĩ na a kubir, a Jeeju dʋↄ Ꞌwuor a saꞋlon ɩ̃ yel: “Ɩ̃ Sãa, fʋ̃ʋ sↄ puorfʋ a mɩnɛ fʋ na cɛl a ɩ̃ sʋↄrfʋ.
43011042	Ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka fʋ ma cɛlʼã a ɩ̃ sʋↄrfʋ a daar a jaa, ɩ̃-cɛ a bala na tiw kolĩ ma ɩnɛ ɩ̃ yele, a mɩnɛ a ba na tʋↄ sↄw bↄ̃w ka fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ tʋ̃ ma.”
43011043	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, ʋ bʋↄlʼã nɩ kpɛ̃w: “Lajaar, wa yi!”
43011044	A kũu yi, a gbɛɛ nɩ a nur vilĩ pↄw nɩ a cẽcẽ-luursɩ ɩ̃ a ba mɩ dãa lũ a nii-sↄw pↄw nɩ a cẽcen. A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ Ꞌlor ʋ bar ʋ cen.”
43011045	A Jufisɩ bala na dãa wɩ a Maarɩɩ sɛ̃ ɩ̃ nyɛ a ala a Jeeju na maal, a yaw jie ƴↄ̃w ʋ na nƴãa,
43011046	ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩŋmɛɛ a ba pʋↄ cenʼã a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ jie na man ba a ala a Jeeju na maal.
43011047	A lɛ, a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ nɩ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ bʋↄlʼã a ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ duo ɩ̃ yel ba: “A daba na maala na a nↄ-kofʋ tʋ̃-yaw; bõ sɩ na maal?
43011048	A sɩmɩ bar ʋ ʋ maala a lɛ, a nɩbɛ ba jaa na sↄw na a ʋ ben, ɩ̃ a Orom nɩbɛ na wa na wɛl a sɩ ji-son nɩ a sɩ tẽw bar.”
43011049	A ƴen sʋbↄ a ba pʋↄ na dɩ a Kayifi na ɩ a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ a ʋna yuon naa pʋↄ yel ba na: “Nyaa bↄ̃w bom wa!
43011050	Nyaa tɩɛr bↄ̃w ka a ɩ na sIↄn a nyɩ jie a nɩ-bõ-ƴen na kpi a nɩbɛ ba jaa ɩnɛ, a tẽw kↄ̃ wɛl ʋ jaa wa mɩɩ?”
43011051	A ala ʋ na yel ma yi a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ jie wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a-na-ɩ ʋ ɩ na a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ a ʋna yuon naa, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ mana áa Jeeju na kpi na a Jufisɩ bal par ʋ jaa ɩnɛ.
43011052	Ɩ̃ aa ɩ a ʋna bal par ɩnɛ tɛw ʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ na kpi na a mɩnɛ ʋ na mɩ kpaarɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn bibiir bala na yaarɩ̃, a ba ɓã taa ɩ bõ-ƴen.
43011053	Wa nyↄw nɩ a ʋna bibir, a Jufisɩ goro na taa a Jeeju kúfʋ.
43011054	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Jeeju maa lɛ cãa yↄ yi a Jufisɩ nii-sↄw wa, ɩ̃ ʋ cenʼã a tẽw ʋlↄ pʋↄ na dɩ a Efarɩm na be a wɛkar nʋↄr, lãa jɛ nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe a be.
43011055	A Jufisɩ Pakɩ fɛtɩ daar tara na, a nɩ-yaw yi a tẽ-bil pʋʋr ɩ̃ cere a Jerujalɛm a ba mɩ̃ɛ pↄlfʋ ɩnɛ.
43011056	Ba bʋↄrↄ na a Jeeju, ɩ̃ sooro taa a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ: “Mɩnɛ nyɩ tɩɛr? Ʋ kↄ̃ wa a fɛtɩ jie wa mɩɩ?”
43011057	Ɩ̃-cɛ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ dãa na yel áa ala ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩrɛ bↄ̃w na a jie a Jeeju na be, á ʋ sɛw na na yel a ba nyↄw ʋ.
43012001	Bibie ayʋↄb ɩ̃ cɛ ɩ̃ a Pakɩ fɛtɩ na ta, a Jeeju cen a Betani, na ɩ a jie a Lajaar ʋlↄ ʋ na dãa ir a kũu pʋↄ na be.
43012002	Ba maalʼã a dɩb kʋ ʋ a be, a Martɩ ɩ a dɩb-poro, ɩ̃ a Lajaar mɩ dãa na be a nɩbɛ bala pʋↄ na lãa jɛ a dɩb par nɩ a Jeeju.
43012003	A Maarɩɩ de na a kã-nyu-vɩlaa ba na bʋↄlↄ a naar na ma kpɛmɛ a dafʋ ɩɛ wa, wa nɩ cir ƴↄ̃w a Jeeju gbɛɛ pʋↄ ɩ̃ fↄfↄ nɩ ʋ a jukↄbↄ, a kãa nyuu de a yir ʋ jaa.
43012004	A Jeeju par-tuure ƴen sʋbↄ na dɩ a Judasɩ Isikaryↄtɩ, na ɩ a ʋlↄ nↄↄ diere ʋ a juu yelʼã:
43012005	“Bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a baa dãa de a kãa na da warbie ture lɩjaata na ba kʋ a nãw deme wa?”
43012006	ꞋWaa yel a lɛ a-na-ɩ a nãw deme ben bá ʋ na wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a-na-ɩ nyanyuur ʋ ɩ, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a na ɩ a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ma tɛrɛ a libie wʋↄ, ʋ ma jure na a ala ba na ƴↄnↄ a be.
43012007	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju yelʼã: “Bar a pↄw jaa jom! Bar ʋ ʋ tɛɛlɛ a kã-nyu-vɩlaa na a ɩ̃ ũufʋ bibir ɩnɛ.
43012008	Nyɩ na tɛrɛ na a nãw deme a nyɩ sↄ̃w a daar a jaa, ɩ̃-cɛ a maa, nyaa tɛrɛ ma a nyɩ sↄ̃w a daar a jaa wa.”
43012009	A Jufisɩ yaw jie wõ na áa Jeeju be na a Betani, ɩ̃ na ba cen. Ɩ̃ aa ɩ a Jeeju ɩnɛ tɛw ba cen wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ba bʋↄrↄ na ba mɩ nyɛ a Lajaar ʋ na ir a kũu pʋↄ.
43012010	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ mɩ goro na taa a ba na mɩ kú na a Lajaar,
43012011	a-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ ɩnɛ a Jufisɩ yaw jie bara a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ sↄr ɩ̃ ƴↄnↄ a Jeeju nyãa.
43012012	A dɩvɩɛ bio, a nɩ-yaw bala na wɩ a fɛtɩ jie wõ na áa Jeeju tara na be a Jerujalɛm.
43012013	A lɛ, ba ɓɛlʼã a pã-bie tɩɩr vɛɛ na ba yi tuoro nɩ ʋ ɩ̃ wuure nɩ kpɛ̃w yele: “Oojana! A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Naaŋmɩn ú be nɩ a ʋlↄ na waara nɩ a ʋ yuor! A Naaŋmɩn ú be nɩ a Ɩsɩrayɛl jamana!”
43012014	A Jeeju nyɛ na a bʋ̃ↄ, do jɛ a ʋ juu, a mɩnɛ a na yel a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ:
43012015	“Sɩ̃ↄ-tẽw nɩbɛ, nyɩ taa jↄrↄ dãbɩ̃ɛ wa! Nyɩ́ nyɛ a nyɩ jamana na do a bʋ̃-bile waara nɩ.”
43012016	A ʋna daarʼã pʋↄ, a ʋ par-tuurbe ma dãa bↄ̃w a par sɛr wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛ a Naaŋmɩn na miilʼɩ̃ a Jeeju yo-yifʋ baar, ala ba pãa tɩɛr yuo a ala a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na dãa yel a ʋ ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ a ɩ na a ala a nɩbɛ na maal a ʋ jie.
43012017	A bala ba jaa na dãa be nɩ a Jeeju ɩ̃ nyɛ a Lajaar ʋ na bʋↄl ʋ yi a yaa pʋↄ lɛ ɩ a nɩ-mimir, ba mɩɩnɛ na kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ.
43012018	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ nɩ-yaw tuoro na a Jeeju a-na-ɩ ba wõ na a ʋna nↄ-kofʋ tʋn ʋ na dãa maal.
43012019	Ɩ̃ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ yele na taa: “Nyɩ nyɛ na, saa tʋↄrↄ maala bom wa; a tẽw nɩbɛ ba jaa tuure ʋ na!”
43012020	A Gɩrɛkɩ nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ be na a bala pʋↄ na wa a puorfʋ ɩnɛ a fɛtɩ jie be a Jerujalɛm.
43012021	Ba ta na a Fɩlɩpɩ na yi a Bɛsada-tẽw na be a Galile wɩɛr ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Sɩ bʋↄrↄ na sɩ nyɛ a Jeeju.”
43012022	A Fɩlɩpɩ cenʼã na yel a Ádire, a ba lãa cen na yel a Jeeju.
43012023	A Jeeju yel ba: “A daar ta na a Naaŋmɩn na miile nɩ a Nɩbɛ Bie yo-yifʋ.
43012024	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a ci-bir ma lo a tene kpi wa, ʋ ma jɛ na be ɩ a ci-bir bõ-ƴen, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ kpi, ʋ ma wↄ̃ na a wↄmↄ yayaw.
43012025	A ʋlↄ na nʋ a ʋ baafʋ, ʋ na bↄr ʋ na; ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na Ꞌlaar a ʋ baafʋ a tẽw na pʋↄ, ʋ na tɛrɛ ʋ na kpɛ nɩ a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw pʋↄ.
43012026	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩrɛ tʋnↄ na a ɩ̃ tʋn, ú tuure ma, ɩ̃ a jie ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na be, be a ɩ̃ tʋ̃tʋnↄ ʋlↄ na mɩ be. A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩrɛ tʋnↄ na a ɩ̃ tʋn, a ɩ̃ Sãa na ƴↄnↄ ʋ na.
43012027	“A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a ɩ̃ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ dama ma na, ɩ̃ bõ ɩ̃ na yel? Ɩ yel a ɩ̃ Sãa ʋ faa ma a daarʼã ɩnɛ mɩɩ? Ɩ̃-cɛ má a ala ɩnɛ ɩ̃ ɛ̃ɛ wa, a na ta ma.
43012028	Sãa, ɩ a fʋ yuor ʋ yi!” A lɛ, a kↄkɩr ƴɛrʼã be a saꞋlon yel: “Ɩ̃ dãa na maal ʋ ʋ yi, ɩ̃ ɩ̃ na lɛ maal ʋ na ʋ yi go.”
43012029	A nɩbɛ bala na ɩraa a be ɩ̃ wonaa yelʼã a saa tanʼã, ɩ̃ a nɩŋmɛɛ yel a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnaa kãw ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ nɩ ʋ.
43012030	A Jeeju yel ba: “Aa ɩ a maa ɩnɛ a ʋna kↄkɩr ƴɛrɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩ ɩnɛ ʋ.
43012031	A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a daar ta na ba na guoro a tẽw na ƴɛrɩ̃. A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ba na irʼã a tẽw na jamana bar.
43012032	Ɩ̃ a maa, a lɛ ba nↄↄ jɛwrɛ ma a ka a tẽw juu duoro nɩ, ɩ̃ na taw na a nɩbɛ ba jaa a ba wa a ɩ̃ sɛ̃.”
43012033	Ʋ ƴɛrʼã a lɛ miilʼɩ̃ a bõ kũu ʋ na kpiire.
43012034	A nɩbɛ bala yel ʋ: “Sɩ wõ na a sɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn pʋↄ áa Kirisi na tɛrɛ na a baafʋ daadaa kpoolaa, ɩ̃ mɩnɛ fʋ ɩ ɩ̃ yel áa sɛw na a ba na jɛw a Nɩbɛ Bie a tẽw juu do nɩ? Ala ɩ̃ ɩ a Nɩbɛ Bie ʋlↄ?”
43012035	A Jeeju yel ba: “Daar fɩ̃ɩ tɛw a cãa na lɛ cãa be a nyɩ sↄ̃w. Nyɩ́ cere a lɛ nyɩ na cãa tɛrɛ a cãa, a mɩnɛ a libe kↄ̃ wa dũunɩ nyɩ wa. A-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ na cere a libe pʋↄ maa bↄ̃w a jie ʋ na cere wa.
43012036	A mɩnɛ nyɩ na cãa tɛrɛ a cãa, nyɩ́ sↄw de ʋ, a mɩnɛ a nyɩ na lɩɛb ɩ a cãa deme.” A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, ʋ cenʼã na sↄↄlɩ̃ a ba ɩnɛ.
43012037	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa saarɩ̃ maal a nↄ-kofʋ tʋ̃-yaw a ba nii-sↄw ɩ̃ baa sↄw de ʋ wa,
43012038	a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere Ejayi ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ na dãa yel na tʋↄ maal baar. Ʋ yelʼã: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ala ɩ̃ sↄw a sɩ manfʋ? Ala a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ miilʼɩ̃ a ʋ fãw?”
43012039	Ɩ̃ baa tʋↄrↄ sↄwrↄ wa, a na ɩ a mɩnɛ a Ejayi na lɛ dãa yel:
43012040	“A maa Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ pↄw ba a mimie, ɩ̃ maal a ba sube a kpɛmɛ, a mɩnɛ a ba mimie kↄ̃ wa nyɛ wa, a ba kↄ̃ mɩ bↄ̃w a par a ba tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃ a ba kↄ̃ mɩ lɩɛb wa a ɩ̃ jie ɩ̃ kpɛmɛ ba wa.”
43012041	A Ejayi yelʼã a lɛ a-na-ɩ ʋ nyɛ na a Jeeju yo-yifʋ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a ʋ ɩnɛ.
43012042	A na saarɩ̃ be a lɛ ɩ̃ a Jufisɩ ni-dierbe yaw jie sↄw na de a Jeeju, ɩ̃-cɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ ɩnɛ, baa dãa Ꞌlara ƴɛrɛ a nɩbɛ na bↄ̃wnaa wa. Ba jↄrↄ na dãbɩ̃ɛ ba nↄↄ wa diw ba bar a puorfʋ yir pʋↄ,
43012043	a-na-ɩ ba nʋ na a pɛwfʋ ʋlↄ na yi a nɩbɛ jie gãw a Naaŋmɩn na pɛwrɛ ba.
43012044	A Jeeju ƴɛrʼã nɩ kpɛ̃w yel: “A ʋlↄ na sↄw de ma, aa ɩ a maa tɛw ʋ sↄw de wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ mɩ sↄw na de a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma.
43012045	Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na nyɛ ma, ʋ mɩ nyɛ na a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma.
43012046	A maa, ɩ̃ wa na a ka a tẽw pʋↄ ɩ a cãa, a mɩnɛ a nɩrɛ lɛ na sↄw de ma kↄ̃ cãa be a libe pʋↄ wa.
43012047	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ nɩrɛ wõ na a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ɩ̃ ma sↄw maal wa, aa ɩ maa ɩ̃ wa ƴↄnↄ ʋ a ƴɛrɩ̃ wa, a-na-ɩ maa wa ka a tẽw pʋↄ a nɩbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ ƴↄ̃wfʋ ɩnɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ wa na a ba faafʋ ɩnɛ.
43012048	A ʋlↄ na jaar ma bar, ɩ̃ ma de a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ wa, ʋ na tɛrɛ na a ʋ ƴɛr-ƴↄnↄ. A ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na mana, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ nↄↄ ƴↄ̃w ʋ a ƴɛrɩ̃ a bibi-baaraa dayen.
43012049	A-na-ɩ maa ƴɛrɛ a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ̃ Sãa na tʋ̃ ma, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ kʋ ma a ala na sɛw ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ ɩ̃ mɩ mana.
43012050	Ɩ̃ ɩ̃ bↄ̃w na bↄ̃w ka a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ tɩɩrɛ na a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a ala ɩ̃ na ƴɛrɛ, ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ na a mɩnɛ a ɩ̃ Sãa na man ma.”
43013001	A cɛ na fɩ̃ɩ ɩ̃ a Pakɩ fɛtɩ na ta, a Jeeju bↄ̃w ka a ʋ daar ta na ʋ na yi a ka a tẽw pʋↄ ɩ̃ cen a ʋ Sãa sɛ̃. A Jeeju na nʋ a bala ʋ na sↄ a ka a tẽw pʋↄ lɛ tɩɩ na nyɩrɩ̃ nʋ ba daadaa.
43013002	A ʋlↄ nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe jɛ na dɩrɛ a dɩb a jaanʋↄr, ɩ̃ a Satã dãa na de nĩe ƴↄ̃w a Sɩmↄ̃ Isikaryↄtɩ bi-daba Judasɩ a ʋ de a Jeeju juu.
43013003	A Jeeju bↄ̃w na a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ áa Naaŋmɩn jie ʋ dãa yi, áa be ʋ lɩɛbɛ cere, ɩ̃ ʋ mɩ bↄ̃w na áa ʋ Sãa de na a yele a jaa ƴↄ̃w a ʋ nuumɩ.
43013004	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ barʼã a dɩb ɩ̃ ir yaa a ʋ cẽcen bar ɩ̃ de a bↄↄdʋbaa lũ a sɩɛ pʋↄ,
43013005	ɩ̃ Ꞌwↄ̃w a kʋ̃ↄ ƴↄ̃w a ŋmã-kpoo pʋↄ, ɩ̃ nyↄw ɩ̃ pɛwrɛ a ʋ par-tuurbe gbɛɛ, ɩ̃ fↄfↄrↄ nɩ a bↄↄdʋbaa ʋlↄ ʋ na lũ a sɩɛ pʋↄ.
43013006	Ʋ ta na a Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr, a Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, fʋ̃ʋ na pɛw ma a gbɛɛ?”
43013007	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A ala ɩ̃ na maala, faa bↄ̃wnↄ a par a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na wa, ɩ̃ a daar kãw fʋ nↄↄ bↄ̃w na a par.”
43013008	A Pɩɛr yel ʋ: “Faa be na pɛw a ɩ̃ gbɛɛ ʋlↄ wa.” A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A maa ma pɛw fʋ a gbɛɛ wa, saa lɛ beree taa wa.”
43013009	A Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr yel ʋ: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a lɛ ʋ, taa pɛw ma a gbɛɛ tɛw wa, mɩ pɛw ma a nur lãa nɩ a juu.”
43013010	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A ʋlↄ na so a kʋ̃ↄ ma lɛ bʋↄrↄ kʋ̃ↄ sofʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a gbɛɛ tɛw ʋ ma pɛw a-na-ɩ ʋ yi na cɛcɛ. A nyɩmɩ, nyɩ ɩ na cɛcɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ aa ɩ nyɩ jaa ʋ wa.”
43013011	A Jeeju bↄ̃w na a ʋlↄ nↄↄ diere ʋ a juu, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ yel a baa ɩ cɛcɛ ba jaa wa.
43013012	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na pɛw ba a gbɛɛ baar, ʋ lɛ de na a ʋ cẽcen su jɛ nɩ a dɩb par ɩ̃ soor ba: “A ala ɩ̃ na maal nyɩ, nyɩ bↄ̃w na a par mɩɩ?
43013013	Nyɩ bʋↄlↄ ma na ʻJãjaanaʼ nɩ ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛʼ. Yel-mɩ̃ɛ nyɩ yel, a-na-ɩ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ.
43013014	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a maa na ɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a Jãjaana pɛw nyɩ na a gbɛɛ, a nyɩmɩ mɩ, nyɩ mɩ sɛw na na pɛwrɛ taa a gbɛɛ.
43013015	Ɩ̃ maalʼã tʋ̃-tↄↄnaa miilʼɩ̃ nyɩ a nyɩ na mɩ maala a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na maal a nyɩ jie.
43013016	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a tʋ̃tʋnↄ ma ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ jie wa, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ ba na tʋ̃ ma ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ʋ jie wa.
43013017	A mɩnɛ nyɩ na bↄ̃w a yele ala, a na ɩ nyɩ na nʋ̃ↄ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ nyɩ maala na a lɛ.
43013018	“Ɩ̃ aa ɩ nyɩ jaa fɛw ɩ̃ yele wa. Ɩ̃ bↄ̃w na a bala ɩ̃ na vɛl ir. Ɩ̃-cɛ a sɛw na a ala na sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ na maal baar a mɩnɛ a na yel: ʻA ʋlↄ na lãa dɩrɛ nɩ ma a dɩb lɛ lɩɛbʼã maal ma bier.ʼ
43013019	Ɩ̃ de na nĩe yele nyɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃-cɛ a ana yele ma ta sɛr wa, a mɩnɛ a ala ɩ̃ wa ta, nyɩ tɩɛr bↄ̃w ka maa ɩ̃ ɩ a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na ɩ.
43013020	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ʋlↄ na sↄw de a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na tʋ̃, ʋ mɩ sↄw na de ma. Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na sↄw de a maa, ʋ mɩ sↄw na de a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma.”
43013021	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, a suur nyɩrɩ̃ na sãw ʋ ʋ yel: “Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, bõ-ƴen a nyɩ sↄ̃w nↄↄ de ma na a juu.”
43013022	A ʋ par-tuurbe Ꞌwuoro taa ma bↄ̃w a buor ʋ na yele wa.
43013023	A par-tuure ʋlↄ a Jeeju na nʋnↄ jɛ na a ʋ lõboorɩ̃,
43013024	a Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr kab ʋ a ʋ soor a Jeeju bↄ̃w a sʋbↄ ʋlↄ ʋ na yele.
43013025	A par-tuure ʋlↄ gã dɩɛl a Jeeju ɩ̃ soor ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ala fʋ yele?”
43013026	A Jeeju yel: “A ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na ŋmaara a buru ɓɛrɛ nɩ a jɩɛr kʋrↄ, ʋlↄ ʋ,” ɩ̃ ɓɛ nɩ a buru ŋmãa a jɩɛr kʋ a Judasɩ na ɩ a Sɩmↄ̃ Isikaryↄtɩ bie.
43013027	A lɛ a Judasɩ na tↄ̃ↄ Ꞌwↄb a buru baar, a Satã kpɛ ʋ na, a Jeeju yel ʋ: “A ala fʋ na maala, pↄw fↄfↄw maal!”
43013028	A bala na dãa jɛ a be a dɩb par, bõ-ƴen kãw ma dãa bↄ̃w a bom na ɩnɛ ʋ na yel ʋ a ala wa.
43013029	Ɩ̃-cɛ a-na-ɩ a Judasɩ ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a ba libie wʋↄ, a nɩŋmɛɛ tɩɛrʼã áa Jeeju yele ʋ na á ʋ cen na da a yele ala ba na maala nɩ a fɛtɩ, mɩɩ á ʋ ir bom cenʼɩ̃ kʋ a nãw deme.
43013030	A lɛ, a mɩnɛ a Judasɩ na Ꞌwↄb a buru baar, ʋ yi na a jie naan. A ɩ na tɩsↄw.
43013031	A lɛ a Judasɩ na yi baar, a Jeeju yelʼã: “A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a Nɩbɛ Bie yuor yi na, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn yo-yifʋ mɩ nyɩrʼã a ʋ jie.
43013032	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn yo-yifʋ nyɩrʼã a Nɩbɛ Bie jie, a Naaŋmɩn na mɩ maalʼã a Nɩbɛ Bie yo-yifʋ ʋ nyɩr a ʋlↄ Naaŋmɩn jie, ɩ̃ ʋ na maalʼã a lɛ a jie naan.
43013033	Ɩ̃ bibiir, fɩ̃ɩ tɛw ɩ̃ na lɛ cãa be nɩ nyɩ. Nyɩ nↄↄ bʋↄrↄ ma na ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na dãa yel a Jufisɩ, ɩ̃ mɩ yele nyɩ na a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, á nyaa tʋↄrↄ wɩɛrɛ a jie ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na cere wa.
43013034	Yɛr-paalaa ɩ̃ kʋrↄ nyɩ: nyɩ́ nʋnↄ taa. A mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na nʋ nyɩ, a sɛw na a nyɩ na mɩ nʋnↄ taa a lɛ.
43013035	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ nyɩ nʋnↄ na taa, a nɩbɛ ba jaa na sɩrɩ̃ na bↄ̃w ka nyɩ ɩ na a ɩ̃ par-tuurbe.”
43013036	A Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr soor ʋ na: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, nyɩnɛ fʋ cere?” A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A jie ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na cere, faa tʋↄrↄ tuure ma cere a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a daar kãw fʋ nↄↄ tu ma na wɩ.”
43013037	A Pɩɛr lɛ soor ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a maa tʋↄrↄ tuure fʋ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ wa? Ɩ̃ sↄw na na kpi a fʋ ɩnɛ.”
43013038	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Fʋ na sɩrɩ̃ na kpi a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ? Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele fʋ, a nↄraa kↄ̃ kõ sɛr wa, ɩ̃ fʋ na cɩɩrɩ̃ na gbɛɛ ata a faa bↄ̃w ma wa.”
43014001	A Jeeju yel ba na: “Nyɩ taa ɩ a tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ dama nyɩ wa. Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa a Naaŋmɩn jie ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa a maa jie.
43014002	Jaaji-yaw be na a ɩ̃ Sãa yir. A ala ma ɩ lɛ ʋ wa, ɩ̃ kↄ̃ↄ dãa yel nyɩ wa. Ɩ̃ cere na a be na gbɛɛrɛ a nyɩ jaajie.
43014003	A maa wa cen na gbɛɛrɩ̃ a nyɩ jaajie baar, ɩ̃ na lɛ lɩɛbʼã wa na de nyɩ, a mɩnɛ a jie ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na be, a nyɩ na mɩ be a be.
43014004	Ɩ̃ a jie ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na cere, nyɩ bↄ̃w na a sↄr.”
43014005	A Tomasɩ yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, saa bↄ̃w a jie fʋ na cere wa. Mɩnɛ sɩ na ɩ ɩ̃ bↄ̃w a sↄr?”
43014006	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Maa ɩ̃ ɩ a sↄr, maa ɩ̃ ɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ, maa ɩ̃ ɩ a baafʋ. Nɩrɛ ma tʋↄrↄ wɩɛrɛ a ɩ̃ Sãa jie ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a maa jie ʋ tↄlʼɩ̃ wa.
43014007	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ nyɩ dãa na bↄ̃w ma, nyɩ naa mɩ bↄ̃w na a ɩ̃ Sãa. Ɩ̃ wa nyↄw nɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, nyɩ bↄ̃w ʋ na ɩ̃ nyɩ mɩ nyɛ ʋ na.”
43014008	A Fɩlɩpɩ yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, miil sɩ a Sãa ɩ̃ a na sɛw sɩ na.”
43014009	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Ɩ̃ kamʼã a nyɩ jie ɩ̃ a faa bↄ̃w ma sɛr wa Fɩlɩpɩ? A ʋlↄ na nyɛ ma, ʋ mɩ nyɛ na a Sãa. Mɩnɛ a ɩ a fʋ yel a ɩ̃ miil nyɩ a Sãa?
43014010	Faa sↄw ka ɩ̃ be na a ɩ̃ Sãa pʋ̃ↄ ɩ̃ a ɩ̃ Sãa mɩ be a ɩ̃ pʋ̃ↄ wa mɩɩ? A ala ɩ̃ na ƴɛrɛ nyɩ, aa ɩ a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ʋ wa, ɩ̃ a ɩ̃ Sãa na be a ɩ̃ pʋ̃ↄ, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ tʋnↄ a ʋ tʋmↄ.
43014011	Nyɩ́ sↄw a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na yel nyɩ á ɩ̃ be na a ɩ̃ Sãa pʋ̃ↄ, a ɩ̃ Sãa mɩ be a ɩ̃ pʋ̃ↄ. A ala ma ɩ lɛ ʋ wa, nyɩ́ sↄw a tʋmↄ ala ɩ̃ na maala ɩnɛ.
43014012	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a ʋlↄ na sↄw de ma, ʋ na tʋnↄ na a tʋmↄ ala ɩ̃ na tʋnↄ, ɩ̃ ʋ na tʋ̃ na a gãw a lɛ, a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ cere na a ɩ̃ Sãa sɛ̃.
43014013	A bom jaa lɛ nyɩ na de a ɩ̃ yuor sʋↄrↄ nɩ, ɩ̃ na maalʼã kʋ nyɩ, a mɩnɛ a Sãa yo-yifʋ na nyɩr a Bie jie.
43014014	A nyɩmɩ de a ɩ̃ yuor sʋↄrʼɩ̃ ma bom lɛ, ɩ̃ na maalʼã kʋ nyɩ.
43014015	“A nyɩmɩ nʋnↄ ma, nyɩ na jↄrↄ na a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ,
43014016	ɩ̃ a maa, ɩ̃ na sʋↄrʼã a Sãa ʋ kʋ nyɩ a Sõsũono ƴen sʋbↄ, a ʋlↄ na ɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ Sɩɛ, ʋ na be nɩ nyɩ daadaa kpoolaa.
43014017	A tẽw pʋↄ nɩbɛ ma tʋↄrↄ pↄwrↄ a Sɩɛ ʋlↄ wa a-na-ɩ baa tʋↄrↄ nyɛrɛ ʋ wa, baa mɩ tʋↄrↄ bↄ̃wnↄ ʋ wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩmɩ, nyɩ bↄ̃w ʋ na, a-na-ɩ ʋ be na a nyɩ sↄ̃w ɩ̃ mɩ be a nyɩ pʋ̃ↄ.
43014018	“Ɩ̃ kↄ̃ bar nyɩ a nyɩ wↄ̃ taa nɩ kpiibsɩ wa; ɩ̃ na lɛ lɩɛbʼã wa a nyɩ jie.
43014019	A ka nɩ a fɩ̃ɩ, a tẽw pʋↄ nɩbɛ ma lɛ nyɛrɛ ma wa; ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na tɛrɛ a baafʋ nyɩ na mɩ tɛrɛ na a baafʋ.
43014020	Ɩ̃ a ʋna bibir ɩ̃ wa ta, nyɩ na bↄ̃w na bↄ̃w ka ɩ̃ be na a ɩ̃ Sãa pʋ̃ↄ, ɩ̃ a nyɩ be a ɩ̃ pʋ̃ↄ ɩ̃ mɩ be a nyɩ pʋ̃ↄ.
43014021	“A ʋlↄ na sↄw a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ɩ̃ maala, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ nʋ ma. Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na nʋ ma, a ɩ̃ Sãa na mɩ nʋ ʋ na, ɩ̃ a maa mɩ, ɩ̃ na mɩ nʋ ʋ na ɩ̃ miilʼɩ̃ ʋ a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ.”
43014022	A Judasɩ soor ʋ (ɩ̃ aa ɩ a Judasɩ Isikaryↄtɩ ʋ wa): “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, mɩnɛ a ɩ a fʋ na miilʼɩ̃ a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ a sɩmɩ tɛw ɩ̃ ma miile nɩ a tẽw pʋↄ nɩbɛ wa?”
43014023	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A nɩrɛ ɩ̃ nʋ ma, ʋ na jↄrↄ na a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃; a ɩ̃ Sãa na nʋnↄ ʋ na ɩ̃ sɩ na wɩ na de ʋ ʋ ɩ a sɩ jaajie.
43014024	A nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na ma nʋ ma wa, Ꞌwaa jↄrↄ a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ wa. A ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ nyɩ na wõ, aa ɩ a maa mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a yi na a ɩ̃ Sãa na tʋ̃ ma jie.
43014025	“Ɩ̃ man nyɩ na a yele ala a lɛ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na cãa be nɩ nyɩ.
43014026	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Sõsũono ʋlↄ na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ a Sãa nↄↄ tʋnↄ nɩ a ɩ̃ yuor, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na jaana nyɩ a yele a jaa ɩ̃ mɩ jawra nyɩ a ala a jaa ɩ̃ na dãa yel nyɩ.
43014027	“Su-ɓaar pʋↄ ɩ̃ bar nyɩ, a maa mɩ̃ɛ su-ɓaar ɩ̃ bar kʋ nyɩ. A su-ɓaar ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na kʋ nyɩ ma wↄ̃ taa nɩ a tẽw na ben wa. Nyɩ taa ɩ a tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ dama nyɩ wa. Nyɩ taa mɩ ɩ a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw nyɩ wa.
43014028	Nyɩ wõ na a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na dãa yel nyɩ a ɩ̃ cere na, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ lɛ lɩɛbɛ na waara a nyɩ sɛ̃. A ala ɩ̃ ɩ nyɩ dãa na nʋ ma, a naa mɩ nʋmↄ nyɩ na ɩ̃ na cere a ɩ̃ Sãa sɛ̃, a-na-ɩ a ɩ̃ Sãa bɛrmɛ na gãw ma.
43014029	Ɩ̃ de na nĩe man nyɩ a yele ala a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃-cɛ a aa ta sɛr wa, a mɩnɛ a ala ɩ̃ wa ta, nyɩ na ƴↄ̃w ma na nyãa.
43014030	Maa lɛ ƴɛrɛ nyɩ ƴɛr-yaw go wa, a-na-ɩ a tẽw na jamana waara na. ꞋWaa tɛrɛ bom a ɩ̃ pʋↄ na kʋrↄ ʋ sↄr a ɩ̃ jie wa,
43014031	ɩ̃-cɛ a sɛw na a tẽw na nɩbɛ na bↄ̃w ka ɩ̃ nʋ na a ɩ̃ Sãa ɩ̃ maala a ala a jaa ʋ na ƴↄ̃w ma. Nyɩ́ ir a sɩ cen.
43015001	“Maa ɩ̃ ɩ a dɩvɛ̃ tɩ-son ɩ̃ a ɩ̃ Sãa ɩ̃ ɩ a tɩ-Ꞌwuoro.
43015002	Ʋ ma ŋma na a wulbie ala bar na be a ɩ̃ pʋↄ ɩ̃ ma wↄnↄ wa, ɩ̃ a ala na wↄnↄ, ʋ ma cↄↄrɩ̃ na ɓɛl bar, a lɛ bↄ̃w nyɩrɩ̃ wↄ̃.
43015003	A ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala ɩ̃ na dãa man kʋ nyɩ gↄrʼã cↄↄrɩ̃ nyɩ a nyɩ ɩ cɛcɛ.
43015004	Nyɩ́ mar ɩraa a ɩ̃ pʋↄ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na mɩ mar ɩraa a nyɩ pʋↄ. A wulbir ma tʋↄrↄ wↄnↄ wↄmↄ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a tɩɛ pʋↄ ʋ mar ɩraa wa. A lɛ ʋ mɩ a nyɩ jie, nyaa tʋↄrↄ wↄnↄ wↄmↄ ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a ɩ̃ pʋↄ nyɩ mar ɩraa wa.
43015005	“Maa ɩ̃ ɩ a dɩvɛ̃ tɩɛ, ɩ̃ nyɩmɩ ɩ̃ ɩ a wulbie. A ʋlↄ na mar ɩraa a ɩ̃ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ mar ɩraa a ʋ pʋↄ, ʋ ma wↄ̃ na wↄmↄ yaw, a-na-ɩ a maa ma be nɩ nyɩ wa, nyaa tʋↄrↄ bom maala wa.
43015006	A ʋlↄ na ma mar ɩraa a ɩ̃ pʋↄ wa, ʋ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a wulbir ba na ma lↄb bar ʋ ko; ɩ̃ a wulbi-lɛ nʋmↄ, ba ma woorʼã ƴↄ̃w a vũumɩ a dɩ.
43015007	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ nyɩ be na a ɩ̃ pʋↄ, a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ mɩ be a nyɩ pʋↄ, nyɩ́ sʋↄr a bom lɛ nyɩ na bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ nyɩ na pↄw na.
43015008	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ nyɩ wↄnↄ na a wↄmↄ yayaw, lɛ a ɩ̃ Sãa yuor na yire, ɩ̃ lɛ nyɩ na mɩ ɩ a ɩ̃ par-tuurbe.
43015009	Á mɩnɛ a ɩ̃ Sãa na nʋ ma, a lɛ ɩ̃ mɩ nʋ nyɩ. Nyɩ́ ɩraa a ɩ̃ nʋfʋ pʋↄ.
43015010	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ nyɩ jↄrↄ na a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, nyɩ na ɩraa na a ɩ̃ nʋfʋ pʋↄ, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na jↄ a ɩ̃ Sãa ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ɩ̃ ɩraa a ʋ nʋfʋ pʋↄ.
43015011	“Ɩ̃ yel nyɩ na a lɛ a mɩnɛ a ɩ̃ nʋ̃ↄ na tʋↄ be a nyɩ pʋ̃ↄ, ɩ̃ a nʋ̃ↄ na ƴala nyɩ.
43015012	A ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ na kʋrↄ nyɩ ɩ na, nyɩ́ nʋnↄ taa a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na mɩ nʋ nyɩ.
43015013	A nʋfʋ ʋlↄ na gãw a nʋfʋ a jaa ɩ na a mɩnɛ a nɩrɛ na sↄw kpi a ʋ badɛɛ ɩnɛ.
43015014	A nyɩmɩ jↄrↄ a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, nyɩ ɩ na a ɩ̃ badɛɛ.
43015015	Maa lɛ bʋↄlↄ nyɩ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ wa, a-na-ɩ a tʋ̃tʋnↄ maa bↄ̃w a ala a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na maala wa. Ɩ̃ ɛ̃ɛ na bʋↄl nyɩ ɩ̃ badɛɛ, a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ man nyɩ na a yele ala a jaa ɩ̃ na dãa wõ a ɩ̃ Sãa sɛ̃.
43015016	Aa ɩ nyɩmɩ ɩ̃ vɛl ma ir wa; maa ɩ̃ vɛl nyɩ ir ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w nyɩ a nyɩ cen na wↄ̃ a wↄmↄ, ɩ̃ a wↄmↄ ʋlↄ kↄ̃ sãw wa. Ɩ̃ a bom jaa lɛ nyɩ na de a ɩ̃ yuor sʋↄrʼɩ̃ a Sãa sɛ̃, ʋ na kʋ nyɩ na.
43015017	A ala ɩ̃ na kpãkpana nyɩ ɩ na, nyɩ́ nʋnↄ taa.
43015018	“A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a tẽw pʋↄ nɩbɛ Ꞌlaar nyɩ na, nyɩ́ bↄ̃w ka maa ba dãa de nĩe Ꞌlaar.
43015019	A nyɩmɩ dãa ɩ a tẽw pʋↄ nɩbɛ, a tẽw pʋↄ nɩbɛ naa nʋnↄ nyɩ na, a-na-ɩ bala ɩ̃ sↄ nyɩ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ ow nyɩ na kpee ir a tẽw pʋↄ a nyaa cãa ɩ a tẽw pʋↄ nɩbɛ wa, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ba Ꞌlaar nyɩ.
43015020	Nyɩ́ tɩɛr bↄ̃w nɩ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ na dãa yel nyɩ, áa tʋ̃tʋnↄ ma ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ jie wa. Á bala ɩ̃ dãa hʋↄl ma, ba nↄↄ mɩ hʋↄl nyɩ na. A bala ɩ̃ dãa jↄ a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃, ba nↄↄ mɩ jↄ na a nyɩ ƴɛrɩ̃.
43015021	Ɩ̃-cɛ ba na maal nyɩ na a ana yele a jaa a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ a-na-ɩ baa bↄ̃w a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma wa.
43015022	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ maa dãa wa ƴɛrʼɩ̃ ba wa, ba kↄ̃ↄ dãa tɛrɛ maal-fãa wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ŋmɩɩlɩ̃fʋ jie ma cãa be be a ba maal-fãa ɩnɛ wa.
43015023	A ʋlↄ na Ꞌlaar ma, ʋ mɩ Ꞌlaarʼã a ɩ̃ Sãa.
43015024	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ maa dãa tʋ̃ tʋ̃-bie a ba sↄ̃w a nɩrɛ kãw na ma dãa tʋ̃ wa, ba kↄ̃ↄ dãa tɛrɛ maal-fãa wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ba nyɛ na a ala ɩ̃ na maal, ɩ̃ cãa Ꞌlaar a maa nɩ a ɩ̃ Sãa.
43015025	Ɩ̃-eɛ a ta na a lɛ a mɩnɛ a ƴɛr-bir ʋlↄ na be a ba ƴɛr-kpɛn sɛbɛ pʋↄ na maala baara. A yelʼã: ʻBa Ꞌlaar ma na pↄrↄ.ʼ
43015026	“A Sõsũono ʋlↄ na ɩ a Yel-mɩ̃ɛ Sɩɛ na yi a Sãa jie na wa na. Ɩ̃ na tʋ̃ nɩ ʋ na ʋ yi a Sãa jie ɩ̃ wa a nyɩ sɛ̃ na mana a ɩ̃ yel-mɩ̃ɛ.
43015027	Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, nyɩ na mɩ mana na a ɩ̃ yel-mɩ̃ɛ, a-na-ɩ nyɩ be nɩ ma na a nyↄwfʋ jie.
43016001	“Ɩ̃ yel nyɩ na a lɛ, a mɩnɛ a bom kãw kↄ̃ wa maal nyɩ a nyɩ ŋmaa yi wa.
43016002	A Jufisɩ na diw nyɩ na bar a ba puorfʋ yie pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a daar tara na a nɩrɛ lɛ ɩ̃ wa kú nyɩ, ʋ na tɩɛrʼã beeka a Naaŋmɩn tʋn ʋ tʋ̃ a lɛ.
43016003	Ba na maalʼã a lɛ, a-na-ɩ baa bↄ̃w a maa nɩ a Sãa wa.
43016004	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ man nyɩ na a lɛ a mɩnɛ a daar ɩ̃ wa ta a ba maala nyɩ a yele ala, a nyɩ na tɩɛr bↄ̃w ka ɩ̃ dãa na yel nyɩ. “Maa dãa man nyɩ a ana yele a nyↄwfʋ jie wa, a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ dãa na cãa be a nyɩ sↄ̃w,
43016005	ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ɩ̃ cere na a ʋlↄ na tʋ̃ ma sɛ̃, ɩ̃ bõ-ƴen kãw a nyɩ pʋↄ ma mɩ soor ma a nyɩnɛ ɩ̃ cere wa.
43016006	Ɩ̃ nãw nyɩrɩ̃ na be a nyɩ jie a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na yel nyɩ a lɛ,
43016007	ɩ̃-cɛ sɩrɛ jaa ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a na ɩ na son a nyɩ jie ɩ̃ na cen, a-na-ɩ a maa ma cen wa, a Sõsũono kↄ̃ wa a nyɩ jie wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a maa ɩ̃ cen, ɩ̃ na tʋ̃ ʋ na ʋ wa a nyɩ sɛ̃.
43016008	Ʋ na maalʼã a tẽw pʋↄ nɩbɛ a ba bↄ̃w a ala na ɩ a maal-fãa, nɩ a ala na ɩ a torfʋ, nɩ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn nↄↄ guoro a ba ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ.
43016009	Ʋ na maal ba na a ba bↄ̃w a ba maal-fãa a-na-ɩ baa sↄw de ma wa.
43016010	Ʋ na mɩ maal ba na a ba bↄ̃w a torfʋ a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ cere na a Sãa sɛ̃ a nyaa lↄↄ nyɛrɛ ma wa.
43016011	Ʋ na mɩ man ba na a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn gↄrʼã ƴↄ̃w a tẽw na jamana a ƴɛrɩ̃ baar.
43016012	“Ɩ̃ cãa na tɛrɛ ƴɛr-yaw na man nyɩ, ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a par bↄ̃wfʋ na kpɛmɛ nyɩ na,
43016013	ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛdaar a Yel-mɩ̃ɛ Sɩɛ nↄↄ waara, ʋ na tↄw nyɩ na a nyɩ bↄ̃w a yel-mɩ̃ɛ par ʋ jaa. A-na-ɩ ʋ kↄ̃ ƴɛrɛ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ na ƴɛrɛ na a ala tɛw ʋ na wõ, mɩ mana nɩ nyɩ a yele ala nↄↄ waara.
43016014	Ʋ na maalʼã a ɩ̃ yuor ʋ yire a-na-ɩ ʋ na de na a ala na ɩ a ɩ̃ ben mana kʋrↄ nyɩ.
43016015	A yele ala a jaa a Sãa na tɛrɛ mɩ ɩ na a ɩ̃ ben, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ yel áa Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na de na a ala na ɩ a ɩ̃ ben mana kʋrↄ nyɩ.
43016016	“A na ɩ na fɩ̃ɩ ɩ̃ nyɩ kↄ̃ lɛ nyɛ ma wa, ɩ̃ a fɩ̃ɩ pʋↄ go, nyɩ na lɛ nyɛ ma na.”
43016017	Ã lɛ, a Jeeju par-tuurbe ŋmɛɛ sooro na taa: “Bõ ɩ̃ dɩ a lɛ ʋ na yel sɩ áa na ɩ na fɩ̃ɩ a sɩ kↄ̃ lɛ nyɛ ʋ wa, ɩ̃ a fɩ̃ɩ pʋↄ go, á sɩ na lɛ nyɛ ʋ na, nɩ a mɩnɛ ʋ na yel á ʋ cere na a Sãa sɛ̃?”
43016018	Ba sooro na taa: “Bõ ɩ̃ dɩ a fɩ̃ɩ ʋ na yel? Saa bↄ̃w a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ par wa.”
43016019	A Jeeju bↄ̃w na a ba bʋↄrↄ na ba soor ʋ ɩ̃ yel ba: “A mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na yel nyɩ áa na ɩ na fɩ̃ɩ ɩ̃ nyɩ kↄ̃ lɛ nyɛ ma wa, ɩ̃ a fɩ̃ɩ pʋↄ go, á nyɩ na lɛ nyɛ ma na, ala ɩnɛ nyɩ sooro taa mɩɩ?
43016020	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, nyɩ na kono na sↄrↄ nɩ a kõ-yel-bie, ɩ̃-cɛ a tẽw pʋↄ nɩbɛ cɩlɛ. Nãw na nyↄw nyɩ na, ɩ̃-cɛ a nʋ̃ↄ na lɩɛrʼã a nyɩ nãw.
43016021	A lɛdaar a pↄw na wala, nãw ma be na a ʋ jie a-na-ɩ a ʋ won daar ta na. Ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛ ʋ na wa dↄw baar, ʋ ma hiinʼã a ʋ won bar, a-na-ɩ nʋ̃ↄ be na a ʋ jie a lɛ a bie na yi baar.
43016022	A lɛ ʋ mɩ, nãw mɩ be na a nyɩ jie a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ nↄↄ lɛ nyɛ nyɩ na, a nʋ̃ↄ be a nyɩ jie, ɩ̃ a ʋna nʋ̃ↄ naa, nɩrɛ kↄ̃ tʋↄ sãw ʋ bar wa.
43016023	“A bibir ʋlↄ ɩ̃ wa ta, nyaa lɛ sooro ma bom wa. Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a bom lɛ nyɩ na diere a ɩ̃ yuor sʋↄrↄ nɩ a Sãa sɛ̃, ʋ na kʋ nyɩ na.
43016024	Wa ta nɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, nyaa dãa de a ɩ̃ yuor sʋↄrʼɩ̃ bom wa. Nyɩ́ sʋↄr ɩ̃ nyɩ na pↄw na, a nʋ̃ↄ na ƴala nyɩ.
43016025	“Sʋkpar ɩ̃ lↄbↄ mana nɩ nyɩ a yele ala, ɩ̃ a daar tara na ɩ̃ kↄ̃ lↄↄ lↄb nyɩ sʋkpar wa, ɩ̃ ɩ̃ na man nyɩ na a Sãa ƴɛrɩ̃ a nyɩr cãa pʋↄ.
43016026	Á ʋna bibirʼãa, nyɩ na de na a ɩ̃ yuor sʋↄrʼɩ̃ a Sãa. Ɩ̃ maa yel nyɩ a ɩ̃ na sʋↄrʼã a Sãa a nyɩ ɩnɛ wa,
43016027	a-na-ɩ a Sãa mɩ̃ɛ nʋ nyɩ na, a mɩnɛ nyɩ na nʋ ma ɩ̃ sↄw bↄ̃w ka ɩ̃ yi na a Naaŋmɩn jie.
43016028	A Sãa jie ɩ̃ yi ɩ̃ wa ka a tẽw pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ɩ̃ yire na ka a tẽw pʋↄ ɩ̃ lɩɛbɛ cere a Sãa jie.”
43016029	A ʋ par-tuurbe yel ʋ: “Faa nyɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na fʋ na ƴɛrɛ gbelẽgbelẽ, ma lɛ cãa lↄbↄ sʋkpar wa.
43016030	A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, sɩ pãa na bↄ̃w ka fʋ bↄ̃w na a yele a jaa, ɩ̃ faa bʋↄrↄ nɩrɛ ʋ soor fʋ bom kãw wa, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a sɩ sↄw bↄ̃w ka a Naaŋmɩn jie fʋ yi.”
43016031	A Jeeju soor ba: “Nyɩ pãa na sↄw ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃?
43016032	A daar tara na ɩ̃ ʋ gↄrʼã ta baar, a nyɩ na ŋma kpee kpee jↄ kul a nyɩ yie ɩ̃ cɛ ma bar ɩ̃ yẽ, ɩ̃ maa ɩ ɩ̃ yẽ wa a-na-ɩ a Sãa be nɩ ma na.
43016033	Ɩ̃ yel nyɩ na a lɛ a nyɩ na tɛrɛ a su-ɓaar, a-na-ɩ nyɩ be na a ɩ̃ pʋↄ. Nyɩ na tɛrɛ na won a ka a tẽw pʋↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ var suur, a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ tʋↄ na a tẽw nɩ a ʋ fãw.”
43017001	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, ʋ Ꞌwuorʼã a saꞋlon ɩ̃ yel: “Sãa, a daar ta na. Maal a fʋ Bie yuor ʋ yi, a Bie na mɩ maal a fʋ yuor ʋ yi,
43017002	a mɩnɛ fʋ na kʋ ʋ a tʋↄfʋ a nɩbɛ ba jaa jie, ʋ na kʋ a bala fʋ na kʋ ʋ a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw.
43017003	A baa-kↄ̃-tɛw ɩ na a ba na bↄ̃w a fʋ̃ʋ fʋ yẽ na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn tↄr, ɩ̃ mɩ bↄ̃w a Jeeju-Kirisi ʋlↄ fʋ na tʋ̃.
43017004	Ɩ̃ maalʼã a fʋ yuor ʋ yi ka a tẽw pʋↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ maal a tʋmↄ ala fʋ na kʋ ma baar.
43017005	A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, Sãa, maal a ɩ̃ yuor ʋ yi a fʋ nii-sↄw nɩ a ʋna yo-yifʋ ɩ̃ na dãa tɛrɛ a fʋ sɛ̃, ɩ̃ a tẽw na ma dãa be be sɛr wa.
43017006	“A nɩbɛ bala fʋ na ir ka a tẽw pʋↄ kʋ ma, ɩ̃ maal ba na a ba bↄ̃w fʋ. Fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ dãa sↄ ba ɩ̃ de kʋ ma, ɩ̃ ba jↄ na a fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃.
43017007	A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ba bↄ̃w ka a bom jaa lɛ fʋ na kʋ ma sɩrɩ̃ na yi a fʋ sɛ̃,
43017008	a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ man ba na a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala fʋ na kʋ ma, a ba sↄw de. Ba sɩrɩ̃ na bↄ̃w ka fʋ sɛ̃ ɩ̃ yi, ɩ̃ ba sↄw na a fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ tʋ̃ ma.
43017009	“A bala ɩnɛ ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ fʋ. Aa ɩ a tẽw pʋↄ nɩbɛ ɩnɛ ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ fʋ wa, ɩ̃ a bala fʋ na de kʋ ma, bala ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ ƴↄnↄ, a-na-ɩ fʋ̃ʋ sↄ ba.
43017010	A bom jaa lɛ ɩ̃ na tɛrɛ ɩ na a fʋ bom, ɩ̃ a bom jaa lɛ fʋ na tɛrɛ mɩ ɩ na a ɩ̃ bom, ɩ̃ a ɩ̃ yuor yi na a ba jie.
43017011	Maa cãa be ka a tẽw pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a bala, ba cãa na be ka, ɩ̃ a maa, ɩ̃ wɩɛrɛ na a fʋ sɛ̃. Sãa son, Ꞌwuoro ba nɩ a fʋ fãw na ɩ a fãw ʋlↄ fʋ na kʋ ma, a mɩnɛ a ba na tʋↄ ɩ bõ-ƴen a sɩ kaarɩ̃.
43017012	A lɛ ɩ̃ na dãa cãa be nɩ ba, ɩ̃ Ꞌwuoro ba na, bↄ̃w tɛrɛ nɩ ba a fʋ fãw ʋlↄ fʋ na kʋ ma. Bõ-ƴen ma bↄr wa ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a ʋlↄ tɛw na sɛw ʋ bↄr wa, a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ na tʋↄ maal baar.
43017013	A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ɩ̃ wɩɛrɛ na a fʋ sɛ̃, ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a lɛ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na cãa be ka a tẽw pʋↄ, a ba na tʋↄ tɛrɛ a ɩ̃ nʋ̃ↄ, ʋ na nyɩrɩ̃ ƴala ba.
43017014	Ɩ̃ de na a fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ man ba, a tẽw na nɩbɛ Ꞌlaar ba, a-na-ɩ baa ɩ a tẽw na ben wa, a mɩnɛ a maa mɩ̃ɛ na ma mɩ ɩ a tẽw na ben wa.
43017015	Maa sʋↄrↄ fʋ a fʋ ir ba ka a tẽw pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ na Ꞌwuoro ba a Fãa Sʋbↄ ɩnɛ.
43017016	A mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na ma ɩ a tẽw na ben wa, a lɛ baa mɩ ɩ a tẽw na ben wa.
43017017	Ow ba kpee nɩ a fʋ yel-mɩ̃ɛ a ba ɩ a fʋ ben; a fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ ɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ.
43017018	A mɩnɛ fʋ na tʋ̃ ma a ka a tẽw pʋↄ, a lɛ ɩ̃ mɩ tʋ̃ ba a tẽw pʋↄ.
43017019	A bala ɩnɛ ɩ̃ ow a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ kpee kʋ fʋ, a mɩnɛ a ba na mɩ tʋↄ sɩrɩ̃ ow kpee ɩ a fʋ ben.
43017020	“Aa ɩ bala tɛw ɩnɛ ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ fʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ mɩ sʋↄrↄ na ƴↄnↄ a bala nↄↄ sↄwrↄ diere ma a ba ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩnɛ.
43017021	Ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ na a fʋ maal a ba jaa a ba ɩ bõ-ƴen, a mɩnɛ a fʋ̃ʋ Sãa na be a ɩ̃ pʋ̃ↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ be a fʋ pʋ̃ↄ. Maal ba a ba na mɩ be a sɩ pʋ̃ↄ, a mɩnɛ a tẽw na nɩbɛ na sↄw bↄ̃w ka fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ tʋ̃ ma.
43017022	Ɩ̃ kʋ ba na a yo-yifʋ ʋlↄ fʋ na kʋ ma, a ba na ɩ bõ-ƴen a mɩnɛ a maa nɩ a fʋ̃ʋ na ɩ a bõ-ƴen,
43017023	a maa be a ba pʋ̃ↄ, a fʋ mɩ be a ɩ̃ pʋ̃ↄ, a mɩnɛ a ba na bↄ̃w sɩrɩ̃ nyↄw taa ɩ bõ-ƴen. A nↄhↄ̃ a tẽw na nɩbɛ na bↄ̃w ka fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ tʋ̃ ma, ɩ̃ fʋ mɩ nʋ ba na a mɩnɛ fʋ na mɩ nʋ ma.
43017024	“Sãa, ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na a bala fʋ na kʋ ma, ba be nɩ ma a jie ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na be, a mɩnɛ a ba na tʋↄ nyɛ a ɩ̃ yo-yifʋ ʋlↄ fʋ na kʋ ma, a-na-ɩ fʋ de na nĩe nʋ ma ɩ̃ a tẽw na ma dãa be be sɛr wa.
43017025	Sãa toraa, a tẽw na nɩbɛ ma bↄ̃w fʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a maa, ɩ̃ bↄ̃w fʋ na ɩ̃ a bala fʋ na kʋ ma mɩ bↄ̃w ka fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ tʋ̃ ma.
43017026	Ɩ̃ maal ba na a ba bↄ̃w fʋ, ɩ̃ ɩ̃ na cãa na maala ba a ba bↄ̃wnↄ fʋ, a mɩnɛ a nʋfʋ ʋlↄ fʋ na nʋ ma na mɩ be a ba pʋ̃ↄ, ɩ̃ a maa mɩ̃ɛ mɩ be a ba pʋ̃ↄ.”
43018001	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, ʋ yi nɩ na a ʋ par-tuurbe cen na gãw a Sɛdʋrↄ̃ kʋlaa gaan. Nakʋↄ be na a jie ʋlↄ, a Jeeju lãa kpɛ nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe a be.
43018002	A Judasɩ ʋlↄ na diere ʋ a juu mɩ bↄ̃w na a ʋna jie, a-na-ɩ a Jeeju nɩ a ʋ par-tuurbe ma dãa na cere a be.
43018003	A lɛ, a Judasɩ taw na a Orom sↄdaalsɩ nɩ a parsãdiele bala a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ na tʋ̃, a ba tɛrɛ a vũusɩ nɩ a lãpar nɩ a jɛb yele cenʼɩ̃ a be.
43018004	A Jeeju bↄ̃w na a ala a jaa nↄↄ tara ʋ ɩ̃ tuor soor ba: “Ala nyɩ bʋↄrↄ?”
43018005	A ba yel ʋ: “A Najarɛtɩ Jeeju sɩ bʋↄrↄ.” A Jeeju yel ba: “A maa ʋ.” Ɩ̃ a Judasɩ ʋlↄ na diere ʋ a juu lãa na ɩraa nɩ ba a be.
43018006	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na yel ba: “A maa ʋ,” ba tɛwtɛw na lo a tene.
43018007	A Jeeju lɛ soor ba: “Ala nyɩ bʋↄrↄ?” A ba yel ʋ: “A Najarɛtɩ Jeeju sɩ bʋↄrↄ.”
43018008	A Jeeju yel ba: “Ɩ̃ yel nyɩ na a maa ʋ. A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a maa nyɩ bʋↄrↄ, nyɩ́ bar a nɩbɛ na a ba cen.”
43018009	Ʋ yelʼã a lɛ a mɩnɛ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ na dãa ƴɛr na tʋↄ maal baar. Ʋ dãa na yel: “A bala fʋ na kʋ ma, bõ-ƴen ma bↄr wa.”
43018010	A be jie, a Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr vʋ̃ↄ na a bãjɩnɛ ʋ na dãa tɛrɛ cɛ nɩ a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ tʋ̃tʋnↄ dʋrɩ̃ toor ŋmaa. A tʋ̃tʋnↄ ʋlↄ yuor dɩ na Malɩkɩsɩ.
43018011	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju yelʼã a Pɩɛr: “Su a fʋ bãjɩnɛ a sↄkpa pʋↄ. Mɩnɛ a ɩ ɩ̃ kↄ̃ nyu nɩ a won ŋman ʋlↄ a Sãa na kʋ ma wa?”
43018012	A lɛ, a sↄdaalsɩ nɩ a ba nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a Jufisɩ parsãdiele nyↄw na a Jeeju lũ.
43018013	Ba de na nĩe taw ʋ cenʼɩ̃ a An sɛ̃, a-na-ɩ a An ɩ̃ ɩ a Kayifi dɩ̃ɛmɛ ɩ̃ a Kayifi ɩ̃ dãa ɩ a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ a ʋna yuon naa pʋↄ.
43018014	A ʋna Kayifi ɩ̃ dãa yel a Jufisɩ áa na ɩ na son a nɩ-bõ-ƴen na kpi a nɩbɛ ba jaa ɩnɛ.
43018015	A Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr nɩ a par-tuure ƴen sʋbↄ tuure na a Jeeju. A baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ dãa na bↄ̃w a ʋna par-tuure naa, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ nyɛ sↄr lãa kpɛ nɩ a Jeeju a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yir a gbalɩ̃ pʋↄ,
43018016	ɩ̃-cɛ a Pɩɛr cãa ɩraa a yẽw a dↄ̃dↄr nʋↄr. A ʋna par-tuure a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na bↄ̃w yi na ƴɛrʼɩ̃ a tʋ̃tʋ̃-poole ʋlↄ na gure a dↄ̃dↄr, ɩ̃ taw a Pɩɛr kpɛ nɩ.
43018017	A tʋ̃tʋ̃-poole ʋlↄ na gure a dↄ̃dↄr soorʼã a Pɩɛr: “A fʋ̃ʋ mɩ, faa ɩ a daba na par-tuure ƴen sʋbↄ wa mɩɩ?” Ʋ yel ʋ: “Maa ɩ a ʋ par-tuure wa.”
43018018	A mɩnɛ a aar na ɩrɛ, a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ nɩ a parsãdiele gbↄw na a vũu Ꞌwuoro, a Pɩɛr mɩ lãa ɩraa nɩ ba Ꞌwuoro.
43018019	A baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ soorʼã a Jeeju a ʋ par-tuurbe ɩnɛ nɩ a ʋ jaanfʋ ɩnɛ ʋ na jaana a nɩbɛ.
43018020	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Cãa pʋↄ ɩ̃ ma dãa ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ, jaana nɩ ba a daar a jaa a puorfʋ yie pʋↄ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, na ɩ a jiir ala a Jufisɩ ba jaa na ma duoro taa. Maa sↄↄlɩ̃ yel bom kãw wa.
43018021	Bõ ɩnɛ fʋ sooro a maa? Soor a bala na wõ a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃; ba bↄ̃w na a ala ɩ̃ na man ba.”
43018022	A mɩnɛ a Jeeju na yel a lɛ, a parsãde ƴen sʋbↄ na ɩraa a ʋ lõboorɩ̃ ɓa ʋ na ɩ̃ yel: “Lɛ ɩ̃ sɛw a fʋ na ƴɛrʼɩ̃ a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ mɩɩ?”
43018023	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ ƴɛr-fãa ɩ̃ ƴɛr, miil a fãa jie, ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ ƴɛr-son ɩ̃ ƴɛr, bõ ɩnɛ fʋ ɓa ma?”
43018024	A lɛ, a An ɩ na a ba lũ ʋ cenʼɩ̃ a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Kayifi sɛ̃.
43018025	A mɩnɛ a Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr na cãa ɩraa a be Ꞌwuoro a vũu, ba soor ʋ na: “A fʋ̃ʋ mɩ, faa ɩ a ʋ par-tuure ƴen sʋbↄ wa mɩɩ?” A Pɩɛr cɩɩrɩ̃ ɩ̃ yel: “Maa ɩ a ʋ par-tuure wa.”
43018026	A baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ tʋ̃tʋnↄ ƴen sʋbↄ na ɩ bal bõ-ƴen nɩ a ʋlↄ a Pɩɛr na dãa cɛ a toor ŋmaa, yelʼã a Pɩɛr: “Maa dãa nyɛ fʋ a fʋ lãa be nɩ ʋ be a nakʋↄ pʋↄ wa?”
43018027	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Pɩɛr lɛ cɩɩrɩ̃ na á aa ɩ yel-mɩ̃ɛ ʋ wa, ɩ̃ a ɩ a nↄraa kõ na a jie naan.
43018028	A ala na yi tↄ, ba yi nɩ na a Jeeju a Kayifi yir ɩ̃ cenʼɩ̃ a jamana Pɩlatɩ yir. A ɩ na a dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ ɓaaraa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jufisɩ mɩ̃ɛ ma dãa kpɛ a jamana yir wa, a mɩnɛ ba kↄ̃ wa sãw a ba mɩ̃ɛ, kↄ̃ tʋↄ dɩ a Pakɩ fɛtɩ wa.
43018029	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Pɩlatɩ yi na be a yẽw na soor ba: “Bõ ƴɛrɩ̃ nyɩ ƴↄ̃w a daba na?”
43018030	A ba yel ʋ: “A ʋlↄ ma dãa ɩ nɩ-bier wa, sɩ kↄ̃ↄ dãa nyↄw ʋ wa nɩ a fʋ sɛ̃ wa.”
43018031	A Pɩlatɩ yel ba: “A nyɩmɩ mɩ̃ɛ, nyɩ́ de ʋ guor a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ tu nɩ a nyɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn sↄr.” A Jufisɩ yel ʋ: “A sɩmɩ, saa tɛrɛ sↄr na kú nɩrɛ wa.”
43018032	A ta na a lɛ a mɩnɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ a Jeeju na dãa ƴɛr miilʼɩ̃ a kũu wↄ̃ mɩnɛ ʋ na kpiire, na maal baar.
43018033	A jamana Pɩlatɩ lɛ kpɛ na a diem ɩ̃ bʋↄl a Jeeju soor: “Fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ ɩ a Jufisɩ jamana mɩɩ?”
43018034	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Fʋ̃ʋ tɩɛr fʋ yẽ ɩ̃ yel a lɛ, mɩɩ nɩbɛ ɩ̃ yel a ala kʋ fʋ a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ?”
43018035	A Pɩlatɩ yel ʋ: “Jufi nɩrɛ ɩ̃ ɩ mɩɩ? Má a fʋ bal nɩbɛ nɩ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ ɩ̃ nyↄw fʋ wa nɩ a ɩ̃ sɛ̃. Bõ ʋlↄ fʋ maal?”
43018036	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A ɩ̃ jamana fãw ma yi ka a tẽw na pʋↄ wa. A ala ɩ̃ dãa ɩ a tẽw na pʋↄ ʋ yi, a ɩ̃ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ naa dãa na jɛbɛ a jɛb ƴↄnↄ ma, a ba kↄ̃ tʋↄ nyↄw ma kʋ a Jufisɩ wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ̃ jamana fãw ma yi ka a tẽw na pʋↄ wa.”
43018037	A Pɩlatɩ soor ʋ: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a lɛ ʋ, jamana fʋ ɩ mɩɩ?” A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A lɛ fʋ na yel ʋ, jamana ɩ̃ ɩ. Ba dↄw ma na ɩ̃ wa ka a tẽw pʋↄ, na ɩ̃ mana a yel-mɩ̃ɛ kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ. A ʋlↄ na ɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ sʋbↄ ma cɛlɛ na a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃.”
43018038	A Pɩlatɩ soor ʋ: “A yel-mɩ̃ɛ parʼɩ̃ a bõ?” A lɛ a Pɩlatɩ na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, ʋ lɛ yi na na yel a Jufisɩ: “Maa nyɛ a daba na sãwfʋ jie wa.
43018039	Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ nyɩ na mɩlɩ̃ nɩ, ɩ̃ ma barʼã kasu nɩ-bõ-ƴen kʋ nyɩ a Pakɩ fɛtɩ daar. A Jufisɩ jamana nyɩ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ bar kʋ nyɩ mɩɩ?”
43018040	A lɛ, ba wuure na yele nɩ: “Aa ɩ ʋlↄ sɩ bʋↄrↄ wa! Barabasɩ sɩ bʋↄrↄ!” Ɩ̃ a ʋna Barabasɩ naa ɩ na nɩ-bier.
43019001	A Pɩlatɩ ƴↄ̃w na a ba nyↄw a Jeeju cenʼɩ̃ na fↄb.
43019002	A sↄdaalsɩ de na a gʋʋr wob a sapi kpa a Jeeju, ɩ̃ mɩ su ʋ cẽcen jɩ̃-Ꞌwↄlↄ-Ꞌwↄlↄ,
43019003	ɩ̃ tawra tara ʋ yele: “Sɩ puor fʋ na, Julĩsɩ jamana!” Ɩ̃ ba ɓara ɓara ʋ na.
43019004	A Pɩlatɩ lɛ yi na yel a Jufisɩ: “Ɩ̃ na taw na a daba na yi nɩ ka a nyɩ sɛ̃, a nyɩ na bↄ̃w ka maa nyɛ sãwfʋ a ʋ jie wa.”
43019005	A lɛ, a Jeeju yi na ɩ̃ cãa kpa a gʋʋr sapi, su nɩ a cẽcen jɩ̃-Ꞌwↄlↄ-Ꞌwↄlↄ, a Pɩlatɩ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ nyɛ a daba!”
43019006	A lɛ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a parsãdiele na nyɛ ʋ, ba wuure na yele: “Kpa ʋ yaal! Kpa ʋ yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu!” A Pɩlatɩ yel ba: “A nyɩmɩ mɩ̃ɛ, nyɩ́ nyↄw ʋ kpa yaal. A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a maa ʋ, maa nyɛ a ʋ sãwfʋ jie wa.”
43019007	A Jufisɩ yel ʋ: “Sɩ tɛrɛ na ƴɛr-kpɛ̃w kãw ɩ̃ a ƴɛr-kpɛ̃w ʋlↄ miilʼã a ʋ sɛw na na kpi, a-na-ɩ ʋ bʋↄrↄ na ba de ʋ ʋ ɩ Naaŋmɩn Bie.”
43019008	A mɩnɛ a Pɩlatɩ na wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃, dãbɩ̃ɛ lɛ nyɩrɩ̃ na nyↄw ʋ,
43019009	ʋ lɛ lɩɛb kpɛ a diem na soor a Jeeju: “Nyɩnɛ fʋ yi?” Ɩ̃ a Jeeju ma jew ʋ nʋↄr wa.
43019010	A Pɩlatɩ soor ʋ: “Faa jewre ma nʋↄr wa? Faa bↄ̃w ka ɩ̃ tɛrɛ na tʋↄfʋ na bar fʋ ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ a tʋↄfʋ na ƴↄ̃w a ba kpa fʋ yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu wa?”
43019011	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Faa tɛrɛ tʋↄfʋ kãw a ɩ̃ jie ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a ʋlↄ a saꞋlon Naaŋmɩn na tɩɩr kʋ fʋ ʋ wa. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ʋlↄ na nyↄw ma kʋ fʋ nyɩrɩ̃ na maal a fãa gãw fʋ.”
43019012	Wa nyↄw nɩ a daar ʋlↄ, a Pɩlatɩ bʋↄrↄ na a mɩnɛ ʋ na ɩrɛ ɩ̃ bara a Jeeju, ɩ̃-cɛ a Jufisɩ wuure na yele: “A fʋ̃ʋ bar a daba na, faa ɩ a jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ baraa wa. A nɩrɛ lɛ na yel a jamana ʋ ɩ, ʋ ɩ na a jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ san-sʋbↄ.”
43019013	A mɩnɛ a Pɩlatɩ na wõ a ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, ʋ taw na a Jeeju yi nɩ ɩ̃ jɛ a ƴɛr-guoro dakↄw juu na be a jie ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a “Kʋsɩpan,” a Jufisɩ na mɩ bʋↄlↄ a “Gabata.”
43019014	A ɩ na a Pakɩ fɛtɩ walfʋ dayen a mↄ̃tↄ̃-tuo daar, a Pɩlatɩ yel a Jufisɩ: “Nyɩ́ nyɛ a nyɩ jamana!”
43019015	A ba wuure yele: “Kú ʋ! Kú ʋ! Kpa ʋ yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu!” A Pɩlatɩ soor ba: “Ɩ̃ kpa a nyɩ jamana yaal mɩɩ?” A baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ yel ʋ: “Saa tɛrɛ jaman-kpee ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋ wa.”
43019016	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Pɩlatɩ ƴↄ̃w na a ba nyↄw a Jeeju cenʼɩ̃ na kpa yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu.
43019017	A lɛ, ba nyↄw na a Jeeju ʋ tuo a nɩ-kʋ-daa a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ yi nɩ a tẽw pʋↄ, cere nɩ a jie ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a “Ju-ŋman-wɩɛr,” ɩ̃ a Jufisɩ bʋↄlↄ a “Gↄlgↄta.”
43019018	A be a sↄdaalsɩ kpa ʋ yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu. Ɩ̃ ba mɩ kpa na nɩbɛ ayi yaal a nɩ-kʋ-dár jur a ʋ lõbobo pʋʋr, ɩ̃ a Jeeju be a sↄ̃w.
43019019	Á Pɩlatɩ ɩ na a ba sɛb sɛbɛ mar a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu na yel: “A Najarɛtɩ Jeeju ʋ, na ɩ a Jufisɩ jamana.”
43019020	A Jufisɩ yaw Ꞌwuoro na a ala na sɛb a ʋna sɛbɛ naa pʋↄ, a-na-ɩ a jie ʋlↄ ba na kpa a Jeeju yaal pɩɛlʼɩ̃ na a tẽw, ɩ̃ ba dãa na sɛbʼɩ̃ a Jufi ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩ a Orom ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩ a Gɩrɛkɩ ƴɛrɩ̃.
43019021	Ɩ̃ a Jufisɩ baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ yelʼã a Pɩlatɩ: “Taa sɛb á Jufisɩ jamana ʋ ɩwa, ɩ̃-cɛ ɛ̃ɛ sɛb áa dába na yelʼã a Jufisɩ jamana ʋ ɩ.”
43019022	A Pɩlatɩ yel: “A ala ɩ̃ na sɛb, bom ma lɩɛbɛ wa.”
43019023	A mɩnɛ a sↄdaalsɩ na kpá a Jeeju yaáƖ baar, ba dẽ na a ʋ cẽcene po jiir anaan, a ba jaa pↄw bõ-ƴene-ƴene, ɩ̃ cɛ a ʋ kpar-woor ʋlↄ̃ na ma tɛrɛ a sɛfʋ jie wa, a-na-ɩ lɛ ba wob ʋ a juumɩ wa ta nɩ a gbɛɛ pʋↄ.
43019024	A sↄdaalsɩ yele na taa: “Nyɩ taa ɩ a sɩ ɓer a cẽcen na bar wa. Nyɩ́ ɩ a sɩ lↄb a gbabie bↄ̃w a ʋlↄ na diere.” Ba yelʼã a lɛ a mɩnɛ a ƴɛr-bir ʋlↄ na be a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ na tʋↄ maal baar: “Ba po na a ɩ̃ cẽcene, ɩ̃ de a ɩ̃ kparʋ lↄbʼɩ̃ a gbãbie.” Lɛ a sↄdaalsɩ maal.
43019025	A Jeeju mã nɩ a ʋ ma yɛbɛ nɩ a Kilopa pↄw Maarɩɩ, nɩ a Madala Maarɩɩ ɩraa na be a Jeeju nɩ-kʋ-daa par.
43019026	A mɩnɛ a Jẽeju na nyɛ a ʋ mã ɩ̃ mɩ nyɛ a ʋ par-tuure ʋlↄ ʋ na nʋ ʋ ɩraa pɩɛl ʋ, ʋ yelʼã a ʋ mã: “Ɩ̃ mã, nyɛ a fʋ bie.”
43019027	Ɩ̃ mɩ yel a par-tuure ʋlↄ: “Nyɛ a fʋ mã.” Wa nyↄw nɩ a ʋna daarʼã, a par-tuure ʋlↄ de na a Jeeju mã kulʼɩ̃ a ʋ yir.
43019028	A ala na yi tↄ, a Jeeju bↄ̃w ka a ƴele a jaa baarʼã a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a mɩnɛ a ƴɛr-bir ʋlↄ na be a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ na tʋↄ maal baar, ʋ yelʼã. “Kʋ̃ↄ-nyuur nyↄw ma na.”
43019029	Yole dãa na be be na sɛw nɩ dã-ɓiirũ, a ba de a tabɩr miir su a ɩsↄb kakɩr pʋↄ, ɩ̃ ɓɩ̃ nɩ a dã-ɓiirũ tur a Jeeju.
43019030	A lɛ ʋ na nyu a dã-ɓiirũ baar, ʋ yelʼã: “A yele a jaa maalʼã baar!” Ɩ̃ surĩ a juu ɩ̃ ŋmaa a vʋʋrʋ̃.
43019031	A ɩ na a bibi-ciiraa walfʋ dayen, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a ʋna bibirʼãa na ɩ a bibir kpɛ̃ɛ, a Jufisɩ ma bʋↄrↄ a kũusɩ a cãa be a nɩ-kʋ-dar jur a bibi-ciiraa dayen wa. A ala ɩnɛ ba sʋↄrʼã a Pɩlatɩ a ʋ ɩ a ba kar a bala ba na kpa yaal gbɛɛ ɩ̃ yaw ba suu nɩ.
43019032	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a sↄdaalsɩ wɩ na a bala ba na dãa lãa kpa nɩ a Jeeju sɛ̃ na kar a dãdãw sʋbↄ nɩ a tuuraa gbɛɛ,
43019033	ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ ba na ta a Jeeju, ba nyɛ ʋ na ʋ gↄr kpi a baa kar ʋ a gbɛɛ wa.
43019034	Ɩ̃-cɛ a sↄdaala kãw de na a ʋ kãpĩi cↄrʼɩ̃ a Jeeju a lõboorɩ̃, a jɩ̃ɩ nɩ a kʋ̃ↄ yi a jie naan.
43019035	A ʋlↄ na nyɛ a yele ala, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ man a ala ʋ na nyɛ, ɩ̃ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ na yel-mɩ̃ɛ. Ʋ bↄ̃w ka yel-mɩ̃ɛ ʋ yele, a mɩnɛ a nyɩ na mɩ tʋↄ tɛrɛ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa.
43019036	A ana yele ta na a lɛ a mɩnɛ a ƴɛr-bir ʋlↄ na be a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ na tʋↄ maal baar: “Ba kↄ̃ wa ka a ʋ kↄↄr kãw wa.”
43019037	A Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ ƴɛr-bir ƴen sʋbↄ lɛ yelʼã: “Ba nↄↄ Ꞌwuoro na a ʋlↄ ba na cↄr.”
43019038	A ala na baar, a Arimate Jojɛfʋ sʋↄrʼã a Pɩlatɩ a ʋ kʋ ʋ a sↄr ʋ de a Jeeju. A Jojɛfʋ ʋlↄ ɩ na a Jeeju par-tuure, ɩ̃-cɛ Ꞌwaa dãa ɩ a yi cãa pʋↄ wa, a-na-ɩ ʋ jↄrↄ na a Jufisɩ dãbɩ̃ɛ. A Pɩlatɩ kʋ ʋ na a sↄr, ʋ cen na de a Jeeju.
43019039	A Nikodɛ̃ ʋlↄ na dãa cen a Jeeju sɛ̃ a tɩsↄw mɩ wɩ na ɩ̃ tɛrɛ tɩ̃ɩ-nyu-vɩlaa ba na bʋↄlↄ a mɩɩr nɩ a alowe ba na nyãkarɩ̃ taa. A na ta na kilo lɩjɛrʼɩ̃-pie tɩ̃ɩ.
43019040	A ba jaa ayi de na a Jeeju vilĩ ʋ a cẽcene, ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w ʋ a tɩ̃ɩ-nyu-vɩlaa tu nɩ a mɩnɛ a Jufisɩ na ma ũu a ba nɩrɛ.
43019041	A jie ʋlↄ ba na kpa a Jeeju yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu, nakʋↄ be na be, ɩ̃ ya-paalaa mɩ be na be a ʋna nakʋↄ pʋↄ a baa dãa ũu nɩrɛ a be sɛr wa.
43019042	A mɩnɛ a na ɩ a Jufisɩ bibi-ciiraa walfʋ dayen, ɩ̃ a yaa ʋlↄ pɩɛl a be, be ba ũu a Jeeju.
43020001	A jɩmaasɩ dayen dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ ɓaaraa, a mɩnɛ a wɩɛr na cãa liw, a Madala Maarɩɩ wɩ na a yaa par ɩ̃ nyɛ a ba yuo a kubir a yaa nʋↄrɩ̃ bar,
43020002	ʋ jↄ cen na nyɛ a Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr nɩ a par-tuure ƴen sʋbↄ ʋlↄ a Jeeju na nʋ, ɩ̃ yel ba: “Ba irʼã a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ a yaa pʋↄ, ɩ̃ saa bↄ̃w a jie ba na bin ʋ wa.”
43020003	A Pɩɛr nɩ a par-tuure ʋlↄ yi na cen a yaa par.
43020004	A ba jaa ayi lãa na jↄrↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a par-tuure ƴen sʋbↄ ʋlↄ jↄ na vɩɛ a Pɩɛr bar ɩ̃ de nĩe ta a yaa par,
43020005	muul nyɛ a cẽcene na gã a be, ɩ̃-cɛ Ꞌwaa kpɛ wa.
43020006	A Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr mɩ bɩɛrʼã ta kpɛ a yaa pʋↄ nyɛ a cẽcene na gã a be,
43020007	ɩ̃ mɩ nyɛ a cẽcen ʋlↄ ba na lũ ʋ a juumɩ, ʋ pilĩ gã ji-kpee ʋ tɛw.
43020008	Ã par-tuure ʋlↄ na dãa de nĩe ta a yaa par, mɩ pãa na kpɛ nyɛ a lɛ ɩ̃ sↄw.
43020009	A-na-ɩ baa dãa bↄ̃w a par sɛr a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na yel áa Jeeju sɛw na na ir a kũu pʋↄ wa.
43020010	A ala ɩ̃ baar, a par-tuurbe ayi bala lɩɛbʼã kul a ba yie,
43020011	ɩ̃-cɛ a Maarɩɩ ɩraa a yaa par kono. Ã mɩnɛ ʋ na kono, ʋ muulʼã a yaa pʋↄ
43020012	nyɛ a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ ayi a ba su cẽcẽ-pɛlɛ jɛ nɩ a jie ʋlↄ ba na dãa gaal a Jeeju. A bõ-ƴen jɛ na a ʋ juu jie ɩ̃ a kãw jɛ a ʋ gbɛɛ jie.
43020013	A sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ soor ʋ: “Pↄw, bõ ɩnɛ fʋ kono?” Ʋ yel ba: “Ba de na a ɩ̃ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ a maa bↄ̃w a jie ba na bin ʋ wa.”
43020014	A mɩnɛ ʋ na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, ʋ ŋmelĩ na nyɛ a Jeeju ʋ ɩraa a be, ɩ̃-cɛ Ꞌwaa bↄ̃w ka ʋlↄ ʋ wa.
43020015	A Jeeju soor ʋ: “Pↄw, bõ ɩnɛ fʋ kono? Ala fʋ bʋↄrↄ?” Ɩ̃ a Maarɩɩ tɩɛrʼã beeka a nakʋↄ sʋbↄ ʋ, ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ de ʋ, miil ma a jie fʋ na bin ʋ, ɩ̃ cen na ɓↄw ʋ.”
43020016	A Jeeju bʋↄl ʋ: “Maarɩɩ!” Ʋ ŋmelĩ yel a Jeeju nɩ a Jufi ƴɛrɩ̃: “Araboni!” (A lɛ yelʼã, a Jãjaana).
43020017	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Taa gↄw ma tɛɛ lɛ wa, a-na-ɩ maa do a ɩ̃ Sãa jie sɛr wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ cen na yel a ɩ̃ yɛɛr á ɩ̃ duoro na a ɩ̃ Sãa sɛ̃ na ɩ a ɩ̃ Naaŋmɩn, a ʋlↄ na mɩ ɩ a nyɩ Sãa nɩ a nyɩ Naaŋmɩn.”
43020018	A Madala Maarɩɩ cenʼã na yel a par-tuurbe á ʋ nyɛ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ mɩ man ba a ala a Jeeju na yel ʋ.
43020019	A ʋna jɩmaasɩ dayen jaanʋↄr, a par-tuurbe kpaarɩ̃ na taa a yir pʋↄ ɩ̃ kpal a pana a-na-ɩ ba jↄrↄ na a Jufisɩ dãbɩ̃ɛ; a Jeeju wɩ ɩraa a ba sↄ̃w ɩ̃ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ su-ɓaar!”
43020020	A lɛ ʋ yel ɩ̃ miilʼɩ̃ ba a ʋ nur nɩ a ʋ lõboor, a nʋ̃ↄ nyↄw ba a mɩnɛ ba na nyɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ.
43020021	A Jeeju lɛ yel ba na go: “Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ su-ɓaar! A mɩnɛ a Sãa na tʋ̃ ma, a maa mɩ, lɛ ɩ̃ mɩ tʋ̃ nyɩ.”
43020022	A mɩnɛ ʋ na yel a lɛ baar, ʋ pɛɛlʼã a vʋʋrʋ̃ ƴↄ̃w ba ɩ̃ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ pↄw a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.
43020023	A nɩrɛ lɛ maal-faar nyɩ na diere bara kʋrↄ ʋ, a Naaŋmɩn na de na bar kʋ ʋ, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ maal-faar nyɩ na ma sↄwrↄ diere bara wa, a Naaŋmɩn kↄ̃ de bar kʋ ʋ wa.”
43020024	A Tomasɩ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Yɩb, na ɩ a par-tuure ƴen sʋbↄ, ma dãa be a ʋ tↄ deme sↄ̃w a lɛ a Jeeju na wɩ wa.
43020025	A lɛ a par-tuurbe na yel ʋ a ba nyɛ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ʋ yel ba na: “A maa ma nyɛ a kure bↄↄr a ʋ nur pʋↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ su a ɩ̃ nubir a bↄↄr ala pʋↄ wa, lãa su nɩ a ɩ̃ nuu a ʋ lõboor bↄw pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃ kↄ̃ tʋↄ sↄw wa.”
43020026	A lɛ a bibie anuu-nʼata na tↄl baar, a par-tuurbe lɛ kpaarɩ̃ na taa a yir pʋↄ, a Tomasɩ mɩ be tↄ. A pana kpalʼã ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju wɩ na ɩraa a ba sↄ̃w ɩ̃ yel: “Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ su-ɓaar!”
43020027	A ala ɩ̃ baar, ʋ yelʼã a Tomasɩ: “Tur a fʋ nubir, nyɛ a ɩ̃ nur. Wa su a fʋ nuu a ɩ̃ lõboorɩ̃, ɩ̃ bar a baalɩ̃fʋ ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w ma a nyãa!”
43020028	A Tomasɩ yel ʋ: “Ɩ̃ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ ɩ̃ Naaŋmɩn!”
43020029	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A-na-ɩ fʋ nyɛ ma na, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a fʋ ƴↄ̃w ma nyãa. Ɩ̃ a na ɩ na nʋ̃ↄ a bala jie na ma nyɛ ma wa ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w ma a nyãa.”
43020030	A Jeeju lɛ maalʼã nↄ-kofʋ tʋ̃-yaw a ʋ par-tuurbe nii-sↄw ba na ma sɛb ƴↄ̃w a sɛbɛ na pʋↄ wa.
43020031	Ɩ̃-cɛ ba sɛbʼã a yele asɩmɛ a nyɩ na tʋↄ sↄw ka a Jeeju ɩ na a Kirisi na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Bie, ɩ̃ a nyɩ na pↄw a baafʋ a ʋ jie a nyɩ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ɩnɛ.
43021001	A ala na tↄl baar, a Jeeju lɛ nyɩrʼã a ʋ par-tuurbe a Tiberiyadi man gbẽgbere nʋↄr. Nyɛ a mɩnɛ ʋ na nyɩr ba.
43021002	A bala na be taa ɩ na a Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr nɩ a Tomasɩ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Yɩb, nɩ a Natanɩɛl na yi a Kana na be a Galile wɩɛr, nɩ a Jebede bi-dabsɩ ayi nɩ a Jeeju par-tuurbe ayi go.
43021003	A Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr yel ba: “Ɩ̃ cere na jɩmɛ nyↄↄrfʋ.” A ba yel ʋ: “Sɩ na mɩ pↄw fʋ na lãa cenʼɩ̃.” A lɛ, ba yi na kpɛ a gbor pʋↄ cen, ɩ̃-cɛ baa nyↄw bom a ʋna tɩsↄw naa wa.
43021004	A mɩnɛ a bio na vɩɛrɛ, a Jeeju ɩraa na be a man gbẽgbere nʋↄr, ɩ̃-cɛ a par-tuurbe ma dãa bↄ̃w ka ʋlↄ ʋ wa.
43021005	A Jeeju soor ba: “Ɩ̃ bibiir, nyaa pↄw a jɩmɛ wa mɩɩ?” A ba yel ʋ: “Kpee!”
43021006	Ʋ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ lↄb a jʋↄ a gbor dʋrɩ̃ loor, ɩ̃ nyɩ na pↄw na.” A lɛ, ba lↄbʼã a jʋↄ ɩ̃ ma lɛ tʋↄrↄ tawra ʋ yire nɩ a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ wa, a-na-ɩ ʋ nyɩrɩ̃ na sɛw nɩ a jɩmɛ.
43021007	A par-tuure ʋlↄ a Jeeju na nʋ yelʼã a Pɩɛr: “A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋ!” A lɛ a Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr na wõ áa Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋ, ʋ su na a ʋ kparʋ ɩ̃ aw lo a kʋ̃ↄmɩ (a-na-ɩ ɩ̃gan ɓuol ʋ dãa tɛrɛ).
43021008	Ɩ̃ a par-tuurbe bala na cɛ wɩ nɩ na a gbor, tawra nɩ a jʋↄ na sɛw nɩ a jɩmɛ, a-na-ɩ mɛɛtɩr kʋbaa tɛw ba dãa jãa nɩ a tene.
43021009	A mɩnɛ ba na yi a gbẽgbere juu, ba nyɛ na vũu na Ꞌlere, a jɩmɛ be a ʋ juu, ɩ̃ a buru mɩ be be.
43021010	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ ir a jɩmɛ ala nyɩ na nyↄↄr a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ wa nɩ”,
43021011	a Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr kpɛ a gbor pʋↄ ɩ̃ taw a jʋↄ na sɛw nɩ a jɩ̃-bɛrɛ, yi nɩ a gbẽgbere juu. A jɩmɛ ɩ na kʋbaa lɩjaayi nɩ pie-nʼata, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a na saarɩ̃ waa a lɛ, a jʋↄ ma ɓer wa.
43021012	A Jeeju yel ba: “Nyɩ́ wa dɩ a dɩb.” Ɩ̃ par-tuure kãw ma Ꞌla soor ʋ a ala ʋ ɩ wa, a-na-ɩ ba bↄ̃w ka a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋ.
43021013	A Jeeju wɩ na de a buru kʋ ba ɩ̃ mɩ kʋ ba a jɩmɛ.
43021014	A ɩ na gbɛɛ ata a lɛ, a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na nyɩr a ʋ par-tuurbe a lɛ ʋ na ir a kũu pʋↄ.
43021015	A lɛ ba na dɩ a dɩb baar, a Jeeju soorʼã a Sɩmↄ̃ Pɩɛr: “Jã bi-daba Sɩmↄ̃, fʋ nʋ ma na gãw a basɩmɛ mɩɩ?” Ʋ yel: “ↄↄ. Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, fʋ bↄ̃w ka ɩ̃ nʋ fʋ na.” A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Bↄ̃w Ꞌwuoro a ɩ̃ peli.”
43021016	Ʋ soor ʋ na gbɛɛ ayi pʋↄ: “Jã bi-daba Sɩmↄ̃, fʋ nʋ ma na mɩɩ?” Ʋ yel ʋ: “ↄↄ. Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, fʋ bↄ̃w ka ɩ̃ nʋ fʋ na.” A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Bↄ̃w Ꞌwuoro a ɩ̃ piir.”
43021017	Ʋ lɛ soor ʋ na gbɛɛ ata pʋↄ: “Jã bi-daba Sɩmↄ̃, fʋ nʋ ma na mɩɩ?” Suur sãw na a Pɩɛr a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na soor ʋ a gbɛɛ ata pʋↄ á ʋ nʋ ʋ na mɩɩ? Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ yel ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, fʋ bↄ̃w na a yele a jaa; fʋ bↄ̃w ka ɩ̃ nʋ fʋ na.” A Jeeju yel ʋ: “Bↄ̃w Ꞌwuoro a ɩ̃ piir.
43021018	Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele fʋ, a lɛ fʋ na dãa cãa ɩ a polbile, fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃ ma dãa sɛ a sɩɛ gan fʋ yẽ cere nɩ a jie ʋlↄ fʋ na bʋↄrↄ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ̃ʋ wa kor baar, fʋ na jã na a nur ɩ̃ a nɩ-kpee sɛ fʋ a sɩɛ gan ɩ̃ taw fʋ cenʼɩ̃ a jie ʋlↄ fʋ na ma bʋↄrↄ fʋ cen wa.”
43021019	A Jeeju ƴɛrʼã a lɛ miilʼɩ̃ a kũu wↄ̃ mɩnɛ a Pɩɛr nↄↄ kpiire, a na maal a Naaŋmɩn yuor ʋ yi. A lɛ ʋ na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, ʋ yel ʋ na: “Tuure ma!”
43021020	A Pɩɛr ŋmelĩ na nyɛ a par-tuure ʋlↄ a Jeeju na nʋ ʋ tuure ba. (Ʋ ɩ na a ʋlↄ na dãa gã dɩɛl a Jeeju a lɛ ba na dɩrɛ a dɩb ɩ̃ soor ʋ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ala ɩ̃ ɩ a ʋlↄ nↄↄ diere fʋ a juu?”)
43021021	A lɛ a Pɩɛr na nyɛ ʋ, ʋ soorʼã a Jeeju: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ a naa, bõ ɩ̃ nↄↄ ta ʋ?”
43021022	A Jeeju yel ʋ: “A maa bʋↄrↄ ʋ cãa be be wa ta nɩ a daar ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na lɩɛbɛ waara, a ɩ na fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ mɩɩ? A fʋ̃ʋ, tuure ma!”
43021023	A lɛ, a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ yɛrʼã pↄw a yɛɛr sↄ̃w áa ʋna par-tuure naa ma kpiire wa. Ɩ̃ a Jeeju ma yel a Pɩɛr áa ʋna par-tuure ma kpiire wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ yel ʋ na: “A maa bʋↄrↄ ʋ cãa be be wa ta nɩ a daar ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na lɩɛbɛ waara, a ɩ na fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ mɩɩ?”
43021024	A ʋna par-tuure naa ɩ̃ de a yele asɩmɛ mana, ɩ̃ sɛb ƴↄ̃w a sɛbɛ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ sɩ bↄ̃w ka a ala ʋ na mana ɩ na yel-mɩ̃ɛ.
43021025	Tʋ̃-yaw lɛ cãa na be be a Jeeju na maal. A ala ɩ̃ ɩ ba dãa na sɛbɛ a ala a jaa bõ-ƴene-ƴene ƴↄnↄ a sɛbsɩ pʋʋr, maa sↄw ka a tẽw ʋ jaa naa tʋↄ na tɛrɛ a ana sɛbsɩ wa.
44001001	Towfɩl! A ɩ̃ sɛb-dãdãw pʋↄ, ɩ̃ manʼã a ala a jaa a Jeeju na dãa maal, nɩ a ala ʋ na mɩɩn a nɩbɛ a nyↄwfʋ jie
44001002	wa ta nɩ a bibir ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na de ʋ do nɩ a saa juu. A lɛ ʋ na ma do sɛr wa, a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ fãw ʋ miile nɩ a bala ʋ na vɛl ir a ba ɩ a ʋ nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ a ala ba na sɛw ba maal.
44001003	A lɛ ʋ na kpi ɩ̃ ir a kũu pʋↄ baar, ʋ miilʼã a ʋ yel-mɩ̃ɛ gbɛɛ yayaw a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ jie, miile nɩ ba a ʋ lɛ tɛrɛ na a baafʋ, a mɩnɛ ʋ na nyɩr ba a bibie lɩjaayi pʋↄ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ ba a Naaŋmɩn fãw ƴɛrɩ̃.
44001004	Bibir kãw, a mɩnɛ ʋ na lãa dɩrɛ nɩ ba a dɩb, ʋ kʋ ba na a ƴɛrɩ̃ na na yele: “Nyɩ taa wa yire a Jerujalɛm wa, ɩ̃ nyɩ́ jɛ gu a Sɩɛ ʋlↄ a Sãa na pʋlɩ̃ nɩ nyɩ, a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na mɩ dãa yel nyɩ.
44001005	A-na-ɩ a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ a Jã-Batii dãa mʋr a nɩbɛ ɩ̃ a ka nɩ a fɩ̃ɩ pʋↄ, Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ pʋↄ ba na mʋr nyɩ.”
44001006	A bala na duo taa a Jeeju sɛ̃ sooro ʋ na: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, fʋ na cↄↄrɩ̃ na a Ɩsɩrayɛl-tẽw a ʋna daarʼãa pʋↄ ʋ lɛ pↄw a ʋ fãw mɩɩ?”
44001007	Ʋ yel ba: “A bibir nɩ a daar ʋlↄ a Sãa na ƴↄ̃w nɩ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃, aa ɩ nyɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ a nyɩ na bↄ̃w wa.
44001008	Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, nyɩ na pↄw na a fãw a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na waara nɩ ƴↄnↄ nyɩ, a nyɩ na ɩ a ɩ̃ yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛr-manba a Jerujalɛm, nɩ a Jude nɩ a Samari wɩɛr ʋ jaa, lɛɛ wa ta nɩ a tẽw bɛwfʋ jiir.”
44001009	A lɛ ʋ na ƴɛr a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ baar, ba Ꞌwuoro ʋ na ʋ duoro a saa juu, ɩ̃ a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃ma wa piw ʋ a baa lɛ nyɛ ʋ go wa.
44001010	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na Ꞌwuoro a saꞋlon a lɛ ʋ na duoro, nɩbɛ ayi na su cẽcẽ-pɛlɛ nyɩr ba na
44001011	ɩ̃ yel ba: “A nyɩmɩ Galile nɩbɛ, bõ ɩ a nyɩ ɩraa a ka Ꞌwuoro a saꞋlon a lɛ? A Jeeju ba na de a nyɩ sↄ̃w duoro nɩ a saa juu nↄↄ lɩɛbʼã wa a mɩnɛ nyɩ na nyɛ ʋ ʋ duoro a saa juu.”
44001012	A nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ yi na a Olivi-tɩɩr tãw juu ɩ̃ lɛ lɩɛb cen a Jerujalɛm. A ʋna tãw ma jãa nɩ a Jerujalɛm wa; a ʋ jãafʋ na ta na kilo bõ-ƴen.
44001013	A lɛ ba na lɩɛb wa a tẽw pʋↄ, ba do na kpɛ a bↄↄpɩɛn die pʋↄ, a jie ʋlↄ ba na ma dãa kpaara taa. A bala na be a be ɩ na a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jã, a Jakɩ, a Ãdire, a Fɩlɩpɩ, a Tomasɩ, a Batelemi, a Matie, a Alfe bie Jakɩ, a Sɩmↄ̃ na ma jɛrɛ, nɩ a Jakɩ kãw bi-daba Judi.
44001014	A ba jaa fɛw ma duo na taa a daar a jaa, lãa nɩ a pↄↄbↄ, nɩ a Jeeju mã Maarɩɩ, nɩ a Jeeju yɛɛr, na ba sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn.
44001015	A bibir kãw, a popuorbo duo na taa ta lɩjaayʋↄb, a Pɩɛr ir a ba sↄ̃w ɩ̃ yel ba:
44001016	“Yɛɛr, a dãa na sɛw a na ta a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na yel a lɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na dãa ƴↄ̃w a Davɩtɩ ʋ ƴɛr a Judasɩ ɩnɛ, ʋlↄ na tↄw a nɩbɛ bala na nyↄw a Jeeju.
44001017	A Judasɩ ʋlↄ dãa na be a sɩ pʋↄ ɩ̃ mɩ dãa lãa tʋnↄ nɩ sɩ a tʋn.
44001018	“A ʋna daba naa de na a libie ba na dãa ya ʋ a ʋ tʋ̃-fãa ɩnɛ, da nɩ puo. Ʋ lo na a be, gbuu nɩ a juu a tene, a puor pur, a nyaba yi a jaa,
44001019	a Jerujalɛm nɩbɛ ba jaa wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ naa ɩ̃ bʋↄlↄ a ʋna puo nɩ a ba ƴɛrɩ̃ a Akɛl-dama, a lɛ yelʼã a ʻjɩ̃ɩ puoʼ.
44001020	“A-na-ɩ a sɛbʼã a Pɛwfʋ Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: ʻWↄ̃ taa nɩ a ʋ yir ʋ lɩɛb ɩ dakpolo, a nɩrɛ kↄ̃ lɛ kpɛ be wa,ʼ ɩ̃ a lɛ sɛbʼã go: ʻA nɩ-kpee ú de a ʋ tʋmↄ.ʼ
44001021	-
44001022	“Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a sɛw na a nɩ-kpee na pↄw sɩ na ʋ ɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛr-mana a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju kũu-pʋↄ-irfʋ ɩnɛ. A sɛw na a daba ʋlↄ ʋ ɩ a nɩrɛ na dãa be a sɩ pʋↄ a daar a jaa a lɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju na dãa lãa yʋↄrↄ nɩ sɩ, wa de nɩ a mɩnɛ a Jã na mʋr ʋ a kʋ̃ↄ, wa ta nɩ a bibir ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na de ʋ a sɩ sↄ̃w do nɩ a saa juu.”
44001023	Ba bʋↄlʼã nɩbɛ ayi ƴↄ̃w a ba nii-sↄw, a Jojɛfʋ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Basabasɩ na mɩ dɩ a Jusitisi, nɩ a ƴen sʋbↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Matɩyasɩ.
44001024	Ɩ̃ a ba jaa sʋↄrↄ na a Naaŋmɩn yele nɩ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, a fʋ̃ʋ na bↄ̃w a nɩbɛ ba jaa sube, miil sɩ a nɩbɛ ayi na pʋↄ a buor fʋ na vɛl ir,
44001025	ʋ na lɩɛr a Judasɩ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ tʋmↄ na pʋↄ ʋ na bar ɩ̃ cen a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ jie.”
44001026	Ba lↄbʼã a gbãbie a ba ɩnɛ ɩ̃ a gbãbie miilʼã a Matɩyasɩ, a ba de ʋ ƴↄ̃w a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ pie-nɩ-bõ-ƴen pʋↄ.
44002001	A lɛ a Pãtekↄtɩ bibir na ta, a popuorbo ba jaa duo na taa a ji-bõ-ƴen.
44002002	A jie naan, a damfʋ yi na a saꞋlon wↄ̃ taa nɩ sɛsɛb kpɛ̃ɛ na fure, ɩ̃ sɛw a ʋna yir ʋ jaa ba na be.
44002003	Ɩ̃ ba nyɛ na bom na wↄ̃ taa nɩ vũu Ꞌlerisɩ a ŋma kpee kpee mar a ba jaa bõ-ƴene-ƴene,
44002004	a ba jaa sɛw nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ, ɩ̃ nyↄw a ƴɛr-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na ƴↄw ba a ba ƴɛrɛ.
44002005	A Jufisɩ dãa na be be na jↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn na yi a ten ten a jaa ɩ̃ wa be a Jerujalɛm-tẽw.
44002006	A mɩnɛ ba na wõ a ʋna damfʋ, ba kaalʼã taa duo, a nʋↄr kpaw ba a-na-ɩ ba wõ na a popuorbo a ba ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa bõ-ƴene-ƴene ƴɛrɩ̃.
44002007	A dũunɩ ba na a nↄɛ ko ba a ba yele: “A nɩbɛ basɩmɛ na ƴɛrɛ, aa ɩ Galile a ba jaa yi wa?
44002008	Ɩ̃ mɩnɛ a ɩ a sɩ jaa wõ a ba ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ ba na dↄw nɩ sɩ?
44002009	A-na-ɩ a sɩmɩ, sɩ yi na a ten kpee kpee. A ŋmɛɛ yi na a Partɩ, a ŋmɛɛ mɩ yi a Mɛɛdɩ, a ŋmɛɛ lɛ yi a Elam, a ŋmɛɛ go lɛ yi a Mesopotamɩ, a ŋmɛɛ yi a Jude nɩ a Kapadↄsɩ, nɩ a Pↄ̃ nɩ a Ajɩ wɩɛr.
44002010	Ɩ̃ a ŋmɛɛ mɩ yi na a Fɩrɩjɩ, nɩ a Pãfɩlɩ, a Ejibti nɩ a Lɩbɩ wɩɛr ʋlↄ na pɩɛlʼɩ̃ a Sɩɩrɛn, ɩ̃ a ŋmɛɛ yi a Orom.
44002011	Á sɩ pʋↄ, ŋmɛɛ be na be na ɩ a Jufisɩ, ɩ̃ a ŋmɛɛ be na be na kpɛ a Jufisɩ puorfʋ pʋↄ. A ŋmɛɛ mɩ be na be na yi a Kɩrɛtɩ, ɩ̃ a ŋmɛɛ yi a Árabɩ. Ɩ̃ a sɩmɩ sɩ jaa, sɩ wõ na a ba de a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ƴɛrɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn tʋ̃-bɛrɛ ʋ na maal.”
44002012	Ɩ̃ a nʋↄr ko ba na ba jaa, a ba tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ bↄr ba, a ba sooro taa: “A par nɩ bõ?”
44002013	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ŋmɛɛ kpɛrɛ na a popuorbo yele nɩ á dãa ɩ̃ kʋrↄ ba.
44002014	A Pɩɛr nɩ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ pie-nɩ-bõ-ƴen lãa na ir ɩraa, ɩ̃ ʋ nyↄw a ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ nɩ kpɛ̃w kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ: “A nyɩmɩ na ɩ a Jufisɩ nɩ a nyɩmɩ nyɩ jaa na be a Jerujalɛm, nyɩ́ cɛl vɩlaa bↄ̃w a ala ɩ̃ na ƴɛrɛ nyɩ.
44002015	A nɩbɛ na, aa ɩ dãa ɩ̃ kʋrↄ ba a mɩnɛ nyɩ na tɩɛrɛ wa, a-na-ɩ a cãa na ɩ dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ ɓaaraa.
44002016	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala na maala a ka ɩ na a ala a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere Jowɛl na dãa yel:
44002017	ʻA Naaŋmɩn yelʼã: Nyɛ a ala nↄↄ tara a baarfʋ daar. Ɩ̃ na deerʼã a ɩ̃ Sɩɛ pↄw a nɩbɛ ba jaa. A nyɩ bi-dabsɩ nɩ a nyɩ bi-pↄↄbↄ nↄↄ ƴɛrɛ na a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala a Naaŋmɩn nↄↄ kʋrↄ ba. A nyɩ polbil nↄↄ mɩ nyɛrɛ na a sɩɛ yele ɩ̃ a nyɩ dab-nyan nↄↄ mɩ nyɛrɛ na a jãasʋlɩ̃sɩ.
44002018	A lɛ ʋ, ɩ̃ na mɩ deerʼã a ɩ̃ Sɩɛ ƴↄ̃w a ɩ̃ tʋ̃tʋ̃-biir nɩ a ɩ̃ tʋ̃tʋ̃-pooli a ʋna daarʼãa pʋↄ, ɩ̃ ba nↄↄ ƴɛrɛ na a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala a Naaŋmɩn nↄↄ kʋrↄ ba.
44002019	Ɩ̃ nↄↄ maalʼã a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ na miile a ɩ̃ kpɛ̃w a saꞋlon iin nɩ a tẽw pʋↄ. A jɩ̃ɩ nↄↄ be na be nɩ a vũu, ɩ̃ a jʋʋr lũburĩ pↄw a wɩɛr.
44002020	A mↄtↄ̃w na lɩɛbʼã liw a tɩsↄw kaarɩ̃, ɩ̃ a cuu mɩ lɩɛb mʋ̃ↄ a jɩ̃ɩ kaarɩ̃ baar, ɩ̃-cɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ bibir pãa ta, a bibir kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ na kpawra a nɩbɛ nʋↄr.
44002021	A lɛdaar, a nɩrɛ lɛ na bʋↄlↄ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yuor, a Naaŋmɩn na faa ʋ na.ʼ
44002022	“Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ, nyɩ́ cɛlɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ na: a Najarɛtɩ Jeeju ʋlↄ, a Naaŋmɩn miilʼã a ʋ yel-mɩ̃ɛ a nyɩ sɛ̃. A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn de ʋ na tʋ̃ nɩ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ nɩ a tʋ̃-bɛrɛ na miile a ʋ kpɛ̃w a nyɩ sↄ̃w a mɩnɛ a nyɩmɩ mɩ̃ɛ na mɩ bↄ̃w.
44002023	Ba nyↄw na a ʋna daba ƴↄ̃w a nyɩ nuumɩ, tu nɩ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ nɩ a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa de nĩe bↄ̃w a yele ala nↄↄ tara. Ɩ nyɩ kú ʋ na, a-na-ɩ nyɩ ƴↄ̃w na a nɩ-faar a ba kpa ʋ yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu.
44002024	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn faa ʋ na a kũu won pʋↄ ɩ̃ ir ʋ a kũu pʋↄ, a-na-ɩ sↄr ma be be a kũu na tʋↄ nyↄw ʋ tɛɛlɛ wa.
44002025	A-na-ɩ a Davɩtɩ dãa na yel a ʋ ɩnɛ: ʻƖ̃ ma nyɛ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ a ɩ̃ nii-sↄw a daar a jaa. Ʋ be nɩ ma na a mɩnɛ a bom kↄ̃ wa dama ma wa.
44002026	A ala ɩnɛ a nʋ̃ↄ be na a ɩ̃ suur pʋↄ ɩ̃ a nʋↄr mɩ nʋmↄ ma ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ nɩ nyɩ. Ɩ̃ a ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ ɩ̃gan balʼã, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ na barʼã nyãa gã nɩ,
44002027	a-na-ɩ faa bara a ɩ̃ sɩɛ a kpɩɩn tẽw wa, ɩ̃ faa mɩ sↄwrↄ a fʋ Nɩ-son ɩ̃gan ʋ sãwna wa.
44002028	Fʋ miil ma na ɩ̃ bↄ̃w a baafʋ sↄɛ, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ fʋ na be nɩ ma fʋ na maalʼã a nʋ̃ↄ a ƴala ma.ʼ
44002029	“Yɛɛr wee! A sɛw na ɩ̃ na ƴɛr nyɩ cãa pʋↄ a sɩ sãa-kʋmↄ Davɩtɩ ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ ʋ kpi na a ba ũu ʋ, ɩ̃ a ʋ yaa eãa na ka a sɩ jie wa ta nɩ a dɩnaa.
44002030	Ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ dãa na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere ɩ̃ ʋ bↄ̃w na bↄ̃w ka a Naaŋmɩn dãa na pʋlɩ̃ nɩ ʋ pↄ yel áa ʋ bal parvʋↄr ƴen sʋbↄ nↄↄ mɩ ɩ na a jamana a ʋ kaarɩ̃.
44002031	A Davɩtɩ de na nĩe nyɛ a ala nↄↄ tara, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ man a Kirisi kũu-pʋↄ-irfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃, a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa yel áa Naaŋmɩn ma bar ʋ a kpɩɩn tẽw wa, ɩ̃ a ʋ ɩ̃gan ma mɩ sãw wa.
44002032	A Naaŋmɩn irʼã a Jeeju ʋlↄ a kũu pʋↄ, a sɩ jaa nyɛ a lɛ ɩ̃ mana nyɩ.
44002033	Ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn ɓↄw ʋ na do nɩ biin a ʋ dʋrɩ̃ lõboorɩ̃ ɩ̃ kʋ ʋ a ʋ Sɩɛ ʋlↄ ʋ na dãa pʋlɩ̃ nɩ ʋ. A ala ʋ deer a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ a nyɩ nyɛ ɩ̃ mɩ wonaa.
44002034	A-na-ɩ a Davɩtɩ mɩ̃ɛ ma do a saꞋlon wa ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ yelʼã: ʻA Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yelʼã a ɩ̃ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ: Jɛ a ɩ̃ dʋrɩ̃ lõboorɩ̃
44002035	wa ta nɩ a lɛ ɩ̃ nↄↄ ƴↄnↄ a fʋ sama-deme a fʋ gbɛɛ pulẽe a ba ɩrɛɛ a fʋ gbɛɛ dↄↄlfʋ jie.ʼ
44002036	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a sɛw na a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ ba jaa ba bↄ̃w ka yel-mɩ̃ɛ ʋ, áa Jeeju ʋlↄ nyɩ na dãa kpa a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu, áa ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w ʋ ɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a Kirisi.”
44002037	A lɛ a nɩbɛ na wõ a ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, a tↄ ba na yaw a ba sooro a Pɩɛr nɩ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ na lãa be nɩ ʋ: “Yɛɛr, bõ sɩ na maal?”
44002038	A Pɩɛr yel ba: “Nyɩ́ lɩɛb a nyɩ yɛ̃, ɩ̃ a ba de a Jeeju-Kirisi yuor mʋrʼɩ̃ nyɩ a kʋ̃ↄ bõ-ƴene-ƴene, a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na de a nyɩ maal-faar bar kʋ nyɩ, ɩ̃ nyɩ na pↄw na a Naaŋmɩn bõ-son na ɩ a ʋ Sɩɛ ʋ na kʋrↄ nyɩ.
44002039	A-na-ɩ a nyɩmɩ nɩ a nyɩ bibiir a Naaŋmɩn pʋlɩ̃ nɩ, nɩ a bala ba jaa na be a nɩdaa mɩ, a bala ba jaa a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Naaŋmɩn nↄↄ bʋↄlↄ.”
44002040	A Pɩɛr lɛ ƴɛrʼã ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ yaw kpãkpana nɩ ba, bʋↄrↄ nɩ ʋ lɩɛb a ba tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ. Ʋ yel ba na: “Nyɩ́ faa a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ yi nɩ a bana nɩ-gõgolĩsɩ pʋↄ!”
44002041	A bala na sↄw a Pɩɛr ƴɛrɩ̃, ba mʋr ba na a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ. A lɛ, a bala na dↄↄl a popuorbo pʋↄ a ʋna dayen naa tara na nɩbɛ ture ata.
44002042	Ba tↄ na nyãa ɩ̃ cɛlɛ a ala a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ na jaana ba, ɩ̃ mɩ nyↄw taa nɩ a nʋfʋ, ɩ̃ mɩ lãw taa a dɩb dɩfʋ jie nɩ a Naaŋmɩn puorfʋ jie.
44002043	Dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw na a nɩbɛ ba jaa a mɩnɛ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ na maala a nↄ-kofʋ tʋ̃-yaw na miile a Naaŋmɩn kpɛ̃w a ba nii-sↄw.
44002044	A popuorbo ba jaa ɓã na taa ɩ nↄ-bõ-ƴen, na ba sũono taa nɩ a ba yele a jaa ba na tɛrɛ.
44002045	Ba ma de na a ba na-yele da, nɩ a bom lɛ ba na tɛrɛ, na ba ma po a libie ba jaa a mɩnɛ a nɩrɛ lɛ na bʋↄrↄ.
44002046	Ba ma duo na taa a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ a bibie a jaa, ɩ̃ mɩ lãa yʋↄrↄ taa a yie dɩrɛ taa a dɩb. Ba ma dɩ na a ba dɩb nɩ nʋ̃ↄ nɩ pʋ-pɩlaa
44002047	ɩ̃ pɛwrɛ a Naaŋmɩn, pↄwrↄ nɩ a yo-vɩlaa a nɩbɛ ba jaa jie. Ɩ̃ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ma de na a bala a Naaŋmɩn na faa ƴↄnↄ a ba pʋↄ a bibie a jaa.
44003001	Bibir kãw, a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jã cenʼã a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ a mↄtↄ̃w gↄrfʋ daar a puorfʋ.
44003002	Daba dãa na be be ba na dↄw ʋ ɩ gbɛr. A bibie a jaa ba ma ɓↄw ʋ na cenʼɩ̃ na bin a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃ ba na bʋↄlↄ a “Dↄ̃dↄr vɩlaa,” ʋ sʋↄrↄ a yele a bala jie na waara a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ.
44003003	A ʋna daba nyɛ na a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jã na tↄl kpɛɛrɛ ɩ̃ sʋↄr ba a libie,
44003004	a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jã Ꞌwuor ʋ kir-kir-kir ɩ̃ a Pɩɛr yel ʋ: “ꞋWuoro sɩ!”
44003005	A daba mʋrʼã a mimie cↄw ba cɛlɛ nɩ bↄ̃w ka bom ba kʋrↄ ʋ.
44003006	Ɩ̃ a Pɩɛr yel ʋ na: “Maa tɛrɛ libie mɩɩ sɛlmɛ kʋrↄ fʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ̃ na tɛrɛ, ala ɩ̃ na kʋ fʋ. Ir cere nɩ a Najarɛtɩ Jeeju-Kirisi yuor!”
44003007	Ɩ̃ na ʋ nyↄw ʋ a dʋrɩ̃ nuu jɛw ʋ ir. A jie naan a ʋ gbɛ-cerisɩ nɩ a ʋ nakↄↄtɩɛ kpɛmɛ na
44003008	ʋ aw ir cere, lãa kpɛ nɩ ba a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ, cere awra nɩ pɛwrɛ a Naaŋmɩn.
44003009	A nɩbɛ ba jaa na be a be nyɛ ʋ na ʋ cere pɛwrɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn,
44003010	a ba bↄ̃w ʋ ʋ ɩ a ʋlↄ na ma dãa jɛ a Naaŋmɩn yir “Dↄ̃dↄr vɩlaa” nʋↄr sʋↄrↄ a libie, a tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ bↄr ba a ba ha nↄɛ a ala ɩnɛ na ta a gbɛr jie.
44003011	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na cãa pↄw a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jã, a nɩbɛ ba jaa nↄɛ ko ba na a ba jↄrↄ wɩɛrɛ a jɛ̃bɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ pʋↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a “Salʋmↄ̃ jɛ̃bɛrɩ̃”.
44003012	A Pɩɛr nyɛ na a lɛ ɩ̃ yel a nɩbɛ: “Ɩ̃ bal nɩbɛ, bõ ɩ a nↄɛ ko nyɩ a ala na ta ɩnɛ? Bõ ɩ a nyɩ Ꞌwuoro sɩ a lɛ, wↄ̃ taa nɩ a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ kpɛ̃w, mɩɩ a sɩ torfʋ sɩ maalʼɩ̃ a daba na ʋ ir cere?
44003013	A Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ na ɩ a Abʋraham Naaŋmɩn nɩ a Ɩjakɩ nɩ a Jakↄb nɩ a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ Naaŋmɩn, a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ maal a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnↄ Jeeju yuor ʋ yire. A nyɩmɩ, nyɩ dãa na nyↄw a Jeeju ʋlↄ tɩɩr a ba na kú, ɩ̃ a lɛ a jamana Pɩlatɩ na dãa bʋↄrↄ ʋ bar ʋ, nyɩ jɛ ʋ na bar.
44003014	A nyɩmɩ, nyɩ jɛ na a ʋlↄ na ɩ a Son Sʋbↄ nɩ a Yel-mɩ̃ɛ Sʋbↄ bar, ɩ̃ sʋↄr a ba bar a nɩ-kúrↄ kʋ nyɩ.
44003015	Nyɩ dãa na ɩ a ba kú a ʋlↄ na ɩ a Baafʋ Sʋbↄ, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn ir ʋ na yi nɩ a kũu pʋↄ. A sɩmɩ, sɩ nyɛ na a lɛ ɩ̃ mana kʋrↄ nyɩ.
44003016	A Jeeju fãw nɩ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa a ʋ ɩnɛ, ala ɩ̃ maal a daba na nyɩ na nyɛ ɩ̃ mɩ bↄ̃w ʋ pↄw a kpɛ̃w. A Jeeju yuor nɩ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa a ʋ jie, ala ɩ̃ maal a daba na ʋ kpɛmɛ a cɛcɛ a nyɩ jaa nii-sↄw.
44003017	“Ɩ̃-cɛ, ɩ̃ yɛɛr, ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka a nyɩmɩ nɩ a nyɩ ni-dierbe dãa na maal a lɛ a Jeeju jie a-na-ɩ nyaa dãa bↄ̃w buon wa.
44003018	A nↄhↄ̃, a Naaŋmɩn maalʼã a ala ʋ na dãa de nĩe ƴↄ̃w a ʋ ƴɛr-hierbe ba jaa a ba hier, áa Kirisi sɛw na na nyɛ hʋʋr.
44003019	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ nyɩ́ lɩɛb a nyɩ yɛ̃ ɩ̃ lɩɛb wa a Naaŋmɩn jie, ʋ de a nyɩ maal-faar fɛ bar nyɩ.
44003020	A lɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na bar a ʋ pɩɛnfʋ ʋ wa, ɩ̃ mɩ tɩɩr a Jeeju ʋlↄ na ɩ a Kirisi ʋ na dãa de nĩe biin a nyɩ ɩnɛ.
44003021	A Kirisi ʋlↄ, ʋ sɛw na na be be a saꞋlon wa ta nɩ a lɛdaar a yele jaa na lɩɛbɛ ɩrɛɛ a yel-paala, a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na dãa ƴↄ̃w a ʋ ƴɛr-hier-sono a ba ƴɛr a korĩ-cɛ,
44003022	a mɩnɛ a Mowisi na dãa yel: ʻA Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na ɩ a nyɩ Naaŋmɩn nↄↄ kʋ nyɩ na a ƴɛr-hiere a ɩ̃ kaarɩ̃ na ɩrɛɛ a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ nɩrɛ ƴen sʋbↄ, ɩ̃ nyɩ na cɛlɛ na a ala a jaa ʋ na yele nyɩ.
44003023	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩrɛ lɛ na mↄↄ cɛlɛ a ʋna ƴɛr-hiere wa, ba na ir ʋ na a nɩbɛ pʋↄ yi nɩ kú bar.ʼ
44003024	Ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe ba jaa, wa nyↄw nɩ a Samɩɛl, a ba jaa bõ-ƴene-ƴene mɩ manʼã a ala nↄↄ tara a ana daarʼãa.
44003025	A pʋlɩ̃fʋ ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na de a ƴɛr-hierbe pʋlɩ̃ nɩ ɩ na a nyɩ ben, ɩ̃ nyɩ mɩ be na tↄ a pʋlɩ̃-taa ʋlↄ pʋↄ a Naaŋmɩn na pʋlɩ̃ nɩ a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ, a mɩnɛ ʋ na yel a Abʋraham: ʻƖ̃ na sũo na a tẽw bal-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ nɩbɛ ba jaa a fʋ bal nɩbɛ ɩnɛ.ʼ
44003026	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Naaŋmɩn irʼã a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnↄ tʋ̃ ʋ de nĩe wa a nyɩ jie, a mɩnɛ ʋ na sũo a nyɩ jaa bõ-ƴene-ƴene a nyɩ lɩɛb ɩ̃ bar a nyɩ tʋ̃-faar.”
44004001	A lɛ a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jã na ƴɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛ, a Naaŋmɩn baar-lorbo nɩ a Naaŋmɩn yir-gurbe nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a Saduse nɩbɛ ta na a ba sɛ̃,
44004002	ɩ̃ nyɛ suur a-na-ɩ ba jaana na a nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ de a Jeeju kũu-pʋↄ-irfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ miile nɩ ba áa nɩbɛ na mɩ irʼã a kũu pʋↄ.
