44004003	Ba nyↄↄr ba na ɩ̃ a-na-ɩ a wɩɛr liwre na, ba ƴↄ̃w ba na a kasu pʋↄ a ba jɛ a be vɩɛ nɩ a bio.
44004004	Ɩ̃-cɛ a bala na dãa wõ a Pɩɛr ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩ-yaw sↄw na, ɩ̃ a lɛ, a popuorbo tara na dabsɩ ture anuu.
44004005	A bio vɩɛ na a Jufisɩ ni-dierbe nɩ a ba tẽ-Ꞌwuorbo nɩ a ba ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ duo taa a Jerujalɛm.
44004006	A An na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ dãa na be be, nɩ a Kayifi, nɩ a Jã, nɩ a Alɛsãdɩrɛ, lãa nɩ a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩbɛ ba jaa.
44004007	Ba taw na a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jã wɩ nɩ a ba nii-sↄw na sooro: “Nyɩnɛ nyɩ pↄw a fãw maalʼɩ̃ a tʋn na? Mɩɩ ala yuor nyɩ de maalʼɩ̃?”
44004008	Ɩ̃ a Pɩɛr sɛw nɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ɩ̃ yel ba: “A nyɩmɩ na ɩ a tẽ-Ꞌwuorbo nɩ a nyɩmɩ ni-dierbe,
44004009	nyɩ sooro sɩ na a dɩnaa a maal-vɩlaa ʋlↄ na maal a gbɛr jie, nɩ a mɩnɛ ʋ na pↄw a kpɛ̃w.
44004010	A nyɩmɩ nyɩ jaa nɩ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ ba jaa, a sɛw na nyɩ bↄ̃w ka a Najarɛtɩ Jeeju-Kirisi ʋlↄ nyɩ na dãa kpa a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn maal ʋ ʋ ir a kũu pʋↄ, a ʋ ɩnɛ a daba na ɩraa nɩ a ɩ̃gan kpɛ̃w a nyɩ nii-sↄw a dɩnaa.
44004011	A Jeeju ʋlↄ, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ ʻa kubir a nyɩmɩ mɛmɩɛrbɛ na dãa jaar bar, ɩ̃ ʋ lɛ lɩɛbʼã ɩ a kubir ʋlↄ ba na de ƴↄ̃w a dacin gbɛr pʋↄ.ʼ
44004012	A-na-ɩ nɩ-kpee ma be be na tʋↄrↄ faara a nɩbɛ wa. A-na-ɩ yo-kpee ma be be a Naaŋmɩn na kʋ a nɩbɛ a ka a tẽw pʋↄ ʋ na tʋↄ faa ba wa.”
44004013	A mɩnɛ a Jufisɩ nɩ-bɛrɛ na nyɛ a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jã Ꞌlafʋ, nʋↄr kpaw ba na, a-na-ɩ ba bↄ̃w ba na a ba ɩ nɩ-pↄrsɩ na ma dãa bↄ̃w a sɛbɛ wa. Ba mɩ bↄ̃w ba na a ba dãa be taa nɩ a Jeeju.
44004014	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na nyɛ a daba ʋlↄ na kpɛmɛ ʋ lãa ɩraa nɩ ba, baa lɛ tʋↄ ƴɛr ƴɛrɩ̃ wa,
44004015	ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ba yel a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jã a ba yi ɩraa be yẽw, ɩ̃ a bala ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ man taa.
44004016	Ba yele na taa: “Mɩnɛ sɩ na ɩ a nɩbɛ na? A-na-ɩ a Jerujalɛm nɩbɛ ba jaa nyɛ na a mɩnɛ ba na maal a nↄ-kofʋ tʋ̃-kpɛ̃ɛ a saa lɛ tʋↄrↄ cɩɩrɛ wa.
44004017	Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ na kↄ̃ↄ yɛr pↄw a tẽw wa, nyɩ́ ɩ a sɩ per ba a ba kↄ̃ lↄↄ de a ʋna yuor ƴɛrʼɩ̃ a ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋ a nɩrɛ lɛ wa.”
44004018	A mɩnɛ ba na bʋↄl ba a ba kpɛ, ba kpãkpan ba na a ba taa lↄↄ diere a Jeeju yuor ƴɛrɛ nɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ mɩɩ jaana nɩ a nɩbɛ go wa.
44004019	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jã yel ba na: “Nyɩ́ tɩɛr je kãa a ala ɩ a sɛw na a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw a sɩ na jↄrↄ nyɩ gãw a Naaŋmɩn.
44004020	A-na-ɩ a ala sɩ na nyɛ ɩ̃ wõ, sɩ kↄ̃ tʋↄ vã a ƴɛrfʋ wa.”
44004021	A ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ lɛ perʼã a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jã ɩ̃ bar ba a ba cen, a-na-ɩ a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ ba jaa na pɛwrɛ a Naaŋmɩn a ala na ta ɩnɛ, baa dãa bↄ̃w a mɩnɛ ba na ɩrɛ ɩ̃ kpãana ba wa.
44004022	A-na-ɩ a daba ʋlↄ ba na maal a tʋ̃-kpɛ̃w ʋ kpɛmɛ, ʋ dãa na tɛrɛ yomo lɩjaayi nɩ dↄↄlaa.
44004023	Ba barʼã a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jã a ba cen a ba nɩbɛ jie na mɩɩn ba a ala a jaa a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a ni-dierbe na yel ba.
44004024	A lɛ a popuorbo na wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃, ba jaa lãa na puoro a Naaŋmɩn yele nɩ: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, fʋ̃ʋ maal a saꞋlon nɩ a tene nɩ a man nɩ a yele a jaa na be a ba pʋↄ.
44004025	Fʋ̃ʋ dãa ƴↄ̃w a fʋ Sɩɛ ʋ de a sɩ sãa-kʋmↄ Davɩtɩ na ɩ a fʋ tʋ̃tʋnↄ nʋↄr ƴɛrʼɩ̃: ʻBõ ɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ gbono a dab-lʋ̃ʋ a fʋ nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ bõ ɩ a nɩ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ mɩ goro taa a pↄrↄ?
44004026	A tẽw pʋↄ jamansɩ gbɛɛrɩ̃ na taa a jɛb ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ a fãgã deme mɩ duo na taa bʋↄrↄ ba jɛbʼɩ̃ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Naaŋmɩn nɩ a ʋlↄ ʋ na vɛl ir.ʼ
44004027	A-na-ɩ sɩrɛ jaa ʋ, a Ɛrↄdɩ nɩ a Pↄ̃sɩ Pɩlatɩ duo na taa nɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ, nɩ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ a tẽw na pʋↄ a fʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃-son Jeeju fʋ na vɛl ir ɩnɛ,
44004028	áa ba maal a ala a jaa a fʋ fãw nɩ a fʋ pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ na dãa de nĩe gbɛɛrɩ̃ a na ta.
44004029	Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, Ꞌwuor nyɛ a ba pufʋ ɩ̃ maal a fʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ a ba tɛrɛ Ꞌlafʋ ƴɛrɛ nɩ a fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃.
44004030	Tur a fʋ nuu a wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme na kpɛmɛ, ɩ̃ de a fʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃-son Jeeju yuor tʋ̃ nɩ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ na miile a fʋ kpɛ̃w.”
44004031	A lɛ ba na puor baar, a jie ʋlↄ ba na duo taa damʼã, a ba jaa sɛw nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ɩ̃ nyↄw a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ nɩ Ꞌlafʋ.
44004032	A popuorbo ba jaa tɛrɛ na nↄ-bõ-ƴen nɩ tɩɛrʋ̃ bõ-ƴen. Nɩrɛ ma be be a ba pʋↄ na yele aa ala ʋ na tɛrɛ ɩ na a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ tɛw ben wa, ɩ̃ a bala ɩ̃ tɛrɛ, a ma ɩ na a ba jaa ben.
44004033	A nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ tɛrɛ na fãw yaw mana nɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju kũu-pʋↄ-irfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn sũofʋ be na be yaw a ba jaa fɛw jie.
44004034	Bom ma dãa ɓↄr nɩrɛ kãw a ba pʋↄ wa, a-na-ɩ a bala na tɛrɛ a por nɩ a yie, ba ma da na, de a libie
44004035	cenʼɩ̃ na bin a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ sɛ̃, a ba po nɩ a nɩbɛ tu nɩ a mɩnɛ a ba yele ɓↄrfʋ na be.
44004036	Daba be na be na yi a Sɩpɩr-tẽw ɩ̃ ɩ a Levi bal nɩrɛ. A ʋ yuor dɩ na Jojɛfʋ ɩ̃ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ mɩ bʋↄlↄ ʋ Banabasɩ, a lɛ yelʼã a “ɓaɓaala.”
44004037	A daba ʋlↄ de na a ʋ puo da, de a libie cenʼɩ̃ na bin a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ sɛ̃.
44005001	Daba dãa na be be na dɩ Ananɩya, ɩ̃ a ʋ pↄw dɩ Safɩra. Ba de na a ba puo da
44005002	ɩ̃ gor taa a bala ayi ɩ̃ ŋmaa a libie sↄↄlɩ̃. A Ananɩya de na a libi-ŋmãa na cɛ cenʼɩ̃ na bin a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ nii-sↄw.
44005003	A Pɩɛr yel ʋ: “Ananɩya, bõ ɩ a Satã kpɛ sɛw a fʋ suur a fʋ bɛlɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ɩ̃ sↄↄlɩ̃ a puo libi-ŋmãa?
44005004	A puo ɩ̃ dãa cãa be be, ʋ kↄ̃ↄ ɩ a fʋ ben wa mɩɩ? Ɩ̃ a lɛ fʋ na da ʋ baar, a libie ma ɩ a fʋ ben wa mɩɩ? Bõ ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w a maal-bir ʋlↄ tɩɛrʋ̃ a fʋ suur pʋↄ? Aa ɩ nɩrɛ fʋ bɛlɩ̃ wa. Naaŋmɩn fʋ bɛlɩ̃.”
44005005	A mɩnɛ a Ananɩya na wõ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ ʋ lo na kpi, a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw a nɩbɛ bala ba jaa na wonaa.
44005006	A polbil irʼã a ba sↄ̃w ɓↄw a kũu lũ tuo yi nɩ na ũu.
44005007	A ɩ na fɩ̃ɩ a ʋ pↄw wɩ, ɩ̃ Ꞌwaa bↄ̃w a ala na dãa ta wa.
44005008	A Pɩɛr soor ʋ: “Man ma a amɩnɛ nyɩ na da a nyɩ puo. A nↄhↄ̃ nyɩ da mɩɩ?” A pↄw sↄw áa lɛ ba da.
44005009	A Pɩɛr yel ʋ: “Bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a nyɩ man taa ɩ̃ bɩɩrɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Sɩɛ? Nyɛ, a bala na ũu a fʋ sɩrɛ tara na be a dↄ̃dↄr nʋↄr. Ba na mɩ ɓↄw fʋ na tuo yi nɩ.”
44005010	A jie naan ʋ lo na kpi a Pɩɛr nii-sↄw, a polbil bala kpɛ nyɛ a kũu ɩ̃ ɓↄw yi nɩ na ũu pɩɛlʼɩ̃ a ʋ sɩrɛ,
44005011	a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyɩrɩ̃ nyↄw a duo-puorbo nɩ a bala ba jaa na wõ a ala.
44005012	A nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ maala na a nↄ-kofʋ tʋ̃-yaw na miile a Naaŋmɩn kpɛ̃w a nɩbɛ sↄ̃w. A popuorbo ba jaa ma tiw na taa a Salʋmↄ̃ jɛ̃bɛrɩ̃ pʋↄ,
44005013	ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ ba jaa na saarɩ̃ kpiire ba, a nɩ-kpeesɩ maa Ꞌlara tara lãa jɩnɛɛ nɩ ba wa.
44005014	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩ-yaw, a dabsɩ nɩ a pↄↄbↄ, ma sↄw na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ wɩɛrɛ dↄↄlↄ a popuorbo juu.
44005015	A na wↄ̃ a lɛ, a nɩbɛ ma de na a ba wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme ƴↄ̃w a da-gbarɩ̃sɩ juu nɩ a cẽcene pʋↄ cenʼɩ̃ na bin a sↄɛ nↄɛ, a mɩnɛ a Pɩɛr ɩ̃ wa tↄlↄ a ʋ dãadiile ʋ pↄw a ŋmɛɛ.
44005016	A nɩ-yaw mɩ yi na a Jerujalɛm tẽ-bil pʋↄ ɩ̃ jↄ ta nɩ a baalsɩ nɩ a bala a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ na tɛrɛ, ɩ̃ a ba jaa pↄw na a kpɛ̃w.
44005017	A baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a ʋ tↄ deme ba jaa na ɩ a Saduse nɩbɛ, nyuur kpɛ na sɛw ba,
44005018	a ba ir nyↄↄr a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ ƴↄ̃w a kasu pʋↄ.
44005019	Ɩ̃ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sɩ-tʋnaa wɩ na a tɩsↄw na yuo a kasu pana ɩ̃ taw ba yi nɩ ɩ̃ yel ba:
44005020	“Nyɩ́ cen a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ na ɩraa ƴɛrɛ a baa-paalaa na ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ ba jaa.”
44005021	A lɛ a bio na vɩɛ, a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ cenʼã a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ na jaana a nɩbɛ, a mɩnɛ a sɩ-tʋnaa na yel ba. A baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a bala na lãa be nɩ ʋ bʋↄlʼã a Jufisɩ ni-dierbe ba jaa a ba duo taa a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ ɩnɛ. Ba tʋ̃ na á ba ir a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ a kasu pʋↄ wa nɩ.
44005022	Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ a parsãdiele bala na ta a kasu yir, baa nyɛ ba wa, ɩ̃ lɩɛb wa na yel:
44005023	“Sɩ nyɛ na a kasu pan ʋ kpal vɩlaa, ɩ̃ a dↄ̃dↄr-gurbe mɩ ɩraa a be a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃ gu, ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ ba na yuo a pan, saa nyɛ nɩrɛ be a diem wa.”
44005024	A mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn yir-gurbe nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ na wõ a ala ba na yel, a ba tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ dama ba na a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ ɩnɛ, a ba sooro taa a mɩnɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ par na be.
44005025	Ɩ̃ a nɩrɛ wɩ na na yel ba: “Nyɩ́ nyɛ, a nɩbɛ bala nyɩ na dãa pↄw a kasu pʋↄ, ba ɩraa na be a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ jaana a nɩbɛ.”
44005026	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Naaŋmɩn yir-gurbe nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ taw na a parsãdiele cenʼɩ̃ na taw nɩ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ jom wɩ nɩ. Aa ɩ fãgã ba taw nɩ ba wa, a-na-ɩ ba jↄrↄ na a dãbɩ̃ɛ a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ nↄↄ lↄbʼɩ̃ ba a kubie.
44005027	A lɛ ba na ta nɩ ba a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ jie baar, ba ƴↄ̃w ba na a ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ nii-sↄw, a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ba:
44005028	“Sɩ dãa na kpãkpan nyɩ a nyɩ taa lↄↄ ƴɛrɛ bʋↄlↄ nɩ a ʋna daba yuor go wa. Ɩ̃ nyɩ́ nyɛ, nyɩ sɛw na a Jerujalɛm-tẽw nɩ a nyɩ jaanfʋ, ɩ̃ nyɩ bʋↄrↄ na nyɩ de a ʋ kũu ƴɛrɩ̃ dↄↄl a sɩ juu.”
44005029	A Pɩɛr nɩ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ yel ba: “A sɛw na a sɩ na jↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn gãw a nɩbɛ.
44005030	A sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ Naaŋmɩn maalʼã a Jeeju ʋlↄ nyɩ na dãa kpa yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu ʋ ir a kũu pʋↄ.
44005031	A Naaŋmɩn de ʋ na biin a ʋ dʋrɩ̃ lõboorɩ̃ a saa juu ʋ ɩ a Jamana nɩ a Fafaara, a mɩnɛ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ na tʋↄrↄ lɩɛbɛ a ba yɛ̃, a Naaŋmɩn diere a ba maal-faar bara kʋrↄ ba.
44005032	A sɩmɩ, sɩ nyɛ na a ana yele ɩ̃ mana nyɩ, lãw nɩ a Sɩɛ ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na kʋ a bala na jↄrↄ ʋ.”
44005033	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a Jufisɩ ni-dierbe na wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃, suur nyɩrɩ̃ na nyↄw ba a ba bʋↄrↄ ba kú ba.
44005034	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴen sʋbↄ na ɩ a Farɩsɩ nɩrɛ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Gamalɩɛl, na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn-jaana a nɩbɛ ba jaa na jↄrↄ irʼã ɩraa a ba sↄ̃w ɩ̃ yel a ba ɩ a nɩbɛ na a ba yi sɛr.
44005035	A ala ɩ̃ baar, ʋ yel ba na: “Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ, nyɩ́ tɛrɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a ala nyɩ na ƴↄ̃w nyãa nyɩ maal a nɩbɛ na.
44005036	Nyɩ bↄ̃w na a daar ʋlↄ a Tedasɩ na dãa ir ƴɛr a dab-ƴɛrɩ̃ yel a nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋ ɩ, a nɩbɛ kↄↄr anaan dãa tuure ʋ. Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na kú ʋ, a bala na tuure ʋ jↄ na ba jaa yɛ̃yɛlɩ̃, a ʋ ben baar.
44005037	A ala na yi tↄ, a Judasɩ na ɩ a Galile nɩrɛ mɩ irʼã ir a nɩbɛ a sↄrfʋ yuon a ba tuure ʋ. Ɩ̃ ba mɩ kú ʋ na, a bala ba jaa na dãa sↄw a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ jↄ ŋma kpee kpee.
44005038	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, nyɩ́ ir a nyɩ nur a nɩbɛ na jie ɩ̃ cɛ ba, a-na-ɩ a ala ɩ a nɩrɛ jie a ƴɛrɩ̃ na nɩ a tʋn na yi, a na bũburĩ na.
44005039	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ a Naaŋmɩn jie a yi, nyaa tʋↄrↄ bũburaa wa.”
44005040	A ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ sↄw na a Gamalɩɛl nʋↄr ɩ̃ bʋↄl a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ fↄb ɩ̃ kpãkpan ba a ba taa lↄↄ ƴɛrɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ bʋↄlↄ nɩ a Jeeju yuor go wa, ɩ̃ bar ba a ba cen.
44005041	Ba yi na a be a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ jie, a nʋ̃ↄ ƴala ba a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na nyɛ a ba sɛw nɩ a kpɛfʋ a Jeeju yuor ɩnɛ.
44005042	Ɩ̃ a bibie a jaa, ba ma jaana na a nɩbɛ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, nɩ a nɩbɛ yie pʋʋr ma gala wa, hiere nɩ áa Jeeju ɩ na a Kirisi.
44006001	A ʋna daarʼãa, a mɩnɛ a par-tuurbe na nyɩrɩ̃ dↄↄlↄ, a Jufisɩ bala na wono a Gɩrɛkɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ hũhune na a Jufisɩ bala na ɩ a tẽw deme. A-na-ɩ a bibie a jaa, ba ma po na a dɩb hiin a kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄↄbↄ bala na wono a Gɩrɛkɩ ƴɛrɩ̃.
44006002	A nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ pie-nʼayi bʋↄlʼã a par-tuurbe tiw taa ɩ̃ yel ba: “Aa sɛw a sɩ na bar a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ ƴɛrfʋ ɩ̃ poro a dɩb wa.
44006003	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ sɩ yɛɛr, nyɩ́ vɛl ir nɩbɛ anuu-nʼayi a nyɩ pʋↄ na tɛrɛ yo-vɩlaa a nɩbɛ jie, na mɩ sɛw nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a yɛ̃, a sɩ kʋ ba a tʋn na a ba Ꞌwuoro.
44006004	Ɩ̃-cɛ a sɩmɩ, sɩ na cãa na de a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ bar ƴↄ̃w a Naaŋmɩn sʋↄrfʋ pʋↄ nɩ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ ƴɛrfʋ pʋↄ.”
44006005	A ʋna ƴɛr-bir nʋmↄ na a duo-puorbo ba jaa a ba vɛl ir a Ɩtɩɛn na tɛrɛ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ʋ bɛrmɛ a Naaŋmɩn jie, ɩ̃ mɩ sɛw nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ. Ba mɩ vɛlʼã ir a Fɩlɩpɩ nɩ a Porokↄↄr nɩ a Nɩkanↄↄr nɩ a Tɩmↄ̃, nɩ a Parmena, lãa nɩ a Nikola na ɩ a Átɩyↄsɩ-tẽw nɩrɛ na kpɛ a Jufisɩ puorfʋ pʋↄ.
44006006	Ba taw ba na ƴↄ̃w a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ nii-sↄw, a ba dↄↄl ba a nur ɩ̃ sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w ba.
44006007	A Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ yɛrɛ na pↄwrↄ a wɩɛr, ɩ̃ a popuorbo nyɩrɩ̃ waa a Jerujalɛm, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn baar-lorbo yaw sↄw a Jeeju puorfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃.
44006008	Fãw nyɩrɩ̃ na be a Ɩtɩɛn jie, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn sũofʋ be nɩ ʋ na ʋ maala a nↄ-kofʋ tʋ̃-bɛrɛ na miile a Naaŋmɩn kpɛ̃w a nɩbɛ sↄ̃w.
44006009	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ nyↄw na ɩ̃ cɩɩrɛ a Ɩtɩɛn. Ba ɩ na a bala na yi a Sɩɩrɛn nɩ a Alɛsãdiri, ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a ba mɩ̃ɛ puorfʋ yir a nɩbɛ na bʋↄlↄ aa “Gbãgbaar bala na lɛ sↄ a ba mɩ̃ɛ puorfʋ yir”. A ŋmɛɛ mɩ yi na a Sɩlɩsɩ nɩ a Ajɩ ɩ̃ a ba jaa cɩɩrɛ na taa nɩ a Ɩtɩɛn.
44006010	Ɩ̃-cɛ baa tʋↄrↄ ɩrɛɛ nɩ ʋ wa, a-na-ɩ ʋ ƴɛrɛ na nɩ a yɛ̃ ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na kʋ ʋ,
44006011	ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ba sↄↄlɩ̃ tↄ a nɩbɛ ƴↄ̃w a ba yel a ba wõ na a Ɩtɩɛn ʋ ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛr-fãa ƴↄnↄ a Mowisi nɩ a Naaŋmɩn.
44006012	Ba damʼã a nɩbɛ a lɛ, lãa nɩ a ni-dierbe nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ a ba nyɛ suur ƴↄ̃w a Ɩtɩɛn ɩ̃ wɩ nyↄw ʋ cenʼɩ̃ a ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ nii-sↄw.
44006013	Ba mɩ wɩ nɩ na a nɩbɛ bala na ƴↄnↄ ʋ a jir-ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a ba yele: “A daba na ma bara a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ʋ na ƴɛrɛ sãwna nɩ a sɩ Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃-son nɩ a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn wa.
44006014	Sɩ wõ na ʋ yel áa Najarɛtɩ Jeeju ʋlↄ na wɛlʼã a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃ lɩɛr a tʋmↄ ala a Mowisi na kʋ sɩ.”
44006015	A bala ba jaa na jɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ diem Ꞌwuoro na a Ɩtɩɛn kir-kir-kir, ɩ̃ nyɛ a ʋ nii-sↄw ʋ wↄ̃ taa nɩ a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnaa nii-sↄw.
44007001	A baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ soorʼã a Ɩtɩɛn: “Sɩrɛ ʋ mɩɩ?”
44007002	A Ɩtɩɛn yel ba: “Ɩ̃ yɛɛr nɩ a ɩ̃ sãa nʋmↄ, nyɩ́ cɛlɛ! A Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ na yi a yuor nyɩrʼã a sɩ sãa-kʋmↄ Abʋraham a lɛ ʋ na cãa be a Mesopotamɩ ɩ̃ ma cen a Saarã sɛr wa,
44007003	ɩ̃ yel ʋ: ʻYi a fʋ tẽw pʋↄ nɩ a fʋ nɩbɛ jie ɩ̃ cen a tẽw ʋlↄ pʋↄ ɩ̃ na miile fʋ.ʼ
44007004	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Abʋraham yi na a Kalide wɩɛr ɩ̃ cen na jɛ a Saarã. Ɩ̃ a lɛ a ʋ sãa na kpi baar, a Naaŋmɩn lɛ ɩ na ʋ yi a be ɩ̃ wa a tẽw na pʋↄ nyɩ na be a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na.
44007005	Ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn ma kʋ ʋ wɩɛr kãw a be wa. ꞋWaa mɩ kʋ ʋ jie fɩ̃ɩ a gbɛr nɛfʋ jie kaarɩ̃ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ pʋlɩ̃ nɩ ʋ na a ʋ na kʋ ʋ na a tẽw, a ʋlↄ nɩ a ʋ bal par jaa. Ɩ̃ a ʋna daarʼãa, Ꞌwaa dãa tɛrɛ bie sɛr wa.
44007006	Nyɩ́ nyɛ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na yel a Abʋraham, áa ʋ bal par nↄↄ ɩ na sáanba tẽ-kpee pʋↄ, á ba na lɩɛb ba na a ba ɩ gbãgbaar, a ba kpow ba yomo kↄↄr anaan pʋↄ.
44007007	A Naaŋmɩn lɛ yelʼã: ʻƖ nↄↄ guorʼã a ʋna tẽw naa ba na ɩrɛɛ a gbãgbaar ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ ba na yi na a be ɩ̃ wa a wɩɛrʼã pʋↄ na puoro ma.ʼ
44007008	Ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn kʋ na a Abʋraham a yʋↄr ŋmaafʋ a ɩ a pʋlɩ̃-taa jɩbaa. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a lɛ a Abʋraham na dↄw a Ɩjakɩ, ʋ ŋmaa ʋ na a yʋↄr a bibie anuu nɩ ata pʋↄ. A lɛ a Ɩjakɩ mɩ maal a Jakↄb, ɩ̃ a Jakↄb mɩ maal a lɛ a ʋ bibiir pie-nʼayi jie na ɩ a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ.
44007009	“A sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ bala tɛrɛ na nyuur a ba yɛbɛ Jojɛfʋ jie, ɩ̃ nyↄw ʋ da, a ba cen nɩ ʋ a Ejibti-tẽw ʋ ɩ a gbãgbaa a be, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn be nɩ ʋ na,
44007010	ɩ̃ faa ʋ a ʋ won a jaa pʋↄ. Ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na ɩraa a Ejibti-tẽw jamana Faarↄ̃ nii-sↄw, a Naaŋmɩn kʋ ʋ na a yɛ̃ ʋ maalʼɩ̃ a tʋmↄ a nʋmↄ a jamana. Ɩ̃ a Faarↄ̃ ƴↄ̃w na a Jojɛfʋ ʋ Ꞌwuoro a Ejibti-tẽw ʋ jaa, nɩ a ʋlↄ jamana yir yele a jaa.
44007011	A kↄ̃ kpɛ̃ɛ lo na a Ejibti-tẽw ʋ jaa, nɩ a Kanãa-tẽw, a wono ba yaw, a sɩ sãa nʋmↄ ma nyɛrɛ a dɩb dɩrɛ wa.
44007012	A lɛ a Jakↄb na wõ á ci be na a Ejibti-tẽw, ʋ de na nĩe tʋ̃ a sɩ sãa nʋmↄ a be,
44007013	ɩ̃ a gbɛɛ ayi pʋↄ ba na cen, a Jojɛfʋ maalʼã a ba bↄ̃w ʋ ʋ ɩ a ba yɛbɛ, ɩ̃ a lɛ, a Faarↄ̃ mɩ bↄ̃w na a Jojɛfʋ yifʋ jie.
44007014	A ala na yi tↄ, a Jojɛfʋ tʋ̃ na bʋↄl a ʋ sãa Jakↄb nɩ a ʋ yir deme ba jaa na ta nɩbɛ lɩjaayi ŋmaaʼnuu,
44007015	a ba cen a Ejibti. Be a Jakↄb kpi, nɩ a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ mɩ,
44007016	a ba de ba cenʼɩ̃ a Sɩsɛm na ũu a yaa ʋlↄ pʋↄ a Abʋraham na dãa da a Emoor bi-dabsɩ sɛ̃ a be a Sɩsɛm.
44007017	“A lɛ a Naaŋmɩn pʋlɩ̃fʋ ʋlↄ ʋ na dãa pʋlɩ̃ nɩ a Abʋraham maalfʋ daar na tara, a sɩ nɩbɛ lɛ nyɩrɩ̃ na waa dↄↄl a Ejibti-tẽw pʋↄ,
44007018	lɛɛ wa ta nɩ a daar ʋlↄ a jaman-paalaa na de a Ejibti-tẽw Ꞌwuoro, ɩ̃ Ꞌwaa bↄ̃w a Jojɛfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa.
44007019	A jamana ʋlↄ bɛlɩ̃ na a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ ɩ̃ kpowro ba fɛrɛ nɩ ba a ba lↄbↄ a ba bi-pɩɩlsɩ bara a ba kpiire.
44007020	A ʋna daarʼãa pʋↄ ba dↄw a Mowisi ʋ ɩ bi-vɩlaa a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw, a ba guol ʋ a ʋ sãa yir cur ata.
44007021	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na lↄb ʋ bar, a Faarↄ̃ bi-pↄw de ʋ na guol, ʋ lɩɛb ɩ a ʋ bie.
44007022	Ɩ̃ ba jaanʼã a Mowisi ʋ bↄ̃w a Ejibti-tẽw yɛ̃ a jaa, na ʋ ɩ gãdaa a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ pʋↄ nɩ a ʋ tʋmↄ pʋↄ.
44007023	“A lɛ ʋ na pↄw a yomo lɩjaayi, tɩɛrʋ̃ wa ʋ na ʋ bʋↄrↄ ʋ cen na nyɛ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ na ɩ a ʋ yɛɛr.
44007024	A mɩnɛ ʋ na ta a be, ʋ nyɛ na a ʋ yɛbɛ ƴen sʋbↄ a Ejibti nɩrɛ na hʋↄlↄ, ɩ̃ cen na sũo ʋ, na ʋ kú a Ejibti nɩrɛ ʋlↄ yaw a san.
44007025	A Mowisi tɩɛrʼã beeka a ʋ yɛɛr na bↄ̃w na bↄ̃w ka a ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na de faa nɩ ba. Ɩ̃-cɛ baa bↄ̃w a lɛ wa.
44007026	A bio vɩɛ na a Mowisi tuorʼɩ̃ a ʋ yɛɛr ayi na jɛbɛ taa, ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ʋ ɓaalɩ̃ ba, ɩ̃ yel ba: ʻNyɩ ɩ na yɛɛr, ɩ̃ bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a nyɩ hʋↄlↄ taa?ʼ
44007027	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na hʋↄlↄ a ʋ tↄ sʋbↄ, daa na a Mowisi bar ɩ̃ yel ʋ: ʻAla ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w fʋ a fʋ ɩ a sɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a sɩ ƴɛr-guoro?
44007028	Fʋ bʋↄrↄ na fʋ mɩ kú ma a mɩnɛ fʋ na kú a Ejibti nɩrɛ a jamɩ mɩɩ?ʼ
44007029	A lɛ a Mowisi na wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃, ʋ jↄ na cen a Madɩyã-tẽw na jɛ a be dↄw dabil ayi.
44007030	“Ɩ̃ a lɛ a yomo lɩjaayi na tↄl baar, a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnaa nyɩrʼã a Mowisi a tɩ-bile pʋↄ na Ꞌlere a vũu a be a wɛkar pʋↄ a Sɩnayɩ-tãw loor.
44007031	A lɛ ʋ na nyɛ a ala, nʋↄr ko ʋ na ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na ta pɩɛl ɩ̃ Ꞌwuoro, ʋ wõ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ kↄkɩr na yel ʋ:
44007032	ʻƖ̃ ɩ na a fʋ sãa-kʋnbↄ Abʋraham nɩ a Ɩjakɩ nɩ a Jakↄb Naaŋmɩn,ʼ a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw a Mowisi ʋ mine ɩ̃ ma Ꞌlara Ꞌwuoro wa.
44007033	A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ lɛ yel ʋ: ʻYaa a fʋ nafaba bar a-na-ɩ a jie ʋlↄ fʋ na ɩraa ɩ na ji-ciiraa.
44007034	Ɩ̃ nyɛ na a mɩnɛ ba na kpowro a ɩ̃ nɩbɛ a Ejibti-tẽw pʋↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ wõ a mɩnɛ ba na pɛnɛ, ɩ̃ na ɩ̃ suu a ba faafʋ ɩnɛ. Yɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, wa ɩ̃ tʋ̃ fʋ a Ejibti.ʼ
44007035	“A ʋna Mowisi a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ na dãa jaar ɩ̃ yel ʋ á ala ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w ʋ ʋ ɩ a ba nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a ba ƴɛr-guoro, a ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn tʋ̃ ʋ ɩ a nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a fafaara nɩ a sũofʋ ʋlↄ ʋ na pↄw a sɩ-tʋnaa jie na dãa nyɩr ʋ a tɩ-bile pʋↄ.
44007036	A ʋna Mowisi ɩ̃ tↄw a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ yi nɩ a Ejibti-tẽw, tʋ̃ nɩ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ na miile a Naaŋmɩn kpɛ̃w a ʋna tẽw pʋↄ, nɩ a Man Jɩ̃ɛw pʋↄ, nɩ a wɛkar pʋↄ a yomo lɩjaayi.
44007037	A ʋna Mowisi naa yelʼã a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ: ʻA Naaŋmɩn nↄↄ kʋ nyɩ na a ƴɛr-hiere a ɩ̃ kaarɩ̃ na ɩrɛɛ a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ nɩrɛ ƴen sʋbↄ.ʼ
44007038	A ʋna Mowisi mɩ dãa na be nɩ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ na duo taa a wɛkar pʋↄ. Ʋ be nɩ na a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnaa na dãa ƴɛrɛ nɩ ʋ a Sɩnayɩ-tãw juu, ɩ̃ ʋ pↄw a Naaŋmɩn baafʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ na ʋ kʋ sɩ.
44007039	“Ɩ̃-cɛ a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ ma sↄw cɛl ʋ wa. Ba jaar ʋ na bar ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ba lɛ lɩɛb cen a Ejibti.
44007040	Ba yelʼã a Aarↄ̃: ʻMaal bʋtɩbɛ kʋ sɩ a ba ɩ a sɩ naaŋmɩnsɩ naa ba de sɩ nĩe, a-na-ɩ saa bↄ̃w a ala na ta a ʋna Mowisi na yi nɩ sɩ a Ejibti wa.ʼ
44007041	Ba mɛ na bʋtɩɩb a ʋna daarʼãa ʋ wↄ̃ taa nɩ nale ɩ̃ kú a yele ƴↄ̃w ʋ, ɩ̃ na ba ɓolo cɩlɛ nɩ a ala ba na maalʼɩ̃ a ba nur ɩnɛ.
44007042	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn ŋmelĩ na puo-sↄw ƴↄ̃w ba ɩ̃ bar ba a ba puoro a saꞋlon ŋmarbie a mɩnɛ a na yel a ƴɛr-hierbe sɛbsɩ pʋↄ: ʻƖsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ! A maa Naaŋmɩn nyɩ dãa kú a dʋn ƴↄ̃w a wɛkar pʋↄ a yomo lɩjaayi mɩɩ? Aa ɩ maa ʋ wa.
44007043	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩ naaŋmɩn Mↄlↄkɩ gan yir nyɩ dãa tɛrɛ yʋↄrↄ nɩ, nɩ a nyɩ naaŋmɩn Arafã bʋtɩɩb na wↄ̃ a ŋmarbir kaarɩ̃. A ana bʋtɩbɛ naa, nyɩmɩ dãa maalʼɩ̃ a nyɩ nur na nyɩ puoro. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ na diw nyɩ na bar, a nyɩ cen a Babɩlↄ̃-tẽw puo-sↄw.ʼ
44007044	“A be a wɛkar pʋↄ, a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ dãa na tɛrɛ a gan yir ba na maal bine a pʋlɩ̃-taa ƴɛr-kpɛn a Mowisi na sɛb ƴↄ̃w a kʋsɩ-pɛrɩsɩ jur. Ba mɛ na a yir ʋlↄ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na yel a Mowisi, a-na-ɩ ʋ yel ʋ na á ʋ maal a wↄ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa miil ʋ.
44007045	Ba de na a ʋna gan yir naa kʋ a ba bibiir na mɩ ɩ a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ, a ba de cere nɩ a daar ʋlↄ a Jojie na tɛrɛ ba kpɛ fa nɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ ten, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ de ba nĩe diw a nɩ-bʋlsɩ bar. A be a gan yir ʋlↄ be wa ta nɩ a jamana Davɩtɩ daar.
44007046	A ʋ ben nʋmↄ na a Naaŋmɩn, ʋ sʋↄr sↄr a ʋ jie á ʋ mɛ yir-kpɛɛraa kʋ a ʋna Naaŋmɩn na mɩ ɩ a Jakↄb Naaŋmɩn.
44007047	Ɩ̃ a Salʋmↄ̃ ɩ̃ ɛ̃ɛ mɛ a yir kʋ ʋ.
44007048	Ɩ̃-cɛ a saꞋlon iin Naaŋmɩn ma kpɛɛrɛ a yie ala pʋↄ a nɩbɛ na mɛ nɩ a ba nur wa, a mɩnɛ a ƴɛr-hiere na yel áa Naaŋmɩn yelʼã:
44007049	ʻA saꞋlon ɩ na a ɩ̃ naa-dakↄw, ɩ̃ a tẽw ɩ a ɩ̃ gbɛɛ dↄↄlfʋ jie. Yir wↄ̃ mɩnɛ nyɩ na mɛ kʋ ma? Mɩɩ ji-wↄ̃ mɩnɛ pʋↄ ɩ̃ na jɛ pɩɛn?
44007050	Aa ɩ a ɩ̃ nur ɩ̃ maal a ala a jaa wa?ʼ
44007051	“A nyɩna su-kpɛn deme, na ma jaar a Naaŋmɩn bar ɩ̃ maa sↄwrↄ cɛlɛ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa, a daar a jaa nyɩ ma vara na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tʋmↄ! A mɩnɛ a nyɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ na dãa maala, a lɛ nyɩ mɩ maala.
44007052	Yɛr-hier-buor a nyɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ ma dãa hʋↄl wa? Ba kú na a bala na dãa de nĩe ƴɛr a Torfʋ Sʋbↄ wafʋ ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, nyɩmɩ de ʋ a juu na nyɩ kú ʋ.
44007053	A nyɩmɩ na pↄw a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn a sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ na kʋ nyɩ, nyaa jↄrↄ a ana ƴɛr-kpɛn wa!”
44007054	A mɩnɛ a ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ na wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ naa, suur nyↄw ba na po nɩ a ba nyɩr nyɩmɛ ƴↄ̃w a Ɩtɩɛn.
44007055	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Ɩtɩɛn sɛw nɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ɩ̃ Ꞌwuor a saꞋlon nyɛ a Naaŋmɩn cãa kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a Jeeju na ɩraa a Naaŋmɩn dʋrɩ̃ loor,
44007056	ɩ̃ yel: “Nyɩ́ cɛlɛ, ɩ̃ nyɛ na a saꞋlon ʋ yuo nɩ a Nɩbɛ Bie na ɩraa a Naaŋmɩn dʋrɩ̃ loor.”
44007057	A mɩnɛ ba na wõ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ, ba wuurʼã nɩ kpɛ̃w ɩ̃ ɓʋr a ba tobo ɩ̃ sɩlɩ̃ ʋ ba jaa
44007058	nyↄw taw yi nɩ a tẽw cɛ̃cɛ̃w, lↄbↄ nɩ ʋ a kubie bʋↄrↄ ba kú ʋ. A ƴɛr-manba binʼã a ba cẽcene a polbile ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Sol gbɛɛ pulẽe.
44007059	Ba lↄbↄ na a Ɩtɩɛn ɩ̃ ʋ sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn yele: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju, de a ɩ̃ sɩɛ!”
44007060	Ɩ̃ ʋ lo na gburĩ a dume ɩ̃ wuurʼɩ̃ kpɛ̃w yel: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, taa de a fãa na ba na maala ma dↄↄl a ba juu wa!” A lɛ ʋ na ƴɛr a ʋna ƴɛr-bir baar, ʋ ŋmaa na a vʋʋrʋ̃. Ɩ̃ a Ɩtɩɛn kʋfʋ nʋmↄ na a Sol.
44008001	A ʋna bibir bõ-ƴen naa pʋↄ, ba nyↄw na ɩ̃ hʋↄlↄ a Jerujalɛm duo-puorbo, a ba jaa jↄ ŋma kpee kpee cen a Jude nɩ a Samari, ɩ̃ cɛ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ tɛw bar a ba jɛ a Jerujalɛm.
44008002	A nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ na jↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn de na a Ɩtɩɛn naa ba kõ ʋ yayaw ũu.
44008003	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Sol ʋlↄ ƴↄ̃w na kpɛ̃w bʋↄrↄ ʋ bũburĩ a duo-puorbo. Ʋ yʋↄrↄ na a yie nyↄwrↄ a dabsɩ lãa nɩ a pↄↄbↄ, ƴↄnↄ a kasu pʋↄ.
44008004	A bala na dãa jↄ ŋma a kpee kpee yʋↄrↄ na a ten ten ƴɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son.
44008005	A Fɩlɩpɩ cenʼã a Samari-tẽw na ƴɛr a Kirisi ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋ a nɩbɛ.
44008006	A mɩnɛ a nɩ-yaw na wõ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ mɩ nyɛ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ ʋ na maala, ba nyɩrɩ̃ na ƴↄ̃w a toor cɛlɛ a ala ʋ na yele.
44008007	A-na-ɩ a kↄ̃tↄn-kpansɩ yire na a nɩ-yaw jie wuure nɩ kpɛ̃w, ɩ̃ a gbɛɛ nɩ a kpɩkpɩl-sãwsɩ deme yaw kpɛmɛ,
44008008	a ba nyɛ nʋ̃ↄ kpɛ̃ɛ a ʋna tẽw naa pʋↄ.
44008009	A be, daba dãa na be be na dɩ Sɩmↄ̃, na ma maala a tɩsↄↄlʋ̃ʋ a korĩ-cɛ jaa, a nʋↄr ko a Samari nɩbɛ. Ʋ yel ba na á nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋ ɩ,
44008010	a bibiir wa de nɩ a nɩ-bɛrɛ jaa sↄw na ma ƴↄ̃w a toor cɛlɛ ʋ. Ba yelʼã áa daba na, a Naaŋmɩn fãw ʋ tɛrɛ, a ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Fãgã Kpɛ̃ɛ Sʋbↄ.
44008011	Ɩ̃ ba nyɩrɩ̃ na ƴↄ̃w toor cɛlɛ ʋ a-na-ɩ korĩ-cɛ jaa ʋ dãa maal a tɩsↄↄlʋ̃ʋ a ko ba a nↄɛ.
44008012	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Fɩlɩpɩ mana ba na a Naaŋmɩn fãw ƴɛrɩ̃ miile nɩ ba a Jeeju-Klrisi yuor, ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na sↄw a ʋna ƴɛr-son, a dabsɩ nɩ a pↄↄbↄ ɩ na a ba mʋr ba a kʋ̃ↄ.
44008013	A Sɩmↄ̃ mɩ̃ɛ mɩ sↄw na, a ba mʋr ʋ a kʋ̃ↄ, ʋ ɩraa a Fɩlɩpɩ sɛ̃, a nʋↄr nyɩrɩ̃ kpaw ʋ a mɩnɛ ʋ na nyɛ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋ̃-bɛrɛ na miile a Naaŋmɩn kpɛ̃w a Fɩlɩpɩ na maala.
44008014	A nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ na be a Jerujalɛm wõ na áa Samari nɩbɛ sↄw na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ tʋ̃ a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jã a be.
44008015	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na ta a Samari, ba sʋↄrʼã a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w a popuorbo a ba pↄw a ʋ Sɩɛ,
44008016	a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ma dãa suu a bana nɩbɛ jie sɛr wa, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju yuor tɛw ba dãa de mʋrʼɩ̃ ba a kʋ̃ↄ.
44008017	A lɛ, a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jã dↄↄl ba na a nur a ba pↄw a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.
44008018	A lɛ a Sɩmↄ̃ na nyɛ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ na dↄↄl a nɩbɛ a nur a ba pↄw a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ, ʋ irʼã libie kʋ a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jã
44008019	ɩ̃ yel: “Nyɩ́ mɩ kʋ ma a ʋna fãw, a maa wa dↄↄl nɩrɛ a nuu ʋ mɩ pↄw a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.”
44008020	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Pɩɛr yel ʋ na: “A fʋ̃ʋ nɩ a fʋ libie jaa, nyɩ́ bↄr, a-na-ɩ fʋ tɩɛrɛ na áa Naaŋmɩn bom pↄrↄ ɩ na bom fʋ na tʋↄrↄ daara nɩ a libie!
44008021	Faa tɛrɛ sↄr fɩ̃ɩ na lãa tʋ̃ nɩ sɩ a tʋn na wa, a-na-ɩ a fʋ suur ma tor a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw wa.
44008022	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ lɩɛb a fʋ yɛ̃ a fʋ tɩɛrʋ̃ bier ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ sʋↄr a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ; a nʋmↄ wa sↄw ʋ na de na a ʋna tɩɛrʋ̃ bar fʋ.
44008023	A-na-ɩ ɩ̃ nyɛ na bↄ̃w ka a fʋ pʋↄ ulĩ na ma ɩ wa, ɩ̃ a fʋ mɩ be a maal-fãa kasu pʋↄ.”
44008024	A Sɩmↄ̃ yel a Pɩɛr nɩ a Jã: “A nyɩmɩ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ, nyɩ́ sʋↄr a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴↄ̃w ma a ana yele nyɩ na yel ma kↄ̃ wa ta ma wa.”
44008025	A lɛ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ bala ayi na man a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ baar, ba lɩɛbʼã kule a Jerujalɛm, ƴɛrɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son a Samari ten yaw ala pʋↄ na be a ba sↄr juu.
44008026	A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sɩ-tʋnaa kãw yelʼã a Fɩlɩpɩ: “Ir cen a gʋbaa loor a sↄr ʋlↄ pʋↄ na ɩ a wɛkar sↄr, na yi a Jerujalɛm ɩ̃ cere a Gajaa.”
44008027	-
44008028	A Fɩlɩpɩ irʼã cen ɩ̃ a be a sↄr juu, ʋ tuorʼɩ̃ na a Etiyopi daba na dãa cen a Jerujalɛm na puor a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ lɩɛb kule. Ʋ ɩ na a Etiyopi pↄw-jamana ba na bʋↄlↄ a Kãdasɩ tʋ̃tʋ̃-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ba na maal ʋ ab na mɩ ɩ a ʋ libi-Ꞌwuoro. Ʋ jɛ na a ʋ kaar pʋↄ a wiir na ma tawra, ɩ̃ Ꞌwuoro a sɛbɛ ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere Ejayi na dãa sɛb.
44008029	A Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ yelʼã a Fɩlɩpɩ: “Cen na pɩɛlʼɩ̃ a kaar ʋlↄ.”
44008030	A Fɩlɩpɩ jↄ na ta a kaar par, ɩ̃ wõ a daba ʋ Ꞌwuoro a Ejayi sɛbɛ, ʋ soor ʋ: “Fʋ bↄ̃w na a ƴɛrɩ̃ na fʋ na Ꞌwuoro par mɩɩ?”
44008031	A daba yel ʋ. “Mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na ɩ ɩ̃ bↄ̃w a par ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ nɩrɛ ɩ̃ miil ma wa?” A lɛ, ʋ sʋↄrʼã a Fɩlɩpɩ ʋ do kpɛ a ba lãa jɛ.
44008032	A Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ ʋ na dãa Ꞌwuoro yelʼã: “Ba taw ʋ na cenʼɩ̃ wↄ̃ taa nɩ pɛr ba na cere nɩ a kúfʋ jie. Ʋ mɩ sine na wↄ̃ taa nɩ a pẽle ba na pũono a kↄbↄ. ꞋWaa haa nʋↄr wa.
44008033	Ba sũkpurĩ ʋ na; baa guor a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ a tor wa. Nɩrɛ kↄ̃ wa ƴɛr a ʋ bal par ƴɛrɩ̃ wa, a-na-ɩ a ʋ baafʋ ŋmaa na a ka a tẽw pʋↄ.”
44008034	A Etiyopi daba yel a Fɩlɩpɩ: “Ɩ̃ sʋↄr fʋ na, yel ma: ala a ƴɛr-hiere yele a lɛ? Ʋlↄ ɩ̃ yele ƴↄnↄ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ, mɩɩ nɩ-kpee ʋ yele?”
44008035	A Fɩlɩpɩ nyↄw na a jie ʋlↄ ʋ na dãa Ꞌwuoro a sɛbɛ pʋↄ ɩ̃ man ʋ a Jeeju ƴɛr-son.
44008036	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na cere, ba ta na jie kʋ̃ↄ na be, a daba yel a Fɩlɩpɩ: “Nyɛ kʋ̃ↄ; bom be na be vara ma a faa tʋↄrↄ mʋrↄ ma a kʋ̃ↄ wa mɩɩ?” [
44008037	A Fɩlɩpɩ yel ʋ: “A fʋ̃ʋ sↄw nɩ a fʋ pʋↄ ʋ jaa, ɩ̃ na tʋↄ na mʋr fʋ a kʋ̃ↄ.” A daba yel: “Ɩ̃ sↄw na ka a Jeeju-Kirisi ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Bie.”]
44008038	Ɩ̃ ʋ ƴↄ̃w na a ba ɩraa nɩ a kaar, a ʋlↄ nɩ a Fɩlɩpɩ suu kpɛ a kʋ̃ↄmɩ, a Fɩlɩpɩ mʋr ʋ.
44008039	A lɛ ba na yi a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ baar, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Sɩɛ jalʼã a Fɩlɩpɩ cenʼɩ̃, a daba ma lɛ nyɛ ʋ wa. Ɩ̃ a nʋ̃ↄ nyↄw ʋ na ʋ de a sↄr cere.
44008040	Ɩ̃ a Fɩlɩpɩ ʋlↄ wa Ꞌwuorʼã nyɛ ʋ be a Ajↄtɩ-tẽw pʋↄ, ɩ̃ de a sↄr cere, ƴɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ a ten a jaa pʋↄ wa ta nɩ a Sejare.
44009001	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Sol cãa na pure a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ par-tuurbe bʋↄrↄ ʋ kú ba. Ʋ cenʼã a Naaŋmɩn baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sɛ̃
44009002	na sʋↄr sɛbsɩ a ʋ cenʼɩ̃ na kʋ a puorfʋ yir ni-dierbe na be a Damasɩ, ɩ̃ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ ʋ nyɛ na a nɩbɛ bala na tuure a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sↄr, a dabsɩ mɩɩ a pↄↄbↄ, ʋ tʋↄ nyↄↄr ba cenʼɩ̃ a Jerujalɛm.
44009003	A lɛ ʋ na be a sↄr pʋↄ cere na pɩɛlɛ a Damasɩ, a cãa yi na a saꞋlon a jie naan ɩ̃ wa nyɩnyɩl pↄw ʋ,
44009004	ʋ lo a tene ɩ̃ wõ kↄkɩr ʋ yel ʋ: “Sol, Sol, bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a fʋ hʋↄlↄ ma a nↄhↄ̃?”
44009005	A Sol soor: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ala fʋ ɩ?” Ʋ yel ʋ: “Ɩ̃ ɩ na a Jeeju ʋlↄ fʋ na hʋↄlↄ.
44009006	Ɩ̃-cɛ, ir kpɛ a tẽw pʋↄ. A be, ba na yel fʋ na a ala fʋ na sɛw fʋ maal.”
44009007	Ɩ̃ a dabsɩ bala na lãa cere nɩ a Sol, ba ɩraa na lɛ gbul, a mɩnɛ ba na wõ a kↄkɩr ɩ̃ ma nyɛ nɩrɛ wa.
44009008	A Sol lɛ irʼã ɩraa ɩ̃ yuo a mimie ɩ̃ ma nyɛ bom wa, a ba nyↄw ʋ a nuu taw kpɛ nɩ a Damasɩ.
44009009	Ʋ jↄ̃w na maalʼɩ̃ bibie ata, ɩ̃ ma dɩ bom wa, ma mɩ nyu kʋ̃ↄ wa.
44009010	Ɩ̃-cɛ par-tuure ƴen sʋbↄ be na be a Damasɩ-tẽw pʋↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Ananɩya. Ʋ nyɛ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ a sɩɛ bom kaarɩ̃ ʋ bʋↄl ʋ: “Ananɩya!” Ʋ yel: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ sↄw na.”
44009011	Ɩ̃ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ʋ: “Ir cen a sↄr ʋlↄ pʋↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Sↄr Toraa. A fʋ̃ʋ cen, fʋ ta a Judasɩ yir ɩ̃ soor a Tarsɩ-tẽw daba ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Sol. Ʋ be na be sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn,
44009012	ɩ̃ ʋ nyɛ na daba ba na bʋↄlↄ a Ananɩya a sɩɛ bom kaarɩ̃, ʋ kpɛ a ʋ sɛ̃ dↄↄl ʋ a ʋ nuu a ʋ mimie na lɛ yuo.”
44009013	A Ananɩya yel: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, nɩ-yaw man ma na a daba na ƴɛrɩ̃, nɩ a bier a jaa ʋ na maal a fʋ nɩbɛ na be a Jerujalɛm.
44009014	Ɩ̃ a ka mɩ, a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ mɩ kʋ ʋ na a sↄr ʋ na nyↄↄrʼɩ̃ a bala ba jaa na bʋↄlↄ a fʋ yuor.”
44009015	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ʋ na: “Gen, a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ vɛlʼã a ʋna daba ir ʋ na ɩ a ɩ̃ tʋ̃tʋnↄ, miilʼɩ̃ a ɩ̃ yuor kʋ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ nɩ a ba jamansɩ nɩ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ mɩ a ba na bↄ̃w ma.
44009016	A maa mɩ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ na miil ʋ na a won ala ʋ na sɛw ʋ nyɛ a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ.”
44009017	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Ananɩya cenʼã na kpɛ a yir ʋlↄ pʋↄ a Sol na be ɩ̃ dↄↄl ʋ a nuu ɩ̃ yel: “Ɩ̃ yɛbɛ Sol, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju ʋlↄ na nyɩr fʋ a lɛ fʋ na be a sↄr pʋↄ waara ɩ̃ tʋ̃ ma a fʋ sɛ̃, a fʋ mimie na lɛ yuo ɩ̃ a fʋ na sɛw nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.”
44009018	A jie naan, bom Ꞌlaw na a Sol mimie pʋↄ lo wↄ̃ taa nɩ jɩm pↄbↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ lɛ nyɛrɛ. A lɛ, ʋ irʼã a ba mʋr ʋ a kʋ̃ↄ,
44009019	ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na dɩ a dɩb baar, ʋ lɛ nyɛ na kpɛ̃w. A Sol jɛ na a be a Damasɩ fɩ̃ɩ nɩ a par-tuurbe bala na be a be.
44009020	A jie naan, ʋ cenʼã a puorfʋ yie pʋↄ na nyↄw ɩ̃ hiere kʋrↄ ba áa Jeeju ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Bie.
44009021	A nↄɛ ko na a bala ba jaa na wõ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃, a ba sooro taa: “Aa ɩ a daba na ɩ̃ dãa bũbure a bala na bʋↄlↄ a yuorʼãa a Jerujalɛm wa? Ɩ̃ Ꞌwaa mɩ wa a ka a ʋ nyↄↄr ba lũ cenʼɩ̃ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ jie wa?”
44009022	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Sol fãw dↄↄlↄ na a bibie a jaa, ʋ ma ƴɛr a ƴɛrɩ̃ tʋↄ a Jufisɩ bala na be a Damasɩ, a jur bↄr ba, a mɩnɛ ʋ na ma miile ba áa Jeeju ɩ̃ sɩrɩ̃ ɩ a Kirisi.
44009023	A mɩnɛ a bibi-yaw na tↄl baar, a Jufisɩ duo na taa goro a Sol kúfʋ.
44009024	Ɩ̃-cɛ nɩrɛ yel ʋ na á ba goro ʋ na. Ba gure na a tẽw dↄ̃dↄ-nↄɛ a mↄtↄ̃w nɩ a tɩsↄw a mɩnɛ ba na kúrↄ ʋ.
44009025	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Sol par-tuurbe ɩ na ʋ kpɛ kpɛ̃jɛrɩ̃ pʋↄ a tɩsↄw a ba tur ʋ bar ʋ suu a tẽw dacin dapuor.
44009026	A mɩnɛ a Sol na ta a Jerujalɛm, ʋ bʋↄrↄ na ʋ pↄw a par-tuurbe, ɩ̃-cɛ a ba jaa jↄrↄ ʋ na dãbɩ̃ɛ a-na-ɩ baa sↄw a ʋ sɩrɩ̃ na ɩ a par-tuure wa.
44009027	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Banabasɩ tɛrɛ ʋ na eenʼɩ̃ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ sɛ̃ ɩ̃ man ba a mɩnɛ a Sol na nyɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ a sↄr pʋↄ, nɩ a mɩnɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na ƴɛrʼɩ̃ ʋ. Ʋ mɩ yel ba na a mɩnɛ a Sol na de a Jeeju yuor ƴɛrʼɩ̃ a ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩ Ꞌlafʋ a lɛ ʋ na be a Damasɩ.
44009028	Wa nyↄw nɩ a ʋna daarʼãa, a Sol pↄw na a par-tuurbe a ba lãa yʋↄrↄ a Jerujalɛm ɩ̃ de a Jeeju yuor ƴɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩ Ꞌlafʋ,
44009029	ɩ̃ mɩ ƴɛrɛ nɩ a Jufisɩ bala na wono a Gɩrɛkɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ mana taa nɩ ba, ɩ̃ a bala ʋlↄ bʋↄrↄ ba kú ʋ.
44009030	A mɩnɛ a yɛɛr na wonaa, ba tↄw na a Sol cenʼɩ̃ a Sejare na ƴↄ̃w a sↄr ʋ cere a Tarsɩ.
44009031	A lɛ, a duo-puorbo dãa na be a pɩɛnfʋ pʋↄ a Jude nɩ a Galile nɩ a Samari wɛɛ a jaa. Ba pↄwrↄ na a fãw jↄrↄ nɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na sũono ba, a nɩbɛ wɩɛrɛ na dↄↄlↄ a ba pʋↄ.
44009032	A Pɩɛr yʋↄrↄ na a ten a jaa. Ɩ̃ bibir bõ-ƴen ʋ cenʼã a popuorbo sɛ̃ a Lɩda,
44009033	na nyɛ a daba ba na bʋↄlↄ a Ene a be, na maal yomo anuu-nʼata a sɛn pʋↄ a-na-ɩ ʋ gbɛrʼã.
44009034	A Pɩɛr yel ʋ: “Ene, a Jeeju-Kirisi kpɛmɛ fʋ na. Ir pilĩ a fʋ sɛn”, a Ene ir a jie naan.
44009035	A Lɩda nɩbɛ, nɩ a Saarↄ̃ nɩbɛ ba jaa nyɛ ʋ na ɩ̃ lɩɛb puoro a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ.
44009036	Pↄw be na be a Jope ɩ̃ ɩ a popuoro a ba bʋↄlↄ Tabɩta, a ʋna yuor a Gɩrɛkɩ nɩbɛ lɩɛb bʋↄlↄ a Dↄrkasɩ, a lɛ yelʼã a “Wʋl-pɩɛl.” Tʋ̃-vɛlɛ ʋ dãa tʋnↄ a daar a jaa sũono nɩ a nãw deme.
44009037	Wʋlɩ̃ dãa na nyↄw ʋ a ʋna daarʼãa ʋ kpi a ba so ʋ a kʋ̃ↄ baar ɩ̃ de ʋ do nɩ bin a bↄↄpɩɛn diem.
44009038	A Lɩda pɩɛlʼɩ̃ na a Jope, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a mɩnɛ a par-tuurbe bala na be a Jope na wõ áa Pɩɛr be na a be, ba tʋ̃ na nɩbɛ ayi a ʋ sɛ̃ nɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃ na: “Sɩ sʋↄr fʋ na a fʋ na wa a sɩ jie fↄfↄw,”
44009039	a Pɩɛr ir a jie naan a ba lãa cen. A mɩnɛ ʋ na ta a be, ba de ʋ na do nɩ a garɩ̃ a bↄↄpɩɛn diem, ɩ̃ a kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄↄbↄ ba jaa taw na ta ʋ ɩ̃ kono miile nɩ ʋ a kparsɩ nɩ a cẽcene a Dↄrkasɩ na dãa maal a lɛdaar ʋ na dãa be nɩ ba.
44009040	A Pɩɛr ɩ na a ba yi ba jaa ɩ̃ ʋ lo gburĩ a dume ɩ̃ sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃ lɩɛb a nii-sↄw cↄw a kũu ɩ̃ yel: “Tabɩta, ir!” A kũu yuo a mimie nyɛ a Pɩɛr ɩ̃ ir jɛ.
44009041	A Pɩɛr nyↄw ʋ na a nuu sũo ʋ ʋ ir, ɩ̃ ʋ bʋↄl a popuorbo nɩ a kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄↄbↄ na ʋ miilʼɩ̃ ba ʋ lɛ ɩ a nɩ-mimir.
44009042	A Jope-tẽw nɩbɛ ba jaa bↄ̃wnaa na ɩ̃ a nɩ-yaw sↄw de a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ.
44009043	A Pɩɛr jɛ na be a Jope kam a daba ʋlↄ yir ba na bʋↄlↄ a Sɩmↄ̃, na ɩ a gan-cↄↄrↄ.
44010001	Daba dãa na be be a Sejare a ba bʋↄlↄ Kↄrnɛɛ. Ʋ ɩ na a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ a Orom sↄdaalsɩ bala pʋↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Ɩtalɩ sↄdaalsɩ.
44010002	Ʋ puoro na a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ mɩ jↄrↄ ʋ, a ʋlↄ nɩ a ʋ yir deme ba jaa. Ʋ ma irʼã libi-yayaw sũono nɩ a Jufisɩ ɩ̃ mɩ sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn ma gala wa.
44010003	Bibir kãw a mↄtↄ̃w gↄrfʋ daar, ʋ nyɛ na a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnaa gbelẽgbelẽ ʋ kpɛ a ʋ sɛ̃ sɩɛ bom kaarɩ̃ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Kↄrnɛɛ!”
44010004	A Kↄrnɛɛ Ꞌwuor ʋ kir-kir-kir ɩ̃ a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw ʋ ʋ yel: “Boolo ʋ, Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ?” A sɩ-tʋnaa yel ʋ: “A Naaŋmɩn sↄw na a fʋ sʋↄrfʋ nɩ a fu sũofʋ fʋ na sũono a nãw deme, ɩ̃ cãa tɛrɛ a fʋ tɩɛrɛ.
44010005	A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, tʋ̃ nɩbɛ a ba cen a Jope na bʋↄl a daba ʋlↄ na dɩ a Sɩmↄ̃ ba na mɩ bʋↄlↄ a Pɩɛr.
44010006	Ʋ be na a ʋ yuor Sɩmↄ̃ yir pʋↄ na ɩ a gan-cↄↄrↄ, a ʋ yir na be a man gbẽgbere nʋↄr.”
44010007	A lɛ a sɩ-tʋnaa na ƴɛrʼɩ̃ a Kↄrnɛɛ ɩ̃ cen baar, ʋ bʋↄlʼã a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ ayi nɩ a sↄdaalaa ƴen sʋbↄ ʋ na barʼɩ̃ a nyãa na mɩ puoro,
44010008	na ʋ miil ba a ala a jaa ʋ na nyɛ, ɩ̃ tʋ̃ ba a Jope.
44010009	A dɩvɩɛ bio, a mɩnɛ a bana nɩbɛ na cãa be a sↄr pʋↄ pɩɛlɛ a Jope, a Pɩɛr do na a garɩ̃ a mↄtↄ̃-tuo a Naaŋmɩn sʋↄrfʋ ɩnɛ,
44010010	a kↄ̃ nyↄw ʋ ʋ bʋↄrↄ a dɩb. Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na cãa maala a dɩb, ʋ nyɛ na sɩɛ bom.
44010011	Ʋ nyɛ na a saꞋlon ʋ yuo ɩ̃ a bom yi a be ɩ̃ suure wↄ̃ taa nɩ gã-kpɛ̃ɛ ba na nyↄw a jiir anaan ɩ̃ ture ʋ suure pɩɛlɛ a tene.
44010012	A wɛ-yel-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ba jaa be na a gãw pʋↄ: a gbɛɛ anaan deme, a yel-vurisɩ, nɩ a pɩrɛ deme.
44010013	Ɩ̃ ʋ wõ na kↄkɩr na yel ʋ: “Pɩɛr, ir kú Ꞌwↄb!”
44010014	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Pɩɛr yel ʋ na: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, maa tʋↄrↄ wa! A-na-ɩ a yel-ciirsɩ nɩ a yel-kpansɩ maa kpɛ a ɩ̃ nʋↄr pʋↄ wa.”
44010015	Ʋ lɛ wõ na a kↄkɩr na lɛ yel ʋ: “A ala a Naaŋmɩn na yel áa ɩ na yel-sono, taa yele áa ɩ na yel-kpansɩ wa.”
44010016	A ta na gbɛɛ ata a na maal a lɛ, ɩ̃ a jie naan, ba lɛ de na a ana yele do nɩ a saꞋlon.
44010017	A lɛ a Pɩɛr na cãa pɛrɛ a sɩɛ bom ʋlↄ par ʋ na nyɛ, a dabsɩ bala a Kↄrnɛɛ na tʋ̃ sooro na a Sɩmↄ̃ yir wa ta nɩ a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃.
44010018	Ba bʋↄlʼã soor: “Ka a Sɩmↄ̃ ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Pɩɛr be?”
44010019	Ɩ̃ a lɛ a Pɩɛr na cãa pɛrɛ a sɩɛ bom ʋlↄ par, a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ yel ʋ na: “Sɩmↄ̃, nɩbɛ ata be na be bʋↄrↄ fʋ.
44010020	Ir suu pↄw ba a nyɩ lãa cen. Taa baala wa, a-na-ɩ maa ɩ̃ tʋ̃ ba a ba wa.”
44010021	A Pɩɛr suu a bana nɩbɛ sɛ̃ na yel ba: “Maa ɩ̃ ɩ a ʋlↄ nyɩ na bʋↄrↄ. A nʋmↄ na a nyɩ wa ka?”
44010022	A ba yel ʋ: “A sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Kↄrnɛɛ ɩ̃ tʋ̃ sɩ. Ʋ ɩ na a nɩ-toraa na jↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃ a Jufisɩ ba jaa mɩ ƴↄnↄ ʋ. A Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnaa yel ʋ na a ʋ bʋↄl fʋ a fʋ wɩ a ʋ yir ʋ cɛl a ala fʋ na tɛrɛ mana ʋ.”
44010023	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Pɩɛr ɩ na a ba kpɛ gã a be. A bio vɩɛ, ʋ ir de a sↄr a ba lãa cere, a yɛɛr ŋmɛɛ na be a Jope pↄw ba cenʼɩ̃.
44010024	A dɩvɩɛ bio a Pɩɛr ta na a Sejare nyɛ a Kↄrnɛɛ nɩ a ʋ yir deme nɩ a ʋ badɛɛ ʋ na bʋↄl a ba jɛ gu ʋ.
44010025	A lɛ a Pɩɛr na ta kpɛɛrɛ, a Kↄrnɛɛ irʼã tuor ʋ ɩ̃ gburĩ a dume a ʋ nii-sↄw puoro ʋ.
44010026	Ɩ̃ a Pɩɛr nyↄw ʋ na ʋ ir ʋ yel ʋ: “Ir ɩraa, a-na-ɩ a maa mɩ, nɩrɛ ɩ̃ mɩ ɩ.”
44010027	Ʋ ƴɛrɛ nɩ na a Kↄrnɛɛ a ba kpɛ, ʋ nyɛ a nɩ-yaw na duo
44010028	ʋ yel ba: “Nyɩmɩ mɩ̃ɛ bↄ̃w na a sɩmɩ Jufisɩ puorfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ pʋↄ, sↄr ma be be a sɩ na lãa gbɛbɛ taa nɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ wa, wa yele nɩ a ba yir kpɛfʋ wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn man ma na a ɩ̃ taa wa Ꞌwuoro nɩrɛ ʋ wↄ̃ taa nɩ nɩ-kpana mɩɩ nɩ-sãwnaa wa.
44010029	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a mɩnɛ nyɩ na tʋ̃ bʋↄl ma, maa dãa baalɩ̃ wa. Ɩ̃ wa na. Yɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ nyɩ na, nyɩ́ man ma a ala ɩnɛ nyɩ na bʋↄl ma.”
44010030	A Kↄrnɛɛ yel: “Á ɩ na bibie ata a dɩnaa ɩ̃ na be a ɩ̃ yir pʋↄ a nↄhↄ̃-wen, na ɩ̃ puoro a jaanʋↄr puorfʋ. A be a jie naan, ɩ̃ nyɛ na daba na su cẽcẽ-nyɩlaa ʋ ɩraa a ɩ̃ nii-sↄw
44010031	ɩ̃ yel ma: ʻKↄrnɛɛ, a Naaŋmɩn wõ na a fʋ sʋↄrfʋ, ɩ̃ Ꞌwaa hiin a fʋ sũofʋ a nãw deme jie wa.
44010032	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ tʋ̃ nɩbɛ a ba cen a Jope na bʋↄl a Sɩmↄ̃ ʋlↄ na mɩ dɩ a Pɩɛr ʋ wa. Ʋ be na a ʋ yuor Sɩmↄ̃ ʋlↄ yir na ɩ a gan-cↄↄrↄ na be a man gbẽgbere nʋↄr.ʼ
44010033	Ɩ̃ tʋ̃ na bʋↄl fʋ a jie naan a lɛ, ɩ̃ fʋ pɛlɩ̃ na pʋↄ ɩ̃ wa. Ɩ̃ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ sɩ be na ka a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw sɩ jaa bʋↄrↄ sɩ cɛl a ala a jaa a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na ƴↄ̃w fʋ a fʋ na ƴɛr sɩ.”
44010034	A Pɩɛr nyↄw na a ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ yele: “A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ɩ̃ nyɛ na bↄ̃w ka a Naaŋmɩn ma Ꞌwuoro a nɩbɛ kpee kpee wa,
44010035	ɩ̃ a nɩ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ba jaa sↄ̃w, a nɩrɛ lɛ na jↄrↄ ʋ ɩ̃ maala a ala na tor, ma nʋmↄ ʋ na.
44010036	A Naaŋmɩn tɩɩrʼã a ƴɛr-son kʋ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ miile ba a pɩɛnfʋ ʋlↄ na yi a Jeeju-Kirisi jie, na ɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ.
44010037	Nyɩ bↄ̃w na a ala na maal a Jude wɩɛr ʋ jaa wa nyↄw nɩ a Galile, a daar ʋlↄ a Jã na dãa ƴɛr a kʋ̃ↄ mʋrfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ baar.
44010038	Ɩ̃ nyɩ mɩ bↄ̃w na a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na vɛl ir a Najarɛtɩ Jeeju ɩ̃ de a ʋ Sɩɛ nɩ a ʋ fãw kʋ ʋ, nɩ a mɩnɛ a Jeeju na dãa yʋↄrↄ maala a vɩlaa kpɛmɛɛ nɩ a bala a Satã na hʋↄlↄ, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn be nɩ ʋ na.
44010039	A sɩmɩ, sɩ nyɛ na a ala a jaa ʋ na maal a Jerujalɛm nɩ a Jufisɩ tẽw ʋ jaa pʋↄ, ɩ̃ mana kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ. Ɩ̃ ba nyↄw ʋ na kpa yaal a daa juu ʋ kpi,
44010040	ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn ir ʋ na a kũu pʋↄ a bibie ata dayen ɩ̃ maal ʋ ʋ nyɩr sɩ.
44010041	Ɩ̃ aa ɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa ɩ̃ nyɛ ʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ nyɩrʼã a sɩmɩ a Naaŋmɩn na de nĩe vɛl ir a sɩ ɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛr-manba, a sɩmɩ na dãa lãa dɩ nɩ ʋ mɩ lãa nyu nɩ ʋ a lɛ ʋ na ir a kũu pʋↄ baar.
44010042	Ʋ yel sɩ na a sɩ hiere kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ miile nɩ ba a ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn biin ʋ ɩ a nɩ-mimie nɩ a kũusɩ ƴɛr-guoro.
44010043	A Jeeju ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe ba jaa dãa miile yele nɩ áa nɩrɛ lɛ na sↄw de ʋ, áa Naaŋmɩn na de na a ʋ yuor barʼɩ̃ a sʋbↄ ʋlↄ maal-faar kʋ ʋ.”
44010044	A lɛ a Pɩɛr na cãa ƴɛrɛ, a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ suu na pↄw a bala ba jaa na cɛlɛ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃.
44010045	Nↄɛ ko na a popuorbo bala na ɩ a Jufisɩ na dãa bɩɛl a Pɩɛr a ba lãa wɩ, a mɩnɛ ba na nyɛ a Naaŋmɩn ʋ mɩ tɩɩr a ʋ Sɩɛ ʋ suu pↄw a nɩ-bʋlsɩ,
44010046	a-na-ɩ ba wõ na a ba ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ pɛwrɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn. A lɛ, a Pɩɛr yelʼã:
44010047	“Sɩ na tʋↄ na mↄ̃w a nɩbɛ na a kʋ̃ↄ mʋrfʋ mɩɩ? A-na-ɩ ba mɩ pↄw na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ a sɩ kaarɩ̃”,
44010048	ɩ̃ na ʋ ƴↄ̃w a ba de a Jeeju-Kirisi yuor mʋrʼɩ̃ ba a kʋ̃ↄ, ɩ̃ a ba sʋↄr ʋ a ʋ jɛ be fɩ̃ɩ a ba sɛ̃.
44011001	A nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ nɩ a yɛɛr na be a Jude wõ na áa nɩ-bʋlsɩ mɩ sↄw na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃.
44011002	A lɛdaar a Pɩɛr na lɩɛb wa a Jerujalɛm, a bala na ma cɛ̃pɛrɛ a yʋↄr ŋmaafʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ ƴↄnↄ ʋ na a ƴɛrɩ̃
44011003	yele nɩ: “Fʋ kpɛ na a nɩbɛ bala yir na ma Ꞌwuoro a yʋↄr ŋmaafʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa, a nyɩ lãa dɩ taa a dɩb!”
44011004	Ɩ̃ a Pɩɛr man ba na a ala na dãa ta a jaa barsɩ, a nyↄwfʋ jie wa ta nɩ a baarfʋ jie. Ʋ yel ba na:
44011005	“Ɩ̃ dãa na be a Jope sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ nyɛ a sɩɛ bom. Ɩ̃ nyɛ na a bom ʋ suure wↄ̃ taa nɩ gã-kpɛ̃ɛ ba na nyↄw a jiir anaan ʋ yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ suure waara na tara a ɩ̃ sɛ̃.
44011006	Ɩ̃ Ꞌwuorʼã kir-kir-kir a pʋ̃ↄ ɩ̃ nyɛ a dʋn bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ba jaa: a gbɛɛ anaan deme, a wɛ-yele, a yel-vurisɩ nɩ a pɩrɛ deme.
44011007	Ɩ̃ mɩ wõ na a kↄkɩr na yel ma: ʻPɩɛr, ir kú Ꞌwↄb!ʼ
44011008	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ yel ʋ na: ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, maa tʋↄrↄ wa! A-na-ɩ a yel-ciirsɩ nɩ a yel-kpansɩ maa kpɛ a ɩ̃ nʋↄr pʋↄ wa.ʼ
44011009	Ɩ̃ lɛ wõ na a kↄkɩr na yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ yel: ʻA ala a Naaŋmɩn na yel áa ɩ na yel-sono, taa yele áa ɩ na yel-kpansɩ wa.ʼ
44011010	A ta na gbɛɛ ata a na maal a lɛ, ɩ̃ a ba lɛ taw a yele ala a jaa lɛ do nɩ a saꞋlon.
44011011	A ʋna daarʼãa pʋↄ, nɩbɛ ata ta na a yir ʋlↄ pʋↄ ɩ̃ na be. Sejare ba dãa yi ɩ̃ a ba tʋ̃ ba a ba wɩ a ɩ̃ sɛ̃.
44011012	A Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ yel ma na a ɩ̃ pↄw ba cenʼɩ̃, a ɩ̃ taa baala wa. A yɛɛr ayʋↄb basɩmɛ mɩ bɩɛl ma na cenʼɩ̃ a Sejare a sɩ lãa kpɛ a Kↄrnɛɛ yir.
44011013	A Kↄrnɛɛ mɩɩn sɩ na a mɩnɛ ʋ na nyɛ a sɩ-tʋnaa ʋ ɩraa a be a ʋ yir ɩ̃ yel ʋ: ʻTʋ̃ nɩbɛ a ba cen a Jope na bʋↄl a Sɩmↄ̃ ʋlↄ na mɩ dɩ a Pɩɛr wa nɩ.
44011014	Ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na mɩɩn fʋ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala na faara a fʋ̃ʋ nɩ a fʋ yir deme ba jaa.ʼ
44011015	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ɩ̃ na cãa nyↄw a ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ, a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ suu na pↄw ba a mɩnɛ ʋ na mɩ dãa pↄw sɩ a korĩ-cɛ,
44011016	a ɩ̃ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ jaw ɩ̃ bↄ̃w a ala a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na dãa yel sɩ: ʻKʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ a Jã dãa mʋr a nɩbɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩmɩ, Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ pʋↄ a Naaŋmɩn nↄↄ mʋr nyɩ.ʼ
44011017	A nↄhↄ̃, a Naaŋmɩn kʋ ba na a ʋna bõ-pↄr-bõ-ƴen ʋlↄ ʋ na mɩ dãa kʋ sɩ a lɛdaar sɩ na sↄw de a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a maa, ala ɩ̃ mɩ ɩ na tʋↄ var a Naaŋmɩn tʋmↄ?”
44011018	A lɛ ba na wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃, ba sine na ɩ̃ pɛwrɛ a Naaŋmɩn yele nɩ: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a lɛ ʋ, a Naaŋmɩn mɩ kʋ na a nɩ-bʋlsɩ a sↄr a ba na lɩɛb a ba yɛ̃ ɩ̃ de a baafʋ sↄr.”
44011019	A daar ʋlↄ ba na kú a Ɩtɩɛn, a hʋↄlfʋ ta na a popuorbo a ba jↄ ŋma kpee kpee. A ŋmɛɛ cenʼã a Fenisi, a ŋmɛɛ cen a Sɩpɩr ɩ̃ a ŋmɛɛ cen a Ãtɩyↄsɩ, ɩ̃ a Jufisɩ tɛw ba dãa ƴɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋrↄ.
44011020	Ɩ̃-cɛ a popuorbo ŋmɛɛ na yi a Sɩpɩr nɩ a Sɩɩrɛn cenʼã a Átɩyↄsɩ na ƴɛrɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju ƴɛr-son mɩ kʋrↄ a bala na ma ɩ a Jufisɩ wa.
44011021	A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ fãw dãa na be nɩ ba, a yaw jie sↄw de a ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ lɩɛb puoro a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ.
44011022	A ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ ta na a duo-puorbo na be a Jerujalɛm, a ba ir a Banabasɩ bar ʋ cen a Átɩyↄsɩ.
44011023	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na ta nyɛ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na maal ba a vɩlaa, a nʋmↄ ʋ na yaw, ʋ yel ba a ba ɩraa cĩcĩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ jie nɩ a ba pʋↄ ʋ jaa.
44011024	A Banabasɩ ʋlↄ ɩ na nɩ-son, ɩ̃ sɛw nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ʋ bɛrmɛ a Naaŋmɩn jie.
44011025	Á Banabasɩ cenʼã a Tarsɩ na soor a Sol jie yↄ nɩ,
44011026	ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na nyɛ ʋ, ʋ tɛrɛ ʋ na wa nɩ a Átɩyↄsɩ, a ba jɛ a be a duo-puorbo sɛ̃ maal yuon, jaana a nɩ-yaw a Naaŋmɩn sↄr. A be a Átɩyↄsɩ ba dãa de nĩe bʋↄl a par-tuurbe a “Kirisi nɩbɛ”.
44011027	A ʋna daarʼãa, a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃-bʋʋrbↄ ŋmɛɛ yi na a Jerujalɛm ɩ̃ cen a Átɩyↄsɩ.
44011028	A ƴen sʋbↄ a ba pʋↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Agabisi irʼã ɩraa, a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tↄw ʋ ƴↄ̃w ʋ yele áa cɛ na fɩ̃ɩ ɩ̃ a kↄ̃ kpɛ̃ɛ na lo na a ten a jaa pʋↄ. (A ta na a lɛdaar a Kilodi na ɩ a jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ.)
44011029	A par-tuurbe manʼã taa áa ba jaa na sũo na a yɛɛr na be a Jude tu nɩ a mɩnɛ ba na tʋↄrↄ.
44011030	Ba maalʼã a lɛ, ɩ̃ tʋ̃ a Banabasɩ nɩ a Sol a ba de a ala ba na cɩɛr cenʼɩ̃ na kʋ a duo-puor-ni-dierbe na be a Jude.
44012001	A ʋna daarʼãa, a jamana Ɛrↄdɩ nyↄw na ɩ̃ hʋↄlↄ a duo-puorbo ŋmɛɛ.
44012002	Ʋ ɩ na a ba kú a Jakɩ na ɩ a Jã yɛbɛ nɩ a bãjɩnɛ.
44012003	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na nyɛ bↄ̃w ka a nʋmↄ na a Jufisɩ, ʋ lɛ ƴↄ̃w na a ba nyↄw a Pɩɛr. A ɩ na a Bur-pʋↄr fɛtɩ daar.
44012004	A mɩnɛ ʋ na nyↄw ʋ, kasu pʋↄ ʋ ƴↄ̃w ʋ ɩ̃ ɩ a sↄdaalsɩ anaan jiir anaan a ba Ꞌwuoro ʋ jewre taa, a-na-ɩ a Ɛrↄdɩ dãa na bʋↄrↄ ʋ bar a Pakɩ fɛtɩ tↄl baar, ɩ̃ ʋ yuo a Pɩɛr guor a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw.
44012005	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ba gu na a Pɩɛr a kasu pʋↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a duo-puorbo sʋↄrↄ na a Naaŋmɩn nɩ kpɛ̃w ƴↄnↄ ʋ.
44012006	A tɩsↄw ʋlↄ na vɩɛrɛ a bio a Ɛrↄdɩ na guoro a Pɩɛr ƴɛrɩ̃, a Pɩɛr gã na gure a sↄdaalsɩ ayi sↄ̃w a kasu pʋↄ. Bↄ̃jↄrɩ̃sɩ ayi ba lũ nɩ ʋ, ɩ̃ a sↄdaalsɩ ŋmɛɛ mɩ be a kasu dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃ gu.
44012007	A jie naan, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sɩ-tʋnaa ɩraa na be a ʋ sɛ̃, ɩ̃ a kasu die caarɩ̃. A sɩ-tʋnaa tↄ na a Pɩɛr lõboorɩ̃ sɩ̃w ʋ ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Ir fↄfↄw!” A bↄ̃jↄrɩ̃sɩ Ꞌlorʼã a ʋ nurɩ̃ lo,
44012008	ɩ̃ a sɩ-tʋnaa yel ʋ: “Sɛ a fʋ sɩɛ gan, ɩ̃ su a fʋ nafaba,” ʋ maal a lɛ, a sɩ-tʋnaa lɛ yel ʋ: “Va a fʋ gãw ɩ̃ tuure ma.”
44012009	A Pɩɛr irʼã tuure a sɩ-tʋnaa, ɩ̃-cɛ Ꞌwaa tɩɛr bↄ̃w ka a ala a sɩ-tʋnaa na maal ɩ na sɩrɛ wa. Ʋ tɩɛrʼã beeka a sɩɛ bom ʋ nyɛ.
44012010	Ba ta na po a dↄ̃dↄr ʋlↄ a dãdãw sↄdaalsɩ na gu ɩ̃ lɛ tↄl po a nɩŋmɛɛ go, ɩ̃ pãa wɩ a dↄ̃dↄr ʋlↄ na be a yẽw na ɩ a kur pan. A pan ʋlↄ yuo na ʋ yẽ a ba yi, a sɩ-tʋnaa tↄw a Pɩɛr ta nɩ a sↄr cara pʋↄ, ɩ̃ bar ʋ a be ɩ̃ cen a jie naan.
44012011	A Pɩɛr tɩɛrʼã bↄ̃w a ala na ta ʋ ɩ̃ yel: “A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ɩ̃ sɩrɩ̃ na bↄ̃w ka a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃ tʋ̃ a ʋ sɩ-tʋnaa ʋ wa faa ma a Ɛrↄdɩ nuumɩ nɩ a ala a jaa ɩnɛ a Jufisɩ na dãa bʋↄrↄ ba maal ma.”
44012012	A mɩnɛ ʋ na tɩɛr bↄ̃w a par, ʋ cenʼã a Maarɩɩ ʋlↄ na ɩ a Jã Markɩ mã yir. A be, a nɩ-yaw duo na sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn.
44012013	A Pɩɛr ŋme na a yẽw pan, ɩ̃ a tʋ̃tʋ̃-poole na dɩ a Orodi cen a pan yuofʋ.
44012014	A lɛ ʋ na wõ a Pɩɛr kↄkɩr bↄ̃w, nʋ̃ↄ ƴala ʋ na ʋ bar a pan yuofʋ, ɩ̃ lɩɛb jↄ kpɛ a die pʋↄ na yel áa Pɩɛr ɩraa na be yẽw.
44012015	A ba yel ʋ: “Fʋ yaara na mɩ?” Ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ jaar ɩ̃ cãa yele á sɩrɛ jaa ʋ. A ba yel: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ lɛ ʋ, a ʋ sɩɛ ʋ.”
44012016	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Pɩɛr cãa na ɩraa ŋmeere a pan. Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na pãa yuo nyɛ ʋ, nʋↄr ko ba na.
44012017	Ʋ tur ba na a nuu a ba bar a gↄn, ɩ̃ ʋ man ba a mɩnɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na tↄw ʋ yi nɩ a kasu pʋↄ. Ɩ̃ ʋ mɩ yelʼã: “Nyɩ́ yel kʋ a Jakɩ nɩ a yɛɛr,” ɩ̃ na ʋ bar ba ɩ̃ yi cen ji-kpee.
44012018	A mɩnɛ a bio na vɩɛ, a sↄdaalsɩ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ nyɩrɩ̃ na dama ba, a ba sooro taa a ala na ta a Pɩɛr.
44012019	A Ɛrↄdɩ ƴↄ̃w na a bá bↄ ʋ faa, ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na soor a sↄdaalsɩ faa, ʋ ƴↄ̃w na á bá kú ba. A ala na yi tↄ, a pɩɛr yi na be a Jude ɩ̃ cen a Sejare na jɛ.
44012020	A Ɛrↄdɩ nyɩrɩ̃ na nyɛ suur ƴↄ̃w a Tɩɩr-tẽ-deme nɩ a Sɩdↄ̃-tẽw nɩbɛ, a ba man taa ɩ̃ cen a ʋ sɛ̃. Ba dↄrʼã a Bɩlasɩtɩ na ɩ a Ɛrↄdɩ yir tʋ̃tʋnↄ pↄw ʋ, ɩ̃ cen a jamana ɓaalɩ̃fʋ jie, a-na-ɩ a jamana tẽw a ba dɩb yire.
44012021	A bibir ʋlↄ a Ɛrↄdɩ na ƴↄ̃w ba ta na, ʋ su a ʋ jamana cẽcene jɛ nɩ a ʋ naa-dakↄw juu ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃,
44012022	a nɩbɛ hele yele: “ꞋWaa ƴɛrɛ wↄ̃ taa nɩ nɩrɛ wa, Naaŋmɩn kaarɩ̃ ʋ ƴɛrɛ!”
44012023	A mɩnɛ a Ɛrↄdɩ na de a Naaŋmɩn pɛwfʋ ƴↄ̃w a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ pʋↄ, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sɩ-tʋnaa ŋme ʋ na a jie naan, ɩ̃ a jãajule vʋr ʋ ʋ kpi.
44012024	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ yɛrɛ na pↄwrↄ cere.
44012025	A lɛ a Banabasɩ nɩ a Sol na tʋ̃ a ba tʋmↄ baar a Jerujalɛm, ba taw na a Jã ʋlↄ ba na mɩ bʋↄlↄ a Markɩ lãa cenʼɩ̃.
44013001	A Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃-bʋʋrbↄ nɩ a jãjaanba dãa na be a Átɩyↄsɩ duo-puorbo pʋↄ: a Banabasɩ nɩ a Sɩmẽw ba na mɩ bʋↄlↄ a Nɩsaa-salaa, nɩ a Lusiisi na yi a Sɩɩrɛn-tẽw, nɩ a Manahɛ̃ ba na lãa guolʼɩ̃ a jamana Ɛrↄdɩ, nɩ a Sol.
44013002	A bibir kãw, ba duo na taa a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ puorfʋ ɩ̃ lũ a nʋↄr, a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ ir a Banabasɩ nɩ a Sol biin ma kpee a tʋn ʋlↄ ɩnɛ ɩ̃ na bʋↄl ba.”
44013003	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na lũ a nʋↄr ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn, ba dↄↄl ba na a nur, ɩ̃ bar ba a ba cen.
44013004	A mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na tʋ̃ a Banabasɩ nɩ a Sol, ba cenʼã a Selesi na kpɛ a gbor a be cere a Sɩpɩr.
44013005	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na ta a Salamɩn, ba nyↄw na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a puorfʋ yie pʋↄ. A Jã Markɩ mɩ be na be sũono ba.
44013006	Ba cʋbↄ na a Sɩpɩr-tẽw tↄlↄ na ta a Pafↄsɩ. A be, ba tuorʼɩ̃ na tɩsↄw nɩrɛ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Bar-Jeeju na ɩ a Jufi nɩrɛ na yel á Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere ʋ ɩ.
44013007	Ʋ be na a Sɩpɩr tẽ-Ꞌwuoro sɛ̃ na dɩ a Sɛrsɩ Polisi na ɩ yɛ̃ sʋbↄ. A tẽ-Ꞌwuoro ʋlↄ bʋↄlʼã a Banabasɩ nɩ a Sol a-na-ɩ ʋ bʋↄrↄ na ʋ wõ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃,
44013008	ɩ̃-cɛ a tɩsↄw nɩrɛ ʋlↄ a Gɩrɛkɩ nɩbɛ na lɩɛb bʋↄlↄ a Elimasɩ bʋↄrↄ na ʋ var ba a sↄr ɩ̃ mɩ lɩɛb a tẽ-Ꞌwuoro tɩɛrʋ̃ ʋ kↄ̃ sↄw a puorfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa.
44013009	Ɩ̃ a Sol ba na mɩ bʋↄlↄ a Pol sɛw nɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ɩ̃ Ꞌwuor ʋ kir-kir-kir
44013010	ɩ̃ yel: “Fʋna Satã bie naa! A fʋ pʋↄ sɛw nɩ na a bɛlɩ̃fʋ nɩ a yel-faar, ɩ̃ fʋ Ꞌlaarʼã a yel-sono a jaa. Fʋ maa bar a fʋ jiri fʋ na bʋↄrↄ fʋ sãw nɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ tʋ̃-dẽdẽsɩ wa!
44013011	A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, cɛlɛ! A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na ŋme fʋ na a fʋ jↄ̃w, ma lↄↄ nyɛrɛ a mↄtↄ̃w cãa wa tara nɩ a daar kãw wa.” A jie naan, a Elimasɩ mimie dẽ na, ʋ nyɛ a wɩɛr wↄ̃ taa nɩ tɩsↄw, ʋ bẽbene yʋↄrↄ bʋↄrↄ nɩrɛ ʋ na nyↄw ʋ a nuu tawra cere nɩ.
44013012	A mɩnɛ a tẽ-Ꞌwuoro na nyɛ a lɛ, ʋ sↄw na de a Jeeju, ɩ̃ a nʋↄr ko ʋ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ na wõ ɩnɛ.
44013013	A Pol nɩ a ʋ lãa-yʋↄrbↄ kpɛ na a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ be a Pafↄsɩ gãw cen a Pɛrjɩ na be a Pãfɩlɩ wɩɛr, a Jã Markɩ bar ba a be ɩ̃ lɩɛb cen a Jerujalɛm.
44013014	Ɩ̃ a bala, ba yi na a Pɛrjɩ, ɩ̃ een na ta a Ãtɩyↄsɩ na be a Pisidi wɩɛr. A bibi-ciiraa ta na a ba kpɛ na jɛ a puorfʋ yir pʋↄ.
44013015	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na Ꞌwuor a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn sɛbɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-hierbe sɛbɛ baar, a puorfʋ yir ni-dierbe ɩ na a ba yel a Pol nʋmↄ: “Yɛɛr, a nyɩmɩ tɛrɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ sũono nɩ sɩ, nyɩ́ man sɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na.”
44013016	A Pol irʼã tur a nuu ɩ̃ yel ba: “Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ nɩ a nyɩmɩ na mɩ be a ka puoro a Naaŋmɩn, nyɩ cɛlɛ!
44013017	A sɩmɩ Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ Naaŋmɩn vɛlʼã ir a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ, ɩ̃ maal ba a ba paal a lɛdaar ba na cãa ɩ a sáanba a Ejibti-tẽw. Ɩ̃ a ʋ fãw ʋ maalʼɩ̃ ba a ba yi a be,
44013018	ɩ̃ ʋ bↄ̃w na tɛrɛ ba a wɛkar pʋↄ wa tara nɩ yomo lɩjaayi.
44013019	Ʋ wɛlʼã bal-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ anuu-nʼayi bar a Kanãa-tẽw ɩ̃ faa a ba wɩɛr kʋ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ a ba tɛrɛ.
44013020	A na ta na yomo kↄↄr anaan dↄↄl lɩjaayi nɩ pie. “A ala ɩ̃ baar, ʋ kʋ ba na a tↄtↄↄrbↄ wa ta nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere Samɩɛl daar.
44013021	A ala na yi tↄ, ba lɛ sʋↄrʼã a Naaŋmɩn a ʋ kʋ ba jamana, ʋ kʋ ba a Sayul na ɩ a Kɩsɩ bi-daba na ɩ a Bɛ̃jamɛ bal nɩrɛ, ʋ ɩ a jamana maal yomo lɩjaayi.
44013022	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na ir a Sayul bar, ʋ kʋ ba na a Davɩtɩ ʋ ɩ a ba jamana. A ʋlↄ ɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn dãa yel: ʻƖ̃ nyɛ na a Jɛsɩ bi-daba Davɩtɩ ʋ ɩ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ a ʋ ben na nʋmↄ ma. Ʋ na maalʼã a ala a jaa ɩ̃ na bʋↄrↄ ʋ maal.ʼ
44013023	A ʋlↄ Davɩtɩ bal par pʋↄ a Naaŋmɩn ir a Jeeju na ɩ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ Fafaara, tu nɩ a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa pʋlɩ̃.
44013024	A lɛ a Jeeju na ma wa sɛr wa, a Jã-Batii de na nĩe hiere yele a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ ba jaa á bá lɩɛb a ba yɛ̃ ɩ̃ a ba mʋr ba a kʋ̃ↄ.
44013025	A lɛ a Jã na pɩɛlɛ a kũu, ʋ yele na: ʻMaa ɩ a ʋlↄ nyɩ na tɩɛrɛ a ɩ̃ ɩ na wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ, ʋ cãa na be a ɩ̃ puo-sↄw waara, ɩ̃ a maa, maa sɛw nɩ a ʋ nafaba sɩɩrfʋ wa.ʼ
44013026	“Ɩ̃ yɛɛr Abʋraham bibiir, nɩ a nyɩmɩ na be a ka puoro a Naaŋmɩn, sɩmɩ ba tʋ̃ nɩ a faafʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ na kʋ.
44013027	A-na-ɩ a Jerujalɛm nɩbɛ nɩ a ba ni-dierbe ma dãa bↄ̃w a ʋlↄ a Jeeju na ɩ wa, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na ƴↄ̃w ʋ a ƴɛrɩ̃, ba maalʼã a ƴɛr-hierbe ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala ba na ma Ꞌwuoro a bibi-ciirsɩ a jaa.
44013028	A mɩnɛ ba na ma saarɩ̃ nyɛ sãwfʋ a ʋ jie na ƴↄnↄ ʋ a kũu pʋↄ wa, ba sʋↄrʼã a Pɩlatɩ ʋ ƴↄ̃w a ba kú ʋ.
44013029	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na maal a ala a jaa na sɛb a sɛbɛ pʋↄ a ʋ ɩnɛ baar, ba yaw ʋ na a nɩ-kʋ daa juu suu nɩ na ũu.
44013030	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn ir ʋ na a kũu pʋↄ.
44013031	Ɩ̃ a bibi-yaw sↄ̃w ʋ nyɩrʼã a bala na dãa yi nɩ ʋ a Galile ɩ̃ cen a Jerujalɛm, ɩ̃ mɩ ɩ a ʋ yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛr-manba a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ jie a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na.
44013032	A sɩmɩ, sɩ ƴɛrɛ na a ƴɛr-son kʋrↄ nyɩ, áa ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na dãa pʋlɩ̃ nɩ a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ,
44013033	á ʋ maalʼã baar a sɩmɩ na ɩ a ba bibiir jie, a lɛ ʋ na ir a Jeeju a kũu pʋↄ. A mɩnɛ a na sɛb a Pɛwfʋ sɛbɛ bõ-kpɛ̃ɛ ayi pʋↄ: ʻFʋ ɩ na a ɩ̃ bi-daba. Wa nyↄw nɩ a dɩnaa ɩ̃ lɩɛbʼã ɩ a fʋ Sãa.ʼ
44013034	A Naaŋmɩn dãa na yel a ʋ na ir ʋ na a kũu pʋↄ, ʋ kↄ̃ↄ lɛ lɩɛb kpɛ a kũu pʋↄ sãw wa. A-na-ɩ ʋ yelʼã: ʻƖ̃ nↄↄ sɩrɩ̃ na kʋ nyɩ a ɩ̃ yel-sono ala ɩ̃ na dãa pʋlɩ̃ nɩ a Davɩtɩ.ʼ
44013035	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Davɩtɩ yel a ji-kpee: ʻFaa bara a fʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃-son ʋ kpɛɛrɛ a sãwfʋ pʋↄ wa.ʼ
44013036	A-na-ɩ a lɛ a Davɩtɩ na cãa be ka a tẽw pʋↄ, ʋ maalʼã a ala a Naaŋmɩn na dãa ƴↄ̃w nyãa ʋ maal ɩ̃ pãa kpi, a ba ũu ʋ a ʋ sãa nʋmↄ jie, a ʋ ɩ̃gan pʋ̃ↄ.
44013037	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na ir a kũu pʋↄ, Ꞌwaa kpɛ a sãwfʋ pʋↄ wa.
44013038	-
44013039	“Yɛɛr, a sɛw na nyɩ bↄ̃w ka a Jeeju yuor sɩ de ƴɛrɛ nɩ kʋrↄ nyɩ áa Naaŋmɩn na tʋↄ na de a nyɩ maal-faar bar kʋ nyɩ. A nɩrɛ lɛ na sↄw de a Naaŋmɩn, ʋ na ir ʋ na a ʋ maal-faar a jaa pʋↄ bar, a ala a jaa pʋↄ a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn na ma dãa tʋↄrↄ ire ʋ wa.
44013040	Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a mɩnɛ a ala a ƴɛr-hierbe na dãa ƴɛr a kↄ̃ wa ta nyɩ wa.
44013041	A-na-ɩ ba yelʼã: ʻA nyɩmɩ na kpɛrɛ a nɩbɛ, nyɩ́ cɛlɛ! Nʋↄr na ko nyɩ na a nyɩ bↄr, a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ na tʋ̃ na tʋmↄ a nyɩ daarʼã pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a ala ɩ̃ saarɩ̃ ɩ a nɩrɛ man nyɩ na, nyɩ kↄ̃ sↄw wa.ʼ ”
44013042	A mɩnɛ a Pol nɩ a Banabasɩ na yire a puorfʋ yir, ba sʋↄr ba na a ba lɛ wa a bibi-ciiraa dayen go na ƴɛr a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋ ba.
44013043	A lɛ a nɩbɛ na wɛl baar, a Jufisɩ yaw jie nɩ a bala na kpɛ a Jufisɩ puorfʋ pʋↄ tuure na a Pol nɩ a Banabasɩ, a ba ƴɛrɛ nɩ ba sũono ba a ba bↄ̃w ɩraa cĩcĩ a Naaŋmɩn maal-vɩlaa pʋↄ.
44013044	A bibi-ciiraa ʋlↄ na tu, a tẽw nɩbɛ yaw jie duo na cɛlɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju ƴɛrɩ̃.
44013045	A mɩnɛ a Jufisɩ na nyɛ a nɩ-yaw bala, nyuur nyɩrɩ̃ na nyↄw ba a ba cɩɩrɛ a ala a Pol na ƴɛrɛ, tʋrↄ nɩ ʋ.
44013046	A Pol nɩ a Banabasɩ barʼã nyãa ɩ̃ yel ba: “A dãa na sɛw sɩ de nĩe ƴɛr a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋ a nyɩmɩ Jufisɩ baar, ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ nyɩ na jaar, a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ nyɩ ƴↄ̃w a ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ ma sɛw nɩ a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw wa. A na be a lɛ, sɩ na lɩɛbʼã cen a nɩ-bʋlsɩ jie a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na.
44013047	A-na-ɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel sɩ na: ʻƖ̃ biin fʋ na a fʋ na ɩ cãa a nɩ-bʋlsɩ jie, a fʋ na de a faafʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ cen na ta nɩ a ten nɩbɛ ba jaa jie.ʼ ”
44013048	A mɩnɛ a bala na ma ɩ a Jufisɩ wa na wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃, ba cɩlɛ na yele nɩ áa Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ na bõ-son. A lɛ, a bala a Naaŋmɩn na vɛl ir a ba na tɛrɛ a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw sↄw na de a Jeeju.
44013049	A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ yɛrʼã pↄw a ʋna wɩɛr ʋ jaa.
44013050	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jufisɩ damʼã a pↄↄ-naabsɩ bala na puoro, nɩ a tẽw nɩ-bɛrɛ ƴↄ̃w a ba hʋↄl a Pol nɩ a Banabasɩ ɩ̃ diw ba bar a ba yi a ba wɩɛr pʋↄ.
44013051	A lɛ, a nɩbɛ ayi bala tɛbʼã a ba gbɛɛ tãbuulĩ ƴↄ̃w ba, ɩ̃ cen a Ɩkↄnɩyↄ̃.
44013052	A par-tuurbe bala na be a Ãtɩyↄsɩ sɛw nɩ na a nʋ̃ↄ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.
44014001	A be a Ɩkↄnɩyↄ̃, a lɛ a Pol nɩ a Banabasɩ mɩ kpɛ a Jufisɩ puorfʋ yir, ɩ̃ ƴɛr a ƴɛrɩ̃ a maal a nɩ-yaw, a Jufisɩ nɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ, a ba sↄw de a Jeeju.
44014002	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jufisɩ bala na jaar tↄrↄ na a nɩ-bʋlsɩ ƴↄnↄ a yɛɛr, maalʼɩ̃ ba a ba tɩɛrɛ a tɩɛrɩ̃-faar ƴↄnↄ ba.
44014003	A Pol nɩ a Banabasɩ jɛ na a be a Ɩkↄnɩyↄ̃ kam, ɩ̃ bar nyãa ƴɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩnɛ. A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ miilʼã a ʋ wɩɛfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ ba na ƴɛrɛ a ɩ sɩrɛ, a mɩnɛ ʋ na kʋ ba a fãw a ba maala nɩ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ na miile a ʋ kpɛ̃w.
44014004	A tẽw ʋlↄ nɩbɛ ŋma na ayi. A ŋmɛɛ sↄw na a Jufisɩ ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ a ŋmɛɛ sↄw a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ ƴɛrɩ̃.
44014005	A Jufisɩ nɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ nɩ a ba nɩ-bɛrɛ jaa bʋↄrↄ na ba maal a Pol nɩ a Banabasɩ fãa a ba lↄbʼɩ̃ ba a kubie kú.
44014006	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Pol nɩ a Banabasɩ bↄ̃wnaa na ɩ̃ jↄ cen a Lɩsɩtɩ nɩ a Dɛrbɩ na be a Lɩkawnɩ wɩɛr, wa cen na ta nɩ a ana ten na tiw kolĩ ba.
44014007	Be ba nyↄw ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son.
44014008	Daba be na be a Lɩsɩtɩ ma jɛ a-na-ɩ ʋ gbɛrʼã. Wa nyↄw nɩ a ʋ bibile daar ʋ maa tʋↄ cen fɩ̃ɩ wa.
44014009	Ʋ cɛlɛ na a ala a Pol na ƴɛrɛ, a Pol Ꞌwuor ʋ kir-kir-kir ɩ̃ nyɛ ʋ ʋ tɛrɛ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa sɛw na kpɛmɛ.
44014010	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ yel a daba nɩ kpɛ̃w: “Ir ɩraa dẽdẽ!” ʋ ka ir cere.
44014011	A lɛ a nɩbɛ na nyɛ a ala a Pol na maal, ba wuure na nɩ a Lɩkawnɩ-tẽw ƴɛrɩ̃ yele nɩ: “A naaŋmɩnsɩ lɩɛbʼã wↄ̃ a nɩbɛ kaarɩ̃ suu a sɩ sɛ̃!”
44014012	Ba de na a Jesi na ɩ a ba naaŋmɩn kãw yuor bʋↄlↄ nɩ a Banabasɩ, ɩ̃ mɩ de a ba naaŋmɩn Ɛrmɛsɩ yuor bʋↄlↄ nɩ a Pol, a-na-ɩ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a ƴɛƴɛrɛ.
44014013	A Jesi ʋlↄ puorfʋ yir be na a tẽw nʋↄr, ɩ̃ a ʋ baar-loro de na a nadɛɛ ba na yarɩ̃ a tɩ-pube, wɩ nɩ be a dↄ̃dↄr nʋↄr, bʋↄrↄ a ʋlↄ nɩ a tẽw nɩbɛ ba lo a baar kʋ a Banabasɩ nɩ a Pol.
44014014	Ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛ a Banabasɩ nɩ a Pol na wonaa, ba ɓerʼã a ba cẽcene ɩ̃ jↄ kpɛ a nɩbɛ sↄ̃w ɩ̃ wuure
44014015	yele nɩ: “Sɩ badɛɛ, bõ ɩnɛ nyɩ maala a lɛ? A nɩbɛ sɩ mɩ ɩ a nyɩ kaarɩ̃. Sɩ wa nɩ na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son kʋrↄ nyɩ yele nɩ nyɩ á nyɩ bar a ana yel-pↄrsɩ ɩ̃ lɩɛb puoro a Naaŋmɩn-mimir ʋlↄ na maal a saꞋlon nɩ a tene nɩ a man kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a yele a jaa na be a ba pʋↄ.
44014016	A korĩ-cɛ ʋ dãa na bar a nɩbɛ ba jaa a ba tuure a ba mɩ̃ɛ sↄɛ,
44014017	ɩ̃-cɛ a daar a jaa ʋ ma maala na a ʋ tʋ̃-vɛlɛ miile nɩ a nɩbɛ a mɩnɛ ʋ na wↄ̃. Ʋ ma barʼã a saa ʋ yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ wa a sɩ ɩnɛ, a tẽw ƴↄ a sɩ pↄw a yele. Ʋ ma kʋ sɩ na a bõ-dɩraa nɩ a nʋ̃ↄ a ƴala sɩ.”
44014018	A Pol nɩ a Banabasɩ na saarɩ̃ ƴɛr a lɛ ɩ̃-cɛ a cãa na kpɛmɛ ɩ̃ a ba pãa tʋↄ pɩɛrɩ̃ a nɩbɛ bar a baa lo a baar kʋ ba wa.
44014019	A Jufisɩ yi na a Átɩyↄsɩ na be a Pisidi wɩɛr nɩ a Ɩkↄnɩyↄ̃ ɩ̃ wa na lɩɛb a nɩbɛ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ a ba lↄbↄ a Pol nɩ a kʋsɩɛ bʋↄrↄ ba kú ʋ. Ɩ̃ ba vu ʋ na yi nɩ a tẽw cɛ̃cɛ̃w na bar, a-na-ɩ ba tɩɛrʼã beeka ʋ kpi na.
44014020	Ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛ a popuorbo na tiw kolĩ ʋ, ʋ irʼã lɛ kpɛ a tẽw pʋↄ ɩ̃ a lɛ a bio na vɩɛ, a ʋlↄ nɩ a Banabasɩ yi na cere a Dɛrbɩ-tẽw.
44014021	A Pol nɩ a Banabasɩ ƴɛrʼã a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son a Dɛrbɩ-tẽw maalʼɩ̃ a nɩ-yaw a ba lɩɛb ɩ a Jeeju par-tuurbe. A ala ɩ̃ baar, ba lɛ lɩɛbʼã cen a Lɩsɩtɩ nɩ a Ɩkↄnɩyↄ̃ nɩ a Átɩyↄsɩ.
44014022	Ba maalʼã a popuorbo a ba nyɩrɛ cere nii-sↄw yele nɩ ba á ba bↄ̃w ɩraa a puorfʋ sↄr pʋↄ. Ba lɛ yel ba na áa sɛw na a sɩ na nyɛ won yaw ɩ̃ pãa kpɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ.
44014023	A jiir a jaa, ba vɛlʼã ir ni-dierbe a duo-puorbo sↄ̃w biin a ba ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na lũ a nʋↄr ɩ̃ sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn baar, ba de ba na ƴↄ̃w a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ ba na sↄw de nuumɩ.
44014024	A Pol nɩ a Banabasɩ lɛ tↄlʼã yi a Pisidi wɩɛr ɩ̃ ta a Pãfɩlɩ.
44014025	Ba ƴɛrʼã a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ a Pɛrjɩ-tẽw ɩ̃ cen a Atalɩ.
44014026	A be, gbor ba kpɛ cen a Átɩyↄsɩ na ɩ a tẽw ʋlↄ a duo-puorbo na dãa de ba ƴↄ̃w a Naaŋmɩn nuumɩ ʋ sũo ba a tʋn ʋlↄ pʋↄ ba na maal baar a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃.
44014027	A lɛ ba na ta a Átɩyↄsɩ, ba bʋↄlʼã a duo-puorbo tiw ɩ̃ man ba a ala a jaa a Naaŋmɩn na de ba maalʼɩ̃, nɩ a mɩnɛ ʋ na yuo a sↄr kʋ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ a ba na mɩ tʋↄ sↄw de a Jeeju.
44014028	Ba jɛ na be kam a popuorbo sɛ̃.
44015001	A nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ yi na a Jude ɩ̃ wɩ a Átɩyↄsɩ na jaana a yɛɛr a ƴɛrɩ̃ na yele nɩ: “A Naaŋmɩn ma faara nyɩ wa, a ala ma ɩ nyɩ ɩ na a ba ŋma a nyɩ yↄɛ a mɩnɛ a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn na yel wa.”
44015002	Ɩ̃ a Pol nɩ a Banabasɩ ma sↄw fɩ̃ɩ wa, a ba faa taa nɩ kpɛ̃w a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩnɛ. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a yɛɛr mɩɩnʼã taa ɩ̃ yel áa Pol nɩ a Banabasɩ nɩ a Átɩyↄsɩ nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ ba cen a Jerujalɛm na man taa nɩ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ nɩ a duo-pↄuor-ni-dierbe a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ je kãa.
44015003	Ɩ̃ a duo-puorbo tↄw ba na ƴↄ̃w a sↄrɩ̃, a ba cen yi a Fenisi nɩ a Samari tẽw pʋↄ, na ba mɩɩnɛ a mɩnɛ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ na lɩɛb ɩ a Naaŋmɩn nɩbɛ. Á ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ naa kʋ na a yɛɛr ba jaa nʋ̃ↄ kpɛ̃ɛ.
44015004	A lɛ ba na ta a Jerujalɛm, a duo-puorbo nɩ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ, nɩ a ni-dierbe de ba na, ɩ̃ a bala na yi a Átɩyↄsɩ man ba na a ala a jaa a Naaŋmɩn na de ba maalʼɩ̃.
44015005	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ na ɩ a popuorbo irʼã ɩ̃ yel: “A sɛw na a ba na mɩ ŋma a nɩ-bʋlsɩ a yↄɛ, ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w ba a ba jↄrↄ a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn.”
44015006	A nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ nɩ a duo-puor-ni-dierbe duo na taa mana taa a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃.
44015007	A lɛ ba na man taa kam, a Pɩɛr irʼã ɩ̃ yel: “Yɛɛr! Nyɩ bↄ̃w na bↄ̃w ka a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ vɛl ma ir a nyɩ sↄ̃w a korĩ-cɛ, ɩ̃ na ƴɛrɛ a ʋ ƴɛr-son kʋrↄ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ, a ba na wonaa ɩ̃ sↄw de.
44015008	A Naaŋmɩn na bↄ̃w a nɩbɛ sube, ʋ miilʼã a mɩnɛ ʋ na sↄw de ba, a-na-ɩ ʋ kʋ ba na a ʋ Sɩɛ a mɩnɛ ʋ na mɩ dãa kʋ sɩ.
44015009	ꞋWaa maal bom kpee a ba jie nɩ a sɩ jie wa, a-na-ɩ ʋ maalʼã a ba sube a ɩ cɛcɛ a ba ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ba na tɛrɛ nɩ ʋ ɩnɛ.
44015010	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na a nyɩ bɩɩrɛ a Naaŋmɩn bʋↄrↄ nyɩ tuo a popuorbo a tuor ʋlↄ a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ nɩ a sɩmɩ mɩ̃ɛ na ma tʋↄ tuo wa?
44015011	Sɩ ɛ̃ɛ na tɩɛr bↄ̃w ka a ɩ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi wɩɛfʋ ɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn faa sɩ, a mɩnɛ ʋ na mɩ faa ba.”
44015012	A nɩbɛ ba jaa na duo taa, ba sine na ɩ̃ cɛlɛ a Banabasɩ nɩ a Pol na mana a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na de ba maalʼɩ̃ a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ na miile a ʋ kpɛ̃w a nɩ-bʋlsɩ sↄ̃w.
44015013	A lɛ ba na ƴɛr baar, a Jakɩ yelʼã: “Yɛɛr! Nyɩ́ cɛlɛ.
44015014	A Sɩmↄ̃ manʼã a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na tɩɛrʼɩ̃ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ a korĩ-cɛ, bʋↄrↄ ʋ vɛl ir a nɩbɛ a ba pʋↄ, a ba ɩ a ʋ ben.
44015015	A ƴɛr-hierbe ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ mɩ ɩ na bõ-ƴen nɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃ na. A-na-ɩ a yelʼã a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ:
44015016	ʻA Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yelʼã: A ala ɩ̃ baar, ɩ̃ nↄↄ wa na na mɛ a Davɩtɩ yir ʋlↄ na dãa lo. Ɩ̃ na lɛ mɛ na a ʋ dacine ala na wɛl, ɩ̃ lɛ gbɛɛrɩ̃ a ir ɩraa,
44015017	maalʼɩ̃ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ ba jaa a ba na bʋↄrↄ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, lãa nɩ a ten nɩbɛ ba jaa ɩ̃ na bʋↄl a ba na ɩ a ɩ̃ ben.
44015018	Lɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel, a ʋlↄ na miilʼɩ̃ a nɩbɛ a ana yele a korĩ-cɛ jaa a ba bↄ̃w.ʼ ”
44015019	A Jakɩ lɛ yelʼã: “Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ tɩɛrʼã bↄ̃w ka aa sɛw a sɩ na ƴↄ̃w a nɩ-bʋlsɩ bala na lɩɛb ɩ a Naaŋmɩn nɩbɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala na kpɛmɛ wa.
44015020	Ɩ̃-cɛ, sɩ́ maal a sɛbɛ tɩɩr kʋ ba, ɩ̃ yel ba, á ba taa wa dɩrɛ a tɩɩb bom wa, ɩ̃ bá tɛrɛ a ba mɩ̃ɛ a pebfʋ ɩnɛ, a ba taa wa mɩ Ꞌwↄbↄ a dʋ̃ↄ ʋlↄ ba na cɩm kú wa, a ba taa wa mɩ Ꞌwↄbↄ jɩ̃ɩ wa.
44015021	A-na-ɩ wa nyↄw nɩ a tẽkorĩ, ba ma ƴɛrɛ na a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn a ten a jaa pʋↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ Ꞌwuoro a ʋ sɛbɛ a puorfʋ yie pʋↄ, a bibi-ciirsɩ a
44015022	A be jie, a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ nɩ a duo-puor-ni-dierbe nɩ a duo-puorbo ba jaa ɩ na nↄ-bõ-ƴen a ba vɛl ir nɩbɛ a ba pʋↄ, tʋ̃ ba a ba lãa cenʼɩ̃ a Pol nɩ a Banabasɩ a Ãtɩyↄsɩ. Ba vɛlʼã ir a Judi ba na mɩ bʋↄlↄ a Basabasɩ, nɩ a Sɩlasɩ, na ɩ a ni-dierbe a yɛɛr jie.
44015023	Ba ƴↄ̃w ba na a ba de a sɛbɛ na cenʼɩ̃: “A sɩmɩ nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ nɩ a duo-puor-ni-dierbe na ɩ a nyɩ yɛɛr, sɩ puorʼã a nyɩmɩ nɩ-bʋlsɩ na ɩ a sɩ yɛɛr, na be a Ãtɩyↄsɩ nɩ a Sɩrɩ nɩ a Sɩlɩsɩ ten pʋↄ.
44015024	Sɩ wõ na a ba yel a nɩbɛ yi na a sɩ jie ɩ̃ wɩ dama nyɩ nɩ a ba ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, bʋↄrↄ ba sãw a nyɩ jur, ɩ̃ saa kʋ ba sↄr a be jie wa.
44015025	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, sɩ manʼã taa nↄ-bõ-ƴen, ɩ̃ ir a nɩbɛ tʋ̃ a nyɩ jie á ba bɩɛl a sɩ badɛɛ Banabasɩ nɩ a Pol
44015026	na ɩ a nɩbɛ bala na sↄw a kũu a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi ɩnɛ.
44015027	Sɩ tʋ̃ na a Judi nɩ a Sɩlasɩ, a ba ƴɛrʼɩ̃ a ba nↄɛ kʋ nyɩ, a ala sɩ na sɛb a ka.
44015028	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nɩ a sɩmɩ mɩ̃ɛ nyɛ na bↄ̃w ka aa sɛw a sɩ na tuo nyɩ a tuor kãw dↄↄl a yele ala na vɩɛlɛ juu wa.
44015029	A ɩ na: nyɩ taa dɩrɛ a tɩɩb bom wa. Nyɩ taa mɩ Ꞌwↄbↄ a jɩ̃ɩ, mɩɩ a dʋ̃ↄ ʋlↄ ba na cɩm kú wa. Nyɩ taa mɩ pebe taa wa. A nyɩmɩ tɛrɛ a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a ala ɩnɛ, a na ɩ na vɩlaa a nyɩ jie. Naaŋmɩn ú be nɩ nyɩ.”
44015030	A duo-puorbo barʼã a nɩbɛ bala ba na ir tʋ̃ a ba cen a Ãtɩyↄsɩ na kpaarɩ̃ a popuorbo ba jaa, ɩ̃ de a sɛbɛ kʋ ba.
44015031	A lɛ ba na Ꞌwuor baar, ba jaa cɩlɛ na, a-na-ɩ ba barʼã tɩɛrʋ̃ a ala ba na wõ ɩnɛ.
44015032	A Judi nɩ a Sɩlasɩ tↄr jaa na mɩ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃-bʋʋrbↄ, ƴɛrʼã a ƴɛrɩ̃ kamʼɩ̃ kʋrↄ nɩ a yɛɛr a Ꞌlafʋ a ba na nyɩrɛ cere nii-sↄw.
44015033	Ba jɛ na be fɩ̃ɩ ɩ̃ a yɛɛr kʋ ba a sↄr nɩ su-ɓaar a ba lɩɛb kul a bala na tʋ̃ ba jie. [
44015034	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Sɩlasɩ ʋlↄ jɛ na a be.]
44015035	A Pol nɩ a Banabasɩ mɩ jɛ na a be a Ãtɩyↄsɩ, a bala nɩ a nɩ-yaw ɓã taa jaana a nɩbɛ ƴɛrɛ nɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴɛr-son.
44015036	A kamʼã fɩɩ, ɩ̃ a Pol yel a Banabasɩ: “Ɩ a sɩ lɩɛb cen a ten ala a jaa sɩ na dãa ƴɛr a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ naa Ꞌwuor a yɛɛr je kãa, bↄ̃w a mɩnɛ ba na be.”
44015037	A Banabasɩ dãa na bʋↄrↄ ʋ mɩ tɛrɛ a Jã ʋlↄ na dɩ a Markɩ a ba lãa cen.
44015038	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Pol nyɛ na a aa sɛw a ba na tɛrɛ ʋ wa, a-na-ɩ ʋ dãa na ŋmaa yi a ba pʋↄ a Pãfɩlɩ-tẽw ɩ̃ maa lɛ cãa pↄw ba cenʼɩ̃ a ba tʋmↄ jie wa.
44015039	Ba faa na taa ŋma kpee kpee, a Banabasɩ tɛrɛ a Markɩ a ba kpɛ a gbor cere a Sɩpɩr.
44015040	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Pol vɛlʼã ir a Sɩlasɩ, ɩ̃ a yɛɛr de ba ƴↄ̃w a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nuumɩ a ʋ maal-vɩlaa na be nɩ ba, a ba cen.
44015041	Ã Pol tↄlʼã yi a Sɩrɩ, nɩ a Sɩlɩsɩ sũo a duo-puorbo a ba na nyɩrɛ cere a nii-sↄw.
44016001	A Pol ta na a Dɛrbɩ nɩ a Lɩsɩtɩ. A be popuoro kãw dãa na be be ba na bʋↄlↄ Timote. A ʋ mã ɩ na Jufi ɩ̃ puoro a Jeeju-Kirisi, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋ sãa ɩ na Gɩrɛkɩ nɩrɛ.
44016002	A yɛɛr na be a Lɩsɩtɩ nɩ a Ɩkↄnɩyↄ̃ bʋↄlↄ ʋ na yo-vɩlaa.
44016003	A Pol bʋↄrↄ na ʋ tɛrɛ ʋ, ʋ ɩ a ʋ lãa-yʋↄrↄ, ɩ̃ de ʋ ŋmaa a yʋↄr a Jufisɩ ɩnɛ na be a be a ana ten naa pʋↄ, a-na-ɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa bↄ̃w na áa ʋ sãa ɩ na Gɩrɛkɩ nɩrɛ.
44016004	A ten ala ba na tↄlↄ yire, ba miile na a popuorbo a ala a Jerujalɛm nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ nɩ a duo-puor-ni-dierbe na guor taa, yele nɩ ba a ba jↄrↄ a ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ.
44016005	A lɛ, a duo-puorbo pↄwrↄ na a fãgã a ba ƴↄ̃w-nyãa pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a nɩbɛ waara dↄↄlↄ a bibie a jaa.
44016006	A Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ mↄ̃w na a Pol nɩ a Sɩlasɩ nɩ a Timote a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ ƴɛrfʋ bar a Ajɩ-tẽw pʋↄ, a ba tↄl yi a Fɩrɩjɩ nɩ a Galatɩ wɩɛr.
44016007	Ã lɛ ba na ta pɩɛl a Mɩsɩ ba dãa na bʋↄrↄ ba cen a Bitini, ɩ̃-cɛ a Jeeju Sɩɛ ma kʋ ba sↄr wa.
44016008	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ba tↄl yi a Mɩsɩ, ɩ̃ cen a Torowasɩ na be a man nʋↄr.
44016009	A tɩsↄw, a Pol nyɛ na sɩɛ bom. Ʋ nyɛ na a Masɛdↄn nɩrɛ ʋ ɩraa ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ ʋ yele nɩ: “Gãw wa ka a Masɛdↄn na sũo sɩ bɩlɛ!”
44016010	A lɛ a Pol na nyɛ a ʋna sɩɛ bom baar, sɩ tↄↄ na bʋↄrↄ a Masɛdↄn cenfʋ, a-na-ɩ sɩ bↄ̃w ka a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ bʋↄl sɩ a sɩ na cen na ƴɛr a ʋ ƴɛr-son kʋ a ʋna tẽw naa nɩbɛ.
44016011	A Torowasɩ sɩ kpɛ a gbor naa sɩ cen dẽdẽ na ta a Samotɩrasɩ-tẽw, ɩ̃ a bio na vɩɛ sɩ ta na a Neyapoli.
44016012	A be sɩ yi ɩ̃ kpɛ a Masɛdↄn dãdãw wɩɛr ta a Fɩlɩpɩ-tẽw ʋlↄ a Orom nɩbɛ na sↄ, na sɩ jɛ a be maal bibie fɩ̃ɩ.
44016013	A bibi-ciiraa dayen sɩ yi na a tẽw pʋↄ ɩ̃ cen a kʋlaa nʋↄr, a jie ʋlↄ sɩ na tɩɛr bↄ̃w ka puorfʋ jie be na, na sɩ jɛ ƴɛrɛ nɩ a pↄↄbↄ na tiw taa a be.
44016014	Ɩ̃ a pↄↄbↄ bala ƴen sʋbↄ dɩ na Lɩdɩ na yi a Tɩyatɩɩr, ɩ̃ ƴaba cẽcẽ-ɓↄmↄ, ɩ̃ puoro a Naaŋmɩn. Ʋ cɛlɛ na a sɩ ƴɛrɩ̃, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yuo a ʋ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ, ʋ sↄw de a ala a Pol na yele.
44016015	A lɛ ba na mʋr ʋ a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ, lãa nɩ a ʋ yir deme baar, ʋ sʋↄr sɩ na a sɩmɩ nyɛ bↄ̃w ka ʋ ɩ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ben sɩrɛ jaa, a sɩ wa jɛ a ʋ yir. Ɩ̃ na ʋ fɛr sɩ a sɩ sↄw.
44016016	A bibir kãw sɩ cere na a puorfʋ jie, na sɩ tuorʼɩ̃ gbãgba-poole a kↄ̃tↄn na tɛrɛ ma maala ʋ ʋ ƴɛrɛ a ala na be a nii-sↄw waara, pↄwrↄ a libi-yaw kʋrↄ a ʋ nɩ-bɛrɛ,
44016017	ʋ ma tↄↄ tuure sɩ a sɩmɩ nɩ a Pol, ɩ̃ wuure yele: “A nɩbɛ na ɩ na a saa juu Naaŋmɩn tʋ̃tʋnbↄ. A faafʋ sↄr ba miile nyɩ.”
44016018	Á bibie waa na ʋ na maala a lɛ, a wa pãa nyaw a Pol, ʋ lɩɛb yel a kↄ̃tↄn: “Á Jeeju-Kirisi yuor ɩ̃ de ƴɛrɛ nɩ fʋ! Yi ɩ̃ cɛ a poole na!” A kↄ̃tↄn tↄↄ yi ɩ̃ cɛ a poole a jie naan.
44016019	Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ a poole nɩ-bɛrɛ na nyɛ bↄ̃w ka baa lɛ tʋↄrↄ pↄwrↄ a libie a ʋ jie wa, ba nyↄw na a Pol nɩ a Sɩlasɩ taw cenʼɩ̃ a jie a tẽw nɩbɛ na ma kpaara taa a fãgã deme nii-sↄw,
44016020	na ba miilʼɩ̃ a ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ ɩ̃ yel: “A nɩbɛ na, Jufisɩ ba ɩ, ɩ̃ dama sɩ a tẽw.
44016021	Ba jaana na a nɩbɛ a ala a sɩmɩ Orom nɩbɛ na ciire, a ala sɩ na ma tʋↄrↄ sↄwrↄ mɩ maala wa.”
44016022	A nɩbɛ mɩ lɩɛbʼã nyɛ nɩ ba a suur, ɩ̃ a fãgã deme yaa a Pol nɩ a Sɩlasɩ cẽcene ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w a ba fↄb ba nɩ a kpaarsɩ.
44016023	A mɩnɛ ba na fↄb ba sɛw, ba nyↄw ba na ƴↄ̃w a kasu pʋↄ, ɩ̃ yel a kasu-gure, a ʋ bↄ̃w Ꞌwuoro ba.
44016024	A lɛ a kasu-gure na wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃, ʋ nyↄw na a Pol nɩ a Sɩlasɩ ƴↄ̃w a kasu di-baaraa pʋↄ, ɩ̃ de a ba gbɛɛ carɩ̃ a daa pʋↄ ɩ̃ lũ.
44016025	A tɩsↄw porɩ̃, a Pol nɩ a Sɩlasɩ sʋↄrↄ na a Naaŋmɩn, cɩɛrɛ nɩ a yele pɛwrɛ nɩ ʋ, a kasu nɩbɛ cɛlɛ.
44016026	A jie naan, a tẽw damʼã nɩ kpɛ̃w, a kasu yir dam de nɩ a dacin-kparaa, ɩ̃ a pana a jaa tↄↄ yuo a jie naan, a kasu deme bↄ̃jↄrɩ̃sɩ Ꞌlor a jaa lo.
44016027	A kasu-gure jaw ir, ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na nyɛ a kasu pana a yuo, ʋ vʋ̃ↄ na a ʋ bãjɩnɛ bʋↄrↄ ʋ kú nɩ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ, a-na-ɩ ʋ beeka a kasu deme jↄ na.
44016028	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Pol wuurʼã nɩ kpɛ̃w yel: “Taa maal a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ bier wa! Sɩ be na ka sɩ jaa.”
44016029	A kasu-gure sʋↄrʼã a lãpa, pↄw kpɛ nɩ a kasu diem, ɩ̃ na ʋ lo gburĩ dume mine nɩ a Pol nɩ a Sɩlasɩ gbɛɛ pulẽe.
44016030	Ʋ taw ba na yi nɩ ɩ̃ soor ba: “Ɩ̃ nɩ-bɛrɛ! Bõ ɩ̃ na maal ɩ̃ nyɛ a faafʋ?”
44016031	A ba yel ʋ: “Sↄw de a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn na faa fʋ na, a fʋ̃ʋ nɩ a fʋ yir deme.”
44016032	Ɩ̃ ba ƴɛrʼã a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋ a ʋlↄ nɩ a ʋ yir deme ba jaa.
44016033	A kasu-gure de ba na a ʋna tɩsↄw naa na ʋ pɛw ba a natɩɛ, ɩ̃ ɩ a ba tↄↄ mʋr ʋ a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ nɩ a ʋ yir deme ba jaa.
44016034	Ʋ tɛrɛ na a Pol nɩ a Sɩlasɩ kpɛ nɩ a ʋ yir, kʋ ba bõ-dɩraa, ɩ̃ a nʋ̃ↄ ƴala a ʋlↄ nɩ a ʋ yir deme ba jaa, a Naaŋmɩn ba na sↄw de ɩnɛ.
44016035	A lɛ a bio na vɩɛ, a ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ tʋ̃ na a ba sõsũonbo yel a kasu-gure, a ʋ bar a nɩbɛ bala a ba cen.
44016036	A kasu-gure cen na man a Pol a mɩnɛ ba na tʋ̃ yel ʋ yele nɩ: “A ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ tʋ̃ na a ɩ̃ bar nyɩ a nyɩ cen. Nyɩ na tʋↄ na yi cenʼɩ̃ su-ɓaar.”
44016037	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Pol yelʼã a sõsũonbo bala: “A sɩmɩ na ɩ a Orom nɩbɛ, ba fↄb sɩ na a pↄrↄ a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ baa dãa guor a sɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ nyɛ a fãa ʋlↄ sɩ na maal wa, ɩ̃ na ba lɛ ƴↄ̃w sɩ a kasu pʋↄ. Ã ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ba bʋↄrↄ na ba sↄↄlɩ̃ yuo sɩ bar mɩɩ? Saa sↄw a lɛ wa. A sɛw na a bala mɩ̃ɛ ba wa na yuo sɩ bar.”
44016038	A sõsũonbo cenʼã na man a lɛ kʋ a ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ, a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw ba a mɩnɛ ba na wõ áa Pol nɩ a Sɩlasɩ ɩ na a Orom nɩbɛ.
44016039	Ba cenʼã na ɓaalɩ̃ ba yi nɩ a kasu pʋↄ, ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ ba a ba yi a tẽw ʋlↄ pʋↄ.
44016040	A lɛ a Pol nɩ a Sɩlasɩ na yi a kasu pʋↄ, ba cenʼã a Lɩdɩ yir, na ba lɛ nyɛ a yɛɛr, ɩ̃ ƴɛr a Ꞌlafʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋ ba, ɩ̃ pãa yi a tẽw ʋlↄ pʋↄ.
44017001	A Pol nɩ a Sɩlasɩ tↄlʼɩ̃ na a Ãfipoli nɩ a Apoloni ten, ɩ̃ cen na ta a Tɛsaloniki, a jie ʋlↄ a Jufisɩ puorfʋ yir na be.
44017002	A Pol cenʼã a puorfʋ yir a mɩnɛ ʋ na mɩlɩ̃ nɩ. Ʋ de na bibi-ciirsɩ ata na ʋ man ba a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala na be a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ.
44017003	Ʋ jaana ba na miile nɩ ba áa sɛw na a Kirisi na nyɛ won ɩ̃ kpi, ɩ̃ ir a kũu pʋↄ. Ʋ lɛ yele ba na go: “A Jeeju ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na miile nyɩ, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a Kirisi.”
44017004	A nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ a ba sↄ̃w sↄw na ɩ̃ pↄw a Pol nɩ a Sɩlasɩ. A Gɩrɛkɩ yaw jie na puoro a Naaŋmɩn mɩ sↄw na lãa nɩ a pↄↄ-nɩ-bɛrɛ yaw jie.
44017005	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nyuur nyↄw na a Jufisɩ, a ba gbɛɛrɩ̃ a bɩcɩɩr deme ba na nyɛ a daa pʋↄ, a ba dama a nɩbɛ a tẽw ɩrɛ wilewile. Ba cenʼã a Jasↄ̃ yir na bʋↄrↄ a Pol nɩ a Sɩlasɩ aa ba nyↄↄr ba cenʼɩ̃ a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw.
44017006	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na ma nyɛ ba wa, ba nyↄw na a Jasↄ̃ nɩ a yɛɛr ŋmɛɛ, taw cenʼɩ̃ a tẽw nɩ-bɛrɛ nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ wuure yele: “Á nɩbɛ na damʼã a ten a jaa yↄ nɩ, ɩ̃ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ba mɩ ta na a sɩ tẽw,
44017007	a Jasↄ̃ de ba kulʼɩ̃ a ʋ yir. Á nɩbɛ bala ba jaa maala na a ala a sɩ jamana ƴɛr-kpɛn na ciire, a-na-ɩ ba yele na a jaman-kpee be na be a ba bʋↄlↄ Jeeju.”
44017008	A ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ damʼã a nɩbɛ nɩ a tẽw nɩ-bɛrɛ ba jaa,
44017009	a nɩ-bɛrɛ ƴↄ̃w a Jasↄ̃ nɩ a yɛɛr bala a ba ya libie bin, ɩ̃ a ba pãa bar ba a ba cen.
44017010	A lɛ a wɩɛr na liw, a yɛɛr tↄw na a Pol nɩ a Sɩlasɩ bar a jie naan a ba cen a Beere. A mɩnɛ ba na ta a be, ba kpɛ na a Jufisɩ puorfʋ yir pʋↄ.
44017011	A Jufisɩ bala a be tɛrɛ na yɛ̃ vɩlaa gãw a Tɛsaloniki deme. Ba cɛlʼã a Pol ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩ ɓĩɓinfʋ, ɩ̃ ma Ꞌloro a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ a bibie a jaa, bʋↄrↄ ba bↄ̃w a ala ɩ a ala a Pol na yel ɩ na a lɛ.
44017012	Nɩ-yaw a ba sↄ̃w sↄw na, lãa nɩ a Gɩrɛkɩ pↄↄ-naabsɩ nɩ a ba dabsɩ yaw.
44017013	Ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛ a Jufisɩ bala na be a Tɛsaloniki na wõ áa Pol mɩ ƴɛrɛ na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ a Beere-tẽw, ba cenʼã a be na ƴɛrɛ a su-ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ dama nɩ a nɩbɛ.
44017014	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a yɛɛr ƴↄ̃w a Pol a man sↄr a jie naan ʋ cen, ɩ̃ cɛ a Sɩlasɩ nɩ a Timote bar a ba jɛ a Beere.
44017015	A bala na tↄwrↄ a Pol cenʼɩ̃ ʋ na na ta nɩ a Atɛn, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na lɩɛb kule, ʋ tʋ̃ ba na a Sɩlasɩ nɩ a Timote sɛ̃, a ba yel ba a ba wɩ a ʋ sɛ̃ fↄfↄw.
44017016	A daar ʋlↄ a Pol na jɛ a Atɛn-tẽw gu a Sɩlasɩ nɩ a Timote, a suur nyɩrɩ̃ na dɩrɛ ʋ, a mɩnɛ ʋ na nyɛ a tɩbɛ a sɛw a ʋna tẽw naa.
44017017	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ ma mana na taa a be a puorfʋ yir pʋↄ nɩ a Jufisɩ nɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ bala na mɩ puoro a Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃ ma mɩ mana taa nɩ a nɩbɛ bala ʋ na tuoro nɩ a daa pʋↄ a bibie a jaa.
44017018	A tɩɛrɩ̃-yaw nɩbɛ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Epikiri nɩbɛ nɩ a Sitoyisi-nɩbɛ nyↄw na ɩ̃ cɩɩrɛ taa nɩ a Pol. A ŋmɛɛ soorʼã: “Bõ a ƴɛr-kↄ̃-pi sʋbↄ na mɩ bʋↄrↄ ʋ yel?” A ŋmɛɛ yel: “A wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a naaŋmɩn paala ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ hiere.” Ba yelʼã a lɛ a-na-ɩ a Pol ƴɛrɛ na a Jeeju ƴɛrɩ̃, nɩ a kũu-pʋↄ-irfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃.
44017019	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ba tɛrɛ na a Pol cenʼɩ̃ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ƴɛrfʋ jie ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Aropasɩ, ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Fʋ na tʋↄ na man sɩ a ƴɛr-paalaa ʋlↄ fʋ na ƴɛrɛ a sɩ na mɩ wonaa mɩɩ?
44017020	A-na-ɩ sɩ wõ na ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a fʋ jie sɩ na ma dãa wõ wa. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a sɩ bʋↄrↄ sɩ bↄ̃w a par.”
44017021	A-na-ɩ a Atɛn-tẽw nɩbɛ ba jaa nɩ a sáanba na be a ba tẽw pʋↄ, a ba ben ɩ na ba ƴɛrɛ a yel-paala cɛlɛ nɩ tɛw.
44017022	A Pol ir ɩraa a nɩbɛ bala na be a Aropasɩ nii-sↄw ɩ̃ yel: “Atɛn nɩbɛ! Ɩ̃ nyɛ na a nyɩ tʋmↄ a jaa bↄ̃w ka nyɩ sɩrɩ̃ na puoro a ŋmɩn-yaw.
44017023	A-na-ɩ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na yʋↄrↄ Ꞌwuoro a nyɩ ŋmɩn-puor-yele, ɩ̃ nyɛ na baar lofʋ jie kãw a ba sɛb ƴↄ̃w: ʻA naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ sɩ na ma bↄ̃w wa.ʼ Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a ʋlↄ nyɩ na puoro ɩ̃ ma bↄ̃w wa, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ wa miile nyɩ.
44017024	A Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ na maal a tẽw nɩ a yele a jaa na be a tẽw pʋↄ, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ a saꞋlon nɩ a tẽw pʋↄ. ꞋWaa gana a yie ala a nɩbɛ na mɛ nɩ a ba nur kʋ ʋ wa.
44017025	ꞋWaa mɩ bʋↄrↄ a nɩbɛ nuu ʋ maal bom kʋ ʋ, wↄ̃ taa nɩ bom ɩ̃ ɓↄr ʋ wa, a-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ ba jaa a vʋʋrʋ̃ nɩ a baafʋ, nɩ a yele a jaa.
44017026	A dab-bõ-ƴen jie a Naaŋmɩn nyↄw ɩ̃ mɛ a nɩ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ba jaa, ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w ba a ba jɛ a ten ten a jaa pʋʋr. Ʋ dãa na de nĩe ƴↄ̃w a nɩbɛ a daar ʋlↄ nɩ a jiir ala ba na beree ka a tẽw pʋↄ.
44017027	Ʋ maalʼã a ala, a ba na tʋↄ bẽbene bʋↄrↄ ʋ, ɩ̃ a ba bↄfʋ ɩnɛ, a nʋmↄ wa sↄw ba nyɛ ʋ. Ɩ̃-cɛ, sɩrɛ jaa ʋ, a Naaŋmɩn ma jãa nɩ a sɩ jaa bõ-ƴene-ƴene wa.
44017028	A-na-ɩ ʻa ʋ jie a sɩ baafʋ yi, ʋlↄ ma maal sɩ a sɩ cere, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ ɩnɛ sɩ be a ka a tẽw pʋↄ.ʼ A ɩ na a mɩnɛ a nyɩ yɛ̃ deme ŋmɛɛ na dãa yel: ʻSɩ mɩ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn bibiir.ʼ
44017029	“A-na-ɩ sɩ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn bibiir, aa sɛw a sɩ na tɩɛr beeka a Naaŋmɩn wↄ̃ na taa nɩ tɩɩb ba na maalʼɩ̃ sɛlmɛ mɩɩ kur-pɩlaa mɩɩ kubir ba na maalʼɩ̃ a ba bↄ̃wfʋ nɩ a ba mɩ̃ɛ yɛ̃ wa.
44017030	A Naaŋmɩn ma cãa goro nɩ a daar ʋlↄ a nɩbɛ na ma dãa bↄ̃w a buon wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na ʋ bʋↄlↄ na a nɩbɛ ba jaa a jiir a jaa a ba lɩɛb a ba yɛ̃.
44017031	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w na a bibir ʋlↄ ʋ na diere a nɩ-bõ-ƴen ʋlↄ ʋ na biin mana nɩ a ten a jaa nɩbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ tuure nɩ a torfʋ. Ʋ miilʼã a nɩbɛ ba jaa áa ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ na yel-mɩ̃ɛ, a mɩnɛ ʋ na jaw a ʋna nɩrɛ naa a kũu pʋↄ yi nɩ.”
44017032	A lɛ ba na wõ a Pol ʋ ƴɛr a kũu-pʋↄ-irfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃, a ŋmɛɛ laara ʋ na, ɩ̃ a ŋmɛɛ yel: “Sɩ bʋↄrↄ na fʋ lɛ bↄ̃w ƴɛr sɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃ naa bibir kãw go.”
44017033	A lɛ, a Pol bar ba na ɩ̃ yi cen.
44017034	A ŋmɛɛ pↄw ʋ na ɩ̃ sↄw de a Kirisi. A ba pʋↄ, a Denisi be na be na ɩ a Aropasɩ nɩbɛ ni-diere, nɩ a pↄw na dɩ a Damari, nɩ a ŋmɛɛ go.
44018001	A ala ɩ̃ baar, a Pol yi na a Atɛn, ɩ̃ cen a Kↄrɛ̃tɩ.
44018002	A be, ʋ tuorʼɩ̃ na a Jufi nɩrɛ na dɩ a Akɩlasɩ na ɩ a Pↄ̃-tẽw nɩrɛ. A Ɩtalɩ ʋ yi ɩ̃ cãa wa ta a jie naan nɩ a ʋ pↄw Pɩrɩsɩl, a-na-ɩ a jamana Kilodi yelʼã a Jufisɩ ba jaa, a ba yi a Orom-tẽw. A Pol cenʼã na nyɛ ba,
44018003	ɩ̃ jɛ be a ba jie a ba lãa tʋnↄ a tʋn, a-na-ɩ tʋ̃-bõ-ƴen ba lãa tɛrɛ na ɩ a gana tʋmↄ.
44018004	A bibi-ciirsɩ a jaa, a Pol ma kpɛ na a puorfʋ yir ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ bʋↄrↄ ʋ lɩɛbʼɩ̃ a Jufisɩ nɩ a Gɩrɛkɩsɩ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ.
44018005	Ɩ̃ a lɛ a Sɩlasɩ nɩ a Timote na yi a Masɛdↄn ɩ̃ wɩ ta, a Pol de na a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ tↄr jaa bar ƴↄ̃w a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ pʋↄ, yele a Jufisɩ áa Jeeju ɩ̃ ɩ a Kirisi.
44018006	Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ a Jufisɩ na var a Pol ɩ̃ kpɛrɛ ʋ, ʋ pĩ na a ʋ cẽcen ƴↄ̃w ba ɩ̃ yel ba: “Á nyɩmɩ bↄr, nyɩ jie a yi. Aa lɛ ɩ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ wa. Wa nyↄw nɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ cere na a nɩ-bʋlsɩ jie.”
44018007	Ʋ yi na a be cen a popuoro kãw sɛ̃ na dɩ a Titiw Jusitisi, a ʋ yir na be a puorfʋ yir lõboorɩ̃.
44018008	A Kirisipi na ɩ a ʋna puorfʋ yir ni-diere nɩ a ʋ yir deme ba jaa sↄw na de a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ. Ɩ̃ a Kↄrɛ̃tɩ nɩbɛ yaw jie na wõ a Pol ƴɛrɩ̃, mɩ sↄw na ɩ̃ ɩ a ba mʋr ba a pʋↄ.
44018009	A tɩsↄw kãw, a Pol nyɛ na sɩɛ bom, ɩ̃ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ʋ: “Taa jↄrↄ dãbɩ̃ɛ wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ, ƴɛrɛ. Taa wa sine wa.
44018010	A-na-ɩ ɩ̃ be nɩ fʋ na. Nɩrɛ ma tʋↄrↄ nyↄwrↄ fʋ maala fãa wa, a-na-ɩ a bala na ɩ a ɩ̃ nɩbɛ a ka a tẽw na pʋↄ, ba waa na.”
44018011	A Pol jɛ na be a Kↄrɛ̃tɩ maal yõ-bõ-ƴen nɩ bõ-ŋmãa, jaana a nɩbɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃.
44018012	A ʋna daarʼãa a Orom fãgã deme na ƴↄ̃w a Galɩ̃yↄ ʋ Ꞌwuoro a Akayi wɩɛr, a Jufisɩ guorʼã taa ɩ̃ nyↄw a Pol cen nɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ jie,
44018013	ɩ̃ yel: “A daba na bʋↄrↄ na ʋ lɩɛb a nɩbɛ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ a ba puoro a Naaŋmɩn a na be kpee nɩ a ala a ʋ ƴɛr-kpɛn na yele.”
44018014	A Pol dãa na bʋↄrↄ ʋ ƴɛr ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃-cɛ a Galɩ̃yↄ yel a Jufisɩ: “A ala ɩ̃ dãa ɩ maal-fãa ɩnɛ ʋ, mɩɩ tʋ̃-bier ɩnɛ ʋ, ɩ̃ naa sↄw na cɛl a nyɩ ƴɛrɩ̃, Jufisɩ.
44018015	Ɩ̃-cɛ a-na-ɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, nɩ a yoe nɩ a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛr-kpɛn nyɩ cɩɩrɛ nɩ taa, a nyɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ a ɩ. Maa bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a ana yele ƴɛr-guoro wa.”
44018016	Ɩ̃ ʋ diw ba na bar a be a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ jie.
44018017	A ba jaa nyↄw na a Sↄsɩten na ɩ a puorfʋ yir ni-diere ɩ̃ fↄb ʋ a be a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ jie nʋↄr, ɩ̃-cɛ aa dãa ba a Galɩ̃yↄ wa.
44018018	A Pol jɛ na a Kↄrɛ̃tɩ kam, ɩ̃ pãa yi a be a yɛɛr sɛ̃ ɩ̃ kpɛ a gbor cen a Sɩrɩ, ʋlↄ nɩ a Pɩrɩsɩl nɩ a Akɩlasɩ. Á lɛ ba na cãa bʋↄrↄ a cenfʋ, ʋ ɩ na a ba pũo ʋ a juu a Sãkire-tẽw, a-na-ɩ ʋ dãa na ƴɛr nʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn jie.
44018019	Ba ta na a Ɛfɛɛsɩ a Pol bar ba a be. Ʋ cenʼã a puorfʋ yir a ba mana taa nɩ a Jufisɩ.
44018020	Ba sʋↄrↄ ʋ na a ʋ jɛ a ba sɛ̃ ɩ̃-cɛ Ꞌwaa dãa sↄw wa.
44018021	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na yire a ba sↄ̃w, ʋ yel ba na: “A Naaŋmɩn wa sↄw, ɩ̃ na lɛ lɩɛbʼã wa a nyɩ sɛ̃.” Ɩ̃ na ʋ yi a Ɛfɛɛsɩ-tẽw, ɩ̃ kpɛ a gbor pʋↄ cen.
44018022	A lɛ ʋ na ta a Sejare, ʋ yi na een a Jerujalɛm, na puor a duo-puorbo a be, ɩ̃ pãa cen a Átɩyↄsɩ.
44018023	Ʋ jɛ na a be fɩ̃ɩ, ɩ̃ lɛ lɩɛb cen na cʋbↄ a Galatɩ nɩ a Fɩrɩjɩ ten bõ-ƴene-ƴene sũono a par-tuurbe ba jaa a ba nyɩrɛ cere a nii-sↄw.
44018024	A Jufi nɩrɛ na dɩ a Apolosi na yi a Alɛsãdiri dãa na wɩ a Ɛfɛɛsɩ. A ʋ nʋↄr ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ nʋmↄ na a nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ ʋ mɩ nyɩrɩ̃ bↄ̃w a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ vɩlaa.
44018025	Ʋ dãa na jaan a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sↄr defʋ. Ʋ ɓĩɓine na ƴɛrɛ nɩ cɛcɛ mana nɩ a ala na tor a Jeeju. Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jã-Batii kʋ̃ↄ mʋrfʋ tɛw ʋ dãa bↄ̃w.
44018026	A daba ʋlↄ nyↄw na a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ nɩ Ꞌlafʋ a puorfʋ yir. A lɛ a Pɩrɩsɩl nɩ a Akɩlasɩ na wõ ʋ ƴɛrɛ, ba tɛrɛ ʋ na kulʼɩ̃ na ba bↄ̃w miil ʋ a Naaŋmɩn sↄr.
44018027	A ɩ na fɩ̃ɩ, a Apolosi bʋↄrↄ ʋ cen a Akayi, a yɛɛr ƴↄ̃w ʋ a sↄr vɩlaa, ɩ̃ sɛb sɛbɛ tɩɩr kʋ a popuorbo a ʋna tẽw naa pʋↄ, á ba de ʋ vɩlaa. A mɩnɛ ʋ na ta a be, ʋ nyɩrɩ̃ na sũo a bala a Naaŋmɩn maal-vɩlaa na saa a ba sↄw de a Jeeju.
44018028	A-na-ɩ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ʋ na mana, a nyɩrɩ̃ na tɛrɛ kpɛ̃w, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ gãw a Jufisɩ a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw. A Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ʋ de miile nɩ ba áa Jeeju ɩ̃ ɩ a Kirisi.
44019001	A daar ʋlↄ a Apolosi na be a Kↄrɛ̃tɩ, a Pol tↄlʼã yi a ten ala na be a tã-gar juu, ɩ̃ ta a Ɛfɛɛsɩ. Ʋ nyɛ na a par-tuurbe ŋmɛɛ a be,
44019002	ɩ̃ soor ba: “A lɛdaar nyɩ na sↄw de a Jeeju, nyɩ pↄw na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ mɩɩ?” A ba yel ʋ: “Saa mɩ wõ a ba yel a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ be na be wa.”
44019003	A Pol soor ba: “Ɩ̃-cɛ, kʋ̃ↄ mʋrfʋ buor ba mʋr nyɩ?” A ba yel ʋ a Jã-Batii kʋ̃ↄ mʋrfʋ ʋ.
44019004	A Pol yel ba: “A Jã mʋrʼã a bala na sↄw ɩ̃ lɩɛb a yɛ̃, ɩ̃ mɩ yel kʋ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ a ba sↄw de a ʋlↄ na waara a ʋ puo-sↄw. A Jeeju ʋ yel a lɛ.”
44019005	A lɛ a par-tuurbe bala na wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ baar, ba ɩ na a ba mʋr ba a kʋ̃ↄ nɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju yuor.
44019006	A mɩnɛ a Pol na dↄↄl ba a nur, a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wa na pↄw ba, a ba nyↄw ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ, ɩ̃ mɩ mana a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ.
44019007	A bana nɩbɛ na ta na dabsɩ pie-nʼayi.
44019008	A Pol cenʼã a puorfʋ yir ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩ Ꞌlafʋ wa maalʼɩ̃ cur ata, mana nɩ ba a Naaŋmɩn fãw ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ bʋↄrↄ ʋ lɩɛbʼɩ̃ a bala na cɛlɛ ʋ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ.
44019009	Ɩ̃ a yaw jie kpɛmɛ na a sube ɩ̃ jaar ɩ̃ kpɛrɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sↄr a nɩbɛ ba jaa nii-sↄw. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Pol ŋmaa yi a ba jie, ɩ̃ ow a ʋ par-tuurbe kpee na ʋ jaana ba a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ a bibie a jaa a Tɩranisi nakol yir.
44019010	Yomo ayi a maal a lɛ, a saa a Jufisɩ nɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ ba jaa na be a Ajɩ-tẽw wõ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃.
44019011	A Naaŋmɩn de na a Pol tʋnↄ nɩ a nↄ-kpawfʋ tʋmↄ ala na bɛrmɛ.
44019012	A ala ɩ̃ saarɩ̃ ɩ a nɩbɛ de na a nii-sↄw bõ-fɛraa nɩ a cẽcene na sɩɩr a Pol ɩ̃gan cenʼɩ̃ na dↄↄl a wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme, ba ma kpɛmɛ na, ɩ̃ a kↄ̃tↄn-bebe ma mɩ yi ɩ̃ cɛ ba.
44019013	A Jufisɩ bala na ma yʋↄrↄ diwre a kↄ̃tↄn-bebe bara, a ŋmɛɛ a ba sↄ̃w mɩ bʋↄrↄ na ba de a Jeeju yuor diw nɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ bar. Ba ma yelʼã a kↄ̃tↄn-bebe: “A Jeeju ʋlↄ ƴɛrɩ̃ a Pol na hiere, a ʋ yuor sɩ de ƴɛrɛ nɩ nyɩ: nyɩ yi!” (
44019014	A bala na maala a lɛ ɩ na nɩbɛ anuu-nʼayi, ɩ̃ ɩ a Jufisɩ baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Seva bi-dabsɩ.)
44019015	Ɩ̃-cɛ a kↄ̃tↄn-bier yel ba na: “Ɩ̃ bↄ̃w na a Jeeju, nɩ a ʋlↄ na ɩ a Pol. Ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩmɩ mɩ, babõ nyɩ ɩ?”
44019016	A daba ʋlↄ a kↄ̃tↄn-bier na tɛrɛ aw na nyↄↄr ba, ɩ̃ ŋme ba vɩlaa ƴↄ̃w ba wʋlɩ̃sɩ a ba jↄ yi a yene nɩ salĩɓobo.
44019017	A Jufisɩ nɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ ba jaa na be a Ɛfɛɛsɩ wõ na a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ naa, a dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw ba ba jaa ɩ̃ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju yuor yire dↄↄlↄ.
44019018	A nɩbɛ yaw jie na dãa sↄw de a Jeeju wɩ na caala a ba maal-faar ala ba na dãa maal,
44019019	ɩ̃ a nɩ-yaw bala na mɩ dãa ɩ a jɩbʋʋ-kpɩlbɛ de na a ba sɛbsɩ wɩ nɩ su bar a dɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa nii-sↄw. Ba gorʼã a sɛbsɩ ala libie a ɩ ture ture kↄↄr ayi gbɛɛ anuu.
44019020	A be jie, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ yire na pↄwrↄ nɩ kpɛ̃w ɩ̃ a ʋ tʋↄfʋ mɩ dↄↄlↄ.
44019021	A ana yele na tↄl baar, a Pol bʋↄrↄ na ʋ tↄl yi a Masɛdↄn nɩ a Akayi cen a Jerujalɛm. Ʋ yele na: “A maa wa ta a be baar, a sɛw na ɩ̃ mɩ nyɛ a Orom-tẽw nɩ mimir.”
44019022	Ʋ tʋ̃ na a ʋ sõsũonbo ayi na ɩ a Timote nɩ a Erasɩtɩ a Masɛdↄn, ɩ̃ na ʋ cãa jɛ be a Ajɩ-tẽw fɩ̃ɩ.
44019023	A ʋna daarʼãa, damfʋ irʼã be a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sↄr defʋ ɩnɛ, naa a bɛlɩ̃.
44019024	Daba kãw na dɩ Demetiri na ɩ kukure na kure a kur-pɛlɛ, ma maalʼã a yir-bil a ba naaŋmɩn Atemi yir kaarɩ̃, a ɩ bom na na sũono a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ yaw.
44019025	Ʋ bʋↄlʼã a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ lãa nɩ a bala na mɩ tʋnↄ a ʋna tʋ̃-bõ-ƴen, na ʋ yel ba: “Ɩ̃ badɛɛ, nyɩ bↄ̃w ka a sɩ vɩlaa jie yi na a sɩ tʋmↄ sɩ na tʋnↄ ɩnɛ.
44019026	Ɩ̃ nyɩ nyɛ na ɩ̃ mɩ wõ a ala a ʋna Pol na maal. Ʋ yele na áa naaŋmɩnsɩ ala a nɩbɛ na maalʼɩ̃ a ba nur ma ɩ naaŋmɩnsɩ wa. Ʋ lɩɛbʼã a nɩ-yaw tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ, ɩ̃ aa ɩ a ka a Ɛfɛɛsɩ-tẽw tɛw ʋ maal a lɛ wa. A lɛ ʋ mɩ maal a Ajɩ ten yayaw pʋↄ.
44019027	Ɩ̃ aa ɩ a sɩ tʋmↄ tɛw ba bʋↄrↄ ba lɩɛb a ɩ tʋ̃-pↄrↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ba mɩ bʋↄrↄ na ba maal a sɩ naaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɛ Atemi yir ʋ lɩɛb ɩ bõ-pↄrↄ. Ɩ̃ a sɩmɩ bar ba a ba maala a lɛ, a Atemi ʋlↄ a Ajɩ nɩbɛ ba jaa na puoro nɩ a ten nɩbɛ ba jaa, ʋ kↄ̃ lɛ yi a yuor go wa.”
44019028	A lɛ a bala na cɛlɛ na wõ a ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, suur nyↄw ba na po nɩ a ba wuure yele nɩ: “A Ɛfɛɛsɩ Atemi bɛrmɛ na!”
44019029	A damfʋ pↄw a tẽw ʋ jaa, a nɩbɛ dar taa cen na nyↄↄr a Masɛdↄn nɩbɛ ayi, a Gayisi nɩ a Arɩsɩta na ɩ a Pol lãa-yʋↄrbↄ ɩ̃ gbu ba cenʼɩ̃ a ɓolĩ wɩɛr.
44019030	A Pol dãa na bʋↄrↄ ʋ cen a nɩ-yaw bala nii-sↄw, ɩ̃-cɛ a popuorbo mↄ̃w ʋ bar.
