44019031	A tʋ̃tʋ̃-nɩ-bɛrɛ ŋmɛɛ na be a Ajɩ-tẽw, ɩ̃ ɩ a ʋ badɛɛ, tʋ̃ na nɩrɛ a ʋ yel ʋ a ʋ taa cen be a ɓolĩ wɩɛr wa.
44019032	Burbur kpɛ na a nɩ-yaw bala na duo taa a be. A ŋmɛɛ ma wuurʼã yel á asɩmɛ ʋ, ɩ̃ a ŋmɛɛ ma wuur yel bõ-kpee, a yaw jie a ba pʋↄ ma mɩ bↄ̃w a bom ɩnɛ ba na tiw taa wa.
44019033	A nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ a be a nɩbɛ pʋↄ de na a ƴɛrɩ̃ man a Alɛsãdɩrɛ, a Jufisɩ na dara ƴↄnↄ a nii-sↄw. A Alɛsãdɩrɛ ɩ na a nɩbɛ a ba sine a-na-ɩ ʋ bʋↄrↄ na ʋ ƴɛr faa a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ nɩ a ʋ tↄ deme a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw.
44019034	Ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛ ba na nyɛ ʋ ʋ ɩ a Jufi nɩrɛ, ba wuurʼã a wuur-bõ-ƴen, maalʼɩ̃ lɛɛrɛ ayi, yele nɩ: “A Ɛfɛɛsɩ Atemi bɛrmɛ na!”
44019035	A tẽw sɛsɛbɛ pãa na tʋↄ ɩ a nɩbɛ a ba sine, ɩ̃ ʋ yel ba: “Ɛfɛɛsɩ nɩbɛ, a nɩbɛ ba jaa bↄ̃w na áa sɩmɩ Ɛfɛɛsɩ nɩbɛ ɩ̃ gure a naaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɛ Atemi yir nɩ a ʋ bʋtɩb-kpɛ̃ɛ na yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ lo.
44019036	Nɩrɛ ma tʋↄrↄ cɩɩrɛ wa. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a sɛw na a nyɩ na bar a gↄn ɩ̃ kↄ̃ pↄw maal bom wa.
44019037	A-na-ɩ nyɩ wa nɩ na a nɩbɛ na, na ma ju a bom a sɩ naaŋmɩn yir pʋↄ wa, baa mɩ ƴɛr ƴɛr-fãa ƴↄ̃w a sɩ naaŋmɩn wa.
44019038	Ála-ɩ̃-sↄ a ala ɩ a Demetiri nɩ a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ tɛrɛ na ƴɛrɩ̃ ƴↄnↄ nɩrɛ, a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ tɛrɛ na a ʋ bibir ɩ̃ a nɩ-bɛrɛ ma mɩ be na be. Bá cen a be na bʋↄl taa.
44019039	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a bom lɛ be na be a nyɩ bʋↄrↄ ba gbɛɛrɩ̃, ba na gbɛɛrɩ̃ na a tẽw nɩbɛ kpaarɩ̃-taa kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ.
44019040	A-na-ɩ a ala sɩ na maal a dɩnaa, a na tʋↄ na ɩ sɩ ƴɛrɩ̃. Ba na yelʼã á tẽw sɩ dama, a-na-ɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ ma be be sɩ na duo nɩ taa a nↄhↄ̃ wa, ɩ̃ saa mɩ tʋↄrↄ miile a ƴɛrɩ̃ par vɩlaa wa.”
44019041	A mɩnɛ ʋ na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, ʋ wɛlʼã a nɩbɛ bar.
44020001	A lɛ a gↄ̃-pↄↄr na baar, a Pol bʋↄlʼã a popuorbo tiw ɩ̃ ƴɛr a sũofʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋ ba. Ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na puor ba baar, ʋ yi na cen a Masɛdↄn.
44020002	Ʋ tↄlʼã yi a ʋna wɩɛr pʋↄ na ʋ ƴɛr ƴɛrɩ̃ yaw sũo nɩ a popuorbo, ɩ̃ pãa po cen a Gɩrɛkɩ-tẽw
44020003	na jɛ a be maal cur ata. A ala na baar, ʋ dãa na bʋↄrↄ ʋ cen a Sɩrɩ-tẽw, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na wõ a Jufisɩ goro taa a ʋ ɩnɛ, ʋ lɩɛbʼã gol cen na kpɛ a Masɛdↄn-tẽw tↄl.
44020004	A bala na ɩ a ʋ lãa-yʋↄrbↄ ɩ na a Sopatɛɛr, na ɩ a Pirisi bi-daba na yi a Beere, nɩ a Arɩsɩta, nɩ a Sekũdi na yi a Tɛsaloniki, nɩ a Gayisi na yi a Dɛrbɩ, nɩ a Timote, lãa nɩ a Tɩsɩkɩ, nɩ a Torofim na yi a Ajɩ wɩɛr.
44020005	A bala ɩ̃ de sɩ a nĩe cenʼã gu sɩ a Torowasɩ.
44020006	Ɩ̃ a sɩmɩ, a lɛ a bur-pʋↄr fɛtɩ na tↄl baar, sɩ kpɛ na a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ a Fɩlɩpɩ-tẽw na sɩ maal bibie anuu, ɩ̃ pↄw ba a Torowasɩ, na sɩ jɛ a be maal bibie anuu-nʼayi.
44020007	A jɩmaasɩ jaanʋↄr, sɩ duo na taa a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ dɩb dɩfʋ, ɩ̃ a Pol mana a nɩbɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃. A-na-ɩ a dɩvɩɛ bio a Pol bʋↄrↄ na ʋ bar ba ɩ̃ cen, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ ƴɛr ba na a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ kam, wa ta nɩ a tɩsↄw porɩ̃.
44020008	A bↄↄpɩɛn die ʋlↄ pʋↄ sɩ na duo, lãpar yayaw be na be,
44020009	ɩ̃ a dabile mɩ be be na dɩ Etikisi ɩ̃ jɛ a fɩnɛɛtɩ nʋↄr, a gʋ̃ↄ nyↄwrↄ ʋ. Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a Pol na nyɩrɩ̃ ƴɛr a ƴɛrɩ̃ kam, ʋ gurʼã lɛ kper na ʋ yi a be a saꞋlon ɩ̃ faa lo a tene, a ba suu ɓↄw nyɛ ʋ kpi.
44020010	A Pol suu na gã pↄw ʋ worĩ ʋ ɩ̃ yel a nɩbɛ: “Nyɩ taa tɩɛrɛ wa. A ʋ vʋʋrʋ̃ lɛ wa na.”
44020011	Ɩ̃ ʋ lɛ do na ŋma a buru a ba po Ꞌwↄb, ɩ̃ ʋ lɛ ƴɛr a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ lɛɛ a bio wa vɩɛ, ʋ pãa yi cen.
44020012	Ɩ̃ a dabile ʋlↄ, ba de ʋ na kpɛ nɩ nɩ-mimir, a sube lɛ ɓãa ba ba jaa fɛw.
44020013	A sɩmɩ, sɩ de na nĩe cen na kpɛ a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ cen a Asↄsɩ, a jie ʋlↄ sɩ na sɛw sɩ de a Pol nɩ a gbor. A-na-ɩ lɛ ʋ dãa yel sɩ, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ, gbɛɛ ʋ na wɩ nɩ.
44020014	A mɩnɛ ʋ na tuorʼɩ̃ sɩ a Asↄsɩ, sɩ de ʋ na nɩ a gbor a sɩ cen a Mɩtɩlɛ̃.
44020015	Ɩ̃ sɩ lɛ yi na a be ɩ̃ a lɛ a bio na vɩɛ na sɩ ta a Kio, ɩ̃ a dayere daar a sɩ ta a Samↄsɩ, ɩ̃ a datɛrɛ daar a sɩ pãa ta a Mile.
44020016	A Pol dãa na yel a ʋ na po na a Ɛfɛɛsɩ bar a mɩnɛ ʋ kↄ̃ wa ɩraa be a Ajɩ wɩɛr a daar wa po ʋ wa. A-na-ɩ ʋ pↄwrↄ na bʋↄrↄ a ʋlↄ tʋↄ ʋ ta a Jerujalɛm a Pãtekↄtɩ fɛtɩ bibir.
44020017	A lɛ a Pol na be a Mile-tẽw, ʋ tʋ̃ na bʋↄl a Ɛfɛɛsɩ duo-puor-ni-dierbe a ba wɩ.
44020018	A mɩnɛ ba na ta a ʋ sɛ̃, ʋ yel ba na: “Nyɩ bↄ̃w na a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na dãa wↄ̃ a nyɩ sↄ̃w a daar a jaa, wa nyↄw nɩ a bibir dãdãw ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na ta a nyɩ jie a Ajɩ-tẽw.
44020019	Ɩ̃ pabʼã a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ tʋnↄ nɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ tʋn, cire nɩ a mↄtↄ̃-kʋ̃ↄ, nyɛrɛ nɩ a won ala na ta ma a Jufisɩ na goro ma ɩnɛ.
44020020	Nyɩ bↄ̃w ka maa sↄↄlɩ̃ bom kãw bar na ɩrɛɛ bõ-son a nyɩ jie wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ ɛ̃ɛ na miil nyɩ a yele a jaa jaana nɩ nyɩ a kpaarɩ̃-taa jiir nɩ a nyɩ yie pʋↄ.
44020021	Ɩ̃ kpãkpanʼã a Jufisɩ nɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ a ba lɩɛb a ba yɛ̃ ɩ̃ puoro a Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃ sↄw de a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju.
44020022	Ɩ̃ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na fɛrɛ ma, ɩ̃ cere na a Jerujalɛm ɩ̃ maa bↄ̃w a ala nↄↄ tara ma a be wa.
44020023	Ɩ̃-cɛ a tẽw lɛ ɩ̃ na ma ta a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ma yel ma na a kasu nɩ a won be na be gu ma.
44020024	Ɩ̃-eɛ ɩ̃ maa tɩɛrʼɩ̃ a ɩ̃ baafʋ ʋ ɩ bom a ɩ̃ jie wa. A ala ɩ̃ na Ꞌwuoro ɩ na a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na tʋↄrↄ maala a tʋmↄ ala a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju na kʋ ma cere na tara nɩ a baarfʋ jie: a lɛ yelʼã, a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛr-son ʋlↄ na miile a Naaŋmɩn maal-vɩlaa.
44020025	“Ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a nyɩmɩ nyɩ jaa jie ɩ̃ na dãa yↄ ƴɛr a Naaŋmɩn fãw ƴɛrɩ̃, nyaa lↄↄ nyɛrɛ ma go wa.
44020026	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, ɩ̃ yele kʋrↄ nyɩ a dɩnaa, a nyɩ sↄ̃w, nɩ-bõ-ƴen wa bↄr, aa ɩrɛ a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa.
44020027	A-na-ɩ ɩ̃ miil nyɩ na a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ tʋmↄ ʋ jaa. Maa sↄↄlɩ̃ bom kãw a nyɩ jie wa.
44020028	Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ mɩ Ꞌwuoro a nɩbɛ bala ba jaa a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na kʋ nyɩ a nyɩ Ꞌwuoro a piir kaarɩ̃. Nyɩ́ bↄ̃w guolo a Naaŋmɩn duo-puorbo ʋ na da nɩ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ Bie jɩ̃ɩ sↄ.
44020029	Ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka a maa cen baar, a nɩbɛ na kpɛ na a nyɩ sↄ̃w wↄ̃ taa nɩ wɛ-dʋ̃-bebe, ɩ̃ ma bara a piir wa.
44020030	Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ mɩ̃ɛ sↄ̃w, a ŋmɛɛ nↄↄ irʼã ŋmara a jirsɩ bɛlɛ nɩ a popuorbo a ba tuure ba.
44020031	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, nyɩ́ jʋʋrↄ, ɩ̃ nyɩ taa hiin a ala ɩ̃ na maal a nyɩ sↄ̃w a yomo ata, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na dãa jaw nyɩ a yɛ̃, a tɩsↄw nɩ a mↄtↄ̃w ma galɩ̃ wa, cire nɩ a mↄtↄ̃-kʋ̃ↄ.
44020032	“Ɩ̃ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ɩ̃ de nyɩ na ƴↄ̃w a Naaŋmɩn nuumɩ, nɩ a ʋ sũofʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ pʋↄ. A ʋlↄ na tʋↄrↄ kʋrↄ nyɩ a fãw, ɩ̃ mɩ kʋrↄ nyɩ a yel-sono ala ʋ na bin a bala ba jaa ɩnɛ na ɩ a ʋ nɩbɛ.
44020033	Maa dãa tɩɛrʼɩ̃ nɩrɛ kãw bom wa: a libie, mɩɩ a sɛlmɛ, mɩɩ a cẽcene wa.
44020034	Nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ bↄ̃w na ka a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ nuu ɩ̃ dãa tʋnↄ nɩ a tʋmↄ pↄwrↄ nɩ a yele ala na sɛw nɩ a maa nɩ a ɩ̃ lãa-yʋↄrbↄ.
44020035	A ɩ̃ tʋmↄ a jaa ɩ̃ na maal, ɩ̃ miil nyɩ na a nyɩ sɛw na na tʋnↄ nɩ kpɛ̃w a nↄhↄ̃, na nyɩ pↄw a yele sũo nɩ a nɩ-nãw nɩbɛ, tɩɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju mɩ̃ɛ na dãa yel: ʻNʋ̃ↄ ma be na a ʋlↄ jie na kʋ a nɩrɛ a bom gãw a ʋlↄ na pↄw.ʼ ”
44020036	A lɛ a Pol na ƴɛr a ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ baar, ʋ gburĩ na a dume a ba lãa sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn.
44020037	A ba jaa fɛw kono woro nɩ a Pol puoro nɩ ʋ,
44020038	a sube sãw ba a mɩnɛ ʋ na yel ba a baa lɛ nyɛrɛ ʋ go wa. A ala ɩ̃ baar, ba tↄw ʋ na cenʼɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ.
44021001	A lɛ sɩ na faa yi a bana nɩbɛ jie, sɩ kpɛ na a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ cen dẽdẽ na ta a Kↄsɩ, ɩ̃ a bio vɩɛ a sɩ ta a Orodi-tẽw, ɩ̃ lɛ yi a be ɩ̃ ta a Patara.
44021002	A be sɩ lɛ nyɛ na a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ ƴen sʋbↄ na cere a Fenisi, na sɩ kpɛ cere.
44021003	Sɩ tↄlↄ na ɩ̃ nyɛ a Sɩpɩr-tẽw a gʋbaa loor, ɩ̃ vɩɛ bar ɩ̃ ta a Sɩrɩ wɩɛr na sɩ suu a Tɩɩr-tẽw, a-na-ɩ a be ba sɛw ba wɛl a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ yele bar.
44021004	A be, sɩ nyɛ na a popuorbo ɩ̃ na sɩ jɛ maal bibie anuu-nʼayi a ba sɛ̃, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na kʋ ba a ƴɛrɩ̃, ba yelʼã a Pol, a ʋ taa een a Jerujalɛm wa.
44021005	A lɛ a ana bibie na ta baar, sɩ lɛ yi na de a sɩ sↄr, ɩ̃ a ba tↄw sɩ ba jaa, nɩ a ba pↄↄbↄ nɩ a ba bibiir, yi nɩ a tẽw cɛ̃cɛ̃w, a sɩ ta a man gbẽgbere nʋↄr, na sɩ gburĩ a dume ɩ̃ sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn.
44021006	A lɛ sɩ na puor taa baar, sɩ kpɛ na a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a ba mɩ lɩɛb kule.
44021007	A mɩnɛ sɩ na yi a Tɩɩr ɩ̃ ta a Pitolemayɩ, a sɩ gbor pʋↄ yↄfʋ baarʼã. Sɩ nyɛ na a yɛɛr a be na sɩ puor ba ɩ̃ jɛ maal bibir bõ-ƴen a ba sɛ̃.
44021008	A bio vɩɛ na a sɩ yi a be ɩ̃ cen na ta a Sejare. A be, sɩ kpɛ na na gã a Fɩlɩpɩ yir. Ʋ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son ƴɛƴɛrɛ ɩ̃ mɩ ɩ a nɩbɛ anuu-nʼayi bala ƴen sʋbↄ ba na dãa vɛl ir a Jerujalɛm.
44021009	Ʋ tɛrɛ na bi-pↄↄbↄ anaan na ma tɛrɛ sɩrbɛ sɛr wa, a ba ma ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala ba na pↄw a Naaŋmɩn jie.
44021010	Sɩ jɛ na be kam fɩ̃ɩ ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃-bʋʋrↄ na dɩ a Agabisi yi a Jude ɩ̃ wɩ.
44021011	Ʋ ta na a sɩ sɛ̃ ɩ̃ de a Pol sɩɛ gan lũ nɩ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ gbɛɛ nɩ a ʋ nur ɩ̃ yel: “Nyɩ́ cɛlɛ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na yel: nↄhↄ̃ a Jerujalɛm Jufisɩ na lũ a daba ʋlↄ na sↄ a sɩɛ gan na ƴↄ̃w a nɩ-bʋlsɩ nuumɩ.”
44021012	A lɛ sɩ na wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃, a sɩmɩ nɩ a Sejare-tẽw nɩbɛ sʋↄrↄ na a Pol lↄbↄ nɩ a nur a ʋ taa lɛ cere a Jerujalɛm wa.
44021013	Ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ yelʼã: “Bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a nyɩ kono na nyɩ bʋↄrↄ nyɩ sãw ma a suur? Ɩ̃ sↄw na a ba na lũ ma, ɩ̃ aa ɩ a ala tɛw ʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ mɩ sↄw na a ba na kú ma a Jerujalɛm a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju ɩnɛ.”
44021014	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ sɩ na ma tʋↄrↄ lɩɛbɛ a ʋ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ wa, sɩ barʼã a sʋↄrfʋ, ɩ̃ yel: “A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ú maal a ʋ pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ tʋmↄ.”
44021015	A mɩnɛ a bibie ala na tↄl baar, sɩ gbɛɛrɩ̃ na cen a Jerujalɛm,
44021016	a Sejare popuorbo ŋmɛɛ bɩɛl sɩ cenʼɩ̃ a daba ʋlↄ yir sɩ na bʋↄrↄ sɩ gã. A ʋ yuor dɩ na a Mɩnasõ ɩ̃ ʋ yi na a Sɩpɩr-tẽw ɩ̃ kam a puorfʋ pʋↄ.
44021017	A mɩnɛ sɩ na ta a Jerujalɛm, a yɛɛr de sɩ na nɩ nʋ̃ↄ.
44021018	A dɩvɩɛ bio sɩ lãa na cenʼɩ̃ a Pol a Jakɩ yir, a jie ʋlↄ a duo-puor-ni-dierbe ba jaa na kpaarɩ̃ taa.
44021019	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a Pol na puor ba baar, ʋ miil ba na a jaa barsɩ, a ala a Naaŋmɩn na maal a ʋ tʋmↄ pʋↄ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ jie.
44021020	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na wonaa, ba pɛw na a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ yel a Pol: “Yɛbɛ, fʋ nyɛ na a mɩnɛ a Jufisɩ ture ture na sↄw de a Kirisi, ɩ̃ a ba jaa ɓĩɓine na a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn ɩnɛ.
44021021	Ba man ba na a fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃, a fʋ mɩɩnɛ na a Jufisɩ ba jaa na be a nɩ-bʋlsɩ ten a ba lɩɛb ɩ̃ bar a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn, yele nɩ ba a ba taa cãa ŋmara a ba bibiir yↄɛ wa, ɩ̃ ba taa mɩ goro nɩ a Jufisɩ maalfʋ wa.
44021022	Mɩnɛ sɩ na ɩ? Á-na-ɩ ba na wonaa na a fʋ ta na a ka.
44021023	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, maal a ala sɩ na yele fʋ. Sɩ tɛrɛ na dabsɩ anaan ka, na ƴɛr nʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn jie.
44021024	De ba a nyɩ lãa cen na pↄl a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ, a fʋ ya a ba jur pũofʋ. A lɛ, a nɩbɛ ba jaa na bↄ̃w ka a ala ba na ƴɛrɛ ƴↄnↄ fʋ, a pↄrↄ ʋ, a-na-ɩ a fʋ̃ʋ mɩ̃ɛ mɩ jↄrↄ na a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn.
44021025	A ala ɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ bala na ɩ a popuorbo ʋ, sɩ tɩɩrʼã sɛbɛ miil ba a ala sɩ na guor taa, á ba taa dɩrɛ tɩɩb bom wa, á ba taa Ꞌwↄbↄ a jɩ̃ɩ mɩɩ dʋ̃ↄ ʋlↄ ba na cɩm kú wa, ɩ̃ ba taa mɩ pebe taa wa.”
44021026	A dɩvɩɛ bio, a Pol taw na a bana dabsɩ anaan a ba lãa maal a ba pↄlfʋ tʋmↄ, ɩ̃ ʋ cen na kpɛ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ yel ba a bibir ʋlↄ a pↄlfʋ tʋmↄ na baara, a lɛ yelʼã a daar ʋlↄ ba na ɩrɛ a ba loro a baar kʋrↄ a Naaŋmɩn.
44021027	A cɛ na fɩ̃ɩ, ɩ̃ a ana bibie anuu-nʼayi na ta baar, ɩ̃ a Jufisɩ bala na yi a Ajɩ wɩɛr nyɛ na a Pol be a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ ɩ̃ dam a nɩbɛ ba jaa, ɩ̃ nyↄw ʋ
44021028	wuure nɩ: “Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ, nyɩ́ wa sũo sɩ! Nyɩ́ nyɛ a daba ʋlↄ na ma hiere a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ ba jaa a jiir a jaa, sãwna nɩ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ yoe, nɩ a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn, ɩ̃ mɩ kpɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn yirʼã. Ɩ̃ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ʋ taw na a nɩ-bʋlsɩ kpɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, sãw nɩ a ji-son na.”
44021029	(Ba yelʼã a lɛ, a-na-ɩ ba dãa na nyɛ a Pol nɩ a Ɛfɛɛsɩ nɩrɛ na dɩ a Torofim a tẽw pʋↄ, ɩ̃ ba tɩɛrʼã beeka a Pol taw ʋ na kpɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ.)
44021030	A gↄ̃-pↄↄr pↄw na a tẽw ʋ jaa, a nɩbɛ yi a tẽw pʋↄ a jiir a jaa ɩ̃ jↄrↄ wɩɛrɛ. Ba nyↄw na a Pol taw yi nɩ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ cɛ̃cɛ̃w ɩ̃ pↄw a pana a jie naan.
44021031	Ba dãa na bʋↄrↄ ba kú ʋ, ɩ̃ a ba cen na yel a Orom sↄdaalsɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, áa Jerujalɛm-tẽw ʋ jaa dama na.
44021032	A jie naan, ʋ de na a sↄdaal-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a sↄdaalsɩ jↄ cenʼɩ̃ a nɩ-yaw pʋↄ. A mɩnɛ ba na nyɛ a nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ nɩ a sↄdaalsɩ, ba barʼã a Pol narfʋ.
44021033	A sↄdaalsɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ta na a Pol sɛ̃ ƴↄ̃w a ba nyↄw ʋ lũ nɩ a bↄ̃jↄrɩ̃sɩ ayi, ɩ̃ ʋ soor a ala ʋ na ɩ nɩ a bom ʋlↄ ʋ na maal.
44021034	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩ-yaw pʋↄ, a ŋmɛɛ ma yelʼã a nↄhↄ̃, ɩ̃ a ŋmɛɛ ma yel bõ-kpee, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na ma tʋↄrↄ bↄ̃wnↄ a par a gↄn yaw sↄ̃w wa, ʋ yelʼã a ba taw a Pol wɩ nɩ a sↄdaalsɩ yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ.
44021035	A mɩnɛ ba na ta a yir dofʋ jie, a nɩbɛ nyɩrɩ̃ na dama yaw, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a sↄdaalsɩ ɓↄw a Pol do nɩ,
44021036	a-na-ɩ a nɩ-yaw tuure na ɩ̃ wuure yele a ba kú ʋ.
44021037	A lɛ ba na kpɛɛrɛ nɩ a Pol a sↄdaalsɩ yir pʋↄ, ʋ yelʼã a sↄdaalsɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ: “Ɩ̃ na tʋↄ na ƴɛr fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ mɩɩ?” A nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ soor ʋ: “Fʋ wono na a Gɩrɛkɩ ƴɛrɩ̃?
44021038	A lɛ ʋ, faa ɩ a ʋna Ejibti nɩrɛ na dãa ir a nɩbɛ a daar kãw a ba jɛbɛ nɩ sɩ wa? A ʋlↄ na dãa taw a nɩ-bebe ture anaan kpɛ nɩ a wɛkar pʋↄ wa?”
44021039	A Pol yel ʋ: “Ɩ̃ ɩ na a Jufi nɩrɛ ba na dↄw a Tarsɩ na be a Sɩlɩsɩ wɩɛr. Ɩ̃ ɩ na a tẽ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩrɛ. Ɩ̃ sʋↄr fʋ na, kʋ ma sↄr ɩ̃ ƴɛrʼɩ̃ a nɩbɛ.”
44021040	A sↄdaalsɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ kʋ ʋ a sↄr, a Pol ɩraa a dofʋ jie juu ɩ̃ tur a nɩbɛ a nuu a ba ŋma gʋmↄ, ʋ ƴɛrɛ ba nɩ a Eburo ƴɛrɩ̃.
44022001	“Ɩ̃ yɛɛr nɩ ɩ̃ sãa nʋmↄ! Nyɩ́ cɛlɛ a ɩ̃ yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ na miile nyɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na.”
44022002	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na wõ a Pol ʋ ƴɛrɛ nɩ ba a Eburo ƴɛrɩ̃, ba lɛ nyɩrɩ̃ na sine cɩcɩ.
44022003	Ʋ yel ba: “Ɩ̃ ɩ na Jufi nɩrɛ ba na dↄw a Tarsɩ a Sɩlɩsɩ wɩɛr, ɩ̃-cɛ a ka a Jerujalɛm ba dãa guol ma. A Gamalɩɛl ɩ̃ dãa ɩ a ɩ̃ jãjaana na ʋ miil ma a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ ƴɛr-kpɛn ɩ̃ bↄ̃w vɩlaa. A mɩnɛ a nyɩ jaa na ɓĩɓine a Naaŋmɩn ɩnɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, a maa mɩ, lɛ ɩ̃ mɩ dãa be.
44022004	Ɩ̃ dãa na nyɩrɩ̃ hʋↄlↄ a bala na de a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sↄr, kúrↄ nɩ a ŋmɛɛ. Ɩ̃ ma nyↄↄrʼã a dabsɩ nɩ a pↄↄbↄ lũ nɩ a bↄ̃jↄrɩ̃sɩ ƴↄ̃w a kasu pʋↄ.
44022005	A baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a ni-dierbe ba jaa na tʋↄ na yel a yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yel. A ba jie ɩ̃ dãa pↄw a sɛbsɩ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ cenʼɩ̃ na kʋ a sɩmɩ Jufisɩ yɛɛr na be a Damasɩ, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na tʋↄ nyↄↄr a bala na be a be na de a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sↄr, lũ nɩ a bↄ̃jↄrɩ̃sɩ wa nɩ a Jerujalɛm a ba kpãa ba.
44022006	“Ɩ̃ be na a sↄr pʋↄ cere na ɩ̃ pɩɛlɛ a Damasɩ, ɩ̃ a mↄtↄ̃-tuo daar, a cãa kpɛ̃ɛ yi na a saꞋlon a jie naan ɩ̃ wa pↄw ma,
44022007	ɩ̃ lo a tene ɩ̃ wõ a kↄkɩr na yele ma: ʻSol, Sol, bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a fʋ hʋↄlↄ ma a lɛ?ʼ
44022008	Ɩ̃ soor ʋ: ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ala fʋ ɩ?ʼ Ʋ yel ma: ʻƖ̃ ɩ na a Najarɛtɩ Jeeju fʋ na hʋↄlↄ.ʼ
44022009	A bala ɩ̃ na lãa be nɩ, ba nyɛ na a cãa ɩ̃-cɛ baa wõ a ʋlↄ na ƴɛrɛ nɩ ma kↄkɩr wa.
44022010	Ɩ̃ lɛ soor ʋ na: ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ! Bõ ɩ̃ sɛw ɩ̃ maal?ʼ A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ma: ʻIr cen a Damasɩ. A be, ba na miil fʋ na a ala a jaa a Naaŋmɩn na ƴↄ̃w fʋ a fʋ na maal.ʼ
44022011	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a cãa ʋlↄ na caarɩ̃ pↄw ma a maa lɛ nyɛrɛ wa, a bala na lãa be nɩ ma nyↄw ma na a nuu taw cenʼɩ̃ na kpɛ nɩ a Damasɩ.
44022012	“Daba be na be ba na bʋↄlↄ a Ananɩya. Ʋ puoro na a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ mɩ jↄrↄ a ʋ ƴɛr-kpɛn, a Jufisɩ ba jaa na be a Damasɩ mɩ ƴↄnↄ ʋ na.
44022013	Ʋ wa na a ɩ̃ sɛ̃ na ɩraa a ɩ̃ lõboorɩ̃ ɩ̃ yel ma: ʻƖ̃ yɛbɛ Sol, a fʋ mimie a lɛ yuo!ʼ A jie naan, a mimie lɛ yuo na ɩ̃ nyɛ ʋ.
44022014	Ʋ yel ma: ʻA sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ Naaŋmɩn de na nĩe vɛl fʋ ir a fʋ na bↄ̃w a ʋ pʋ-tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ, ɩ̃ nyɛ a ʋlↄ na ɩ a Yel-mɩ̃ɛ Sʋbↄ, ɩ̃ wõ a ʋ kↄkɩr.
44022015	A-na-ɩ fʋ sɛw na na ƴɛrɛ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ ba jaa miile nɩ ba a ala fʋ na nyɛ ɩ̃ wõ.
44022016	Ɩ̃ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a fʋ cãa jɛ? Ir a ba mʋr fʋ a kʋ̃ↄ, a fʋ bʋↄlↄ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yuor, ʋ pɛw a fʋ maal-faar bar.ʼ
44022017	-
44022018	“Ɩ̃ lɛ lɩɛbʼã cen a Jerujalɛm, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na be a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ puoro, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nyɩr ma na ɩ̃ yel ma: ʻIr pↄw yi fↄfↄw a Jerujalɛm a-na-ɩ baa sↄwrↄ a ala fʋ na ƴɛrɛ a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ wa.ʼ
44022019	Ɩ̃ ɩ̃ yelʼã: ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ba bↄ̃w na vɩlaa a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na dãa yʋↄrↄ a ba puorfʋ yie nyↄwrↄ a bala na sↄw de fʋ ƴↄnↄ a kasu pʋↄ, a ba fↄbↄ ba.
44022020	A daar ʋlↄ ba na dãa kúrↄ a Ɩtɩɛn na mana a nɩbɛ a fʋ yel-mɩ̃ɛ, a maa mɩ̃ɛ mɩ dãa na be be ɩ̃ mɩ sↄw a ba kú ʋ, ɩ̃ gu a bala na kúrↄ ʋ cẽcene.ʼ
44022021	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ma na: ʻGen, a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ tʋ̃ fʋ na a fʋ na cen a nɩdaa a nɩ-bʋlsɩ jie.ʼ ”
44022022	A nɩbɛ cɛlʼã a Pol wa ta nɩ a ʋna ƴɛr-bir ʋ na ƴɛr. Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ ba na wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃, ba nyɩrɩ̃ na ƴɛrɛ nↄ-kpɛn yele: “Ɩ a daba na ʋ bↄr ka a tẽw pʋↄ! Aa sɛw ʋ na cãa tɛrɛ mimir wa!”
44022023	A mɩnɛ ba na cãa ƴɛrɛ a nↄ-kpɛn, ɓere nɩ a ba cẽcene, Ꞌwↄ̃wnↄ nɩ a tãbuulĩ lↄbↄ bara a saꞋlon,
44022024	a sↄdaalsɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ na a ba taw a Pol kpɛ nɩ a sↄdaalsɩ yir. Ʋ ƴↄ̃w na á ba fↄb ʋ ʋ miil ba a ba bↄ̃w a bom na ɩnɛ a nɩ-yaw na nyɩrɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a nↄ-kpɛn a lɛ ƴↄnↄ ʋ.
44022025	Ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛ ba na lũ a Pol a fↄbfʋ ɩnɛ, ʋ yelʼã a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na ɩraa a be: “Nyɩ tɛrɛ na sↄr na fↄb a Orom nɩrɛ a pↄrↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a baa guor a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa mɩɩ?”
44022026	A mɩnɛ a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃, ʋ cenʼã na yel a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ: “Mɩnɛ fʋ na ɩ? A-na-ɩ a daba na ɩ na a Orom nɩrɛ.”
44022027	A sↄdaalsɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ cen a Pol sɛ̃ na soor ʋ: “A fʋ̃ʋ! A Orom nɩrɛ fʋ ɩ mɩɩ?” A Pol sↄw.
44022028	A sↄdaalsɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ʋ: “A maa, libi-yaw ɩ̃ ir a ba lɩɛbʼɩ̃ ma ɩ̃ ɩ a Orom nɩrɛ.” Ɩ̃-cɛ a Pol yel ʋ: “A maa ʋlↄ, a lɛ ba dↄw ma.”
44022029	A jie naan, a bala na dãa bʋↄrↄ ba fↄb ʋ bar ʋ na. A sↄdaalsɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ mɩ, dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw ʋ na a mɩnɛ ʋ na nyɛ bↄ̃w ka a Pol ɩ na a Orom nɩrɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ dãa ɩ a ba lũ ʋ.
44022030	A dɩvɩɛ bio, a mɩnɛ a sↄdaalsɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na bʋↄrↄ ʋ bↄ̃w bↄ̃w a bom na ɩnɛ a Jufisɩ na ƴↄnↄ a Pol a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, ʋ ɩ na a ba Ꞌlor ʋ bar, ɩ̃ tʋ̃ yel a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a Jufisɩ ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ ba jaa a ba duo, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ pãa taw a Pol suu cenʼɩ̃ a ba nii-sↄw.
44023001	A Pol Ꞌwuorʼã a ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ ɩ̃ yel: “Yɛɛr, Ɩ̃ tɛrɛ na a tɩɛrʋ̃ jom cere nɩ a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw wa ta nɩ a dɩnaa bibirʼã.”
44023002	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Ananɩya na ɩ a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yelʼã a bala na pɩɛl a Pol a ba ɓa ʋ nʋↄr pʋↄ.
44023003	A Pol yel ʋ: “Fʋna dacin pɩlaa na! A Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ na ɓa fʋ. Fʋ jɛ na ka de a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn guoro nɩ a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ na fʋ lɛ sãwna a ana ƴɛr-kpɛn na fʋ yel a ba ɓa ma.”
44023004	A bala na ɩraa a be yelʼã a Pol: “A Naaŋmɩn baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ fʋ tʋrↄ?”
44023005	A Pol yel ba: “Yɛɛr! Maa dãa bↄ̃w ka ʋ ɩ na Naaŋmɩn baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ wa. A-na-ɩ a yelʼã a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: ʻTaa ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛr-fãa ƴↄnↄ a fʋ nɩbɛ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ wa.ʼ ”
44023006	A Pol bↄ̃w ka a ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ ŋmɛɛ ɩ na a Saduse nɩbɛ ɩ̃ a ŋmɛɛ ɩ a Farɩsɩ. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ ƴɛrʼɩ̃ kpɛ̃w a ba nii-sↄw: “Yɛɛr, Farɩsɩ nɩrɛ ɩ̃ ɩ, a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ na dↄw. A tɩɛrʋ̃ son ɩ̃ na tɛrɛ áa nɩbɛ na irʼã a kũu pʋↄ, ala ɩnɛ ba guoro ma.”
44023007	A mɩnɛ ʋ na ƴɛr a lɛ, a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ nɩ a Saduse nɩbɛ faa na taa ɩ̃ ŋma kpee kpee,
44023008	a-na-ɩ a Saduse nɩbɛ ma yelʼã á kũusɩ ma ire a kũu pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃ ma mɩ yel áa Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ nɩ a sɩɩr ma mɩ be be wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ tɩɛrɛ na áa jaa be na be.
44023009	A gↄ̃-pↄↄr nyɩrɩ̃ na duoro, ɩ̃ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄↄnbↄ ŋmɛɛ na ɓã a Farɩsɩ nɩbɛ irʼã ma sↄw wa, ɩ̃ yel: “Saa nyɛ a daba na sãwfʋ jie wa. A nʋmↄ-wa-sↄw a sɩɛ bom ʋ nyɛ ʋ ƴɛrʼɩ̃ ʋ, mɩɩ a sɩ-tʋnaa ɩ̃ ƴɛrʼɩ̃ ʋ.”
44023010	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a faa-taa na nyɩrɩ̃ kpɛmɛ, dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw na a sↄdaalsɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋ tɩɛr beeka ba na taw na a Pol ɓɛl, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ yel a sↄdaalsɩ a ba suu cen na faa a Pol a nɩ-yaw sↄ̃w wɩ nɩ a sↄdaalsɩ yir.
44023011	A dɩvɩɛ bio tɩsↄw, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nyɩrʼã a Pol ɩ̃ yel ʋ: “Tɛrɛ Ꞌlafʋ! A mɩnɛ fʋ na dãa ƴɛr a yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ a ka a Jerujalɛm, a sɛw na a fʋ na mɩ ƴɛr a lɛ a OrIↄm-tẽw pʋↄ.”
44023012	A bio vɩɛ na, a Jufisɩ duo goro taa. Ba pↄrↄ na yele nɩ: “Saa dɩrɛ bom wa, saa mɩ nyuure bom wa, wa tara nɩ a lɛ sɩ na kúrↄ a Pol.”
44023013	A bala na goro taa po na nɩbɛ lɩjaayi.
44023014	Ba cenʼã a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a Jufisɩ ni-dierbe jie na yel ba: “Sɩ pↄ na ƴↄ̃w a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ a saa dɩrɛ bom wa, wa tara nɩ a lɛ sɩ na kúrↄ a Pol.
44023015	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a nyɩmɩ nɩ a ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ, nyɩ́ sʋↄr a sↄdaalsɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ a ʋ taw a Pol wa nɩ a nyɩ jie, maala nɩ wↄ̃ taa nɩ nyɩ bʋↄrↄ na nyɩ Ꞌlo bↄ̃w a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ par. Ɩ̃ a sɩmɩ, sɩ na gu ʋ na a sↄr pʋↄ na sɩ kú ʋ, ʋ kↄ̃ ta a nyɩ jie wa.”
44023016	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Pol arbile wõ na a ʋna gorfʋ, ɩ̃ een a sↄdaalsɩ yir na kpɛ man kʋ a Pol.
44023017	A Pol bʋↄlʼã a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ kãw yel ʋ: “Taw a polbile na cenʼɩ̃ a fʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ jie, a-na-ɩ ʋ tɛrɛ na ƴɛrɩ̃ na ƴɛr ʋ.”
44023018	A sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ taw ʋ a ba lãa cen a sↄdaalsɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sɛ̃, ʋ yel ʋ: “A Pol sɩ na tɛrɛ a ka a kasu pʋↄ, ʋlↄ ɩ̃ bʋↄl ma yel á ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a polbile na wa nɩ a fʋ sɛ̃, a ʋ tɛrɛ na ƴɛrɩ̃ na ƴɛr fʋ.”
44023019	A nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ taw a polbile ʋlↄ yi nɩ ji-kpee ɩ̃ soor ʋ: “Bõ ƴɛrɩ̃ fʋ tɛrɛ ƴɛrɛ ma?”
44023020	Ʋ yel ʋ: “A Jufisɩ guorʼã taa a ba na sʋↄr fʋ na a fʋ taw a Pol wɩ nɩ a bio a ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ nii-sↄw, bɛlɛ nɩ fʋ a ba bʋↄrↄ na ba lɛ soor ʋ bↄ̃w a ƴɛrɩ̃ par.
44023021	Ɩ̃-cɛ, taa sↄw wa. A-na-ɩ a ba nɩbɛ po na lɩjaayi na sɛw ba var gu ʋ. Ba pↄ na ƴↄ̃w a ba mɩ̃ɛ a baa dɩrɛ bom wa, a baa mɩ nyuure bom wa, wa tara nɩ a lɛ ba na kúrↄ ʋ. Ba gbɛɛrɩ̃ na baar a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ cɛlɛ a fʋ sↄwfʋ.”
44023022	A sↄdaalsɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ kpãkpan a polbile a ʋ taa wa ƴɛrɛ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ na ƴɛr kʋ ʋ kʋrↄ nɩrɛ wa, ɩ̃ bar ʋ ʋ cen.
44023023	A sↄdaalsɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ bʋↄlʼã a ʋ sↄdaal-nɩ-bɛrɛ ayi ɩ̃ yel ba: “Nyɩ́ gbɛɛrɩ̃ sↄdaalsɩ kↄↄr ayi a Sejare cenfʋ ɩnɛ, nɩ a wibe deme lɩjaata nɩ pie, nɩ a kãpime deme kↄↄr ayi, a nyɩ cen a tɩsↄw.
44023024	Nyɩ́ mɩ de a wibe a Pol ɩnɛ ʋ na do a nyɩ cenʼɩ̃ ʋ vɩlaa a tẽ-Ꞌwuoro Felisi sɛ̃.”
44023025	Ɩ̃ ʋ sɛbʼã a sɛbɛ na tɩɩr:
44023026	“A maa Kilodi Lɩsɩyasɩ ɩ̃ tɩɩr a sɛbɛ na kʋ a fʋ̃ʋ Felisi na ɩ a tẽ-Ꞌwuoro. Ɩ̃ puor fʋ na vɩlaa.
44023027	A Jufisɩ dãa na nyↄw a daba na bʋↄrↄ ba kú ʋ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛ ɩ̃ na wõ ʋ ɩ a Orom nɩrɛ, ɩ̃ de na a ɩ̃ sↄdaalsɩ cenʼɩ̃ faa nɩ ʋ.
44023028	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ bↄ̃w a bom na ɩnɛ a Jufisɩ na ƴↄnↄ ʋ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, ɩ̃ taw ʋ na cenʼɩ̃ a ba ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ nii-sↄw,
44023029	na ɩ̃ nyɛ bↄ̃w ka a ba ƴɛr-kpɛn ɩnɛ ba ƴↄnↄ ʋ a ƴɛrɩ̃; ɩ̃-cɛ saa nyɛ sãwfʋ a ʋ jie na ƴↄnↄ ʋ a kũu pʋↄ mɩɩ a kasu pʋↄ wa.
44023030	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ɩ̃ na wõ a Jufisɩ goro a daba na, ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w na a ba taw ʋ wɩ nɩ a fʋ sɛ̃ a jie naan. Ɩ̃ mɩ yelʼã a ʋ ƴɛr-ƴↄnbↄ a ba mɩ wɩ na ƴɛr a ba ƴɛrɩ̃ a fʋ mɩ wonaa.”
44023031	A sↄdaalsɩ de na a Pol a tɩsↄw cenʼɩ̃ a Átɩpatɩrɩ, a mɩnɛ ba na yel ba.
44023032	A bio vɩɛ na, a sↄdaalsɩ bala na cere nɩ a gbɛɛ lɩɛb kule ɩ̃ bar a wibe deme a ba cere nɩ a Pol.
44023033	A lɛ ba na ta a Sejare, ba de na a sɛbɛ kʋ a tẽ-Ꞌwuoro ɩ̃ mɩ de a Pol ƴↄ̃w a ʋ nuumɩ.
44023034	A lɛ a tẽ-Ꞌwuoro na Ꞌwuor a sɛbɛ baar, ʋ soorʼã a Pol a tẽ-buor ʋ yi, ʋ yel ʋ a Sɩlɩsɩ wɩɛr ʋ yi.
44023035	A tẽ-Ꞌwuoro yel ʋ: “A fʋ ƴɛr-ƴↄnbↄ ɩ̃ wa ta, ala ɩ̃ na guor a fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃,” ɩ̃ na ʋ ƴↄ̃w a ba gu a Pol a yir kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ pʋↄ a jamana Ɛrↄdɩ na dãa mɛ.
44024001	A lɛ a bibie anuu na tↄl baar, a Ananɩya na ɩ a baar-lo-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ta na a Sejare, nɩ a ni-dierbe ŋmɛɛ, nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-mana ba na bʋↄlↄ a Tɛtiil. Ba cenʼã a tẽ-Ꞌwuoro Felisi nii-sↄw na mana a ba ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ba na tɛrɛ ƴↄnↄ a Pol.
44024002	Ba bʋↄlʼã a Pol kpɛ nɩ a be, a Tɛtiil nyↄw a ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ yel a nↄhↄ̃: “Ɩ̃ nɩ-kpɛ̃-vɩlaa, a nʋmↄ sɩ na a mɩnɛ a tẽw na ɓãa ɩ a vɩlaa a fʋ ɩnɛ. A fʋ yɛ̃ vɩlaa fʋ na tɛrɛ Ꞌwuoro nɩ a tẽw, ala ɩnɛ a tẽw cↄↄrɩ̃ lɩɛb ɩ a vɩlaa.
44024003	A nʋmↄ sɩ na a sɩ puoro fʋ vɩlaa a ala a jaa ɩnɛ sɩ na nyɛ a jiir a jaa.
44024004	Ɩ̃-cɛ maa bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ vↄw fʋ wa. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ sʋↄr fʋ na a fʋ na cɛl sɩ fɩ̃ɩ nɩ a fʋ pʋ-pɩlaa fʋ na tɛrɛ.
44024005	Sɩ nyɛ na a daba na ʋ sãwna a nɩbɛ jur yʋↄrↄ nɩ. Ʋ ma nyanyaana na a Jufisɩ a ten a jaa a ba dama taa, ɩ̃ ʋ ɩ na a Najarɛtɩ nɩbɛ ni-diere.
44024006	Ʋ mɩ dãa na bʋↄrↄ ʋ sãw a sɩ Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ, a sɩ nyↄw ʋ [bʋↄrↄ sɩ guor a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a sɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn na yel.
44024007	Ɩ̃-cɛ a sↄdaalsɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Lɩsɩyasɩ wa na na jal ʋ a sɩ nuumɩ,
44024008	ɩ̃ na ʋ ƴↄ̃w a sɩmɩ na ɩ a ʋ ƴɛr-ƴↄnbↄ a sɩ wɩ a fʋ sɛ̃.] Fʋ̃ʋ soor ʋ, a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ na tʋↄ na bↄ̃w a ala a jaa sɩ na ƴↄnↄ ʋ par.”
44024009	A Jufisɩ mɩ sↄw na áa ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala ba na ƴↄnↄ ʋ ɩ na yel-mɩ̃ɛ.
44024010	A tẽ-Ꞌwuoro kʋ na a Pol sↄr a ʋ ƴɛr, ʋ yel: “Ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka a yomo waa na fʋ na Ꞌwuoro a tẽw na, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a nʋmↄ ma na ɩ̃ na miil a ɩ̃ yel-mɩ̃ɛ a fʋ nii-sↄw.
44024011	Ɩ̃ na ta a Jerujalɛm a Naaŋmɩn puorfʋ ɩnɛ, aa po bibie pie-nʼayi wa. Fʋ na tʋↄ na soor bↄ̃w.
44024012	Baa dãa nyɛ ma ɩ̃ cɩɩrɛ taa nɩ nɩrɛ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ wa, mɩɩ ɩ̃ dama a nɩbɛ a ba puorfʋ yie, mɩɩ a tẽw pʋↄ wa.
44024013	A ala a nɩbɛ na ƴↄnↄ ma a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, baa tʋↄrↄ miile a ɩrɛɛ yel-mɩ̃ɛ wa.
44024014	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ na tʋↄ na miil fʋ a ala na ɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ: a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ Naaŋmɩn tʋn ɩ̃ tʋnↄ tuure nɩ a sↄr paalaa ʋlↄ ba na yel a jiri sↄr ʋ. Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ sↄw na a ala a jaa na sɛb a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn sɛbɛ pʋↄ, nɩ a ʋ ƴɛr-hierbe sɛbsɩ pʋↄ.
44024015	Ɩ̃ tɛrɛ na a tɩɛrʋ̃ daadaa a Naaŋmɩn jie, a mɩnɛ a bala mɩ̃ɛ na mɩ tɛrɛ: áa nɩbɛ jaa, a nɩ-sono nɩ a nɩ-faar na irʼã a kũu pʋↄ.
44024016	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ ma ƴↄ̃w na fãw ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a ɩ̃ suur cĩcĩ a daar a jaa ɩ̃ na ɩ cɛcɛ a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw nɩ a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw.
44024017	“A yomo waa na ɩ̃ na yi a Jerujalɛm, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ lɛ wa nɩ na a libie na sũo nɩ a nãw deme na be a ɩ̃ tẽw pʋↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ lo a baar kʋ a Naaŋmɩn.
44024018	A ala ɩ̃ maala a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ a ba nyɛ ma. Ɩ̃ dãa na pↄlɩ̃ a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ baar, ɩ̃ nɩ-yaw ma dãa be be wa, damfʋ ma mɩ dãa be be wa.
44024019	A Jufisɩ ŋmɛɛ na yi a Ajɩ dãa na be be. A ala ɩ ba tɛrɛ na ƴɛrɩ̃ ƴↄnↄ ma, bala ɩ̃ dãa sɛw ba wa a ka a fʋ nii-sↄw na ba ƴɛr.
44024020	Mɩɩ a nɩbɛ basɩmɛ, bá yel a sãwfʋ ʋlↄ ba na nyɛ a ɩ̃ jie a lɛdaar ɩ̃ na be a ba ƴɛr-guor-nɩ-bɛrɛ nii-sↄw,
44024021	ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a ƴɛr-bir ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na dãa ɩraa a ba sↄ̃w ɩ̃ ƴɛrʼɩ̃ a kpɛ̃w yel: ʻƖ̃ sↄw na a kũu-pʋↄ-irfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ be ka a nyɩ nii-sↄw a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ pʋↄ a dɩnaa!ʼ ”
44024022	A Felisi na bↄ̃w a Kirisi sↄr ƴɛrɩ̃ vɩlaa wɛl ba na bar ɩ̃ yel ba: “A sↄdaalsɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Lɩsɩyasɩ ɩ̃ wa wa, ɩ̃ na guorʼã a nyɩ ƴɛrɩ̃,”
44024023	ɩ̃ na ʋ ƴↄ̃w a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋ ɩ a sↄdaalsɩ a ba Ꞌwuoro a Pol, ɩ̃ ma mɩ kʋ ʋ sↄr, ɩ̃ mɩ bar a ʋ badɛɛ a ba ma wɩ sũo ʋ.
44024024	A bibie fɩ̃ɩ tↄlʼã, a Felisi lɛ wa nɩ a ʋ pↄw Dɩrɩsɩl na ɩ a Jufi nɩrɛ. Ʋ ɩ na a ba wa nɩ a Pol ʋ cɛlɛ a Jeeju-Kirisi puorfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ na ƴɛrɛ kʋrↄ ba.
44024025	Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ a Pol na cãa ƴɛrɛ a ala na ɩ a torfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃, nɩ a mɩnɛ a nɩrɛ na mɩ sɛw ʋ tɛrɛ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ, nɩ a mɩnɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ bibir nↄↄ tara, dãbɩ̃ɛ nyↄw na a Felisi, ʋ yel ʋ: “A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, fʋ na tʋↄ na cen, ɩ̃ a maa wa nyɛ vuo, ɩ̃ na lɛ bʋↄl fʋ na.”
44024026	Ɩ̃ ʋ mɩ tɩɛrʼã beeka a Pol na kʋ ʋ na libie, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ ma bʋↄlↄ ʋ tↄ̃tↄ̃tↄ̃ a ba ƴɛrɛ taa.
44024027	A lɛ a yomo ayi na tↄl baar, a jaman-kpee na dɩ a Pↄrsɩ Fɛsɩtɩsɩ wa na jew a Felisi. Ɩ̃-cɛ a-na-ɩ a Felisi bʋↄrↄ na ʋ maal a nʋmↄ a Jufisɩ, ʋ barʼã a Pol a kasu pʋↄ.
44025001	A mɩnɛ a Fɛsɩtɩsɩ na de a ʋ tʋmↄ maal bibie ata, ʋ yi na a Sejare, ɩ̃ cen a Jerujalɛm.
44025002	A be, a Jufisɩ ni-dierbe nɩ a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ man ʋ na a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala ba na tɛrɛ ƴↄnↄ a Pol.
44025003	Ba sʋↄrʼã a Fɛsɩtɩsɩ a ʋ maal bom kʋ ba: a ʋ ɩ a ba wa nɩ a Pol a Jerujalɛm, a-na-ɩ ba goro ʋ na bʋↄrↄ ba kú ʋ a sↄr pʋↄ.
44025004	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Fɛsɩtɩsɩ yel ba na áa Pol be na a kasu pʋↄ a Sejare, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ Fɛsɩtɩsɩ mɩ, áa be ʋ lɩɛbɛ cere.
44025005	Ʋ yel ba na: “Nyɩ́ ɩ a nyɩ ni-dierbe a ba pↄw ma a sɩ lãa cen a Sejare, ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a daba ʋlↄ sãw na, bá ƴↄ̃w ʋ a ƴɛrɩ̃.”
44025006	A Fɛsɩtɩsɩ maalʼã bibie anuu-nʼata mɩɩ bibie pie a ba sɛ̃, ɩ̃ lɩɛb cen a Sejare. A dɩvɩɛ bio, ʋ jɛ na a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ jie, ɩ̃ ɩ a ba taw a Pol wɩ nɩ.
44025007	Ɩ̃ a lɛ a Pol na ta, a Jufisɩ bala na yi a Jerujalɛm tiw na kolĩ ʋ, ɩ̃ ƴↄnↄ ʋ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ yaw na bɛlɩ̃, ɩ̃-cɛ baa tʋↄrↄ miile a ɩrɛ yel-mɩ̃ɛ wa.
44025008	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Pol ma sↄw wa, ɩ̃ de a ʋ yel-mɩ̃ɛ miile yele nɩ: “Maa sãw a Jufisɩ ƴɛr-kpɛn, mɩɩ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ, mɩɩ a jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa.”
44025009	A Fɛsɩtɩsɩ bʋↄrↄ na ʋ maal a nʋmↄ a Jufisɩ, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ʋ soor a Pol: “Fʋ bʋↄrↄ na fʋ cen a Jerujalɛm a fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ na guor a ɩ̃ nii-sↄw a be mɩɩ?”
44025010	A Pol yel: “Ɩ̃ be na ka a jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴɛr-guoro nii-sↄw. A ka ɩ̃ sɛw a ba na guor a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃. A ala ɩ a Jufisɩ ʋ, maa sãw a ba jie wa, a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ mɩ bↄ̃w na vɩlaa.
44025011	A ala ɩ ɩ̃ sãw na, mɩɩ ɩ̃ maalʼã a bom jaa lɛ na sɛw a ba na kú ma, maa jaara a kũu wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala ba na ƴↄnↄ ma ɩ na pↄrↄ, nɩrɛ ma tɛrɛ sↄr na ƴↄ̃w ma a ba nuu pʋↄ wa. Ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ a guor a jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ jie.”
44025012	A lɛ a Fɛsɩtɩsɩ na man taa nɩ a ʋ yɛ̃ deme baar, ʋ yelʼã a Pol: “Fʋ yelʼã a ba cenʼɩ̃ fʋ a jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ jie. A be fʋ na cen.”
44025013	A ɩ na fɩ̃ɩ, a jamana ʋlↄ na dɩ a Agɩrɩpa, lãa na wɩ nɩ a Berenisi a Sejare-tẽw a Fɛsɩtɩsɩ puorfʋ.
44025014	Ɩ̃ a-na-ɩ ba na jɛ na be kam fɩ̃ɩ, a Fɛsɩtɩsɩ de na a Pol ƴɛrɩ̃ man a Agɩrɩpa. Ʋ yel ʋ na: “Kasu sʋbↄ be na ka a Felisi na bar.
44025015	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ɩ̃ na dãa cen a Jerujalɛm, a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a Jufisɩ ni-dierbe ƴↄ̃w ʋ na a ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ mɩ sʋↄr ma a ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w ʋ a kũu ƴɛrɩ̃.
44025016	Ɩ̃-cɛ, ɩ̃ yel ba na áa Orom nɩbɛ ma ƴↄnↄ nɩrɛ kũu ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ ba taw na a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ yi nɩ a ʋ ƴɛr-ƴↄnbↄ nii-sↄw ʋ miilʼɩ̃ a ʋ yel-mɩ̃ɛ wa.
44025017	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ba pↄw ma na a sɩ lãa wa a ka. Maa bar a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ kam wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a dɩvɩɛ bio ɩ̃ jɛ na a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ jie, ɩ̃ ɩ a ba taw a daba ʋlↄ wa nɩ.
44025018	Ɩ̃ a lɛ a ʋ ƴɛr-ƴↄnbↄ na ir ɩraa, baa ƴↄ̃w ʋ a ƴɛr-faar ala ɩ̃ na dãa tɩɛrɛ wa.
44025019	Ɩ̃ a ba puorfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ tɛw ba cɩɩrɛ nɩ taa, nɩ a nɩrɛ kãw na kpi ba na bʋↄlↄ a Jeeju, ɩ̃ a Pol yele a ʋ ɩ na nɩ-mimir.
44025020	Maa bↄ̃w a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na ɩrɛ ɩ̃ mana a ƴɛr-nↄhↄ̃ wa, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ soor a Pol a ala ɩ̃ ɩ ʋ bʋↄrↄ na ʋ cen a Jerujalɛm a ba na guor a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ a be.
44025021	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Pol yelʼã a ʋ bʋↄrↄ na a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ a guor a jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ nii-sↄw. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w a ba tɛrɛ ʋ wa ta nɩ a lɛ ɩ̃ na tɩɩrɛ ʋ a ba cere nɩ ʋ a Sejaar jie.”
44025022	A Agɩrɩpa yel a Fɛsɩtɩsɩ: “A maa, ɩ̃ mɩ bʋↄrↄ na ɩ̃ wõ a ʋna daba ƴɛrɩ̃.” A Fɛsɩtɩsɩ yel ʋ: “A bio, fʋ na wõ na a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃.”
44025023	A dɩvɩɛ bio, a Agɩrɩpa nɩ a Berenisi wɩ na kpɛɛrɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ƴɛrfʋ die pʋↄ miile a ba mɩ̃ɛ a ba pɛwrɛ ba. A sↄdaalsɩ nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a tẽw nɩ-bɛrɛ mɩ pↄw ba na kpɛ nɩ, ɩ̃ a Fɛsɩtɩsɩ ƴↄ̃w a ba taw a Pol wɩ nɩ.
44025024	A Fɛsɩtɩsɩ yel: “A fʋ̃ʋ jamana Agɩrɩpa nɩ a nyɩmɩ nyɩ jaa sɩ na lãa be nɩ a ka, nyɩ nyɛ na a daba na, a ʋlↄ a Jufisɩ ba jaa ƴↄnↄ a ƴɛrɩ̃, a be a Jerujalɛm nɩ a ka mɩ, wuure nɩ kpɛ̃w yele nɩ a Ꞌwaa sɛw na cãa ɩ nɩ-mimir wa.
44025025	Ɩ̃-cɛ a maa, ɩ̃ nyɛ na bↄ̃w ka Ꞌwaa maal fãa a sɩ na ƴↄ̃w ʋ a kũu pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃ a-na-ɩ ʋ sʋↄrʼã a ba cenʼɩ̃ ʋ a jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ jie, ɩ̃ yelʼã áa be ba na cenʼɩ̃ ʋ.
44025026	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na ma bↄ̃w vɩlaa a ala na sɛw ɩ̃ na sɛb kʋ a jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ a ʋ ɩnɛ wa, ɩ̃ taw ʋ na wa nɩ a fʋ̃ʋ jamana Agɩrɩpa nii-sↄw, nɩ a nyɩmɩ nyɩ jaa nii-sↄw, a mɩnɛ a nyɩmɩ wa soor ʋ baar, ɩ̃ bↄ̃w a ala na sɛw ɩ̃ sɛb tɩɩr.
44025027	A-na-ɩ ɩ̃ tɩɛrʼã bↄ̃w ka aa vɩɛlɛ a sɩ na tɩɩr a kasu sʋbↄ ɩ̃ ma tɩɩr sɛbɛ miilʼɩ̃ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala sɩ na ƴↄ̃w ʋ wa.”
44026001	A Agɩrɩpa yelʼã a Pol: “Fʋ tɛrɛ na sↄr na ƴɛr a fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃.” A Pol tur a nuu ɩ̃ man a ʋ yel-mɩ̃ɛ na ʋ yel:
44026002	“Jamana Agɩrɩpa, a nʋmↄ ma na ɩ̃ na miil a ɩ̃ yel-mɩ̃ɛ a fʋ nii-sↄw a dɩnaa, a ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ a jaa ɩnɛ a Jufisɩ na ƴↄ̃w ma.
44026003	A-na-ɩ fʋ bↄ̃w na a Jufisɩ sↄɛ a jaa nɩ a ala ba na ma cɩɩrɛ nɩ taa, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ sʋↄr fʋ na a fʋ na cɛlɛ ma nɩ su-nyↄwraa.
44026004	“A Jufisɩ ba jaa bↄ̃w na a ɩ̃ maalfʋ, a ɩ̃ bibile daar wa ta nɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na; ba bↄ̃w na a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na dãa be a korĩ-cɛ a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ nɩbɛ sↄ̃w, nɩ a Jerujalɛm-tẽw pʋↄ.
44026005	A kamʼã ba na bↄ̃w ma, ɩ̃ a bala ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ, ba na tʋↄ na yel a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na dãa be a Farɩsɩ ji-gbulĩ ʋlↄ pʋↄ na nyɩrɩ̃ cɛ̃pɛrɛ a sɩ puorfʋ ƴɛr-kpɛn.
44026006	Ɩ̃ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na go, ba ƴↄnↄ ma na a ƴɛrɩ̃ a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ tɩɛrɛ na a pʋlɩ̃fʋ ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na dãa pʋlɩ̃ nɩ a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ.
44026007	A ʋna pʋlɩ̃fʋ naa a sɩ bal pie-nʼayi bʋↄrↄ ba pↄw, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ba nyɩrɩ̃ tʋnↄ a puorfʋ tʋmↄ a tɩsↄw nɩ a mↄtↄ̃w. Ɩ̃ jamana, a ʋna pʋlɩ̃fʋ ɩnɛ a Jufisɩ ƴↄnↄ ma a ƴɛrɩ̃.
44026008	Bõ ɩ a nyɩmɩ na ɩ a Jufisɩ maa sↄw áa Naaŋmɩn ma irʼã a kũusɩ yi nɩ a kũu pʋↄ wa?
44026009	“A maa mɩ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ dãa na tɩɛr bↄ̃w ka a sɛw na ɩ̃ na maal yele yayaw na sãw nɩ a Najarɛtɩ Jeeju yuor.
44026010	A lɛ ɩ̃ dãa maal a Jerujalɛm. A baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ kʋ ma na sↄr ɩ̃ nyↄwrↄ a Naaŋmɩn nɩbɛ yayaw ƴↄnↄ a kasu pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a bala ɩ̃ kʋrↄ ba, ɩ̃ ma mɩ sↄw na.
44026011	Gbɛɛ yayaw ɩ̃ cenʼã a puorfʋ yie na kpãa ba, bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ fɛr ba a ba sãw a Jeeju-Kirisi yuor. A suur ɩ̃ na nyɩrɩ̃ nyɛ nɩ ba maal ma na ɩ̃ hʋↄl ba wa ta nɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ ten pʋↄ.
44026012	“A ala ɩ̃ dãa maala a lɛdaar a baar-lo-nɩ-bɛrɛ na kʋ ma a sↄr, ɩ̃ tʋ̃ ma ɩ̃ cere a Damasɩ.
44026013	Ɩ̃ jamana, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na be a sↄr pʋↄ cere a mↄtↄ̃-tuo, a cãa yi na a saꞋlon caarɩ̃ kolĩ ma nɩ a bala ɩ̃ na lãa cere nɩ, ɩ̃ nyɩnyɩlɛ gãw a mↄtↄ̃w.
44026014	A sɩ jaa lo na a tene ɩ̃ ɩ̃ wõ na a kↄkɩr na ƴɛrɛ nɩ ma a Eburo ƴɛrɩ̃: ʻSol, Sol, bõ ɩ̃ ɩ a fʋ hʋↄlↄ ma a lɛ? Fʋ̃ʋ lɩɛb maala a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ bier wↄ̃ taa nɩ a naab na lɩɛb jɛbɛ nɩ a gʋraa ba na kpara nɩ ʋ.ʼ
44026015	Ɩ̃ soor ʋ: ʻNɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ala fʋ ɩ?ʼ A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel ma: ʻƖ̃ ɩ na a Jeeju fʋ na hʋↄlↄ.
44026016	Ɩ̃-cɛ, ir ɩraa. Ɩ̃ nyɩr fʋ na na ƴↄ̃w fʋ a fʋ na ɩ a ɩ̃ tʋ̃tʋnↄ, naa fʋ mana a ala fʋ na nyɛ a dɩnaa kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ mɩ mana ba a ala ɩ̃ na lↄↄ miile fʋ.
44026017	Ɩ̃ na faa fʋ na a Jufisɩ jie nɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ bala jie ɩ̃ na tʋnↄ fʋ.
44026018	Ɩ̃ tʋnↄ fʋ na a fʋ na yuo ba a mimie, a ba na yi a libe pʋↄ ɩ̃ kpɛ a cãa pʋↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ yi a Satã fãw pʋↄ ɩ̃ kpɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ, a ba na sↄw de ma, a Naaŋmɩn na de a ba maal-faar bar kʋ ba, ɩ̃ a ba kpɛ a Naaŋmɩn nɩbɛ pʋↄ nyɛ a jɩnaafʋ jie.ʼ
44026019	“Jamana Agɩrɩpa! A ala ɩnɛ, maa jaar a saꞋlon sɩɛ bom ɩ̃ na nyɛ wa.
44026020	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ de na nĩe ƴɛr a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋ a Damasɩ-tẽw nɩbɛ, nɩ a Jerujalɛm tẽ-deme, ɩ̃ mɩ ƴɛr kʋ a Jude nɩbɛ ba jaa lãa nɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ a ba lɩɛb a ba yɛ̃ ɩ̃ tuure a Naaŋmɩn, maala nɩ a tʋmↄ ala na miile a ba yɛ̃ lɩɛbfʋ.
44026021	A ala ɩnɛ a Jufisɩ nyↄw ma a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ bʋↄrↄ ba kú ma.
44026022	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn sũo ma na wa ta nɩ a dɩnaa ɩ̃ na cãa ɩraa a ka, mana a ɩ̃ yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋrↄ a nɩ-kↄmsɩ nɩ a nɩ-bɛrɛ jaa. Maa ƴɛrɛ bom kpee ɩ̃ ma ɩ a ala a ƴɛr-hierbe nɩ a Mowisi na dãa yel áa na ta na wa.
44026023	Ba yelʼã áa Kirisi sɛw na na nyɛ a hʋʋr ɩ̃ ɩ a dãdãw sʋbↄ na ire a kũu pʋↄ, na ʋ miile nɩ a faafʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ ɩrɛɛ cãa a sɩ nɩbɛ jie nɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ jie.”
44026024	A mɩnɛ a Pol na cãa mana a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ a lɛ, a Fɛsɩtɩsɩ ƴɛrʼã nɩ kpɛ̃w yel: “Pol, fʋ yaara na! A bↄ̃wfʋ fʋ na nyɩrɩ̃ tɛrɛ maal fʋ na a fʋ bↄr juu!”
44026025	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Pol yel ʋ: “Ɩ̃ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, maa bↄr juu wa. A ala ɩ̃ na ƴɛrɛ ɩ na a yɛ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃.
44026026	A jamana bↄ̃w na a ana tʋmↄ par, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ bar nyãa ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a ʋ nii-sↄw. Ɩ̃ bↄ̃w na bↄ̃w ka bom ma be be ʋ na ma bↄ̃w wa, a-na-ɩ a ana yele ma dãa maal a lõkor pʋↄ wa.
44026027	Jamana Agɩrɩpa, fʋ sↄw na a ala a ƴɛr-hierbe na sɛb mɩɩ? Ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka fʋ sↄw na.”
44026028	A Agɩrɩpa yel a Pol: “Fʋ bʋↄrↄ na fʋ tↄↄ lɩɛb ma a lɛ a daadaa ɩ̃ ɩ a Kirisi nɩrɛ mɩɩ?”
44026029	A Pol yel: “A ala ɩ a daadaa ʋ, mɩɩ a na kamʼã, Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ sʋↄrↄ, ɩ̃ aa ɩ a fʋ̃ʋ fʋ yẽ ɩnɛ ʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩ jaa na cɛlɛ ma a dɩnaa, a nyɩ na tʋↄ lɩɛb wↄ̃ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na wↄ̃. Ɩ̃-cɛ a bↄ̃jↄrɩ̃sɩ na tɛw, maa bʋↄrↄ ba ƴↄ̃w nyɩ a ɩ̃ kaarɩ̃ wa.”
44026030	A jamana nɩ a tẽ-Ꞌwuoro nɩ a Berenisi lãa nɩ a bala ba jaa na dãa jɛ a be irʼã
44026031	ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na yi baar ba yele na taa: “A daba na ma maal fãa a ba na ƴↄ̃w ʋ a kũu pʋↄ mɩɩ a kasu pʋↄ wa.”
44026032	A Agɩrɩpa yel a Fɛsɩtɩsɩ: “A daba na ɩ̃ ma dãa sʋↄr a ba cenʼɩ̃ ʋ a jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ jie wa, sɩ naa tʋↄ na bar ʋ.”
44027001	A lɛ ba na ƴↄ̃w sɩ a sɩ kpɛ a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ cere a Ɩtalɩ, ba de na a Pol nɩ a kasu deme ŋmɛɛ kʋ a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Juliisi, na ɩ a Orom jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ sↄdaalsɩ ƴen sʋbↄ.
44027002	Sɩ kpɛ na a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ kãw na yi a Adɩramɩtɩ na sɛw ʋ lara a Ajɩ man, na sɩ cere. Ɩ̃ a Arɩsɩta na ɩ a Tɛsaloniki-tẽw nɩrɛ na be a Masɛdↄn wɩɛr pↄw sɩ na lãa cenʼɩ̃.
44027003	A dɩvɩɛ bio sɩ ta na a Sɩdↄ̃, ɩ̃ a Juliisi na maala a Pol a vɩlaa, kʋ ʋ na sↄr ʋ cen a ʋ badɛɛ jie a ba sũo ʋ.
44027004	A lɛ sɩ na yi a be, sɩ lara na a Sɩpɩr-tẽw lõboor a-na-ɩ a sɛsɛb tuoro sɩ na.
44027005	Sɩ kpɛ na a man sↄ̃w tↄl yi a Sɩlɩsɩ nɩ a Pãfɩlɩ ɩ̃ ta a Mɩɩra na be a Lɩsɩ wɩɛr.
44027006	A be, a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nyɛ na a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ na yi a Alɛsãdiri ɩ̃ cere a Ɩtalɩ, ɩ̃ ɩ a sɩ kpɛ.
44027007	A bibie waa na sɩ na cere a vɛrɛtɛtɛ a wõ sɩ, ɩ̃ a sɩ pãa ta a Sɩnɩdɩ-tẽw. A mɩnɛ a sɛsɛb na ma kʋrↄ sɩ sↄr a sɩ cere a dẽdẽ wa, sɩ tↄlʼã kolĩ a Salmↄne-tẽw naa sɩ nyɛ a pĩfʋ jie a Kɩrɛtɩ-tẽw lõboorɩ̃.
44027008	Sɩ lara na a ʋna tẽw lõboor cere a wõ sɩ, ɩ̃ a sɩ pãa ta a gbor-bɛrɛ ɩraafʋ jie ba na bʋↄlↄ a Gbor ɩraafʋ ji-vɩlaa na pɩɛl a Lase-tẽw.
44027009	Sɩ kamʼã a sↄr pʋↄ, a lɩɛb ɩ sɩ jãjĩ a gbor cenɩfʋ, a-na-ɩ a nʋↄr lũfʋ bibir mɩ tↄlʼã po. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Pol kpãkpan ba,
44027010	yel: “Ɩ̃ badɛɛ, ɩ̃ nyɛ na bↄ̃w ka a sɩ cenfʋ na na ɩ sɩ na bier yayaw. A gbor nɩ a yele na wɛ na, nɩ a sɩmɩ mɩ.”
44027011	Ɩ̃-cɛ a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ cɛlʼã a gbor-vɛlɛ nɩ a gbor sʋbↄ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ gãw a Pol ƴɛrɩ̃.
44027012	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a gbor ɩraafʋ jie na ma vɩɛlɛ a ba na ɩraa a be a sɩ̃ɛw wa, a nɩbɛ yaw jie a gbor pʋↄ yele na á bá yi a be ɩ̃ dɩ tuo ta a Fenikisi na ba jɛ a be a sɩ̃ɛw. A-na-ɩ a Fenikisi ɩ na a Kɩrɛtɩ-tẽw gbor ɩraafʋ jie na be a mↄtↄ̃w mʋrfʋ jie gʋbaa nɩ a dʋrɩ̃ lõboorɩ̃.
44027013	A mɩnɛ a sɛsɛb bile na yi a tẽw parɩ̃ ɩ̃ fure, ba tɩɛrʼã bↄ̃w ka ba na tʋↄ na maal a ala ba na bʋↄrↄ, ɩ̃ na ba nyↄw a kur ʋlↄ na nyↄw a gbor ɩraa nɩ for bar ɩ̃ na ba lara a Kɩrɛtɩ-tẽw cere.
44027014	Ɩ̃ a ɩ na fɩ̃ɩ, a sɛsɛb kpɛ̃ɛ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Erakɩlↄ̃ yi na a tãw juu ɩ̃ suu
44027015	de a gbor cere nɩ, a Ꞌwaa lɛ tʋↄrↄ toro a sɛsɛb wa, a sɩ bɩl faa ɩ̃ bar a sɛsɛb ʋ de sɩ cere nɩ.
44027016	A mɩnɛ sɩ na ta a tẽ-bile ba na bʋↄlↄ a Kiloda, ʋ pĩ sɩ na fɩ̃ɩ a sɩ ƴↄ̃w fãw ɩ̃ ɓↄw a gbor bile sɩ na dãa tawra
44027017	ƴↄ̃w a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ su a mibe kolĩ a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃ lũ. Dãbɩ̃ɛ dãa na nyↄw sɩ a mɩnɛ sɩ na cere na kpara a biire ʋlↄ na be a Lɩbɩ-tẽw lõboorɩ̃. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ba lↄb a cẽcen kpow ƴↄ̃w a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ a tawra ba ɩ̃ bar a sɛsɛb ʋ tↄrↄ ba cere nɩ.
44027018	A dɩvɩɛ bio, a mɩnɛ a sɛsɛb na cãa dama sɩ a yaw, ba ire na a gbor yele lↄbↄ bara a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ.
44027019	A datɛrɛ daar, a gbor deme mɩ̃ɛ ire na a gbor tʋmↄ yele lↄbↄ ƴↄnↄ a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ.
44027020	A bibie waa na sɩ na ma nyɛ a mↄtↄ̃w mɩɩ a ŋmarbie wa, ɩ̃ a sɛsɛb cãa fure nɩ a kpɛ̃w a bibie a jaa, a sɩ pãa bↄ̃w ka cɩ̃ɛfʋ jie ma lɛ be be wa.
44027021	A mɩnɛ ba na be a be kam ɩ̃ ma dɩrɛ bom wa, a Pol irʼã ɩraa a ba sↄ̃w ɩ̃ yel ba: “Ɩ̃ badɛɛ, a sɛw na a nyɩ naa dãa cɛl ma, a sɩ kↄ̃ↄ dãa bar a Kɩrɛtɩ-tẽw wa; a won na kↄ̃ↄ ta wa ɩ̃ a yele asɩmɛ kↄ̃ↄ mɩ wɛ wa.
44027022	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, nyɩ́ bar nyãa. Nɩ-bõ-ƴen ma bↄrↄ wa, a gbor tɛw ɩ̃ na wɛ.
44027023	A-na-ɩ a jamɩ tɩsↄw, a Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ na sↄ ma ɩ̃ mɩ tʋnↄ a ʋ tʋn barʼã a ʋ sɩ-tʋnaa ʋ wa
44027024	yel ma: ʻPol, taa jↄrↄ dãbɩ̃ɛ wa! A sɛw na a fʋ na ɩraa a jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ nii-sↄw; ɩ̃ a fʋ ɩnɛ, a Naaŋmɩn na mɩ kʋ na a baafʋ a bala na lãa be nɩ fʋ a gbor pʋↄ.ʼ
44027025	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ badɛɛ, nyɩ́ bar nyãa, a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ tɛrɛ na ƴↄ̃w-nyãa a Naaŋmɩn jie áa na maalʼã a mɩnɛ ʋ na yel ma.
44027026	Ɩ̃-cɛ sɩ na kpa na tẽ-bile kãw pʋↄ na be a man sↄ̃w.”
44027027	Sɩ maalʼã bibie pie-nʼanaan, a sɛsɛb cãa diere sɩ cere nɩ, ɩ̃ a tɩsↄw porɩ̃, a gbor deme tɩɛrʼã beeka a sɩ tara na a tẽw kãw gbẽgbere,
44027028	ɩ̃ lↄb a miir a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ bʋↄrↄ ba bↄ̃w a mɩnɛ a kʋ̃ↄ na be, a ɩ mɛɛtɩr lɩjaayi. Ba lɛ cenʼã fɩ̃ɩ ɩ̃ lɛ lↄb, a ɩ mɛɛtɩr lɩjɛrʼɩ̃-pie.
44027029	Ba jↄrↄ na dãbɩ̃ɛ a sɩ gbor na wa ŋme kubir ɩ̃ na ba lↄb kure anaan a nyↄw a gbor a parvʋↄrɩ̃ ɩraa nɩ, ɩ̃ a ba bʋↄrↄ a bio ʋ vɩɛ.
44027030	A gbor deme bʋↄrↄ na ba yi a gbor pʋↄ jↄ faa a ba mɩ̃ɛ. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ba Ꞌlorʼã a gbor bile bar ʋ suure a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ maala nɩ wↄ̃ taa nɩ a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ kur-nyↄↄrsɩ ba lɛ lↄbↄ a nii-sↄw.
44027031	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Pol yelʼã a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a sↄdaalsɩ: “A ala ɩ a nɩbɛ na ma ɩraa ka a gbor pʋↄ wa, nyaa tʋↄrↄ cɩ̃ɛnɛ wa.”
44027032	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a sↄdaalsɩ ŋmaa a mibe ala na nyↄw a gbor bile bar, ʋ lo.
44027033	A cɛ na fɩ̃ɩ a bio na vɩɛ, ɩ̃ a Pol bʋↄrↄ na ʋ ɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa a ba dɩ a dɩb. Ʋ yelʼã: “Bibie pie-nʼanaan nɩ a dɩnaa nyɩ na cãa jɛ ɩ̃ ma dɩ a bom wa.
44027034	Ɩ̃ sʋↄr nyɩ na, nyɩ́ dɩ a dɩb a-na-ɩ a be jie nyɩ na tʋↄ cɩ̃ɛ. Nɩrɛ kãw jukↄbir bõ-ƴen ma bↄrↄ wa.”
44027035	A mɩnɛ a Pol na ƴɛr a lɛ baar, ʋ de na a buru puorʼɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn a nɩbɛ ba jaa nii-sↄw ɩ̃ ŋmaa Ꞌwↄbↄ,
44027036	a ba jaa pãa bar nyãa ɩ̃ mɩ Ꞌwↄb.
44027037	A sɩ jaa na be a gbor pʋↄ ɩ na nɩbɛ kↄↄr ayi dↄↄl lɩjaanaan ŋmaaʼnuu nɩ bõ-ƴen.
44027038	A lɛ ba na dɩ pi baar, ba lↄbʼã a buru bie ƴↄ̃w a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ ɩ̃ cɛ a gbor ʋ pe gẽe.
44027039	A lɛ a bio na vɩɛ, a gbor deme ma bↄ̃w a tẽ-buor ba na ta wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ba nyɛ na a man gↄraa a jie a biire na be, ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ a ala ɩ ba tʋↄ na, ba maal a gbor ʋ do ɩraa a be.
44027040	Ba Ꞌlorʼã a kur-nyↄↄrsɩ lↄb bar a man pʋↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ Ꞌlor a vulsɩ ala na gↄrↄ a gbor, ɩ̃ pãa yɛr a cẽcen bar a gbor nii-sↄw a sɛsɛb tↄrↄ ba cere nɩ a biire par.
44027041	Ɩ̃-cɛ ba ta na a jie na a kʋ̃ↄ na maal a biire a duo, a gbor kpa a be. A gbor nii-sↄw kpɛ na baar ma tʋↄrↄ dama wa, ɩ̃ a kʋ̃ↄ sɛsɛb ŋmeere a gbor parvʋↄr wɛlɛ.
44027042	A sↄdaalsɩ bʋↄrↄ na ba kú a kasu deme, a bõ-ƴen kↄ̃ duur jↄ cɩ̃ɛ wa.
44027043	Ɩ̃-cɛ a-na-ɩ a sↄdaal-nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ bʋↄrↄ na ʋ faa a Pol, ʋ mↄ̃w na a sↄdaalsɩ bar a ba taa maal a lɛ wa. Ɩ̃ ʋ yelʼã a bala na bↄ̃w a duurfʋ a ba de nĩe aar lo a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ duur cen na yi a gbẽgbere juu,
44027044	ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w a bala na cɛ á bá nyↄↄr a gbor daar mɩɩ a gbor yele na ba pe tuure. A lɛ ba maal, na ba ta a gbẽgbere juu faa a ba mɩ̃ɛ ba jaa.
44028001	A mɩnɛ sɩ na cɩ̃ɛ baar, ba yel sɩ na a Maltɩ a tẽw ʋlↄ dɩ.
44028002	A ʋna tẽw naa nɩbɛ maal sɩ na a vɩlaa a wa po. A mɩnɛ a saa na waara a aar ɩrɛ, ba gbↄw na vũu ƴↄ̃w sɩ a sɩ Ꞌwuoro.
44028003	A Pol vaarʼã a dali wa nɩ ƴↄnↄ a vũu pʋↄ, a dↄ̃pan be a dali pʋↄ, a vũu susuur kpɛ ʋ ʋ vilĩ a Pol nuu mar tɛɛlɛ.
44028004	A lɛ a ʋna tẽw naa nɩbɛ na nyɛ a waab ʋ gbɛ̃ɛgbɛɛlɛ a Pol nuumɩ, ba yele na taa: “A daba na sɩrɩ̃ na ɩ nɩ-kúrↄ. Ʋ saarɩ̃ na cɩ̃ɛ a man pʋↄ ɩ̃-cɛ a Torfʋ Sʋbↄ ma sↄw bar ʋ ʋ na baa wa.”
44028005	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Pol mɩrʼã a waab kpar a vũu pʋↄ ɩ̃ aa ɩ ʋ bier wa.
44028006	A nɩbɛ Ꞌwuoro na cɛlɛ nɩ a Pol nuu mↄrfʋ, mɩɩ a mɩnɛ ʋ na loro kpiire a jie naan. Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ba na Ꞌwuor kam ɩ̃ ma nyɛ a ɩ ʋ bier wa, ba lɩɛbʼã a ba tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ ɩ̃ yel á naaŋmɩn kãw ʋ ɩ.
44028007	A ʋna tẽw naa nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Pibiliisi wɩɛr pɩɛlʼã a be. Ʋ de sɩ na vɩlaa a sɩ gã a ʋ yir bibie ata.
44028008	A Pibiliisi sãa ɩ̃gan dãa na kpor ʋ ʋ gã ɩ̃ a kʋnfʋ nyↄw ʋ, ɩ̃ a Pol kpɛ na a ʋ sɛ̃, na dↄↄl ʋ a nur ɩ̃ sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w ʋ ʋ kpɛmɛ.
44028009	A mɩnɛ a ala na yi tↄ, a wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme bala na be a tẽw ʋlↄ pʋↄ mɩ wa na na nyɛ a kpɛ̃w.
44028010	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ba wa nɩ na a yel-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ na puorʼɩ̃ sɩ, ɩ̃ a daar ʋlↄ sɩ na yire diere a sↄr, ba kʋ sɩ na a yele ala na dãa sɛw nɩ sɩ.
44028011	A lɛ a cur ata na tↄl baar, sɩ de na a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ “A Naaŋmɩ̃-yɩb” na yi a Alɛsãdiri ɩ̃ dãa ɩraa a be a tẽ-bile ʋlↄ pʋↄ a sɩ̃ɛw.
44028012	Sɩ ta na a Sɩrakisi maal bibie ata,
44028013	ɩ̃ yi a be lara a tẽw kolo na ta a Eresio. A dɩvɩɛ bio, a tẽw parɩ̃ sɛsɛb fure na a sɩ maal bibie ayi a sↄr pʋↄ ɩ̃ ta a Pujↄl.
44028014	Sɩ nyɛ na a yɛɛr a be a ʋna tẽw naa pʋↄ a ba sʋↄr sɩ a sɩ jɛ maal bibie anuu-nʼayi a ba sɛ̃. A lɛ sɩ maala wa ta nɩ a Orom.
44028015	Ɩ̃ a yɛɛr na be a Orom wõ na a sɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ yi tuor sɩ a Apiisi daa pʋↄ, nɩ jie ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ a Sáanba-yie-ata. A mɩnɛ a Pol na nyɛ ba, ʋ pɛwrɛ na a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ a Ꞌlafʋ lɛ wa ʋ.
44028016	A mɩnɛ sɩ na ta a Orom, ba kʋ na a Pol a sↄr ʋ kpɛɛrɛ ʋ yẽ, nɩ a sↄdaala ʋlↄ na gure ʋ.
44028017	A lɛ a bibie ata na tↄl baar, a Pol bʋↄlʼã a Jufisɩ ni-dierbe a ba wɩ. A mɩnɛ ba na duo baar, ʋ yel ba na: “Yɛɛr, maa maal fãa a sɩ nɩbɛ jie wa, maa mɩ sãw a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ sↄɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ba nyↄw ma na a Jerujalɛm kʋ a Orom nɩbɛ,
44028018	a ba soor ma, ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ba bar ma, a-na-ɩ ba nyɛ na a ɩ maa maal fãa a sɛw a ba na kú ma wa.
44028019	Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ a Jufisɩ na ma sↄw wa, ɩ̃ bɩlʼã faa ɩ̃ sʋↄr a ba cenʼɩ̃ ma a jaman-kpɛ̃ɛ jie, ɩ̃-cɛ aa ɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ tɛrɛ ƴↄnↄ a ɩ̃ nɩbɛ wa.
44028020	A ala ɩnɛ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ nyɛ nyɩ, na ɩ̃ ƴɛrʼɩ̃ nyɩ. A-na-ɩ ba lũ nɩ ma na a bↄ̃jↄrɩ̃sɩ asɩmɛ a ʋlↄ ɩnɛ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ na gure a ʋ waa.”
44028021	A ba yel ʋ: “A Jude-tẽ-deme ma tɩɩr sɛbɛ kãw a sɩ wõ a fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa. A sɩ yɛbɛ kãw ma mɩ yi a be ɩ̃ wa man sɩ a fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃, mɩɩ ƴɛr sɩ a fʋ fãa wa.
44028022	Ɩ̃-cɛ sɩ bʋↄrↄ na fʋ man sɩ fʋ mɩ̃ɛ a ala fʋ na tɩɛrɛ, a-na-ɩ sɩ bↄ̃w na bↄ̃w ka a jiir a jaa ba Ꞌlaarʼã a nɩbɛ bala pʋↄ fʋ na be.”
44028023	Ba ƴↄ̃w na a Pol a bibir ba na lɛ waara, ɩ̃ a ʋna dayen, a nɩbɛ waa na na wɩ pↄw ʋ a jie ʋlↄ ʋ na be. Ʋ de na a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn nɩ a ƴɛr-hierbe ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ mana ba miile nɩ ba a Naaŋmɩn fãw ƴɛrɩ̃, a dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ wa ta nɩ a jaanʋↄr, bʋↄrↄ ʋ lɩɛbʼɩ̃ a ba sube a Jeeju ɩnɛ.
44028024	A ŋmɛɛ lɩɛbʼã sↄw a ala ʋ na ƴɛr ba, ɩ̃-cɛ a ŋmɛɛ ma sↄw wa.
44028025	A lɛ ba na yire ɩ̃ ma tɛrɛ a nↄ-bõ-ƴen wa, a Pol ƴɛr ba na a ƴɛr-birʼã yel: “A ƴɛrɩ̃ ala a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na ƴↄ̃w a ƴɛr-hiere Ejayi ʋ yel a nyɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ ɩ na yel-mɩ̃ɛ:
44028026	ʻCen a nɩbɛ na jie na yel ba: Nyɩ na sɩrɩ̃ na wonaa, ɩ̃ nyaa bↄ̃wnↄ a par wa. Nyɩ na sɩrɩ̃ na Ꞌwuoro, ɩ̃ nyaa nyɛrɛ wa.
44028027	A-na-ɩ a bana nɩbɛ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ lɩɛbʼã ɩ dãbol tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ. Ba ɓʋrʼã a ba tobo, ɩ̃ mɩ pↄw a ba mimie, a mɩnɛ a ba tobo kↄ̃ wa wõ bom wa, a ba mimie kↄ̃ↄ mɩ nyɛ wa, a ba kↄ̃ mɩ bↄ̃w a par, ɩ̃ lɩɛb wa a ɩ̃ jie ɩ̃ faa ba wa.ʼ
44028028	A Pol lɛ yel ba na: “Nyɩ́ bↄ̃wnaa bↄ̃w ka a Naaŋmɩn de na a ʋ faafʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ na tɩɩr kʋ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ. A bala, ba na cɛlɛ ʋ na!” [
44028029	A lɛ a Pol na ƴɛr a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ baar, a Jufisɩ wɛlʼã kule na ba faara taa.]
44028030	A Pol jɛ na a ʋna yir ʋ na dãa yara maalʼɩ̃ yomp ayi. Ʋ ma de na a bala ba jaa na wɩɛrɛ a ʋ sɛ̃,
44028031	ƴɛrɛ ba a Naaŋmɩn fãw ƴɛrɩ̃, jaana nɩ ba a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩ Ꞌlafʋ, a mɩnɛ ʋ na ƴↄ̃w nyãa.
45001001	A maa Pol na ɩ a Jeeju-Kirisi tʋ̃tʋnↄ ɩ̃ tɩɩrɛ a sɛbɛ na, a maa a Naaŋmɩn na vɛl ir ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩ-tʋnaa a ʋ ƴɛr-son hierfʋ ɩnɛ.
45001002	A Naaŋmɩn dãa na de nĩe pʋlɩ̃ nɩ sɩ a ƴɛr-son naa a ʋ ƴɛr-hierbe ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ pʋↄ, a mɩnɛ ba na dãa sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ.
45001003	A ɩ na a ʋ Bie ƴɛrɩ̃, na ɩ a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi ba na dↄw a Davɩtɩ bal pʋↄ, ʋ ɩ a nɩrɛ;
45001004	ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn miilʼɩ̃ na a ʋ fãw á ʋ ɩ na a ʋ Bie, tu nɩ a ʋ Sɩ-cɛcɛ tʋmↄ a mɩnɛ ʋ na maal ʋ ʋ ir a kũusɩ pʋↄ.
45001005	A ʋlↄ ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ pↄw na a Naaŋmɩn sũofʋ wa lɩɛb ɩ a nɩ-tʋnaa, ɩ̃ na bʋↄl a tẽ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ a jaa nɩbɛ nɩ a ʋ yuor, a ba ƴↄ̃w ʋ a nyãa, mɩ wono nɩ ʋ a toor.
45001006	A nyɩmɩ mɩ, nyɩ be na tↄ a bana nɩbɛ pʋↄ a Naaŋmɩn na bʋↄl a nyɩ na ɩ a Jeeju-Kirisi nɩbɛ.
45001007	Ɩ̃ tɩɩrɛ na a sɛbɛ na kʋrↄ a nyɩmɩ nyɩ jaa na be a Orom-tẽw, a nyɩmɩ a Naaŋmɩn na nʋnↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ ow nyɩ a kpee. A sũofʋ nɩ a pɩɛnfʋ na yi a sɩ Sãa Naaŋmɩn nɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi sɛ̃ á be a nyɩ jie.
45001008	Ɩ̃ puoro na a ɩ̃ Naaŋmɩn nɩ a Jeeju-Kirisi yuor a nyɩjaa ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ a tẽw ʋ jaa pʋↄ ba ƴɛrɛ na a nyɩ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ƴɛrɩ̃.
45001009	A Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ tʋn ɩ̃ na tʋnↄ nɩ a ɩ̃ suur ʋ jaa, hiere nɩ a ƴɛr-son ʋlↄ na yi a ʋ Bie jie, bↄ̃w ma na. Ʋ bↄ̃w na ka ɩ̃ ma tɩɛrɛ nɩ nyɩ na a daar a jaa
45001010	a lɛ ɩ̃ na ma puoro, sʋↄrↄ nɩ ʋ ma gala wa. A ala ɩ ʋ sↄw na, ɩ̃ na pãa na sɩrɩ̃ nyɛ a sↄr wɩ a be a nyɩ jie.
45001011	A-na-ɩ ɩ̃ tɩɩ na bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ nyɛ nyɩ kʋ nyɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tʋↄfʋ kãw a nyɩ na nyɩrɩ̃ tɛrɛ a kpɛ̃w.
45001012	Ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na ɩ̃ yel a lɛ, a maa wa be a nyɩ sↄ̃w, sɩ na kʋ na taa a Ꞌlafʋ, a sɩ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa sɩ na tɛrɛ ɩnɛ, a nyɩmɩ nɩ a maa.
45001013	Yɛɛr, maa bʋↄrↄ nyɩ baala wa; ɩ̃ ma tɩɛrʼɩ̃ na gbɛɛ yayaw a nyɩ jie wɩfʋ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na tʋↄ pↄw a ɩ̃ tʋmↄ wↄmↄ a nyɩ jie, wↄ̃ taa nɩ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na pↄw a wↄmↄ a tẽ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ŋmɛɛ pʋʋr; ɩ̃-cɛ maa nyɛ a sↄr wa ta nɩ a dɩnaa wa.
45001014	A-na-ɩ maa ɩ̃ sɛw na cen a yel-bↄↄnbↄ, nɩ a bala na ma bↄ̃w bom wa jie, nɩ a nɩ-kpaarsɩ nɩ a gẽgemsɩ jie.
45001015	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ tɩɩ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ wɩ nɩ a ƴɛr-son hier kʋ a nyɩmɩ mɩ na be a Orom-tẽw.
45001016	Maa jↄrↄ a vĩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son ƴɛrfʋ ɩnɛ wa, a-na-ɩ ʋ ɩ na a fãw ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na faara nɩ a nɩrɛ lɛ na sↄw ʋ: a Jufisɩ jie sɛr, nɩ a nɩ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ba jaa jie mɩ.
45001017	A-na-ɩ a ʋna ƴɛr-son jie, a Naaŋmɩn miilʼã a mɩnɛ a nɩrɛ na tʋↄrↄ toro a ʋ nii-sↄw, a mɩnɛ ʋ na nyↄw nɩ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa wa cenʼɩ̃ ta nɩ a baarfʋ daar, tu nɩ a ƴɛr-bir ʋlↄ na be a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ na yel: “A ʋlↄ na tor a Naaŋmɩn jie a ʋ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ɩnɛ, na pↄw na a baafʋ.”
45001018	Sɩ nyɛ na a Naaŋmɩn su-tuo ʋ yi a saa juu, ɩ̃ suu pↄw a maal-bi-kpansɩ nɩ a faar ala a jaa a nɩbɛ na maal, a maal-faar ala ba na piw nɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ bar.
45001019	A-na-ɩ a ala ba na tʋↄrↄ bↄ̃wnↄ a Naaŋmɩn ɩnɛ a be na cãa pʋↄ a ba nii-sↄw; a Naaŋmɩn mɩ̃ɛ miilʼɩ̃ ba na a ala.
45001020	Wa nyↄw nɩ a tẽw maalfʋ daar, a Naaŋmɩn miilʼã a mɩnɛ ʋ na wↄ̃. A ala sɩ na ma dãa tʋↄrↄ nyɛrɛ wa, yi na a cãa pʋↄ a ala ʋ na maal ɩnɛ. A lɛ bʋↄrↄ na a yel, a ʋ fãgã daadaa, nɩ a ʋ Naaŋmɩn ɩfʋ wãa. A nↄhↄ̃, nɩrɛ ma lɛ tɛrɛ ful-yifʋ jie wa.
45001021	Ba bↄ̃w na a Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃-cɛ baa kʋrↄ ʋ a ju-kpɛ̃ɛ wa; baa mɩ puoro ʋ a mɩnɛ ʋ na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn wa. A ba juu tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ lɩɛbʼã ɩ bõ-jaalsɩ, ɩ̃ a ba sube liw a baa tʋↄrↄ bↄ̃wnↄ bom wa.
45001022	Ba ma yelʼã a yɛ̃-bↄↄnbↄ ba ɩ, ɩ̃ lɩɛb ɩ dãbolo.
45001023	Ba de na a Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ na ma tɛrɛ kũu wa yo-yifʋ, na ba lɩɛb kʋrↄ a bʋtɩbɛ ala na wↄ̃ taa nɩ a nɩrɛ na wa kpiire, mɩɩ a lili, a dʋn, nɩ a wɩɩr ba na pɛrɩ̃.
45001024	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Naaŋmɩn de ba bar a ba sube yel-kpansɩ bↄfʋ pʋↄ, a ba sãwna a ba ɩ̃gana maala nɩ a vĩ yele a ba sↄ̃w.
45001025	Ba de na a Naaŋmɩn yel-mɩ̃ɛ tɛw nɩ a jiri, ɩ̃ puoro tʋnↄ nɩ a tʋmↄ kʋrↄ a ala a Naaŋmɩn na maal, ɩ̃ cɛ a Naaŋmɩn na ɩ a yel-maala bar, na ɩ a ʋlↄ na sɛw nɩ a pɛwfʋ a daar a jaa. Amɛn.
45001026	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Naaŋmɩn de ba bar a vĩ yele bↄfʋ pʋↄ. A ba pↄↄbↄ mɩ lɩɛbʼã maala a ala na ma ɩ wa, a-na-ɩ ba ma barʼã a dabsɩ ɩ̃ lɩɛb bʋↄrↄ taa a ba nɩ̃ɛ.
45001027	A lɛ ʋ mɩ a dabsɩ jie. Ba ma barʼã a pↄↄbↄ, ɩ̃ lɩɛb pebe a ba dab-tↄ. A daba nɩ a ʋ dab-tↄ maala na a vĩ yele, pↄwrↄ nɩ a kpãafʋ ala na sɛw nɩ ba a ba burbur ɩnɛ.
45001028	A mɩnɛ ba na ma nyɛ a Naaŋmɩn bↄ̃wfʋ ʋ ɩ ba son wa, a Naaŋmɩn de ba na bar a ba tɩɛrɩ̃-saansɩ pʋʋr, a ba maala a ala na ma vɩɛlɛ wa.
45001029	Ba bↄ̃w na a gõgolĩfʋ tʋmↄ a jaa: a maal-fãa, a nɩbɛ yele jɩɛlfʋ, nɩ a bier maalfʋ. Ba mɩ sɛw nɩ na a nyuur, ɩ nɩ a nɩ-kúrbↄ, faara nɩ taa, bɛlɛ nɩ taa, tɛrɛ nɩ a tɩɛrɩ̃-bebe, mɩ cile nɩ taa.
45001030	Ba ma mɩ koro na taa, Ꞌlaarʼɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn, mɩ kpɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛ, bʋↄrↄ nɩ a ju-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a yuor. Ba bↄ̃w na a mɩnɛ ba na fʋ̃fʋlↄ ɩ̃ maala a bier, ɩ̃ mɩ wõw a toor a ba dↄↄrbↄ jiir.
45001031	Baa tɛrɛ bↄ̃wfʋ wa, ɩ nɩ a nɩ-gõgolĩsɩ, mɩ kpɛ nɩ a bɩcɩɩr, ma mɩ tɛrɛ nã-bↄ̃wfʋ wa.
45001032	Ba bↄ̃w na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ na yel áa bala na maala a lɛ sɛw nɩ na a kũu. Ɩ̃-cɛ ba cãa na maala a ala, ɩ̃ mɩ kpɩ́ire a bala na mɩ maala a lɛ.
45002001	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a nɩ-bõ lɛ fʋ na ɩ ɩ̃ guoro a nɩrɛ kãw ƴɛrɩ̃, faa tɛrɛ ful-yifʋ jie wa, a-na-ɩ a bom ʋlↄ na saa a fʋ guoro a nɩrɛ ƴɛrɩ̃, fʋ mɩ lɩɛbʼã ƴↄnↄ a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃; a-na-ɩ a fʋ̃ʋ na guoro mɩ maala na a lɛ.
45002002	Sɩ bↄ̃w na ka a Nãaŋmɩn guoro na a bala na maala a yele ala ƴɛrɩ̃, tuure nɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ.
45002003	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a fʋna daba na guoro a bala na maala a yele ala ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ mɩ maala a lɛ, fʋ tɩɛr beeka fʋ na nyɛ na cɩ̃ɛfʋ jie a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ bibir mɩ?
45002004	Mɩɩ, fʋ mɛbɛ na a Naaŋmɩn yɛ̃ bↄ̃wfʋ na nyɩrɩ̃ ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ, nɩ a ʋ su-nyↄwraa nɩ a ʋ su-ɓaar mɩɩ? Faa bↄ̃w ka a Naaŋmɩn yɛ̃-bↄ̃wfʋ tↄwrↄ fʋ na a fʋ na lɩɛb a fʋ yɛ̃ wa?
45002005	Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ a fʋ suur na kpɛmɛ, nɩ a mɩnɛ fʋ na ma bʋↄrↄ fʋ lɩɛb a fʋ yɛ̃ wa, fʋ dↄↄlↄ na a Naaŋmɩn su-tuo bine a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɩnɛ, gure nɩ a ʋ su-tuo bibir ʋlↄ a nɩbɛ na nyɛrɛ a mɩnɛ ʋ na guoro a ba ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ nɩ a ʋ torfʋ.
45002006	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn na ya na a nɩbɛ ba jaa tu nɩ a ba tʋmↄ.
45002007	A bala na ɩraa a cĩcĩ a tʋ̃-sono pʋↄ, bʋↄrↄ nɩ a yo-yifʋ, a ju-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a baafʋ na ma tɛrɛ a sãwfʋ wa, na pↄw na a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw.
45002008	Ɩ̃-cɛ a bala na bʋↄrↄ a ba mɩ̃ɛ bↄb, na ba wõw nɩ a toor a yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ wono a toor a maal-fãa ƴɛrɩ̃ pʋↄ, na pↄw na a Naaŋmɩn su-tuo nɩ a ʋ kpãafʋ.
45002009	A won nɩ a tuo dɩfʋ na pↄw na a nɩrɛ lɛ na maala a bier; a Jufisɩ sɛr, nɩ a nɩ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ba jaa.
45002010	Ɩ̃-cɛ a bala na maala a son na pↄw na a yo-yifʋ, a ju-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a pɩɛnfʋ, wa nyↄw nɩ a Jufisɩ, nɩ a nɩ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ba jaa jie go.
45002011	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ma Ꞌwuoro a nɩbɛ kpee kpee wa.
45002012	A bala ba jaa na ma bↄ̃w a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn wa, ɩ̃ maala a fãa, ba na wɛ na, ɩ̃ aa ɩ a ana ƴɛr-kpɛn na saa wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a bala na bↄ̃w a ƴɛr-kpɛn, ɩ̃ maal a fãa, a ƴɛr-kpɛn ala ba na de guorʼɩ̃ a ba ƴɛrɩ̃.
45002013	A-na-ɩ aa ɩ a bala na bↄ̃w a ƴɛr-kpɛn ɩ̃ tor a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a bala na jↄrↄ a ƴɛr-kpɛn, bala a Naaŋmɩn nↄↄ nyɛ a ba tor.
45002014	A-na-ɩ a lɛdaar a nɩ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ na ma saarɩ̃ bↄ̃w a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn wa, ɩ̃ a ba maalfʋ wãa tuure a ana ƴɛr-kpɛn, ba miile na á ba tɛrɛ na a ƴɛr-kpɛn a ba pʋↄ.
45002015	A-na-ɩ ba miilʼã a lɛ, áa ala a ƴɛr-kpɛn na bʋↄrↄ sɛbʼã a ba sube pʋʋr, ɩ̃ a ba mɩ̃ɛ bↄ̃wfʋ mɩ miile ba na a ʋna maalfʋ. A daar kãw a ba mɩ̃ɛ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ ma ƴↄ̃w ba na a ƴɛrɩ̃, mɩɩ a yifʋ jie.
45002016	A lɛ a na ta a ʋna bibirʼãa pʋↄ a Naaŋmɩn nↄↄ ƴↄnↄ a Jeeju-Kirisi ʋ guoro a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala na sↄↄlɩ̃ a nɩbɛ sube pʋʋr, tuure nɩ a ƴɛr-son ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na mana.
45002017	Ɩ̃-eɛ a fʋ̃ʋ, ba bʋↄlↄ fʋ na a Jufi nɩrɛ. Fʋ barʼɩ̃ na a ƴɛr-kpɛn nyãa, mɩ barʼɩ̃ a tɩɛrʋ̃ a Naaŋmɩn ɩnɛ.
45002018	Fʋ bↄ̃w na a ʋ pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃, a ʋ ƴɛr-kpɛn mɩ jaan fʋ na a fʋ de a ala na vɩɛlɛ.
45002019	Fʋ tɩɛrʼã beeka fʋ̃ʋ ɩ jↄn-taara, mɩ ɩ nɩ a cãa a libe sↄↄlɩ̃sↄw.
45002020	Fʋ lɛ tɩɛrʼã beeka fʋ̃ʋ ɩ a bala na ma bↄ̃w a bom wa mimiile, ɩ nɩ a bibiir jãjaana, a-na-ɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn pʋↄ fʋ tɩɛrʼã beeka fʋ sɩrɩ̃ na tɛrɛ a bↄ̃wfʋ nɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ.
45002021	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a fʋ̃ʋ na jaana a nɩŋmɛɛ, mɩnɛ a ɩ a faa lɩɛb jaan a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ wa? A fʋ̃ʋ na ma hiere kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ a ba taa jure wa, ɩ̃ bõ ɩ a fʋ jure?
45002022	A fʋ̃ʋ na ma yele a nɩrɛ ʋ taa wa gana nɩ pↄw kpee wa, ɩ̃ bõ ɩnɛ fʋ ma lɛ maal? A fʋ̃ʋ na ma kpɛrɛ a tɩbɛ, ɩ̃ bõ ɩ a fʋ ma lɛ kpɛ a tɩɩb diem jure.
45002023	A fʋ̃ʋ na bar a tɩɛrʋ̃ a ƴɛr-kpɛn ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ bõ ɩnɛ fʋ sãw a ƴɛr-kpɛn, sãw nɩ a Naaŋmɩn yuor a lɛ?
45002024	A mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na yel: “A nyɩmɩ saa a nɩ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ kpɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn.”
45002025	A fʋ̃ʋ jↄrↄ a ƴɛr-kpɛn, a fʋ yʋↄr ŋmaafʋ ɩ na bom. Ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ̃ʋ ma jↄrↄ a ƴɛr-kpɛn wa, ɩ̃ saarɩ̃ ŋmaa a yʋↄr, a wↄ̃ na taa nɩ faa mɩ ŋmaa wa.
45002026	Ɩ̃ a bala na ma ŋmaa a yʋↄr wa, ɩ̃ jↄrↄ a ƴɛr-kpɛn, a Naaŋmɩn kↄ̃ de ba a ba wↄ̃ taa nɩ a bala na ŋmaa wa?
45002027	A ʋlↄ na ma ŋmaa a yʋↄr a ɩ̃gan buur pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃ jↄrↄ a ƴɛr-kpɛn, ʋ guorʼã a fʋ̃ʋ na ma jↄrↄ a ƴɛr-kpɛn wa ƴɛrɩ̃, a ala saarɩ̃ ɩ fʋ ŋmaa na a yʋↄr ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ a ƴɛr-kpɛn sɛbɛ.
45002028	A ʋlↄ na sɩrɩ̃ ɩ a Jufi nɩrɛ ma ɩ a ʋlↄ ba na nyɛ nɩ a mimie tɛw wa, ɩ̃ a ʋ yʋↄr ŋmaafʋ na ma mɩ ɩ a ʋ ɩ̃gan buur tɛw wa.
45002029	A ʋlↄ na sɩrɩ̃ ɩ a Jufi nɩrɛ ɩ na a ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na nyɛ ʋ mɩ ŋmaa a yʋↄr a ʋ suur pʋↄ. A ʋ yʋↄr ŋmaafʋ yi na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ jie, ɩ̃ a kↄ̃ ɩ a ʋlↄ na yi a ƴɛr-kpɛn sɛbɛ pʋↄ wa. Aa ɩ a nɩbɛ jie a nɩ-lɛ ma pↄw a ʋ pɛwfʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn jie ʋ.
45003001	A ala ɩ lɛ ʋ, bõ a Jufi nɩrɛ tɛrɛ gãw a nɩŋmɛɛ? Bõ a yʋↄr ŋmaafʋ ma maal a nɩrɛ?
45003002	A ba son be na a jiir a jaa. A dãdãw ɩ na, ba ɩ na a bala a Naaŋmɩn na de a ʋ bʋʋr kʋ.
45003003	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a Jufisɩ ŋmɛɛ jaarʼã a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃, sɩ́ lɛ yel a bõ? A ba jaarfʋ na tʋↄ na sãw a Naaŋmɩn dẽdẽ ɩfʋ mɩɩ?
45003004	A kↄ̃ tʋↄ ɩ a lɛ wa. A sɛw na a Naaŋmɩn na ɩ a Yel-mɩ̃ɛ Sʋbↄ, a ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa ŋmara na a jiri, wↄ̃ taa nɩ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na yel: “A nɩbɛ sɛw na ba nyɛ fʋ a fʋ tor a fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ pʋↄ; a fʋ mɩ pↄw a tʋↄfʋ a ala ɩ ba bʋↄrↄ na ba guor a fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃.”
45003005	A ala ɩ a sɩ gõgolĩfʋ tʋmↄ miile na a Naaŋmɩn torfʋ, mɩnɛ sɩ na yel? Sɩ na yelʼã áa Naaŋmɩn ɩ na Naaŋmɩn gõgolaa a mɩnɛ ʋ na nyɛ a ʋ su-tuo ƴↄ̃w sɩ mɩɩ? (A nɩbɛ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ ɩ̃ de ƴɛrʼɩ̃.)
45003006	A kↄ̃ tʋↄ ɩ a lɛ wa. A ala ɩ a lɛ a dãa wↄ̃, mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na tʋↄ guor a tẽw ƴɛrɩ̃?
45003007	A nɩrɛ kãw na yelʼã: “A ala ɩ a ɩ̃ jiri ŋmafʋ maala na a Naaŋmɩn yel-mɩ̃ɛ ʋ nyɩrɩ̃ yire, ʋ pↄwrↄ a yo-yifʋ, ɩ̃ bõ ɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na lɛ ƴↄ̃w ma a ƴɛrɩ̃ yelʼɩ̃ á maal-fãa sʋbↄ ɩ̃ ɩ?”
45003008	Ɩ̃ bõ ɩ a sɩ kↄ̃ maala a bier, a son wa dↄↄl wa? A lɛ a nɩŋmɛɛ ma kpɛrɛ sɩ, áa lɛ sɩ ma yel. A bana nɩbɛ naa, a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na ƴↄnↄ ba, torʼã.
45003009	Ɩ̃ mɩnɛ? A sɩmɩ Jufisɩ, sɩ sa na a nɩŋmɛɛ mɩɩ? Saa sa ba wa! A-na-ɩ sɩ gↄrʼã nuile nyɩ a mɩnɛ a Jufisɩ nɩ a nɩ-kpeesɩ ba jaa na ɓã taa be a maal-fãa pʋↄ.
45003010	A nɩɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na yel: “Nɩrɛ kãw ma be be na tor wa; bõ-ƴen ma mɩ be wa.
45003011	Nɩrɛ kãw ma tɛrɛ a bↄ̃wfʋ wa. Nɩrɛ kãw ma mɩ bʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn wa.
45003012	A ba jaa barʼã a sↄr ɩ̃ vɩɛ ɓã taa lo. Nɩrɛ kãw ma maala a vɩlaa wa; bõ-ƴen tɛw ma mɩ be wa.
45003013	A ba nʋↄr wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a yaa ba na yuo bar. Ba ma de na a ba dɛlɩ̃bir bɛlɛ nɩ a nɩbɛ; a waab lↄw ɩ̃ ma yire a ba nↄgbalĩbie pʋↄ.
45003014	A pↄfʋ nɩ a ƴɛr-tor ɩ̃ ma yire a ba nʋↄr pʋↄ.
45003015	Ba maa yaarɩ̃ kú nɩrɛ wa.
45003016	Ba ma sãwna na a yele, maala nɩ a nabier a jie lɛ ba na tↄlↄ.
45003017	Baa bↄ̃w a sↄr ʋlↄ na ɩ a pɩɛnfʋ sↄr wa.
45003018	Baa jↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn a ba tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ pʋↄ wa.”
45003019	Sɩ bↄ̃w na ka a ala a jaa a ƴɛr-kpɛn na miile, ʋ ƴɛrɛ na kʋrↄ a bala na be a ƴɛr-kpɛn pʋↄ, a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ ba jaa nↄɛ na pↄw, ɩ̃ a tẽw nɩbɛ ba jaa na be a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ dayen.
45003020	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw, nɩrɛ kãw torfʋ ma yire a ƴɛr-kpɛn jↄfʋ ɩnɛ wa, a-na-ɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn ɩ̃ saa a sɩ bↄ̃w a maal-fãa.
45003021	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a torfʋ ʋlↄ na yi a Naaŋmɩn jie miilʼã cãa pʋↄ, ɩ̃ aa ɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn jↄfʋ ɩ̃ saa wa. A Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe mɩ dãa na ƴɛr a ala ɩnɛ.
45003022	A ɩ na a torfʋ ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na kʋ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na sↄw de a Jeeju-Kirisi, a bala ba jaa na tɛrɛ nɩ ʋ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ma Ꞌwuoro a nɩbɛ kpee kpee wa.
45003023	A nɩbɛ ba jaa maalʼã a fãa, faa nɩ a Naaŋmɩn na-yele.
45003024	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋ wɩɛfʋ ɩnɛ ʋ lɩɛbɛ ba a ba toro a ʋ nii-sↄw, a mɩnɛ ʋ na da ba fáa ba a Jeeju-Kirisi tʋmↄ pʋↄ a pↄrↄ.
45003025	A ʋna Kirisi, a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w ʋ na ʋ ɩ a baar-lo-bom, a mɩnɛ ʋ na deer a ʋ jɩ̃ɩ de nɩ a bala na sↄw de ʋ maal-faar bar kʋ ba. A nↄhↄ̃ a Naaŋmɩn bʋↄrↄ na ʋ miil a ʋ torfʋ. A korĩ-cɛ ʋ nyↄw na a suur, ɩ̃ ma kpãa a bala na maal a fãa wa.
45003026	Ɩ̃-eɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ʋ miile na a mɩnɛ ʋ na lɩɛbɛ a nɩbɛ a ba toro a ʋ nii-sↄw; a-na-ɩ ʋ bʋↄrↄ na a ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ ʋ tor, ɩ̃ mɩ bʋↄrↄ ʋ lɩɛb a bala na sↄw de Jeeju a ba na mɩ tor.
45003027	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, nyɩnɛ a yo-bↄb lɛ be? ꞋWaa lɛ be be go wa. Bõ ɩnɛ? A-na-ɩ ba jↄrↄ na a ƴɛr-kpɛn mɩɩ? Kpee. Ɩ̃-cɛ, a ba ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ɩnɛ.
45003028	A-na-ɩ sɩ nyɛ na bↄ̃w ka a nɩrɛ ma tor a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw a ƴɛr-kpɛn ʋ na jↄrↄ ɩnɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ʋ na tɛrɛ ɩnɛ ʋ.
45003029	A Naaŋmɩn, a Jufisɩ Naaŋmɩn tɛw ʋ ɩ mɩɩ? ꞋWaa mɩ ɩ a nɩ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ Naaŋmɩn wa? Ↄↄ, má ʋ mɩ ɩ na a ba Naaŋmɩn.
45003030	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn bõ-ƴen tɛw ɩ̃ be be, a ʋlↄ na lɩɛbɛ a Jufisɩ nɩbɛ a ba toro a ba ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ mɩ lɩɛbɛ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ a ba mɩ toro a ba ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ɩnɛ mɩ.
45003031	A lɛ yelʼã a sɩ sãwna na a ƴɛr-kpɛn nɩ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa bara mɩɩ? Aa ɩ lɛ ʋ wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ, sɩ ɛ̃ɛ na maala a ƴɛr-kpɛn a ba bↄ̃w tɛrɛ a ba par.
45004001	Bõ sɩ na lɛ yel a sɩ sãa-kʋmↄ Abʋraham ɩnɛ? Bõ ʋ pↄw nɩ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ fãgã?
45004002	A ala ɩ a Abʋraham dãa na tor a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw a ʋ tʋmↄ ɩnɛ, sↄr be na be ʋ na tʋↄ bʋↄrↄ a yuor, ɩ̃-cɛ aa ɩ a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw wa.
45004003	A-na-ɩ bõ a yel a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ? A yelʼã: “A Abʋraham ƴↄ̃w na a Naaŋmɩn a nyãa, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a Naaŋmɩn de ʋ ʋ ɩ a nɩ-toraa.”
45004004	A nɩrɛ na tʋnↄ a tʋn, baa de a ʋ yar ʋ ɩ bõ-pↄrↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ san ʋ, a ba na ya ʋ.
45004005	Ɩ̃-cɛ, a ʋlↄ na ma maal a bom wa, ɩ̃ sↄw de a Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ na lɩɛbɛ a maal-kpana sʋbↄ ʋ toro a ʋ nii-sↄw, a Naaŋmɩn na de ʋ na ʋ tor a ʋ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ɩnɛ.
45004006	A lɛ ʋ a Davɩtɩ mɩ ƴɛr a mɩnɛ a na nʋmɛɛ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na nyɛ ʋ tor ɩ̃-cɛ Ꞌwaa maal bom wa.
45004007	“Nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a bala jie a Naaŋmɩn na de a ba burbur bar kʋ ba, nɩ a bala ʋ na piw a ba maal-fãa tɛɛlɛ.
45004008	Nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ jie a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na mↄↄ sooro ʋ a ʋ maal-fãa wa.”
45004009	A ʋna nʋ̃ↄ naa, a bala na ŋmaa a yʋↄr jie tɛw ʋ be mɩɩ? Mɩɩ ʋ mɩ be na a bala na ma mɩ ŋmaa wa jie? A-na-ɩ sɩ yelʼã: “A Abʋraham ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn de ʋ ʋ ɩ a nɩ-toraa.”
45004010	Mɩnɛ a Abʋraham dãa wↄ̃ ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn de ʋ? Ʋ dãa na ŋmaa a yʋↄr mɩɩ Ꞌwaa dãa ŋmaa sɛr wa? ꞋWaa dãa ŋmaa sɛr wa.
45004011	A Naaŋmɩn bɩɛrʼã man ʋ a yʋↄr ŋmaafʋ ʋ ɩ a jɩbaa na miile á Naaŋmɩn de ʋ na ʋ ɩ a nɩ-toraa a ʋ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ɩnɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ a Ꞌwaa ŋmaa a yʋↄr sɛr wa. A nↄhↄ̃, a bala ba jaa na ma ŋmaa a yʋↄr wa ɩ̃ sↄw de a Naaŋmɩn ʋ na de ba na a ba ɩ a nɩ-torisɩ, a Abʋraham ɩ a ba sãa-kʋmↄ.
45004012	Ʋ mɩ ɩ na a bala na ŋmaa a yʋↄr sãa-kʋmↄ; a lɛ yelʼã, a bala na ŋmaa a yʋↄr ɩ̃ mɩ tuure a sɩ sãa Abʋraham, tɛrɛ nɩ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ʋlↄ ʋ na dãa tɛrɛ ɩ̃-cɛ a Ꞌwaa dãa ŋmaa a yʋↄr sɛr wa.
45004013	A Naaŋmɩn pʋlɩ̃fʋ ʋ na pʋlɩ̃ nɩ a Abʋraham nɩ a ʋ bal parvʋↄr áa tẽw nↄↄ ɩ na a ba gãw bom, aa yi a ba ƴɛr-kpɛn jↄfʋ ɩnɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ na a mɩnɛ ba na tor a ba ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ɩnɛ.
45004014	A ala ɩ a bala na jↄrↄ a ƴɛr-kpɛn, bala tɛw ɩ̃ wa pↄwrↄ a gã-yele, a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa na ɩ na pↄrↄ, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn pʋlɩ̃fʋ ma lɛ tɛrɛ par wa.
45004015	A-na-ɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn ɩ̃ ma waara nɩ a Naaŋmɩn su-tuo; ɩ̃-cɛ a jie a ƴɛr-kpɛn na ma be wa, a ƴɛr-kpɛn sãwfʋ kↄ̃ mɩ be wa.
45004016	Ála-ɩ̃-sↄ, a pʋlɩ̃fʋ ma yi a ƴɛr-kpɛn jie wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ yi na a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa jie, ʋ na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn wɩɛfʋ bom, na tʋↄrↄ ɩrɛɛ a cĩcĩ a Abʋraham bal parvʋↄr nɩbɛ ba jaa jie. Aa ɩ a bala tɛw na jↄrↄ a ƴɛr-kpɛn ʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩ ɩ na a bala na mɩ tɛrɛ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa a Abʋraham kaarɩ̃, a ʋlↄ na ɩ a sɩ jaa sãa-kʋmↄ.
45004017	A mɩnɛ a na sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “Ɩ̃ biin fʋ na a fʋ ɩ a tẽ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ sãa-kʋmↄ.” Ʋ ɩ na a ba sãa a Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ nii-sↄw ʋ na dãa ƴↄ̃w a nyãa. a Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ na maala a kũusɩ a ba ire a kũu pʋↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ de a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ maalʼɩ̃ a yele ala na ma dãa be wa, a lɛ be.
45004018	A ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a dãa na kpɛmɛ a Abʋraham ʋ na tɛrɛ a tɩɛrʋ̃ son, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ ƴↄ̃w na a Naaŋmɩn a nyãa, tɛrɛ nɩ ʋ a tɩɛrʋ̃ cɛcɛ. A nↄhↄ̃ ʋ lɩɛbʼã ɩ a tẽ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ sãa-kʋmↄ, tu nɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na dãa yel ʋ: “A nↄhↄ̃ a fʋ bibiir nↄↄ ɩ.”
45004019	A ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a ʋ yomo na tara a kʋbaa, ɩ̃ ʋ nyɛ bↄ̃w ka ʋ ta na a kũu, a ʋ pↄw Sara ma mɩ lɛ be na lɛ dↄw bie wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ cãa na ɩraa cĩcĩ a ʋ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa pʋↄ.
45004020	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na pʋlɩ̃ nɩ ʋ, Ꞌwaa tɛrɛ baalɩ̃fʋ a ʋ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ ɛ̃ɛ na pↄw kpɛ̃w a ʋ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa pʋↄ kʋrↄ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn a ju-kpɛ̃ɛ.
45004021	Ʋ bↄ̃w na bↄ̃w ka a Naaŋmɩn tɛrɛ na kpɛ̃w na maal a ala ʋ na pʋlɩ̃.
45004022	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a yel, áa Naaŋmɩn de ʋ na ʋ ɩ a nɩ-toraa a ʋ jie a ʋ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ɩnɛ.
45004023	A ʋna ƴɛr-birʼãa na yel, áa Naaŋmɩn de ʋ na, ma sɛb a Abʋraham ɩnɛ tɛw ʋ wa.
45004024	Á mɩ sɛbʼã a sɩ ɩnɛ mɩ. A Naaŋmɩn na mɩ de sɩ na a sɩ Ɩor, a sɩmɩ na ƴↄ̃w a ʋlↄ na maal a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju ʋ ir a kũu pʋↄ a nyãa.
45004025	Ʋ ɩ na a Jeeju ʋlↄ ba na dãa ƴↄ̃w a ba kú a sɩ bɩɛfʋ ɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn jie, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn lɛ maal ʋ ʋ ir a kũu pʋↄ a sɩ na tor a ʋ nii-sↄw.
45005001	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a mɩnɛ sɩ na lɛ tor a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw a sɩ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ɩnɛ, sɩ tɛrɛ nɩ ʋ na a pɩɛnfʋ a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi ɩnɛ.
45005002	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ sɩ na tɛrɛ nɩ a Kirisi a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa, sɩ pↄw na a sↄr be a Naaŋmɩn wɩɛfʋ pʋↄ, a jie sɩ na be ɩraa a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃. Ɩ̃ a ala na lɛ maal sɩ a sɩ cɩlɛ ɩ na a tɩɛrʋ̃ son sɩ na tɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn na-yele pↄwfʋ ɩnɛ.
45005003	Ɩ̃ aa ɩ lɛ tɛw ʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ sɩ ma mɩ cɩlɛ na a won pʋↄ sɩ na be, a-na-ɩ a won ɩnɛ sɩ ma pↄw a su-nyↄwraa,
45005004	ɩ̃ a su-nyↄwraa tɩɩrɛ na a su-varkpara, ɩ̃ a su-varkpara mɩ tɩɩrɛ a gufʋ tɩɛrʋ̃ son.
45005005	A ʋna gufʋ tɩɛrʋ̃ son kↄ̃ wa ƴↄ̃w sɩ vĩ wa, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn barʼã a ʋ nʋfʋ ƴↄ̃w a sɩ suur pʋↄ, a ʋ Sɩɛ ʋ na kʋ sɩ ɩnɛ.
45005006	A lɛdaar sɩ na dãa cãa bal, a lɛ a Kirisi kpi a nɩ-bebe ɩnɛ a daar ʋlↄ ba na dãa ƴↄ̃w.
45005007	A kpɛmɛ na a nɩrɛ na sↄw kpi a nɩ-toraa ɩnɛ. A nʋmↄ-wa-sↄw a nɩrɛ nↄↄ Ꞌla na kpi a nɩ-son ɩnɛ,
45005008	ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn miil sɩ na a mɩnɛ ʋ na tɩɩ nʋnↄ sɩ, a-na-ɩ a lɛdaar sɩ na dãa cãa ɩ a maal-fãa deme, a Kirisi kpi na a sɩ ɩnɛ.
45005009	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ʋ na lɩɛb sɩ a sɩ tor taa nɩ a Naaŋmɩn a ʋ jɩ̃ɩ ɩnɛ a lɛ, a lɛ sɩ mɩ sɩrɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka ʋ nↄↄ mɩ faa sɩ na a Naaŋmɩn su-tuo pʋↄ.
45005010	Naaŋmɩn sama-deme sɩ dãa ɩ. Ɩ̃ a ʋ bie kũu ɓaalɩ̃ sɩ, wa yele nɩ a mɩnɛ ʋ na ɓaalɩ̃ sɩ baar, a Naaŋmɩn kↄ̃ lɛ tʋↄ faa sɩ a ʋ bie baafʋ pʋↄ wa?
45005011	Ɩ̃ aa ɩ a ʋna tɩɛrʋ̃ tɛw sɩ tɛrɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ sɩ cɩlɛ na a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɓaalɩ̃ sɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ a sɩ tɛrɛ a lãw-taa.
45005012	Dab-bõ-ƴen ɩ̃ saa a maal-fãa kpɛ a tẽw pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a maal-fãa saa a kũu mɩ be. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a kũu pↄw na a nɩbɛ ba jaa, a-na-ɩ a ba jaa maalʼã a fãa.
45005013	A lɛ a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn na ma dãa wa sɛr wa, a maal-fãa dãa na de nĩe be ka a tẽw pʋↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛ a ƴɛr-kpɛn na ma be wa, ba maa de a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w nɩrɛ wa.
45005014	Ɩ̃-cɛ wa nyↄw nɩ a Adã wa ta nɩ a Mowisi daar, a kũu tʋↄ na a nɩbɛ ba jaa, a ala saarɩ̃ ɩ baa dãa maal fãa wↄ̃ taa nɩ a Adã na dãa sãw a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn bar wa. A Adã ɩ̃ dãa ɩ a Jeeju-Kirisi ʋlↄ na dãa waara dãadiile.
45005015	ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋ bɩɛfʋ ma wↄ̃ taa nɩ a Naaŋmɩn wɩɛfʋ bom ʋ na tɩɩr kʋ sɩ wa. A ala ɩ a nɩ-bõ-ƴen bɩɛfʋ ɩ̃ saa a nɩ-yaw kpi, a Naaŋmɩn wɩɛfʋ waa na gãw a lɛ a nɩ-yaw jie, a mɩnɛ ʋ na kʋ sɩ a ʋ wɩɛfʋ bom a nɩ-bõ-ƴen ʋlↄ na ɩ a Jeeju-Kirisi jie.
45005016	Ɩ̃ a ala a Naaŋmɩn na kʋ sɩ ma maal wↄ̃ taa nɩ a nɩ-bõ-ƴen maal-fãa na maal wa. A-na-ɩ a nɩ-bõ-ƴen maal-fãa ɩnɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ wa nɩ a yel, ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ sɩ na bɩɛ a Naaŋmɩn jie gbɛɛ yayaw baar, a Naaŋmɩn wɩɛfʋ bom lɩɛb sɩ na a sɩ tor a ʋ nii-sↄw.
45005017	A ala ɩ a nɩ-bõ-ƴen bɩɛfʋ ɩ̃ saa a kũu tɛrɛ a tʋↄfʋ a yi a ʋna nɩ-bõ-ƴen jie, a bala na sɩrɩ̃ pↄw a Naaŋmɩn wɩɛfʋ nɩ a ʋ torfʋ ʋ na nyɩrɩ̃ kʋ sɩ, na mɩ tɛrɛ na a tʋↄfʋ a ba baafʋ pʋↄ, a mɩ yi a nɩ-bõ-ƴen ʋlↄ na ɩ a Jeeju-Kirisi jie.
45005018	A mɩnɛ a nɩ-bõ-ƴen bɩɛfʋ na ƴↄ̃w a nɩbɛ ba jaa a kũu ƴɛrɩ̃, a lɛ ʋ mɩ a nɩ-bõ-ƴen tʋ̃-cɛcɛ na mɩ sↄ-yaa a nɩbɛ ba jaa pↄw a torfʋ ʋlↄ na kʋrↄ ba a baafʋ.
45005019	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a nɩ-bõ-ƴen to-wõwfʋ na ƴↄ̃w a nɩ-yaw a ba ɩ a maal-fãa deme, a lɛ ʋ mɩ a nɩ-bõ-ƴen to-wõfʋ na mɩ lɩɛb a nɩ-yaw a ba tor a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw.
45005020	A ƴɛr-kpɛn wa na a mɩnɛ a nɩbɛ bɩɛfʋ na nyɩrɩ̃ waa dↄↄl, ɩ̃ a jie a fãa na waara dↄↄlↄ, a Naaŋmɩn wɩɛfʋ ma dↄↄlʼã gãw a lɛ.
45005021	A-na-ɩ a mɩnɛ a maal-fãa na tɛrɛ a tʋↄfʋ ƴↄ̃w a nɩbɛ a kũu pʋↄ, a lɛ a Naaŋmɩn wɩɛfʋ mɩ tɛrɛ a tʋↄfʋ, lɩɛbʼɩ̃ a nɩbɛ a ba tor a ʋ nii-sↄw, a ba wa pↄw a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi ɩnɛ.
45006001	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, mɩnɛ sɩ na pãa yel? Sɩ́ cãa maala a fãa, a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn yɛ̃-bↄ̃wfʋ na dↄↄlↄ taa a sɩ jie mɩɩ?
45006002	Aa ɩ lɛ ʋ wa. A sɩmɩ na kpi a maal-fãa pʋↄ, mɩnɛ sɩ na lɛ ɩ ɩ̃ cãa maala a ala go?
45006003	A sɩmɩ sɩ jaa ba na mʋr a kʋ̃ↄ a sɩ na ɩ bõ-ƴen nɩ a Jeeju-Kirisi, nyaa bↄ̃w ka ba mʋr sɩ na, a sɩ na lãa kpi nɩ ʋ a ʋ kũu pʋↄ wa?
45006004	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a mɩnɛ ba na mʋr sɩ a sɩ lãa kpi nɩ ʋ, ba mɩ lãa na ũu sɩ a lɛ. Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a Sãa yo-yifʋ nɩ a ʋ kpɛ̃w na maal a Kirisi ʋ ir a kũu pʋↄ, a sɩmɩ mɩ, sɩ mɩ tɛrɛ na a baafʋ ʋlↄ na ɩ a baa-paalaa.
45006005	A ala ɩ sɩ lɩɛbʼã ɩ nɩ ʋ a bõ-ƴen a kũu pʋↄ a sɩ kʋ̃ↄ mʋrfʋ ɩnɛ, a lɛ sɩ nↄↄ mɩ ɩ nɩ ʋ a bõ-ƴen, mɩ ir a kũu pʋↄ a ʋ kaarɩ̃.
45006006	Nyɩ́ ɩ a sɩ bↄ̃w nɩ a nanɩ: a Kirisi de na a sɩ nɩ-kʋraa a ba kpa nɩ ʋ a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu, a mɩnɛ a sɩ maal-fãa ɩ̃gan kↄ̃ tʋↄ lɛ ɩ a maal-fãa gbãgbaa wa.
45006007	A-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ na kpi pↄw na a faafʋ a maal-fãa ɩnɛ.
45006008	Ɩ̃ a sɩmɩ kpi nɩ a Kirisi, sɩ bↄ̃w na ka sɩ nↄↄ lãa na tɛrɛ nɩ ʋ a baafʋ.
45006009	A-na-ɩ a mɩnɛ a Kirisi na ir a kũu pʋↄ, Ꞌwaa lↄↄ kpiire wa; a kũu ma lɛ tɛrɛ fãgã a ʋ jie wa.
45006010	A mɩnɛ ʋ na kpi, a maal-fãa ŋmaa-yifʋ ɩnɛ ʋ kpi a gbɛ-daa, ɩ̃-cɛ a baafʋ ʋlↄ ʋ na tɛrɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn ben.
45006011	A lɛ ʋ, a nyɩmɩ mɩ, nyɩ́ bↄ̃w ka nyɩ sɩrɩ̃ na kpi a maal-fãa ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ a baafʋ ʋlↄ na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ben, a mɩnɛ nyɩ na be a Jeeju-Kirisi pʋↄ.
45006012	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, nyɩ taa ɩ a maal-fãa ʋ lɛ tɛrɛ a tʋↄfʋ a nyɩ ɩ̃gan pʋↄ a nyɩ na sↄw maala a ala a nyɩ ɩ̃gan buur na bʋↄrↄ wa.
45006013	Ɩ̃ nyɩ taa mɩ de a nyɩ ɩ̃gan ɓãbie a lɩɛb ɩ gõgolĩfʋ tʋmↄ yele a nyɩ maala nɩ a fãa wa. Ɩ̃-eɛ, a mɩnɛ nyɩ na ɩ a nɩbɛ bala na kpi ɩ̃ lɛ ir a kũu pʋↄ nyɩ́ de a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a Naaŋmɩn, a nyɩ ɩ̃gan ɓãbie mɩ lɩɛb ɩ a tʋ̃-son yele a Naaŋmɩn tʋmↄ pʋↄ.
45006014	A maal-fãa kↄ̃ lɛ ɩ a nyɩ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ wa, a-na-ɩ nyaa be a ƴɛr-kpɛn pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn wɩɛfʋ pʋↄ nyɩ be.
45006015	Mɩnɛ? Sɩ́ maala a fãa a mɩnɛ sɩ na ma be a ƴɛr-kpɛn pʋↄ go wa ɩ̃ be a Naaŋmɩn wɩɛfʋ pʋↄ mɩɩ? Aa ɩ lɛ ʋ wa!
45006016	Nyaa bↄ̃w ka a nyɩmɩ de a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ ƴↄ̃w a nɩrɛ kãw gbãgba-tʋmↄ pʋↄ, wono nɩ ʋ a toor, nyɩ ɩ na a ʋlↄ nyɩ na wono a toor gbãgbaar wa? A na tʋↄ na ɩ a maal-fãa ʋ, na cere nɩ nyɩ a kũu pʋↄ, mɩɩ a Naaŋmɩn nyɩ na wono a toor, na maala nyɩ a nyɩ toro a ʋ jie.
45006017	Ɩ̃ Naaŋmɩn sↄ puorfʋ, a-na-ɩ a nyɩmɩ na dãa ɩ a maal-fãa gbãgbaãr, nyɩ sↄw na de a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ nɩ a nyɩ suur ʋ jaa ƴↄ̃w a ana maal-bie ba na dãa jaan nyɩ pʋↄ.
45006018	A mɩnɛ nyɩ na faa a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a fãa pʋↄ, nyɩ lɩɛbʼã ɩ a son gbãgbaar.
45006019	A nɩbɛ maal-bie ɩ̃ de miile nɩ nyɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a-na-ɩ a nyɩ ɩ̃gan buur balʼã. A ala ɩ nyɩ dãa na de a nyɩ ɩ̃gan ɓãbie bar a tʋ̃-kpansɩ pʋↄ, maala nɩ a burbur bʋrↄ bʋrↄ, a lɛ ʋ mɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, nyɩ́ de a nyɩ ɩ̃gan ɓãbie ƴↄ̃w a ɩ a torfʋ gbãgba-tʋmↄ yele, a nyɩ na tʋↄ ɩ a cɛcɛ a nyɩ maalfʋ pʋↄ.
45006020	A lɛdaar nyɩ na dãa ɩ a maal-fãa gbãgbaar, nyaa dãa be a torfʋ ƴɛr-kpɛ̃w pʋↄ wa.
45006021	Ɩ̃ bõ nyɩ pↄw a ana yele nyɩ na dãa maal pʋↄ, na lɛ lɩɛb ɩ nyɩ a vĩ a dɩnaa? A ba baarfʋ daar ɩ na kũu.
45006022	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a mɩnɛ nyɩ na fáa a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a maal-fãa jie, ɩ̃ lɩɛb ɩ a Naaŋmɩn gbãgbaar, ʋ maala nyɩ na a nyɩ lɩɛbɛ ɩrɛɛ a cɛcɛ, ɩ̃ a baarfʋ daar nyɩ na mɩ pↄw na a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw.
45006023	A-na-ɩ a maal-fãa yar ɩ na a kũu, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn wɩɛfʋ bom ɩ na a baa-kↄ̃-tɛw ʋlↄ sɩ na pↄw a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi pʋↄ.
45007001	Yɛɛr, nyɩ gↄrʼã bↄ̃w a ala ɩ̃ na yele nyɩ, a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ nɩ na a bala na bↄ̃w a ƴɛr-kpɛn. A ƴɛr-kpɛn tɛrɛ na tʋↄfʋ a nɩrɛ jie a lɛdaar ʋ na cãa a mimir.
45007002	A pↄw na kul a sɩrɛ, a ƴɛr-kpɛ̃w lũ ʋ na nɩ a ʋ sɩrɛ wa ta nɩ a ʋ kũu daar. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋ sɩrɛ wa kpi, ʋ tɛrɛ na sↄr na yi a ƴɛr-kpɛ̃w ʋlↄ pʋↄ na dãa lũ ʋ nɩ a ʋ sɩrɛ.
45007003	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a ala ɩ a ʋ sɩrɛ cãa na be be, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ cen na ir sɩr-paalaa, ba na yelʼã á ʋ sãw na a ʋ kulfʋ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋ sɩrɛ wa kpi, ʋ tɛrɛ na sↄr a ƴɛr-kpɛn pʋↄ na cen kul a dab-kpee. A nↄhↄ̃, Ꞌwaa sãw a ʋ kulfʋ wa.
45007004	Ɩ̃ yɛɛr, a lɛ ʋ mɩ a nyɩ jie. A mɩnɛ nyɩ na ɓã taa ɩ a bõ-ƴen nɩ a Kirisi ɩ̃gan, ba ƴↄ̃w nyɩ na a kũu pʋↄ a ƴɛr-kpɛn ɩnɛ, a mɩnɛ a nyɩ na tʋↄ ɩ a nɩ-kpee ben, tʋnↄ nɩ a tʋ̃-sono kʋrↄ a Naaŋmɩn.
45007005	A-na-ɩ a lɛdaar sɩ na dãa cere tuure a ala a sɩ ɩ̃gan buur na bʋↄrↄ, a ƴɛr-kpɛn ma dãa na jawra a faa vɩláa a sɩ ɩ̃gan pʋↄ, a sɩ maala a ala na cere nɩ sɩ a kũu pʋↄ.
45007006	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, sɩ nyɛ na sↄr yi a ƴɛr-kpɛn pʋↄ, a-na-ɩ saa cãa a ala na dãa pↄw sɩ a kasu pʋↄ wa, a mɩnɛ sɩ na tʋↄ tuure a sↄr paalaa maala a ala a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na ƴↄ̃w sɩ, ɩ̃ bar a sↄr kʋraa ʋlↄ pʋↄ sɩ na dãa be, tuure a ƴɛr-kpɛn ala ba na dãa sɛb.
45007007	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, sɩ́ yel a bõ? A Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn ɩ na maal-fãa mɩɩ? Aa ɩ a lɛ ʋ wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛr-kpɛn maal ma na ɩ̃ bↄ̃w a fãa. A-na-ɩ ɩ̃ kↄ̃ↄ dãa bↄ̃w a bõ na dɩ a jɩɛlfʋ, ɩ̃ a ala ɩ̃ ma dãa ɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛ̃w ɩ̃ yel, a ɩ̃ taa jɩɛlɛ nɩrɛ bom wa.
45007008	A ƴɛr-kpɛn ɩnɛ a maal-fãa nyɛ a sↄr kpɛ ma ɩ̃ Ꞌwuoro a yele a jaa a Ꞌwuor-fãa. A-na-ɩ a jie ʋlↄ a ƴɛr-kpɛn na ma be wa, a maal-fãa wↄ̃ na taa nɩ bõ-kũu.
45007009	A korĩ-cɛ, ɩ̃ dãa na be ka ma bↄ̃w a ƴɛr-kpɛn wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛ a ƴɛr-kpɛn na ta ma a maal-fãa de na a ɩ̃ baafʋ ɩ̃ cɛ ma bar.
45007010	A ʋna ƴɛr-kpɛn na dãa sɛw na tↄw ma ƴↄ̃w a baafʋ pʋↄ, lɛ lɩɛbʼã tↄw ma ƴↄ̃w a kũu pʋↄ.
45007011	A-na-ɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn ɩnɛ a maal-fãa nyɛ a sↄr bɛlɩ̃ ma, wa ƴↄ̃w ma a kũu pʋↄ a lɛ.
45007012	Sɩ nyɛ na a nↄhↄ̃ a mɩnɛ a ƴɛr-kpɛn na ɩ a son, ɩ̃ a Mowisi sɛbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ na mɩ ɩ a son, mɩ tor ɩ̃ mɩ vɩɛlɛ.
45007013	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a bõ-son lɩɛbʼã ɩ ma a kũu bom mɩɩ? Aa ɩ lɛ ʋ wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a maal-fãa de na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn na ɩ a bõ-son, ƴↄ̃w nɩ ma a kũu pʋↄ, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na tʋↄ nyɛ bↄ̃w ka a maal-fãa sɩrɩ̃ na ɩ a fãa. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ƴɛr-kpɛn ɩ̃ saa ɩ̃ nyɛ a mɩnɛ a fãa na nyɩrɩ̃ bɛlɩ̃.
45007014	Sɩ bↄ̃w na ka a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ bom, ɩ̃-cɛ a maa, ɩ̃gan buur nɩrɛ ɩ̃ ɩ, a maal-fãa na da ɩ̃ ɩ a ʋ gbãgbaa.
45007015	Maa bↄ̃w a ala par ɩ̃ na maala wa. A-na-ɩ ɩ̃ maa maal a ala ɩ̃ na ma bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ maal wa, ɩ̃ a ala ɩ̃ na maa bʋↄrↄ wa, ala ɩ̃ ma lɛ ɛ̃ɛ maal.
45007016	Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na maa bʋↄrↄ a ala ɩ̃ na maala wa, ɩ̃ sↄw na bↄ̃w ka a ƴɛr-kpɛn ɩ na bõ-son.
45007017	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, aa ɩ maa bↄ̃w nɩ maala a lɛ wa ɩ̃-cɛ a maal-fãa ʋlↄ na be a ɩ̃ pʋ̃ↄ ʋ.
45007018	A-na-ɩ ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka a bõ-son ma be a ɩ̃ pʋↄ wa; ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na ɩ̃ yel a lɛ, a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ wãa pʋↄ. A ala saarɩ̃ ɩ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na a son maalfʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ a fãgã ma be be wa.
45007019	A-na-ɩ ɩ̃ maa maal a son ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na bʋↄrↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a bier ala ɩ̃ na maa bʋↄrↄ wa, ala ɩ̃ ma maal.
45007020	A ala ɩ ɩ̃ maala na a ala ɩ̃ na ma bʋↄrↄ wa, aa lɛ cãa ɩ maa bↄ̃w nɩ maala wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a maal-fãa ʋlↄ na be a ɩ̃ pʋ̃ↄ ʋ.
45007021	Ɩ̃ nyɛ na a mɩnɛ a na be: maa wa bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ maal a son, a bier tɛw ma be a ɩ̃ jie.
45007022	A ɩ̃ suur pʋↄ, ɩ̃ sↄw na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn vɩlaa,
45007023	ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ nyɛ na a ƴɛr-kpɛ̃w kãw ʋ be a ɩ̃ ɩ̃gan pʋↄ jɛbɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn ala na be a ɩ̃ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ pʋↄ. Ʋ ɩ na a maal-fãa ƴɛr-kpɛ̃w na tʋnↄ a ʋ tʋmↄ a ɩ̃ ɩ̃gan pʋↄ, pↄw nɩ ma a kasu pʋↄ.
45007024	Ɩ̃ ɩ na nãw sʋbↄ a wa po! Ala na wɩɛ ma a ɩ̃ ɩ̃gan naa ɩnɛ na cere nɩ ma a kũu pʋↄ ya?
45007025	Naaŋmɩn sↄ puorfʋ, a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi na ɩ a ɩ̃ Wɩwɩɛrɛ ɩnɛ. Ála-ɩ̃-sↄ a ala ɩ a maa ʋ, a ɩ̃ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ jↄrↄ na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn, ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ̃ tↄr jaa, a maal-fãa ƴɛr-kpɛ̃w ɩ̃ jↄrↄ.
45008001	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, yel ma lɛ pↄwrↄ a bala na be a Jeeju-Kirisi pʋↄ wa.
45008002	A-na-ɩ a Jeeju-Kirisi pʋↄ ɩ̃ na be, a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ƴɛr-kpɛ̃w kʋ ma na a baafʋ, faa nɩ ma a maal-fãa nɩ a kũu ƴɛr-kpɛn pʋↄ.
45008003	A Naaŋmɩn maalʼã a ala a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn na ma dãa tʋↄrↄ wa, a-na-ɩ a nɩrɛ wãa balʼã. Ʋ tʋ̃ na a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ Bie, ʋ tɛrɛ a ɩ̃gan buur a maal-fãa sʋbↄ kaarɩ̃ a maal-fãa ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w ʋ a kũu pʋↄ sãw nɩ a nɩrɛ maal-fãa fãw bar,
45008004	a mɩnɛ sɩ na tʋↄrↄ maala a ala a jaa a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn na bʋↄrↄ a sɩ jie, a ala ɩ saa cere tuure nɩ a sɩ wãa wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a sɩ na cere tuure nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.
45008005	A-na-ɩ a bala na cere tuure nɩ a ba wãa ma ƴↄ̃w na a ba tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ a ɩ̃gan buur yele pʋↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a bala na cere tuure nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ma ƴↄ̃w na a ba tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ a ala a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na bʋↄrↄ pʋↄ.
45008006	A ɩ̃gan buur yele bↄfʋ cere na a kũu pʋↄ, ɩ̃--cɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ yele bↄfʋ tɛrɛ na a baafʋ nɩ a pɩɛnfʋ.
45008007	A ɩ̃gan buur yele bↄfʋ Ꞌlaarʼã a Naaŋmɩn. ꞋWaa jↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn wa, ɩ̃ Ꞌwaa mɩ tʋↄrↄ jↄrↄ ʋ wa.
45008008	A bala na cere tuure nɩ a ba ɩ̃gan buur tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ ma tʋↄrↄ maala a nʋmↄ a Naaŋmɩn wa.
45008009	Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, nyaa cere tuure nɩ a nyɩ ɩ̃gan buur tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ wa. A Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nyɩ tuure, a-na-ɩ a ʋ Sɩɛ be na a nyɩ pʋ̃ↄ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na ma tɛrɛ a Kirisi Sɩɛ wa, ma ɩ a ʋ ben wa.
45008010	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a Kirisi be na a nyɩ pʋ̃ↄ, a ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a nyɩ ɩ̃gan na kpi na a nyɩ maal-fãa ɩnɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩ sɩɛ pↄw na a baafʋ a nyɩ torfʋ ɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw.
45008011	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a Sɩɛ ʋlↄ na dãa maal a Jeeju ʋ ir a kũu pʋↄ mɩ be na a nyɩ pʋ̃ↄ, a ʋlↄ na maal a Jeeju-Kirisi ʋ ir a kũu pʋↄ nↄↄ mɩ kʋ na a nyɩ ɩ̃gan na ɩ a bõ-kpiiraa a baa-paalaa, a yi a ʋ Sɩɛ na be a nyɩ pʋ̃ↄ jie.
45008012	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ yɛɛr, sɩ dɩ na san a Naaŋmɩn jie. Aa ɩ ɩ̃gan buur san ʋ a sɩ na cere tuure nɩ a ɩ̃gan buur wa.
45008013	A nyɩmɩ eere tuure nɩ a fãa ala a nyɩ ɩ̃gan buur na bʋↄrↄ, nyɩ na kpi na. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nyɩ sãw nɩ a nyɩ ɩ̃gan buur maal-bie bar, nyɩ na tɛrɛ na a baafʋ.
45008014	A bala ba jaa a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na tↄwrↄ, bala ɩ̃ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn bibiir.
45008015	A-na-ɩ a Sɩɛ ʋlↄ sɩ na pↄw ma ƴↄnↄ sɩ a gbãgbaa ɩfʋ pʋↄ a sɩ na lɛ jↄrↄ a dãbɩ̃ɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ sɩ pↄw na a Sɩɛ ʋlↄ na lɩɛb sɩ á sɩ́ ɩrɛ a Naaŋmɩn bibiir, a sɩ na tʋↄ bʋↄlↄ ʋ a “Aba,” a lɛ yelʼã “ɩ̃ Sãa.”
45008016	A Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ mɩ̃ɛ nɩ a sɩ sɩɛ pↄw na taa ɩ̃ man sɩ a sɩ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn bibiir.
45008017	A ala ɩ sɩ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn bibiir, sɩ na pↄw na a yel-sono ala a Naaŋmɩn na pʋlɩ̃ nɩ sɩ. Sɩ na lãa na pↄw a ala nɩ a Kirisi, a-na-ɩ sɩ lãa na be taa a ʋ hʋʋr pʋↄ, a mɩnɛ sɩ nↄↄ mɩ lãa beree nɩ ʋ a ʋ yo-yifʋ pʋↄ.
45008018	Ɩ̃ tɩɛrʼã bↄ̃w ka a won na sɩ na nyɛrɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, saa tʋↄrↄ diere ʋ mana nɩ a Naaŋmɩn yo-yifʋ yele ala ʋ nↄↄ miile sɩ wa.
45008019	A tẽw ʋ jaa a Naaŋmɩn na maal, ɓĩɓine na cɛlɛ nɩ a daar ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn nↄↄ miile a ʋ bi-dabsɩ a ba yire cãa pʋↄ.
45008020	A-na-ɩ a tẽw mɩ yara na a yaan a pↄrↄ, ɩ̃ aa ɩ ʋlↄ bʋↄrↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w ʋ. Ɩ̃ tɩɛrʋ̃ son cãa na be be,
45008021	a-na-ɩ a tẽw mɩ̃ɛ ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na maal na nyɛ na a faafʋ a daar kãw a fãw ʋlↄ pʋↄ ʋ na be ɩ a gbãgbaa sãwna. Ʋ na yi na na pↄw a faafʋ ʋlↄ na be a Naaŋmɩn bibiir na-yele pʋↄ.
45008022	Wa ta nɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, sɩ bↄ̃w ka a tẽw yele a jaa ʋʋnↄ na nyɛrɛ nɩ a nãw wↄ̃ taa nɩ a pↄw na dↄwrↄ.
45008023	Ɩ̃ aa ɩ a tẽw yele tɛw ʋ wa. A sɩmɩ na tɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn dãdãw bõ-pↄrↄ ʋ na kʋ sɩ, sɩ mɩ ʋʋnↄ na a sɩ suur pʋↄ, cɛlɛ nɩ a daar ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na lɩɛbɛ sɩ a sɩ ɩrɛ a ʋ bibiir, mɩ faara nɩ sɩ a ɩ̃gan ʋ jaa.
45008024	A Naaŋmɩn faa sɩ na ɩ̃ mɩ kʋ sɩ a ʋna gufʋ tɩɛrʋ̃ son naa. A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ nyɛ na a bom ʋlↄ ʋ na dãa gure, a ʋ gufʋ tɩɛrʋ̃ son ma lɛ ɩ bom wa. A bom ʋlↄ a nɩrɛ na nyɛ baar, mɩnɛ ʋ na lɛ ɩ ɩ̃ lɛ tɩɛrɛ nɩ ʋ?
45008025	Ɩ̃-cɛ, a ala ɩ sɩ tɩɛrɛ na a bom ʋlↄ sɩ na ma nyɛ wa, su-nyↄwraa sɩ tɛrɛ cɛlɛ nɩ ʋ.
45008026	A lɛ ʋ mɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ma mɩ wa sũo a sɩmɩ na bal. A-na-ɩ saa bↄ̃w a mɩnɛ na sɛw a sɩ na ma puor a Naaŋmɩn wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ ma sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄnↄ sɩ, ʋʋnↄ nɩ a ʋʋnfʋ ʋlↄ na ma tʋↄrↄ ƴɛrɛ wa.
45008027	A ʋlↄ na jʋʋrↄ a nɩrɛ suur bↄ̃w na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃, a-na-ɩ ʋ ma sʋↄrↄ na ƴↄnↄ a bala na ɩ a ʋ ben, tuure nɩ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na bʋↄrↄ.
45008028	Sɩ bↄ̃w na ka a Naaŋmɩn gbɛɛrɛ na a yele a jaa a mɩnɛ a na ɩ a son a bala na nʋnↄ ʋ jie, nɩ a bala ʋ na bʋↄl tu nɩ a mɩnɛ ʋ na ƴↄ̃w nyãa.
45008029	A korĩ-cɛ jaa a Naaŋmɩn vɛlʼã ir a nɩbɛ bala ʋ na bↄ̃w, ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w ba a ba na lɩɛb wↄ̃ a ʋ Bi-daba kaarɩ̃, a mɩnɛ a ʋ Bi-daba na tʋↄ ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ a yɛɛr yaw sↄ̃w.
45008030	A bala a Naaŋmɩn na vɛl ir ƴↄ̃w a lɛ, ʋ mɩ bʋↄl ba na. Ɩ̃ a bala ʋ na bʋↄl, ʋ mɩ lɩɛb ba na a ba tor. Ɩ̃ a bala ʋ na lɩɛb a ba tor, ʋ mɩ maal ba na a ba pↄw a ʋ yo-yifʋ yele.
45008031	Bõ sɩ na lɛ yel go? A ala ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ɓã sɩ na, ala na lɛ tʋↄ jɛbʼɩ̃ sɩ?
45008032	ꞋWaa sↄw mↄ̃w sɩ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ Bie wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ de ʋ na bar ʋ kpɛ a kũu pʋↄ a sɩ jaa ɩnɛ; ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, mɩnɛ ʋ kↄ̃ lɛ kʋ sɩ a yele a jaa ɓã sɩ wa?
45008033	Ala na tʋↄ ƴↄ̃w a bala a Naaŋmɩn na vɛl ir a ƴɛrɩ̃? Nɩrɛ ma tʋↄrↄ wa, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn nyɛ ba na a ba tor.
45008034	Ala na tʋↄ ƴↄ̃w ba a yel? Nɩrɛ ma tʋↄrↄ wa, a-na-ɩ a Jeeju-Kirisi ɩ̃ ɩ a ʋlↄ na dãa kpi. Ɩ̃ aa ɩ a lɛ tɛw ʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ mɩ irʼã a kũu pʋↄ ɩ̃ jɛ a Naaŋmɩn dʋrɩ̃ loor, mɩ sʋↄrↄ ʋ ƴↄnↄ sɩ.
45008035	Ala na tʋↄ ŋmaa sɩ bar a Kirisi nʋfʋ pʋↄ? A won, a hʋʋr, a kpowfʋ, a kↄ, a nãw nyɛfʋ, a jãjĩ mɩɩ a sɩ kúfʋ na tʋↄ na mɩɩ?
45008036	A mɩnɛ a na yel a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “A fʋ̃ʋ saa a ba ƴↄnↄ sɩ a kũu pʋↄ a bibie a jaa. Ba de sɩ na a sɩ wↄ̃ taa nɩ piir ba na cere nɩ a kúfʋ jie.”
45008037	Ɩ̃ a ala a jaa fɛw pʋↄ, sɩ nyɩrɩ̃ na lɛ tɛrɛ a tʋↄfʋ, a yi a ʋlↄ na nʋ sɩ jie.
45008038	A-na-ɩ ɩ̃ bↄ̃w na bↄ̃w ka bom ma be be na tʋↄrↄ ŋmaara sɩ a Naaŋmɩn nʋfʋ pʋↄ wa. A kↄ̃ ɩ a kũu, mɩɩ a baafʋ, a sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ, a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ, mɩɩ a fãwsɩ nɩŋmɛɛ ʋ wa. A kↄ̃ mɩ ɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ yele mɩɩ a nɩdaar yele wa.
45008039	A kↄ̃ mɩ lɛ ɩ a saꞋlon mɩɩ a kpɩɩn tẽw fãwsɩ mɩɩ a bom kãw lɛ a Naaŋmɩn na maal wa. Bom ma be be na tʋↄrↄ ŋmaara sɩ a Naaŋmɩn nʋfʋ ʋlↄ ʋ na kʋ sɩ a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi jie wa.
45009001	-
45009002	1Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na ɩa Kirisi nɩrɛ, maa ŋmaa jiri wa. A nã-kpɛ̃ɛ be na a ɩ̃ suur pʋↄ a daar a jaa, a suur nyɩrɩ̃ sãw ma. A ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ bↄ̃wfʋ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na tↄwrↄ, mɩ man ma na a lɛ.
45009003	-
45009004	Ɩ̃ na tʋↄ na bʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn ʋ pↄ ƴↄ̃w ma, ŋmaa taa nɩ ma a Kirisi, a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ ɩnɛ na ɩ a ɩ̃ yɛɛr nɩ a ɩ̃ bal nɩbɛ. A Naaŋmɩn de ba na a ba ɩ a ʋ bibiir, ɩ̃ sↄw miil ba a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ a cãa kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, mɩ cↄↄrɩ̃ nɩ ba a pʋlɩ̃-tar ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, mɩ kʋ nɩ ba a ʋ ƴɛr-kpɛn, ɩ̃ lɛ miil ba a mɩnɛ ba na puoro ʋ, lɛ pʋlɩ̃ nɩ ba a yele.
45009005	A korĩ-cɛ saanba na dãa tuure a Naaŋmɩn sↄr ɩ na a ba dↄↄrbↄ, ɩ̃ a Kirisi mɩ ɩ a ba nɩrɛ a ɩ̃gan buur pʋↄ. u tɛrɛ a pɛwfʋ a daar a jaa, a ʋlↄ na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn na gãw a yele a jaa. Amɛn.
45009006	Aa ɩ wↄ̃ taa nɩ a Naaŋmɩn pʋlɩ̃fʋ sãw na wa. A-na-ɩ aa ɩ a Ɩsɩrayɛl bal nɩbɛ ba jaa ɩ̃ ɩ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ tↄr jaa wa.
45009007	Ɩ̃ aa mɩ ɩ a Abʋraham bal parvʋↄr ɩ̃ ɩ a ʋ bibiir tↄr ba jaa wa. A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn dãa na pʋlɩ̃ nɩ ʋ: “A Ɩjakɩ bibiir, bala tɛw ba nↄↄ bʋↄlↄ a fʋ bal nɩbɛ.”
45009008	Á lɛ yelʼã, aa ɩ a bala ba na dↄw a ɩ̃gan buur dↄwfʋ ɩ̃ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn bibiir wa. A bala tɛw ba na dↄw tu nɩ a Naaŋmɩn pʋlɩfʋ ba de a ba ɩ a Abʋraham bal nɩbɛ.
45009009	Nyɛ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na dãa pʋlɩ̃: “A daar wa ta, ɩ̃ na lɛ wa na, ɩ̃ a Sara na dↄw na a dabile.”
45009010	Ɩ̃ aa ɩ a nↄhↄ̃ tɛw a Naaŋmɩn na maal wa. A Erebeka bi-dabsɩ ayi tɛrɛ na a sãa bõ-ƴen na ɩ a sɩ sãa-kʋmↄ Ɩjakɩ.
45009011	-
45009012	Ɩ̃-cɛ, a lɛ ba na ma dãa dↄw ba sɛr wa, a baa mɩ maal a fãa mɩɩ a son wa, a Naaŋmɩn yel ʋ na, áa kpɛ̃ɛ nↄↄ tʋnↄ na kʋrↄ a bile. A Naaŋmɩn bʋↄrↄ na ʋ miil a nↄhↄ̃ á ʋ tɛrɛ na a ʋ maalfʋ, vɛlɛ ire nɩ a nɩbɛ.
