Ʋ maa vɛl ir a ʋ nɩrɛ tu nɩ a ʋ maal-bie wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ ma vɛl ʋ na ir tu nɩ a ʋlↄ Naaŋmɩn bʋↄlfʋ, a mɩnɛ a ʋ pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ na tʋↄ maal wa baar.
45009013	A mɩnɛ a na yel a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “A Jakↄb ɩ̃ nʋ, ɩ̃ Ꞌlaar a Ejayu.”
45009014	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ bõ sɩ na yel? Sɩ na yelʼã áa Naaŋmɩn ɩ na Naaŋmɩn gõgolaa? Aa tʋↄrↄ ɩrɛɛ a lɛ wa.
45009015	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn dãa na yel a Mowisi: “Ɩ̃ na bↄ̃w na a ʋlↄ na sɛw ɩ̃ bↄ̃w a nãw; ɩ̃ na mɩ maalʼã a vɩlaa a ʋlↄ na sɛw ɩ̃ maal a vɩlaa.”
45009016	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ala a jaa ma yi a nɩrɛ kãw pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ pʋↄ mɩɩ a ʋ fãgã jie wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn tɛw na tɛrɛ a nã-bↄ̃wfʋ jie a yi.
45009017	A mɩnɛ a na sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ, a Naaŋmɩn yelʼã a Ejibti-tẽw jamana: “Ɩ̃ biin fʋ na a fʋ ɩ a jamana a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na tʋↄ de fʋ miilʼɩ̃ a ɩ̃ fãw, nɩ a mɩnɛ a ɩ̃ yuor na tʋↄ yi pↄw a tẽw ʋ jaa.”
45009018	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a Naaŋmɩn ma bↄ̃w na a nãw a ʋlↄ ʋ na bʋↄrↄ jie, ɩ̃ mɩ kpɛmɛ a ʋlↄ ʋ na bʋↄrↄ suur.
45009019	A nʋmↄ-wa-sↄw fʋ na yel ma na: “A ala ɩ lɛ a be, bõ ɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na lɛ cãa soor sɩ a fãa ƴɛrɩ̃? Ala na tʋↄ jaar a ʋ pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃?”
45009020	Ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ̃ʋ na ɩ a nɩrɛ, ala fʋ ɩ, na mɩ cɩɩlɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn? A lakpow na tʋↄ na yel a ʋ mɩɛrɛ, á bõ ɩnɛ ʋ mɛ ʋ a nↄhↄ̃ mɩɩ?
45009021	A lakpo-mɩɛrɛ ma tɛrɛ sↄr na maalʼɩ̃ a ʋ yaaraa a ala ʋ na bʋↄrↄ wa? ꞋWaa tʋↄrↄ diere a ʋna yaaraa mɩɛrɛ nɩ a lakpo-vɩlaa, ɩ̃ lɛ cɩɛrɛ mɩɛrɛ nɩ a lakpow lɛ ʋ na bʋↄrↄ wa mɩɩ?
45009022	Aa ɩ Ɩɛ a Naaŋmɩn mɩ dãa maal a nɩbɛ wa? Ʋ dãa na bʋↄrↄ a nɩbɛ ba bↄ̃w a ʋ su-tuo a ba maal-fãa ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ mɩ nyɛ a ʋ fãgã, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ dãa na cãa tɛrɛ a su-nyↄwraa a ba jie, a bala a ʋ su-tuo na dãa sɛw na wɛl bar.
45009023	Ʋ maalʼã a lɛ bʋↄrↄ ʋ miilʼɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a ʋ yo-yifʋ na nyɩrɩ̃ bɛrmɛ a bala ʋ na bↄ̃w nɩ a nãw jie, a bala ʋ na mɩ dãa de nĩe gbɛɛrɩ̃ a ʋ na-yele pↄwfʋ ɩnɛ.
45009024	A sɩmɩ mɩ a Naaŋmɩn na vɛl ir, sɩ mɩ be na a ba pʋↄ. Ɩ̃ saa yi a Jufisɩ sↄ̃w tɛw wa, ɩ̃-cɛ sɩ mɩ yi na a nɩ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ sↄ̃w mɩ.
45009025	A mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na yel a Oje sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “A nɩbɛ bala na ma dãa ɩ a ɩ̃ ben wa, ɩ̃ nↄↄ bʋↄl ba na a ɩ̃ nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ a bala ɩ̃ na ma dãa nʋnↄ wa, ɩ̃ nↄↄ bʋↄl ba na a ɩ̃ nɩ-nʋnɩsɩ.
45009026	Ɩ̃ a jie ʋlↄ ba na dãa yel á baa ɩ a ɩ̃ nɩbɛ wa, a be naan ba nↄↄ lɛ bʋↄl ba a Naaŋmɩn-mimir bibiir.”
45009027	A Ejayi mɩ dãa na hier a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ ɩnɛ: “A ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ waa na jɛ̃ taa nɩ a man biire, ɩ̃-cɛ a fɩ̃ɩ tɛw nↄↄ wa cɩ̃ɛ,
45009028	a-na-ɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nↄↄ maalʼã a tẽw pʋↄ a ala ʋ na dãa yel fↄfↄw, wa ta nɩ a bɛwfʋ jie.”
45009029	A mɩnɛ a Ejayi na mɩ dãa de nĩe yel: “A ala ma dãa ɩ a fãwsɩ a jaa Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ma dãa bar sɩ a bal bʋrↄ ŋmɛɛr wa, a naa dãa na be sɩ a Sↄdↄm deme kaarɩ̃, ɩ̃ a sɩ mɩ lɩɛb wↄ̃ taa nɩ a Gↄmↄↄr nɩbɛ.”
45009030	Sɩ́ lɛ pãa yel a bõ? Sɩ na yelʼã, áa nɩ-kpeesɩ na ma dãa bʋↄrↄ a torfʋ a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw wa, ba pↄw na a ʋna torfʋ a yi a ba ƴↄ̃w-nyãa jie.
45009031	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ na dãa bʋↄrↄ a ƴɛr-kpɛn na tʋↄrↄ maala ba a ba toro a Naaŋmɩn jie ma dãa tʋↄ lɛ pↄw wa.
45009032	Bõ ɩnɛ? A-na-ɩ a ba bↄfʋ pʋↄ baa dãa bʋↄrↄ nɩ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ba bↄfʋ yi na a ba tʋmↄ jie tɛw.
45009033	Ba ŋme na a gbɛr a kubir pʋↄ ʋlↄ na ma kpara a nɩbɛ, tu nɩ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na yel: “Nyɩ́ nyɛ! Ɩ̃ biine na a kubir ʋlↄ na ma kpara a nɩbɛ a Sɩ̃ↄ-tẽw pʋↄ, a kʋsɩpan ʋlↄ nↄↄ maala ba a ba loro, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na ƴↄ̃w ʋ a nyãa, vĩ kↄ̃ wa kpɛ ʋ fɩ̃ɩ wa.”
45010001	Yɛɛr, a ala a ɩ̃ suur na bʋↄrↄ, ɩ̃ ma mɩ sʋↄrↄ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ɩ na, a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ ba pↄw a faafʋ.
45010002	Ɩ̃ na tʋↄ na de a ba ƴɛrɩ̃ man a mɩnɛ ba na ma ɓĩɓine a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ maalfʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ baa tɛrɛ bↄ̃wfʋ a ba ɓĩɓinfʋ pʋↄ wa.
45010003	Ba baala na a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na ɩrɛ ɩ̃ lɩɛbɛ ba a ba toro a ʋ nii-sↄw. Baa jↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn torfʋ sↄr wa; a ba mɩ̃ɛ torfʋ sↄr ba lɩɛb bↄ.
45010004	A-na-ɩ a Kirisi cenʼɩ̃ na a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn na ta nɩ a baarfʋ jie, a mɩnɛ a nɩrɛ lɛ na sↄw de ʋ, ʋ na tʋↄ na tor a Naaŋmɩn jie.
45010005	A ala ɩ a torfʋ ʋlↄ na yire a ƴɛr-kpɛn jↄfʋ pʋↄ ʋ, a Mowisi sɛbʼã yel: “A nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na maala a ala a jaa a ƴɛr-kpɛn na bʋↄrↄ na pↄw na a baafʋ a ala ɩnɛ.”
45010006	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ a torfʋ ʋlↄ na yire a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa pʋↄ ʋ, nyɛ a mɩnɛ a Mowisi na dãa yel: “Taa wa lɩɛb soor a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ, á ala na do a saa juu?” (a lɛ bʋↄrↄ na a yel á ala na maal a Kirisi ʋ suu.)
45010007	“Taa wa mɩ lɩɛb soor a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ, á ala na suu a kpɩɩn tẽw?” (a lɛ bʋↄrↄ na a yel á ala na yi nɩ a Kirisi a kũusɩ jie.)
45010008	Ɩ̃-cɛ bõ a Mowisi lɛ yel? Ʋ yelʼã: “A ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ be na a fʋ nʋↄr pʋↄ nɩ a fʋ suur pʋↄ; Ꞌwaa jãa nɩ fʋ wa.” Ʋ ɩ na a ʋna ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ƴɛrɩ̃ sɩ na ma hiere kʋrↄ nyɩ.
45010009	A ala ɩ fʋ cã na yelʼɩ̃ a fʋ nʋↄr áa Jeeju ɩ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ mɩ sↄw nɩ a fʋ suur, áa Naaŋmɩn maal ʋ na ʋ ir a kũu pʋↄ, fʋ na pↄw na a faafʋ.
45010010	A-na-ɩ a suur a nɩrɛ na sↄw nɩ ɩ̃ lɩɛb tor a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ a ʋ nʋↄr ʋ na mɩ cã nɩ yel, ɩ̃ pↄw a faafʋ a Naaŋmɩn jie.
45010011	A mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na yel, áa nɩrɛ lɛ na sↄw de ʋ, vĩ kↄ̃ wa kpɛ ʋ fɩ̃ɩ wa.
45010012	A Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw, a Jufisɩ nɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ ma be kpee kpee wa, a-na-ɩ a ba jaa tɛrɛ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃-bõ-ƴen na tɛrɛ a na-yele a bala ba jaa na bʋↄlↄ a ʋ yuor ɩnɛ.
45010013	A mɩnɛ a na sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “A nɩrɛ lɛ na bʋↄlↄ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yuor na pↄw na a faafʋ.”
45010014	Ɩ̃ mɩnɛ ba na ɩ ɩ̃ bʋↄl a ʋ yuor a ala ɩ baa sↄw de ʋ wa? Ɩ̃ mɩnɛ ba na mɩ ɩ ɩ̃ sↄw de ʋ a ala ɩ baa wõ a ba ƴɛr a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa? Ɩ̃ mɩnɛ ba na mɩ lɛ ɩ ɩ̃ wõ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ a ala ɩ a nɩrɛ ma be be hiere wa?
45010015	Ɩ̃ mɩnɛ ba na ɩ ɩ̃ hier a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ a ala ɩ nɩbɛ ma be be na tʋ̃ ba wa? A mɩnɛ a na sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “Nyɛ a mɩnɛ a bala na hiere a ƴɛr-son wafʋ na vɩɛlɛ!”
45010016	Ɩ̃-cɛ aa ɩ nɩbɛ ba jaa ɩ̃ jↄ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son wa. A mɩnɛ a Ejayi na mɩ dãa yel: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ala ɩ̃ sↄw de a sɩ ƴɛrɩ̃?”
45010017	A lɛ, a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ sↄw-defʋ yi na a cɛlfʋ jie, ɩ̃ a ala sɩ na cɛlɛ ɩ na a Kirisi ƴɛrɩ̃.
45010018	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ sooro na: Baa wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃ wa mɩɩ? Ↄↄ, ba wõ ʋ na, a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na yel: “A ƴɛr-hierbe kↄkɩr yi na pↄw a jiir a jaa, ɩ̃ a ba ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ cen na ta a tẽw bɛwfʋ jie.”
45010019	Ɩ̃ lɛ sooro na go: A Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ kↄ̃ dãa bↄ̃w a par wa? Ɩ̃ na tʋↄ na de nĩe miil nyɩ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na yel a Mowisi. Ʋ yelʼã: “Ɩ̃ na ƴↄ̃w nyɩ na a nyɩ tɛrɛ a nyuur a nɩ-bʋlsɩ jie, ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ a suur a ʋna tẽw naa nɩbɛ na ma tɛrɛ yɛ̃ wa ɩnɛ.”
45010020	A Ejayi mɩ Ꞌla na ƴɛr a ƴɛr-bir ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na yel: “A nɩbɛ bala na ma dãa bʋↄrↄ ba pↄw ma wa, ba nyɛ ma na. Ɩ̃ mɩ nyɩrʼã a bala na ma dãa soor ma wa.”
45010021	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ ʋ, ʋ yel ba na: “A dʋ̃Ꞌwʋlɩ̃ wa ta nɩ a jaanʋↄr, ɩ̃ ma turʼã a nur bʋↄlↄ nɩ a nɩbɛ bala na ɩ a to-woonbo nɩ a cɩcɩɩrbɛ.”
45011001	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, ɩ̃ sooro na: a Naaŋmɩn jaarʼã a ʋ nɩbɛ bar mɩɩ? Aa tʋↄrↄ ɩrɛ a lɛ wa. A maa mɩ̃ɛ, Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩrɛ ɩ̃ ɩ. A ɩ̃ sãa-kʋmↄ nɩ a Abʋraham; ɩ̃ ɩ na a Bɛ̃jamɛ bal nɩrɛ.
45011002	A Naaŋmɩn ma jaar a ʋ nɩbɛ bar wa. Ʋ bↄ̃w ba na korĩ-cɛ jaa a ba ɩ a ʋ ben. Má nyɩ bↄ̃w na a ala a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na yel a Eli ƴɛrɩ̃ pʋↄ, a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa waala a ala a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ na maal a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw.
45011003	Ʋ yelʼã: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ba kú na a fʋ ƴɛr-hierbe, wɛlʼɩ̃ a fʋ baar lofʋ jiir bar. Maa ɩ̃ yẽ tɛw ɩ̃ cɛ, a ba mɩ bʋↄrↄ ba kú ma.”
45011004	Ɩ̃ mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn dãa kʋ a Eli a sↄwfʋ? Ʋ yel ʋ na: “Ɩ̃ cãa na tɛrɛ nɩbɛ ture anuu-nʼayi na ma gburĩ a dume puor a ba naaŋmɩn na dɩ a Baal wa.”
45011005	A lɛ a mɩ be a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃. Nɩbɛ fɩ̃ɩ cãa na be be a Naaŋmɩn na vɛl ir a ʋ su-pɩlaa ɩnɛ.
45011006	Ʋ vɛl ba na ir a yi a ʋ su-pɩlaa jie, ɩ̃ aa yi a ba tʋmↄ ɩnɛ wa. A ala ma ɩ lɛ ʋ wa, a ʋ su-pɩlaa ma tʋↄrↄ ɩrɛ su-pɩlaa wa.
45011007	Ɩ̃ mɩnɛ mↄↄ? A Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ faa na a ala ba na bʋↄrↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a bala tɛw a Naaŋmɩn na vɛl ir ɩ̃ pↄw. Ɩ̃ a bala na cɛ, a ba sube kpɛmɛ na.
45011008	A mɩnɛ a na sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “A Naaŋmɩn maal ba na a ba faa a yɛ̃, tɛrɛ a mimie ɩ̃ ma nyɛrɛ wa, ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ a tobo ɩ̃ ma mɩ wono wa, wa ta nɩ a dɩnaa.”
45011009	Ɩ̃ a Davɩtɩ mɩ yelʼã a ʋ sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “Wↄ̃ taa nɩ a ba fɛtɩsɩ a lɩɛb ɩ cakpo mɩɩ bɛraa, nyↄↄr ba a ba lo pↄw a kpãafʋ.
45011010	Wↄ̃ taa nɩ a ba mimie a mɩ lɛ jↄ̃w a baa tʋↄrↄ nyɛrɛ wa. Wↄ̃ taa nɩ ba mɩ tuoro a toe a daar a jaa kↄ̃ pↄw pɩɛnfʋ wa.”
45011011	Ɩ̃ lɛ soorʼã go: a Jufisɩ na ŋme a gbɛr lo, daadaa ba faa lo mɩɩ? Aa tʋↄrↄ ɩrɛ a lɛ wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ba bɩɛfʋ ɩ̃ saa a faafʋ ta a nɩ-bʋlsɩ jie a mɩnɛ a Jufisɩ na tɛrɛ nɩ ba a nyuur.
45011012	A ala ɩ a Jufisɩ bɩɛfʋ ɩ̃ saa a nɩbɛ ba jaa pↄw a na-yele, ɩ̃ a ba wurfʋ ɩnɛ a na-yele mɩ ta a nɩ-bʋlsɩ, mɩnɛ a na pãa wↄ̃ a lɛdaar ba na lɩɛbɛ ba jaa pↄwrↄ a faafʋ!
45011013	A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a nyɩmɩ nɩ-bʋlsɩ ɩ̃ bʋrↄ nɩ. A mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na ƴↄ̃w ma ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩ-tʋnaa a nɩ-bʋlsɩ jie, ɩ̃ cɩlɛ na a ʋna tʋn naa pʋↄ,
45011014	ɩ̃ mɩ maala a bom jaa lɛ bʋↄrↄ nɩ a nyuur a nyↄw a ɩ̃ nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ na tʋↄ faa a nɩŋmɛɛ.
45011015	A ala ɩ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ lↄb-barfʋ maalʼã a tẽw nɩbɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn a ba ɓaalɩ̃ taa, bõ na ta a lɛdaar a Naaŋmɩn na lↄↄ diere ba? A na ɩ na a bala na kpi kũu-pʋↄ-irfʋ̃!
45011016	A ala ɩ ba de na nĩe ŋmaa a bur-bir ŋmãa kʋ a Naaŋmɩn, a buru ʋ jaa ɩ na a ʋ ben. A ala ɩ a tɩɛ kãw nyɩbɛ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn ben, a ʋ wulbie mɩ ɩ na a ʋ ben.
45011017	A Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a olivi tɩɛ ba na sɛl, ɩ̃ cɛ a ʋ wulbie ŋmɛɛr ŋma bar. Ɩ̃ a fʋ̃ʋ na ma ɩ a Jufi nɩrɛ wa, fʋ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a mↄↄpʋↄ olivi tɩɛ wulbir ba na ŋmaa wa nɩ cow a wulbie ala na cɛ sↄ̃w, a fʋ na mɩ tʋↄ pↄw a sʋmↄ ala na yi a nyɩbɛ pʋↄ ɩ̃ duoro guolo a tɩɛ.
45011018	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ taa tɩɛr beeka fʋ̃ sa na a wulbie ala ba na ŋma bar wa. A ala ɩ fʋ bʋↄrↄ na fʋ vʋ̃ a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ, a sɛw na fʋ bↄ̃w ka aa ɩ fʋ̃ʋ guolo a nyɩbɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ bala ɩ̃ guolo fʋ.
45011019	Fʋ na tʋↄ na yel: “Má a ɩ̃ cowfʋ ɩnɛ ba ŋma a ana wulbie bar!”
45011020	Ↄↄ, a lɛ ʋ. A mɩnɛ ba na ma tɛrɛ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa wa, a ala ɩnɛ ba ŋma ba bar, ɩ̃-cɛ a-na-ɩ a fʋ̃ʋ, fʋ tɛrɛ na a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa, a ala ɩnɛ fʋ de a ba jie. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ taa wa bʋↄrↄ a yuor wa, ɩ̃-cɛ bↄ̃w jʋʋrↄ.
45011021	A-na-ɩ a ala ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ma dãa sↄw bar a Jufisɩ na ɩ a tɩɛ mɩ̃ɛ wulbie wa, ʋ kↄ̃ wa mɩ bar fʋ wa.
45011022	Nyɛ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na tɛrɛ a yɛ̃-bↄ̃wfʋ nɩ a bierfʋ. Ʋ bierʼã a bala na lo jie, ɩ̃ bↄ̃w a yɛ̃ a fʋ jie, a ala ɩ fʋ cãa na cere a mɩnɛ a ʋ yɛ̃-bↄ̃wfʋ na bʋↄrↄ. A ala ma ɩ lɛ ʋ wa ba na mɩ ŋmaa fʋ na bar,
45011023	ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a Jufisɩ lɩɛbʼã ɩ̃ bar a ba su-kpɛn tɛrɛfʋ, a Naaŋmɩn na lɛ cow ba na ƴↄ̃w a tɩɛ ʋlↄ pʋↄ ba na dãa be. A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn na tʋↄ na lɛ maal a lɛ.
45011024	A fʋ̃ʋ na ma ɩ a Jufi nɩrɛ wa, fʋ ɩ na a mↄↄpʋↄ olivi tɩɛ wulbir, a ba ŋmaa wa nɩ cow ƴↄ̃w a olivi tɩ-sɛlaa pʋↄ fʋ na ma dãa bↄ̃w wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a Jufisɩ bala, ba ɩ na a tɩ-sɛlaa ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ wulbie. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a na nyɩrɩ̃ na yↄw a ba na lɛ lɩɛb cow ba ƴↄ̃w a ba mɩ̃ɛ tɩɛ pʋↄ ba na dãa be.
45011025	Yɛɛr, maa bʋↄrↄ nyɩ baala a ƴɛr-sↄↄlaa na ɩ̃ na mana nyɩ ɩnɛ wa, a mɩnɛ a nyɩ kↄ̃ↄ de a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ tɩɛr beeka nɩ-kpaarsɩ nyɩ ɩ wa. A ɩ na a mɩnɛ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ na lɩɛb kpɛmɛ a sube, ɩ̃-cɛ a ala na cenʼã, wa ta nɩ a lɛdaar a nɩ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ba jaa nↄↄ wa kpɛɛrɛ pↄwrↄ a faafʋ.
45011026	Ɩ̃ a nↄhↄ̃ a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ ba jaa na pãa pↄw a faafʋ, a mɩnɛ a na sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “A Fafaara nↄↄ yi na a Sɩ̃ↄ-tẽw wa, na ʋ ir a bier maalfʋ a Jakↄb bal nɩbɛ sↄ̃w bar.
45011027	Nyɛ a pʋlɩ̃-taa ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ nↄↄ cↄↄrɩ̃ nɩ ba, a lɛ ɩ̃ nↄↄ ire a ba maal-faar bara.”
45011028	A sɩmɩ Ꞌwuor a mɩnɛ a Jufisɩ na jaar a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son bar, ba lɩɛbʼã ɩ a Naaŋmɩn sama-deme a mɩnɛ a nyɩ na pↄw a son. Ɩ̃ a sɩmɩ lɛ Ꞌwuor a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na vɛl ba ir, ba ɩ na a nɩ-nʋnɩsɩ a ba sãa-kʋnbↄ ɩnɛ.
45011029	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn maa kʋ nɩrɛ bom ɩ̃ lɛ fáa wa. Ʋ maa mɩ lɛ bʋↄl nɩrɛ ɩ̃ lɛ bar ʋ wa.
45011030	A korĩ-cɛ, nyɩ dãa na wõw a toor a Naaŋmɩn jie, ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn nã-bↄ̃wfʋ ta nyɩ na a Jufisɩ to-wõwfʋ ɩnɛ.
45011031	A lɛ ʋ mɩ a Jufisɩ bala, ba wõw na a toor a Naaŋmɩn jie a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a nyɩmɩ na tʋↄ pↄw a Naaŋmɩn nã-bↄ̃wfʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ a na ɩ a mɩnɛ a bala mɩ̃ɛ na mɩ tʋↄ pãa pↄw a ʋna nã-bↄ̃wfʋ naa a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na.
45011032	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn pↄw na a nɩbɛ ba jaa a to-wõwfʋ kasu pʋↄ a mɩnɛ ʋ na tʋↄ miil ba ba jaa a ʋ nã-bↄ̃wfʋ.
45011033	Nyɩ́ nyɛ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn lefʋ na bɛrmɛ! A ʋ kpaarfʋ nɩ a ʋ bↄ̃wfʋ ma tɛrɛ tɛwfʋ wa. Ala na tʋↄ bↄ̃w a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ par? Ala na tʋↄ nyɛ a sↄr ʋ na ma de cen?
45011034	A mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na yel: “Ala ɩ̃ dãa bↄ̃w a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ tɩɛrʋ̃? Ala mɩ dãa ɩ a ʋ yɛ̃-mana?
45011035	Ala ɩ̃ dãa de nĩe kʋ a Naaŋmɩn bom ʋ na mɩ lɩɛb ya ʋ?”
45011036	A-na-ɩ a ʋ jie a yele a jaa yi, ʋlↄ maal ba jaa, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ mɩ sↄ ba. Ʋlↄ sↄ a yo-yifʋ a daar a jaa. Amɛn.
45012001	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ yɛɛr, a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na bↄ̃w sɩ a nãw, ɩ̃ kpãkpana nyɩ na a nyɩ de a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a Naaŋmɩn, a nyɩ ɩ a baar-lo-bõ-mimir na ɩ a cɛcɛ kpɛ a Naaŋmɩn nyãa; a-na-ɩ lɛ ɩ̃ ɩ a puor-son nyɩ na sɛw nyɩ puoro ʋ.
45012002	Nyɩ taa ɩ a nyɩ maalfʋ a wↄ̃ a tẽw na nɩbɛ maalfʋ kaarɩ̃ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ bar a Naaŋmɩn ʋ lɩɛb a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ tↄr jaa, tu nɩ a mɩnɛ a nyɩ yɛ̃ na lɩɛb. A nↄhↄ̃ nyɩ na tʋↄ na bↄ̃w a ala na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃, a ala na ɩ a son, a ala na nʋmↄ, nɩ a ala na ɩ a cɛcɛ.
45012003	A mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na sũo nɩ ma a ʋ tʋↄfʋ, ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na nyɩ jaa fɛw, a nyɩ taa tɩɛrɛ beeka nyɩ ɩ na nɩrɛ gãw a mɩnɛ a na sɛw wa, ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ ɛ̃ɛ tɛrɛ tɩɛrɩ̃-vɛlɛ, tu nɩ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na kʋ nyɩ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa bõ-ƴene-ƴene.
45012004	A nɩ-bõ-ƴen ɩ̃gan tɛrɛ na jiir yayaw na mɩ tɛrɛ a ba tʋmↄ kpee kpee.
45012005	A lɛ ʋ mɩ, a mɩnɛ sɩ na saarɩ̃ waa, ɩ̃ ɩ̃gan bõ-ƴen sɩ ɩ a Kirisi pʋↄ, a sɩ jaa bõ-ƴene-ƴene mɩ ɓã na taa ɩ a ʋna ɩ̃gan bõ-ƴen ɓãbie.
45012006	Sɩ tɛrɛ na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tʋmↄ kpee kpee tu nɩ a ʋ sũofʋ a sɩ jie. A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ tʋↄfʋ ɩ na ʋ na bʋʋrↄ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃, ú bʋʋrↄ tuure nɩ a mɩnɛ a ʋ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa na be.
45012007	A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ ben mɩ ɩ na ú tʋnↄ a tʋmↄ kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ, ú tʋnↄ kʋrↄ ba. A ʋlↄ ben na ɩ a nɩbɛ jaanfʋ, ú jaana ba.
45012008	A ʋlↄ ben go na ɩ a nɩŋmɛɛ kpãkpanfʋ, ú kpãkpana ba. A ʋlↄ ben na ɩ ú sũono a nɩbɛ nɩ a ʋ yele, ú tɛrɛ pʋ-pɩlaa sũono nɩ ba. A nɩrɛ kãw ben wa ɩ ú ɩ a ni-diere, ú bↄ̃w cɛlɛ tↄ maala. A ʋlↄ na pↄw a tʋↄfʋ a nãw deme sũofʋ ɩnɛ, ú sũono ba nɩ nʋ̃ↄ.
45012009	Nyɩ taa ɩ a nyɩ nʋfʋ ʋ nyanyaa nɩ a bɛlɩ̃fʋ wa. Nyɩ́ Ꞌlaar a fãa, ɩ̃ mar taa nɩ a son vɩlaa vɩlaa.
45012010	Nyɩ́ bↄ̃w nyↄw taa nɩ a nʋfʋ a yɛɛr kaarɩ̃, mɩ cʋrↄ taa, tɛrɛ nɩ a ƴↄ̃wfʋ a nyɩ sↄ̃w.
45012011	Nyɩ taa ɩ tõtol deme wa, ɩ̃ nyɩ́ ɛ̃ɛ ɩ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ, tʋlↄ nɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ tʋmↄ pʋↄ.
45012012	Nyɩ́ cɩlɛ a nyɩ tɩɛrʋ̃ son ɩnɛ, tɛrɛ nɩ a su-nyↄwraa a kpowfʋ pʋↄ, ɩraa nɩ cĩcĩ a Naaŋmɩn sʋↄrfʋ pʋↄ.
45012013	Nyɩ́ sũono a popuorbo bala na be a nãw pʋↄ, ɩ̃ bↄ̃w diere a saanba bala na wɩɛrɛ a nyɩ jie.
45012014	Nyɩ́ sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn ʋ maal a bala na hʋↄlↄ nyɩ a vɩlaa. Nyɩ taa sↄnↄ ba wa, ɩ̃ nyɩ́ ɛ̃ɛ sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄnↄ ba.
45012015	Nyɩ́ cɩlɛ nɩ a bala na cɩlɛ, ɩ̃ pↄw a bala na kono, kono nɩ.
45012016	Nyɩ́ pↄwrↄ taa, tɛrɛ nɩ nↄ-bõ-ƴen a nyɩ sↄ̃w. Nyɩ taa ɩ yo-bʋↄrbↄ wa, ɩ̃ nyɩ́ ɛ̃ɛ bal a nãw deme jie. Nyɩ taa de a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a nyɩ ɩ nɩ-kpaarsɩ wa.
45012017	Nyɩ taa de a fãa lɩɛb ya a fãa wa. Nyɩ́ ɩ a nyɩ tʋmↄ a ɩ tʋ̃-son a nɩbɛ ba jaa nii-sↄw.
45012018	A ala ɩ a nyɩ jie a yi, nyɩ́ dɩ tuo ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a pɩɛnfʋ nɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa.
45012019	Ɩ̃ badɛɛ, nyɩ taa yawra a san nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ bar kʋ a Naaŋmɩn su-tuo ʋ yaw, a-na-ɩ a sɛbʼã a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yelʼã, á ʋlↄ sↄ a san yawfʋ, á ʋlↄ na lɩɛb ya ba.”
45012020	A lɛ sɛbʼã yel go: “A kↄ wa nyↄw a fʋ san-sʋbↄ, á fú kʋ ʋ a dɩb ʋ dɩ. A kʋ̃ↄ-nyuur ɩ̃ nyↄw ʋ mɩɩ, á fú kʋ ʋ a kʋ̃ↄ ʋ nyu. A fʋ̃ʋ maala a lɛ, a vĩ na lɩɛbʼã dɩrɛ ʋ wↄ̃ taa nɩ a vũu-sala fʋ na woor dↄↄl a ʋ juumɩ a dɩrɛ ʋ.”
45012021	Taa ɩ a nɩrɛ maal-bier tʋↄ fʋ wa; ɩ̃ a fʋ̃ʋ, fú ɛ̃ɛ de a fʋ maal-vɩlaa tʋↄ nɩ a maal-bier.
45013001	A sɛw na a nɩrɛ lɛ na wur a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ a fãgã deme na Ꞌwuoro a tẽw jie, a-na-ɩ fãgã ma be be ɩ̃ ma yi a Naaŋmɩn jie wa, ɩ̃ a fãgã deme na be a ka, Naaŋmɩn biin ba ba jaa.
45013002	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ʋlↄ na jɛbɛ nɩ a fãgã deme, ʋ jɛbɛ nɩ na a fãgã ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na biin, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ nↄↄ maala a lɛ na taw na a yel dↄↄl a ʋ juumɩ.
45013003	A bala na maala a vɩlaa, baa sɛw na jↄrↄ a tẽw nɩ-bɛrɛ dãbɩ̃ɛ wa. ɩ̃-cɛ a bala tɛw na maala a fãa ɩ̃ sɛw na jↄrↄ ba. Faa bʋↄrↄ fʋ jↄrↄ a fãgã deme dãbɩ̃ɛ wa mɩɩ? Maala a vɩlaa ɩ̃ ba na kpiire fʋ na.
45013004	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn tʋmↄ pʋↄ ba be ƴↄnↄ fʋ̃ a vɩla-maalfʋ pʋↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ̃ʋ maala a bier, jↄrↄ ba a dãbɩ̃ɛ, a-na-ɩ aa ɩ pↄrↄ ba tɛrɛ a fãgã kpãana nɩ wa. A Naaŋmɩn su-tuo ba miile, waara nɩ a ʋ kpãafʋ a ʋlↄ na maala a bier jie.
45013005	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a ɩna son a fʋ na wur a fʋ̃ mɩ̃ɛ a ba jie, a kↄ̃ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn suur ɩnɛ tɛw ʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a na mɩ yi a fʋ̃ mɩ̃ɛ bↄ̃wfʋ jie.
45013006	A ala ɩnɛ nyɩ ma yara a lãpo, a-na-ɩ a fãgã deme bala na cɛlɛ tↄ a ana tʋmↄ ɩ na a tʋ̃tʋnbↄ a Naaŋmɩn na biin.
45013007	Nyɩ́ ya a nɩrɛ lɛ a bom lɛ nyɩ na tɛrɛ ʋ. A lãpo ʋ mɩɩ, nyɩ́ ya ʋ; a sɛbɛ kãw libie ʋ mɩɩ, nyɩ́ ya ʋ. Nyɩ́ jↄrↄ a ʋlↄ na sɛw nɩ a jↄfʋ, ɩ̃ ƴↄnↄ a ʋlↄ na sɛw nɩ a ƴↄ̃wfʋ.
45013008	Nyɩ taa tɛrɛ nɩrɛ san ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a nʋfʋ nyɩ na nʋnↄ taa a nyɩ sↄ̃w wa, a-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ na nʋnↄ a ʋ tↄ deme, ʋ maalʼã a ƴɛr-kpɛn a jaa baar.
45013009	A-na-ɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn ala yelʼã: “Taa wa gana nɩ pↄw kpee mɩɩ a dab-kpee wa, taa wa kúrↄ nɩrɛ wa, taa wa jure wa, taa Ꞌwuoro nɩrɛ bom a Ꞌwuor-fãa wa”. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛr-kpɛn ala a jaa, nɩ a ala na cɛ, tiw na a ƴɛr-kpɛ̃w bõ-ƴen pʋↄ na yel: “Nʋnↄ a fʋ tↄ sʋbↄ a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ kaarɩ̃.”
45013010	A fʋ̃ʋ na nʋnↄ a fʋ tↄ sʋbↄ, faa lɛ tʋↄrↄ maala ʋ a fãa wa. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a nʋfʋ a lɛ maalʼã a ƴɛr-kpɛn a jaa baar.
45013011	Nyɩ́ bↄ̃w maala a lɛ, a-na-ɩ nyɩ bↄ̃w na a daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ sɩ na be. A gʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ irfʋ daar ta na. A faafʋ pɩɛl sɩ na a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, gãw a sɩ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa nyↄwfʋ daar.
45013012	A tɩsↄw tↄlↄ na, a wɩɛr kpaarʼã. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, sɩ́ bar a tʋmↄ ala na ma maala a tɩsↄw, ɩ̃ lɩɛb de a jɛb-yele ala sɩ na jɛbɛ nɩ a cãa pʋↄ.
45013013	Sɩ́ ɩ a sɩ maalfʋ ʋ vɩɛlɛ a mɩnɛ a na sɛw a cãa pʋↄ. Sɩ́ bↄ̃w tɛrɛ a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ a kpokpo dɩb dɩfʋ, a dãa kʋfʋ, a gã-ta-burbur, a pebfʋ, a gↄm-bↄfʋ nɩ a nyuur tɛrɛfʋ ɩnɛ.
45013014	Nyɩ́ bar a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi baa-paalaa ʋ pↄw nyɩ. Nyɩ taa bar a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ ʋ tɛrɛ a ɩ̃gan buur tɩɛrʋ̃, maala nɩ a ala ʋ na bʋↄrↄ wa.
45014001	Nyɩ́ sↄw de a ʋlↄ na bal a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa pʋↄ, kↄ̃ cɩɩrɛ a ʋ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ wa.
45014002	Nɩrɛ ƴen sʋbↄ na tʋↄ na tɛrɛ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa dɩrɛ nɩ a yele a jaa, ɩ̃-cɛ a kãw na bal a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa pʋↄ dɩrɛ na a jɛ-vɛɛ tɛw.
45014003	A ʋlↄ na dɩrɛ a yele a jaa ma sɛw na kpɛrɛ a ʋlↄ na ma dɩrɛ a jaa wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na ma dɩrɛ a yele a jaa wa, ma mɩ sɛw ʋ ƴↄ̃w a ʋlↄ na dɩrɛ a jaa a ƴɛrɩ̃ wa, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn sↄw na de ʋ.
45014004	Bõ fʋ ɩ ɩ̃ ƴↄnↄ a nɩrɛ kãw tʋ̃tʋnↄ a ƴɛrɩ̃? A ʋlↄ ɩraa a cĩcĩ mɩɩ ʋ faa na Ɩo, a ʋ nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ a ba. Ɩ̃ ʋ na ɩra na cĩcĩ, a-na-ɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ tɛrɛ na kpɛ̃w na nyↄw ʋ ʋ ɩraa.
45014005	Yen sʋbↄ na tɩɛrʼã a bibir kãw sa na a bibie ŋmɛɛ, ɩ̃ a kãw tɩɛr áa bibie a jaa ma sa taa wa. A sɛw na a ba jaa na sɩrɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka a ba tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ vɩɛlɛ na.
45014006	A ʋlↄ na de a bibir bõ-ƴen ʋ be kpee, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋ de ƴↄnↄ nɩ. Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na dɩrɛ a jaa, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋ dɩrɛ ƴↄnↄ nɩ, a-na-ɩ ʋ puorʼã a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w a ala pʋↄ. Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na jaara a ala, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋ mɩ maala ƴↄnↄ nɩ, a-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ mɩ, mɩ puorʼã a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w a ala pʋↄ.
45014007	Nɩrɛ kãw ma be ka a sɩ sↄ̃w a tẽw pʋↄ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɩnɛ wa, ɩ̃ nɩrɛ kãw ma mɩ be a sɩ sↄ̃w ɩ̃ kpi a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɩnɛ wa.
45014008	A sɩmɩ na be ka a tẽw pʋↄ, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩnɛ sɩ be ka. A sɩmɩ mɩ kpi, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩnɛ sɩ mɩ kpi. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a sɩmɩ be ka a tẽw pʋↄ mɩɩ sɩ kpi na, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃ sↄ sɩ.
45014009	A Kirisĩ kpi na ɩ̃ ir a kũu pʋↄ na tʋↄ ɩ a nɩ-mimie nɩ a kũusɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ.
45014010	Ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ̃ʋ, bõ ɩnɛ fʋ ƴↄnↄ a fʋ yɛbɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃? Mɩɩ bõ ɩnɛ fʋ mɩ kpɛrɛ ʋ? A-na-ɩ a sɩ jaa nↄↄ ɩraa na a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ ɩnɛ.
45014011	A-na-ɩ a sɛbʼã a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “A maa na ɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃-mimir ɩ̃ yel, a nɩbɛ ba jaa nↄↄ gburĩ na a dume a ɩ̃ nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ a ba jaa nↄɛ nↄↄ haa na pɛw a Naaŋmɩn.”
45014012	A lɛ ʋ, a sɩ jaa fɛw bõ-ƴene-ƴene na manʼã a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ baafʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋ a Naaŋmɩn.
45014013	Nyɩ́ ɩ a ƴɛr-ƴↄ̃w-taa a na baar a sɩ sↄ̃w, ɩ̃ a nyɩ ɛ̃ɛ de a maal-bie asɩmɛ: a nyɩ taa wa maal bom kãw na cɩɛrɛ a nyɩ yɛbɛ, mɩɩ na wa maala ʋ ʋ loro a fãa pʋↄ wa.
45014014	A mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na be a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju pʋↄ, ɩ̃ bↄ̃w na bↄ̃w ka bõ-dɩraa kãw ma be be na ɩ bõ-saanaa wa. Ɩ-cɛ a ala ɩ nɩrɛ wa de na a bom ʋ ɩa bõ-saanaa, a ʋ jie ʋ ɩ a saanaa.
45014015	A fʋ̃ʋ maal a cɛ a fʋ yɛbɛ a bõ-dɩraa kãw ɩnɛ fʋ na dɩrɛ, nʋfʋ ma lɛ be a fʋ maalfʋ pʋↄ wa. Taa ɩ a fʋ bom dɩfʋ ʋ maal a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ ɩnɛ a Kirisi na kpi, ʋ wa bↄr wa.
45014016	Nyɩ́ tɛrɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a ala nyɩ na nyɛ a ɩ a bõ-son, a kↄ̃ ɩ bõ-hũhunaa a nɩbɛ jie wa.
45014017	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ ƴɛrɩ̃ ma ɩ a bõ-dɩraa nɩ a bõ-nyuuraa ƴɛrɩ̃ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ ɩ na a torfʋ, a pɩɛnfʋ nɩ a nʋ̃ↄ ʋlↄ na yi a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ jie ƴɛrɩ̃.
45014018	A ʋlↄ na tʋnↄ a Kirisi tʋmↄ a nↄhↄ̃, ʋ maalfʋ kpɛ na a Naaŋmɩn a nyãa ɩ̃ mɩ vɩɛlɛ a nɩbɛ jie.
45014019	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, sɩ́ tuure a tʋmↄ ala na tɛrɛ a pɩɛnfʋ, nɩ a ala na maala sɩ a sɩ karɛɛ a Naaŋmɩn sↄr pʋↄ.
45014020	Taa sãw a Naaŋmɩn tʋmↄ bar a bõ-dɩraa ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩnɛ tɛw wa. Yel-mɩ̃ɛ ʋ, a yele a jaa sɛw na a dɩfʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ a nɩrɛ bom dɩfʋ maalʼã a ʋ yɛbɛ ʋ lo a fãa pʋↄ, bier ʋ maal.
45014021	A sa na a fʋ na jaara a nɩn Ꞌwↄbfʋ, mɩɩ a dãa nyufʋ, mɩɩ a bõ-lɛ dɩfʋ na wa maala a fʋ yɛbɛ ʋ loro.
45014022	Nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ jie a ʋ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ na ma ƴↄnↄ ʋ a ƴɛrɩ̃ wa a lɛ ʋ na maal a bom ʋlↄ ʋ na vɛl ir.
45014023	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na baala a dɩb ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ wa dɩ, na pↄw na a ƴɛrɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn jie, a-na-ɩ Ꞌwaa dɩ nɩ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa wa. Ɩ̃ a ala a jaa na ma yi a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa pʋↄ wa ɩ na a maal-fãa.
45015001	A sɩmɩ na tɛrɛ a kpɛ̃w, a sɛw na a sɩ na sũono a bala na ma kpɛmɛ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃ saa sɛw na maala a ala tɛw na nʋmↄ sɩ wa.
45015002	A sɩ jaa fɛw bõ-ƴene-ƴene sɛw na sɩ maala a ala na nʋmↄ a sɩ tↄ sʋbↄ, a na tʋↄ sũo ʋ ʋ karɛɛ a Naaŋmɩn sↄr pʋↄ.
45015003	A-na-ɩ a Kirisi mɩ̃ɛ ma dãa tɩɛrɛ a ala na nʋmↄ ʋ tɛw wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ a na sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “A tʋ-bie ala na yi a bala na tʋrↄ fʋ jie lɩɛbʼã lo a ɩ̃ juumɩ.”
45015004	A ala a jaa ba na dãa sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ a korĩ-cɛ, a sɛbʼã a sɩ jaanfʋ ɩnɛ, a mɩnɛ a sɩ na tʋↄ tɛrɛ a gufʋ tɩɛrʋ̃ son a yi a sɩ su-nyↄwraa nɩ a sɩ ɓaalɩ̃fʋ ala jie sɩ na pↄw a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ.
45015005	A Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ na ɩ a su-nyↄwraa sʋbↄ nɩ a ɓaalɩ̃fʋ sʋbↄ, ú maal nyɩ a nyɩ tɛrɛ tɩɛrʋ̃ bõ-ƴen a nyɩ sↄ̃w, tuure nɩ a Jeeju-Kirisi pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃,
45015006	a mɩnɛ a nyɩ na lãa tɛrɛ nↄ-bõ-ƴen pɛwrɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ na ɩ a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi Sãa.
45015007	Nyɩ́ bↄ̃w pↄwrↄ taa a nyɩ sↄ̃w wↄ̃ taa nɩ a mɩnɛ a Kirisi na sↄw de nyɩ, a na maal a Naaŋmɩn yuor ʋ yire.
45015008	A-na-ɩ ɩ̃ yele nyɩ na, a Kirisi lɩɛbʼã ɩ a Jufisɩ tʋ̃tʋnↄ a Naaŋmɩn yel-mɩ̃ɛ miilfʋ ɩnɛ, a mɩnɛ ʋ na maal a pʋlɩ̃fʋ ala baar a Naaŋmɩn na dãa pʋlɩ̃ nɩ a ba sãa-kʋnbↄ.
45015009	Ɩ̃ ʋ mɩ wa na a nɩ-bʋlsɩ na tʋↄ pɛwrɛ a Naaŋmɩn a ʋ nã-bↄ̃wfʋ ɩnɛ, a mɩnɛ a na sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ na pɛwrɛ fʋ na a nɩ-bʋlsɩ sↄ̃w, ɩ̃ mɩ cɩɛrɛ a yele pɛwrɛ nɩ a fʋ yuor.”
45015010	A lɛ yelʼã go: “Nɩ-bʋlsɩ, nyɩ́ cɩlɛ nɩ a bala na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn deme.”
45015011	Ɩ̃ lɛ yel: “A nyɩmɩ nɩ-bʋlsɩ, nyɩ́ pɛwrɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nyɩ jaa. Áa nɩbɛ ba jaa, ba pɛwrɛ ʋ.”
45015012	A Ejayi mɩ yelʼã a ʋ sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “A Jɛsɩ bal nɩrɛ nↄↄ wa na wa ir de a nɩ-bʋlsɩ ten, ɩ̃ a ba jaa nↄↄ tɛrɛ nɩ ʋ na a tɩɛrʋ̃ son.”
45015013	A Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ na ɩ a tɩɛrʋ̃ son sʋbↄ, ú sɛw a nyɩ sube nɩ a nʋ̃ↄ nɩ a pɩɛnfʋ a nyɩ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ɩnɛ. A Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ fãw ú mɩ maal nyɩ á nyɩ́ tɛrɛ a tɩɛrʋ̃ son a ƴala a nyɩ jie.
45015014	Ɩ̃ yɛɛr, maa mɩ̃ɛ bↄ̃w na bↄ̃w ka nyɩ sɩrɩ̃ na ɩ a nɩ-sono tɛrɛ a bↄ̃wfʋ a jaa, na mɩ tʋↄ kʋ taa a yɛ̃ a nyɩ sↄ̃w.
45015015	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ cãa na sɛb nyɩ a sɛbɛ, yel nyɩ a yele ŋmɛɛ cãa pʋↄ a na tʋↄ jaw nyɩ a yele ala ɩnɛ. A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn wɩɛfʋ be na a ɩ̃ jie,
45015016	a mɩnɛ ʋ na ƴↄ̃w ma ɩ̃ ɩ a Jeeju-Kirisi tʋ̃tʋnↄ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ jie. A Naaŋmɩn tʋ̃-cɛcɛ ɩ̃ tʋnↄ hiere nɩ a ʋ ƴɛr-son, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na tʋↄ diere a nɩ-bʋlsɩ kʋrↄ a Naaŋmɩn a baar-lo-bom kaarɩ̃ na kpɛ ʋ a nyãa, a ʋ Sɩɛ na mɩ ow kpee, a ba ɩ a ʋ ben.
45015017	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na be a Jeeju-Kirisi pʋↄ, ɩ̃ barʼã tɩɛrʋ̃ a ɩ̃ tʋmↄ ɩ̃ na tʋnↄ kʋrↄ a Naaŋmɩn.
45015018	A ala ɩ ɩ̃ na sↄw na ƴɛr bom kãw, a na ɩ na a ala tɛw a Kirisi na maal a ɩ̃ ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ na wa nɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ a ba na wono a Naaŋmɩn a toor a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ nɩ a ala ɩ̃ na maal ɩnɛ,
45015019	a fãgã ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na maalʼɩ̃ nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ miilʼɩ̃ ba a Naaŋmɩn kpɛ̃w, nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ fãgã ba na mɩ nyɛ. A nↄhↄ̃ ɩ̃ manʼã a Kirisi ƴɛr-son ʋ jaa a jiir a jaa, wa nyↄw nɩ a Jerujalɛm wa ta nɩ a Ɩlɩrɩ wɩɛr.
45015020	A-na-ɩ ɩ̃ tɩɛrʋ̃ dãa na ɩ, ɩ man a ƴɛr-son a jiir ala tɛw ba na ma dãa wõ a Kirisi yuor sɛr wa, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ kↄ̃ wa mɛ ɩ̃ yir dↄↄl nɩrɛ dacin kparaa juu wa.
45015021	Ɩ̃-cɛ, ɩ̃ maalʼã a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na yel: “A bala ba na ma dãa hier a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ kʋ wa nↄↄ nyɛ ʋ na, ɩ̃ a bala na ma dãa wõ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa nↄↄ wonaa na.”
45015022	A tʋmↄ ala ɩ̃ dãa var ma a sↄr gbɛɛ yayaw a nyɩ jie wɩfʋ,
45015023	ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ɩ̃ baarʼã a ɩ̃ tʋmↄ a be a ana wɛɛ naa. Ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ a yõ-yaw pʋↄ ɩ̃ na dãa bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ wɩ nyɛ nyɩ,
45015024	a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a maa wa cere a Ɛsɩpan-tẽw ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na ɩ̃ Ꞌlaw Ꞌwuor nyɩ je kãa. A na nʋmↄ ma na a mɩnɛ sɩ na nyɛrɛ taa mɩ beree taa a bibie ala pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a ala baar ɩ̃ na mɩ pↄw a sũofʋ a nyɩ jie a ʋna tẽw naa cenfʋ ɩnɛ.
45015025	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃. Jerujalɛm ɩ̃ cere a Naaŋmɩn popuorbo tʋmↄ ɩnɛ na be a be.
45015026	A-na-ɩ a duo-puorbo bala na be a Masɛdↄn nɩ a Akayi ten guorʼã taa a libie cɩɛrfʋ a Naaŋmɩn bibiir bala na ɩ a nãw deme a Jerujalɛm ɩnɛ.
45015027	A bala mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ guor taa ba yẽ a ala maalfʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ a dãa na sɩrɩ̃ sɛw a ba na maal a lɛ. A-na-ɩ a ala ɩ a Jerujalɛm popuorbo ɩ na a ba po a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ yele nɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ, a nɩ-bʋlsɩ mɩ sɛw na na mɩ po a ba ɩ̃gan buur yele a mɩ sũo a Jerujalɛm popuorbo.
45015028	A maa wa maal a ʋna tʋn naa baar, na ɩ ɩ̃ de a libie ala ba na cɩɛr a jaa tɩɩr kʋ a Jerujalɛm deme, ɩ̃ na Ꞌlaw na nyɛ nyɩ, ɩ̃ pãa cere a Ɛsɩpan-tẽw.
45015029	Ɩ̃, ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka a lɛ ɩ̃ nↄↄ wɩɛrɛ a be a nyɩ jie, ɩ̃ na tɛrɛ na a Kirisi sũofʋ na ƴala, wɩ nɩ.
45015030	Yɛɛr, nyɩ́ nyɛ a ala ɩ̃ na sʋↄrↄ nɩ nyɩ a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi yuor, nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nʋfʋ ɩnɛ. Nyɩ́ pↄw ma a ɩ̃ jɛb pʋↄ, sʋↄrↄ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄnↄ ma,
45015031	a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na cɩ̃ɛ a Naaŋmɩn to-woonbo jie na be a Jude wɩɛr pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a popuorbo na mɩ sↄw de ma vɩlaa a libie ala ɩ̃ na cere nɩ.
45015032	A nↄhↄ̃, a Naaŋmɩn wa sↄw, ɩ̃ na ta na a be a nyɩ jie nɩ nʋ̃ↄ, mɩ pↄw nɩ a pɩɛnfʋ a nyɩ sↄ̃w.
45015033	A Naaŋmɩn na ɩ a pɩɛnfʋ sʋbↄ, ú be nɩ nyɩ nyɩ jaa. Ámɛn.
45016001	Ɩ̃ sʋↄr nyɩ na a sɩ yɛ-pↄw Febe ɩnɛ, a ʋlↄ na tʋnↄ a Naaŋmɩn tʋn a Sãkire-tẽw duo-puorbo sↄ̃w,
45016002	a nyɩ na bↄ̃w de ʋ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yuor pʋↄ, a mɩnɛ a na sɛw na maala a popuorbo sↄ̃w, ɩ̃ mɩ sũo ʋ a bom jaa lɛ pʋↄ ʋ na bʋↄrↄ. A ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ mɩ dãa na sũo nɩ-yaw, nɩ a ɩ̃ tↄr jaa.
45016003	Nyɩ́ puor a Pɩrɩsɩl nɩ a Akɩlasɩ kʋ ma. Ba ɩ na a ɩ̃ lãa-tʋnbↄ a Jeeju-Kirisi tʋmↄ pʋↄ,
45016004	ɩ̃ mɩ dãa sↄw a kũu a ɩ̃ baafʋ ɩnɛ. Aa ɩ maa tɛw ɩ̃ bↄ̃w wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ duo-puorbo ba jaa mɩ bↄ̃w na.
45016005	Nyɩ́ puor a duo-puorbo bala na ma duoro taa a be a ba yir pʋↄ. Nyɩ́ mɩ puor a ɩ̃ baraa Ɛpɛnɛtɩ, na ɩ a Kirisi popuor-dãdãw a Ajɩ-wɩɛr.
45016006	Nyɩ́ lɛ puor a Maarɩɩ na nyɩrɩ̃ tʋ̃ a tʋmↄ kʋ nyɩ.
45016007	Nyɩ́ puor a Ádɩrɛnɩkɩ nɩ a Jʋnyasɩ na ɩ a ɩ̃ bal nɩbɛ na dãa lãa be nɩ ma a kasu pʋↄ ɩ̃ a ba yuor na yi a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ pʋↄ. Ba de ma na nĩe puoro a Kirisi.
45016008	Nyɩ́ mɩ puor a Ápɩlate na ɩ a ɩ̃ baraa a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ.
45016009	Nyɩ́ lɛ puor a Ʋrbɛ̃ na ɩ a sɩ lãa-tʋnↄ a Kirisi tʋmↄ pʋↄ, nɩ a ɩ̃ baraa Sɩtakɩ.
45016010	Nyɩ́ puor a Apɛlɛ ba na Ꞌwuor nyɛ ʋ sɩrɩ̃ ɩraa a Kirisi sↄr pʋↄ. Nyɩ́ mɩ puor a Aritobul yir deme,
45016011	nɩ a Ɛrↄdɩyↄ̃ na mɩ ɩ a ɩ̃ bal nɩrɛ, ɩ̃ mɩ lɛ puor a Narsɩsɩ yir deme na lɩɛb ɩ a popuorbo.
45016012	Nyɩ́ mɩ lɛ puor a Tɩrɩfɛn nɩ a Tɩrɩfↄsɩ, na ɩ a pↄↄbↄ bala na tʋnↄ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ tʋmↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ puor a ɩ̃ yɛ-pↄw nʋnaa Pɛrsɩdɩ na tʋ̃ a tʋn yaw kʋ ʋ.
45016013	Nyɩ́ puor a Urufusi na tʋlↄ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩnɛ, nɩ a ʋ mã na mɩ dãa be a ɩ̃ mã kaarɩ̃.
45016014	Nyɩ́ mɩ puor a Asɛ̃kɩrɩ, nɩ a Filegↄ̃, a Ɛmɛsɩ, a Paturoba, a Ɛmasɩ nɩ a yɛɛr bala ba na be nɩ taa.
45016015	Nyɩ́ mɩ lɛ puor a Filolↄgɩ, nɩ a Juli, a Nere, nɩ a ʋ yɛ-pↄw Olɛ̃pa, lãa nɩ a Naaŋmɩn-puorbo bala na be nɩ ba.
45016016	Nyɩ́ puoro taa woro nɩ taa nɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yuor. A Kirisi popuorbo ji-gbulĩsɩ ba jaa puor nyɩ na.
45016017	Yɛɛr, ɩ̃ kpãkpana nyɩ na a nyɩ na bↄ̃w piire a bala na ma ŋmara a nɩbɛ a kpee kpee, mɩɩ maala ba a ba loro a fãa pʋↄ, cɩɩrɛ nɩ a jaanfʋ ʋlↄ nyɩ na dãa pↄw. Nyɩ́ taw a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ yi nɩ a ba jie,
45016018	a-na-ɩ a bana nɩ-bʋrↄ par ma tʋnↄ a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Kirisi tʋmↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ba mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃gan buur yele ba bʋↄrↄ. A ba ƴɛr-vɛlɛ nɩ a ba nↄ-kãa ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ba ma de bɛlɩ̃ nɩ a nɩ-ɓaara tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ.
45016019	A nyɩ toor wõfʋ ta na a jiir a jaa, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ cɩlɛ na a nyɩ maalfʋ ɩnɛ. Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na nyɩ ɩ nɩ-kpaarsɩ maala nɩ a vɩlaa, ɩ̃ ɩ cɛcɛ, sↄmↄ nɩ a bier.
45016020	Ɩ̃ ka nɩ fɩ̃ɩ pʋↄ, a Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ na ɩ a pɩɛnfʋ sʋbↄ na ŋmɩ̃ɛ na a Satã a nyɩ gbɛɛ pʋↄ. A sũofʋ na yi a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju sɛ̃ ú be a nyɩ jie!
45016021	A Timote na ɩ aɩ̃ lãa-tʋnↄ, nɩ a Lusiisi, a Jasↄ̃ nɩ a Sↄsɩpatɛɛr na ɩ a ɩ̃ bal nɩbɛ puor nyɩ na.
45016022	A maa Tɛrtiw mɩ̃ɛ na sɛb a sɛbɛ na, puor nyɩ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ.
45016023	A Gayisi na ɩ a ɩ̃ yir daba, lãa nɩ a popuorbo bala ba jaa na kpaara a be, puor nyɩ na. A Ɛrasɩtɩ na ɩ a tẽw libi-gure, nɩ a ɩ̃ yɛbɛ Kartu mɩ puor nyɩ na. [
45016024	A sũofʋ na yi a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi sɛ̃ ú be a nyɩ jie nyɩ jaa! Amɛn.]
45016025	Naaŋmɩn sↄ pɛwfʋ, a ʋlↄ na tʋↄrↄ maala nyɩ a nyɩ na ɩraa cĩcĩ, tu nɩ a ɩ̃ ƴɛr-son na ɩ a Jeeju-Kirisi ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ na hiere. A ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ dãa na sↄↄlɩ̃ a sɩ jie a korĩ-cɛ-cɛ jaa,
45016026	ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ʋ nyɩrʼã cãa pʋↄ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe sɛbsɩ pʋʋr, a mɩnɛ a ten bʋrↄ bʋrↄ nɩbɛ ba jaa na tʋↄ wõ a ʋna ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ sↄw de ʋ, wono nɩ ʋ a toor, tu nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ na ma be a kũu jie wa pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃.
45016027	A Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ tɛw na ɩ a kpaarfʋ sʋbↄ yuor ʋ yire a daar a jaa a Jeeju-Klrisi ɩnɛ! Amɛn.
46001001	A maa Pol nɩ a sɩ yɛbɛ Sↄsɩtɛn ɩ̃ lãa tɩɩrɛ a sɛbɛ na. A Naaŋmɩn vɛl ma na ir, ɩ̃ bʋↄl ma ɩ̃ ɩ a Jeeju-Kirisi nɩ-tʋnaa.
46001002	Sɩ tɩɩrɛ na a sɛbɛ na kʋrↄ a nyɩmɩ Naaŋmɩn duo-puorbo na be a Kↄrɛ̃tɩ-tẽw, a nyɩmɩ a Naaŋmɩn na ow a kpee a Jeeju-Kirisi pʋↄ a nyɩ ɩ a ʋ nɩbɛ, ɓã taa nɩ a bala ba jaa na be a jiir a jaa na bʋↄlↄ a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi yuor, na ɩ a ba Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a sɩ ben.
46001003	A sũofʋ nɩ a pɩɛnfʋ na yi a sɩ Sãa Naaŋmɩn nɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi sɛ̃ á be a nyɩ jie.
46001004	Ɩ̃ pɛwrɛ na a Naaŋmɩn a daar a jaa a nyɩ ɩnɛ a mɩnɛ ʋ na kʋ nyɩ a ʋ sũofʋ a Jeeju-Kirisi pʋↄ,
46001005	a-na-ɩ a ʋlↄ pʋↄ nyɩ le a yele a jaa ɩnɛ, a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ƴɛrfʋ nɩ a bↄ̃wfʋ pʋↄ a jaa.
46001006	A mɩnɛ nyɩ na sɩrɩ̃ nyↄw a Kirisi yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ a cĩcĩ ɩraa nɩ,
46001007	a Naaŋmɩn sũofʋ bom kãw ma ɓↄrↄ nyɩ wa, a nyɩmɩ na jɛ cɛlɛ a daar ʋlↄ a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi nↄↄ nyɩrɛ.
46001008	A ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ na tɛrɛ nyɩ na ɩraa nɩ cĩcĩ wa ta nɩ a baarfʋ daar, a mɩnɛ a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi waa dayen, a ba kↄ̃ tʋↄ nyɛ cɛfʋ jie a nyɩ jie wa.
46001009	A Naaŋmɩn ɩ na dẽdẽ, a ʋlↄ na bʋↄl nyɩ a nyɩ lãw taa nɩ a ʋ Bie Jeeju-Kirisi na ɩ a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ.
46001010	Yɛɛr, ɩ̃ sʋↄr nyɩ na nɩ a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi yuor, a nyɩ na mana taa nyɩ jaa. Nyɩ taa ŋmara kpee kpee wa, ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ bↄ̃w nyↄw taa tɛrɛ nɩ tɩɛrɩ̃-bõ-ƴen nɩ nↄ-bõ-ƴen.
46001011	A-na-ɩ yɛɛr, a Kilowe yir deme man ma na á faa-taa be na a nyɩ sↄ̃w.
46001012	A lɛ yelʼã a nyɩ jaa ma ƴɛrɛ na kpee kpee. A bõ-ƴen ma yelʼã: “Maa ɩ na a Pol nɩrɛ.” A kãw yel, á Apolosi nɩrɛ ʋ ɩ, a kãw go, á Pɩɛr nɩrɛ ʋ ɩ, ɩ̃ a ƴen sʋbↄ ma yel á Kirisi ben ʋ ɩ.
46001013	Nyɩ tɩɛr beeka ba dãa na ŋma a Kirisi kpee kpee po mɩɩ? A Pol ba dãa kpa a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu a nyɩ ɩnɛ mɩɩ? Mɩɩ a Pol yuor ba dãa de mʋrʼɩ̃ nyɩ a kʋ̃ↄ mɩɩ?
46001014	Ɩ̃ puoro na a Naaŋmɩn a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na ma dãa mʋr nɩrɛ kãw a kʋ̃ↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ma ɩ a Kirisipi nɩ a Gayisi tɛw ʋ wa.
46001015	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, nɩrɛ kãw ma tʋↄrↄ yele a ɩ̃ yuor ɩ̃ de mʋrʼɩ̃ nyɩ a kʋ̃ↄ wa.
46001016	(Ↄↄ, yel-mɩ̃ɛ ʋ! Ɩ̃ mɩ dãa na sɩrɩ̃ mʋr a Sitefana yir deme a kʋ̃ↄ. A ala ɩ̃ baar, maa lɛ bↄ̃w ka ɩ̃ mʋrʼã nɩrɛ kʋ̃ↄ go wa.)
46001017	A-na-ɩ a Kirisi ma tʋ̃ ma ɩ̃ wa kʋ̃ↄ mʋrfʋ ɩnɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ tʋ̃ ma na ɩ̃ wa ƴɛrɛ a ʋ ƴɛr-son. Aa ɩ a tẽw na pʋↄ kpaarfʋ ɩ̃ de ƴɛrɛ nɩ wa, a mɩnɛ a Kirisi kũu ʋ na kpi a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu kↄ̃ wa lɩɛb ɩ pↄrↄ wa.
46001018	A-na-ɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ na ɩ a Kirisi kũu a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu ɩ na dãbol ƴɛrɩ̃ a bala na wɛrɛ jie, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn kpɛ̃w a sɩmɩ jie na be a faafʋ sↄr pʋↄ.
46001019	A mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na yel: “Ɩ̃ na sãw na a nɩ-kpaarsɩ kpaarfʋ bar, ɩ̃ mɩ ir a yɛ̃-tɛrbɛ yɛ̃ bar.”
46001020	A ala be a lɛ, bõ a ʋlↄ na kpaar na lɛ yel go? Mɩɩ a ƴɛr-kpɛn-bↄ̃wnↄ, bõ ʋ na mɩ yel? A tẽw na cɩcɩɩrɛ, bõ ʋ na mɩ yel? A Naaŋmɩn ma lɩɛb a tẽw na kpaarfʋ ʋ ɩ dãbol yɛ̃ wa mɩɩ?
46001021	A-na-ɩ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn kpaarfʋ na maal a tẽw nɩbɛ a ba kↄ̃ tʋↄ bↄ̃w a Naaŋmɩn nɩ a ba kpaarfʋ wa, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a nʋmↄ ʋ ʋ na de a dãbol ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ sɩ na ƴɛrɛ, faara nɩ a bala na ƴↄ̃w ʋ a nyãa.
46001022	A Jufisɩ bʋↄrↄ na ba nyɛ a Naaŋmɩn tʋ̃-miilsɩ, ɩ̃ a Gɩrɛkɩ nɩbɛ bʋↄrↄ a kpaarfʋ.
46001023	Ɩ̃-cɛ a sɩmɩ ʋlↄ, sɩ hiere na a Kirisi ʋlↄ, ba na dãa kpa a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu ƴɛrɩ̃, na cɛ a Jufisɩ, ɩ̃ ɩ dãbol ƴɛrɩ̃ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ jie.
46001024	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a bala a Naaŋmɩn na bʋↄl ʋ, a Jufisɩ mɩɩ a Gɩrɛkɩ nɩbɛ, a Kirisi ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn kpɛ̃w nɩ a Naaŋmɩn kpaarfʋ a ba jie.
46001025	A-na-ɩ a ala a nɩbɛ na nyɛ a ɩ a dãbol ƴɛrɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn jie, tɛrɛ na kpaarfʋ gãw a nɩbɛ ben, ɩ̃ a ala ba na nyɛ a bal a Naaŋmɩn jie tɛrɛ na kpɛ̃w gãw a ba ben.
46001026	Ɩ̃ yɛɛr, nyɩ́ Ꞌwuor nyɛ a nyɩmɩ a Naaŋmɩn na bʋↄl. A tẽw na nɩ-kpaarsɩ ma waa a nyɩ sↄ̃w wa, a fãgã deme nɩ a naabsɩ bibiir ma mɩ waa wa.
46001027	Ɩ̃-cɛ a bala a tẽw na nɩbɛ na ma nyɛ a baa ɩ bom wa, bala a Naaŋmɩn ma de tʋ̃ nɩ, a vĩ kpɛ a nɩ-kpaarsɩ. Ɩ̃ a bala a tẽw na nɩbɛ na ma nyɛ a ba bal, bala a Naaŋmɩn ma de tʋ̃ nɩ, a vĩ kpɛ a nɩ-kpɛn.
46001028	A bala a tẽw na nɩbɛ na ma nyɛ a ba ɩ a nɩ-kpansɩ ma ɩ bom wa, a ba mɛbɛ, bala a Naaŋmɩn ma vɛl ir wɛlɛ nɩ a ala a nɩbɛ na ma kpiire,
46001029	a mɩnɛ a nɩrɛ lɛ kↄ̃ tʋↄ bↄ yuor a ʋ nii-sↄw wa.
46001030	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn ɩnɛ nyɩ ɓa taa nɩ a Jeeju-Kirisi, ɩ̃ ʋ ƴↄ̃w ʋ ʋ lɩɛb ɩ a sɩ kpaarfʋ. A Kirisi ɩnɛ sɩ tor a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw, ʋ mɩ ow sɩ kpee a sɩ ɩ a ʋ ben, ʋ faa sɩ yi nɩ a maal-fãa pʋↄ.
46001031	A mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na yel: “A ʋlↄ na bʋↄrↄ a yuor, ú bʋↄrↄ a yuor a ala a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na maal ɩnɛ.”
46002001	Yɛɛr, a lɛ ɩ̃ na dãa wɩ a nyɩ sɛ̃ na ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-sↄↄlaa kʋrↄ nyɩ, maa dãa wɩ nɩ kpaarfʋ mɩɩ bↄ̃bↄ̃wnↄ ƴɛr-bie wa.
46002002	A-na-ɩ a lɛ ɩ̃ na dãa be a nyɩ sↄ̃w, ɩ̃ nyɛ na a ɩ son ɩ̃ kↄ̃ ƴɛr ƴɛr-kpee ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Jeeju-Kirisi ƴɛrɩ̃ tɛw ʋ wa, a ʋlↄ ba na kpa a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu.
46002003	Balfʋ nɩ dãbɩ̃ɛ nɩ mĩfʋ ɩ̃ dãa be nɩ a nyɩ sɛ̃.
46002004	A ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ɩ̃ na dãa ƴɛrɛ mɩ hiere nɩ, ma dãa ɩ a tẽw na pʋↄ yɛ̃-ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a miile na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tʋmↄ nɩ a ʋ kpɛ̃w,
46002005	a mɩnɛ a nyɩ kↄ̃ ƴↄ̃w a nɩbɛ kpaarfʋ a nyãa wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn kpɛ̃w nyɩ ƴↄ̃w a nyãa.
46002006	Ɩ̃-cɛ sɩ ƴɛrɛ na a kpaarfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ nɩ a bala na bɩ a Naaŋmɩn sↄr pʋↄ, ɩ̃ aa ɩ a tẽw na kpaarfʋ ʋ wa; aa mɩ ɩ a tẽw na nɩ-bɛrɛ kpaarfʋ ʋ wa, a-na-ɩ ba na lo na daar kãw.
46002007	Ɩ̃ sɩ mana na a Naaŋmɩn kpaarfʋ na ɩ a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faaraa na sↄↄlɩ̃ a nɩbɛ jie, a ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na dãa gbɛɛrɩ̃ a sɩ yo-yifʋ ɩnɛ ɩ̃ ma dãa maal a tẽw sɛr wa.
46002008	A kpaarfʋ ʋlↄ, a tẽw na nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ kãw ma bↄ̃w ʋ wa. A ala dãa ɩ ba bↄ̃w ʋ na, ba kãa dãa kpa a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ na yi a yuor yaal a nɩ-kʋ-daa juu wa.
46002009	Ɩ̃ a ala sɩ na mana ɩ na a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na yel: “A Naaŋmɩn gbɛɛrɩ̃ na a ala a nɩrɛ mimir na ma dãa nyɛ wa, a toor na ma mɩ dãa wõ wa; a bom ʋlↄ a nɩrɛ na ma mɩ dãa tɩɛrʼɩ̃ wa, ala a Naaŋmɩn gbɛɛrɩ̃ a bala na nʋnↄ ʋ ɩnɛ.”
46002010	Ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn de na a ʋ Sɩɛ miilʼɩ̃ sɩ a ana yele, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ cɛ̃pɛrɛ na a yele a jaa, a ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a ala na sↄↄlɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn pʋↄ ʋ.
46002011	A nɩrɛ jie, ala na tʋↄ bↄ̃w a ala na be a ʋ pʋ̃ↄ, ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ sɩɛ ʋ wa? A lɛ ʋ mɩ a Naaŋmɩn jie. Nɩrɛ ma mɩ bↄ̃wnↄ a Naaŋmɩn yele, ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a ʋ Sɩɛ tɛw ʋ wa.
46002012	A sɩmɩ, saa pↄw a tẽw na yɛ̃ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a Sɩɛ ʋlↄ na yi a Naaŋmɩn jie sɩ pↄw, a mɩnɛ a sɩ na tʋↄ bↄ̃w nɩ a yele ala a Naaŋmɩn na kʋ sɩ a ʋ maal-vɩlaa ɩnɛ.
46002013	Sɩ maa de a ƴɛr-bie ala na yi a nɩbɛ kpaarfʋ pʋↄ mana nɩ a ana yele wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛr-bie ala a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na kʋ sɩ sɩ ma de mana nɩ. A nↄhↄ̃, sɩ ma de na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ yele mana kʋrↄ a bala na tɛrɛ a ʋna Sɩɛ.
46002014	A nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na ma tɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wa ma tʋↄrↄ pↄwrↄ a yele ala na yire a ʋ jie wa. A ʋna nɩrɛ jie, a ɩ na dãbol yele. ꞋWaa tʋↄrↄ bↄ̃wnↄ a par wa, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tɛw ba na tʋↄ bↄ̃w nɩ a yele ala par.
46002015	A nɩrɛ ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ, ʋ na tʋↄ na jʋʋr a bom lɛ bↄ̃w a par. Ɩ̃-cɛ nɩrɛ ma tʋↄrↄ bↄ̃wnↄ a ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ maalfʋ par wa.
46002016	A mɩnɛ a na yel a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “Ala ɩ̃ dãa bↄ̃w a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ tɩɛrʋ̃, na tʋↄ jaan ʋ a yɛ̃?” Ɩ̃-cɛ a sɩmɩ, sɩ tɛrɛ na a Kirisi tɩɛrʋ̃.
46003001	Yɛɛr, a ala ɩ maa ʋ, maa dãa tʋↄ ƴɛrʼɩ̃ nyɩ wↄ̃ taa nɩ a nɩbɛ na tɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ ɛ̃ɛ na ƴɛrʼɩ̃ uyɩ wↄ̃ taa nɩ a tẽw na nɩbɛ, a bala na wↄ̃ taa nɩ a bibiir a Kirisi sↄr pʋↄ.
46003002	Bʋrɩ̃ ɩ̃ kʋ nyɩ; aa ɩ saãb ʋ wa, a-na-ɩ nyaa dãa tʋↄrↄ dɩrɛ saab wa. Ɩ̃ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, nyaa mɩ cãa tʋↄrↄ dɩrɛ wa,
46003003	a-na-ɩ nyɩ cãa na maala a tẽw na nɩbɛ kaarɩ̃. A mɩnɛ a nyuur nɩ a faa-taa na be a nyɩ sↄ̃w, aa ɩ a tẽw na nɩbɛ kaarɩ̃ nyɩ cãa wↄ̃, na nyɩ cãa maala a mɩnɛ ba na mɩ maala wa?
46003004	A mɩnɛ a bõ-ƴen na ma yel á ʋ ɩ na a Pol ben, ɩ̃ a kãw ma yel á Apolosi ben ʋ ɩ, nyaa cãa maala a nɩbɛ ba jaa kaarɩ̃ wa?
46003005	A-na-ɩ bõ a Apolosi ɩ, ɩ̃ bõ a Pol mɩ ɩ? Naaŋmɩn tʋ̃tʋnbↄ sɩ ɩ, na tↄw nyɩ ƴↄ̃w á nyɩ sↄw de a Kirisi ƴɛrɩ̃, tu nɩ a ala a Naaŋmɩn na kʋ sɩ bõ-ƴene-ƴene a sɩ na maal.
46003006	Maa ɩ̃ dãa sɛl, a Apolosi sɛ a kʋ̃ↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ maal a karɩ̃.
46003007	A lɛ ʋ, a ʋlↄ na sɛl, nɩ a ʋlↄ na sɛ a kʋ̃ↄ ma ɩ bom wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn na maala a tɩɛ ʋ karɛɛ ɩ̃ ɩ a bom.
46003008	A sɛsɛlɛ nɩ a sɛsɛrɛ jɛ̃ na tar, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn na ya ba na bõ-ƴene-ƴene tu nɩ a mɩnɛ ba na tʋ̃.
46003009	A sɩmɩ, sɩ ɩ na a lãa-tʋnbↄ a Naaŋmɩn tʋmↄ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a nyɩ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn puo. Nyɩ mɩ ɩ na a yir ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na mɩɛrɛ.
46003010	A mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na sũo ma ɩ̃ ɩ a yi-mɛ-gãdaa, ɩ̃ binʼã a dacin kparaa, ɩ̃ a ƴen sʋbↄ mɩɛrɛ dↄↄlↄ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩrɛ lɛ sɛw na ʋ bↄ̃w mɩɛrɛ dↄↄlↄ.
46003011	A dacin par gↄrʼã be be na ɩ a Jeeju-Kirisi. Nɩrɛ kãw ma be be na lɛ tʋↄrↄ bine bõ-kpee go wa.
46003012	Á ŋmɛɛ na dↄↄlʼɩ̃ na sɛlmɛ, mɩɩ kur pɩlaa, mɩɩ kubi-ɓↄmↄ, ɩ̃ a nɩŋmɛɛ dↄↄlʼɩ̃ daar, a mʋ̃ↄ, mɩɩ kakɩɛ.
46003013	A nɩbɛ ba jaa tʋmↄ na nyɩrʼã cãa pʋↄ, a-na-ɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ dayen, a vũu na miilʼã a mɩnɛ a na wↄ̃. A ʋna vũu naa na bɩɩrʼã a nɩbɛ ba jaa tʋmↄ bↄ̃w a mɩnɛ a na be.
46003014	A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ tʋn ʋ na tʋ̃ dↄↄl cãa na ɩraa, a vũu ma dɩ wa, ʋ na pↄw na a yar.
46003015	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩrɛ tʋmↄ wa dɩ, Ꞌwaa Ꞌlɛmɛ a yar wa, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ na pↄw na a faafʋ wↄ̃ taa nɩ nɩrɛ na jↄ yi vũu pʋↄ cɩ̃ɛ.
46003016	Nyaa bↄ̃w ka Naaŋmɩn di-tuo nyɩ ɩ, a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ be a nyɩ pʋ̃ↄ wa?
46003017	A nɩrɛ wa wɛl a Naaŋmɩu di-tuo bar, a Naaŋmɩn na mɩ wɛl ʋ na bar. A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn die ʋlↄ ɩ ua bõ-tuo, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ nyɩ ɩ.
46003018	Nɩrɛ ʋ taa wa bɛlɛ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ wa. A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ be na a nyɩ sↄ̃w ɩ̃ tɩɛr beeka ʋ tɛrɛ na a tẽw na kpaarfʋ, a sɛw na ʋ lɩɛb ɩ dãbol, a mɩnɛ ʋ na sɩrɩ̃ lɩɛb ɩ a nɩ-kpaaraa.
46003019	A-na-ɩ a tẽw na kpaarfʋ ɩ na dãbol bom a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw, a mɩnɛ a na sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “A Naaŋmɩn ma de na a tẽw na nɩ-kpaarsɩ kpɩlfʋ lɩɛb nyↄwrↄ nɩ ba.”
46003020	A lɛ sɛbʼã yel go: “A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ bↄ̃w na a nɩ-kpaarsɩ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ, bↄ̃w ka aa ɩ bom wa.”
46003021	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, nɩrɛ kãw ʋ taa wa bʋↄrↄ yuor nɩrɛ ɩnɛ wa, a-na-ɩ a nyɩmɩ sↄ a yele a jaa.
46003022	A Pol, nɩ a Ápolosi, nɩ a Pɩɛr, nɩ a tẽw na, nɩ a baafʋ, nɩ a kũu, nɩ a daarʼã, nɩ a daar ʋlↄ nↄↄ waara, nyɩmɩ sↄ a jaa.
46003023	Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, Kirisi ɩ̃ sↄ nyɩ, ɩ̃ a Kirisi, Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ sↄ ʋ.
46004001	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, nyɩ sɛw na nyɩ ma de sɩ a sɩ ɩ a Kirisi tʋ̃tʋnbↄ, a bala a Naaŋmɩn na de a ba ɩ a ʋ yel-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ ꞋwoꞋwuorbo.
46004002	Ɩ̃ a ala ba na ma nyɩrɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ a yel-Ꞌwuoro jie ɩ na, ʋ ɩ dẽdẽ.
46004003	A maa jie, a ala ɩ nyɩ guoro na a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ mɩɩ a tẽw nɩ-bɛrɛ ɩ̃ guoro, aa ɩ ma bom wa. A maa mɩ̃ɛ, maa mɩ guoro a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa.
46004004	A ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ bↄ̃wfʋ ma miil ma bõ-bier wa; ɩ̃-cɛ maa yel a ɩ̃ torʼã a lɛ wa. A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ ƴɛr-guoro.
46004005	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, nyɩ taa de nĩe guor a ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋ daar ma ta sɛr wa. Ɩ̃-eɛ nyɩ́ bar wa ta nɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ waa. A ʋlↄ na maal a ala na sↄↄlɩ̃ a libe pʋↄ a yi cãa pʋↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ maal a nɩbɛ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ ala na be a ba pʋʋrɩ̃ a nyɩr cãa pʋↄ. Ɩ̃ a daar ʋlↄ pʋↄ, a nɩbɛ ba jaa bõ-ƴene-ƴene na pↄw na a ba pɛwfʋ a Naaŋmɩn jie.
46004006	Yɛɛr, a nyɩ ɩnɛ ɩ̃ de a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ nɩ a Apolosi miilʼɩ̃ a ana yele a lɛ. Ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na nyɩ de sɩ a sɩ ɩ bõ-tↄↄuaa, jaanʼɩ̃ a sʋkpa par ʋlↄ na yel: “Taa gãw a ala ba na sɛb bar wa.” A nyɩ pʋↄ, nɩrɛ kãw ma sɛw na vʋnↄ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ, ɓã nɩ a ƴen sʋbↄ ɩ̃ kpɛrɛ a kãw wa.
46004007	Ala ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w fʋ a kpɛ̃ɛ ɩfʋ? Bõ fʋ tɛrɛ ɩ̃ ma ɩ ba kʋ fʋ na wa? Ɩ̃ ala ɩ ba kʋ fʋ na, bõ ɩ a fʋ vʋnↄ a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ wↄ̃ taa nɩ fʋ mɩ̃ɛ bom ʋ?
46004008	Nyɩ gↄrʼã tɛrɛ a yele a jaa ala nyɩ na ƴↄ̃w nyãa! Nyɩ mɩ gↄrʼã le! Nyɩ lɩɛbʼã ɩ jamansɩ nyɩ yẽ, ɩ̃ cɛ sɩ bar! Ɩ̃ tɩɩ na bʋↄrↄ nyɩ sɩrɩ̃ ɩ jamansɩ a sɩ na tʋↄ ɓã taa.
46004009	Ɩ̃ nyɛ na a wↄ̃ taa nɩ a Naaŋmɩn maalʼã a sɩmɩ na ɩ a ʋ nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ a sɩ ɩ a par-pↄↄrbↄ. Sɩ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a bala ba na ƴↄ̃w a kũu pʋↄ a sɩ ɩ a bõ-miilaa a ten a jaa nɩbɛ nii-sↄw, nɩ a sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ nii-sↄw mɩ.
46004010	Sɩ ɩ na dãbolo a Kirisi ɩnɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩ ɩ a yɛ̃-bↄↄnbↄ a Kirisi pʋↄ. Sɩ balʼã, ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩ kpɛmɛ. A nɩbɛ ƴↄnↄ nyɩ na, ɩ̃ mɛbɛ sɩ.
46004011	Wa ta nɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, a kↄ nɩ a kʋ̃ↄ-nyuur ma nyↄw sɩ na, a yel-suursɩ ma ɓↄr sɩ, a nɩbɛ ma pↄbↄ sɩ, ɩ̃ a saa mɩ tɛrɛ yir kpɛɛrɛ wa.
46004012	Sɩ tʋnↄ nɩ na a sɩ nur, vↄwrↄ nɩ a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ. A bala tʋ sɩ, Naaŋmɩn sɩ ma sʋↄr ƴↄ̃w ba. A bala kpow sɩ, sɩ ma nyↄw na suur.
46004013	A ala ɩ a jir-kar ba ŋmaa ƴↄ̃w sɩ, sɩ ma laara uɩ ba na. Sɩ hɛbʼã wↄ̃ a tẽw saba kaarɩ̃, ɩ̃ mɩ ɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa tãpuor wa ta uɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na.
46004014	Maa sɛb nyɩ a asɩmɛ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w nyɩ vĩ wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na ɩ̃ kpãkpan nyɩ a ɩ̃ bi-nʋnɩsɩ kaarɩ̃.
46004015	A nyɩmɩ saarɩ̃ tɛrɛ tↄtↄↄrbↄ ture pie na tↄwrↄ nyɩ a Kirisi sↄr pʋↄ, ɩ̃ sãa bõ-ƴen tɛw nyɩ tɛrɛ. A Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son ɩ̃ na dãa wɩ nɩ ƴɛr kʋ nyɩ ɩnɛ ɩ̃ lɩɛb ɩ a nyɩ sãa a Jeeju-Kirisi pʋↄ.
46004016	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ sʋↄr nyɩ na, nyɩ́ lɩɛb tↄↄnↄ ma.
46004017	A ala ɩnɛ ɩ̃ tʋ̃ a Timote be a uyɩ jie. Ʋ ɩ na a ɩ̃ bi-nʋnaa ɩ̃ mɩ ɩ dẽdẽ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ jie. Ʋ na jaw nyɩ na a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na eere a Jeeju-Kirisi sↄr pʋↄ, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na ma mɩ jaana a duo-puorbo a jiir a jaa.
46004018	A nɩŋmɛɛ be na be vʋnↄ maala nɩ wↄ̃ taa nɩ maa wɩɛrɛ be wa.
46004019	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ wa sↄw, ka nɩ fɩ̃ɩ ɩ̃ na wɩ na be a nyɩ jie. Maa wɩɛrɛ a bana yo-bʋↄrbↄ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ tɛw bↄ̃wfʋ ɩnɛ wa, ɩ̃-eɛ ɩ̃ na mɩ bↄ̃w a ba kpɛ̃w ʋlↄ ba na tɛrɛ a Kirisi pʋↄ.
46004020	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn fãw ma ɩ a nʋↄr ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ tɛw wa, ɩ̃-cɛ tʋↄfʋ ʋ ɩ.
46004021	Bõ nyɩ bʋↄrↄ? Ɩ̃ wɩ nɩ gʋraa, mɩɩ ɩ̃ wɩ nɩ nʋfʋ nɩ su-ɓaar?
46005001	Ba ƴɛrɛ na a jiir a jaa á gã-ta-burbur be na a nyɩ sↄ̃w. A ʋna burburʼãa ma mɩ tʋↄrↄ beree a nɩ-bʋlsɩ mɩ̃ɛ sↄ̃w wa. A-na-ɩ a nyɩ sↄ̃w, kãw ma de na a ʋ sãa pↄw gana nɩ.
46005002	Ɩ̃ a nyɩ cãa vʋnↄ! Nãw ɛ̃ɛ na dãa sɛw ʋ nyↄw nyɩ, a nyɩ diw a ʋlↄ na maal a lɛ bar a nyɩ sↄ̃w.
46005003	A ala ɩ a maa ʋ, a ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na jãa nɩ nyɩ a ɩ̃gan buur pʋↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ be nɩ nyɩ na a sɩɛ pʋↄ; a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na maal a lɛ, ɩ̃ gↄrʼã guor a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃, wↄ̃ taa nɩ ɩ̃ be na a nyɩ sↄ̃w.
46005004	A lɛdaar nyɩ nↄↄ duoro taa nɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi yuor, ɩ̃ a maa wa be nɩ nyɩ a sɩɛ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi kpɛ̃w mɩ be nɩ sɩ,
46005005	nyɩ́ de a daba ʋlↄ ƴↄ̃w a Satã nuu pʋↄ, ʋ na wɛl a ʋ ɩ̃gau, ɩ̃ a ʋ sɩɛ na pↄw a faafʋ a bibir ʋlↄ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na guoro a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ.
46005006	A nyɩ yo-bↄb ma vɩɛlɛ wa. Nyaa bↄ̃w ka a tabɩr fɩ̃ɩ ma tʋↄ na maal a buru ʋ jaa ʋ vʋ̃ wa?
46005007	Nyɩ́ ir a tabɩr kʋraa na ɩ a maal-fãa a nyɩ sↄ̃w bar, a mɩnɛ a nyɩ na tʋↄ ɩ a bur-paalaa na ma tɛrɛ tabɩr wa. A lɛ nyɩ sɩrɩ̃ wↄ̃, a-na-ɩ ba de na a Kirisi na ɩ a sɩ Pakɩ fɛtɩ baar-lo-pele lo nɩ a baar.
46005008	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a sɩ Pakɩ fɛtɩ ʋlↄ a Kirisi na cↄↄrɩ̃ kʋ sɩ, sɩ taa dɩrɛ nɩ ʋ a buru ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a tabɩr kʋraa na ɩ a bier nɩ a fãa maalfʋ wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ ɩ a sɩ ɛ̃ɛ dɩrɛ nɩ ʋ a bur-pʋↄr na miile a sɩ cɛcɛ ɩfʋ nɩ a sɩ yel-mɩ̃ɛ tɛrɛfʋ.
46005009	A sɛbɛ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na dãa sɛb nyɩ, ɩ̃ dãa na yel a nyɩ taa wa lãwna taa nɩ a burbur-maalba wa.
46005010	Maa dãa bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ yel a burbur-maalba ba jaa na be ka a tẽw ua pʋↄ wa; mɩɩ a bala na ma jɩɛlɛ a yele, mɩɩ a nyanyube, mɩɩ a tɩbɛ deme jaa wa. A ala dãa ɩ a lɛ ʋ, a naa dãa na sɛw a nyɩ yi ka a tẽw na pʋↄ.
46005011	Ɩ̃ dãa na bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ yel a nyɩ taa lãwna taa nɩ a ʋlↄ na yel á sɩ yɛbɛ ʋ ɩ a Kirisi pʋↄ, ɩ̃ cãa maala a burbur, mɩɩ cãa jɩɛlɛ a yele, mɩɩ cãa ɩ a tɩɩb sʋbↄ, cãa kpɛrɛ a nɩbɛ, a dãa cãa kʋrↄ ʋ, mɩɩ cãa ɩ a nyanyuur. Nyɩ taa tɩɩ mɩ dɩ nɩ a nɩ-lɛ bom wa.
46005012	-
46005013	Aa ɩ ɩ̃ tʋn ʋ ɩ̃ na guor a bala ua ma ɩ a sɩ nɩbɛ wa ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ wa. Naaŋmɩn na guor a ba ƴɛrɩ̃. Aa ɩ a bala na ɩ a sɩ nɩbɛ nyɩ sɛw na ma guoro wa? A mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na yel: “Nyɩ́ diw a bier sʋbↄ bar a nyɩ sↄ̃w.”
46006001	A lɛdaar a kãw a nyɩ pʋↄ na mↄↄ tɛrɛ nɩ a ʋ tↄ sʋbↄ a ƴɛrɩ̃, mɩnɛ ʋ ma ɩ ɩ̃ cen na bʋↄl a ʋ tↄ sʋbↄ ʋlↄ a ʋlↄ na ma puoro wa jie, ɩ̃ ma lɛ bar a Naaŋmɩn deme jie cenfʋ?
46006002	Nyaa bↄ̃w ka a Naaŋmɩn deme ɩ̃ nↄↄ guoro a tẽw na ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ wa? Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a nyɩmɩ wa guoro a tẽw na ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, uyaa sɛw na guor a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala na ma mɩ ɩ bom wa mɩɩ?
46006003	Nyaa bↄ̃w ka a sɩmɩ wa guoro a sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ wa, wa pãa yele nɩ a tẽw na yele?
46006004	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃ nↄhↄ̃ wa ta nyɩ, a nyɩ ma de cenʼɩ̃ a bala ba na ma sↄr ƴↄ̃w a duo-puorbo pʋↄ wa sɛ̃!
46006005	Ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ na a lɛ na ƴↄ̃w nyɩ vĩ. Nɩrɛ ma tɩɩ be a nyɩ sↄ̃w na kpaar tʋↄrↄ guoro a ʋ tↄ sʋbↄ ƴɛrɩ̃ wa?
46006006	A vɩɛlɛ na a yɛbɛ na taw a ʋ tↄ sʋbↄ cenʼɩ̃ a ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ a bala na ma puoro wa jie mɩɩ?
46006007	Nyɩ gↄrʼã sãw sɩrɛ jaa a mɩnɛ nyɩ na taw taa cen a bala na ma puoro wa jie. A dãa na sɛw a fʋ na sↄw a ʋna bɩɛfʋ. Bõ ɩ a fʋ kↄ̃ sↄw a ba ju fʋ wa?
46006008	Ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩmɩ ɛ̃ɛ maala a fãa jure nɩ, ɩ̃ a ma lɛ ɩ a nyɩ yɛɛr sↄ̃w nyɩ maala a lɛ!
46006009	Má nyɩ bↄ̃w ka a bala na maala a fãa ma kpɛɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ wa. Nyɩ taa bɛlɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ wa. A bala na pebe, mɩɩ a tɩbɛ deme, a gã-ta-burbur deme, a dabsɩ bala na maala taa a vĩ tʋmↄ,
46006010	a nyanyube, a bala na ma jɩɛlɛ a yele, a bala a dãa na ma kúrↄ, a bala na ma kpɛrɛ a nɩbɛ, nɩ a bala na ma fara a mbɛ yele, ma kpɛɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn fãw pʋↄ wa.
46006011	Lɛ a nyɩ ŋmɛɛ dãa wↄ̃, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn pɛw nyɩ na bar, ɩ̃ ow nyɩ kpee a nyɩ ɩ a ʋ ben, ɩ̃ mɩ hɛb uyɩ a nyɩ tor a ʋ nii-sↄw a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju-Kirisi yuor nɩ a sɩ Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ɩnɛ.
46006012	A ŋmɛɛ a nyɩ sↄ̃w ma yelʼã: “Maa ciire bom maalfʋ wa.” Sɩrɛ jaa ʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ aa ɩ a yele a jaa ɩ̃ vɩɛlɛ a maalfʋ wa. Ɩ̃ na mɩ tʋↄ na yel á maa ciire bom maalfʋ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ maa diere a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ bara a bom tʋↄrↄ ma wa.
46006013	Nyɩ ma mɩ yelʼã áa dɩb maalʼã a puor ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ a puor mɩ maal a dɩb ɩnɛ. A lɛ ʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn na wɛlʼã a ba jaa ayi bar. Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩsaa-salaa ɩ̃gan ma maal a pebfʋ ɩnɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩnɛ ba maal ʋ.
46006014	A Naaŋmɩn maalʼã a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋ ir a kũu pʋↄ, ɩ̃ ʋ nↄↄ mɩ maal sɩ na a sɩ ir a kũu pʋↄ nɩ a ʋ kpɛ̃w.
46006015	Nyɩ bↄ̃w na ka a nyɩ ɩ̃gan ɩ na a Kirisi ɩ̃gan ɓãbie. Ɩ̃ na de na a Kirisi ɩ̃gan ɓãbie maal a ɩ pↄw-baa ɩ̃gan ɓãbie? A kↄ̃ ɩ a lɛ wa.
46006016	Mɩɩ nyaa bↄ̃w ka a daba ʋlↄ na gã nɩ a pↄw-baa, ba lɩɛbʼã ɩ ɩ̃gan bõ-ƴen wa? A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ yelʼã: “Ba jaa ayi na lɩɛbʼã ɩ ɩ̃gan bõ-ƴen.”
46006017	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na mara taa nɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na lɩɛbʼã ɩ nɩ ʋ bõ-ƴen a sɩɛ pʋↄ.
46006018	Nyɩ́ taw yi a gã-ta-burbur pʋↄ! A maal-fãa lɛ a nɩrɛ na maala ma kpɛɛrɛ a ʋ ɩ̃gan pʋↄ wa; ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na de a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ ƴↄ̃w a gã-ta-burbur pʋↄ, a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃gan pʋↄ ʋ maala a fãa ƴↄnↄ.
46006019	A Naaŋmɩn kʋ nyɩ na a ʋ Sɩɛ ʋ be a nyɩ pʋ̃ↄ, ɩ̃ nyaa bↄ̃w ka a nyɩ ɩ̃gan ɩ na a ʋna Sɩɛ di-tuo wa? Nyaa sↄ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ wa.
46006020	A Naaŋmɩn da nyɩ na. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ uyɩ́ de a nyɩ ɩ̃gan kʋrↄ nɩ ʋ a ju-kpɛ̃ɛ.
46007001	A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, sɩ ta na a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ala nyɩ na dãa soor a nyɩ sɛbɛ pʋↄ. A vɩɛlɛ na a daba kↄ̃ sɩɩr pↄw wa.
46007002	Ɩ̃-cɛ a gã-ta-burbur ɩnɛ, a sa na a daba na tɛrɛ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ pↄw ɩ̃ a pↄw na mɩ tɛrɛ a ʋ sɩrɛ.
46007003	A sɩrɛ sɛw na ʋ kʋrↄ a ʋ pↄw a ala na sɛw, ɩ̃ a pↄw ʋ mɩ maala a lɛ a ʋ sɩrɛ jie.
46007004	A pↄw ma sↄ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃gan wa, a ʋ sɩrɛ sↄ. A sɩrɛ ma mɩ sↄ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃gan wa, ɩ̃ a ʋ pↄw mɩ sↄ.
46007005	Nyɩ taa wa ŋmara a gaajie, ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ nyɩ mana taa ɩ̃ ŋma daar fɩ̃ɩ pʋↄ a Naaŋmɩn sʋↄrfʋ ɩnɛ wa. A ala ɩ̃ baar, nyɩ́ lɛ kpaarɩ̃, a mɩnɛ a Satã kↄ̃ wa nyɛ sↄr kpɛ nyɩ a lɛdaar nyɩ na ma lɛ tʋↄrↄ tɛrɛɛ a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ wa.
46007006	A ala ɩ̃ na miile nyɩ ma ɩ ƴɛr-kpɛ̃w wa, ɩ̃-cɛ sↄr ɩ̃ miile nyɩ.
46007007	Ɩ̃ naa bʋↄrↄ na a dabsɩ ba jaa ba jɛ a ɩ̃ kaarɩ̃, ɩ̃-cɛ ba jaa bõ-ƴene-ƴene tɛrɛ na a ba bõ-pↄrↄ ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na kʋ ba.
46007008	Nyɛ a ala ɩ̃ na yele a dakↄbↄ uɩ a kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄↄbↄ: a vɩɛlɛ na a ba na cãa jɛ a ɩ̃ kaarɩ̃.
46007009	Ɩ̃ a bala ma tʋↄrↄ tɛrɛɛ a ba mɩ̃ɛ wa, bá kul a pↄw, mɩɩ a sɩrɛ, a-na-ɩ a kulfʋ sa na a mrɛ na jɛ sↄbↄ a nii-sↄw.
46007010	A ala ɩ̃ na yele a bala na kul ma yi a ɩ̃ jie wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ jie a yi: a pↄw ʋ taa wa jaara a ʋ sɩrɛ bara wa.
46007011	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ ʋ wa jaar ʋ na, ú jɛ a lɛ, mɩɩ ú ɓaalɩ̃ a ʋ sɩrɛ. Ɩ̃ a daba, ʋ taa wa mɩ diwre a ʋ pↄw bara wa.
46007012	A ala ɩ̃ na yele a bala na cɛ jie ma yi a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ jie wa, ɩ̃ maa ɩ̃ yele: a ala ɩ a popuoro tɛrɛ na a pↄw na ma puoro wa ɩ̃ sↄw jɛ nɩ ʋ, ʋ taa diwre ʋ bara wa.
46007013	Ɩ̃ a pↄw wa mɩ tɛrɛ a sɩrɛ na ma puoro wa, ɩ̃ mɩ sↄw jɛ nɩ ʋ, ʋ taa wa jaara ʋ bara wa.
46007014	A-na-ɩ a daba ʋlↄ na ma puoro wa, a Naaŋmɩn Ꞌwuoro ʋ na a ʋ pↄw na puoro ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ a pↄw ʋlↄ na ma puoro wa, a Naaŋmɩn mɩ Ꞌwuoro ʋ na a ʋ sɩrɛ na mɩ puoro ɩnɛ. A ala ma dãa ɩ lɛ ʋ wa a ba bibiir naa wↄ̃ na taa nɩ tɩbɛ deme bibiir. Ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn sɩrɩ̃ na Ꞌwuoro ba, a ba mã, mɩɩ a ba sãa na puoro ɩnɛ.
46007015	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na ma puoro wa wa bʋↄrↄ ʋ ŋmaa a kpee, ú ŋmaa. A ʋlↄ ŋmaa a lɛ, a sɩrɛ mɩɩ a pↄw na ɩ a popuoro ma cãa be a ʋna kulfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ pʋↄ wa. A-na-ɩ a pɩɛufʋ ɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn bʋↄl sɩ.
46007016	A fʋ̃ʋ pↄw na puoro, mɩnɛ fʋ ɩ ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka fʋ uↄↄ tʋↄ na faa a fʋ sɩrɛ? Ɩ̃ a fʋ̃ʋ daba na puoro, mɩnɛ fʋ ɩ ɩ̃ bↄ̃w ka fʋ nↄↄ tʋↄ na faa a fʋ pↄw?
46007017	A ala ma ɩ a lɛ a be wa, a nɩbɛ ba jaa sɛw na ba cere tuure nɩ a bõ-pↄrↄ ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na kʋ ba, ɩ̃ mɩ cere tuure nɩ a mɩnɛ ba na dãa wↄ̃ ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn wa bʋↄl ba. A ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ mana kʋrↄ a duo-puorbo a jiir a jaa.
46007018	A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ dãa na ŋmaa a yʋↄr ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn wa bʋↄl ʋ ʋ puoro, ʋ taa bʋↄrↄ ʋ lɛ lɩɛb wa. A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ ma dãa ŋmaa a yʋↄr wa ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn wa bʋↄl ʋ, ʋ taa lɛ bʋↄrↄ ʋ ŋmaa wa.
46007019	A fʋ̃ʋ ŋmaa a yʋↄr mɩɩ faa ŋmaa wa, aa ɩ bom wa. A Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn jↄfʋ ɩ̃ ɩ a bom.
46007020	A nɩrɛ lɛ, ú cãa jɛ a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa wↄ̃ ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn wa bʋↄl ʋ.
46007021	Gbãgbaa fʋ dãa ɩ ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn wa bʋↄl fʋ? Taa waala wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ sↄr be na be fʋ na diere yire, fú de.
46007022	A-na-ɩ a gbãgbaa ʋlↄ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na bʋↄl, ʋ ɩ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ m-faaraa. A lɛ ʋ mɩ, a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na sↄ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ wa bʋↄl ʋ, ʋ ɩ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ gbãgbaa.
46007023	A Naaŋmɩn da nyɩ na. Nyɩ taa lɩɛb ɩ nɩbɛ gbãgbaar wa.
46007024	Yɛɛr, nyɩ jaa bõ-ƴene-ƴene, nyɩ́ jɛ a Naaŋmɩn nii-sↄw a mɩnɛ nyɩ na dãa wↄ̃ ɩ̃ ʋ wa bʋↄl nyɩ.
46007025	A bala na ma kul taa sɛr wa, maa tɛrɛ ƴɛr-kpɛ̃w na yi a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ jie wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ na miil nyɩ na a ala ɩ̃ na tɩɛrɛ, a maa a Naaŋmɩn nã-bↄ̃wfʋ na sũo ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩ-dẽdẽ.
46007026	A mɩnɛ sɩ na be a won pʋↄ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ tɩɛrʼã bↄ̃w ka a vɩɛlɛ na a nɩrɛ na jɛ a lɛ.
46007027	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ fʋ tɛrɛ na pↄw, taa wa diwre ʋ bara wa. A ala ɩ̃ ɩ faa tɛrɛ pↄw wa, taa bʋↄrↄ fʋ kul wa.
46007028	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ fʋ wa kulʼã, faa maal fãa wa. Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a pↄsabile wa mɩ kulʼã, Ꞌwaa mɩ maal fãa wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a bala na kul taa na pↄw na a tẽw na pʋↄ won, ɩ̃ maa bʋↄrↄ a ana yele a ta nyɩ wa.
46007029	Yɛɛr, nyɛ a ala ɩ̃ na yele: a daar ɩ ua ŋmãa. Wa nyↄw nɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a bala na kul a pↄↄbↄ bá maala wↄ̃ taa uɩ baa kul wa.
46007030	A bala na kono, bá maala wↄ̃ taa nɩ sube ma sãw ba wa. A bala na cɩlɛ, bá wↄ̃ taa nɩ baa tɛrɛ nʋ̃ↄ wa. A bala na daara a yele bine, bá mɩ wↄ̃ taa nɩ baa tɛrɛ bom wa.
46007031	Ɩ̃ a bala na ƴaba, ba taa nyɩrɩ̃ de a ba mɩ̃ɛ ƴↄ̃w a ala pʋↄ wa, a-na-ɩ a tẽw na nɩ a ʋ yele a jaa tↄlↄ na.
46007032	Ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na nyɩ taa tɛrɛ dɛn wa. A daba ʋlↄ na ma tɛrɛ pↄw wa ma cɛlɛ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yele, a mɩnɛ ʋ na tʋↄrↄ maala a nʋmɛɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ.
46007033	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a pↄw ma cɛlɛ na a tẽw na pʋↄ yele, a mɩnɛ ʋ na tʋↄrↄ maala a nʋmɛɛ a ʋ pↄw.
46007034	A ʋ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ ŋma na jiir ayi. A lɛ a mɩ wↄ̃ nɩ a pↄw ʋlↄ na ma tɛrɛ a sɩrɛ wa, mɩɩ a pↄsabile. Ʋ ma eɛlɛ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yele, a-na-ɩ ʋ ma bʋↄrↄ na a ʋ ɩ̃gan nɩ a ʋ sɩɛ a ɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ben. Ɩ̃ a pↄw ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a sɩrɛ ma cɛlɛ na a tẽw na pʋↄ yele, a mɩnɛ ʋ na tʋↄrↄ maala a nʋmɛɛ a ʋ sɩrɛ.
46007035	Ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ na a asɩmɛ a nyɩ son ɩnɛ. Aa ɩ bɛraa ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w nyɩ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩ na maala a ala na sɛw, de nɩ a nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ ƴↄ̃w a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ tʋmↄ pʋↄ kↄ̃ tɛrɛ tɩɛrʋ̃ kpee wa.
46007036	Á ala ɩ a daba ma lɛ tʋↄrↄ tɛrɛɛ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ a ʋ baraa nii-sↄw wa a tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ na gãw ʋ ɩnɛ, ɩ̃ tɩɛr bↄ̃w ka a sɛw na ba kul taa, ú maal a mɩnɛ ʋ na bʋↄrↄ a ba kul taa. Aa ɩ fãa wa.
46007037	Ɩ̃-cɛ a daba ʋlↄ na bↄ̃w ɩraa cĩcĩ a ʋ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ pʋↄ, ma tɛrɛ damfʋ wa, bↄ̃w tɛrɛ nɩ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ wa vɛl ir a ʋ suur pʋↄ a Ꞌwaa kule a ʋ baraa wa, ʋ maalʼã vɩlaa.
46007038	A nↄhↄ̃, a ʋlↄ na kul a ʋ baraa maalʼã vɩlaa, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na ma kul wa maalfʋ sa ua.
46007039	A pↄw na tɛrɛ a sɩrɛ na be uɩ ʋ na lɛɛ wa ta nɩ a ʋ sɩrɛ kũu daar. Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ wa kpi, sↄr be na be ʋ na kul a ʋlↄ ʋ na bʋↄrↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a sɛw na ʋ kul a ʋlↄ na ɩ a popuoro.
46007040	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ ʋ jɛ na a lɛ a na nyɩrɩ̃ na nʋmↄ ʋ. Lɛ ɩ̃ nyɛ a ɩ a sↄr, ɩ̃ ɩ̃ mɩ tɩɛrʼã bↄ̃w ka ɩ̃ tɛrɛ na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.
46008001	A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na ɩ̃ man nyɩ a yele ala ba na ma lo nɩ a baba ƴɛrɩ̃. Sɩ jaa sɩrɩ̃ na tɛrɛ a bↄ̃wfʋ a mɩnɛ nyɩ na yel, ɩ̃-cɛ a bↄ̃wfʋ ma maalʼã a nɩrɛ ʋ vʋnↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a nʋfʋ ma maal sɩ na a sɩ karɛɛ a Naaŋmɩn sↄr pʋↄ.
46008002	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ mrɛ tɩɛrʼã bↄ̃w ka ʋ bↄ̃w na bom, Ꞌwaa bↄ̃w bom kãw a mɩnɛ a na sɛw sɛr wa.
46008003	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩrɛ nʋnↄ na a Naaŋmɩn, a Naaŋmɩn bↄ̃w ʋ na.
46008004	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a ala na ɩ a tɩbɛ yele dɩfʋ, sɩ bↄ̃w ka tɩɩb ma ɩ bom ka a tẽw pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn bõ-ƴen tɛw ɩ̃ be be.
46008005	A ala ɩ̃ saarɩ̃ ɩ a bala ba na ma bʋↄlↄ a naaŋmɩnsɩ na be a saꞋlon mɩɩ a tẽw pʋↄ, (ɩ̃ sɩ bↄ̃w ka a naaŋmɩnsɩ nɩ a fãwsɩ waa na),
46008006	ɩ̃-cɛ a sɩ jie, Naaŋmɩn bõ-ƴen tɛw ɩ̃ be be, a ʋlↄ na ɩ a sɩ Sãa, a ʋlↄ jie a yele a jaa na yi, a sɩ mɩ ɩ a ʋ ben. Ɩ̃ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ bõ-ƴen tɛw ɩ̃ mɩ be be na ɩ a Jeeju-Kirisi, a ʋlↄ ɩnɛ a yele a jaa be ka, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ ɩnɛ sɩ mɩ tɛrɛ a baafʋ.
46008007	Ɩ̃-cɛ aa ɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a ʋna bↄ̃wfʋ wa. A popuorbo ŋmɛɛ nyɩrɩ̃ na mɩlɩ̃ nɩ a tɩbɛ, ma cãa jↄrↄ dãbɩ̃ɛ áa yele ala ba na dɩrɛ cãa na ɩ a tɩbɛ yele. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a ana yele sↄb ba na bar, a-na-ɩ a ba mɩ̃ɛ bↄ̃wfʋ cãa na pab.
46008008	Aa ɩ dɩb na pɩɛlʼɩ̃ sɩ a Naaŋmɩn wa. A sɩmɩ ma dɩ wa, bom ma yire a sɩ pʋↄ wa. A sɩmɩ mɩ dɩ, bom ma mɩ lɛ dↄↄlↄ sɩ wa.
46008009	Ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ tɛrɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ a ala uyɩ ua tɛrɛ a sↄr maala ɩnɛ, a kↄ̃ wa maal a nyɩ yɛbɛ na bal a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa pʋↄ ʋ wa lo a fãa pʋↄ wa.
46008010	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩrɛ ʋlↄ mɩ̃ɛ bↄ̃wfʋ na pab wa nyɛ na a fʋ̃ʋ na tɛrɛ a bↄ̃wfʋ a fʋ jɛ dɩrɛ a dɩb a tɩɩb diem, ʋ kↄ̃ tɩɛr bↄ̃w ka a vɩɛlɛ na ʋ na dɩ a tɩbɛ yele wa?
46008011	A lɛ, a fʋ bↄ̃wfʋ na saa na a yɛbɛ ʋlↄ na bal, a Kirisi na kpi a ʋ ɩnɛ, na wɛ.
46008012	Ɩ̃ a lɛ nyɩ na maal a fãa a nↄhↄ̃, a nyɩ yɛɛr bala jie a mɩ̃ɛ bↄ̃wfʋ na cãa pab, a Kirisi mɩ̃ɛ nyɩ maal a ʋna fãa ƴↄ̃w.
46008013	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃ bõ-dɩraa dɩfʋ na maalʼã a ɩ̃ yɛbɛ ʋ vɩɛ a Naaŋmɩn sↄr, maa lↄↄ dɩrɛ a ʋna bom fɩ̃ɩ wa, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ kↄ̃ wa maal a ɩ̃ yɛbɛ ʋ vɩɛ wa.
46009001	A maa, maa tɛrɛ sↄr na maal a bom lɛ ɩ̃ na bʋↄrↄ wa mɩɩ? Maa ɩ nɩ-tʋnaa wa mɩɩ? Maa mɩ nyɛ a sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju wa mɩɩ? Ɩ̃ a nyɩmɩ, nyaa ɩ a wↄmↄ ala ɩ̃ na pↄw a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ tʋmↄ pʋↄ wa mɩɩ?
46009002	A ala ɩ maa ɩ nɩ-tʋnaa a nɩŋmɛɛ jie wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a nyɩ jie ɩ̃ ɩ na nɩ-tʋnaa. A mɩnɛ nyɩ na lɩɛb ɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ben, a miile na á ɩ̃ sɩrɩ̃ na ɩ a nɩ-tʋnaa.
46009003	Nyɛ a ala ɩ̃ na tɛrɛ yele a bala na hũhune ma:
46009004	Saa tɛrɛ sↄr na de a ala sɩ na dɩrɛ, nɩ a ala sɩ na nyuure a sɩ tʋmↄ ɩnɛ wa mɩɩ?
46009005	Saa mɩ tɛrɛ sↄr na tɛrɛ pↄw na ɩ a popuoro yʋↄrↄ nɩ, a mɩnɛ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ ŋmɛɛ, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yɛɛr, nɩ a Pɩɛr na ma maala wa mɩɩ?
46009006	Mɩɩ a maa nɩ a Banabasɩ tɛw ɩ̃ sɛw na tʋuↄ a tʋmↄ pↄwrↄ a sɩ dɩb?
46009007	Sↄdaal-buor ɩ̃ dãa ya a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ a sↄdaalsɩ tʋmↄ pʋↄ? Ala ɩ̃ dãa sɛl tɩɛ ɩ̃ ma lɛ Ꞌwↄbↄ a ʋ wↄmↄ wa? Mɩɩ ala ɩ̃ dãa cɩɩnɛ dʋn ɩ̃ ma lɛ pɩɛnɛ a bʋrɩ̃ wa?
46009008	Nyɩ taa tɩɛr bↄ̃w ka a ala na tara a nɩbɛ sↄ̃w tɛw ɩ̃ tↄↄ ƴɛrɛ wa. A Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn ma mɩ yel a lɛ wa mɩɩ?
46009009	A-na-ɩ a sɛbʼã a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn pʋↄ: “Taa lũ a naab ʋlↄ nʋↄr pↄw fʋ na ƴↄ̃w ʋ ŋmeere fʋ a ci wa.” A Naaŋmɩn tɩɛrɛ nɩ na nii mɩɩ?
46009010	Aa ɩ a sɩmɩ tɛw ɩnɛ ʋ yele wa? Ↄↄ, a ɩ na a sɩmɩ ɩnɛ ba sɛb. A sɛw na a ʋlↄ na kʋↄrↄ a puo nɩ a ʋlↄ na ŋmeere a ci, ba tʋnↄ tɩɛrɛ nɩ a ala ba na pↄwrↄ.
46009011	A sɩmɩ na dãa bʋr a sɩɛ bom a nyɩ jie, a lɛ ɩ na bõ-kpɛ̃ɛ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ sɩ pↄwrↄ na yele a nyɩ jie mɩɩ?
46009012	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a ŋmɛɛ tɛrɛ na a sↄr diere a nyɩ yele, saa tɛrɛ sↄr gãw ba wa mɩɩ? Ɩ̃-cɛ sɩ barʼã a ʋna sↄr. Sɩ sↄw na a yele a jaa a mɩnɛ sɩ kↄ̃ wa var a Kirisi ƴɛr-son bar wa.
46009013	Nyɩ bↄ̃w ua bↄ̃w ka a bala na tʋnↄ a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, a be ba ma pↄw a ba dɩb. A bala na mɩ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn baar-lorbo, a baar lofʋ jie ba mɩ dɩrɛ.
46009014	A lɛ ʋ mɩ, a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ mɩ ƴↄ̃w na a bala na hiere a ʋ ƴɛr-son á bá mɩ pↄwrↄ a ba dɩb a ala ɩnɛ.
46009015	Ɩ̃-cɛ a maa, maa de bom kãw wa. Ɩ̃ maa sɛb a sɛbɛ na bʋↄrↄ nyɩ ma kʋ ma wa. A kũu sa ma na gãw a ana yele defʋ. Nɩrɛ ma be na vara ma a ʋna yo-bↄfʋ bara wa.
46009016	A Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son ƴɛrfʋ ma ɩ ma yo-bↄfʋ wa, ɩ̃ fɛraa ɩ̃ fɛrɛ ma, a-na-ɩ a maa ma ƴɛr a ƴɛr-son kʋ a nɩbɛ wa, a na ɩ ma na nabier.
46009017	A ala dãa ɩ a maa vɛl ir a ʋna tʋn, ɩ̃ naa ma de na yar. Ɩ̃ aa ɩ maa ɩ̃ vɛl ir wa; yel-Ꞌwuoro ba ƴↄ̃w ma ɩ̃ ɩ.
46009018	Ɩ̃ bõ ɩ̃ ua ɩ a ɩ̃ yar? A ɩ na ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son a pↄrↄ kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ, kↄ̃ diere nɩ a yele ala na dãa sɛw nɩ ma a ƴɛr-son ƴɛrfʋ ɩnɛ wa.
46009019	Ɩ̃ sↄ na a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ. Maa ɩ nɩrɛ kãw gbãgbaa wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ de na a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ lɩɛb ɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa gbãgbaa, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na tʋↄ nyɩrɩ̃ pↄw a nɩbɛ kʋ a Kirisi.
46009020	A lɛdaar ɩ̃ na ma ta a Jufisɩ sↄ̃w, ɩ̃ ma lɩɛbʼã wↄ̃ taa nɩ a Jufi nɩrɛ, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na tʋↄ tↄw ba ƴↄ̃w a Kirisi pʋↄ. A ala saarɩ̃ ɩ maa be a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ ma lɩɛbʼã a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ wↄ̃ taa nɩ ɩ̃ be na a ana ƴɛr-kpɛn pʋↄ, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na tʋↄ pↄw a ʋala na jↄrↄ a ana ƴɛr-kpɛn.
46009021	A maa wa mɩ ta a bala na ma bↄ̃w a Mowisi ƴɛr-kpɛn wa sↄ̃w, ɩ̃ ma mɩ lɩɛbʼã wↄ̃ a ba kaarɩ̃, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na tʋↄ pↄw ba. A lɛ ma bʋↄrↄ a yel á maa jↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn wa, a-na-ɩ ɩ̃ be na a Kirisi ƴɛr-kpɛ̃w pʋↄ.
46009022	A maa wa mɩ ta a bala ƴↄ̃w-nyãa na pab jie, ɩ̃ ma mɩ barʼã a ɩ̃ ƴↄ̃w-nyãa ʋ mɩ pab, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na tʋↄrↄ pↄwrↄ ba. A nↄhↄ̃ ɩ̃ ma de na a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ bar a yele a jaa pʋↄ, a nɩbɛ ba jaa jie, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na tʋↄ nyɛ a sↄr faa a nɩbɛ ŋmɛɛ.
46009023	Ɩ̃ maala na a yele a jaa a nↄhↄ̃ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-son ɩnɛ, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na mɩ tʋↄ pↄw a ʋ yel-sono.
46009024	Nyɩ bↄ̃w na bↄ̃w ka a bala na ma dãwna taa, ma jↄrↄ na ba jaa, ɩ̃-cɛ bõ-ƴen tɛw ɩ̃ ma pↄw a bom- Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, nyɩ́ mɩ jↄrↄ a lɛ na tʋↄ pↄw a bom.
46009025	A bala na cↄↄrↄ a ba mɩ̃ɛ a dãw-taa ɩnɛ ma bↄ̃w na tɛrɛ a ba mɩ̃ɛ a yele a jaa pʋↄ. Ba ma maala na a lɛ na tʋↄ pↄw a dãdãw sʋbↄ sapi na maa yaarɩ̃ sãw wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a sɩmɩ, a sapi ʋlↄ sɩ na jↄrↄ wa pↄwrↄ na be na be daadaa kpoolaa.
46009026	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ mɩ kpo ƴↄ̃w a bom ʋlↄ ɩnɛ ɩ̃ na jↄrↄ, ɩ̃ ma mɩ ŋmeere bara a vuo pʋↄ wa.
46009027	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ kpowro ua a ɩ̃ ɩ̃gan tɛrɛ nɩ ʋ cĩeĩ, a mɩnɛ a lɛdaar ɩ̃ na hiere kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ, a Naaŋmɩn kↄ̃ wa jaar ma bar wa.
46010001	Yɛɛr, ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na nyɩ cãa bↄ̃w nɩ a ala na dãa ta a sɩ sãa-kʋnbↄ a Mowisi na dãa tɛrɛ a wɛkar pʋↄ. Ba jaa dãa na be a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃ma pulẽe, ɩ̃ ba jaa mɩ gãw na a Man Jɩ̃ɛw.
46010002	A ba jaa mʋrʼã a kʋ̃ↄ a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃ma nɩ a man pʋↄ lɩɛb ɩ Mowisi nɩbɛ.
46010003	Ba jaa mɩ dɩ na a dɩb ala a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na kʋ ba,
46010004	ɩ̃ mɩ nyu a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʋ̃ↄ ba jaa. A-na-ɩ ba nyu na a kʋ̃ↄ ʋlↄ na dãa yi a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʋsɩpan pʋↄ na dãa tuure ba, ɩ̃ a ʋna kʋsɩpan naa dãa na ɩ a Kirisi.
46010005	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ba pʋↄ, a yaw jie maalfʋ ma dãa nʋmↄ a Naaŋmɩn wa; ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a ba fa lo kpi a wɛkar pʋↄ.
46010006	A ana yele naa ta na a lɛ na tʋↄ ɩ sɩ bõ-miilaa a sɩ taa ɩ a yel-fã-Ꞌlaarba a mɩnɛ ba na dãa wↄ̃ wa.
46010007	Nyɩ taa mɩ ɩ a tɩb-puorbo a mɩnɛ a ba ŋmɛɛ na dãa wↄ̃ wa, a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na yel: “Áa nɩbɛ bala jɛ ua dɩ nyu uɩ, ɩ̃ pãa ir ɓolo sɛbɛ nɩ a bɩnɛ.”
46010008	Sɩ taa mɩ maala a burbur gaua uɩ taa a ba ŋmɛɛ kaarɩ̃ wa. A bala na maal a lɛ, mbɛ ture hjɛrʼɩ̃-ata lo na kpi a bibir bõ-ƴen.
46010009	Sɩ taa mɩ bɩɩrɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ a mɩnɛ a ba ŋmɛɛ na dãa maal, a wɩɩr dʋn ba kú wa.
46010010	Nyɩ taa mɩ hũhune a Naaŋmɩn a mɩnɛ a ba ŋmɛɛ na mɩ dãa maal, a Wɛwɛlɛ wɛl ba bar wa.
46010011	A ala a jaa ta ba na, na ɩ sɩ bõ-miilaa ba na mɩ sɛb kpãkpana nɩ a sɩmɩ na be a tẽw baarfʋ daar.
46010012	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a ʋlↄ na tɩɛr bↄ̃w ka ʋ ɩraa na cĩcĩ, ú bↄ̃w ɩraa kↄ̃ wa lo wa.
46010013	Bɩɩrfʋ kãw ma ta nyɩ ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a ala na ma ta a nɩbɛ ba jaa ʋ wa. Naaŋmɩn ɩ na dẽdẽ. ꞋWaa sↄwrↄ a bɩɩrfʋ ʋlↄ na gãw nyɩ ʋ tara nyɩ wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ a bɩɩrfʋ wa ta nyɩ, ʋ na miil nyɩ na a yifʋ jie, kʋ nɩ nyɩ a kpɛ̃w ʋlↄ nyɩ na ɩrɛɛ nɩ.
46010014	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ badɛɛ, nyɩ́ taw yi a tɩbɛ pʋↄ.
46010015	Ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ nɩ nyɩ na a mɩnɛ nyɩ na ɩ a yɛ̃-tɛrbɛ. Nyɩ́ pɛ a ala ɩ̃ na yele je kãa.
46010016	A ŋman ʋlↄ sɩ na mↄↄ nyuure nɩ, pɛwrɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn a ʋ maal-vɩlaa ɩnɛ, maa lɩɛb sɩ a sɩ ɓã taa ɩ bõ-ƴen nɩ a Kirisi a ʋ jɩ̃ɩ ɩnɛ wa? Ɩ̃ a buru sɩ na mↄↄ ŋmara poro, maa mɩ lɩɛb sɩ a sɩ ɓã taa ɩ bõ-ƴen nɩ a Kirisi a ʋ ɩ̃gan ɩnɛ wa?
46010017	A mɩnɛ sɩ na saarɩ̃ waa, ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a bur-bõ-ƴen tɛw, a lɩɛb sɩ na a sɩ ɩ ɩ̃gan bõ-ƴen, a-na-ɩ sɩ jaa ma po na a ʋna bur-bõ-ƴen.
46010018	Nyɩ́ tɩɛr a Ɩsɩrayɛl puorfʋ tʋmↄ nyɛ. A bala na dɩrɛ a baar lofʋ yele maa ɓã taa ɩ bõ-ƴen nɩ a Naaŋmɩn na sↄ a baar-lofʋ jie wa?
46010019	Bõ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ yel a lɛ? Áa baar-lo-bom ɩ na bom, mɩɩ áa tɩɩb ɩ na bom mɩɩ?
46010020	Aa ɩ lɛ ɩ̃ yel wa. Ɩ̃ ɩ̃ yelʼã á ana yele a tɩbɛ deme na ma loro nɩ a baar, á aa ɩ Naaŋmɩn ba ma kʋrↄ wa; a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ ba ma kʋ. Ɩ̃ maa bʋↄrↄ nyɩ ɩ bõ-ƴen nɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ wa.
46010021	Nyaa tʋↄrↄ nyuure nɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ŋman nɩ a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ ŋman wa. Nyaa mɩ tʋↄrↄ tune a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ŋmau pʋↄ, nɩ kↄ̃tↄnsɩ ŋman pʋↄ wa.
46010022	Mɩɩ sɩ bʋↄrↄ sɩ maal a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nyuur ʋ ir? Nyɩ tɩɛrʼã beeka sɩ tɛrɛ na kpɛ̃w gãw ʋ mɩɩ?
46010023	A ŋmɛɛ ma yelʼã á baa ciire bom maalfʋ wa. Sɩrɛ jaa ʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ aa ɩ a yele a jaa ɩ̃ vɩɛlɛ a maalfʋ wa. Bom ma ciire maalfʋ ʋlↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ aa ɩ a yele a jaa ɩ̃ sũono a nɩbɛ a ba karɛɛ wa.
46010024	Nɩrɛ kãw ʋ taa maala a ala na nʋmↄ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ú maala a ala na nʋmↄ a ʋ tↄ sʋbↄ.
46010025	Nyɩ tɛrɛ na sↄr na ŋmaa a nɩn lɛ ba na daara a daa pʋↄ, kↄ̃ bʋↄrↄ nyɩ bↄ̃w a nɩn ʋlↄ yifʋ jie a nyɩ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ damfʋ ɩnɛ wa.
46010026	A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ yelʼã: “A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃ sↄ a tẽw, nɩ a yele a jaa na be a ʋ juu.”
46010027	A nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na ma puoro wa wa bʋↄl fʋ dɩb ɩnɛ a fʋ wa sↄw cen, dɩ a bom lɛ ʋ na bine a fʋ nii-sↄw, kↄ̃ soor ʋ bom kãw a fʋ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ damfʋ ɩnɛ wa.
46010028	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩrɛ wa yel fʋ á tɩɩb nɩn ʋ, taa wa Ꞌwↄbↄ wa. A ʋlↄ na yel, uɩ a ʋ tɩɛrʋ̃ damfʋ ɩnɛ, fʋ sɛw na jaar.
46010029	Aa ɩ a fʋ̃ʋ mɩ̃ɛ tɩɛrʋ̃ damfʋ ɩnɛ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na yel fʋ ɩnɛ ʋ. Nyɩ na tʋↄ na soor ma: “A ala ɩ̃ ɩ ɩ̃ tɛrɛ na a sↄr maala a bom a lɛ, bõ ɩnɛ a nɩrɛ na lɛ tʋↄ koro ma a ʋ tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ damfʋ ɩnɛ?
46010030	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ ɩ̃ puorʼã a Naaŋmɩn ɩ̃ dɩrɛ a bom, bõ ɩnɛ a nɩrɛ na lɛ koro ma a ala ɩ̃ na sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w ɩ̃ dɩrɛ ɩnɛ?”
46010031	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a nyɩmɩ dɩrɛ a dɩb, mɩɩ a bom nyɩ nyuure, mɩɩ a bom jaa lɛ nyɩ na maala, nyɩ́ maala kʋrↄ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn a ju-kpɛ̃ɛ.
46010032	Nyɩ taa wa maala bom a wa cɩɛrɛ a Jufisɩ, mɩɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ, mɩɩ a Naaŋmɩn-puorbo wa.
46010033	Nyɩ́ maala a ɩ kaarɩ̃. Ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na ɩ̃ maala a yele a jaa a na nʋmↄ a nɩbɛ ba jaa. Maa bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ bom wa, ɩ̃ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na a nɩbɛ ba jaa son, a mɩnɛ a ba na tʋↄ pↄw a faafʋ.
46011001	Nyɩ́ tↄↄnↄ ma, a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na mɩ tↄↄnↄ a Kirisi.
46011002	Ɩ̃ kpiire nyɩ na a mɩnɛ nyɩ na cãa tɛrɛ a ɩ̃ tɩɛrɛ a daar a jaa, nɩ a mɩnɛ nyɩ na mɩ cãa nyↄw a jaanfʋ ala ɩ̃ na dãa jaan nyɩ tɛɛlɛ.
46011003	Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na nyɩ bↄ̃w nɩ a nanɩ: a Kirisi ɩ̃ ɩ a dabsɩ ba jaa juu, ɩ̃ a daba mɩ ɩ a pↄw juu, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn mɩ ɩ a Kirisi juu.
46011004	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a daba wa sʋↄrↄ ua a Naaŋmɩu, mɩɩ bʋʋrↄ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ wa pↄw bom a ʋ juu pʋↄ, a Kirisi na ɩ a ʋ juu ʋ kpɛrɛ.
46011005	Ɩ̃-cɛ a pↄw wa sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn, mɩɩ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ ʋ bʋʋrↄ kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ ma pↄw bom a ʋ juu wa, a ʋ sɩrɛ na ɩ a ʋ juu ʋ kpɛrɛ. A wↄ̃ na taa nɩ ʋ pũo na a ʋ juu.
46011006	A-na-ɩ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a pↄw ma pↄw bom a ʋ juu wa, ú ɩ a ba ŋma ʋ a jukↄbↄ bar. Ɩ̃-cɛ a-na-ɩ a ma ɩ na vĩ a pↄw na ŋma a ʋ jukↄbↄ, mɩɩ na pũo a ʋ juu, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a sɛw na ʋ na lũ bom pↄw.
46011007	A daba ma sɛw na pↄw a ʋ juu wa, a-na-ɩ a daba ɩ̃ miile a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na be, nɩ a ʋ yo-yifʋ mɩ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a pↄw ɩ̃ miile a daba yo-yifʋ.
46011008	A-na-ɩ a daba ma yi a pↄw jie wa, ɩ̃ pↄw ɩ̃ yi a daba jie.
46011009	Ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn ma mɛ a daba a pↄw ɩnɛ wa, ɩ̃ pↄw ʋ mɛ a daba ɩnɛ.
46011010	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ ɩnɛ, a pↄw sɛw na na lũ a bom pↄw a ʋ juu na miile a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ wurfʋ.
46011011	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nii-sↄw, a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a daba ma be be wa, a pↄw tɛw ma ɩ bom wa, ɩ̃ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a pↄw ma mɩ be be wa, a daba tɛw ma mɩ ɩ bom wa.
46011012	A-na-ɩ a mɩnɛ a pↄw na yi a daba jie, a lɛ a pↄw na mɩ dↄw a daba, ɩ̃ a ala a jaa yi na a Naaŋmɩn jie.
46011013	Nyɩ́ pɛ nyɩ mɩ̃ɛ je kãa. A vɩɛiɛ ua a pↄw ua sʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn a nɩbɛ sↄ̃w, ɩ̃ ma lũ bom pↄw a ʋ juu wa?
46011014	A uɩrɛ mɩ̃ɛ tɩɛrʋ̃ miile na áa ɩ na vĩ a daba na tɛrɛ a jukↄb-wobo.
46011015	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ na yo-yifʋ bom a pↄw jie ʋ na tɛrɛ a jukↄb-wobo. A-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn kʋ ʋ na a jukↄb-wobo a na tʋↄ ɩ ʋ bõ-pↄwraa.
46011016	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ nɩrɛ cãa na bʋↄrↄ ʋ cɩɩrɛ a asɩmɛ, ʋ sɛw na na bↄ̃w ka a Naaŋmɩn-puorbo a jiir a jaa nɩ a sɩmɩ mɩ̃ɛ ma tɛrɛ maal-kpee wa.
46011017	A ala pʋↄ sɩ na ta a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, maa tʋↄrↄ kpiire nyɩ wa. A-na-ɩ a nyɩ duo-taa ma maal nyɩ na bier gãw a son.
46011018	A dãdãw bom ɩ na: ba yel ma na, á nyɩmɩ wa duo taa, á nyɩ ma faara na taa, ɩ̃ ɩ̃ sↄw na ŋmãa.
46011019	A sɩrɩ̃ na sɛw a faa-taa na be a nyɩ sↄ̃w, a sɩ na tʋↄ bↄ̃w a bala na ɩ a dẽdẽ.
46011020	A lɛdaar nyɩ na ma duo taa, aa ɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ dɩb nyɩ ma dɩrɛ wa.
46011021	A-na-ɩ a lɛ nyɩ na ma lãa jɛ a dɩb par, naa ma dɩ na a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ dɩb ʋ yẽ, ɩ̃ cɛ a ŋmɛɛ bar a ba jɛ nɩ a kↄ̃, ɩ̃ a dãa kúrↄ a nɩŋmɛɛ.
46011022	Nyaa tɛrɛ yir uyɩ na dɩrɛ ɩ̃ mɩ nyuure wa? Mɩɩ nyɩ bʋↄrↄ na nyɩ mɛbɛ a Naaŋmɩn-puorbo, ƴↄnↄ nɩ a bala na ma tɛraa wa a vĩ mɩɩ? Bõ nyɩ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ yel nyɩ? Ɩ̃ kpiir nyɩ mɩɩ? Maa fɛr tʋↄrↄ kpiire nyɩ wa.
46011023	A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ jie ɩ̃ dãa pↄw a jaanfʋ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na dãa jaan nyɩ. A ɩ na a tɩsↄw ʋlↄ ba na dãa nyↄwrↄ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju, ʋ de na a buru,
46011024	ɩ̃ a lɛ ʋ na pɛw a Naaŋmɩn baar, ʋ ŋmaa na a buru ɩ̃ yel: “A nanɩ ɩ na a ɩ̃ ɩ̃gan ɩ̃ na tɩɩr a nyɩ ɩnɛ. Nyɩ́ maala a lɛ bↄ̃wnↄ nɩ ma.”
46011025	Ɩ̃ a lɛ ba na dɩ a dɩb baar, ʋ mɩ de na a ŋman ɩ̃ yel: “A dɩvɛ̃ na be a ŋman na pʋↄ, miile na a pʋlɩ̃-ta-paalaa a ɩ̃ jɩ̃ɩ na gbɛɛrɩ̃. A daar a jaa nyɩ nↄↄ nyuure, nyɩ́ maala bↄ̃wnↄ nɩ ma.”
46011026	A-na-ɩ a daar a jaa nyɩ na Ꞌwↄbↄ a buru na, mɩ nyuure nɩ a dɩvɛ̃, nyɩ miile na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ kũu lɛɛ wa tara nɩ a ʋ waa daar.
46011027	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a nɩrɛ lɛ wa Ꞌwↄbↄ a buru mɩɩ nyuure a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ dɩvɛ̃, ɩ̃ a ʋ maalfʋ ma vɩɛlɛ wa, ʋ na pↄw na a ƴɛrɩ̃ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃gan nɩ a ʋ jɩ̃ɩ ɩnɛ.
46011028	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a nɩrɛ sɛw na na jʋʋr a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ je kãa ɩ̃ pãa Ꞌwↄb a buru, mɩ nyu nɩ a dɩvɛ̃.
46011029	A ʋlↄ ua Ꞌwↄbↄ mɩ nyuure nɩ ɩ̃ ma bↄ̃wnↄ nɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃gan wa, ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ bʋↄrↄ ƴↄnↄ a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ a lɛ ʋ na Ꞌwↄbↄ nyuure nɩ.
46011030	A ala ɩnɛ a Ꞌwↄbↄ a yaw jie a nyɩ sↄ̃w, a ŋmɛɛ bal, ɩ̃ a nɩŋmɛɛ kpi.
46011031	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ sɩ de na nĩe jʋʋr a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ, saa lɛ tʋↄrↄ pↄwrↄ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ kpãafʋ wa.
46011032	Ɩ̃ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ma guorʼã a sɩ ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ̃ kpãa sɩ, a mɩnɛ a sɩ kↄ̃ wa pↄw a yel ala a Naaŋmɩn nↄↄ ƴↄnↄ a tẽw na nɩbɛ wa.
46011033	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ yɛɛr, a lɛ nyɩ na mↄↄ duo taa a dɩb dɩfʋ ɩnɛ, nyɩ́ ma gu taa.
46011034	Á ala ɩ̃ ɩ a kↄ̃ nyↄw na a kãw, ú dɩ be a ʋ yir, a mɩnɛ a nyɩ duo-tar kↄ̃ wa lɩɛb ƴↄ̃w nyɩ yel wa. Ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ na eↄↄrɩ́ na a yele ala na cɛ a lɛdaar ɩ̃ nↄↄ wɩɛrɛ a be.
46012001	Yɛɛr, a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na ɩ̃ man nyɩ a tʋ̃-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ala a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na tʋnↄ, a-na-ɩ maa bʋↄrↄ nyɩ tɛrɛ baalɩ̃fʋ a ala ɩnɛ wa.
46012002	Nyɩ bↄ̃w ka a lɛdaar nyɩ na dãa ɩ a tɩbɛ deme, a ma dãa na ir nyɩ a nyɩ ma cen na puoro a tɩbɛ na maa tʋↄ bʋ wa.
46012003	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ yel nyɩ, áa nɩrɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na tↄwrↄ ma tʋↄrↄ yele áa Jeeju ʋ pↄrↄ ƴↄnↄ wa. Ɩ̃ nɩrɛ ma tʋↄrↄ yele áa Jeeju ɩ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ɩ̃ tↄw ʋ wa.
46012004	Tʋ̃-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ be na be a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na tʋnↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a jaa yi na a Sɩ-bõ-ƴen jie.
46012005	A tʋmↄ tʋ̃fʋ be na kpee kpee, ɩ̃-cɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ bõ-ƴen jie a yire.
46012006	A Naaŋmɩn kpɛ̃w be na a tʋ̃-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ pʋↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn bõ-ƴen ɩ̃ maala a ala a jaa a nɩbɛ ba jaa jie.
46012007	A Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tʋmↄ nyɩrʼã a nɩbɛ ba jaa jie bõ-ƴene-ƴene, a na tʋↄ sũo a nɩbɛ ba jaa.
46012008	A Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ma kʋ na a bõ-ƴen a kpaarfʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋ ƴɛrɛ, ɩ̃ a kãw ma mɩ pↄw a bↄ̃wfʋ mɩ ƴɛrɛ, a mɩ yi a ʋna Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ naa jie.
46012009	A Sɩɛ ʋlↄ ma mɩ kʋ na a ƴen sʋbↄ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa, ɩ̃ mɩ kʋ a kãw a tʋↄfʋ a baalsɩ kpaarfʋ ɩnɛ.
46012010	A ʋna Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ naa ma mɩ kʋ ua a nɩrɛ kãw a kpɛ̃w ʋ na maala nɩ a nↄ-kofʋ yele, ɩ̃ mɩ kʋ a ƴen sʋbↄ ʋ na bʋʋrↄ a ʋ pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃. Ʋ ma lɛ kʋ na a kãw go ʋ na tʋↄ bↄ̃wnↄ nɩ a sɩɛ ʋlↄ na ma ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ben wa, nɩ a ʋlↄ na sɩrɩ̃ ɩ a ʋ ben. Ʋ ma mɩ lɛ kʋ na a ƴen sʋbↄ a tʋↄfʋ ʋ ƴɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ, ɩ̃ mɩ lɛ kʋ a ƴen sʋbↄ go ʋ na lɩɛbɛ nɩ a ana ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ naa.
46012011	A ʋna Naaŋmɩn Sɩ-bõ-ƴen naa ɩ̃ maala a ala a jaa fɛw, kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ bõ-ƴene-ƴene a tʋmↄ kpee kpee a mɩnɛ ʋ na bʋↄrↄ.
46012012	A Kirisi wↄ̃ na taa nɩ ɩ̃gan na tɛrɛ a ɓãbi-yaw, a-na-ɩ a ala saarɩ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃gan tɛrɛ na a ɓãbi-yaw, ɩ̃-cɛ ɩ̃gan bõ-ƴen tɛw ʋ ɩ.
46012013	A mɩnɛ ba na mʋr sɩ a kʋ̃ↄ, sɩ kpɛ na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩ-bõ-ƴen pʋↄ lɩɛb ɩ ɩ̃gan bõ-ƴen: a Jufisɩ mɩɩ a nɩ-bʋlsɩ, a gbãgbaar nɩ a bala na sↄ a ba mɩ̃ɛ, a Naaŋmɩn Sɩ-bõ-ƴen ba tuul sɩ sɩ jaa.
46012014	A ɩ̃gan ma tɛrɛ ɓãbir bõ-ƴen tɛw wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ɓãbi-yayaw ʋ tɛrɛ.
46012015	A ala ɩ a gbɛr yelʼã: “A-na-ɩ maa ɩ a nuu wa, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ maa be a ɩ̃gan pʋↄ wa,” a ala ua saa na ʋ kↄ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃gan ɓãbir wa mɩɩ?
46012016	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ a toor yelʼã: “Maa ɩ a mimir wa, ala-ɩ̃-sↄ maa be a ɩgan pʋↄ wa,” a ala na saa na ʋ kↄ̃ ɩ a ɩ̃gan ɓãbir wa mɩɩ?
46012017	A ala ɩ a ɩ̃gan ʋ jaa dãa na ɩ a mimir, mɩnɛ ʋ na ma ɩ ɩ̃ wõ a ƴɛrɩ̃? Mɩɩ ʋ jaa dãa ɩ a toor, ɩ̃ mɩnɛ ʋ na ma ɩ ɩ̃ wõ a yele nyuu?
46012018	Ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn maalʼã a ɩ̃gan ʋ tɛrɛ a ʋ ɓãbie a jaa a mɩnɛ ʋ na bʋↄrↄ.
46012019	A ala ɩ a jaa dãa na ɩ a ɩ̃gan ɓãbir bõ-ƴen tɛw, ɩ̃gan kↄ̃ↄ be be wa.
46012020	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ɩ̃gan ɓãbie waa na ɩ̃ ɩ ɩ̃gan bõ-ƴen.
46012021	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a mimir ma tʋↄrↄ yele a nuu á Ꞌwaa bʋↄrↄ ʋ wa, ɩ̃ a juu ma mɩ tʋↄrↄ yele a gbɛɛ á Ꞌwaa bʋↄrↄ ba wa.
46012022	Ɩ̃ a ɩ̃gan ɓãbie ala na wↄ̃ taa nɩ ba balʼã, ala sɩ ma ɛ̃ɛ uyɩrɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ.
46012023	A ɓãbie ala sɩ na ma tɩɛr beeka á aa ɩ wa, ala sɩ ma nyɩrɩ̃ cↄↄrↄ, ɩ̃ a sɩ ɓãbie ala na ma vɩɛlɛ wa, ala sɩ ma bↄ̃w piw.
46012024	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala na vɩɛlɛ ma lɛ bʋↄrↄ cↄↄrɩ̃fʋ wa. A Naaŋmɩn maalʼã a ɩ̃gan a mɩnɛ a ɓãbie ala na ma tɛrɛ a ƴↄ̃wfʋ wa na tʋↄ pↄw a ƴↄ̃wfʋ,
46012025	a mɩnɛ a kpee kpee ŋmafʋ kↄ̃ be a ɩ̃gan pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃-eɛ a ɓãbie a jaa na tʋↄ sũono taa.
46012026	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ a ɓãbir bõ-ƴen nyɛrɛ na a nãw, a ɓãbie a jaa mɩ be na nãw pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a ɓãbir bõ-ƴen pↄw na a ju-kpɛ̃ɛ, a ɓãbie a jaa mɩ cɩlɛ na.
46012027	A nyɩmɩ, nyɩ ɩ na a Kirisi ɩ̃gan ɩ̃ mɩ ɩ a ʋ ɩ̃gan ɓãbie bõ-ƴene-ƴene.
46012028	A Naaŋmɩn biinʼã nɩbɛ na tɛrɛ a tʋmↄ kpee kpee a duo-puorbo sↄ̃w. A dãdãw deme ɩ na a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ, a tuuraa ɩ na a ʋ pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃-bʋʋrbↄ, ɩ̃ a gbɛɛ ata deme ɩ a jãjaanba. A ala ɩ̃ baar ʋ biinʼã a bala ʋ na kʋ a kpɛ̃w a ba maala nɩ a nↄ-kofʋ yele, nɩ a bala na tɛrɛ a tʋↄfʋ kpaara nɩ a wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme, a bala na sũono a nɩbɛ, a bala na tↄwrↄ a nɩbɛ, nɩ a bala na ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ.
46012029	A ba jaa ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ mɩɩ? Mɩɩ a ba jaa ɩ̃ ɩ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃-bʋʋrbↄ, nɩ a jãjaanba mɩɩ? A ba jaa ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a kpɛ̃w maala nɩ a nↄ-kofʋ yele mɩɩ?
46012030	Mɩɩ ba jaa ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a tʋↄfʋ kpaara nɩ a wʋlɩ̃sɩ deme mɩɩ? A ba jaa ɩ̃ ma ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ, mɩɩ ma lɩɛbɛ a ana ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ naa?
46012031	Nyɩ́ tɩɩ bʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tʋmↄ ala na bɛrmɛ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na ɩ̃ na miil nyɩ na sↄr kãw na lɛ sa a ala a jaa.
46013001	Ɩ̃ na tʋↄ na ƴɛrɛ a tẽw na ƴɛr-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ nɩ a sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃-cɛ a maa ma tɛrɛ a nʋfʋ wa, a ɩ̃ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ naa lɩɛbʼã wↄ̃ taa nɩ kur ba na ŋmeere ʋ pↄↄrↄ a gↄmↄ, mɩɩ gbẽlĩbir ba na ŋmeere Ꞌlẽgerem Ꞌlẽgerem.
46013002	Ɩ̃ na tʋↄ na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃-bʋʋrↄ mɩ bↄ̃wnↄ nɩ a yel-sↄↄlsɩ a jaa, ɩ̃ mɩ tʋↄ tɛrɛ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa maala nɩ a tan a ba ir cere, ɩ̃-cɛ a maa ma tɛrɛ a nʋfʋ wa, maa ɩ bom wa.
46013003	Ɩ̃ na tʋↄ na de a ɩ̃ yele a jaa po a nɩbɛ, ɩ̃ mɩ de a ɩ̃ mɩ̃ɛ ƴↄ̃w a vũumɩ ʋ dɩ, ɩ̃-cɛ a maa ma tɛrɛ a nʋfʋ wa, aa dↄↄlↄ ma bom wa.
46013004	A nʋfʋ tɛrɛ na su-nyↄwraa, nɩ a pʋ-pɩlaa. ꞋWaa tɛrɛ nyuur wa; Ꞌwaa mɩ bʋↄrↄ yuor wa. A nʋfʋ ma bʋↄrↄ ju-kpɛ̃ɛ wa;
46013005	Ꞌwaa maala vĩ tʋmↄ wa; Ꞌwaa Ꞌwuoro a ʋ mɩ̃ɛ tɛw wa; Ꞌwaa mɩ nyɛrɛ suur fↄfↄw wa, Ꞌwaa ƴↄnↄ nɩrɛ pʋ̃ↄ wa.
46013006	A nʋfʋ ma bʋↄrↄ gõgolĩ-tʋmↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ yel-mɩ̃ɛ ma nʋmↄ ʋ.
46013007	A nʋfʋ tɛrɛ na su-balaa a yele a jaa jie. Ʋ ma tɛrɛ na a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa a daar a jaa, mɩ tɛrɛ a tɩɛrʋ̃ son a yele a jaa pʋↄ, ɩ̃ ma mɩ sↄw a won a jaa.
46013008	A nʋfʋ ma tɛrɛ baarfʋ daar wa. A ala ɩ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ bʋʋfʋ ʋ, ʋ na tↄlʼã, a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ na mɩ baarʼã, ɩ̃ a bↄ̃wfʋ mɩ na mɩ tↄlʼã.
46013009	A-na-ɩ a sɩ bↄ̃wfʋ ɓↄrʼã, ɩ̃ a sɩ Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ bʋʋfʋ mɩ ɓↄr.
46013010	Ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛdaar a ala na ɩ a eɛcɛ na tara, a ala na ɓↄr ma lɛ beree wa.
46013011	A lɛdaar ɩ̃ na dãa cãa ɩ a bibile, a bibi-ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ɩ̃ ma dãa ƴɛrɛ, tɛrɛ nɩ a bibi-yɛ̃, tɩɛrɛ nɩ a bibi-tɩɛrɩ̃sɩ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na ɩ a nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ baar, ɩ̃ barʼã a ala na ɩ a bibi-tʋmↄ.
46013012	A ala sɩ na nyɛ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ bom sɩ ua nyɛ caaraa pʋↄ na ma bↄ̃w nyɩr wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a daar wa ta, sɩ na nyɛ ʋ na gbelẽgbelẽ. A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a ɩ̃ bↄ̃wfʋ ɓↄrʼã, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋna daarʼãa pʋↄ, ɩ̃ na bↄ̃w na a jaa, a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na mɩ bↄ̃w ma.
46013013	A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na yele ata ɩ̃ be be: a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa, a tɩɛrʋ̃ son, nɩ a nʋfʋ; ɩ̃-cɛ a ana yele ata pʋↄ, a bõ-kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ na a nʋfʋ.
46014001	Nyɩ́ nyɩrɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ a nʋfʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ́ mɩ bʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tʋmↄ a nyɩ sↄ̃w. A ala pʋↄ, a kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ na a nyɩ na bʋʋrↄ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃.
46014002	A ʋlↄ na ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ, aa ɩ nɩrɛ ʋ ƴɛrɛ nɩ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a Naaŋmɩn ʋ ƴɛrɛ nɩ. A Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ʋ tɛrɛ ƴɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-sↄↄlsɩ.
46014003	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na bʋʋrↄ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃, nɩbɛ ʋ ƴɛrɛ nɩ, sũono nɩ ba a ba karɛɛ, kpãkpana nɩ ba, mɩ ɓaala nɩ ba.
46014004	A ʋlↄ na ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ, a ʋ yẽ tɛw a sũono ʋ kara, ɩ̃-cɛ a ʋlↄ na bʋʋrↄ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃, a duo-puorbo ʋ sũono a ba kara ba jaa.
46014005	Ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na nyɩ jaa nyɩ ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ. Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ̃ na nyɩrɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ ɩ na a nyɩ na tʋↄ bʋʋrↄ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃. A ʋlↄ na bʋʋrↄ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ gãw na a ʋlↄ na ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ, a ala ma ɩ nɩrɛ be na be ire a par a sũono a duo-puorbo ba jaa wa.
46014006	Yɛɛr, nyɩ́ tɩɛr nyɛ. A ala ɩ ɩ̃ wɩ na a nyɩ jie na ƴɛrɛ nɩ nyɩ a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ, bõ a na ɩ nyɩ, ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ma ɩ a ƴɛr-miilaa, mɩɩ bↄ̃wfʋ mɩɩ Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ bʋʋfʋ, mɩɩ jaanfʋ ɩ̃ wɩ nɩ wa?
46014007	A lɛ a mɩ wↄ̃ nɩ a yele ala ba na ma pɛɛlɛ mɩɩ ba na ma ŋmeere. A ala ɩ a ba kↄkɩɛ ma be kpee kpee wa, mɩnɛ fʋ na ɩ ɩ̃ bↄ̃w a sʋkpa ba na pɛɛlɛ mɩɩ ba na ŋmeere?
46014008	Ɩ̃ a ɩl-pɛɛlɛ mɩ, a ʋlↄ pɛɛl a ɩl a burbur, ala na gbɛɛrɩ̃ a jɛb ɩnɛ?
46014009	A lɛ ʋ mɩ a nyɩ jie. A ala ɩ a nyɩ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ ma caara wa, mɩnɛ ba na tʋↄ bↄ̃w a par? Vuo pʋↄ nyɩ ƴɛrɛ bara.
46014010	A ƴɛr-yaw be na ka a tẽw pʋↄ ɩ̃ na ma bↄ̃w a nʋↄr wa, ɩ̃-cɛ bõ-ƴen ma be be na ma tɛrɛ a par wa.
46014011	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ a nɩrɛ ƴɛrɛ nɩ ma na a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na ma wono wa, ɩ̃ na ɩ na saana a ʋ jie, ɩ̃ ʋ mɩ ɩ ma saana.
46014012	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a nyɩmɩ mɩ, a mɩnɛ nyɩ na tɩɩ bʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tʋmↄ a nyɩ sↄ̃w, nyɩ́ nyɩrɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ a ala na sũono a duo-puorbo a ba karɛɛ.
46014013	A nɩrɛ ʋlↄ na ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ sɛw na ʋ sʋↄr a Naaŋmɩn a mɩnɛ ʋ na tʋↄrↄ lɩɛbɛ a ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ.
46014014	A-na-ɩ a maa puoro a Naaŋmɩn nɩ a ana ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ, a ɩ̃ sɩɛ pnoro na ɩ̃ eɛ a ɩ̃ yɛ̃ bar.
46014015	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, bõ ɩ̃ na maal? Ɩ̃ na puoro na a Naaŋmɩn nɩ a ɩ̃ sɩɛ, ɩ̃ mɩ puoro nɩ a ɩ̃ yɛ̃. Ɩ̃ na mɩ cɩɛrɛ na a yele nɩ a ɩ̃ sɩɛ, ɩ̃ mɩ cɩɛrɛ nɩ a ɩ̃ yɛ̃.
46014016	A ala ɩ fʋ pɛwrɛ na a Naaŋmɩn nɩ a fʋ sɩɛ, mɩnɛ a ʋlↄ na ɩ a dakume ɩ̃ be a be na tʋↄ yel a “Amɛn” a fʋ Naaŋmɩn pɛwfʋ ɩnɛ? A-na-ɩ Ꞌwaa bↄ̃w a fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ par wa.
46014017	A fʋ Naaŋmɩn pɛwfʋ na tʋↄ ua vɩɛlɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ aa sũo a fʋ tↄ sʋbↄ ʋ na karɩ̃ wa.
46014018	Ɩ̃ pɛwrɛ na a Naaŋmɩn a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ gãw nyɩ nyɩ jaa.
46014019	Ɩ̃-cɛ a duo-puorbo mi-sↄw, a uʋmↄ ma na ɩ̃ na ƴɛr ƴɛr-bie anuu nɩ a ɩ̃ yɛ̃, na jaauʼɩ̃ a nɩbɛ, gãw a ƴɛr-yaw ɩ̃ na ƴɛrɛ nɩ a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ.
46014020	Yɛɛr, nyɩ taa wↄ̃ taa nɩ bibiir a yɛ̃ pʋↄ wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ a bier maalfʋ ʋ, nyɩ́ ɩ bi-pɩɩlsɩ, ɩ̃ bɩ a yɛ̃ pʋↄ.
46014021	A sɛbʼã a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ pʋↄ: “Yɛr-kpeesɩ ɩ̃ na de ƴɛrʼɩ̃ a nɩbɛ basɩmɛ. Sáanba ɩ̃ na de ƴɛrʼɩ̃ ba, ɩ̃-cɛ ba kↄ̃ mɩ cɛl ma wa. Lɛ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yel.”
46014022	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ ma ɩ jɩbaa a popuorbo jie wa, ɩ̃-cɛ a bala na ma puoro wa jie ʋ ɩ a jɩbaa. Ɩ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ bʋʋfʋ ma ɩ jɩbaa a bala na ma puoro jie wa, ɩ̃ a bala na puoro jie ʋ ɛ̃ɛ ɩ a jɩbaa.
46014023	A ala ɩ a duo-puorbo duo na taa, ɩ̃ a ba jaa nyↄw ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ, ɩ̃ a dakumsɩ mɩɩ a bala ua ma puoro wa wa kpɛ a be nyɛ nyɩ a lɛ, ba kↄ̃ yel á nyɩ yaara na wa?
46014024	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ a ba jaa bʋʋrↄ na a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃, ɩ̃ a dakume mɩɩ a ʋlↄ na ma puoro wa wa kpɛ, a ala a jaa ʋ na wouo, a na tↄ ʋ na a suur pʋↄ ʋ nyↄw ɩ̃ pɛrɛ.
46014025	A yele ala na dãa sↄↄlɩ̃ a ʋ suur pʋↄ na yi na cãa pʋↄ, ɩ̃ ʋ na gũu na surĩ a juu pɛwrɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn yele nɩ áa Naaŋmɩn sɩrɩ̃ na be a nyɩ sↄ̃w.
46014026	Yɛɛr, mɩnɛ a na be? A lɛdaar nyɩ na ma duo taa, bõ-ƴeu a nyɩ sↄ̃w ma tɛrɛ na yele na cɛ, a ƴen sʋbↄ ma tɛrɛ jaanfʋ na jaan, a kãw ma tɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-miilaa na miil, a bõ-ƴen go ma tɛrɛ a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ na ƴɛr, ɩ̃ a ƴen sʋbↄ go na lɩɛbɛ a ana ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ. A ala a jaa sɛw na na sũo nyɩ a nyɩ karɛɛ.
46014027	A ala ɩ ba wa ƴɛrɛ na a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ, a sɛw na ba ɩ nɩbɛ ayi mɩɩ ata, ɩ̃-cɛ ba taa wa poro ata wa, ɩ̃ bá ƴɛrɛ ɩ̃ cɩɛrɛ kʋrↄ taa, ɩ̃ nɩrɛ ú mɩ lɩɛb a ala ba na yele.
46014028	Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ nɩrɛ ma be a duo-puorbo sↄ̃w na lɩɛb a ba ƴɛrɩ̃ wa, a ʋlↄ na ƴɛrɛ ú sine, ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ nɩ a ʋ nɩɩ̃ɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn.
46014029	A ala ɩ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃-bʋʋrbↄ ʋ, bá ɩ nɩbɛ ayi mɩɩ ata, ɩ̃-cɛ a bala na eɛ, bá jɛ pɛrɛ a ala ba na yele.
46014030	A ala ɩ a ƴen sʋbↄ na jɛ a be wa pↄw ua a ƴɛr-miilaa a Naaŋmɩn jie, a dãdãw sʋbↄ, ú sine.
46014031	Nyɩ jaa na tʋↄ na bʋʋrↄ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ bõ-ƴene-ƴene, a mɩnɛ a na tʋↄ jaan a nɩbɛ ba jaa kpãkpana nɩ ba.
46014032	A Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃-bʋʋrbↄ ma tʋↄ na tɛrɛ a ba mɩ̃ɛ a tʋmↄ ala pʋↄ,
46014033	a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ma ɩ nyanyaafʋ Naaŋmɩn wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ bʋↄl sɩ na a sɩ na tɛrɛ su-ɓaar. A mɩnɛ a na ma maala a Naaŋmɩn duo-puorbo sↄ̃w a jiir a jaa,
46014034	a pↄↄbↄ sɛw na ba ma sme a duo-taa pʋʋr. Sↄr ma be be a pↄw na ƴɛr ƴɛrɩ̃ wa. A sɛw na ba ma wur a ba mɩ̃ɛ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-kpɛn na yel.
46014035	A ala ɩ ba bʋↄrↄ na ba soor bom, bá soor a ba sɩrbɛ be a yir. Aa vɩɛlɛ a pↄw na ƴɛr a ƴɛrɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn yir pʋↄ wa.
46014036	Nyɩ jie a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ dãa yi mɩɩ a nyɩ jie tɛw a dãa ta?
46014037	A ala ɩ̃ ɩ nɩrɛ tɩɛr bↄ̃w ka a ʋ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃-bʋʋrↄ, mɩɩ a ʋ tɛrɛ na a Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ bↄ̃wfʋ, a sɛw na ʋ bↄ̃w ka a asɩmɛ ɩ̃ na sɛb ɩ na a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ ƴɛr-kpɛ̃w.
46014038	A ala ɩ a nɩrɛ ma sↄw a ala wa, nyɩ taa mɩ sↄw de ʋ wa.
46014039	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ ɩ̃ yɛɛr, nyɩ́ nyɩrɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩu pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃ bʋʋfʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ nyɩ taa mↄ̃wnↄ a ƴɛr-bↄ̃w-faarsɩ ƴɛrfʋ bara wa.
46014040	Nyɩ́ maala a yele a jaa a mɩnɛ a na sɛw, tuure nɩ a mɩnɛ ba na guor.
46015001	Yɛɛr, a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ɩ̃ bʋↄrↄ na ɩ̃ jaw nyɩ a ƴɛr-son ʋlↄ ɩ̃ na dãa ƴɛr kʋ nyɩ ɩ̃ a nyɩ mɩ sↄw de ɩ̃ mɩ ɩraa a be cĩcĩ.
46015002	Nyɩ na pↄw na a faafʋ a ƴɛrɩ̃ ʋlↄ ɩuɛ a ala ɩ̃ ɩ nyɩ bↄ̃w na nyↄw ʋ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na dãa ƴɛr kʋ nyɩ. A ala ma ɩ lɛ ʋ wa, a nyɩ sↄwfʋ na ɩ na pↄrↄ.
46015003	Ɩ̃ dãa na man a ala na ɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃ juu ɩ̃ na mɩ dãa pↄw kʋ nyɩ, na yel áa Kirisi kpi na a sɩ maal-faar ɩnɛ tu nɩ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn Sɛbɛ na dãa yel,
