66013004	A ba jaa pɛwrɛ na a gbãgbacol, a-na-ɩ ʋ de na a ʋ tʋↄfʋ kʋ a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ, ɩ̃ ba mɩ pɛwrɛ na a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ yele nɩ: “Ala mɩ be a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ na kaarɩ̃? Ala na tʋↄ jɛbʼɩ̃ ʋ?”
66013005	Ba kʋ ʋ na a sↄr ʋ ƴɛrɛ yo-bↄb ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ mɩ kpɛrɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃ mɩ kʋ ʋ sↄr ʋ na maal a ala, maalʼɩ̃ cur lɩjaayi nʼayi.
66013006	Ʋ nyↄw na ɩ̃ kpɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn, mɩ kpɛrɛ nɩ a ʋ yuor, nɩ a jie ʋlↄ ʋ na be, nɩ a bala na be a be a saa juu.
66013007	Ba kʋ ʋ na a sↄr ʋ na jɛbʼɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn nɩbɛ tʋↄ ba, ɩ̃ mɩ kʋ ʋ a tʋↄfʋ a bal-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ jie, nɩ a nɩ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ, nɩ a ƴɛr-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ, nɩ a ten a jaa jie.
66013008	A tẽw pʋↄ nɩbɛ ba jaa, a bala a ba yoe na ma sɛb a baafʋ sɛbɛ pʋↄ wa, nↄↄ gbure na a dume puoro ʋ, a lɛ yelʼã a bala yoe na ma sɛb a Pẽle sɛbɛ pʋↄ wa, a ʋlↄ ba na dãa kú a tẽw nyↄwfʋ daar jaa.
66013009	“A ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a tobo wono nɩ, ú bↄ̃w cɛlɛ a asɩmɛ.
66013010	A ala ɩ ba biinʼã nɩrɛ a sama-deme ɩnɛ, a sama-deme na sɩrɩ̃ de ʋ cenʼɩ̃. Ɩ̃ a ala ɩ ba biinʼã nɩrɛ a ba na kú nɩ ʋ a sↄ-bãjɩnɛ, a sↄ-bãjɩnɛ ba na sɩrɩ̃ kú nɩ ʋ. Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ a sɛw a Naaŋmɩn deme na tɛrɛ su-nyↄwraa, tɛrɛ nɩ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa.”
66013011	Ɩ̃, ɩ̃ lɛ nyɛ na a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ ƴen sʋbↄ ʋ yire á tene, ɩ̃ tɛrɛ ɩlɛ a Pẽle kaarɩ̃, ɩ̃ ƴɛrɛ wↄ̃ taa nɩ gbãgbacol.
66013012	Ʋ tɛrɛ na a dãdãw wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ tʋↄfʋ a jaa, tʋnↄ nɩ a tʋmↄ a ʋ nii-sↄw. Ʋ fɛrʼã a tẽw pʋↄ nɩbɛ ba jaa a ba pɛwrɛ a dãdaw wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ ʋlↄ a ŋmafʋ ala na dãa sɛw a kú ʋ, na ɓↄ̃.
66013013	A gbɛɛ ayi wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ ʋlↄ maalʼã nↄ-kofʋ tʋ̃-bɛrɛ, mↄↄ tʋↄ maal a vũu a yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ wa lo a tene a nɩbɛ ba jaa nii-sↄw.
66013014	Ʋ bɛlɛ na a tẽwpʋↄnɩbɛ nɩ a ʋ nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ ba na kʋ ʋ ʋ maala a dãdãw wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ nii-sↄw. Ʋ yelʼã a tẽw pʋↄ nɩbɛ á bá mɛ bʋtɩb-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋ wↄ̃ taa nɩ a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ ʋlↄ ba na cɛ cɛ nɩ a sↄ-bãjɩnɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ lɛ nɩ̃ɛ.
66013015	Ɩ̃ a gbɛɛ ayi wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ pↄw na a tʋↄfʋ̃ na maal a bʋtɩɩb ʋlↄ ʋ vʋʋrↄ, a mɩnɛ ʋ na mɩ tʋↄ ƴɛrɛ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ, ɩ̃ mɩ tʋↄ maal a ba kú a bala ba jaa na ma sↄw pɛwrɛ ʋ wa.
66013016	Ʋ fɛrʼã a nɩ-bɛrɛ nɩ a nɩ-kↄmsɩ, a nãw deme nɩ a naabsɩ, a gbãgbaar nɩ a bala na sↄ a ba mɩ̃ɛ, a ba jaa na pↄw a jɩbaa a ba dʋrɩ̃ nuú pʋↄ, mɩɩ a ba diirɩ̃.
66013017	Nɩrɛ ma tɛrɛ sↄr na da bom wa, a ala ma ɩ ʋ tɛrɛ na a ʋna jɩbaa nãa wa; a lɛ yelʼã a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ ʋlↄ yuor, mɩɩ a ʋ ƴuor sɛb-bie nʋↄr.
66013018	A ka, a sɛw na a nɩrɛ na tɛrɛ kpaarfʋ. A ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a yɛ̃ ú sↄr a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ ʋlↄ sɛb-bĩe nʋↄr, a-na-ɩ ʋ na sↄrʼã nyɛ daba yuor. A sↄrfʋ nʋↄr ɩ na kↄↄr ayʋↄb dↄↄl lɩjaata nʼayʋↄb.
66014001	Ala ɩ̃ baar, ɩ̃ Ꞌwuorʼã nyɛ a Péle ʋ ɩraa a Sɩ̃ↄ tãw juu. Ʋ lãa na ɩraa nɩ nɩbɛ ture kʋbaa lɩjaayi nʼanaan na tɛrɛ a ʋ yuor nɩ a ʋ Sãa yuor a ba dibe pʋʋr.
66014002	Ɩ̃ wõ na kↄkɩr na yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ hele kʋ̃ↄ kaarɩ̃, mɩɩ saa na paar. A ʋna kↄkɩr mɩ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ korĩjomsɩ ba na ŋmeere.
66014003	A bana nɩ-yaw ɩraa na a naa-dakↄw nii-sↄw, nɩ a yel-mimie anaan nɩ a nɩ-bɛrɛ nii-sↄw cɩɛrɛ yel-paalaa. Nɩrɛ ma tʋↄrↄ jaana a ʋna yele, ɩ̃ ma ɩ a bana nɩbɛ ture kʋbaa lɩjaayi nʼanaan tɛw ba na da fáa a ka a tẽw pʋↄ wa.
66014004	Ba ɩ na a bala na ma sãw a ba mɩ̃ɛ nɩ a pↄↄbↄ wa. Ba tɛrɛ na a ba mɩ̃ɛ cɛcɛ. Ba ma mɩ tuure na a Pẽle a jiir a jaa ʋ na cere. Ba da ba na fáa a nɩbɛ sↄ̃w a ba na ɩ a bõ-paala ba na kʋrↄ a Naaŋmɩn nɩ a Péle.
66014005	Ba maa ŋmaa jiri fɩ̃ɩ wa. Baa tɛrɛ cɛfʋ jie wa.
66014006	Ɩ̃ ɩ̃ nyɛ na a sɩ-tʋnaa ƴen sʋbↄ ʋ be a saꞋlon file-file yʋↄrↄ lie kaarɩ̃, ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a daar a jaa ƴɛr-son, bʋↄrↄ ʋ hier kʋ a tẽ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ, nɩ a bal-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ, nɩ a ƴɛr-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ nɩ a nɩ-bʋrↄ ba jaa na be ka a tẽw pʋↄ.
66014007	Ʋ yele na nɩ kↄkɩr kpɛ̃w: “Nyɩ́ jↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn, mɩ kʋrↄ nɩ ʋ a ju-kpɛ̃ɛ! Á-na-ɩ a daar ta na ʋ na guor a nɩbɛ ƴɛrɩ̃. Nyɩ́ pɛwrɛ a ʋlↄ na maal a saꞋlon nɩ a tene, a man nɩ a kʋ̃ↄ yifʋ jiir!”
66014008	Ɩ̃ a gbɛɛ ayi sɩ-tʋnaa tu na a dãdãw sɩ-tʋnaa, yele nɩ: “Ʋ lo na, a Babɩlↄ̃ tẽ-kpɛ̃ɛ lo na; a ʋlↄ na maal a te-bʋ̃rↄ bʋrↄ a ba nyu a ʋ gã-ta-burbur dãa na waara nɩ a Naaŋmɩn su-tuo.”
66014009	Ɩ̃ a gbɛɛ ata sɩ-tʋnaa mɩ tu na a bala ayi, yele nɩ kↄkɩr kpɛ̃w: “A nɩrɛ lɛ na pɛwrɛ a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ nɩ a bʋtɩɩb ba na mɛ a ʋ kaarɩ̃, ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ a ʋ jɩbaa a ʋ diirɩ̃, mɩɩ a ʋ nuu pʋↄ,
66014010	na mɩ nyu na a Naaŋmɩn su-tuo dã-kpɛ̃w ʋ na deer ƴↄ̃w a ʋ su-tuo ŋman pʋↄ. A bala ba jaa na maal a lɛ, ba na pↄw na kpowfʋ a vuu pʋↄ nɩ a kʋsɩ-Ꞌlerisɩ pʋↄ, a Naaŋmɩn sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Pẽle nii-sↄw.
66014011	Ɩ̃ a vũu ʋlↄ pʋↄ ba na pↄwrↄ a kpowfʋ, a ʋ jʋʋr duoro na a daar a jaa. A bala na pɛwrɛ a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ nɩ a bʋtɩɩb ʋlↄ ba na mɛ, nɩ a nɩrɛ lɛ na pↄw a ʋ yuor jɩbaa, kↄ̃ tɛrɛ pɩɛnfʋ a mↄtↄ̃w nɩ a tɩsↄw wa.”
66014012	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a Naaŋmɩn deme na jↄrↄ a ʋ ƴɛr-kpɛn, ɩ̃ mɩ ɩraa cĩcĩ a Jeeju pʋↄ, sɛw na na tɛrɛ su-nyↄwraa.
66014013	Ɩ̃ ɩ̃ wõ na kↄkɩr na yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ yel ma: “Sɛb a asɩmɛ: ʻWa nyↄw nɩ a ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃, nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a bala na kpiire a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ sↄr pʋↄ.ʼ A Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ yel: ʻↄↄ, sɩrɛ jaa ʋ. Ba na jɛ na pɩɛnɛ, ma lɛ nyɛrɛ vↄwfʋ wa, a-na-ɩ a tʋmↄ ala ba na dãa maal be nɩ ba na.ʼ ”
66014014	Ɩ̃ lɛ Ꞌwuorʼã nyɛ dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃-pɩlaa, ɩ̃ a ʋna dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃ma pʋↄ, bom jɛ na be daba kaarɩ̃, ɩ̃ kpa sɛlmɛ sapi a juu pʋↄ, tɛrɛ nɩ ci-ŋma-sʋↄ na dɩrɛ a ʋ nuumɩ.
66014015	Ɩ̃ sɩ-tʋnaa ƴen sʋbↄ yi na a Naaŋmɩn yir, wuurʼɩ̃ kↄkɩr kpɛ̃w yel a ʋlↄ na jɛ a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃ma pʋↄ: “De a fʋ sʋↄ ŋma nɩ a ci, a-na-ɩ a ci-ŋmafʋ daar ta na. A tẽw pʋↄ ci bɩ na ta a ŋmafʋ.”
66014016	A ʋlↄ na dãa jɛ a dↄ̃dↄrɩ̃ma pʋↄ de na a ʋ sʋↄ suu nɩ a tene ŋma nɩ a tẽw ʋ jaa ci.
66014017	Ɩ̃ a sɩ-tʋnaa ƴen sʋbↄ lɛ yi na a Naaŋmɩn yir a be a saa juu, ɩ̃ mɩ tɛrɛ a ci-ŋma-sↄ-dɩraa.
66014018	A sɩ-tʋ̃-kpee na ɩ a vũu nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yi na a baar lofʋ jie, wuurʼɩ̃ kↄkɩr kpɛ̃w yelʼɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a sↄ-dɩraa: “De a fʋ sↄ-dɩraa ŋma nɩ a dɩvɛ̃ tɩ-wↄmↄ, a-na-ɩ a mʋ̃ↄ na.”
66014019	A sɩ-tʋnaa de na a ʋ sʋↄ suu nɩ a tene, ŋma nɩ a dɩvɛ̃ tɩ-wↄmↄ, lↄb ƴↄ̃w a bↄw kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ pʋↄ ba na ma nɛbɛ a ʋ bie, na miile a Naaŋmɩn su-tuo.
66014020	Ba nɛb ba na a tẽw cɛ̃eɛ̃w, a jɩ̃ɩ yi a bↄw pʋↄ ɩ̃ do jɛ̃ taa nɩ a dↄ̃dↄr nʋↄr, ɩ̃ jↄ maal kilo kↄↄr ata.
66015001	Ɩ̃ lɛ nyɛ na bõ-kpɛ̃ɛ kãw na ɩ bõ-miilaa a saꞋlon na ko ma nʋↄr: a ɩ na a sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ anuu-nʼayi na tɛrɛ jãjĩ-yele anuu-nʼayi. A baarfʋ daar yele ʋ, a-na-ɩ a ala pʋↄ a Naaŋmɩn su-tuo baara.
66015002	Ɩ̃ lɛ nyɛ na a bom na wↄ̃ taa nɩ man kʋ̃ↄ na ɩ wɩl-wɩl na nyanyaa nɩ vũu. Ɩ̃ mɩ lɛ nyɛ na a bala na dãa tʋↄ a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ, nɩ a ʋ bʋtɩɩb, nɩ a sↄr-bie ala na miile a ʋ yuor, a ba tɛrɛ a korĩjomsɩ ala a Naaŋmɩn na kʋ ba, ɩraa nɩ a man kʋ̃ↄ wɩl-wɩl gbẽgbere nʋↄr.
66015003	Ba cɩɛrɛ na a Naaŋmɩn tʋ̃tʋnↄ Mowisi yele, nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Pele yele a nↄhↄ̃: “Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Naaŋmɩn na ɩ a kpɛ̃w a jaa Sʋbↄ, a fʋ tʋmↄ bɛrmɛ na, ɩ̃ mɩ koro nʋↄr. Ten a jaa Jamana, a fʋ maal-bie torʼã, ɩ̃ mɩ ɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ.
66015004	Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ, ala ɩ̃ be be kↄ̃ jↄrↄ fʋ wa? Ala ɩ̃ be be kↄ̃ maal a fʋ yuor ʋ yire wa? A-na-ɩ fʋ̃ʋ tɛw ɩ̃ ɩ a cɛcɛ. A ten a jaa nɩbɛ na wa na gbure a dume a fʋ nii-sↄw, a-na-ɩ a fʋ maal-bie torʼã, ɩ̃ nyɩr cãa pʋↄ.”
66015005	A ala ɩ̃ baar, ɩ̃ lɛ nyɛ na a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir na ɩ a ʋ pʋlɩ̃-taa di-ciiraa ʋ yuo a saꞋlon,
66015006	ɩ̃ a sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ bala anuu-nʼayi na tɛrɛ a jãjĩ-yele anuu-nʼayi, a ba su a cẽcẽ-pɛlɛ na nyɩlɛ, sɛ nɩ sɛlmɛ gana a ba nyãa juu, yire nɩ a be a Naaŋmɩn yir ʋlↄ pʋↄ.
66015007	A yel-mimie anaan bala ƴen sʋbↄ de na a sɛlmɛ laa na sɛw nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ na be a daar a jaa su-tuo, kʋ a sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ bala anuu-nʼayi.
66015008	A Naaŋmɩn yo-yifʋ nɩ a ʋ kpɛ̃w ɩnɛ, a jʋʋr sɛw na a puorfʋ yir ʋlↄ ɩ̃ nɩrɛ ma tʋↄrↄ kpɛɛrɛ a be, wa tara nɩ a lɛdaar a sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ anuu-nʼayi jãjĩ-yele anuu-nʼayi na maala baara wa.
66016001	Ɩ̃ wõ na kↄkɩr kpɛ̃w na yi a Naaŋmɩn puor-yir, yele a sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ anuu-nʼayi bala: “Nyɩ́ cen na kpaar a Naaŋmɩn su-tuo a lara pʋↄ bar a tẽw juu.”
66016002	A dãdãw sɩ-tʋnaa cenʼã na kpaar a ʋ ben bar a tẽw juu, a natɩ-yarɩsɩ na bier tɛ a nɩbɛ bala na tɛrɛ a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ jɩbaa ɩ̃ mɩ puoro a ʋ bʋtɩɩb.
66016003	A gbɛɛ ayi sɩ-tʋnaa cenʼã na kpaar a ʋ ben ƴↄ̃w a man pʋↄ, a kʋ̃ↄ lɩɛb wↄ̃ taa nɩ kũu jɩ̃ɩ, a yel-mimie na be a kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ kpi ba jaa.
66016004	A gbɛɛ ata sɩ-tʋnaa mɩ cenʼã na kpaar a ʋ ben ƴↄ̃w a kʋlsɩ pʋʋr nɩ a kʋ̃ↄ bunisɩ jiir, a lɩɛb ɩ jɩ̃ɩ.
66016005	A ala ɩ̃ baar, ɩ̃ wõ na a sɩ-tʋnaa ʋlↄ na Ꞌwuoro a kʋ̃ↄsɩ ʋ yel: “Gɛcɛ Sʋbↄ, fʋ̃ʋ na ɩ, na mɩ dãa ɩ, fʋ torʼã a mɩnɛ fʋ na maal a nↄhↄ̃.
66016006	A-na-ɩ a bala na dãa kú a fʋ nɩbɛ nɩ a fʋ ƴɛr-hierbe, fʋ kʋ ba na a jɩ̃ɩ a ba nyuure. Ba pↄw na a ala na sɛw nɩ ba.”
66016007	Ɩ̃ lɛ wõ na a kↄkɩr na yi a baar lofʋ jie na yel: “Ↄↄ, Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Naaŋmɩn na ɩ a kpɛ̃w a jaa Sʋbↄ. A fʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ ɩ na yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ mɩ tor.”
66016008	A gbɛɛ anaan sɩ-tʋnaa kpaarʼã a ʋ ben ƴↄ̃w a mↄtↄ̃w pʋↄ, ʋ pↄw a tʋↄfʋ vuul a nɩbɛ nɩ a vũu.
66016009	A tʋlɩ̃ kpɛ̃w vuulʼã a nɩbɛ a ba tʋrↄ a Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a tʋↄfʋ a ana jãjĩ-yele pʋↄ, ɩ̃ ma lɩɛb a ba yɛ̃ kʋrↄ nɩ ʋ a ju-kpɛ̃ɛ wa.
66016010	A gbɛɛ anuu sɩ-tʋnaa kpaarʼã a ʋ ben ƴↄ̃w a wɛ-dʋ̃-naa-dakↄw juu, a ʋ fãw wɩɛr lɩɛb sↄb, ɩ̃ a nɩbɛ Ꞌwↄbↄ a nↄgbalɩ̃bie a won na wono ba ɩnɛ.
66016011	Ba tʋrↄ na a saa juu Naaŋmɩn a ba won nɩ a ba natɩɛ ɩnɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ baa lɩɛb a ba yɛ̃ a ba maal-bie ɩnɛ wa.
66016012	A gbɛɛ ayʋↄb sɩ-tʋnaa kpaarʼã a ʋ ben ƴↄ̃w a Ɛfɩratɩ kʋl-kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ, a kʋ̃ↄ sɩr, bar a sↄr a tẽw parɩ̃ jamansɩ ɩnɛ nↄↄ waara.
66016013	Ɩ̃ lɛ nyɛ na sɩ-kpansɩ ata na wↄ̃ taa nɩ lↄn na yire a gbãgbacol nʋↄr pʋↄ, nɩ a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ nʋↄr pʋↄ, nɩ a jir-ŋma-ƴɛr-hiere nʋↄr pʋↄ.
66016014	Ba ɩ na a kↄ̃tↄnsɩ na ma maala a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ. Ba cere na a tẽw ʋ jaa jamansɩ jie, na kpaarɩ̃ ba a Naaŋmɩn, na ɩ a kpɛ̃w a jaa Sʋbↄ, bibir kpɛ̃ɛ jɛb ɩnɛ.
66016015	A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ yelʼã: “Oɛlɛ! Ɩ̃ wɩɛrɛ na nyanyuur kaarɩ̃. Nʋ̃ↄ na be na a ʋlↄ na jʋʋrↄ jie, a ʋlↄ na bↄ̃w tɛrɛ a ʋ cẽcene, a mɩnɛ ʋ kↄ̃ↄ cere nɩ salĩɓuor a ɩ ʋ vĩ a nɩbɛ nii-sↄw wa.”
66016016	A kↄ̃tↄnsɩ bala kpaarɩ̃ na a jamansɩ a jie ʋlↄ ba na bʋↄlↄ nɩ a Eburo ƴɛrɩ̃ a Amagɛdↄ̃.
66016017	A gbɛɛ anuu-nʼayi sɩ-tʋnaa kpaarʼã a ʋ ben ƴↄ̃w a sɛsɛb pʋↄ ɩ̃ a kↄkɩr kpɛ̃w yi a naa-dakↄw ʋlↄ na be a Naaŋmɩn di-tuo pʋↄ yel: “A maalʼã.”
66016018	Ɩ̃ a saa nyɩnyɩlɛ, a kↄkɩɛ yire, a saa tana, ɩ̃ a tẽw ɓn nɩ kpɛ̃w. Wa nyↄw nɩ a lɛdaar a nɩrɛ na be ka a tẽw pʋↄ, a tẽw ma dãa ɓĩi nɩ kpɛ̃w a nↄhↄ̃ sɛr wa.
66016019	A tẽ-kpɛ̃ɛ ŋma na jiir ata kpee kpee, a nɩ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ten kar lo, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn cãa bↄ̃w nɩ a tẽ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ na dɩ a Babɩlↄ̃, ɩ̃ de a dɩvɛ̃ nɩ a ŋman kʋ ʋ ʋ nyu, a dɩvɛ̃ ʋlↄ na ɩ a ʋ su-tuo na nyɩrɩ̃ tomo.
66016020	A ten a jaa a kʋ̃ↄ na jilĩ kolĩ nyɩ na, nɩ a tan a jaa.
66016021	A sa-kʋsɩ-bɛrɛ a nɩrɛ na ma tʋↄrↄ ɓↄwrↄ wa, a yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ loro pↄbↄ a nɩbɛ, a ba tʋrↄ a Naaŋmɩn a ʋna jãjĩ-bom ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ ʋ dãa na ɩ bom na nyɩrɩ̃ bier.
66017001	A ala ɩ̃ baar, a sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ bala anuu-nʼayi na tɛrɛ a lara anuu-nʼayi, bõ-ƴen a ba pʋↄ wa na yel mã: “Wa, ɩ̃ na miil fʋ na a kpãafʋ ʋlↄ na tara a pↄw-baa na na yi a yuor, a lɛ yelʼã a tẽw ʋlↄ na ɩraa a kʋl-yaw gbẽgbere nↄɛ
66017002	A tẽw jamansɩ maalʼɩ̃ ʋ na a burbur, ɩ a ʋ burbur maalfʋ kú na a tẽw ʋ jaa nɩbɛ a dɩvɛ̃ kaarɩ̃.”
66017003	Ɩ̃ a sɩ-tʋnaa ɓↄw ma na a sɩɛ pʋↄ kpɛ nɩ wɛkar pʋ̃ↄ, ɩ̃ nyɛ a pↄw na jɛ a wɛ-dʋ̃-jɩ̃ɛw kpakpa juu ba na sɛb a yoe ala na kpɛrɛ a Naaŋmɩn pↄw a ʋ ɩ̃gan, na tɛrɛ jur anuu-nʼayi, nɩ ɩlɛ pie.
66017004	A pↄw ʋlↄ vaarʼã cẽcen jɩ̃ɛw kpakpa na kpɛmɛ a dafʋ, ɩ̃ parɩ̃sɩ yele ba na maalʼɩ̃ a sɛlmɛ, nɩ a kubi-nyɩlɩsɩ nɩ a lɛr-kpɛn. Ʋ tɛrɛ na a sɛlmɛ laa a ʋ nuu pʋↄ a maal-kpansɩ na sɛw, nɩ a tʋ̃-kpansɩ ála na yi a ʋ burbur pʋↄ̃.
66017005	Ba sɛbʼã yuor na ɩ a sʋkpa a ʋ diir pʋↄ na yel: “A Babɩlↄ̃ na yi a yuor, a ʋlↄ na ɩ a pↄw-baar mã, nɩ a tẽw pʋↄ maal-kpansɩ mã.”
66017006	Ɩ̃ nyɛ na a pↄ̃w ʋlↄ ʋ nyɩrɩ̃ kú a Naaŋmɩn deme, nɩ a bala na ɩ a Jeeju yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛr-manba, a nʋ̃ↄ lɩɛb kú ʋ a dãa kaarɩ̃, a ba jɩ̃ɩ na deer ɩnɛ. A mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na nyɛ ʋ, nʋↄr ko ma na,
66017007	a sɩ-tʋnaa yel ma: “Bõ ɩ a nʋↄr ko fʋ? Ɩ̃ na man fʋ na a fʋ bↄ̃w a pↄw ʋlↄ par, nɩ a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a jur anuu-nʼayi nɩ á ɩlɛ pie.
66017008	A wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ ʋlↄ fʋ na nyɛ, dãa na be ka, ɩ̃ Ꞌwaa lɛ cãa wa, ɩ̃ ʋ nↄↄ lɛ yi na a bↄw ʋlↄ̃ pʋↄ na ma tɛrɛ a bɛwfʋ wa, cen a wɛfʋ jiẽ. A tẽw nɩbɛ bala yoẽ ba na ma sɛb ƴↄ̃w a baafʋ sɛbɛ pʋↄ a tẽw nyↄwfʋ daar jaa wa, a nʋↄr na ko ba na, a mɩnɛ ba na nyɛrɛ a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ ʋlↄ, a-na-ɩ ʋ dãa na be ka, ɩ̃ ma lɛ cãa wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ na lɛ wa na.
66017009	“A ka sɛw na fʋ tɛrɛ yɛ̃ nɩ kpaarfʋ bↄ̃w nɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃ na par. A jur anuu-nʼayi ala miile na tan anuu-nʼayi, a jie ʋlↄ a pↄw na jɩnaa. A jur ala mɩ miile na jamansɩ anuu-nʼayi.
66017010	Anuu a ba sↄ̃w lo na, a bõ-ƴen cãa na ɩ a jamana, ɩ̃ a kãw ma wa sɛr wa. A ʋlↄ wa wa, a sɛw na ʋ na kam fɩ̃ɩ.
66017011	A wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ ʋlↄ na dãa be, ɩ̃ ma lɛ cãa wa, ɩ na a jãmansɩ bala anũu-nʼata sʋ̃bↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ lɛ be a anuu-nʼayĩ bala pʋↄ, cere a wɛfʋ jie.
66017012	“A ɩlɛ pie bala fʋ na nyɛ miile na jamansɩ pie na ma nyↄw a ba tʋ̃mↄ sɛr wa, ɩ̃-cɛ ba na pↄw na a tʋↄfʋ ɩ nɩ a jamansɩ daar fɩ̃ɩ pʋↄ tɛw, lãa nɩ a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ ʋlↄ.
66017013	A ba jaa fɛw tɛrɛ na tɩɛrʋ̃ bõ-ƴen, ɩ̃ de a ba kpɛ̃w nɩ a ba tʋↄfʋ ƴↄ̃w a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ tʋmↄ pʋↄ.
66017014	Ba nↄↄ jɛbɛ nɩ na a Naaŋmɩn Pẽle, ɩ̃-cɛ a Pẽle na tʋↄ ba na, a-na-ɩ ʋlↄ ɩ̃ ɩ a nɩ-bɛrɛ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a jamansɩ Jamana. A ʋ nɩbɛ mɩ ʋ na bʋↄl, ɩ̃ mɩ vɛl ir, na mɩ ɩ a dẽdẽ, nↄↄ mɩ lãa na pↄw nɩ ʋ a tʋↄfʋ.”
66017015	A sɩ-tʋnaa lɛ yel ma na go: “A kʋ̃ↄsɩ ala fʋ na nyɛ, a jie a pↄw-baa na jɛ, miile na a nɩ-bʋlsɩ, a nɩ-yaw na duo a ji-gbulĩsɩ, a tẽ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ nɩ a ƴɛr-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ nɩbɛ.
66017016	A ɩlɛ pie fʋ na nyɛ, nɩ a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ, nↄↄ Ꞌlaarʼã a pↄw-baa. Ba na sãw na a ʋ yele a jaa bar, ɩ̃ cɛ ʋ bar nɩ salĩɓuor. Ba na Ꞌwↄb ʋ na ɩ̃ cɛ ƴↄ̃w a vũu pʋↄ.
66017017	A-na-ɩ a mɩnɛ a Naaŋmɩn na ƴↄ̃w a ba sube pʋʋr a ba na maal a ʋ pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃, ba na tɛrɛ na nↄ-bõ-ƴen de nɩ a ba tʋↄfʋ ƴↄ̃w a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ tʋmↄ pʋↄ, wa ta nɩ a lɛdaar a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ na maala baara.
66017018	“Ɩ̃ a pↄw ʋlↄ fʋ na nyɛ miile na a tẽ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ na tɛrɛ a tʋↄfʋ a tẽw jamansɩ jie.”
66018001	A ala ɩ̃ baar, ɩ̃ nyɛ na sɩ-tʋnaa ƴen sʋbↄ na nyɩrɩ̃ tɛrɛ a tʋↄfʋ, ʋ yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ suure, ɩ̃ a ʋ caarɩ̃fʋ caarɩ̃ pↄw a tẽw ʋ jaa.
66018002	Ʋ wuurʼã nɩ kↄkɩr kpɛ̃w yele: “Ʋ lo na! A Babɩlↄ̃ tẽ-kpɛ̃ɛ lo nal Ʋ lɩɛbʼã ɩ a kↄ̃tↄn gaajie, nɩ a kↄ̃tↄn-kpansɩ bʋrↄ bʋrↄ, nɩ a lili-kpansɩ bʋrↄ bʋrↄ a nɩrɛ na ma bʋↄrↄ wa, kpɛfʋ jie.
66018003	A-na-ɩ a tẽ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ a jaa nyu na a ʋ gã-ta-burbur dãa, a bↄr ba a juu. A tẽw jamansɩ maalʼɩ̃ ʋ na a burbur, ɩ̃ a ten a jaa ƴaƴabsɩ le na a ʋ yele ƴↄfʋ ɩnɛ.”
66018004	Ɩ̃ lɛ wõ na kↄkɩr ƴen sʋbↄ na yi a saꞋlon ɩ̃ yel: “Ɩ̃ nɩbɛ, nyɩ́ yi a tẽw na sↄ̃w, a mɩnɛ a nyɩ kↄ̃ wa be tↄ a ʋ maal-faar pʋↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ pↄw a ana yel-kpansɩ nↄↄ tara ʋ wa.
66018005	A-na-ɩ a ʋ maal-faar dↄↄlʼã taa wa ta nɩ a saꞋlon, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn cãa na bↄ̃w nɩ a ʋ gõgolĩ-tʋmↄ.
66018006	Nyɩ́ maal ʋ a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa maal nyɩ. Nyɩ́ ya a ala ʋ na maal nyɩ, ɩ̃ lɛ dↄↄl ʋ. Nyɩ́ sɛw a dãa a ŋman ʋlↄ ʋ na dãa kʋ nɩ nyɩ gbɛɛ ayi kʋ ʋ ʋ nyu.
66018007	Ya ʋ a won nɩ a nãw ala tu nɩ a mɩnɛ ʋ na dãa bʋↄrↄ a ju-kpɛ̃ɛ, wono nɩ a nʋ̃ↄ. A-na-ɩ ʋ ma yelʼã a ʋ suur pʋↄ: ʻƖ̃ be na ka pↄↄ-naa kaarɩ̃. Maa ɩ kpɩ̃ɩ-pↄw wa. Nãw ma tara ma fɩ̃ɩ wa.ʼ
66018008	Ala-ɩ̃-sↄ, a jãjĩ-yele ala ba na bin a ʋ ɩnɛ, a kũu, a nãw, nɩ a kↄ̃-kpɛ̃ɛ na ta ʋ na bibir bõ-ƴen tɛw. A vũu na dɩ ʋ na, a-na-ɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ na guor a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃, tɛrɛ na kpɛ̃w.”
66018009	A tẽw jamansɩ na dãa maalʻɩ̃ ʋ a burbur, mɩ wõ nɩ ʋ a nʋ̃ↄ, na waala na kono nɩ, a mɩnɛ ba nↄↄ nyɛrɛ a vũu ʋlↄ na dɩrɛ ʋ jʋʋr.
66018010	Ba na ɩraa na nɩdaa a ʋ kpowfʋ dãbɩ̃ɛ ɩnɛ ɩ̃ yele: “Babɩlↄ̃ tẽ-kpɛ̃ɛ na tɛrɛ a kpɛ̃w, fʋ ɩ na nãw nãw, a-na-ɩ a lɛɛr-bõ-ƴen pʋↄ a kpãafʋ tↄↄ ta fʋ.”
66018011	A tẽw pʋↄ ƴaƴabsɩ na mɩ kono na waala nɩ a ʋ ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ nɩrɛ ma lɛ daara a ba ƴaƴab-yele,
66018012	na ɩ a sɛlmɛ, a kur-pɛlɛ, nɩ a kʋsɩ-ɓↄmↄ, a lɛr-bie, a cẽcẽ-ɓↄmↄ bʋrↄ bʋrↄ, nɩ a ŋmɛɛ na ɩ a bʋlↄ, a ŋmɛɛ sala bʋlↄbʋlↄ, ɩ̃ a ŋmɛɛ ɩ jɩɩn kpakpa. A yele mɩ ɩ na a da-vɛlɛ, nɩ a yel-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ ba na maalʼɩ̃ a da-vɛlɛ ala, nɩ a wab-cɩlɛ, nɩ a kur-jɩ̃ɛw, nɩ a kur-salaa nɩ a kʋsɩ-pɛlɛ,
66018013	a tɩɛ bi-nↄr, a jɛɛ yel-nyuursɩ, a kã-nyu-vɩlaa, a tɩ̃ɩ ɓĩinaa, a tɩ̃ɩ-nyu-vɩlaa, a dɩvɛ̃, a kãa, a jↄ̃, a ci, a bʋn, a piir, a wibe, a kaarsɩ ala a wibe na ma tawra, nɩ a gbãgbaar nɩ a nɩ-daarsɩ.
66018014	A ƴaƴabsɩ bala yelʼã a tẽw ʋlↄ: “A yel-vɛlɛ ala a fʋ suur na dãa nʋ bũburĩ na. A fʋ na-yele nɩ a fʋ yo-bↄb yele bↄrʼã. Faa lↄↄ pↄwrↄ ba fɩ̃ɩ wa.”
66018015	A ƴaƴabsɩ bala na dãa pↄw a ba mɩ̃ɛ a ʋ ɩnɛ na mɩ ɩraa na a nɩdaa a ʋ kpowfʋ dãbɩ̃ɛ ɩnɛ kono waala nɩ,
66018016	yele nɩ: “A tẽ-kpɛ̃ɛ nanɩ ɩ na nãw nãw! Ʋ ma dãa na su a cẽcẽ-ɓↄmↄ jɩɩn kpakpa, parɩ̃sɩ nɩ a sɛlmɛ yele, nɩ a kʋsɩ-nyɩlɩsɩ nɩ a lɛr-bie,
66018017	ɩ̃ a ana na-yele a jaa tↄↄ bↄr a lɛɛr-bõ-ƴen pʋↄ.” A bala na duure nɩ a gbor-bɛrɛ, nɩ a bala ba na de, nɩ a gbor pʋↄ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ, nɩ a bala ba jaa na be a manɩ̃, ɩraa na a nɩdaa
66018018	ɩ̃ wuure, a mɩnɛ ba na nyɛ a tẽw na dɩrɛ ure a jʋʋr, na ba yele: “Tẽ-buor be ka ɩ̃ ta a tẽ-kpɛ̃ɛ nanɩ?”
66018019	Ba Ꞌwↄ̃wnↄ na a tana ƴↄnↄ a ba jurɩ̃, waala kono yele nɩ: “A tẽ-kpɛ̃ɛ nanɩ ɩ na nãw nãw! A bala na dãa tʋnↄ a gbor-bɛrɛ pʋↄ pↄwrↄ na a ba mɩ̃ɛ a ʋ na-yele ɩnɛ, ɩ̃-cɛ a lɛɛr-bõ-ƴen pʋↄ a ʋ yele bↄrʼã a jaa.”
66018020	Saa juu deme, nyɩ́ cɩlɛ! A Naaŋmɩn nɩbɛ, nɩ a ʋ nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ, nɩ a ʋ ƴɛr-hierbe, nyɩ́ mɩ cɩlɛ a ʋna tẽw kpãafʋ ɩnɛ, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn guorʼã a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ tu nɩ a ala ʋ na dãa maal nyɩ.
66018021	A ala ɩ̃ baar, a sɩ-tʋ̃-gãdaa de na kʋsɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ na jɛ̃ taa nɩ nɩɛr lↄb ƴↄ̃w a man kʋ̃ↄ pʋↄ, ɩ̃ yel: “A nↄhↄ̃ ba nↄↄ lↄb a Babɩlↄ̃ tẽ-kpɛ̃ɛ bar, a nɩrɛ ma lↄↄ nyɛrɛ ʋ wa.
66018022	Baa lↄↄ wono a korĩjom ŋmefʋ, nɩ a yel-cɩɛrbɛ, nɩ a wɩɛ kuon, nɩ a ɩl-pɛɛlbɛ a fʋ jie wa. Baa lↄↄ nyɛrɛ tʋ̃tʋnↄ kãw ʋ lɛ tʋnↄ tʋn kãw a fʋ jie wa. Baa mɩ lↄↄ wono jↄ̃-ƴɛrbɛ dam a fʋ jie go wa.
66018023	Lãpa kãw ma lↄↄ caara a fʋ jie wa. A polbile nɩ a pↄsabile na kul taa kↄkɩɛ ma lↄↄ yire a fʋ jie wa. A fʋ ƴaƴabsɩ ɩ̃ dãa yi a yuor a tẽw pʋↄ, ɩ̃-cɛ a fʋ tɩsↄↄlʋ̃ʋ pʋↄ fʋ bɛlɩ̃ na a tẽ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ a jaa.”
66018024	A Babɩlↄ̃ tẽ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ, ba wɛl ʋ na a lɛ, a-na-ɩ ba nyɛ na a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe jɩ̃ɩ a ʋ jie, lãa nɩ a Naaŋmɩn nɩbɛ jɩ̃ɩ, nɩ a bala ba jaa ba na dãa kú a tẽw pʋↄ jɩ̃ɩ.
66019001	A ala ɩ̃ baar, ɩ̃ wõ na kↄkɩ-kpɛn na wↄ̃ taa nɩ nɩ-yaw kↄkɩɛ a saꞋlon na yele: “Aleluya! A faafʋ, a yo-yifʋ nɩ a kpɛ̃w ɩ na a sɩ Naaŋmɩn ben,
66019002	a-na-ɩ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ ɩ na yel-mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃ mɩ tor. A Naaŋmɩn ƴↄ̃w na a pↄw-baa ʋlↄ na yi a yuor yel, a ʋlↄ na dãa sãwna a tẽw ʋ jaa nɩ a ʋ burbur maalfʋ. Ʋ wɛl ʋ na bar a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ ʋ na kú ɩnɛ.”
66019003	Ba lɛ yelʼã go: “Aleluya! A tẽ-kpɛ̃ɛ ʋlↄ jʋʋr ure na a daar a jaa.”
66019004	Ɩ̃ a nɩ-bɛrɛ lɩjɛrʼɩ̃ anaan nɩ a yel-mimie anaan lo na gburĩ a dume a Naaŋmɩn ʋlↄ na jɛ a naa-dakↄw juu nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ pɛwrɛ ʋ yele nɩ: “Amɛn! Aleluya!”
66019005	Kↄkɩr kãw yi na a naa-dakↄw jie, ɩ̃ yel: “A nyɩmɩ na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn tʋ̃tʋnbↄ, ɩ̃ mɩ jↄrↄ ʋ, a bibiir nɩ a nɩ-bɛrɛ jaa, nyɩ́ pɛwrɛ a sɩ Naaŋmɩn!”
66019006	Ɩ̃ lɛ wõ na dam na wↄ̃ taa nɩ nɩ-yaw kↄkɩɛ na hele kʋ̃ↄ kpɛ̃ɛ kaarɩ̃, nɩ a saa na tana nɩ kpɛ̃w, a yele: “Aleluya! A sɩ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Naaŋmɩn na ɩ a kpɛ̃w a jaa Sʋbↄ de na a tẽw.
66019007	Nyɩ́ ɩ a sɩ tɛrɛ nʋ̃ↄ cɩlɛ nɩ, kʋrↄ nɩ ʋ a ju-kpɛ̃ɛ, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn Pẽle kulfʋ daar ta na, a ʋ baraa parɩ̃sɩ.
66019008	Ba kʋ ʋ na sↄr ʋ vaar a cẽcẽ-ɓↄmↄ pɩlpɩl na nyɩlɛ.” (A cẽcene ala miile na a Naaŋmɩn deme tʋ̃-torisɩ.)
66019009	Ɩ̃ a sɩ-tʋnaa yel ma na: “Sɛb a asɩmɛ: A ma ɩ na nʋ̃ↄ a bala jie ba na bʋↄl a Naaŋmɩn Pele kulfʋ fɛtɩ jie.” Ɩ̃ ʋ lɛ yel ma na: “A ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ asɩmɛ ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ.”
66019010	Ɩ̃ lo gburĩ a dume a ʋ gbɛɛ pulẽe bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ puor ʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ ʋ yel ma na: “Taa maal a lɛ wa. Ɩ̃ ɩ na a tʋ̃tʋnↄ a fʋ̃ʋ nɩ a fʋ yɛɛr kaarɩ̃ na tɛrɛ a Jeeju yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃. Pɛwrɛ a Naaŋmɩn!” A Jeeju yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃ ɩ na a ʋlↄ na tↄwrↄ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃-bʋʋrbↄ a ba ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ pʋʋr.
66019011	Ɩ̃ ɩ̃ nyɛ na a saa juu ʋ yuo, ɩ̃ a wi-pɩlaa ɩraa a be. A ʋlↄ na do ʋ yuor dɩ na a Dẽdẽ nɩ a Yel-mɩ̃ɛ Sʋbↄ, a-na-ɩ a ʋ ƴɛrɩ̃ guorfʋ nɩ a ʋ jɛb jɛbfʋ torʼã.
66019012	A ʋ mimie nyɩnyɩlɛ na vũu kaarɩ̃, ɩ̃ ʋ kpa sɛlmɛ sapir yaw a ʋ juumɩ. Ba sɛbʼã a yuor ƴↄ̃w ʋ, a ʋlↄ ʋ yẽ tɛw na bↄ̃w.
66019013	Ʋ su na cẽcen na ɩ jɩ̃ɩ ʋ jaa. A ʋ yuor dɩ na, “A Naaŋmɩn Yɛrɩ̃.”
66019014	A saa juu sↄdaalsɩ na su a cẽcẽ-pɛlɛ pɩlpɩl do na wi-pɛlɛ tuure nɩ ʋ.
66019015	A sↄ-bãjɩn-dɩraa yi na a ʋ nʋↄr pʋↄ, ʋ na cɩɛrɛ nɩ a ten bʋrↄ bʋrↄ. Ʋ na tɛrɛ ba na nɩ a kpɛ̃w ʋlↄ na wↄ̃ a kur kaarɩ̃. Ʋ na nɛbʼã a dɩvɛ̃ tɩ-wↄmↄ a bↄw kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ a dɩvɛ̃ kʋ̃ↄ jↄrↄ, a miile a Naaŋmɩn na ɩ a kpɛ̃w a jaa Sʋbↄ su-tuo na nyɩrɩ̃ tomo.
66019016	Ba sɛbʼã a ʋ yuor ƴↄ̃w a ʋ cẽcen juu, nɩ a ʋ gbɛ-kpɛ̃ɛ pʋↄ a nↄhↄ̃: “Jamansɩ Jamana, nɩ a nɩ-bɛrɛ Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ.”
66019017	Ɩ̃ lɛ nyɛ na sɩ-tʋnaa kãw na ɩraa a mↄtↄ̃w sↄↄlɩ̃sↄw ɩ̃ wuurʼɩ̃ kↄkɩr kpɛ̃w yel a wɛ-lili ba jaa na yʋↄrↄ a saꞋlon: “Nyɩ́ wa kpaarɩ̃ taa a Naaŋmɩn fɛtɩ kpɛ̃ɛ ɩnɛ!
66019018	Nyɩ́ wa dɩ a jamansɩ nɩn, nɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa nɩn: a fãgã deme, nɩ a gãdar, a wibe, nɩ a bala na do ba, a bala na sↄ a ba mɩ̃ɛ, nɩ a bala na ɩ a gbãgbaar, a bibiir nɩ a nɩ-bɛrɛ ba jaa nɩn.”
66019019	Ɩ̃ lɛ nyɛ na a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ, nɩ a tẽw pʋↄ jamansɩ, nɩ a ba sↄdaalsɩ, a ba kpaarɩ̃ taa bʋↄrↄ ba jɛbʼɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na do a wiir, nɩ a ʋ sↄdaalsɩ.
66019020	Ba nyↄw na a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ ʋlↄ, nɩ a jir-ŋma-ƴɛr-hiere ʋlↄ na dãa maal a nↄ-kofʋ tʋmↄ a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ nii-sↄw, bɛlɛ nɩ a bala na dãa pↄw a ʋ jɩbaa puoro nɩ a ʋ bʋtɩɩb. Ba nyↄw ba na ba jaa ayi lↄb ƴↄ̃w a vuu bↄw pʋↄ, a jie ʋlↄ a kʋsɩ-Ꞌlerisɩ na dɩrɛ.
66019021	Á bala na cɛ, a ʋlↄ na do a wiir juu kú ba na nɩ a sↄ-bãjɩnɛ ʋlↄ na yi a ʋ nʋↄr pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a wɛ-lili dɩ a ba nɩn pi.
66020001	A ala ɩ̃ baar, ɩ̃ lɛ nyɛ na sɩ-tʋnaa ʋ yi a saꞋlon suu ɩ̃ tɛrɛ a bↄw ʋlↄ na ma tɛrɛ a bɛwfʋ wa nakili a ʋ nuu pʋↄ, nɩ a bↄ̃jↄrɩ̃ gbol.
66020002	Ʋ nyↄw na a gbãgbacol na ɩ a wa-kʋraa, a lɛ yelʼã a ʋlↄ na ɩ a cicile, mɩɩ a Satã, ɩ̃ lũ nɩ ʋ a ʋ bↄ̃jↄrɩ̃ gbol, ʋ na maal yomo tur.
66020003	Ʋ de ʋ na lↄb ƴↄ̃w a bↄw ʋlↄ pʋↄ na ma tɛrɛ a bɛwfʋ wa, ɩ̃ kpal ƴↄ̃w nɩ a jɩbaa, a mɩnɛ ʋ kↄ̃ lɛ tʋↄ cãa bɛlɛ a tẽw nɩbɛ wa ta nɩ a yomo tur ala na tↄlↄ. A ala ɩ̃ tↄl baar, a sɛw na a ba na Ꞌlor ʋ bar daar fɩ̃ɩ pʋↄ.
66020004	Ɩ̃ lɛ nyɛ na naa-dakↄↄr, ɩ̃ a bala na jɛ a ba jur, ba kʋ ba na a sↄr a ba guor a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ. Ɩ̃ a bala na dãa mana a Jeeju yel-mɩ̃ɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛrɩ̃ a ba ŋma ba a jur, ɩ̃ nyɛ na a ba sɩɩr. A bala, baa dãa pɛwrɛ a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ nɩ a ʋ bʋtɩɩb wa. Baa mɩ dãa pↄw a ʋ jɩbaa a diirɩ̃ mɩɩ a nuu pʋↄ wa. Ba irʼã a kũu pʋↄ lãa jɛ nɩ a Kirisi a ʋ fãw pʋↄ maalʼɩ̃ yomo tur.
66020005	A nanɩ ɩ na a dãdãw kũu-pʋↄ-irfʋ, ɩ̃ a bala na cɛ ma ir a kũu pʋↄ ɩ̃ a ala ma ɩ a lɛ a yomo tur na tↄl baar wa.
66020006	A na ɩ na nʋ̃ↄ a Naaŋmɩn deme bala jie na be a dãdãw kũusɩ irfʋ pʋↄ. A gbɛɛ ayi kũu ma lɛ tʋↄrↄ ba wa. Ba na ɩ na a Naaŋmɩn nɩ a Kirisi baar-lorbo, lãa jɛ nɩ a Kirisi a ʋ fãw pʋↄ maalʼɩ̃ yomo tur.
66020007	Ɩ̃ a yomo tur ala wa tↄl baar, ba na Ꞌlorʼã a Satã bar, ʋ yi a kasu pʋↄ,
66020008	na ʋ cen na bɛlɩ̃ a ten bʋrↄ bʋrↄ a lõbobo a jaa, ba na bʋↄlↄ a Gↄgɩ nɩ a Magↄgɩ, kpaarɩ̃ ba taa a jɛb ɩnɛ. Ba na waa na jɛ̃ taa nɩ a man gbẽgbere nʋↄr biire.
66020009	Ba yɛrʼã pↄw a tẽw ʋ jaa, ɩ̃ mɩ jilĩ kolĩ a Naaŋmɩn deme wɩɛr, nɩ a tẽw ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na nʋ, ɩ̃-cɛ a vũu yi na a saꞋlon ɩ̃ lo dɩ ba.
66020010	Ba lↄbʼã a cicile ʋlↄ na dãa bɛlɛ a tẽw nɩbɛ, ƴↄ̃w a vũu bↄw pʋↄ, a jie ʋlↄ a kʋsɩ-Ꞌlerisɩ na dɩrɛ, a be a wɛ-dʋ̃ↄ nɩ a jir-ŋma-ƴɛr-hiere na be, a ba na kpow ba a mↄtↄ̃w nɩ a tɩsↄw a yomo a jaa fɛw.
66020011	Ɩ̃ ɩ̃ lɛ nyɛ na naa-dakↄw kpɛ̃ɛ na pɛlɩ̃, nɩ a ʋlↄ na jɛ a ʋ juu, ɩ̃ a tene nɩ a saꞋlon nɩɩrɩ̃ a ʋ nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ a baa lɛ nyɛrɛ ba wa.
66020012	Ala ɩ̃ baar, ɩ̃ nyɛ na a bibiir nɩ a nɩ-bɛrɛ bala na dãa kpi, a ba ɩraa a naa-dakↄw nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ a ba yuo sɛbsɩ bin, ɩ̃ lɛ yuo sɛb-kpee na ɩ a baafʋ sɛbɛ. Ba guorʼã a kũusɩ bala ƴɛrɩ̃ tu nɩ a ala ba na dãa maal, a ba sɛb ƴↄ̃w a sɛbsɩ pʋʋr.
66020013	A man tɩɩrʼã a kũusɩ bala ʋ na dãa tɛrɛ. A kũu nɩ a kpɩɩn tẽw mɩ tɩɩr a kũusɩ bala ba na mɩ dãa tɛrɛ, ɩ̃ a ba guor a ba ƴɛrɩ̃ ba jaa bõ-ƴene-ƴene, tu nɩ a ala ba na dãa maal.
66020014	Ba lↄbʼã a kũu nɩ a kpɩɩn tẽw ƴↄ̃w a vũu bↄw pʋↄ. A vũu bↄw ʋlↄ ɩ na a gbɛɛ ayi kũu.
66020015	Ɩ̃ ba mɩ lↄbʼã a nɩrɛ lɛ na ma tɛrɛ a ʋ yuor a baafʋ sɛbɛ pʋↄ wa ƴↄ̃w a vũu bↄw pʋↄ.
66021001	Ala ɩ̃ baar, ɩ̃ nyɛ na saꞋlon paalaa nɩ tẽ-paalaa, a-na-ɩ a dãdãw saꞋlon nɩ a dãdãw tẽw tↄlʼã, ɩ̃ a man ma lɛ be be go wa.
66021002	Ɩ̃ mɩ nyɛ na a tẽ-son na ɩ a Jerujalɛm paalaa a Naaŋmɩn na cↄↄrɩ̃ bar, ʋ yi a saa juu ɩ̃ suure, wↄ̃ taa nɩ pↄsabile na parɩ̃sɩ cere a ʋ sɩrɛ tuorfʋ jie.
66021003	Ɩ̃ wõ na kↄkɩr kpɛ̃w na yi a naa-dakↄw par na yel: “A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, a Naaŋmɩn wa na jɛ a nɩbɛ sↄ̃w! Ʋ na jɛ nɩ ba na, ɩ̃ ba na ɩ na a ʋ nɩbɛ. A Naaŋmɩn na be nɩ ba na, ɩ̃ ɩ a ba Naaŋmɩn.
66021004	Ʋ na fɛ na a ba mↄtↄ̃-kʋ̃ↄ a jaa bar a ba mimie pʋↄ. Kũu kↄ̃ lɛ be go wa. A nãw nɩ a waalɩ̃fʋ kↄ̃ mɩ lɛ be wa. Bom ma lɛ Ꞌwↄbɛɛ nɩrɛ wa, a-na-ɩ a yel-koro tↄlʼã.”
66021005	Ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na jɛ a naa-dakↄw juu yelʼã: “A ƴɛ̃ƴɛrɩ̃ na, ɩ̃ maala na a yele a jaa a ɩrɛɛ yel-paala.” Ʋ lɛ yelʼã go: “Sɛb a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ asɩmɛ, a-na-ɩ a ɩ na dẽdẽ ɩ̃ mɩ ɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃.”
66021006	Ɩ̃ ʋ yel ma na go: “Á maalʼã. A maa ɩ a dãdãw nɩ a bɛwfʋ jie, a nyↄwfʋ jie nɩ a baarfʋ jie. A ʋlↄ a kʋ̃ↄ-nyuur na nyↄw, ɩ̃ na kʋ ʋ na a baafʋ kʋ̃ↄ bunaa a pↄrↄ.
66021007	A ʋlↄ na ɩrɛɛ a tʋↄfʋ sʋbↄ na pↄw na a yele ala. Ɩ̃ na ɩ na a ʋ Naaŋmɩn, ɩ̃ ʋ ɩ a ɩ̃ bie.
66021008	Ɩ̃-cɛ a ala ɩ a dãbɩ̃-ŋmah, nɩ a bala na ma tɛrɛ a ƴↄ̃w-nyãa wa, a nɩ-kpansɩ, a nɩ-kúrbↄ, a gã-ta-burbur deme, a tɩsↄw nɩbɛ, a tɩbɛ deme, nɩ a jir-ŋmarba ba jaa, a ba jie na be na a vũu bↄw pʋↄ, a jie a kʋsɩ-Ꞌlerisɩ na dɩrɛ, na ɩ a gbɛɛ ayi kũu.”
66021009	A sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ anuu-nʼayi bala na tɛrɛ a lara anuu-nʼayi na sɛw nɩ a jãjĩ-yel-baarsɩ anuu-nʼayi, bõ-ƴen wa na yel ma: “Wa, ɩ̃ na miil fʋ na a Naaŋmɩn Pẽle pↄw ʋ na kule.”
66021010	Ɩ̃ a sɩ-tʋnaa ɓↄw ma na a sɩɛ pʋↄ, do nɩ tã-kpɛ̃ɛ juu ɩ̃ miil ma a tẽ-son na ɩ a Jerujalɛm, na yi a Naaŋmɩn sɛ̃ a saa juu ɩ̃ suure,
66021011	nyɩnyɩlɛ nɩ a Naaŋmɩn yo-yifʋ. A ʋ caarɩ̃fʋ wↄ̃ na taa nɩ a kubi-ɓↄmↄ na dɩ jasɩpɩ na nyɩlɛ papar.
66021012	Ʋ tɛrɛ na dacĩ-woor ba na mɛ kolĩ ʋ, ʋ do a saꞋlon, ɩ̃ tɛrɛ dↄ̃dↄ-nↄɛ pie-nʼayi ba na sɛb a Ɩsɩrayɛl nɩbɛ bal pie-nɩʼayi yoe ƴↄ̃w, ɩ̃ a sɩ-tʋnɩsɩ pie-nʼayi na gure.
66021013	A dↄ̃dↄɛ ala be na a tẽw Ɩõbobo a jaa: ata be na a tẽw parɩ̃, a ata be a dʋrɩ̃ loor, a ata be a tẽw iin, ɩ̃ a ata mɩ be a gʋbaa loor.
66021014	Ba mɛ na a dacĩ-woor ʋlↄ dↄↄl a kubie pie-nʼayi jur ba na sɛb a yoe pie-nʼayi ƴↄ̃w, na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn nɩ-tʋnɩsɩ yoe.
66021015	Á sɩ-tʋnaa ʋlↄ naƴɛrɛ nɩ ma tɛrɛ na da-mɩɩnaa na ɩ a sɛlmɛ ʋ na mɩɩnʼɩ̃ a tẽw, nɩ a ʋ dↄ̃dↄɛ, nɩ a ʋ dacin.
66021016	A tẽw womofʋ nɩ a yalɩ̃fʋ jɛ̃ na tar. A sɩ-tʋnaa mɩɩnʼã a tẽw nɩ a ʋ da-mɩɩnaa, a womofʋ ɩ kilo ture ayi dↄↄl kↄↄr ayi. A mɩnɛ ʋ na yalɩ̃ ɩ̃ mɩ womo, lɛ ʋ mɩ do.
66021017	A ala ɩ̃ baar, ʋ mɩ mɩɩnʼã a dacin, ʋ ta da-mɩɩnaa kʋbaa lɩjaayi nʼanaan. A ʋ da-mɩɩnaa ʋlↄ jɛ̃ na taa nɩ a nɩrɛ nuu kpʋlɩ̃kpʋʋr wa ta nɩ a nubie.
66021018	Ba mɛ na a dacin nɩ a jasɩpɩ, ɩ̃ mɛ a tẽw nɩ a sɛlmɛ nɛrɛ na nyɛrɛ caaraa kaarɩ̃.
66021019	Ba ƴaarɩ̃ na a dacĩ-kparaa kubi-bɛrɛ nɩ a kʋsɩ-ɓↄmↄ bʋrↄ bʋrↄ. A dãdãw kubir ƴaarɩ̃fʋ bom ɩ na jasɩpɩ, a gbɛɛ ayi ben ɩ na safɩɩr, a gbɛɛ ata ben ɩ na agatɩ, a gbɛɛ anaan ben ɩ na ɛmɛrↄdɩ,
66021020	a gbɛɛ anuu ben ɩ na onɩsɩ, a gbɛɛ ayʋↄb ben ɩ na sardↄn, a gbɛɛ anuu-nʼayi ben ɩ na kɩrɩsʋlɩtɩ, a gbɛɛ anuu-nʼata ben ɩ na beril, a gbɛɛ pie-for-bir ben ɩ na topajɩ, a gbɛɛ pie ben ɩ na kɩrɩsʋpasɩ, a gbɛɛ pie-nɩ-bõ-ƴen ben ɩ na turkosi, ɩ̃ a gbɛɛ pie-nʼayi ben ɩ a amɛtɩsɩtɩ.
66021021	A dↄ̃dↄ-nↄɛ pie-nʼayi ala ɩ na lɛr-bie pie-nʼayi. Lɛr-bir bõ-ƴene-ƴene ba maalʼɩ̃ ba ba jaa. A sↄr ʋlↄ na be a tẽw pʋↄ ɩ na sɛlmɛ nɛrɛ na nyɛrɛ caaraa kaarɩ̃.
66021022	Maa nyɛ a puorfʋ yir a ʋna tẽw pʋↄ wa, a-na-ɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Naaŋmɩn na ɩ a kpɛ̃w a jaa Sʋbↄ, nɩ a Naaŋmɩn Pẽle, ɩ̃ ɩ a ʋ puorfʋ yir.
66021023	A tẽw ʋlↄ ma bʋↄrↄ mↄtↄ̃w mɩɩ cuu a na caara ʋ wa, a-na-ɩ a Naaŋmɩn yo-yifʋ caarɩ̃ ʋ na, ɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn Pẽle ɩ̃ ɩ a ʋ lãpa.
66021024	A tẽ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ nɩbɛ na yʋↄrↄ na a ʋ cãa pʋↄ, ɩ̃ a tẽw pʋↄ jamansɩ na de na a ba na-yele wɩɛrɛ nɩ kʋrↄ ʋ.
66021025	A ʋ dↄ̃dↄ-nↄɛ na yuo na a mↄtↄ̃w a jaa, a-na-ɩ tɩsↄw ma lɛ beree be wa.
66021026	Ba na de na a tẽ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ na-yele nɩ a ba yo-yifʋ yele wɩ nɩ kpɛ nɩ a be.
66021027	Ɩ̃-cɛ bõ-dɛɛr kãw ma kpɛɛrɛ be fɩ̃ɩ wa. A nɩrɛ lɛ na maala a yel-kpansɩ, mɩɩ na ŋmara a jirsɩ ma mɩ kpɛɛrɛ wa, ɩ̃ a bala a yoe na sɛb a Naaŋmɩn Pẽle baafʋ sɛbɛ pʋↄ tɛw na kpɛ.
66022001	Ɩ̃ a sɩ-tʋnaa miil ma na a baafʋ kʋ̃ↄ kʋlaa, a kʋ̃ↄ na ɩ wɩl-wɩl-wɩl caaraa kaarɩ̃, na yi a Naaŋmɩn nɩ a Péle naa-dakↄw par,
66022002	ɩ̃ jↄrↄ a tẽw sↄr sↄↄlɩ̃sↄw. A baafʋ tɩɛ ɩraa na a kʋlaa lõbobo pʋʋr a jaa, na wↄnↄ a wↄmↄ gbɛɛ pie-nʼayi a yuon pʋↄ, a lɛ yelʼã a gbɛ-daa a cur a jaa pʋↄ. A ʋ vɛɛ ɩ na tɩ̃ɩ, ma kpaara a tẽ-bʋrↄ bʋrↄ nɩbɛ.
66022003	A Naaŋmɩn pↄfʋ ma lɛ beree bom kãw pʋↄ wa. A Naaŋmɩn nɩ a Pẽle naa-dakↄw na be na be, ɩ̃ a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ na pɛwrɛ ʋ na.
66022004	Ba na nyɛ na a ʋ nii-sↄw, ɩ̃ ʋ na sɛbʼã a ʋ yuor ƴↄ̃w a ba diirɩ̃.
66022005	Tɩsↄw ma lɛ beree wa, ɩ̃ baa lↄↄ bʋↄrↄ lãpa cãa, mɩɩ mↄtↄ̃w caarɩ̃fʋ wa, a-na-ɩ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Naaŋmɩn na caarɩ̃ ba na nɩ a ʋ cáa, ɩ̃ ba na ɩ na jamansɩ a daar a jaa.
66022006	A ala ɩ̃ baar, a sɩ-tʋnaa yel ma na: “A ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ asɩmɛ ɩ na dẽdẽ, ɩ̃ mɩ ɩ a yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃, ɩ̃ a Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Naaŋmɩn na ma tↄwrↄ a ʋ ƴɛr-hierbe a ba sɩɛ pʋↄ, tʋ̃ na a ʋ sɩ-tʋnaa ʋ wa miil a ʋ tʋ̃tʋnbↄ a ala na be a sↄr pʋↄ wáara.”
66022007	A Jeeju yelʼã: “Nyɛ, ɩ̃ be na a sↄr pʋↄ wɩɛrɛ. Nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a ʋlↄ jie na jↄrↄ a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃-bʋʋrↄ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ na be a sɛbɛ na pʋↄ.”
66022008	A maa Jã, ɩ̃ wõ na ɩ̃ mɩ nyɛ a ana yele, ɩ̃ a mɩnɛ ɩ̃ na wõ ɩ̃ nyɛ ba baar, ɩ̃ lo na a sɩ-tʋnaa ʋlↄ na miil ma a ana yele gbɛɛ pulẽe bʋↄrↄ ɩ̃ puor ʋ.
66022009	Ɩ̃ ʋ yel ma na: “Taa maal a lɛ wa! Ɩ̃ ɩ na a fʋ lãa-tʋnↄ, nɩ a fʋ yɛɛr na ɩ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hierbe lãa-tʋnↄ, lãa nɩ a bala na jↄrↄ a sɛbɛ na ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ. Pɛwrɛ a Naaŋmɩn!”
66022010	Ɩ̃ ʋ lɛ yel ma na: “Taa sↄↄlɩ̃ a Naaŋmɩn ƴɛr-hiere ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ na be a sɛbɛ na pʋↄ bar wa, a-na-ɩ a daar ʋlↄ a Naaŋmɩn na ƴↄ̃w pɩɛlɛ na.
66022011	A gõgolĩfʋ sʋbↄ, ú cãa cere nɩ a ʋ gõgolĩfʋ, a nɩ-kpana ú cãa cere nɩ a ʋ maal-kpana, a nɩ-son ú cãa cere nɩ a ʋ son maalfʋ, ɩ̃ a ʋlↄ na ɩ a nɩ-cɛcɛ ú cãa cere nɩ a ʋ cɛcɛ ɩfʋ.”
66022012	Ɩ̃ a Jeeju yelʼã: “Nyɛ, ɩ̃ be na a sↄr pʋↄ wɩɛrɛ nɩ a yar ala ɩ̃ na kʋrↄ a nɩbɛ ba jaa bõ-ƴene-ƴene, tuure nɩ a ba tʋ̃-bie.
66022013	A maa ɩ a dãdãw nɩ a bɛwfʋ jie, a ni-diere nɩ a par-pↄↄrↄ, a nyↄwfʋ jie nɩ a baarfʋ jie.”
66022014	Nʋ̃ↄ ma be na a bala jie na ma pɛɛrɛ a ba cẽcene, na tʋↄ tɛrɛ a sↄr Ꞌwↄbↄ nɩ a baafʋ tɩɛ wↄmↄ, na mɩ tʋↄ tu a dↄ̃dↄ-nↄɛ kpɛ a tẽw pʋↄ.
66022015	Ɩ̃-cɛ a nɩ-kpansɩ, a tɩsↄw nɩbɛ, a gã-ta-burbur deme, a nɩ-kúrbↄ, a tɩbɛ deme, nɩ a bala ba jaa na nʋ a jirsɩ ŋmafʋ mɩ maala nɩ a jiri tʋmↄ, ba na ɩraa na be a yẽw.
66022016	“A maa Jeeju ɩ̃ tʋ̃ a ɩ̃ sɩ-tʋnaa ʋ wɩ man nyɩ a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ asɩmɛ a duo-puorbo ɩnɛ. Maa ɩ̃ ɩ a Davɩtɩ bal parvʋↄr bie, nɩ a bi-vɩɛ ŋmarbir na caara.”
66022017	A Naaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nɩ a Pẽle Pↄw-kulaa yelʼã: “Wa!” A ʋlↄ na mɩ wonaa, ú mɩ yel: “Wa!” A ʋlↄ a kʋ̃ↄ-nyuur na nyↄw, ú wa; a ʋlↄ na mɩ bʋↄrↄ a baafʋ kʋ̃ↄ, ú wa nyu pↄrↄ.
66022018	A maa Jã, ɩ̃ kpãkpana na a nɩbɛ ba jaa na wono a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃-bʋʋrↄ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ na be a sɛbɛ na pʋↄ: a ala ɩ nɩrɛ wa dↄↄlʼã bom a ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ asɩmɛ pʋↄ, a Naaŋmɩn na mɩ dↄↄl ʋ na a jãjĩ-yele ala na be a sɛbɛ na pʋↄ.
66022019	Ɩ̃ a nɩrɛ wa mɩ ir bom a Naaŋmɩn pʋ-tɩɛrʋ̃-bʋʋrↄ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ na be a sɛbɛ na pʋↄ, a Naaŋmɩn na mɩ mↄ̃w ʋ na a baafʋ tɩɛ wↄmↄ Ꞌwↄbfʋ bar, nɩ a tẽ-son pʋↄ kpɛfʋ na ɩ a ala ba na sɛb ƴↄ̃w a sɛbɛ na pʋↄ.
66022020	A ʋlↄ na mana a yel-mɩ̃ɛ ƴɛrɩ̃sɩ asɩmɛ yele na: “ↄↄ, ɩ̃ be na a sↄr pʋↄ wɩɛrɛ!” Amɛn! Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju, wa!
66022021	A Nɩ-kpɛ̃ɛ Jeeju sũofʋ ú be a nɩbɛ ba jaa jie.
